40001001	A wo li nwer nyi et'tohngo ji Jisos Kraist lohng no, ji jolo mmon a Devid, Devid ji jolo mmon no Ebraham.
40001002	Ebraham jele Aisik. Aisik jel Jekob. Jekob jel Juda, a abon bako.
40001003	Juda jele Peres, go Sera. Nnyehn ebo, bo jo lung-e re Tamar. Peres jel Hesron. Hesron jel Ram.
40001004	Ram jel Aminadab, Aminadab jel Nason. Nason jel Salmon.
40001005	Salmon jel Boas. Nnyehn Boas, bo jo lung-e re Rehab. Boas jel Obed. Nnyehn Obed, bo jo lung-e re Rut. Obed jel Jesi.
40001006	Jesi jel Devid ji jolo ntul. Devid ji jolo ntul jel Solomon. Nnyehn Solomon tohko jol nkal Uraya.
40001007	Solomon jel Rehoboam. Rehoboam jel Abija. Abija jel Asa.
40001008	Asa jel Jehosafat. Jehosafat jel Joram. Joram jel Usia.
40001009	Usia jel Jotam. Jotam jel Ehas. Ehas jel Hesekaya.
40001010	Hesekaya jel Manase. Manase jel Amon. Amon jel Josia.
40001011	Josia jel Jekonia, a abon bako, ngare nyi anebe Bebilon ba bob abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon.
40001012	Ngare nyi bo ma bob abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon, owo Jekonia kehm jele Sealtiel. Sealtiel jel Serubabel.
40001013	Serubabel jel Abiud. Abiud jel Eliakim. Eliakim jel Asor.
40001014	Asor jel Sadohk. Sadohk jel Akim. Akim jel Eliud.
40001015	Eliud jel Eleasar. Eleasar jel Matan. Matan jel Jekob.
40001016	Jekob jel Josef ji jolo nlum a Meri. Meri ji jolo nnyehn Jisos, Jisos ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist.
40001017	Bomo goji Ebraham, nde nne l'jel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng go ngare nyi Devid, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani. Bomo goji Devid, nde nne l'jel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng ngare nyi bo bobo abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani. Bomo ngare nyi bo bobo abone Israel, tahm abo go Bebilon, nde nne l'jel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng ngare nyi Kraist, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani.
40001018	Ana wo bo jele Jisos Kraist. Nnyehn Jisos, bo jo lung-e re Meri. Ngare nyi bo ma lam elbal abola Josef, Josef tikem noongo a Meri, Meri sa ela go nsahm Etingi Etohko.
40001019	Josef nlum ewe jolo nnobeljina nne. Á sebem re á sono Meri. Á sebe mbang ana nyi á bahk-e tene, ane k'wuk.
40001020	Eji Josef jo tir nsol nyio kpee, enjel nyi Esowo kehm bake, ba kpir-e go nlem, kehm-e tongo re, “Josef ji mmon no Devid, ka kpe fahl elkoko Meri go elbal! Tibre ela bi á ma sa o, á sa go nsahm Etingi Etohko.
40001021	Á bahke jele mmon, no a bahk-e gungu mbing re Jisos (ji lohngo re nt'tahre). Tibre á bahke tahre ane ebe yehke go bo abiafem.”
40001022	Nsol nyia kpee limi, eji alum nya Ntul Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr l'lohko jol go etingitingi, nya á bungu re,
40001023	“Mmongungu a nnenkal, (Ngbahme nyi bo kala n'noongo a ne) bahke sake ela, jel mmon no nlum, no bo bahke jo lung-e re Emanuel.” (Ji lohngo re, “Esowo li a nahre”).
40001024	Josef nyahme kan go ellu, á kehm limi ana enjel nyi Ntul Esowo tong-e no, á feere song ko Meri go elbal.
40001025	Á tikem noongo a ne tete á jel ngbokambang a mmon ewe no nlum. Josef kehm-e gungu mbing re Jisos.
40002001	Jisos, bo jel-e go Betlehem ji Judea ngare nyi Herod jolo ntul. Owo akahnkahn ane kehm lohngo go ero nfam ba go Jerusalem,
40002002	ba kehme elbahbe re, “Mmon no na, no bo m-e jel, no li ntul no Jus? Tibre wahr ebnyehn elonlo eje go ero nfam. Owo wahnge e ba no re wahr ba kak-e.”
40002003	Eji ntul a Herod wuku ano, eltim kehm-e jokko, a aneb Jerusalem kpee.
40002004	Owo á kehm lungu atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Kraist jio, bo bahk-e jele gan?”
40002005	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Go Betlehem ji Judea. Tibre ana wo nnyehnamahr Esowo nyono no re,
40002006	“ ‘Wahn Betlehem ji Juda, wahn erennge ejahbe sang go mbang anyehng anyehng go ellong atubesi ajahbe nya li go Juda. Tibre go egahne ellong wo, ntubesi bahke lohngo, no bahke ba fili Israel, ane ebame.’ ”
40002007	Herod kehm lungu akahnkahn ane bao, tahm a bo go nkpohko, song bahb bo ekahmekahme ngare nyi elonlo jio lohngo no.
40002008	Owo á kehm tumu bo tv go Betlehem, a elle ni á tubu bo re, “Songen, wahn song seb mmon noo nob nob! Ń l'song seb-e nyehn, lim-m wahn, me n kahn, eji me n l'tob je song kak-e fvfo.”
40002009	Eji bo ma wuk ana ntul bungu no, bo kehm tahme. Elonlo ji bo jo nyehn go ero nfam kehm gboko bo mbang tete song yiimi edi ji mmon noo jolo no.
40002010	Eji bo kpe nyehn elonlo jio yim no, bo bele eyebatahng sehng, fere jo g'geere.
40002011	Bo kehm yele ekp'kpa, song nyehn mmon, a Meri nnyehn, gbo jamme alahng, kak mmon. Bo kehm soro lennge abam ebo, yehke agul, frankinsens, a mmir, yare mmon.
40002012	Esowo kehm rehke bo go nlem re, bo k'kpe feere goji Herod. Owo bo kehm sehnge mbang nyindiki kehnge.
40002013	Ngare nyi akahnkahn ane bao ma tahm fi, owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm ba kpiri Josef go nlem, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo rod mmon, a nnyehn, be, song go Ijipt, kang ona tete me n kpe ba tong-a. Tibre Herod yahke ba mmon noa seb re á wul.”
40002014	Josef kehm tahme, rod mmon, a nnyehn, bo tahm atv atv song rehng go Ijipt.
40002015	Owo á jolo no tete Herod kpo, eji l'lohko jol ana Ntul Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr re, “N lungu mmon ewame go Ijipt, á lohng ba.”
40002016	Herod sebe kan kahn re, akahnkahn ane m-e nehm, atahng kehm-e rake tete. Á kehm tumu ane, bo song wul abon ba nlum kpee go Betlehem, a abon ajahbe ba li sennge o kak, ba ma kang bomo nnya ebal feere ndi, tib ana á wuku goji akahnkahn ane bao bada ngare nyi elonlo lohngo no.
40002017	Ngare nyio nyi lohko lim ana nnyehnamahr Jeremaya bungu no re,
40002018	“Bobwuk ewahl ane go Rama, ewahl ji ane ma biingi aling, fere kp'lingi ndon ndon. Resel kp'lingi abon ebe. Bo kak-e eltim, jol eltim we tikem naange, tibre bo kpeem li elikiliki.”
40002019	Ngare nyi Herod ma kpo, owo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm kpe song kpiri Josef go nlem, eji á jolo go Ijipt, kehm-e tongo re,
40002020	“Tahm, rod mmon, a nnyehn, wo feere a bo go ndi nyi Israel. Tibre ane ba jo seb re bo ba wul mmon bobkpo.”
40002021	Josef kehm tahme, rod mmon, a nnyehn, feere a bo go ndi nyi Israel.
40002022	Eji Josef wuku re, Arkelaus ebko nji nyi nde Herod, kp'fili Judea, á kehm kehme elfahle eljeke o. Owo Esowo kehm-e kpe rehke go nlem, Josef kehm tahme go ejang bi Galili,
40002023	song lene go ejahbe ji bo kpo lung re Nasaret, eji l'lohko jol ana abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re, “Bo bahke jo lung-e re nne a Nasaret.”
40003001	Ngare nyio Jon ji nwohngalahb kehm lohngo ba, ba kehme elbungu go elka emahng nio ni Judea re,
40003002	“Yaangen elkpin enahne, tibre etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.”
40003003	Jon wo jolo nne no nnyehnamahr Aisaya jo bung bada ne, eji á jo bung re, “Nne noa, kp'rabe go elka emahng re, ‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bum-e. Limen mbang t'tor, nyi á bahke sehnge.’ ”
40003004	Nsol nyi Jon jo kak, bo limi go anyar nyam nyi bo kpo lung re ekamel. Á jo gbaange egbaange ji bo limi go ngunyam. Á jo li agohrobi, fere jo yab akehng ekon.
40003005	Ane jo lohngo go Jerusalem je go ege, a ane ba jolo go Judea kpee, go ane kpee ba lene ajahbe nya jolo egbuk ebbal ebbal bi aya ma bo kpo lung re Jodan.
40003006	Bo jo fvvrv abiafem ebo, á jo wohngo bo alahb go Jodan.
40003007	Eji Jon nyehne aneb Farisi, a anebe Sadusi gbalee kp'bake re á wohngo bo alahb, á kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn ane ba li ana akumbad ba! Nne awo tong-n re, ḿ bahke foro go erakatahng ji Esowo ji kp'bake?
40003008	Limen nsol nyi bahke tibi re, wahn eblohko yaange elkpin enahne.
40003009	Kana kpe laange, fere jo bung go egahna ntim re, ‘Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.’ N kp-n tongo re, Esowo bahke ma ko atal nyaa, lim abon ka Ebraham.
40003010	“Bobtoobo elfuk bum, ni bo bahke kiimi alohk nti, melle nti nyio. Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab akab nya nno, bo bahke mehle tub, fere rod kak agun.
40003011	“N kp-n wohngo alahb mao ma egbokondon. Nne no kp'bake toon-m wo ga gbal sehnge me. Jol me n fuumem re me n sol akpaketa enye. Á bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko, a agun.
40003012	A fili ed'da go ebo, kp'febe arasi enye. Á bahke kpuku arasi enye, song kak go ege ekp'kpa, fere jahm awal go agun nya l'k'tiki lahme elahmelahme.”
40003013	Ngare nyio Jisos kehm tahme go Galili, song rehng go Jodan goji Jon re Jon wohng-e alahb.
40003014	Jon jo gare re á sahd-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Kehn wo wo nobo re wo wohngo na me alahb, wo ma fere ba na ga egame.”
40003015	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nong jol ano! Tibre fuumu re wahr lim nsol kpee nyi Esowo sebe re wahr lim.” Jon kehm taame.
40003016	Tvtv o eji Jisos ma bel ewohngalahb, á kehm lohngo go alahb. Ngare nyio ejahbetul Esowo eblennge ka-e. Owo á kehm nyehne etohko ji Esowo go elfoongo ni ebbehl kp'badde abake, kehm ba jol a ne.
40003017	Owo bo kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame, no kpo kor-m s'sehng.”
40004001	Etingi Etohko kehm yehke Jisos, song kak go elka emahng re nnehm gar-e.
40004002	Eji Jisos ma bade elne njal nfung atahl abal, owo njal kehm-e yame.
40004003	Nnehm kehm bake, ba tong-e re, “A l'jol Mmon Esowo, tong atal nyaa siingi abred.”
40004004	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Abred nya nya sang wahnge nne kpo kpin, á kpo bel elkpin go ellum anehng anehng ni lohng go nnyo mi Esowo.’ ”
40004005	Nnehm kehm rodo Jisos, tahm a ne go mbarebare ejahbe, song kun-e go elkong etahk Esowo,
40004006	kehm-e tongo re, “A l'jol Mmon Esowo, yehb, wo ba gbo go ndi! Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, “ ‘Esowo bahke tongo enjel enye bada na. Bo bahk-a gbiiri go bo abo, eji a l'k'ba jahre akpade enya go eltal.’ ”
40004007	Jisos kehm faange re, “Bo t'tob nyon go nwer Esowo re, ‘Ka gare Esowo, Ntul ewa!’ ”
40004008	Nnehm kehm kpe rod Jisos, tahm a ne go ewong ji sahb w'wahre, fere tib-e ajahbe kpee nya li go njini, a ellub ni bo kpi no,
40004009	kehm-e tongo re, “M bahk-a kake nyaa kpee, a l'jamme alahng kak-m.”
40004010	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nnehm, tahm-m go esamahr! Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Esowo, Ntul ewa wo wo, a bahk-e jo kak. Ye ntahngtahng wo, a bahke fere jo lok-e.’ ”
40004011	Nnehm kehm-e soro yake. Babenjel soro ba kak-e ebo.
40004012	Eji Jisos wuku re, Jon, bo m-e kak ngbekobo, á kehm tahme eje, song rehng go Galili.
40004013	A kehm tahme go Nasaret, fere song lene go Kapenium ji jolo kohlo eto ji Galili, go ndi nyi abone Sebulon, a ba Naftali,
40004014	eji l'lohko jol jang jang ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no re,
40004015	“Ndi nyi abon Sebulon, a ba Naftali, ba lene ejang bio bi eto ji Galili li no, egbuk Jodan jehko go Galili jio ji ane ba ki nyi Esowo,
40004016	ane bao ba jehk go ejannge ebnyehn egburu ellennge. Ane bao ba nong go emel elkv, edi ebkehme bo lennge.”
40004017	Bomo ngare nyio asongo Jisos kehm kehme etib ebe tiingi re, “Senngen njahm go egahne abiafem! Tibre etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.”
40004018	Eji Jisos jo jen go nkpe eto nyi Galili, á kehm nyehne abasahre nsahre, ane na abal, noko jolo Saimon ji bo jo lung-e re Pita, noko, bo jo lung-e re Andru ji mmonannyehn Pita. Bo kake erim alahb.
40004019	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen toon-m, m bahk-n limi ń fere jo bim ane.”
40004020	Bo kehm soro tahm arim ebo sa, tahm toon-e.
40004021	Jisos kehm kpe sehng asongo, kpe song nyehn ane abal bako. Noko, bo jo lung-e re Jems. Noko, bo jo lung-e re Jon, mmonannyehn Jems. Bo jolo abon Sibidi. Bo woomo go egbang, jo baade arim ebo, a Sibidi nde ebo. Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo.
40004022	Bo kehm soro tahm egbang sa, tahm nde ebo sa, tahm toono Jisos.
40004023	Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge go Galili kpee, jo tib ane go bo ntahk ero, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib bio bi etul bi Esowo, fere jo lim ane, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.
40004024	Ane kpee ba jolo go Siria wuku kan elgahm ene, owo bo kehm koko aneb ayam kpee ba go ege, ba jo yam ajoobo ayam tvv, fere jo nyehn ajoobo arem, a ane ba bele abi atohko go bo a ntim, a aneb eyam atatehk, a ane ba ma banne. Jisos limi bo kpee, bo nob.
40004025	Ellong ane gbalee ba jo toon-e, egom jindiki lohng go Galili, egom jindiki lohng go Dekapolis, egom jindiki lohng go Jerusalem, egom jindiki lohng go Judea, egom jindiki lohng go egbuk Jodan jehko.
40005001	Eji Jisos nyehne ellong ane bao, á kehm tahme go ewong. Á ji kan a me, abat'toono ebe kehm bake go ege.
40005002	Á kehm kehme bo tib re,
40005003	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba ma gbo ekpak bio bi etohko. Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
40005004	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba jehk ndon ndon. Tibre bo bahke kake bo eltim.
40005005	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpi nnaange eljini. Tibre bo bahke bele njini ana ejum elehke elkv ebo.
40005006	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kp'sahb s'seb re bo li eno go esamahr bi Esowo. Tibre bo bahke lehke eno.
40005007	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba, ane kpo fili bo ndon. Tibre bo bahke tob fili Esowo ndon.
40005008	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba ntim ebo li saang. Tibre bo bahke nyehne Esowo.
40005009	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpo seb elkoono. Tibre bo bahke jo lung bo re abon ba Esowo.
40005010	“Elfuulu li ka ane ba, bo kp'nohko bo tib eji bo kp'limi nsol nyi li go etingitingi. Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
40005011	“Elfuulu li ka-n, ane l'jo su-n, fere jo nohk-n, fere jo kiimi elkohn efahnge anehng anehng lak-n tib go egame esi.
40005012	“Belen eyebatahng, wahn jo geere. Tibre eltuuru enahne ni li go ejahbetul Esowo kp'gbale. Ano wo bo jo tob nohk abanyehnamahr Esowo ba tohko jol, wahn kehm jini.
40005013	“Wahn ba li akang ma njini. Elyebe akang l'lohng go akang, bahke limi renan, kehm kpe yebe? Nehm kpe nob ellahbe. Bo bahke sale na wohng go, ane jo kadde sehng.
40005014	“Wahn ba li ellennge ni njini. Ejahbe ji bo si kunu go ewong nehm kpe ma biiri.
40005015	Nnene limm, no kpo nyaale et'rekahng, rod ejeere konngo. Á bahke rodo na kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu at'rekahng. Owo bahke yake ka ane kpee ba wob ekp'kpa jio.
40005016	Nong, ellennge enahne ni ń kpi no jo ya go esamahr ane, eji bo l'nyehn nnoobo enyahne nyi ń kpo lim, fere jo tehk nso ejahne no li go ejahbetul.
40005017	“Kana tir re m ba re me m ba range atahm nya Moses, a eltibi ni abanyehnamahr tibi no. M baam re me m ba range, m ba re me n gohro ba lim, biingi go nseenge.
40005018	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eji elbung abola ndi kpeke li, mmonr'rohka mmojum awohng awohng no atahm nehm range tete rehng es'kohro ji nsol kpee bahke male.
40005019	“Owo fvfo, nne awohng awohng no l'yuudu nr'rohka mmontahm awohng awohng, afi á tibi ane ano, ye wo bahke ga jol nkpak go ejahbetul Esowo sehnge ane kpee. Nne awohng awohng no l'bum atahm, fere jo t'tib, ye wo bahke jolo nj'joka nne go ejahbetul Esowo.
40005020	“N kp-n tongo re, ń nehm ma yel go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem re, eno ejahne ji ḿ bahke lehke go esamahr Esowo sehnge ji at'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi.
40005021	“Wahn ebwuk ana bo tongo ane ba jolo mahne mahne re, ‘Kana jo wul nne! Nne awohng awohng no l'wul nne, bo bahk-e koko, tahm ane go elam.’
40005022	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no eltim l'rak-e tob mmonannyehn, bo bahk-e koko, tahm a ne go elam. Nne awohng awohng no l'su mmonannyehn, bo bahk-e koko, tahm a ne go esub. Nne awohng awohng no l'tong mmonannyehn re, ‘Egboolo ji!’ yeblim ebi ji bo bahk-e koko, song kak go ellulagun.
40005023	“A l'ko ayare ba a nya go edi njom alimi, a l'fere buumu ona re, ń li go ntong awahn a mmonanne,
40005024	yake ayare enya bum kohlo edi njom alimi jio, wo feere, tohko song bung ntong nyio mal, fere koono a mmonanne, wo kehm feere ba ka ayare enya.
40005025	Jo koono a nnekv ewa elwaare, eji ngare kpeke li, eji nnekv ewa l'ki-a song kak esub, nlamalam rod-a kak mbehresi go ebo, á rod-a song kak ngbekobo.
40005026	Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Owo a bahke woomo tete a gohro gal mbong nyi a bele no, jol ederi ajehng ajehng nehm sa.
40005027	“Wahn ebwuk ana bo bungu re, ‘Ka jo lim erehbe!’
40005028	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no l'yehke amahr enye kunu nnenkal re á noongo a ne, yeblim abiafem nya erehbe go ege eltim.
40005029	Elmahr eboblum ena l'wahng re wo lim abiafem, luudu ro go! Ga nob re ejum ngubjing enya demme, sehnge re bo rod ngubjing enya kpee, song kak go ellulagun.
40005030	Eboblum eba l'wahng re wo lim abiafem, kim tub go! Ga nob re ejum ngubjing enya tan, sehnge re bo rod ngubjing enya kpee, song kak go ellulagun.
40005031	“Bo kpe bung re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no l'yehke nkal ewe elbal, nong á nyon nwer ka-e, nyi á me yehke elbal.’
40005032	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no l'yehke nkal ewe elbal, eji nnenlum nondiki ki noongo a ne, á kp-e limi re á lim erehbe. Nne awohng awohng no l'ko nnenkal no bo m-e yehke elbal, á kp'limi erehbe.
40005033	“Wahn ebtob wuk ana bo tongo ane ba jolo mahne mahne re, ‘Ka jo tir go edaange! Ka kane enyam bi a nyame no go esamahr bi Ntul Esowo!’
40005034	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, wahn k'jo tir nkpel anyehng anyehng. Kana jo tir elbung! Tibre elbung, eti etul ji Esowo ji.
40005035	Kana jo tir ndi! Tibre ndi, etikunakpade eje ji. Kana jo tir Jerusalem! Tibre Jerusalem, ejahbe ji egburu ntul ji.
40005036	Ka jo tir esi eja! Tibre a nehm ma lim ellv esi anehng re, jol mbarebare, jol a nehm ma lim re, jol nnyakenyake.
40005037	“Nong, wahn jo faange re, ‘Ee,’ tohko jol ano, ‘E'ee.’ Ellum anehng anehng ni l'jol sehnge ano, lohng goji Ebinne jio.
40005038	“Wahn ebwuk ana bo bungu re, ‘Nne no l'wa ntem elmahr, bo tob wa-e elmahr. Nne no l'bahk ntem elmahn, bo tob bahk-e elmahn.’
40005039	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo sahde ebi nne go eko! Nne l'rum-a elkpal go ekpoko eboblum, sennge ekpoko ebobkal ka-e, á kpe-a rum.
40005040	Nne no l'gbaame ewobo eja re á kp'koko, kpe yake nkud enya ka-e.
40005041	Nne no l'bob-a re, wo jen mmal anyehng a ne, jen mmal ebal a ne.
40005042	Nne no l'lem-a ejum, ka-e! Nne no l'ba re á ba yaame ejum go ega, ka-e!
40005043	“Wahn ebwuk ana bo tongo re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa bahke jo kor-a, nnekv ewa jo sab-a.’
40005044	Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nong, anebekv ebahne jo kor-n. Jo biren nnoobo tv ane ba kp-n suku! Jo limen nnoobo ka ane ba kpo ko-n ekv! Jo kaken ero ka ane ba kpo ka-n ebi mbol mbol, a ane ba kpo nohk-n,
40005045	eji ń l'jol abon ba Nso ejahne no li go ejahbetul. Tibre á kpo lim njul enye jo ya tub abi ane, a anoobo ane. Á kpo na elahb ka ane ba ma li eno, a ane ba ma li ebi.
40005046	“Anv, ane ba ń kpo kor bo, bo l'kor-n, eltuuru anii Esowo bahk-n tuuru? Anv, abakokatak kpehme lim anoa?
40005047	Ń l'jo kak abonane ejahne nnyo ba ba, anv, nkpokosi ejum anyi nyi ḿ ma lim? Anv, ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpehme lim anoa?
40005048	Jolen saang, wahn k'bel elem ajehng ajehng, ana Nso ejahne no li go ero li saang.
40006001	“Kunen ekpu, eji ń l'k'jo lim nnoobo enyahne go esamahr ane, tohko jol ano, Nso ejahne no li go ero wahn nehm tuuru.
40006002	Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi a l'lim nnoobo, ka jo tooro yannge, ana ane ba kpo tib elbo go ekp'kpa ero, fere jo jen alab nfam, eji ane l'jo tehk bo. N kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
40006003	A l'lim nnoobo, nong, ebobkal eba k'kahn ji eboblum eba kp'limi,
40006004	eji nnoobo enya nyi a kp'limi l'k'jo jol gbul gbul gbuul. Nso no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.
40006005	“A l'kehme ero kak, ka jo lim ana ane ba kpo tib elfuumu elfuumu. Kpo kor bo re bo jo mehl yiimi go ekp'kpa ero, fere yiimi elatahkgur, jo kak ero, eji ane l'nyehn bo. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
40006006	A l'kehm kake ero, yel go ega nkimi. Eji a ma bam mbu tv elna, wo kehm kake ero ka Nso no ane l'ki-e ma nyehn. Nsoo no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.
40006007	“A l'kehm kake ero, ka jo lim ewok mbol mbol, ana ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpo lim. Ane bao ba kpo tir re, Esowo bahke wuku bo, tib eji bo kp'kake alaabe aro.
40006008	Kana jol ana bo! Tibre Nso ejahne kp'kahne nsol nyi ń kp'sebe, jol ń kehm-e bahbe.
40006009	Ana wo nobo re wahn jo kak ero re, “Nso ejahre no li go ero, nong, mbing enya jol saang.
40006010	Yake etul eba ba. Nong, mbang enya lim, afi jolo go ndi, afi jolo go ero.
40006011	Ka-r ejum alehke ji l'biingi a nahre lela.
40006012	Jo tahm ka-r go egahre abiafem, ana wahr kpo tahm ka ane ba lim-r abiafem.
40006013	Ka lim, e yel go elgaare. Jo tahr-r yehke go abiafem.
40006014	“Ń l'tahm ka ane go bo ab'bi nya bo lim-n no, Nso ejahne no li go ero bahke tob tahm ka-n go egahne ab'bi.
40006015	Ń tohko tahm ka ane go bo ab'bi nya bo lim-n no, bahke limi renan, Nso ejahne kehm tob tahm ka-n?
40006016	“Ń l'kehme elnahne njal bade, kana jo gehn asamahr, ana ane ba kpo tib elfuumu elfuumu kpo lim. Bo kpo gbod asamahr ebo, eji ane l'kahn re, bo kpi elbo njal bade. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
40006017	A l'kehme elna njal bade, jo ru esamahr, wo fere jak esi,
40006018	eji ane l'k'kahn re, a kpi elna njal bade, sehngem Nso no ane kil-e elnyehne wo bahke kahne. Nso no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.
40006019	“Kana jo kpu nsol afang bum elnahne go njini nyia, edi ji bahke biili amahn, etan fere wo, awajv fere wa yel ba v.
40006020	Ga nob re wahn kpu nsol afang bum elnahne go ejahbetul Esowo, edi ji l'k'tiki biili amahn, etan l'k'ma wo, awajv l'k'ma wa yel song v.
40006021	Tibre eltim ena bahke tiki jol edi ji afang enya li no.
40006022	“Elmahr ni li ana et'rekahng ka ngubjing. Elmahr ena l'jol sange sange, ngubjing enya bahke bele ellennge.
40006023	Elmahr ena l'jol ab'bi ab'bi, ngubjing enya bahke jolo ejannge ejannge. Ellennge ni wob-a go atahng l'fere kpiidi, jol ejannge, nkom ejannge nyi bahke jolo tete, jol nyi nse sang.
40006024	“Nnene limm, no bahke ma loko nde na ebal. Á bahke koko noko ekv, noko jo kor-e. Tohko jol ano, á bahke lake na awohng, fere jo daange noko. Ń nehm ma loko Esowo, fere jo loko akpohko.
40006025	“Ana wo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo tiiri bada nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo li, fere jo w'wo, a nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo kak go ngubjing. Elkpin sang ga gbal sehnge nsol alehka? Ngubjing sang ga gbal sehnge aboma?
40006026	Nyehnen nruk ana bo kp'fonngo go elbung yannge. Bo kpehme bahm nsol. Bo kpehme kpa. Bo kpehme sol, song lake go abuungu. Nso ejahne no li go ero wo kpo le bo. Anv, wahn sang ga gbal sehnge nruka?
40006027	Nne awo ewahne no bahke kpe ma budu abon nnya go ege elkpin, eji á kp'tiiri ana?
40006028	“Jen ji wahnge ń kp'tiiri bada nsol ngubjing? Nyehnen ana at'tul nkpad kpo gbal go emahng. Bo kpehme nyennge lim eltum. Bo kpehme jamme nsol kak elbo.
40006029	N kp-n tongo re, Jol Solomon go ege ellub á liibem ana at'tul nyao.
40006030	Ana Esowo kpo liibi ajele nya li go emahng, nya kpo kpin lela lela, behna bo jahm fi, jen ji wahnge á l'ki-n tob liibi, wahn ji kp'kahn taame ntiil?
40006031	“Owo fvfo nobo re wahn k'jo tiiri, fere jo bung re, ‘Ejum aji e bahke jo li, fere jo wo, fere jo kak go ngubjing?’
40006032	Nsol nyia nyi ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpo tiiri. Wo, wahn, Nso ejahne no li go ero kp'kahne re, nsol nyia kpee nobo re wahn bel.
40006033	Ga nob re wahn gbo mbang tiiri bade etul bi Esowo, ana ḿ bahke lehke eno go ege esamahr. Á bahk-n budu nsol nyehko kpee.
40006034	“Kana jo tiiri bade nya behna! Nong behna tiiri bade elne. Efung abehng abehng kpo bel afemfem nyanye. Wahn, kana jo budu at'tiiri nya nyahne!
40007001	“Kana jo lam ane bako, eji Esowo l'ki-n tob lam.
40007002	Tibre go mbang ny'nehm nyi ń kpo lam ane bako, nyi nyi Esowo bahke tob ko lam-n. Ana ń gare no ka, ano wo Esowo bahke tob gare ka-n.
40007003	“Jen ji wahnge a kp'seenge mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr, a kil eltiiri bada nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr?
40007004	A bahke sahbe renan, tong mmonanne re, ‘Nong, me n yehk-a mmolsahk no wob-a go elmahr,’ eji nkporti wob-a go elmahr?
40007005	Wobnob tane! Tohko gbo mbang yehke nkporti go ega elmahr, eji a l'mal nyehn, yehke mmolsahk no wob go elmahr mmonanne.
40007006	“Kana jo ka ebv nsol Esowo nyi li eje eje, eji bo l'k'tahm kehm-n eljaake. Kana jo rod amohkesol ro tv akuk, eji bo l'k'kadde go bo akpade.
40007007	“Bahben, ḿ bahke bele. Seben, ḿ bahke nyehne. Kahden, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-n.
40007008	Tibre nne awohng awong no l'bahb, á bahke bele. Nne no l'seb, á bahke nyehne. Nne no l'kahd, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-e.
40007009	“Nne awo ewahne no bahke kake mmon ewe eltal, á l'bahb-e re á ka-e nsol alehke?
40007010	Afi á bahke rodo nnyo ka-e, á l'bahb-e re á ka-e nsahre?
40007011	Wahn ji li na abi ane, ń kp'kahne ana ń kpo ka abon ebahne nsol nyi nno, l'lim renan, Nso ejahne no li go ero l'ki-n tob ka nsol nyi nno, ń l'bahb-e?
40007012	“Nsol kpee nyi ń kp'sebe re ane bako jo lim ka-n, nyi nyi ḿ bahke tob jo lim ka bo. Ń l'lim ano, wahn ebbum atahm nya Esowo, a alum nya abanyehnamahr bungu no.
40007013	“Sehngen go nfiidifiidi eti mbu jio! Tibre mbang nyi li rehng go ellulagun, mbang elfohk elkul nyi, eti mbu eje kp'kpange. Ane gbalee ba kp'sehnge ona.
40007014	Wo, mbang nyi li rehng go elkpin, mbang asodaroongo nyi. Eti mbu eje li fii. Ane ba kp'nyehne mbang nyio li ntiil.
40007015	“Jo gberen akimfahnge abanyehnamahr. Bo kpo ba go egahne, jo ba lim, are ejoro bi. Wo, go bo atahng bo li, are abibbib enyam bi.
40007016	Go bo akab wo, ḿ bahke bo liingi. Anv, asokonso, nne kpo j'je song bong akab avaina? Agasame, nne kpo je song bong akab afiga?
40007017	“Eti ji nno ajehng ajehng kpo kab anoobo akab. Esabsab eti kpo kab abi akab.
40007018	Eti ji nno nehm ma kab abi akab. Esabsab eti nehm ma kab anoobo akab.
40007019	Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab anoobo akab, bo bahke gbahke kak agun.
40007020	Go bo akab wo fvfo, ḿ bahke bo liingi.
40007021	“Nne awohng awohng sang no kpo lung-m re, ‘Ntul, Ntul!’ bahke yele go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem ye ji kp'limi ji Nsoo no li go ero tong-e no re á lim bahke yele.
40007022	Efung bio ane gbalee bahk-m bahbe re, ‘Ntul, wahr sang jo nyehn amahr go ega mbinga, fere jo kam abi atohko yehke go ega mbinga, jo lim akpokosi gbalee go ega mbinga?’
40007023	Owo m bahke kehm tongo bo re, ‘Me, wahn n nehme kahn. Fak-m wahn go esamahr, wahn aneb ab'bi ba!’
40007024	“Fvfo, nne awohng awohng no l'wuk alum enyame, fere jo lim, á li ana ekahnkahn nne ji si etahk eje kunu go ekpartal.
40007025	Elahb kehm ba na, nnyel kehm yele, kuumu agbunggbung, rehng etahk jio, nfeb kehm kehme ellimi, jo gbul etahk jio. Tikem gbo. Tibre á si kunu go ekpartal.
40007026	“Nne awohng awohng no l'wuk alum enyame, k'lim, á li ana egboolo nne ji si etahk eje kunu go erikehndi.
40007027	Elahb kehm ba na, nnyel kehm yele, kuumu agbunggbung, rehng etahk jio, nfeb kehm kehme ellimi, jo gbul etahk jio. Etahk jio kehm gboko, wa r'rere r'rere.”
40007028	Eji Jisos ma bung nsol nyia mal, eltibi ene kehm kpoko ellong ane bao esi.
40007029	Á jo tibi bo ana nne no kpi nsahm. Á joom tib ana at'tibi ebo ba atahm.
40008001	Jisos kehm badde go ewong jio, ellong ane gbalee tahm toon-e.
40008002	Nne abili kehm lohngo ba go ege, kehm ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, l'kor-a, a li-m ma lim, n nob.”
40008003	Jisos kehm tanne ebo ebe, koor-e, kehm bungu re, “Kor-m kor, wobnob!” Tvtv ona á kehm soro nob abili enye.
40008004	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka tiki tong nne awohng awohng, wobwuka? Song goji nlimajom, wo song tib-e elna, fere lim njom nyi Moses tibi no, eji l'jol ejum ntianse ka ane.”
40008005	Eji Jisos rehnge go Kapenium, ntubesi a nsoja no Rom kehm bake, ba kpir-e, kehm-e gboongo
40008006	re, “Nsoo, nlokeltum ewame noa go etahk, kp'yame g'ga, jol á nehme ma jen.”
40008007	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “M bahke bake ba lim-e, á nob.”
40008008	Owo ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, me n fuumem re wo ba yel go egame ekp'kpa. Lub bung na bung ellum, nlokeltum ewame bahke nobo.
40008009	Tibre me n li nne no wob nne go elwo. N tob kpi nsoja nyi wob-m go elwo. N l'tong noo re, ‘Song!’ á tahm. N l'tong noka re, ‘Ba!’ á ba. N l'tong nlokeltum ewame re, ‘Lim jia!’ á lim na lim.”
40008010	Eji Jisos wuku ano, kehm-e kpoko esi. Á kehm tongo ane ba jo toon-e re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, elkohn eltaame ana nia n ka nyehn a nyehn go Israel.
40008011	N kp-n tongo re, Ane gbalee bahke lohngo go ero nfam, a erede nfam ba ji a Ebraham, a Aisik, go Jekob go ejahbetul Esowo, jo li nsol a bo.
40008012	Wo, abon ntul ba jol lehke etul, bo bahke rodo bo, ro kak edi ji nkom ejannge li no. Owo ane bahke jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.”
40008013	Owo Jisos kehm tongo ntubesi a nsoja noo re, “Song kehnge! Ana a ma taame, ano wo bahke jolo ka-a.” Ngare ny'nehm ona nyi nlokeltum ewe nobo eyam ebe.
40008014	Jisos song rehnge kan etahk Pita, á kehm song nyehn nnyehn nkal a Pita nong kp'yame arumbum.
40008015	Á kehm-e kooro go ebo, á kehm soro nob arumbum nyao, kehm soro tahm, kehm-e kehme elloko.
40008016	Eji elgung ba no, ane kehm koko ane gbalee ba bele abi atohko, ba go ege. Á kehm kame bo abi atohko nyao kpee yehke go ege ellum, fere lim aneb ayam kpee, bo nob,
40008017	eji l'lohko jol ana Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr Aisaya re, “Á rodo elleenge enahre, fere sol ayam enyahre.”
40008018	Eji Jisos nyehne ellong ane gbalee ba ma ba yiimi senng-e kak, á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Wahr tahmen egbuk jehko!”
40008019	Owo nt'tibi atahm awohng kehm bake go ege, ba tong-e re, “Nt'tibi, m bahk-a toono rehng edi ajehng ajehng ji a fi no.”
40008020	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Akpangang kpi abing nya bo kpo woomo. Nruk kpi ntahk nyi bo kpo kang. Wo, Mmon no nne, edi ellohko esi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.”
40008021	Nne noko no jolo nt'toono Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, nong, me n tohko song kpa nsoo kak.”
40008022	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Tahm toon-m, nong, akvne kpa atem akvne kak!”
40008023	Jisos kehm yele go egbang, abat'toono ebe tahm toon-e.
40008024	Owo egburu nfeb nyi nnen a nnen kehm ba kehme ellimi go eto jio, ebuku jo lim, bulu egbang. Ngare nyio Jisos jo l'lal.
40008025	Abat'toono ebe kehm jeke go ege, song nyahm-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, tahr-r, e kp'tane na a!”
40008026	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'fahle ana, wahn ji kp'kahn taame ntiil?” Owo á kehm mehle yiimi, kehm nyame nfeb, a ebuku. Edi kehm naange soom.
40008027	Owo kehm kpoko ane bao esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Elkohn nne awo anae, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, bo wuk-e?”
40008028	Jisos kehm bake go Gadara ji jolo go egbuk eto jehko. Owo ane abal kehm lohngo edi ji alahm akvne jolo no, ba wan-e. Bo bele abi atohko go bo atahng. Bo jo mennge sehng. Jol nne awohng awohng joom sahb, sehng mbang nyio.
40008029	Owo bo kehm biingi tiim re, “Anv, Mmon no Esowo, jen ji e kpi no me atemtem? Anv, a ba na re wo ba kak-r erema, eji ngare kala biinga?”
40008030	Ellong akuk jolo ona kpidi kpidi, jo li nsol.
40008031	Abi atohko kehm gboongo Jisos re, “A l'kehm-r kame yake, nong, wahr song yel akuk nyao go atahng.”
40008032	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Songen!” Bo kehm soro lohng, song yel akuk nyao go atahng. Ellong akuk nio kehm soro rehm abahl, song fooro agbunggbung eto jio, yel go alahb tan.
40008033	Ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao, kehm soro be ebo tahm, song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tooro kpee, fere tooro ejum ji ma lim ane ba bele abi atohko.
40008034	Ejahbe jio kpee kehm tahme, song kpiri Jisos. Eji bo song nyehn-e, bo kehm-e gboongo re, á lub tahm ejahbe jio song.
40009001	Jisos kehm yele go egbang, siiri eto jio, song rehng go ege ejahbe.
40009002	Ane bandiki kehm koko mbanne nyi noongo go edilnong ba a ne go ege. Eji Jisos nyehne eltaame ebo, á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mmon ewame, bob eltim! Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”
40009003	Owo at'tibi ba atahm bandiki kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Nne noa kp'suku Esowo, eji á ma rod elne bum ana Esowo.”
40009004	Jisos k'kahn ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'tiri elkohn abi nsol ana nyao go egahna ntim?
40009005	Anv, jen ji ga riidi, n l'tong-e re, ‘Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n l'tong-e re, ‘Tahm, wo jen!’?
40009006	M bahk-n tibi re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.” Owo á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
40009007	Nne noo kehm mehle yiimi, tahm eje kehnge.
40009008	Eji ane bao nyehne ano, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tehk Esowo bi ma ka ane elkohn nsahm ana nyio.
40009009	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio. Eji á jo sehng asongo, á kehm nyehne nne no jehk go ege a nji etak, no bo jo lung-e re Matiu. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!” Matiu kehm soro tahm toon-e.
40009010	Efung abehng eji Jisos jolo go etahk Matiu, jo li nsol, abakokatak gbalee, a aneb ab'bi jolo a ne o, go abat'toono ebe fvfo, tob jo li nsol.
40009011	Egom Farisi jindiki nyehne kan ano, bo kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge nt'tibi ewahne kpo li nsol edi ajehng a abakokatak, go aneb ab'bi?”
40009012	Jisos kehm wuku ana bo jo bung, kehm faange re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem ane ba kp'yame ba ba kpo seb nlimakahm.
40009013	Songen, wahn song kpili bade ana edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo no, ji bungu re, ‘Njom sang n kp'sebe, ndon nyi.’ M baam re me m ba lung anoobo ane, m ba re me m ba lung aneb ab'bi re bo ba gbo ndon.”
40009014	Abat'toono Jon ji nwohngalahb kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr, a Bab Farisi, e kpo kono elnahre njal bade, abat'toono eba kil jo bade?”
40009015	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv, atem nlumanne li ma ji ndon ndon go elkak elbala, eji nlumanne kpeke li a boa? Efung bahke rehnge bi bo bahke rodo nlumanne go bo ellong, tahm a ne. Ngare nyio nyi, bo bahke kehme elbo njal bade.
40009016	“Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe, song baade nk'kula mbomo. Á l'lim ano, mmojang mbomo no nfenfe nehm yiimi. Nk'kula mbomo mio bahke kpe kv edi jio budu sehnge ana wuku wuku.
40009017	Nnene limm, no bahke yaange amahm ma kp'fahle kak go nk'kohko eyahbe. Á l'lim ano, eyahbe jio bahke bahnge na, amahm sale. Nobo re nne ko amahm ma kp'fahle, song yaange kak go eyahbe nfenfe. Eyahbe nfenfe jio, a amahm bahke jolo nob nob.”
40009018	Eji Jisos jo bung nsol nyia tong bo, owo ntubesi a Jus awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Mmon ewame kp'na kpoko. Ba wahr tahm, wo ba koor-e ebo, eji á l'fere bel elkpin.”
40009019	Jisos kehm tahme toon-e, a abat'toono ebe fvfo.
40009020	Mmonankal awohng no alung sa-e go nnahb ewubu a nnya ebal, kehm kehme Jisos toono go njahm, kehm kooro es'sili nsubu enye.
40009021	Tibre á bungu go ege eltim re, “N l'lub kooro nsubu enye nyi nyi, m bahke nobo.”
40009022	Jisos kehm keebe, nyehn-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewame, bob eltim! Eltaame ena ni ma-a lim, a ma nob.” Ngare ny'nehm ona nyi nnenkal noo kehm soro nob.
40009023	Owo Jisos kehm ba rehng go etahk ntubesi noo, ba nyehn aneb ase, a ane ba ba elkv, bo kp'kubu ase, jo lim ewok.
40009024	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen, tibre mmon noa ka kpo, á kp'lale na.” Owo bo kehm-e elwolo.
40009025	Bo kame kan ane bao yehke me, Jisos kehm yele ekp'kpa song jabbe mmonse nkal noo go ebo, á kehm mehle ji.
40009026	Eka jio kehm yeere na yeere ejahbe jio kpee.
40009027	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, jo jen asongo. Awakamahr ane abal kehm-e kehme eltoono, fere jo rabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr lub fil-a ndon!”
40009028	Eji Jisos yele go ekp'kpa, awakamahr ane bao kehm ba kpir-e. Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kp'taame re m bahke ma lim ejum ana jiaa?” Owo bo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo.”
40009029	Jisos kehm kooro bo go amahr, kehm bungu re, “Nong, jol ana ḿ ma taame.”
40009030	Amahr ebo kehm soro lennge. Jisos kehm bungu a bo t'tahne re, “Kana tiki tong nnene!”
40009031	Bo kehm tahme, song tooro tong ejahbe jio kpee ji Jisos ma lim.
40009032	Eji ane bao kp'tahme asongo, ane bako kehm koko nkamme ba ane go ege, nyi bele ebi etohko go ege atahng.
40009033	Jisos kehm kame nne noo ebi etohko jio yehke, nne noo soro kehme elbungu. Ane bao kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Elkohn ejum ana jia, e ka nyehn a nyehn go Israel.”
40009034	Bab Farisi kehm bungu re, “Ntul a nnehm wo ka-e nsahm re á jo kam ane abi atohko yehke.”
40009035	Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge ajahbe nya nnen, a nya nse kpee. Á jo tibi ane go bo ntahk ero, fere jo tiingi bo nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo, fere jo lim ane, bo jo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.
40009036	Eji á nyehne ellong ane, bo kehm-e fili ndon. Tibre eko ebtan bo, nkakebo bo kpimm, bo jolo ana ejoro bi ki kpi mb'baabe.
40009037	Owo á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Egburu egbe jia, ji elkpake, wo, abalimeltum li ntiil.
40009038	Gboongen nfono egbe, eji á l'tum abalimeltum tv re bo ba kpa egbe eje.”
40010001	Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv elne, kehm kake bo nsahm re bo kam ane abi atohko yehke, fere lim ane, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.
40010002	Abing abatiingetib ewubu ane abal nya a. Ngbokambang, Saimon ji bo jo lung-e re Pita, go Andru mmonannyehn, go Jems ji mmon a Sibidi, a Jon ji mmonannyehn Jems,
40010003	go Filip, Batolomi, Tomos, go Matiu nkokatak, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Lebeus ji bo jo lung-e re Tadeus,
40010004	a Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom, go Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.
40010005	Re Jisos kehm tumu ewubu ane abal bao, á tubu bo elle re, “Kana je ajahbe nya ane ba ki li Jus, a ajahbe Samaria.
40010006	Songen goji ejoro bi Israel bi ma tan.
40010007	Song bungen alum Esowo re, ‘Etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.’
40010008	Limen aneb ayam, bo nob, wahn lim aneb abili, bo nob, fere nyahme akvne go elkv, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke. “Ana n ka-n mbol mbol, tob kaan go mbol mbol.
40010009	Kana fili agul, a asilva, jol kana kak apene go egahne abam fili.
40010010	Kana fili abam efilibo, fere fili mbomo ebal ebal, a akpaketa, a nti efilibo. Tibre nlimeltum f'fuumu re á bel nsol alehke.
40010011	“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń l'song rehng, afi jolo egburu ejahbe, afi jolo mmojahbe no nse, seben nne no bahke kahne re, eltum enahne ni nno ni. Kangen a ne o tete wahn tahm ejahbe jio.
40010012	Ń l'yange go etahk nne, kaken bo nnyo.
40010013	Ane bao l'vvr-n, nong, elkoono ni ń kpi no jol a bo. Bo tohko fere vvr-n, elkoono ni ń kpi no bahke feere, ba tob-n.
40010014	Nne awohng awohng no tohk-n vvrv, k'wuungu atung go egahne alum, afi fere jolo ejahbe, tahmen edi jio, wahn kum ebtohko go egahne akpade.
40010015	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Go efung elam, elam ji ejahbe jio bahke bibi sehnge ji Sodom, a Gomorra.
40010016	“Anv, n kp-n tumu ana ejoro tv go ellong abi enyam. Jo bangen ana enyo, wahn fere jol ana mbehl nyi kil jo lim ebi ejum ajehng ajehng.
40010017	Jo gberen! Tibre ane bahk-n jo kak go esub, fere jo dv-n go bo a ntahk ero.
40010018	“Bo bahke jo ko-n, song yiimi go esamahr atubesi, a atul tib go egame esi. Nsol nyia nyi bahk-n jo lim, eji ń l'jo yiim-m ntianse go bo esamahr, a esamahr ane bako ba ki nyi Esowo.
40010019	Bo l'kak-n go esub, kana jo tiiri bada nsol nyi ḿ bahke bungu, jol ana ḿ bahke b'bung. Tibre ngare nyio bo bahk-n kake alum nya ḿ bahke bungu.
40010020	Tibre alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, nyanyahne sang, bahke lohngo goji Etohko ji Nso ejahne ji kp'bungu go egahne atahng.
40010021	“Abonanyehn nne bahke jo yake abonanyehn ka re bo wul. Babnde nne bahke tob jo yake abon ebo ka re bo wul. Abon bahke jo kpiidi kuumu babnde, jo jabbe bo ka, bo wul.
40010022	Nne awohng awohng bahke jo ko-n ekv tib go egama mbing. Nne no l'kpuumu tete rehng go es'kohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.
40010023	“Bo l'nohk-n go ejahbe jehko, been, song ejahbe jehko. Tibre etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń nehm ma tiki lim eltum go ajahbe Israel kpee mal, tete Mmon no nne feere ba.
40010024	“Nne no kp'kpili kpehme gbal sehnge nt'tibi ewe. Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde.
40010025	Nobo re nne no kp'kpili tob taame go eyebatahng jol ana nt'tibi ewe. Nobo re nlokeltum taame, jol ana nde. Nfontahk, bo l'lung-e re ntul a nnehm, bahke limi renan, bo k'tob lung ane ebe ano?
40010026	“Kana jo fahl ane! Ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo bulu no, ji Esowo l'k'lennge. Ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo behre no, ji ane l'k'kahn.
40010027	Ejum ji n kp-n tongo a mbehr mbehr, ḿ bahke bungu gbul gbul gbuul. Ji m bungu go aw'wa tong-n, ḿ bahke bungu go elkab ane.
40010028	“Kana jo fahl ane ba kpo wul ngubjing, ba l'k'ma wul etohko. Fahlen ye jio ji bahke ma rannge etohko, a ngubjing go ellulagun.
40010029	Nne li ma gunu nruk ebal go are, ka mpene. Abehng abehng limm, bi bahke gboko go ndi, sehngem re no, Nso ejahne taame na.
40010030	Wahn, alv enyahne kpee nya li go egahne asi, bobfange.
40010031	Kana kpe fahl! Wahn ba ga lub sehnge nruk gbalee.
40010032	“Fvfo, nne awohng awohng no l'yiimi ntianse ka-m go esamahr ane, ye wo fvfo, m bahke tob yiimi ntianse ka-e go esamahr bi Nsoo no li go ejahbetul.
40010033	Nne awohng awohng no l'ten-m go esamahr ane, ye wo fvfo, m bahk-e tob ten go esamahr bi Nsoo no li go ejahbetul.
40010034	“Kana tir re, n ko elkoono ba a ni go njini nyia. M baam re me n ko elkoono ba a ni, m ba re me n ko ekahngkahng ba a bi.
40010035	M ba re ‘mmon fere kpiidi kuumu nde, mmon no nkal kpiidi kuumu nnyehn, nkal a nne kpiidi kuumu nnyehn nlum.
40010036	Nne, ane ebe ba bahke fere jol anebekv ebe.’
40010037	Nne no nde, afi jolo nnyehn, bo l'kor-e sehnge me, á fuumem a name. Nne no abon ebe l'kor-e sehnge me, á fuumem a name.
40010038	Nne awohng awohng no tohko rod ekros eje, tahm toon-m, á fuumem a name.
40010039	Nne no l'gare re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne no l'tane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
40010040	“Nne no l'vvr-n, á vvrv me. Nne no l'vvr-m, á tob vvrv nne no tum-m no.
40010041	Nne no l'vvrv nnyehnamahr, tib eji á kahne re nnyehnamahr Esowo wo, á bahke bele eltuuru ana ni nnyehnamahr kpo bel. Nne no l'vvrv etingitingi nne tib á li go etingitingi, á bahke bele eltuuru ana ni etingitingi nne kpo bel.
40010042	Nne awohng awohng no l'ka nne awohng go ellong abonse baa abon alahb re á wo, tib eji á kp'kahne re, nt'toono ewame wo, á bahke bele eltuuru go etingitingi.”
40011001	Eji Jisos tubu abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, elle mal, á kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ajahbe Jus, jo bung alum Esowo, fere jo tib ane.
40011002	Eji Jon ji nwohngalahb ji woomo go ngbekobo wuku bada nsol nyi Kraist kp'limi, á kehm yehke abat'toono ebe tum tv-e.
40011003	Bo kehm song bahb-e re, “Wo wo li nne no Jon tongo re á kp'baka, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?”
40011004	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Feeren song goji Jon, wahn song tong-e bada nsol nyi ń kp'nyehne a, fere kp'wuku,
40011005	ana awakamahr kp'nyehne, abanne kp'tahme jen, aneb abili kp'nobo, alakatung kp'wuku, akvne kp'nyahme go elkv, akpak, bo kp'tiingi bo nnoobo etib.
40011006	Eyebatahng li ka nne no l'ki-m sel gbo.”
40011007	Eji abat'toono Jon ma feere fi, Jisos kehm bahbe ellong ane bao bada Jon re, “Elka emahng, eji ń jo je goji Jon, ń jo je re wahn song nyehn jen? Eljele ni nfeb kp'limi kp'neenga?
40011008	Anv, ejum aji ń jo j'je re wahn song nyehn abee? Nne no ma liibi nsol nyi nno a nnoa? Ane ba kpo liibi ano kpo jol go ntahk nyi atul.
40011009	Anv, ejum aji ń jo j'je o, jo song nyehn? Nnyehnamahr woa? N kp-n tongo re, Wahn ebnyehn nne no gbale sehnge nnyehnamahr.
40011010	Tibre Jon wo li nne no bo nyono go nwer Esowo bada ne re, ‘M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame, á gbo-a mbang, song tuungu mbang bum-a.’
40011011	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, nnene limm, no ma j'jol go njini nyia no gbale sehnge Jon ji nwohngalahb. Nne no ga rede go ellong ane ba bahke lehke etul bi Esowo, á gbale sehnge Jon.
40011012	Bomo ngare nyi Jon ji nwohngalahb tete rehng anv, etul bi Esowo li go elkake nsahm kehm kuumu, aneb nsahm bahke kuumu go eko akake.
40011013	Atahm nya Moses, a abanyehnamahr Esowo kpee tete ba rehng ngare nyi Jon bungu bade etul bia.
40011014	L'kor-n taamen tv alum nyaa, nya li re, Jon wo li Elaija, ji bo bungu re á kp'bake.
40011015	Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.
40011016	“Anv, m bahke koko ane ba li anv gara jen? Bo li ana abonse ba ma lohng elatahkgur kpi mbene lim. Egom jindiki tong egom jehko re,
40011017	“ ‘Wahr ebwor afiri ka-n, ḿ bahnem. Wahr ebling aling, wahn tobem ling fvfo.’
40011018	“Eji Jon ba no, á jo kono elne njal bade, amahm á joom wo. Ane re, á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng.
40011019	Eji Mmon no nne ba no, á jo li nsol, fere jo w'wo, ane jo bungu re, ‘Nyehnen nlehke ebno noa, no kpo wo amahm, á li ntem no abakokatak, a aneb ab'bi!’ Nne l'kpur nsol nyi aneb elkahne kpo lim, owo á bahke tob kahn ana elkahne li no.”
40011020	Jisos kehm kehme ajahbe nya á ma ga lim akpokosi gbalee ebi ka, tibre bo ka gbo ndon.
40011021	“Eyuu a nahne, aneb Korasin! Eyuu a nahne, aneb Betsaida! Li re Taya, a Saidon nyehne agburu akpokosi ana nya wahn ma nyehn a, kehn bo jol gboko ndon wuku wuku, fere kak ajakensol, kpu atong, kak esi.
40011022	Wo, n kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a bo ana bahke bibi a nahne.
40011023	“Wahn aneb Kapenium, bo ma-n mehl wahre rehng go ejahbetul Esowo. Bo bahke fere rod-n, ro kak go ellulagun. Li re aneb Sodom nyehne agburu akpokosi ana nya ḿ ma nyehn a, kehn bo baa, kpeke li tete sik anv.
40011024	Owo n kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a Sodom ana bahke bibi a nahne.”
40011025	Ngare nyio Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, wo wo li Ntul go ero, a ndi. N kp-a tehke, tib eji a ma lennge abonbili nsol nyia nyi a behre re akahnkahn ane, a anebkul k'nyehn.
40011026	Tibre kor-a na re wo lim ano, Nsoo.
40011027	“Nsoo ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kak go egame abo. Nnene limm, no kp'kahne Mmon, sehngem Nde ntahngtahng wo kp-e kahne. Nnene limm, no kp'kahne Nde, sehngem Mmon ntahngtahng wo kp-e kahne, a nne awohng awohng no Mmon kp'sebe re á lennge Nde tib-e.
40011028	“Baan go egame, wahn ane kpee ba ma lahng go elsolo nsol nyi kp'lubu. M bahk-n kake erekekv.
40011029	Taamen, wahn woom-m go elwo, fere jo kpili go egame. Tibre me n li soom, fere jol reed. Owo atohko enyahne bahke bele erekekv.
40011030	Tibre eltum ename riidem. Elsol ename ni m bahk-n sehke kp'yaare.”
40012001	Ngare nyio eji Jisos jo jen go mbang egbe efung Esabat, abat'toono ebe njal y'yam bo. Bo kehm kehme amohk nkohl monngo tv go arahn, jo li.
40012002	Eji Bab Farisi nyehne ano, bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nyehn ana abat'toono eba kp'limi ejum ji ki fuumu re nne lim efung Esabat!”
40012003	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ń ka lung a lung bade ana Devid njal yam-e no, a ane ebea?
40012004	Á song yele ekp'kpa Esowo, song li abred nya bo limi no bum go ekp'kpa Esowo jio, nya ki tohko f'fuumu re á li, a ane ebe, sehngem abalimajom ba ba fuumu re bo jo li.
40012005	Ń ka lung a lung go atahm nya Moses re, efung Esabat abehng abehng abalimajom ba kpo lim eltum go etahk Esowo kpo s'soodo ntahm nyi Esabat, jol ntahm nyio bo joom gbo.
40012006	“N kp-n tongo re, Ejum jia, ji gbale sehnge etahk Esowo.
40012007	Li re ń kp'kahne ana edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo no, ji bungu re, ‘Njom sang n kp'sebe, ndon nyi’, kehn ń kpehme ka ane ba ki gbo ntahm ebi.
40012008	Tibre Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
40012009	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go etahk ero ajehng.
40012010	Nne jolo o, no ebo ebe lohngo no. Bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Anv, n'nob re nne lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo efung Esabata?” Tibre bo jo sebe ejum ji bo bahke koko ka Jisos ebi.
40012011	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne awohng ewahne l'bel njoro, njoro nyio l'fere gbo yel go elbing efung Esabat, á nehm song yehk-ea?
40012012	Anv, nne sang ga gbal sehnge njora? Ano wo wahng ka atahm enyahre bungu re, nne jo lim nnoobo efung Esabat.”
40012013	Owo á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!” Á kehm tanne ebo, ebo fere feere ana wuku wuku, nob kpee ana ebo behko.
40012014	Bab Farisi kehm soro tahm, song lam kak-e, ana bo bahk-e wulu.
40012015	Eji Jisos sebe ano kahn, á kehm tahme eje. Ane gbalee kehm tahme toon-e. Á limi bo kpee, bo nob ayam ebo.
40012016	Á tongo bo re, bo k'tooro tong ane bako bada ne,
40012017	eji l'lohko jol ana Esowo bungu sehng go nnyo mi nnyehnamahr Aisaya re,
40012018	“Nyehnee, a wo li nlokeltum ewame no m ma yehke. Akor-m ejame ji kpo kor-m s'sehng. M bahk-e kake etohko ejame. Á bahke jo tiingi ane baka baka elam ejame.
40012019	Á nehm jo taange ntaange, fere jo rabe. Bo nehm jo wuk ewok eje go nla ejahbe.
40012020	Eljele ni ma bahne, á nehm wob. Et'rekahng ji kp'rede ellulu, á nehm lahme, tete etingitingi ba ko nji.
40012021	Go ege a mbing wo ane baka baka bahke jo kunu ekpu.”
40012022	Ane bandiki kehm koko nwakamahr nyi ki jo ma bung, ba a ne, nyi bele ebi etohko go ege atahng. Jisos kehm limi nne noo, á nyehn, fere bung.
40012023	Ellong ane bao kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Anv, mmon a Devid wo aa?”
40012024	Bab Farisi wuku kan a me, bo kehm bungu re, “Á kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke tib go nsahm nyi Belsebul, ntul a nnehm ka-e no.”
40012025	Jisos k'kahn ntir atahng ebo, kehm tongo bo re, “Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji l'yab, jol ebo ebo, bahke tane na. Nfam anyehng anyehng nyi l'yab, jol ebo ebo, afi fere jol nlaaga, nehm yiimi.
40012026	Nnehm l'kam nnehm yake go, lohngo re eblehm ebyab. Ejahbetul eje bahke yiimi renan?
40012027	“L'fere jol re, n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm, anv abon ebahne kpo kam bo yehke go nsahm anyii? Owo wahng ka bo bahke jolo ane ba bahk-n lame.
40012028	N kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi etohko ji Esowo, eblohng re, Esowo ebbadde ba go egahne, a etul etul ebe.
40012029	Nnene limm, no bahke ma wa etahk etahntahn nne yel, song kpu nsol enye tahm a nyi, sehngem re no, á tohko gbo mbang gba etahntahn nne jio alehke, á kehm ma yel, song kpu nsol enye.
40012030	“Nne no ki li ka me, á li nnekv ewame. Nne no tohk-m tob elkpiimi, no lun á kp'fare na faade.
40012031	Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, ane bahke ma bel eltahmeka go bo abiafem anyehng anyehng nya bo limi no, a eb'bi ajehng ajehng ji bo bungu no, sehngem ab'bi nya bo kpo bung bade Etingi Etohko, nya nya bo l'k'tiki bel eltahmeka.
40012032	Nne awohng awohng no l'bung eb'bi bada Mmon no nne, á bahke bele eltahmeka. Nne awohng awohng no l'bung eb'bi bade Etingi Etohko, á nehm bel eltahmeka, jol eying jia ji anv, afi fere jol eying ji kp'bake.
40012033	“Re wahn kehm jo bong anoobo akab nti, lohngo re ḿ bahke bahme na nnoobo eti. Ń l'bahm ebi eti, ḿ bahke bongo abi akab. Tibre go akab nya kabe no nya, bo bahke liingi eti jio.
40012034	Wahn ane ba li ana akumbad ba! Ḿ bahke ma bung anoobo nsol renan, eji ń li ab'bi ab'bi? Tibre nsol nyi ma rur nne go ege eltim, nyi nyi nne kpo bung go ege a nnyo.
40012035	Nnooba nne kpo yehke anoobo nsol nya wob-e go ege atahng. Ebi nne kpo yehke abi nsol nya wob-e go ege atahng.
40012036	N kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, nne awohng awohng, Esowo bahk-e bahbe bade ellum anehng anehng ni á bungu no, ni ki lohng ejumjum.
40012037	Tibre Esowo bahke koko alum enya nya a bungu no, lam-a. Fundiki a bahke lehke eno. Fundiki a bahke lehke ebi.”
40012038	Egom Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm bandiki kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, e kp'sebe re wo lim nkpokosi, wahr nyehn.”
40012039	Á kehm faange bo re, “Abi ane ba li anv, ba ma sennge Esowo njahm kp'sebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi. Jol nkpokosi anyehng anyehng bo nehm nyehn, sehngem nkpokosi ana nyi nnyehnamahr a Jona nyi nyi bo bahke nyehne.
40012040	Tibre, ana Jona kange ala nnyam alahb nfung era, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke tob kang atahng ndi nfung era.
40012041	“Go efung elam bio, aneb Ninive bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre bo gb'gbo ndon go bo abiafem, eji bo wuku alum Esowo nya Jona bungu no. Nyehnen ga, a wo li ejum ji ga gbal sehnge Jona.
40012042	Go efung elam bio, ntul a nnenkal no Seba bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre á lohngo nlaabambang ejahbe ba goji Solomon re á ba wuk elkahne ene. Nyehnen ga, a wo li ejum ji ga gbal sehnge Solomon.
40012043	“Ebi etohko l'lohng nne, á kpo yannge go adi nya kp'waange, jo seb edi ji á bahke reke ekv, á nehm tiki ting.
40012044	Owo ebi etohko jio bahke kehm bungu re, ‘M bahke feere go etahk ji n lohng no abake.’ Á l'feere song nyehn etahk jio, li nehme nehme, bo ma feenge kpee, tuungu kpee bum,
40012045	owo á bahke tahme, song ko atohko nyako na asehma ba a nya, nya sahb b'bib sehnge ye. Bo feere ba lene etahk jio. Nne noo bahke kpe sab na sehnge ana wuku wuku. Ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ka abi ane ba li anv.”
40012046	Ngare nyi Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu a ane bao, nnyehn kehm lohngo ba, a abonanyehn. Bo yiimi go elatahk, jo seb re bo bung a ne.
40012047	Owo nne awohng kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nyehnee, nne, a abonane yim go elatahk kp'sebe re bo bung a na.”
40012048	Jisos kehm faange nne no tong-e no re, “Nne awo li nnee? Ane aba li abonanee?”
40012049	Á kehm tono ebo tv abat'toono ebe, kehm bungu re, “A wo li nnee. A wo li abonanee.
40012050	Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'lim ji Nsoo no li go ero kp'sebe re á lim, ye wo li mmonannee, a nnee.”
40013001	Efung b'nehm ona, Jisos kehm mehle go etahk, song ji go nkpe eto.
40013002	Eji ellong ane gbalee ba go ege, owo á kehm yele go egbang, song ji. Ane bao kpee yiimi go nkpe egbuk.
40013003	Á ko ngaane, jo tong bo nsol gbalee re, “Nne jolo gona, no tahme no, song wohngo amohk nti enye go ege egbe.
40013004	Eji á jo wohngo, nyandiki gbo noongo go mbang. Nruk ba suudu kpee mele.
40013005	“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Abon ndi jolo ntiil. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge. Tibre edi jio ndi gbalem.
40013006	Njul nyaare kan a me, akohdo nti nyao wuudu, fere kpo. Tibre alohk jolem.
40013007	“Nyandiki gbo kuumu go elkob akpiri. Akpiri nyao gbale, bulu akohdo nti nyao.
40013008	“Amohk nti nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kab akab. Atasok nyandiki jo jolo nkab atahl alon alon, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl ara ara, atasok nyandiki eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu.
40013009	“Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
40013010	Owo abat'toono Jisos kehm bake go ege, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge a kpo ko ngaane, jo bung a bo?”
40013011	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo ma-n ka elkahne nio ni etul bi Esowo, bi Esowo behre no. Ane bao, bo kaam bo.
40013012	Nne no kpi no, bo bahk-e budu na, á bel gbalee. Nne no ki kpi, bo bahk-e taare na ji á kpi no.
40013013	Owo wahng ka n kpo bung a bo go ngaane. Tibre bo kpo seenge, jol bo kpehme nyehn. Bo kpo wuungu atung, jol bo kpehme wuk, fere kahn.
40013014	Bo ba li ane ba nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no bada bo re, “ ‘Ḿ bahke wuungu na wuungu wuungu atung, ń nehm tiki kahn. Ḿ bahke seenge na seenge seenge, ń nehm tiki nyehn.
40013015	Tibre asi ane bao ebfere tahne. Bobsahde atung ebo. Bobbulu amahr ebo. Ki li ano, kehn, bo kp'nyehne, fere wuk, fere k'kahn go bo a ntim, fere sennge, feere go egame, eji n l'lim bo, bo nob.’
40013016	Elfuulu li ka amahr enyahne, eji kp'nyehne. Elfuulu li ka atung enyahne, eji kp'wuku.
40013017	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Abanyehnamahr gbalee, a aneb Esowo gbalee jo sebe re bo nyehn ji ń kp'nyehne a. Jol bo tikem nyehn. Bo jo sebe re bo wuk ji ń kp'wuku a. Jol bo tikem wuk.
40013018	“Wuungen atung anv, wahn kahn ana elgan ni li bada mbahmgbe lohngo no.
40013019	“Ane ba l'wuk alum nya etul bi Esowo, k'kahn ana lohngo no, Ebinne bahke bake, ba yehke nsol nyi bo ma bahm go bo a ntim tahm a nyi. Nyao nya li amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang.
40013020	“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Bo l'wuk alum Esowo nyao o, bo ko tvtv a eyebatahng.
40013021	Eji bo ki kpi alohk, bo kpehme kang. Erem l'ba, a ntong tib go alum Esowo nya bo wuku no, bo soro gbo tvtv.
40013022	“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya fooro gbo go elkob akpiri. Bo kp'wuku alum Esowo, wo, nsol nyi njini nyia kpo gbiingi bo go bo a ntim. Ekor akpohko kpo nehm bo. Nsol nyia kpee kpo bulu alum Esowo nyao tv. Akab bo nehm kab.
40013023	“Ane bako li ana amohk nti nya bo wohngo go nnooba ndi. Bo l'wuk alum Esowo kahn, bo lohko kab akab, egom jindiki nkab atahl alon alon, egom jindiki nkab atahl ara ara, egom jindiki eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu.”
40013024	Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana nne no tahme song kak nkohl go ege egbe.
40013025	Eji ane ma lal, nnekv ewe kehm tahme song wohngo afem agasame semme go nkohl nyio, tahm eje.
40013026	Eji nkohl ma mahng, gbal, fere lake abon, agasame kehm tob mahng.
40013027	Owo alokeltum ba nfono egbe noo kehm ba bahb-e re, ‘Nsoo, nkohl sang a kake go ega egbea? Anv, agasame nyao lohngo gan ba?’
40013028	Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Nnekv wo ma lim ejum jio.’ Alokeltum bao kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Anv, a kp'sebe re wahr song wooba?’
40013029	Á kehm tene re, ‘E'ee, ń l'song woobo agasame, ḿ bahke woobo nkohl semme.
40013030	Nong, nsol ebal ebal gbal ano tete rehng go efung elbanne. Owo m bahke tongo abab'banne re, Gboon mbang, wahn tohko woobo agasame, gba agan agan, eji bo l'jahm fi, wahn kehm banne nkohl kanne, kpu song kpake go egame etahk.’ ”
40013031	Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana mmohk asia nyi nne ko no, song bahm go ege etahngga.
40013032	Se sehnge mmohk eti anyehng anyehng. Eji gbale no, gbale sehnge eti ajehng ajehng ji bo kpo bahm etahngga. Owo nruk kehm bake, ba si ntahk o.”
40013033	Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana ayist, nya nnenkal ko song behr go ebam aflawa na ebra tete semme kpee, fere tung.”
40013034	Nsol nyia kpee, Jisos jo bungu go ngaane, tong ellong ane. Á joom tiki bung na bung, k'bung go elgan,
40013035	eji l'lohko jol ana nnyehnamahr bungu no re, “M bahke jo bung a bo go ngaane. M bahke tongo bo nsol nyi Esowo behre no ngare nyi njini bomo no.”
40013036	Jisos kehm tahme ellong ane bao sa, song yel ekp'kpa. Abat'toono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba bahb-e re, “Tong-r ana elgan ni li bade agasame lohngo no.”
40013037	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Nne no kake nkohl, Mmon no nne wo.
40013038	Edi egbe jio, njini nyi. Nkohl nyio, abon Ntul ba. Agasame nyao, abon ba Ebinne jio ba.
40013039	Nnekv no wohngo afem agasame, nnehm nyi. Ngare elbanne nyio, es'kohro eying jia ji. Abab'banne bao, babenjel ba.
40013040	“Ana bo bahke kpuku agasame nyao, jamme fi, ano wo bahke jolo es'kohro eying jia.
40013041	Owo Mmon no nne bahke tumu enjel enye, bo bahke yannge go ege ejahbetul, kpu ane kpee ba jo wahng re ane jo lim abiafem, a aneb ab'bi,
40013042	ro bo, kak go agun. Owo bo bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.
40013043	Aneb Esowo bahke jo ya ana njul go ejahbetul ji Nde ebo. “Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.
40013044	“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana elkohl akpohko ni bo behre go egbe. Nne awohng kehm song nyehn, tuungu behr. Á bele eyebatahng sehng, kehm song gungu nsol enye kpee nyi á bele no, fere ba gunu edi egbe jio.
40013045	“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana njenare no jo seb anoobo amohkesol.
40013046	Eji á nyehne anyehng nyi sahb k'kim ekun, fere n'nob, owo á kehm soro tahm, song gungu nsol enye kpee, nyi á bele no, fere ba gunu mmohkesol nyio.
40013047	“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana erim bi bo ma kak go aya, fere bob nsahre go nkohn a nkohn.
40013048	Eji nsahre ma rur, bo kehm tohngo, bum egbuk. Owo bo kehm jehke, kehm kehme nsahre jak. Nyi nno, bo jo kake go ajeere. Nyi ki nob, bo ro go.
40013049	Ano wo bahke jolo go es'kohro eying jia. Babenjel bahke bake, ba jak abi ane go ellong anoobo ane,
40013050	fere ro bo kak agun. Owo bo bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.”
40013051	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, nsol nyia lenng-n lennga?” Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Ee nsoo.”
40013052	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Owo wahnge nt'tibi no atahm awohng awohng no ma jol nt'toono Esowo, no ma kpili bade etul bi Esowo, á li ana nfontahk no kpo yehke nsol afang enye go elkohl, nyindiki nsol nfenfe, nyindiki ak'kulu nsol.”
40013053	Eji Jisos tuubu ngaane nyio kpee mal, owo á kehm tahme edi jio,
40013054	song rehng go ege ejahbe, song kehme bo tib go bo etahk ero. Ane ba wuk-e no, jo kpo bo esi sehng, bo kehm bahbe re, “Gan wo á bele elkohn elkahne ana nia, a nsahm nyi á kpo ko lim agburu akpokosi nyaa?
40013055	Ye sang li mmon a kapentaa? Nnyehn sang bo kpo lung-e re Meria? Abonanyehn sang bo kpo lung bo re Jems, Joses, Saimon a Judasa?
40013056	Abonanyehn ba nkal sang li a nahre a kpeea? Anv, gan wo á bele bel nsol nyio kpee?”
40013057	Owo bo kehm-e tene. Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Nnyehnamahr, bo kpo kak-e edi ajehng ajehng, sehngem ane ebe, a ejahbe eje ji kil jo kak-e.”
40013058	Á limem akpokosi gbalee ejahbe jio tib go bo ek'taame.
40014001	Ngare nyio Herod ji jolo ntul a Galili kehm wuku bada Jisos.
40014002	Owo á kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo ona ma nyahme go elkv. Ano wo wahnge á kpi egburu nsahm ana nyio nyi kpo mehl-e.”
40014003	Tibre Herod bobo Jon, gba-e, kak go ngbekobo tib esi ji Herodias ji jolo nkal a Filip mmonannyehn.
40014004	Tibre Jon jo tong-e re, “Fuumem re a ko-e.”
40014005	Herod jo sebe re á wul-e. Á jo fahle Jus, tibre bo jo bumu Jon ana nnyehnamahr.
40014006	Efung bi bo ji, buumu efung bi bo jele Herod, mmon no nkal no Herodias kehm kehme ase bahn go elkab ane nio. Herod, atahng yeb-e sehng,
40014007	á kehm nyame, fere t'tir re, “M bahk-a kake ejum ajehng ajehng ji a l'bahb-m.”
40014008	Nnyehn kehm toobo a ne. Mmon noo kehm song tong Herod re, “Ka-m esi Jon ji nwohngalahb anv anv go ekpingi.”
40014009	Ntul kpeem bang, wo, tib go esi ji á tiri no go esamahr ane ba á tiingi bo elkak, owo á kehm tongo re bo lim ka-e ana á bahbe no.
40014010	Á kehm tumu ane, bo song kim Jon esi go ngbekobo,
40014011	ko esi jio go ekpingi ba a ji, ba ka mmon noo. Mmon noo kehm soro ko, song ka nnyehn.
40014012	Abat'toono Jon kehm bake, ba rod ekv eje, song kpa kak, kehm feere song tong Jisos.
40014013	Eji Jisos wuku eka jio bada Jon, owo á kehm tahme edi jio, song yel egbang antahng, song rehng edi ji li soom. Ellong ane ba wuku no, kehm tahme ajahbe ebo, jo jen egbuk egbuk, jo toon-e.
40014014	Jisos lohngo kan egbang me, á kehm nyehne ellong ane gbalee. Bo kehm-e fili ndon. Á kehm limi aneb ayam ebo, bo nob.
40014015	Eji elgung ma ba, abat'toono ebe kehm song kpir-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm edi jia ana rehng go ajahbe, ekidi kp'labe. Wo gana, ngare ebsehng. Nong, ane baa song gunu nsol alehke go abon ajahbe li me.”
40014016	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Bo sang bahke tahme song gunu nsol alehke li, wahn kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li.”
40014017	Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsol nyi e kpi a kpee li abon abred na alon, kumu abon nsahre abal.”
40014018	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Koon nsol nyio ba ka-m wahn!”
40014019	Owo á kehm tongo ane bao re, bo ji go ajele. Á kehm rodo abon abred bao na alon, a abon nsahre na abal, kehm kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke abon abred bao, ka abat'toono ebe. Abat'toono ebe ko, song bak ellong ane bao.
40014020	Bo li ane kpee wohngo. Abat'toono ebe kehm song taare bo erik ji sa no, ruru ewubu ejeere na ebbal.
40014021	Aneblum ba li nsol nyio jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000). Jol anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem bo.
40014022	Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re bo yel egbang, gbo-e mbang, song go egbuk jehko, ye samme ji, yaame ane bao.
40014023	Eji á ma yaame ane bao, owo á kehm tahme go ewong antahng re á song kak ero. Eji elgung ba no, Jisos noa, kpeke li go ntahngtahng.
40014024	Ngare nyio egbang ebrehng go nlum alahb. Ebuku jo gbulu egbang bio tv edi ajehng ajehng. Tibre nfeb jo lohngo go bo a mbuksong.
40014025	Nkpese efungfu wo, Jisos jene ero alahb, song kpiri bo.
40014026	Eji abat'toono ebe nyehn-e no á kp'jene go ero alahb, kehm mennge bo. Bo kehm bungu re, “Etohko ji,” fere rabe elfahle elfahle.
40014027	Jisos kehm soro bung a bo tvtv re, “Boben eltim, me wo, kana kpe fahl!”
40014028	Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, l'lohko jol re wo wo, tong-m, me n lohng, jen go alahb, ba kpir-a!”
40014029	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ba!” Pita kehm lohngo go egbang, kehm kehme eljene go ero alahb asongo goji Jisos.
40014030	Eji á nyehne re, nfeb nyio kp'limi area, á kehm kehme elfahle, soro kehme eltere, kehm rabe re, “Nsoo, tahr-m!”
40014031	Owo Jisos kehm soro tanne ebo ebe, jabb-e kehm-e tongo re, “Wo ji kp'kahn taame ntiil, jen ji wahnge a kehm f'faabe me?”
40014032	Eji bo feere song yel go egbang, nfeb nyio kehm soro naange.
40014033	Ane ba woomo go egbang kehm ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, wo Mmon Esowo wo.”
40014034	Bo kehm gohro siiri, song rehng go egbuk jehko ji Genesaret.
40014035	Ane bao liingi kan Jisos, bo kehm tiingi etib tv ajahbe kpee nya jolo o. Bo kehm koko aneb ayam kpee, ba a bo go ege.
40014036	Bo fere gboong-e re, á nong, aneb ayam lub koor-e go ege as'sili nsubu. Ane kpee ba koor-e no, bo nobo ayam ebo.
40015001	At'tibi ba atahm, a egom Farisi jindiki kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba goji Jisos, ba bahbe re,
40015002	“Jen ji wahnge abat'toono eba kp'daange atahm nya babnsoo, tib eji bo kil jo ru abo, kehm jo li nsol?”
40015003	Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpo daange atahm Esowo, fere kp'toono eljini n'nahne?
40015004	Tibre Esowo jehke ntahm re, ‘Jo kak nso, a nne!’ Nyehko kpe li re, ‘Nne no l'su nde, afi jolo nnyehn, bo bahk-e wulu.’
40015005	Wahn kpo tib re, ‘Nne no l'bel ejum ji á jol kake nde ebo, afi jolo nnyehn, á l'fere bung re, Ejum jia li ka Esowo, kpeem li ka-e re, á kpe kak nde, a nnyehn.’
40015006	Eji ń kpo tib ana wo wahnge ḿ ma range ntahm nyi Esowo, fere kp'toono eljini n'nahne.
40015007	Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Aisaya lohko nyehn enyehnamahr ji nno bada nahne, eji á bungu re,
40015008	“ ‘Ane baa kpo kak-m go nnyo a nnyo. Ntim ebo n wobem.
40015009	Bo kp-m kake mbol mbol, eji bo kp'tibi atahm nya ane baka baka jehke no, nya ki li nya Esowo.’ ”
40015010	Jisos kehm lungu ellong ane tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Wuungen atung, wahn kahn!
40015011	Ejum ji kpo yel nne go nnyo sang kpo lim eltim nne k'kpe jol saang. Jio ji kpo lohng na go ege a nnyo, ji ji kpo lim eltim nne re k'kpe jol saang.”
40015012	Abat'toono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba tong-e re, “Anv, a kp'kahne re, alum nya wuku a bungu no s'sab Bab Farisia?”
40015013	Owo á kehm faange re, “Eti ajehng ajehng ji Nsoo no li go ero ki bahm, bo bahke mehle na tub go.
40015014	Yaken na yake bo go! Bo li awakamahr atubesi! Nwakamahr l'seb re á tib ntem nwakamahr mbang, bo ane abal abal bahke gboko na, yel go elbing.”
40015015	Owo Pita kehm-e tongo re, “Tong-r ana elgan nia lohngo no!”
40015016	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn fvfo, ń nehme tob kahna?
40015017	Ń nehme kahn re, ejum ajehng ajehng ji l'yel nne go nnyo kpo sehng go ala, lohng go ngubjinga?
40015018	Nsol nyi kpo lohng nne go nnyo kpo lohng-e go eltim. Nsol nyio nyi kpo lim nne, k'kpe jol saang.
40015019	Tibre go eltim nne wo ebi ntir kpo lohng, a ewulane, erehbe alimi, anebkal akono, ejv avohko, ntianse efahnge, a afahnge akiimi lake ane.
40015020	Nsol nyia ana nyi kpo lim nne, k'kpe jol saang. Re nne li nsol k'ru abo, we nehm ma lim á k'kpe jol saang.”
40015021	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ejang bi Taya, a Saidon.
40015022	Nnenkal a Kenan awohng no lohng ejahbe jio kehm bake go ege, ba rabe gboong-e re, “Nsoo, mmon no Devid, nong, me n fil-a ndon! Mmon ewame, ebi etohko wob-e go atahng, kp-e gbiingi sehng.”
40015023	Jisos we tikem faange. Abat'toono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba gboong-e re, “Tong-e á song. Tibre á kp'rabe tob-r sehng.”
40015024	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Bo tum-m tv go ejoro bio bi Israel bi ma tan bi bi.”
40015025	Owo nnenkal noo kehm ba gbo go ege alata, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, kak-m ebo!”
40015026	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Nobem re nne rod nsol alehke nyi abon, ka ebv.”
40015027	Nnenkal noo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo, jol ebv kpo kpiimi akahb elang nya kpo fooro ekp'kuru nde ebo gbo.”
40015028	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nnenkal, eltaame ena kp'gbale gbalee. Nong, lohko jol ana a kp'sebe.” Ngare ny'nehm ona nyi mmon ewe noo no nkal nobo eyam bio.
40015029	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go eto jio ji Galili, kehm wahre go ewong, song ji.
40015030	Ellong ane gbalee kehm koko aneb ayam ba a bo goji Jisos. Bandiki jolo abanne, bandiki agboodo, bandiki awakamahr, bandiki akamme. Ane bako gbalee ba jo yame ayam nyandikandiki. Bo jo ba bumu aneb ayam bao go alata nya Jisos. Á jo lim bo, bo nob.
40015031	Jo kpo ane esi sehng, eji bo nyehne akamme kp'bungu, fere nyehn agboodo ma nob, fere nyehn abanne kp'jene, awakamahr fere jo nyehn. Bo kehm kehme Esowo bio bi Israel ellub ka.
40015032	Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Ane baa ma-m fili ndon. Tibre nfung era nyi a, nyi bo ma kang a name. Anv, bo kpeem kpi ejum alehke ajehng ajehng. N nehme seb re me n yake bo, bo song njal njal. Fundiki bo bahke gboko awo go mbang.”
40015033	Owo abat'toono Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Gan wo e bahke tingi nsol alehke elka emahng nia, kehm leke ellong ane ana nia?”
40015034	Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Abon abred abik ń kpi no?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E kpi abon abred na asehma, kunu abon nsahre abik abik.”
40015035	Jisos kehm tongo ellong ane bao re, bo ji go ndi.
40015036	Á kehm rodo abon abred bao na asehma, a nsahre nyio, kehm kake Esowo saam, bakke, ka abat'toono ebe, abat'toono ebe kehm koko, song bak ane.
40015037	Bo li ane kpee wohngo. Abat'toono ebe kehm taare bo erik ji sa no, ruru ejeere na ebsehma.
40015038	Aneblum ba li nsol nyio jolo ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000). Jol anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem.
40015039	Jisos kehm yaame ane bao re bo song kehnge, kehm yele egbang, song rehng go egbuk jehko ji Magadan.
40016001	Egom Farisi jindiki, a Bab Sadusi kehm bake goji Jisos re bo ba gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e tongo re, á lim nkpokosi nyi lohng go ejahbetul Esowo tib bo.
40016002	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ana wo ń kpo kono elbungu. Elgung l'ba, eji elbung ma biili, ń re, ‘Elahb nehm na.’
40016003	Efungfu atv atv eji elbung ma biili, fere ny'nyak, ń re, ‘Elahb bahke nake.’ Ń kpo kahn ana elbung li no, joare elahb bahke nake, afi nehm na. Anv, nliingi nyi kp'tibi bada ngare ń nehme ma liinga?
40016004	Abi ane ba li anv, ba ma sennge Esowo njahm kp'sebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi. Jol nkpokosi anyehng anyehng bo nehm nyehn, sehngem nkpokosi ana nyio nyi nnyehnamahr Jona nyi nyi bo bahke nyehne.” Owo á kehm soro tahm bo sa o, tahm eje.
40016005	Eji abat'toono Jisos siiri eto jio, song rehng egbuk jehko, ebred ajehng ajehng bo belem. Tibre bo y'yini, bo rodem.
40016006	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Jo gberen, wahn jo kunu ekpu go ayist nyao nya Farisis, a nya Sadusis.”
40016007	Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Á bungu ellum nia a, tib eji e ki rod abred ba a nya.”
40016008	Eji Jisos sebe kahn ana bo jo bung, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Wahn ane ba kp'kahn taame ntiil ba! Jen ji wahnge ń kp'bungu atemtem bade ana ń ki rod abred ba a nya?
40016009	Anv, ń ka tiki kahn naa? Anv, ń nehme kpe buumu ana m bakke abon abred bao na alon, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awuba? Anv, erik ji sa no, ji ń taare no, ruru ejeere ebbik?
40016010	Abon abred bao na asehma ba m bakke, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu, erik ji sa no, ji ń taare no, ruru ejeere ebbik?
40016011	Jen ji wahnge ń kil tiki kahn re, n joom bung a nahne bade abred? Jo gberen elnahne tib ayist nya Farisis, a nya Sadusis.”
40016012	Owo abat'toono ebe kehm kahne re, Jisos jo tongo bo re, bo gbere eltibi nio ni Farisis, a ni Sadusis, bo k'gbere ayist nya bo kpo kak go abred.
40016013	Eji Jisos rehnge go ejang bi Sisaria Filipi, owo á kehm bahbe abat'toono ebe re, “Anv, ane kpo bung renan bada Mmon no nne? Nne awo li Mmon no nne?”
40016014	Owo bo kehm faange re, “Ane bandiki kpo bung re, wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Ane bandiki bung re, wo Elaija wo. Ane bandiki re, wo Jeremaya wo, tohko jol ano nnyehnamahr nondiki wo.”
40016015	Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn kpo tir re, me n li elkohn nne awo?”
40016016	Saimon Pita kehm faange re, “Wo wo li Mesaya ji Mmon no Esowo bi li go elkpin.”
40016017	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Eyebatahng li a na, Saimon, mmon a Jona. Ji a bungu a, nne sang tib-a na. Nsoo no li go ero wo ma lennge ka-a.
40016018	N kp-a kpeke tong re, Wo wo li Pita (ji lohngo re eltal). Go ekpartal jia wo m bahke sehke etahk ero ejame. Jol elkv nehm ma rannge etahk jio.
40016019	M bahk-a kake agbokoro nya ejahbetul Esowo. Ji a l'gba go njini nyia, bobtob gba go ejahbetul Esowo. Ji a l'fannge go njini nyia, bobtob fannge go ejahbetul Esowo.”
40016020	Owo Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, bo k'tiki tong nne awohng awohng re, ye wo li Mesaya.
40016021	Bomo ngare nyio asongo, Jisos kehm bomo abat'toono ebe eltongo gbul gbul gbuul re, “M bahke jeke go Jerusalem, song nyehn erem gbalee, bi anebkul nfam, a atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm bahk-m kake. Bo bahk-m wulu. L'kang nfung era, n nyahme go elkv.”
40016022	Pita kehm koko Jisos, tahm a ne go nkpohko, kehm-e rehke re, “Nsoo, Esowo k'taame re ejum ana jia lim-a.”
40016023	Owo Jisos kehm sennge, tong Pita re, “Nnehm, fak-m go esamahr! Wo kp-m kpane. Tibre a kpo tir ntir nyehka nyehka nyi ane. A kpehme tir ntir nyi Esowo.”
40016024	Owo Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'seb re á toon-m, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje tahm toon-m.
40016025	Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'seb re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no l'tane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke bele etingitingi elkpin.
40016026	Nsehng anyi nne bahke lehke, afi á gbo afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane etohko eje? Ejum aji nne bahke kake, kehm fake etohko eje?
40016027	“Tibre Mmon no nne yahke ba elbake go ellub ni nde, a enjel enye. Owo á bahke tuuru nne awohng awohng jang jang ana á limi no.
40016028	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom ejahne jindiki jia ana, ji l'k'kpo tete bo nyehn Mmon no nne kp'bake ana ntul.”
40017001	Eji ma kang nfung erakera, Jisos kehm yehke Pita, Jems, a Jon ji mmonannyehn a Jems. Bo kehm tahme bo bo, song wahr nwahrewahre ewong.
40017002	Eji bo jo seenge Jisos, á kehm yaange. Esamahr ebe fere jo ya ana njul. Nsol nyi á kake go ngubjing kehm bare kparaang.
40017003	Owo bo kehm soro nyehn Moses abola Elaija ma lohng ba, ba kehme elbungu a Jisos.
40017004	Pita kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nsoo, a wo li nnoobo edi ji fuumu re wahr jol. L'kor-a, nong, wahr si nkpatahk era a, behko jol b'ba, behko jol bi Moses, behko jol bi Elaija.”
40017005	Eji Pita kpi mbungu mbungu, ekparesemsem ji jo ya, kehm tahle ba bulu bo. Owo bo kehm wuku ellum go ekparesemsem jio re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m s'sehng. Wuken ye!”
40017006	Abat'toono bao wuku kan ano, bo kehm gboko, kohk asamahr ebo go ndi, kehm kehme elfahle gbalee.
40017007	Jisos kehm bake, ba kpiri bo, kooro bo, kehm bungu re, “Mehlen yiimi, kana kpe fahl!”
40017008	Eji bo tabe asamahr ebo wahre, bo kpeem nyehn nnene, sehngem Jisos ntahngtahng wo bo nyehn-e no.
40017009	Eji bo jo badde go ewong abake, Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana tiki tong nne awohng awohng bada nkpokosi nyi ḿ ma nyehn a, tete Mmon no nne nyahme go elkv.”
40017010	Abat'toono bao kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge at'tibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba?”
40017011	Á kehm faange re, “Elaija bahke gboko mbang ba, ba tuungu ejum ajehng ajehng.
40017012	N kp-n tongo re, Elaija ebsi b'ba. Bo we liingem. Bo lim-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji koro bo. Ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke tob nyehn erem bi ane bao bahk-e kake.”
40017013	Owo kehm lennge abat'toono bao re, á jo bungu abo bada Jon ji nwohngalahb.
40017014	Eji bo feere no, ba rehng edi ji ellong ane jolo no, nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba jamme Jisos alahng,
40017015	kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, nong, mmon ewame fil-a ndon. Á kpo gbo ngboko, kpo gbiing-e sehng. Nkpel tvv á kpo kono elgboko yel agun, fere jo gbo yel alahb.
40017016	N ko-e ba a ne goji abat'toono eba. Bo we maam lim, á nob.”
40017017	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn ane ba kpo soodo, fere k'taame ba! M bahke kange renan a nahne? Anv, bahke kange renan, ji m bahke koko tib-n, ń kehm kahne? Ko mmon noo, ba a ne!”
40017018	Jisos kehm nyame ebi etohko jio, ebi etohko jio kehm soro lohng mmon noo. Mmon noo lohko nob tvtv.
40017019	Owo abat'toono Jisos kehm bake, ba kpiri Jisos, eji á li ntahngtahng, kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr ki ma kam ebi etohko jio yehke?”
40017020	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ek'taame ejahne ji wahnge. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń l'taame, jol afi eltaame enahne se ana mmohk asia, ń li ma tong ewong jia re, ‘Mehl, song rehng o!’ Ewong jio bahke lohko mehl tahm. Ejumjum limm, ji bahk-n riidi.
40017021	Elkohn ebi etohko ana jio ń nehm ma kam yehke, tohko jol re ń kake ero, fere bade elnahne njal.”
40017022	Ngare nyi bo jolo go Galili, Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Mmon no nne, bo yahk-e ba elyake, kak ane go ebo.
40017023	Bo bahk-e wulu. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.” Abat'toono ebe, ndon kehm gbale bo go eltim.
40017024	Eji Jisos, a abat'toono ebe ba rehng go Kapenium, ane ba kpo ko etak ji etahk Esowo kehm ba bahb Pita re, “Anv, nt'tibi ewahne kpehme tahb etak ji etahk Esowoa?”
40017025	Pita kehm faange re, “Ee.” Eji Pita yele ekp'kpa, owo Jisos kehm gboko mbang bahb-e re, “Saimon, anv, a kpo tir renan bade ejum jia? Atul ba njini nyia kpo ko atak goji abon ebo, afi bo kpo ko goji ane baka baka?”
40017026	Owo Pita kehm faange re, “Goji ane baka baka.” Jisos kehm bungu re, “L'fere jol ano, lohngo re, abon, ntahm bo wobem.
40017027	Nong, wahr lim, eji l'k'sab bo. Song, wo song tub eblo go eto! Yehke ngbokambang a nnyam alahb nyi gbo eblo, wo lennge nnyo eme. Owo a bahke nyehne akpohko nya bahke biingi etak ejame, a j'ja. Nyao nya a bahke koko, song ka bo.”
40018001	Ngare nyio nyi abat'toono Jisos ba rehng go ege, owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nne awo ga gbal go ellong ane ba wob go elwo ni Esowo?”
40018002	Jisos kehm lungu mmonse, ba yiimi go bo a mbuksong,
40018003	kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń tohko tiki yaange jol ana abonse, ń nehm tiki li etul bi Esowo.
40018004	Fvfo, nne no l'rede elne, jol ana mmonse noa, ye wo ga gbal go ellong ane ba wob go elwo ni Esowo.
40018005	Nne awohng awohng no l'vvrv elkohn mmonse ana noa tib go egama mbing, á vvrv me.
40018006	“Ga nob re bo kahn nne egburu eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse awohng no ma taame tv-m, á gbo yel abiafem.
40018007	“Eyuu a ane ba njini nyia tib nsol nyi kpo wahng re ane jo lim abiafem! Nsol nyio bahke tiki ba. Eyuu a ane ba kp'koko ba a nyi!
40018008	“Ebo eba, afi jolo ekpade eja l'kehm-a limi re wo gbo yel abiafem, kim tub go! Ga nob re wo yel go edi elkpin ebo abehng, tohko jol ano ekpade ajehng, sehnge re wo bel abo abal abal, a akpade abal abal, bo ro-a kak go agun nya li go njinanjini.
40018009	“Elmahr ena l'kehm-a limi re wo lim abiafem, luudu ro go! Ga nob re wo bel elmahr anehng, yel edi elkpin, sehnge re wo bel amahr abal abal, bo ro-a kak ellulagun.
40018010	“Jo kunen ekpu, eji ń l'k'daange mmonse awohng awohng no wob go ellong abonse baa. Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Enjel ebo nya li go ejahbetul Esowo kpo nyehn esamahr Nsoo no li go ero ngare anyehng anyehng.
40018011	Tibre Mmon no nne ba re, á ba tahre jio ji ma tan.
40018012	“Anv, ń kp'tiri renan bade ejum jia? Nne l'bel ejoro atahl alon, anyehng kehm ba tan, nfono ejoro nehm tahm ejoro behko sa go awong, song seb nyio nyi ma tana?
40018013	Á l'seb-e nyehn, etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, á bahke ga bel eyebatahng go njoro nyio, sehnge ejoro behko bi ki tan.
40018014	Ano wo fvfo Nso ejahne no li go ero kil sebe re mmonse awohng awohng go ellong abonse baa tan.
40018015	“Mmonanne l'lim abiafem bada na, song lennge ebi ji á lim-a no ka-e wahn wahn. Á l'wuk-a, a m-e ko, feere a ne.
40018016	Á tohk-a fere wuk, ko ntianse anyehng, tohko jol ano ebal, je a bo, ‘eji ellum anehng anehng l'jo yiimi, ni ntianse ebal, tohko jol ano ni ntianse era bungu no, bum nnyo amehng.’
40018017	Á tohko fere wuk bo, tooro tong aneb ero. Á tohko fere wuk aneb ero, ko-e na ko ana nne no ki nyi Esowo, tohko jol ano ana nkokatak.
40018018	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń l'gba go njini nyia, bobtob gba go ejahbetul Esowo. Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń l'fannge go njini nyia, bobtob fannge go ejahbetul Esowo.
40018019	“N kp-n kpeke tong re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ane abal ebahne l'kod abo kak ero go njini nyia, Nsoo no li go ero bahke limi ka bo.
40018020	Tibre edi jio ji ane abal, ane ara l'kono go egama mbing, me n li go bo ellong.”
40018021	Pita kehm bake goji Jisos, kehm ba bahb-e re, “Nsoo, nkpel ebik nyi mmonannee l'sood-m, m bahke jo tahm ka-e?”
40018022	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N kp-a tongo re, Nkpel esehma sang, li nkpel atahltahl atahl ani nkpel ewubu.
40018023	“Etul bi Esowo li ana ntul awohng no lungu alokeltum ebe re bo ba toobo akpohko enye ka-e.
40018024	Á bomo kan eltoobo a alokeltum ebe, owo bo kehm koko nne awohng ba go ege, no bel-e mbong ekpa akpohko atahltahl nkpel atahltahl.
40018025	Eji nlokeltum noo ki bel ejumjum ji á bahke kake, owo nde kehm tongo re, bo gung-e, fere gungu nkal ewe, gungu abon ebe, a nsol kpee nyi á kpi no, ko akpohko nyao gal mbong.
40018026	“Owo nlokeltum noo kehm jamme nde alahng, kehm-e gboongo re, ‘Nsoo titi, tohko kpe nong, m bahk-a gale mbong enya kpee.’
