40018027	“Nde nlokeltum noo, ndon kehm-e fili, á kehm-e yake, á song, fere yake mbong nyi á bel-e no tv-e.
40018028	“Nlokeltum nonehm o kehm tahme song kpiri nte ewe, no jo tob loko nde nonehm o. Nte ewe noo bel-e mbong a mpon esehma. Á kehm-e tubu ejahm go nkahng, fere tong-e re, ‘Gal-m mbong enyame!’
40018029	“Nte ewe noo kehm-e jamme alahng, fere jo gboong-e re, ‘Titi, tohko kpe nong, m bahk-a gale mbong enya.’
40018030	“Jol atung we á joom wuungu. Á tahm a ne, song kak-e ngbekobo re á woomo o tete gal-e mbong enye.
40018031	“Eji alokeltum bako nyehne ano, bo kpeem jo bang. Bo kehm tahme, song tooro nsol kpee nyi ma lim, tong nde ebo.
40018032	“Owo nde kehm-e lungu, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo ebi nlokeltum wo. Mbong nyio nyi a bel-m no kpee, me n yake tv-a, tib eji a gboong-m no.
40018033	Anv, limm nyi kehn nte ewa jol-a tob fili ndon, ana a fil-m ndona?’
40018034	“Nde noo, atahng rak-e sehng, owo á kehm tumu nlokeltum noo ngbekobo re bo kak-e erem tete á gal-e mbong enye kpee.
40018035	“Ano wo Nsoo no li go ero bahke limi nne awohng awohng ewahne no tohko jo tahm ka mmonannyehn go abiafem nya á lim-e no kpee eltim eltim ene.”
40019001	Eji Jisos ma bung ano mal, á kehm tahme o Galili, feere go Judea, egbuk Jodan jehko.
40019002	Ellong ane gbalee kehm tahme toon-e. Á kehm limi bo, bo nob ayam ebo.
40019003	Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bake re bo ba gar-e. Bo bahb-e re, “Anv, ntahm enyahre b'bung re, nfem anyehng anyehng l'gbo nne abola nkal ewe, á yehk-e na yehke elbala?”
40019004	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Anv ń ka tiki lung bade ana Esowo limi ane go mbomannahb re, á limi ‘nnenlum, a nnenkala?’
40019005	fere bung re, ‘Ano wo wahnge nne bahke tahme nde, a nnyehn sa, bo song jol ebo ebo abola nkal ewe. Ane bao na abal bahke fere jol ajehng.’
40019006	Bo nehm kpe jol ane abal, bo bahke fere jol ana ngubjing anyehng. Ejum ji Esowo ma kono edi ajehng, nne k'yaame.”
40019007	Owo Bab Farisi kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge Moses kehm jehke ntahm re, nne jo nyon nwer, ka nkal ewe, kehm-e kame, á song?”
40019008	Jisos kehm faange re, “Moses jehke ntahm re wahn jo yehke akal ebahne ano tib go egahne etahnsi. Go mbomannahb jolem ano.
40019009	Wo, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no l'kam nkal ewe, eji nnenlum nondiki ki noongo a ne, fere ko nkal nondiki, yeblim abiafem nyao nya erehbe. Nne no l'ko nnenkal no bo m-e yehke elbal, yebtob lim abiafem nya erehbe.”
40019010	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Joare ano wo li no bada nnenlum, a nnenkal, ga nob re nne k'ko nkal.”
40019011	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ellum ni n fi elbungu a, ane kpee sang bahke lennge bo, sehngem ane bao ba Esowo ma lennge ka bo, bo ba bahke lennge bo.
40019012	Ane baa, ba bo ma fang bo. Ane baa, ba bo jele na bo ano. Ane baa, ba fange elbo antahng tib esi jio ona ji etul bi Esowo. Nne no l'mal kahn ana lohngo no, nong, á kahn.”
40019013	Ane bandiki kehm koko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kunu bo abo, kak ero. Abat'toono Jisos kehm nyame ane bao.
40019014	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Yaken abon ba nse, bo jo ba ga egame. Kana jo sahde bo! Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka ane ba li ana bo.”
40019015	Á kehm kunu bo abo, kehm tahme eje o.
40019016	Nne awohng kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Nt'tibi, nnoobo anyi m bahke limi, eji n l'bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
40019017	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm-m bahbe bade ji kp'nobo? Esowo ntahngtahng bi kp'nobo. L'jol re a kp'sebe re wo bel elkpin, jo bum atahm!”
40019018	Owo á kehm-e bahbe re, “Atahm anya?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ka jo wul nne! Ka jo lim erehbe! Ka jo v ejv! Ka jo yiimi ntianse efahnge!
40019019	Kak nso, a nne! Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba!”
40019020	Owo njangkun nyio kehm-e faange re, “Nyaa kpee n kpo b'bum. Anv, ejum aji kpe li, ji m bahke kpe lim!”
40019021	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “A l'seb re wo jol go nseenge, song, wo song gungu nsol kpee nyi a kpi no, ko akpohko nyao song ka akpak, a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo feere ba toon-m.”
40019022	Eji njangkun nyio wuku ano, á kehm tahme eje ndon ndon. Tibre á fange sehng.
40019023	Jisos kehm bungu tong abat'toono ebe re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Bahke riidi sehng re, efange nne kehm lehke etul bi Esowo.
40019024	N kp-n kpeke tong re, Re efange nne kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
40019025	Abat'toono ebe wuku ano, kehm sahb kp'kpo bo esi, bo kehm bahbe re, “Wo anv, nne awo bahke kehm bele eltahre me?”
40019026	Jisos kehm seenge bo too, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Jia, nne nehm ma lim. Wo, goji Esowo ejum ajehng ajehng riidem.”
40019027	Owo Pita kehm bungu re, “Nyehn ana e ma yake nsol kpee kp-a toono. Ejum aji e bahke bele?”
40019028	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke jehke go eti etul ji ellub ene, ngare nyio nyi nsol kpee ma yaange, jol nyi nfenfe, owo wahn jia ji jo toon-m ḿ bahke tob ji go ewubu a nti etul ebal, fere lam ewubu et'tohngo ebbal bi Israel.
40019029	Nne awohng awohng no l'yake etahk eje, yake abonanyehn, yake nde, yake nnyehn, yake abon ebe, fere yake egbe eje tib go esi mbing enyame, á bahke bele budu nkpel atahl alon, fere bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
40019030	Ane gbalee ba li agbokombang bahke fere jol akahlenjahm. Akahlenjahm bahke fere jol agbokombang.
40020001	“Etul bi Esowo li ana nfono egbe no tahme no efungfu atv atv, song lak ane egbe eje.
40020002	Eji á ma lam are ane bao re á bahke kake bo nne awohng awohng nsiring elon elon efung, owo á kehm tubu bo tv go ege egbe re bo song lim eltum.
40020003	“Eji ma rehng nkaranka esehmwubu, á kehm jeke are, song nyehn ane bamongo yim no mbol mbol, kil ejumjum lim.
40020004	Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Wahn tob songen go egame egbe, wahn song lim eltum. M bahk-n kpiki nob nob ana bo kpo kono elkpiki.’
40020005	“Owo bo kehm tahme. “Nfono egbe noo kehm kpe je ngare efin, fere kpe je go nkaranka era nyi elgung, tob lim ano jang jang.
40020006	Eji ma rehng nkaranka elon nyi elgung, á kehm kpe je, song nyehn ane bako yim no mbol mbol, kil ejumjum lim. Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń yim na yim ana efung kohro kohro, ń kil ejumjum lim?’
40020007	“Owo bo kehm-e faange re, ‘Nnene limm, no ma-r lak eltum.’ “Á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Tob songen fvfo go egame egbe, wahn song lim eltum. M bahk-n kpiki nob nob ana bo kpo kono elkpiki.’
40020008	“Eji elgung ba no, nfono egbe noo kehm tongo ntubesi a nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Lung aneb eltum ebame, bo ba, wo kpi bo. Gbo mbang bom goji ane ba n gohro ko bo ba, wo kehm gohro kpi ane ba n gbo mbang ko bo.’
40020009	“Ane ba bomo eltum nkaranka elon nyi elgung kehm bake, ba ko nsiring elon elon.
40020010	Owo ane ba, á gbo mbang lak bo kehm bake. Bo jo tiri re, bo bahke koko akpohko sehnge ane bao. Bo fvfo tob ko nsiring elon elon.
40020011	Eji bo ma ko ano, owo bo kehm kehme elmemme tob nfono egbe noo re,
40020012	‘Ane baa ba a gohro ko bo ba, bo limi eltum awa anyehng nya nya, wobkpi bo jang jang ana a kpi-r no, wahr ji ma nyehn erem go nfuba njul nyia efung kohro kohro.’
40020013	“Owo nfono egbe kehm faange nne awohng re, ‘Mbi, wa n nehmem na. Nsiring elon sang wuku e lame area?
40020014	Ko akpohko enya, wo song a nya! Anv, l'kor-m re me n ka ane ba gohro ba ekahlenjahm ana n ka-a no,
40020015	anv, akpohko enyame sang n kp'koko lim ana kor-m noa? Anv, a kp'memme tib eji m ma wehr aboa?’ ”
40020016	Jisos kehm gohro bung re, “Akahlenjahm bahke gboko mbang, agbokombang fere kahle njahm. Ane gbalee ba bo ma lung bo, wo, abon amohk ane ntiil ba bo ma jak.”
40020017	Eji Jisos jo tahm go Jerusalem, ngare nyi bo li go mbang, á kehm koko abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tahm a bo go nkpohko anyehng, song tong bo re,
40020018	“Nyehnen, anv, e kp'tahme go Jerusalem. Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e yake, kak atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm go ebo. Bo bahke lame elam ji bo bahk-e wulu,
40020019	fere yak-e, kak ane baka baka go ebo, ba bahk-e nyoko, fere dv-e, kum-e go ekros. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
40020020	Nkal a Sibidi kehm koko abon ebe Jon, a Jems, ba a bo goji Jisos, kehm ba gong go ege alata, kehm-e gboongo re, á lub lim ejum ka-e.
40020021	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji a kp'sebe me?” Á kehm-e faange re, “Ka abon ebame baa na abal nsahm, eji noko l'ji go ega ejang eboblum, noko go ega ejang ebobkal ngare nyi a ma jol ntul.”
40020022	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Ń nehme kahn ji ń kp'b'bahb. Anv, ḿ bahke ma wo go nkob nyi n yahke ba elwoka?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ee, e bahke ma wo.”
40020023	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahke lohko wo go egama nkob. Me, nsahm n kpimm, nyi m bahke yehke ane, noko ji go egame ejang eboblum, noko ji go egame ejang ebobkal. Adi nyao li ka ane ba wahnge Nsoo toobo bum.”
40020024	Abat'toono bako na ewubu wuku kan ano, atahng kehm rake bo tob Jon, a Jems.
40020025	Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo tv elne, kehm bungu re, “Ń kp'kahne re, atubesi ba njini nyia kpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane. Aj'jok ane kpo tob fili ane.
40020026	Wahn, kana jo lim ano go egahne ellong. Nne awohng awohng ewahne no l'seb re á jol nj'joka nne, á bahke jolo na nlokeltum ewahne.
40020027	Nne awohng awohng ewahne no l'seb re á jol ntubesi, á bahke fere jol na nlokeltum ewahne,
40020028	ana Mmon no nne ki ba re bo lok-e, á ba re á ba loko, fere ka elkpin ene, fak ane gbalee yake.”
40020029	Eji bo jo tahm go Jeriko asongo, ellong ane gbalee kehm tahme toono Jisos.
40020030	Awakamahr na abal ji o nkpe a mbang. Eji bo wuku re, Jisos kp'bake elsehnge, bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr fil-a ndon!”
40020031	Ellong ane bao kehm sahde bo re bo rahke ewok. Bo jo kpe nyennge na rabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr fil-a ndon, nsoo!”
40020032	Jisos kehm yiimi, lung bo re bo ba. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kp'sebe re me n lim jen ka-n?”
40020033	Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, lub lenng-r amahr enyahre!”
40020034	Owo Jisos ndon kehm-e fili. Á kehm song kooro bo abo go amahr, bo kehm soro nyehn tvtv, soro tahm toon-e.
40021001	Eji bo ma kabbe Jerusalem, bo kehm ba rehng go Betfage ji jolo go nnahb ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv. Owo Jisos kehm yehke abat'toono ebe, ane na abal,
40021002	kehm tongo bo re, “Songen ejahbe ji li-n o mbuksong. Owo ḿ bahke nyehne mbvankang nyi bo kahn-e go eti, a mmon ewe. Fanngen bo, wahn ko bo ba ka-m.
40021003	Nne awohng awohng no l'bahb-n ejum bade ebvnkang bio, tongen ye re, ‘Nsoo kp'sebe bo,’ nfono ebvnkang bio bahke yake bo elwaare ka.”
40021004	Nsol nyia limi, eji l'lohko jol go etingitingi ana nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re,
40021005	“Tong Sayon re, Nyehnen, ntul ewahne kp'bake go egahne. Á li soom, á kun go mbvankang. Á kun go mmon a nnyam no kpo sol nsol.”
40021006	Abat'toono ebe kehm tahme, song lim ana Jisos tongo bo.
40021007	Bo kehm koko mbvankang nyio, a mmon ba a bo, yehke awobo ebo, kunu go bo a njahm, Jisos kehm wahre, kuumu mmon a mbvankang noo.
40021008	Ellong ane gbalee kehm yehke awobo ebo, yal go mbang. Ane bandiki song ja amang, jo ba yal go mbang.
40021009	Ellong ane ba gbo Jisos mbang, a ellong ane ba jo toon-e njahm kehm kehme elrabe re, “Tehken mmon no Devid! Elfuulu li ka nne no kp'bake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo. Tehken Esowo bi li go ero!”
40021010	Eji Jisos yele go nla Jerusalem, edi kehm kehme elvvrv na vvrv. Ane kehm kehme elbahbe re, “Nne awo ona?”
40021011	Owo ellong ane bao kehm jo bung re, “Jisos wo ana, ji li nnyehnamahr. Á lohng go Nasaret nyi Galili.”
40021012	Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, song kam ane ba jo gungu, a ane ba jo gunu, fere gbul akp'kuru nya abayaangakpohko tuubu go, a nti nyi abagungumbehl.
40021013	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Etahk ejame, bo bahke jo lung re, etahk ero akake.’ Wahn ebfere rod, bum ana ebehre awajv.”
40021014	Awakamahr ane, a abanne kehm bake, ba kpir-e go etahk Esowo jio. Á lim bo, bo nob.
40021015	Eji atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm nyehn akpokosi nya á limi no, fere wuk abonse kp'rabe go etahk Esowo jio re, “Tehken mmon no Devid!” atahng kehm rake bo.
40021016	Owo bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Wobwuk ana bo kp'raba?” Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ee, n kp'wuku. Wo, ń ka tiki lung edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re, “ ‘Esowo ebko anyo abonse, a nya abonbili, lim, eji l'jol ejum eltehke ka yefono antahnga?’ ”
40021017	Jisos kehm tahme bo sa, song rehng go Betani, fere kang o.
40021018	Efungfu atv atv eji Jisos feere asongo go Jerusalem, njal kehm-e yame.
40021019	Á kehm nyehne eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go nkpe a mbang. Á jeere kan kohlo o me, á nyehnem nkab anyehng anyehng, sehngem anyane nya nya á nyehne no. Owo á kehm tongo eti jio re, “A nehm kpe tiki kab akab go njinanjini.” Tvtv ona eti jio kehm soro kpo.
40021020	Eji abat'toono ebe nyehne ano, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahnge eti jia ma tahr kp'kpo elwaare elwaare anae?”
40021021	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń l'taame, k'jo faabe, ḿ bahke jo lim ana m ma lim eti jia, jol s'sehnge na ana. Ń li ma tong ewong jia re, ‘Mehl, song yel aya!’ Bahke lohko lim ano.
40021022	Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń l'bahb go egahne ero bi ń kp'kake, ń l'taame, ḿ bahke bele.”
40021023	Jisos kehm feere go etahk Esowo. Eji á jo tib, atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm bake, ba kpir-e, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi wahnge a kpo lim nsol ana nyia? Nne awo ka-a nsahm ana nyio?”
40021024	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe fvfo. Ń l'faang-m, n kehm-n tongo bada nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi wahnge n kpo lim nsol ana nyia.
40021025	Anv, nsahm nyi Jon jo wohngo ane alahb lohng go ejahbetul Esowo baa, afi lohng goji ane?” Bo kehm kehme eltoobo atemtem re, “E l'bung re, ‘Nsahm nyi Jon lohng go ejahbetul Esowo’, á bahk-r bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń ki taame tv Jon?’
40021026	E l'fere bung re, ‘Nsahm enye lohng goji ane’, ma ane bahk-r limi ejum nji. Tibre e kp'fahle bo, tib eji bo kpee jo bum Jon ana nnyehnamahr.”
40021027	Owo bo kehm faange Jisos re, “Wahr nehme kahn.” Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Fvfo, wahn n nehm tong bada nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi n kpo ko, lim nsol nyia.
40021028	“Anv ń kp'tiri renan bade elgan nia? Nne jolo go, no bele abon na abal. Owo á kehm jeke goji ngbokambang a mmon, kehm song tong-e re, ‘Mmon ewame, song lela go egame egbe, wo song lim eltum.’
40021029	“Mmon noo kehm faange re, ‘N nehm je.’ Ji kan mmokidi, á kehm yaange ntir atahng enye, fere tahm egbe nde.
40021030	“Owo nde kehm kpe je, song kpiri mmon noko, kehm-e tob tong ano fvfo. Á kehm taame re, ‘Ee nsoo.’ Jol egbe á tikem je.
40021031	“Nne awo go abon abal bao limi ji nde tong-e re á lim?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ngbokambang a mmon wo.” Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Abakokatak, a abajenas'sa ba bahke song yel go ejahbetul Esowo, wahn sa elatahk, jo seenge bo.
40021032	Tibre Jon ji nwohngalahb ba, ba tib-n mbang nyi nno, nyi elsehnge, ń tikem taame tv-e. Abakokatak, a abajenas'sa ba taame no tv-e. Jol eji ń nyehne nyehn ano, ń tikem yaange ntir atahng enyahne, fere taame tv-e.”
40021033	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wuken elgan nehko! Nne jolo go, no bahme avain, fere kak ega sennge. Á kehm rahme elbing ni bo jo kak akab nti, fere jo kaame akab nti nyao tv elbing nio, alahb jo lohng. Á si enyong, kak ane ba jo baabe edi jio, kehm yaame abahmgbe edi jio, toono eje tahm ejahbe jehko ji li fee.
40021034	“Eji ngare nyi bo kpo bong akab nti nyao ma kabbe, owo á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe tv ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje, eji bo l'song ko akab nti enye, ba ka-e.
40021035	Abayaame etahngga kehm bobo alokeltum ebe. Noko, bo dv-e, noko, bo wul-e, fere tuubu noko atal, á kpo.
40021036	“Owo nfono etahngga kehm kpe tum alokeltum bako gbalee, sehnge ba á gbo mbang tum. Abayaame etahngga tob limi bo jang jang ana bo limi ane bako.
40021037	“Es'kohro, á gohro tum mmon ewe tv bo. Á bungu re, ‘Bo bahke kake mmon ewame.’
40021038	“Eji abayaame etahngga bao nyehne mmon ewe noo kp'bake, bo kehm bungu atemtem re, ‘Ye wo li nlehkelkv, nong, wahr song wulen ye, eji etahngga jia l'fere jol j'jahre.’
40021039	Bo kehm-e bobo, ro njahm etahngga nyehko, fere song wul-e.
40021040	Anv, nfono etahngga l'ba, á bahke limi abayaame etahngga bao renan?”
40021041	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Á bahke wulu abi ane bao, bo kpo esabsab elkv, fere yaame ane bako etahngga jio, ba bahke jo ka-e akab nti nyao go ngare nyi nno.”
40021042	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń ka tiki lung a lung edi nwer Esowo jia re, “ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no, ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahma? Ntul Esowo limi jia ji li nkpokosi go egahra ntim.’
40021043	“Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, Esowo bahk-n taare etul ebe, faake a bi, ka ane ba bahk-e kake akab nti go ngare nyi nno.
40021044	“Nne no l'fooro gbo eltal nio, á bahke banne. Wo, nne no eltal nio l'gbo nyed-e á bahke rere na rere kpee.”
40021045	Atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi wuku kan ngaane enye, bo kehm soro kahn tvtv re, á jo bungu bada bo.
40021046	Bo kehm gare ana bo bahk-e bobo. Bo jo fahle ellong ane ba jo bum Jisos ana nnyehnamahr.
40022001	Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re,
40022002	“Etul bi Esowo li ana ntul no toobo ebjing bi elkak elbal, ni mmon ewe yahke ko nkal.
40022003	Á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe re, bo song tong ane ba á tiingi bo elkak re bo ba. Korem bo elbake.
40022004	Á kehm kpe yehke alokeltum bako, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Songen, wahn song tong ane ba n tiingi bo elkak re, Me n toobo ejum ajehng ajehng kpee bum. Bobwul efong ebame, a atohkondi nya m ma le bo, bo ma jok. Baan go elkak elbal!’
40022005	“Ane ba bo tiingi bo elkak, elkak nio lubem bo. Bo tahme na go bo alimi nsol. Noko tahme go ege egbe, noko tahm go ege a nju are.
40022006	Egom ane bako bobo alokeltum ntul noo, nohk bo, fere wul bo.
40022007	“Ntul, atahng rak-e sehng. Á kehm tumu nsoja enye, bo song wul awulane bao, fere jahm ejahbe ebo fi.
40022008	Owo á kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, ‘Nsol elkak kpee, me n toobo bum. Ane ba n tiingi bo, bo kpeem fuumu.
40022009	Songen go ayaame mbang! Nne awohng awohng no ń l'nyehn-e, tongen ye, á ba go elkak elbal.’
40022010	“Alokeltum bao kehm tahme, jo yannge. Nne awohng awohng no bo nyehn-e no, l'kor-e, bo ko-e tahm a ne go elkak. Ane bandiki jolo abi ane, bandiki jol anoobo ane. Ekp'kpa elkak nio kehm ruru ane ane.
40022011	“Owo ntul kehm tahme re á song nyehn ane ba jo li nsol. Á kehm nyehne nne no kake ewobo ji ki fuumu elkak elbal nio.
40022012	Ntul kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Mbi, a limi renan, kehm yele a, k'kak ewobo ji fuumu elkak nia?’ “Nne noo belle na belle eje.
40022013	“Owo ntul kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, ‘Boben ye, wahn gba-e alehke go abo, a akpade akpade, fere ro-e tv go elatahk, edi ejannge jio ji ane kpo woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.’
40022014	“Tibre ane gbalee ba bo tiingi no. Abon amohk ane abik abik ba bo ma jak.”
40022015	Bab Farisi kehm tahme, song toobo ana bo bahk-e bobo go ege alum nnyo.
40022016	Bo kehm tumu abat'toono ebo, a aneb ntul a Herod tv goji Jisos. Bo kehm song bahb-e re, “Nt'tibi, e kp'kahne re, wo etingi nne ji. A kpo tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi. A kpehme rang nnene. Jol esamahr ane, a kpehme be.
40022017	Tong-r ana a kp'tiri bade ejum jia. N'nob re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi nobem?”
40022018	Jisos k'kahn ebi ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm faange re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Jen ji wahnge ń kp-m gare?
40022019	Tib-m wahn akpohko nya ḿ bahke koko tahb etak.” Bo kehm koko ba a nya.
40022020	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?”
40022021	Bo kehm faange re, “Esi jia ji ntul ji. Mbing nyia nyi ntul nyi.” Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kaan ntul ji li ka ntul, wahn ka Esowo ji li ka Esowo.”
40022022	Eji bo wuku ano, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm-e yaame sa, tahm ebo.
40022023	Efung b'nehm ona, egom Sadusi jindiki kehm bake ba kpiri Jisos. Bo ba kpo tib re, elnyahme go elkv limm. Owo bo kehm tongo Jisos re,
40022024	“Nt'tibi, Moses bungu re, ‘Nne l'kpo, eji á ki jel abon, mmonannyehn nkvne ko nnenkal noo, eji á l'jel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
40022025	“Abonanyehn na asehma ba jolo a nahre. Ngbokambang ko nkal, mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á kehm kpoko, nkal ewe sa.
40022026	Ano wo tob lim etoono mmonannyehn, a mmonannyehn noko no toono noo, a erik abonanyehn bako kpee.
40022027	Es'kohro, nnenkal noo tob kpo.
40022028	Anv, efung bi ane l'nyahme go elkv, nne awo á bahke jolo nkal ewe? Tibre bo ane kpee ko-e ana nkal abo.”
40022029	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ń kpo soodo, tibre ń nehme kahn nwer Esowo, a nsahm nyi Esowo.
40022030	Ngare nyi ane ma nyahme go elkv, bo bahke jolo ana babenjel. Aneblum nehm kpe jo ko akal. Anebkal nehm kpe jo bal alum.
40022031	Bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ń ka lung alung ana Esowo tong-n no re,
40022032	‘Me wo li Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’ Jia lohngo re, Ye li Esowo bio bi ane ba li go elkpin, bi akvne sang.”
40022033	Eji ellong ane bao wuku ana á jo tib, kpo bo esi sehng.
40022034	Eji Bab Farisi wuku re, Jisos ebga aneb Sadusi, bobbelle, bo kehm song kono edi ajehng.
40022035	Nne awohng go bo ellong no jolo nt'tibi no atahm kehm bake ba bahb Jisos mbahbe, jo gar-e. Á bahb-e re,
40022036	“Nt'tibi, ntahm anyi ga gbal kpee go egahre atahm?”
40022037	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “ ‘Esowo, ntul ewa bahke jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, etohko etohko eja, a ntir a ntir enya.’
40022038	A wo li ngbokambang a ntahm nyi ga gbal.
40022039	Etoono ntahm tob li na li ana nyio o, nyi li re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.’
40022040	Atahm nya Moses kpee, a eltibi ni abanyehnamahr tohk ntahm ebal nyia.”
40022041	Ngare nyi Bab Farisi ba kono edi ajehng, Jisos kehm bahbe bo mbahbe re,
40022042	“Anv, ń kpo tir renan bada Mesaya? Ye mmon a nyehne wo?” Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Mmon a Devid wo.”
40022043	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Jen ji wahnge Devid lungu Mesaya re, ‘Ntul ewame’, eji Etingi Etohko mehl-e no, á bungu re,
40022044	“ ‘Ntul Esowo tongo ntul ewame re, Ji go egame ejang eboblum tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
40022045	“Yefono Devid jo lung-e re, ‘Ntul ewame’, bahke limi renan, ntul noo kehm fere jol mmon ewe?”
40022046	Nnene jolem, no male elfaange Jisos ellum anehng anehng. Bomo efung bio asongo nnene kpeem jo sahb, bahb-e mbahbe.
40023001	Jisos kehm tongo ellong ane bao, a abat'toono ebe re,
40023002	“At'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi ebko nji nyi Moses.
40023003	Jo bumen ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo l'tong-n, wahn fere jo lim. Kana jo toono eljini ni bo! Tibre bo kpehme lim ji bo kpo bung.
40023004	“Bo kpo tuuru alublub nsol, nya kpo riidi go elsolo, rod si ane. Jol bofono antahng bo kpehme gare elmehle.
40023005	Bo kpo lim ejum ajehng ajehng, eji ane l'jo nyehn bo. Nyehnen ana awer nya bo kpo kahn go bo abuk, a abo abo kp'kpange, nya bo nyono adi nwer Esowo! Nyehnen ana asohk nya bo tohko go as'sili akpawobo ebo kp'labe!
40023006	Go elkak, kpo kor bo re, bo ji adi nya fuumu re aj'jok ane ji. Go ekp'kpa ero, kpo kor bo re, bo ji mbuksong.
40023007	Go are, kpo kor bo re, ane jo gong kak bo nnyo, fere jo lung bo re at'tibi.
40023008	“Nong, ane ki-n jo lung re at'tibi. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li nt'tibi ewahne. Wahn kpee abonanyehn ba.
40023009	Kana jo lung nne awohng awohng go njini nyia re Nso ejahne. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li Nso ejahne, ye jio ji li go ejahbetul.
40023010	Nong, ane ki-n jo lung re atubesi. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li ntubesi ewahne, ye ji li Mesaya.
40023011	“Nne no l'ga gbal go egahne ellong, ye wo bahke jolo nlokeltum ewahne.
40023012	Nne awohng awohng no l'mehl elne wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne awohng awohng no l'rede elne, bo bahk-e mehle wahre.
40023013	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo bam ejahbetul Esowo tv ane. Ń kpehme taame, yake ane ba kp'gare re bo yel. Wahnfono antahng nehm yel.
40023014	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo nehm akalebun, taare ntahk ebo. Eyaame jehko, ń kpo kak alaabe aro, jo tib elnahne. Tib esi jio ji bahke wahnge elam ejahne sahb gb'gbal!
40023015	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo yannge go njini kpee, jo siiri agburu aya, eji ń l'lub were nne awohng, á fere yel-n. Ń l'ting nne, ń rod-e, lim mmon ellulagun no sahb s'sab sehnge wahnfono antahng.
40023016	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn awakamahr ane ba kpo tib ane mbang! Ń kpo tib re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no l'tir etahk Esowo, ejumjum limm. Wo, nne no l'fere tir agul nya li go etahk Esowo, á bahke tiki lim, nehm tiki kane.’
40023017	Wahn agboolo awakamahr ba! Anv, ejum aji ga gbal, agul, afi etahk Esowo ji wahnge agul nyao li saang?
40023018	Ń kpo kpe tib re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no l'tir edi njom alimi, ejumjum limm. Wo, nne no l'fere tir ejum njom ji kun edi njom alimi jio, á bahke tiki lim, nehm kane.’
40023019	“Wahn agboolo awakamahr ba! Anv, ejum aji ga gbal, ejum njom, afi edi njom alimi ji wahnge ejum njom li saang?
40023020	Fvfo, nne l'tir edi njom alimi, yebtir edi njom alimi jio, a nsol njom kpee nyi kun o.
40023021	Nne no l'tir etahk Esowo, yebtir etahk Esowo, a Esowo bi lene o.
40023022	Nne no l'tir ejahbetul Esowo, yebtir eti etul ji Esowo, a nne no jehk o.
40023023	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo ka eltahme go abon asahkesahke nsol ana nkambe, nfehne, a abehne, fere gbake alahmlahm nsol ana elam, ndon, a eltaame, bum go nkpe. Limen nsol ebal ebal, kana gbake ajehng bum go nkpe!
40023024	“Wahn awakamahr ane ba kpo tib ane mbang ba! Ń kpo yehke nnyamnyame go egahne alahb elwoko, fere mele ekamel!
40023025	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Tibre ń kpo ru njahm a nkob, a njahm ekpingi. Go atahng, nsol ejv ebrur, a nsol nyi ń kpo lahm ane bako etong.
40023026	Wo nwakamahr a nne a Farisi wo! Gbo mbang ru atahng nkob, a atahng ekpingi, eji njahm l'tob bar.
40023027	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn li ana alahm nya bo ma taame efem go njahm elatahk, ma nob. Go atahng, akahb akvne nya ma rur, a nsol eltehb.
40023028	Ana wo fvfo ń tob li. Go njahm elatahk ń kpo jol nne awohng awohng, are ń li nob nob. Go atahng, ab'bi nya ma rur, a afahnge afahnge.
40023029	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Wahn ba kake alahm nya abanyehnamahr Esowo, fere liibi alahm nya atingitingi ane,
40023030	fere jo bung re, ‘Li re e jolo ngare nyi babnso ejahre, kehn, e jolem limi ana bo limi no, fere wul abanyehnamahr Esowo.’
40023031	Wahnfono antahng ebyiimi ntianse re wahn ba li abon ba ane ba wulu abanyehnamahr.
40023032	Wahn ebba soro asi, kp'gohro lim ji babnso ejahne limi no sa.
40023033	“Wahn enyo bia, wahn abon akumbad baa, ḿ bahke ma for renan go elam ji bo bahk-n lame, kim ebi ka-n, fere kak-n go ellulagun?
40023034	Owo wahng ka m bahke tumu abanyehnamahr tv-n, fere tum akahnkahn ane, fere tum at'tibi. Egom jindiki, ḿ bahke wulu bo, jindiki, ń kum bo lake go akros, jindiki, ḿ bahke jo dv bo go egahna ntahk ero, fere jo kam bo yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe,
40023035	eji ń l'li ebi tib go atingitingi ane ba bo wulu bo go njini kpee, bomo goji Ebel ji jolo etingi nne tete ba rehng goji Sekaraya ji jolo mmon a Barakaya, ye ji ń wul-e no go elka elka ni etahk Esowo, a edi njom alimi.
40023036	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba li anv bahke lehke ebi tib go nsol nyio kpee.
40023037	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Wahn ba kp'wulu abanyehnamahr Esowo, fere tuubu ane ba Esowo tumu bo tv-n atal. Nkpel tvv n jo gare re me n lung-n tv elname, ana nkok kpo lung abon ebe tv elne, fere walle bo go ege akpungkpung. Wahn joom kor elbake.
40023038	“Etahk ejahne bahke sake nehme nehme.
40023039	“N kp-n tongo re, Bomo anv asongo, me n nehm kpe nyehn, tete ngare nyi ḿ bahke bungu re, ‘Elfuulu li ka nne no kp'bake go mbing nyi Ntul!’ ”
40024001	Jisos kehm lohngo go etahk Esowo jio tahm. Abat'toono ebe kehm bake, ba tib-e ntahk nyi bo si go nlaaga nyi etahk Esowo jolo no.
40024002	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nyehnen ntahk nyia a kpee! Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Jol eltal anehng anehng limm, ni bahke kpe kuumu a ntem. Bo bahke wake kpee, wohng ndi.”
40024003	Eji Jisos song ji go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, owo abat'toono ebe kehm song kpir-e bo bo, kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-r ngare nyi ejum jio bahke limi, wo fere tib-r elliingi ni bahke tibi elbake ena ni a bahke bake, a ni es'kohro eying jia.”
40024004	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Kunen ekpu, eji nne awohng awohng l'ki-n nehm.
40024005	Tibre ane gbalee bahke bake go egama mbing, jo ba bung re, ‘Me wo li Mesaya.’ Toono o, bo nehm ane gbalee.
40024006	Ḿ bahke kehme elwuku bada nta, fere jo wuk aka nta. Kana jo fahl! Tibre nsol nyia kpee bahke tiki lim, jol o es'kohro sang ma rehng na.
40024007	Ajahbe nyandiki bahke jo nok atemtem. Ajahbe nyandiki bahke kehme elnoko a atem ajahbe nyako! Njal, a ayam nya kpo sehnge ane, go ndi agbehke bahke jo jol adi adi.
40024008	Nsol nyia kpee nyi li mbomannahb erem.
40024009	“Ngare nyio nyi bo bahke jo bob-n, song ka re bo kak-n erem, fere wul-n. Ane kpee bahk-n jo ko ekv tib go egama mbing.
40024010	Ane gbalee bahke kehme elseele gbo, tibre bo bahke jo jabbe atemtem ka go, fere jo ko atemtem ekv.
40024011	“Akimfahnge abanyehnamahr gbalee bahke longo ba, ba nehm ane gbalee.
40024012	Owo eji ab'bi ma tv ano, elkoro ni ane gbalee bahke kehme elmale.
40024013	Nne no l'yiimi t'tahne go mbang nyi Esowo tete rehng go es'kohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.
40024014	Ngare nyi bo ma tiingi nnoobo etib bade etul bi Esowo tong njini kpee ana ejum ntianse, owo es'kohro bahke kehm rehnge.
40024015	“Ḿ bahke nyehne ‘ejum ji kp'sahb s'sab, ji bahke rannge edi’, ji nnyehnamahr a Daniel bungu no bade, yim go mbarebare edi. Nne no l'lung nsol nyia, nong á kahn.
40024016	“Ngare nyio nyi ane ba li go Judea bahke beke, tahm go awong.
40024017	Nne no l'kuumu go ege ero etahk, á k'tohko seb elyele go ekp'kpa, song rod ejum fili.
40024018	Nne no l'jol go ege egbe, á k'tohko be, ba etahk, ba rod nsol ebjing enye.
40024019	“Eyuu a anebkal ba bahke jolo ela ngare nyio, a anebkal ba kpi abon go ebo.
40024020	Kaken ero, eji elbeke enahne ni ḿ bahke beke l'k'jol ngara nnale, k'fere jol efung Esabat.
40024021	Tibre erem bio bahke gbale sehng. Jol erem ana bio ka jol a jol ejolojolo bomo eji njini bomo no tete rehng anv. Jol nehm kpe tiki jol ano ejolojolo.
40024022	“Tohko jol re Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe, nnene nehm jol no bahke bele eltahre. Tib go esi ji ane ba Esowo ma yehke, owo wahnge Esowo bahke tele afung nyao kahbe.
40024023	“Ngare nyio, nne l'tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen, Kraist ga!’ afi á tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist go!’ kana taame tv-e.
40024024	Akimfahnge ane bahke lohngo ba, jo ba bung re, Bo ba li Mesaya. Egom jindiki bahke jo bung re, Bo ba li abanyehnamahr Esowo. Bo bahke kehme nliingi tib, fere jo lim akpokosi, eji limi limi kan, bo l'nehm aneb Esowo, ba Esowo ma jak.
40024025	Kunen ekpu, m ma-n tong jia ana, re ngare kehm rehnge.
40024026	“Ane l'kehm-n tongo re, ‘Nyehnen, ye go elka emahng!’ kana je go! Bo l'fere tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen, ye ga nkimi nyia!’ kana taame tv bo.
40024027	Ana emangedu kpo lim, lennge duu, bomo go ero nfam tete rehng go erede nfam, ano wo elbake ni Mmon no nne bahke jolo.
40024028	Tibre edi ajehng ajehng ji ekpakv ejum l'noongo, owo ntere bahke jeke song rur.
40024029	“Ngare nyi erem bio ma mal, “njul bahke dvvrv, ebareka nehm kpe jo ya na eyakeyake. Alonlo bahke kehme elfooro go elbung gbo. Atahm nya elbung bahke range.
40024030	“Owo ane bahke kehm nyehne elliingi ni Mmon no nne go elbung. Ane kpee ba li go njini bahke kehme ellingi, fere nyehn Mmon no nne kp'bake go akparesemsem, a nsahm a nsahm, a egburu ellub.
40024031	Owo enjel bahke woro ntang wahre wahre. Á bahke tumu babenjel tv ejang njini abehng abehng, a ejang elbung abehng abehng, eji bo l'song ko ane ba á jake bo, ba a bo edi ajehng.
40024032	“Kpilen ejum go elgan ni li bade eti ji bo kpo lung re efig. Eji eti jio ma nyono, fere kak anyane, owo ḿ bahke kahne re, nnale ebba.
40024033	Tob li ka-n fvfo re, ń l'nyehn nsol nyio kp'limi, owo ḿ bahke kehm kahne re, ngare ebkabbe kpidi kpidi.
40024034	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bao ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio, bo nehm kpo, tete nsol nyio lim kpee.
40024035	Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.”
40024036	“Nnene nehme kahn efung bio, a ngare nyio, jol babenjel ba li go ejahbetul Esowo nehme kahn, jol Mmon nehme kahn, sehngem Nsoo ntahngtahng wo kp'kahne.
40024037	“Ana jolo go ngare nyi Noa, ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
40024038	Ana wo jolo no ngare nyi nnyel nyi bulu njini kala yel. Ane bao jo li nsol, fere jo w'wo. Aneblum jo ko akal, anebkal jo bal alum tete rehng efung bi Noa yele go egbang.
40024039	Tvtv o bo joom kahn ji kp'l'lim, tete nnyel yel, ba feenge bo kpee, tahm abo. “Ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
40024040	Ngare nyio ane abal bahke jolo go egbe, noko, bo bahk-e koko, noko sa.
40024041	Anebkal abal bahke jo gok nsol, noko, bo bahk-e koko, noko sa.
40024042	“Jo baaben, tibre ń nehme kahn efung bi Ntul ewahne bahke bake.
40024043	Ji fuumu re wahn kahn, li re, nfontahk k'kahn ngare nyi nwajv bahke bake atv, kehn á jol baabe, á jolem taame re, bo ba lahm etahk eje ye.
40024044	Owo fvfo nobo re wahn toobo ebjing kpee. Tibre Mmon no nne bahke gbede na ba ngare nyi ń ki bum re á kp'bake.
40024045	“Nne awo li ekahnkahn nlokeltum no kpi ekakesehk? Ye wo li nne no nde ma yake alokeltum bako kak go ege ebo re á jo le bo go ngare.
40024046	Eyebatahng bahke jolo a nlokeltum noo no nde l'ba, á bahke ba kpir-e, á kp'limi ano.
40024047	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nde bahke faake a nsol enye kpee, kak-e go ebo.
40024048	“Á l'fere jol ebi nlokeltum, á bahke bungu go ege eltim re, ‘Nsoo nehme waka ba.’
40024049	Á bahke kehme alokeltum bako dv, fere jo jen a abawokamahm, jo li nsol a bo, fere jo w'wo.
40024050	Owo nde nlokeltum noo bahke kehnge efung bi á ki ekpu kunu, a ngare nyi á kil kahne.
40024051	Nde bahk-e bomo, kiimi akv akv akv, fere rod-e, kak edi ji ane ba kpi alum abal abal wob no. Owo ane bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.
40025001	“Etul bi Esowo bahke jolo ana ngbahme na ewubu nyi rodo at'rekahng ebo, tahm re bo song wane nlumanne.
40025002	Ngbahme na elon jolo akahnkahn. Ngbahme nyehko na elon jolo agboolo.
40025003	Agboolo agbahme nyao rodo at'rekahng ebo, akehng bo filem.
40025004	Akahnkahn agbahme nyao rodo at'rekahng, fere fili akpuma akehng budu.
40025005	“Eji nlumanne laange elbake, agbahme nyao kpee kehm kehme amahke lal, soro sa lal.
40025006	Nlum atv, nne jo r'rabe re, ‘Nyehnen, nlumanne kp'bake! Songen, wahn song wan-e!’
40025007	“Agbahme nyao kpee kehm mehle, toobo at'rekahng ebo bum.
40025008	Owo agboolo nyao kehm tongo akahnkahn re, ‘Nyahken akehng emahne ka-r, tibre at'rekahng enyahre yahke lahme.’
40025009	“Owo akahnkahn kehm faange bo re, ‘Akehng maa nehm biingi rehng egahne. Songen goji abajenare, wahn song gunu antahng.’
40025010	“Eji bo tahme no re bo song gunu akehng, nlumanne kehm bake. Ane bao ba toobo ebjing kehm tahme toon-e, song rehng go elkak elbal. Bo kehm bame mbu.
40025011	“Ji kan a, agbahme nyako kehm tob ba, ba kehme elbungu re, ‘Nsoo, nsoo, lenng-r mbu!’
40025012	“Owo á kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Wahn n nehme kahn!’ ”
40025013	Jisos kehm gohro bung re, “Jo kunen ekpu, tibre n nehme kahn efung, a ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
40025014	“Etul bi Esowo bahke jolo ana nne no yahke ba eltahme eljen. Á kehm lungu alokeltum ebe, yake nsol enye, kak go bo abo.
40025015	Á ka nne awohng awohng ana á bahke ma lim. Noko, á ka-e ekpa akpohko eblon, noko, ekpa akpohko ebbal, noko ajehng, kehm soro tahm eje.
40025016	Nne no ko ekpa akpohko eblon kehm soro tahm, song jen are, li nsehng go ekpa akpohko eblon.
40025017	Ano wo nne no ko ekpa ebbal tob li nsehng ekpa ebbal fvfo.
40025018	Nne no ko ekpa ajehng kehm song rahm elbing, rod akpohko nde, kak o behr.
40025019	“Eji ma sahb k'kang, nde alokeltum bao kehm kehnge, kehm ba tong alokeltum ebe re, bo ba toobo akpohko enye ka-e.
40025020	“Nlokeltum no ko ekpa akpohko eblon kehm koko ekpa akpohko eblon behko budu, ba a bi, kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, a ka-m ekpa akpohko eblon, nyehn ekpa akpohko eblon behka gana bi m ma li nsehng.’
40025021	“Owo nde kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nkakesehk a nlokeltum no nno. Eji a bele ekakesehk go abons'sohko abon nsol, m bahke yake agburu nsol, kak-a go ebo. Ba yel ga, wo bel eyebatahng ana n kpi no.’
40025022	“Nne no ko ekpa akpohko ebbal kehm tob ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, a ka-m ekpa akpohko ebbal, nyehn ekpa ebbal behka bi m ma li nsehng.’
40025023	“Owo nde kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nkakesehk a nlokeltum no nno. Eji a bele ekakesehk go abons'sohko abon nsol, m bahke yake agburu nsol, kak-a go ebo. Ba yel ga, wo bel eyebatahng ana n kpi no.’
40025024	“Nne no ko ekpa akpohko ajehng kehm tob ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, n kp'kahne re, wo ebibbib nne ji. Á kpo kpa ji a ki bahm, fere fv nya a ki kak.
40025025	N jo f'fahl, owo n kehm tahme song behr akpohko enya go ndi. Nyehn nyanya ana.’
40025026	“Owo nde kehm-e faange re, ‘Wo ebi nlokeltum wo, no ma gbo ewon. Á k'kahn re, n kpo kpa ji n ki bahm, fere fv nya n ki kak.
40025027	Kehn nde, a jol kake abajenare akpohko enyame, n l'ba, m ba ko, fere ko nsehng budu.
40025028	Taaren ye ekpa akpohko jio, wahn ka nne no kpi ekpa ebwubu.
40025029	“ ‘Tibre nne awohng awohng no kpi no, bo bahk-e kake na budu, á bel gbalee. Nne no ki kpi, jol ntiil ana á kpi no, bo bahk-e taare na.
40025030	Roden edemme nlokeltum noa, ro tv elatahk edi ejannge. Owo nne bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.’
40025031	“Ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake go ege ellub, a enjel kpee, á bahke jehke go eti etul jio ji ellub ene.
40025032	Ane ba li go njini kpee, bo bahke koko bo, ba yiimi go ege esamahr. Owo á bahke kehm yabe bo ana mbaabebul kpo yab ejoro, bum eje eje, ebulbaange jol eje eje.
40025033	Á bahke rodo ejoro, bum ege ejang eboblum, fere rod ebulbaange, bum ege ejang ebobkal.
40025034	Owo ntul bahke kehm tongo ane ba yiim-e go ege ejang eboblum re, ‘Baan, wahn jia ji Nsoo ma-n fuulu! Baan, wahn ba li etul bi Esowo ma toobo bum-n, bi lohng eji njini bomo na bom.
40025035	Tibre njal jo yam-m yam, ń jo ka-m, n li. Alahb kor-m kor, ń ka-m, n wo. N yel-n ejen, ń vvr-m.
40025036	N jolo ebun ebun, ń ka-m, m bobo. N jo y'yam, ḿ ba, ba nyehn-m. N woomo go ngbekobo, ḿ ba, ba nyehn-m.’
40025037	“Owo atingitingi ane bao bahk-e kehm faange re, ‘Ntul, ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, njal ma-a yam, e ka-a, a li? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, alahb ma-a kor, e ka-a, a wo?
40025038	Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ana njenne, e kehm-a vvrv? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a ebun ebun, e kehm-a kake, a bobo?
40025039	Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a kp'yame, jol go ngbekobo, e kehm ba nyehn-a?’
40025040	“Owo ntul noo bahke kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi ń jo lim ano ka nne awohng no sahb r'rede go ellong abonanee ba li a, ń jo limi ka me.’
40025041	“Owo á bahke kehm tongo ane ba yiim-e go ege ejang ebobkal re, ‘Fak-m wahn go esamahr, wahn ji Esowo ma-n su. Songen go ellulagun ni li go njinanjini, ni bo ma toobo bum nnehm, a enjel enye.
40025042	Tibre njal yam-m yam, me ń kaam, n li. Alahb kor-m kor, me ń kaam, n wo.
40025043	N yel-n ejen, me ń vvrem. N jolo ebun ebun, me ń kaam, m bobo. N jo y'yam, fere woomo go ngbekobo, ḿ baam, ba nyehn-m.’
40025044	“Owo bofono bahke tob faange re, ‘Ntul, ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, njal kp-a yame, alahb jo kor-a? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ana njenne? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ebun ebun? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a kp'yame? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a wob go ngbekobo? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a ano, ki-a kak ebo?’
40025045	“Owo á bahke kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi ń ki jo lim ano ka nne awohng no sahb r'rede go ellong abonanee ba li a, ń limem ka me.’
40025046	“Ane baa bahke song yel go edi erem, jo nyehn erem o go njinanjini. Atingitingi ane bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini.”
40026001	Eji Jisos ma bung alum nyaa kpee mal, á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re,
40026002	“Ń kp'kahne re, lela ebsa nfung ebal, elkak Pasova rehng. Efung bio bi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka re bo kum-e go ekros.”
40026003	Owo atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm song kono go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Kayafas.
40026004	Owo bo toobo no ana bo bahke bobo Jisos mbehr mbehr, song wul.
40026005	Bo jo bungu re, “Nong, wahr k'lim ngare elkak, eji l'k'gbo ntong.”
40026006	Eji Jisos jolo go Betani go etahk Saimon ji nne abili,
40026007	nnenkal awohng kehm bake go ege, no fili elom akehng ji nno a nno, ji sahb k'kim ekun. Á kehm yaange akehng mao, kak-e go esi ngare nyi á jehk go ekp'kuru kpi nsol li.
40026008	Eji abat'toono ebe nyehne ano, atahng kehm rake bo. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge á kp'fade akehng ana maa?
40026009	Kehn akehng maa bo jol gungu, ko akpohko gbalee, fere ko, ka akpak.”
40026010	Jisos sebe kan kahn ana bo jo bung, á kehm tongo bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'gbiingi mmonankal noa? Yeblim nnoobo ka-m.
40026011	Akpak li a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng, wo, me n limm a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng.
40026012	Tibre eji mmonankal noa wohng-m akehng go egama ngubjing, á toobo ebjing ebame bum, bi m bahke kpoko.
40026013	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Edi ajehng ajehng go njini kpee, ji bo bahke tiingi nnoobo etib bia, bo bahke tob jo bung jia ji nnenkal noa ma lim, fere jo buum-e.”
40026014	Nne awohng go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, no bo jo lung-e re Judas Iskariot kehm tahme, song kpiri atubesi abalimajom,
40026015	kehm bahbe bo re, “Ejum aji ḿ bahk-m kake, n l'jabbe Jisos, kak-n go ebo?” Bo kehm-e kake mpon esehma.
40026016	Bomo ngare nyio asongo, Judas kehm kehme mbang seb ana nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo.
40026017	Ngbokambang efung elkak ni Jus kpo li abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist, abat'toono Jisos kehm ba kpir-e, fere bahb-e re, “Gan wo a kp'sebe re wahr song toobo nsol alehke nyi elkak Pasova bum-a?”
40026018	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Songen go nla ejahbe goji nne awohng, wahn song tong-e re, ‘Nt'tibi re, Ngare enyame ebkabbe. M bahke lehke elkak Pasova, a abat'toono ebame go ega etahk.’ ”
40026019	Abat'toono Jisos kehm song toobo nsol elkak Pasova nio bum, ana Jisos tongo bo.
40026020	Eji elgung ma ba, Jisos kehm song ji go ekp'kuru, jo li nsol, a abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
40026021	Eji bo jo li nsol o, á kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng ewahne bahk-m jabbe ka go.”
40026022	Ndon kehm fili bo. Bo kehm-e kehme elbahbe. No nne re, “Nsoo, me wo afi?”
40026023	Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Nne no kp'na tohko ebred eje ekpingi ajehng a name, ye wo li nne no bahk-m jabbe ka.
40026024	Mmon no nne bahke kpoko jang jang ana bo nyono bada ne. Eyuu a nne no bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka. Jol ga nob, li re nne noo bo we jelem.”
40026025	Judas ji gung-e no kehm bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, anv, me woa?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, wo wo.”
40026026	Eji bo kpi nlehke nlehke nsol, Jisos kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke, ka abat'toono ebe, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn li! A wo li ngubjing enyame.”
40026027	Owo á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm kake bo, kehm bungu re, “Woon, wahn ane kpee!
40026028	Tibre a wo li alung emame ma egbanngalung ji nfenfe, ma kp'fabe ka ane gbalee, eji bo l'bel eltahmeka go bo abiafem.
40026029	N kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe wo alahb avain maa tete efung bio rehng bi m bahke kpe wo a nahne go ejahbetul ji Nsoo.”
40026030	Owo bo kehm yimi ese, kehm lohngo tahm go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
40026031	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Atv maa ḿ bahke dulu tib esi ejame. Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, “ ‘M bahke wulu mbaabebul, ejoro bahke yaame ebo.’
40026032	Ngare nyi m ma nyahme, m bahk-n gboko mbang, song rehng go Galili.”
40026033	Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Afi ane baka kpee dulu na, me, wa n nehm be sa.”
40026034	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Atv maa, re nkok kehm kuku, a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me a nehme kahn.”
40026035	Pita kehm-e faange re, “Afi elkv ni m bahke kpoko a na, wa n nehm tiki ten.” Abat'toono bako kpee tob bung ano fvfo.
40026036	Owo Jisos kehm koko abat'toono ebe, tahm a bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re Gesemani, kehm tongo bo re, “Jiin ana, tete me n song kak ero o feere.”
40026037	Á kehm rodo Pita, a abon abal ba Sibidi, tahm a bo. Ndon kehm-e kehme elfili, ala fere jo teel-e.
40026038	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eltim ename ebjol ndon ndon sehng, rehng go elkv. Jiin a, wahn jo tob-m elbaabe.”
40026039	Á kehm reenge je go es'song, song gbo, kohk esamahr ndi, kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, tohko ga tahne, fak-m nkob erem nyia. Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
40026040	Á kehm feere ba kpiri abat'toono ebe kp'lale, kehm tongo Pita re, “Ḿ maam ji awa anyehng nya nya tob-m elbaaba?
40026041	Jo baaben, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń l'k'yel go elgaare. Etohko, mbang nyi Esowo kp-e koro, wo ga, ngubjing kp'leenge.”
40026042	Á kehm kpe feere, song kak ero re, “Nsoo, l'fere jol nyi m bahke woko go nkob nyia, a tohko fere fak-m nkob nyia go elbohngo, nong, mbang enya lim!”
40026043	Eji á kpe feere ba, á kehm kpe ba nyehn bo kp'lale. Tibre akpakamahr lubu bo ellu ellu.
40026044	Jisos kehm kpe tahm bo sa, kpe song kak ero b'nehm.
40026045	Á kehm kpe feere ba kpiri abat'toono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kpi nlale nlala, fere jo re ekva? Ngare ebkabbe na a, nyi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne, kak aneb abiafem go ebo.
40026046	Mehlen, wahr tahmen! Nyehnen, nne no bahk-m jabbe ka, ma kabbe a.”
40026047	Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, Judas ji woomo go ellong abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, kehm ba lohng, a ellong ane gbalee ba fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm. Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam ba tumu bo.
40026048	Nne no gung-e no tongo ane bao wuku wuku ana bo bahke liingi Jisos. Á tongo bo re, “Nne no n l'sod-e nnyo, ye wo, ḿ bahk-e bobo.”
40026049	Owo á kehm soro sehng na sehng, song rehng goji Jisos, kehm bungu re, “Nt'tibi, n kp-a kake nnyo,” kehm soro sod-e nnyo.
40026050	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Mbi, a ba jen?” Owo bo kehm bake, ba bob Jisos.
40026051	Nne awohng go ellong ane ba jolo a Jisos o kehm wobo ekahngkahng ebe go mbak, kpale nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom etung.
40026052	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Feere a ekahngkahng eba, wo kak go mbak! Tibre ane ba kpo nok abohng akahngkahng, bo bahke kpoko elkv akahngkahng.
40026053	Anv, a nehme kahn re, n jol ma gboongo Nsoo, á tum sehnge nlong enjel ewubbal re bo ba kak-m eboa?
40026054	Wo, l'fere jol ano, adi nwer Esowo nya bungu bade elkv ename bahke kehm jolo go etingitingi renan?”
40026055	Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong ellong ane bao re, “Anv, ń lohngo ba a akahngkahng, a atahmtahm re wahn ba bob-m ana n li nwajva? Efung abehng abehng n jo ji go etahk Esowo, jo tib-n, me ń tikem bob.
40026056	Nyaa kpee limi, eji alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no l'lohko jol go etingitingi.” Abat'toono ebe kpee kehm-e yaame sa, be ebo tahm.
40026057	Ane ba bobo Jisos kehm-e koko, tahm a ne go etahk Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Owo at'tibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kono asi.
40026058	Jisos jo jene ekv. Pita jen ekv, á kehm ba rehng go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom, kehm song ji a alokeltum nfontahk, eji á l'nyehn ji bahke jolo.
40026059	Atubesi abalimajom, anebkul nfam, a atul esub jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke kiimi afahnge lake Jisos, toono o, bo wul-e.
40026060	Bo tikem kahn mbang anyehng anyehng, jol eji akimfahnge atianse gbalee lohngo lohng ba yiimi. Es'kohro, akimfahnge atianse na abal kehm gohro lohng ba yiimi,
40026061	fere bung re, “Nne noa tongo re, á bahke ma wa etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si go nfung era.”
40026062	Owo ntubesi abalimajom kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A nehm faanga? Ejum aji ane baa kp'bungu tob-a?”
40026063	Jisos belle na eje. Ntubesi abalimajom kehm-e kpe tong re, “N kpa rehke go esamahr Esowo bi li go elkpin re wo tong-r joare wo Mesaya wo, ji li Mmon no Esowo.”
40026064	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo. N kp-a tongo re, Bomo anv asongo ḿ bahke nyehne Mmon no nne jehk go ejang eboblum bi Esowo bi gbale sehng, ń fere nyehn-e á kp'bake go akparesemsem.”
40026065	Owo ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm yare ewobo eje, kehm bungu re, “Yebsu Esowo! Ntianse anyehng anyehng e nehme kpe seb. Wahnfono antahng ebwuk ab'bi alum nya á ma bung.
40026066	“Ń tiri renan?” Bo kehm faange re, “Yebli ebi ji fuumu re bo wul-e.”
40026067	Bo kehm soko atel wohng-e go ege esamahr, fere dv-e. Egom jindiki jo ruum-e nkpal,
40026068	fere jo bung re, “Mesaya, nyehn-r amahr, wo fere tong-r nne no rum-a no.”
40026069	Pita ji eje ga elatahk. Nlokeltum awohng no jolo nnenkal kehm lohngo ba rehng go ege, kehm-e tongo re, “Wo fvfo, a tob jolo a Jisos ji Galili.”
40026070	Á kehm gbaame go esamahr ane bao kpee re, “N nehme kahn ejum ji a kp'b'bung.”
40026071	Eji Pita ma tahm, song rehng go mbuga, nnenkal noko kehm-e kpe nyehn, kehm tongo ane ba jolo ona re, “Ye jia tob jolo a Jisos ji Nasaret.”
40026072	Á kehm kpe gbaame, fere tir re, “Nne noo, we n nehme kahn.”
40026073	Eji ma ji mmokidi, ane ba yiimi kohlo o kehm bake ba kpiri Pita, kehm-e tongo re, “Etingitingi, a tob wob go bo ellong. Tibre alum nya a kp'bungu, nya nya kp'tibi ejahbe ji a lohng no.”
40026074	Pita kehm tiri re, “Esowo demm-m na demme. N nehme kahn nne noo.” Tvtv ona nkok kehm soro kuk.
40026075	Pita kehm soro buumu alum nya Jisos tong-e re, “Re nkok kehm kuku, a bahk-m tene nkpel era.” Pita kehm lohngo ona, song kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
40027001	Eji efungfu se no, atubesi abalimajom kpee, a anebkul nfam kehm toobo ana bo bahke wulu Jisos.
40027002	Eji bo m-e kak agbekobo, bo kehm-e koko, tahm a ne, song yak-e kak Pailet go ebo, ye ji jolo ntubesi ejahbe.
40027003	Eji Judas ji gung-e no nyehne re, Jisos ebli ebi, á kehm gboko ndon, fere rod mpon esehma nyio, feere a nyi re á song ka atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam,
40027004	kehm bungu tong bo re, “Me n lim abiafem, eji n gungu nne no ki lim ebi ajehng ajehng.” Bo kehm-e faange re, “O elam ejahre sang, nfem enya nyi go.”
40027005	Á kehm saade akpohko nyao, kak go etahk Esowo, kehm tahme eje, song kahn elne ekehd.
40027006	Atubesi abalimajom kehm rodo akpohko nyao, fere bung re, “Abi akpohko nyaa, akpohko alung nya. Fuumem re, akpohko nyaa woomo semme a akpohko ayare.”
40027007	Bo kehm toobo, rod akpohko nyao, song gunu edi egbe ji jolo ji ntokatu, eji bo l'jo kpa ajahmjahm kak edi ndi jio.
40027008	Owo wahnge bo kpo lung edi ndi jio re, “Egbe alung”, tete sik anv.
40027009	Owo kehm lohko jol go etingitingi ana nnyehnamahr Jeremaya bungu no re, “Bo rodo mpon esehma nyio nyi jolo ekun bi aneb Israel taame re bo ka go ege esi,
40027010	song gunu edi egbe ji ntokatu, ana Ntul Esowo tong-m no.”
40027011	Jisos kehm song yiimi go esamahr ntubesi ejahbe no bahb-e re, “Wo wo li ntul no Jusa?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, me wo.”
40027012	Eji atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam jo ka-e ebi, ejumjum á faangem.
40027013	Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a nehme wuk nsol gbalee nyi bo kp'bungu tob-aa?”
40027014	Jol Jisos we tikem faange. Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm-e kpoko esi tete.
40027015	Elkak anehng anehng ntubesi ejahbe jo kono elyehke nne a ngbekobo awohng, ka ellong ane, no bo l'seb.
40027016	Ngare nyio nne awohng woomo ngbekobo, no bo jo lung-e re Barabas. Nnene jolem no ki-e kahn.
40027017	Eji bo ba kono edi ajehng, Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Nne awo ń kp'sebe re me n yehke yake, Barabas, afi Jisos ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist?”
40027018	Tibre á jo kahne kpee re, bo ko-e ba ka-e, tib eji á jo teele bo ala.
40027019	Eji Pailet jehk go ege eti elam, nkal ewe kehm tiingi tv-e re, “Ka lak etingi nne jio abo, tibre ye wo wahng ka n nyehne erem gbalee go egama nlem nyi n leeme no lela.”
40027020	Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm kehme ellong ane bao eltim sennge re, bo gboongo Pailet, á yehke Barabas yake, fere wul Jisos.
40027021	Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm bahbe bo re, “Ane abal baa, nne awo ń kp'sebe re me n yehke yake?” Bo kehm faange re, “Barabas wo.”
40027022	Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, me n lim Jisos jen, ye ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist?” Bo ane kpee kehm faange re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
40027023	Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ebi aji á ma lim?” Bo kehm kpe rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
40027024	Eji Pailet sebe kahn re, ejumjum kpeem li ji á bahke kpe ma lim, gana ntong yahke gbo, owo á kehm koko alahb, ba ru abo go esamahr ane bao, kehm bungu re, “Elkv ni nne noa bahke kpoko, ebo ebame o wobem, nfem enyahne nyi go.”
40027025	Owo ellong ane bao kpee kehm-e faange re, “Nong, alung eme tuun-r, a abon abon ebahre.”
40027026	Pailet kehm yehke Barabas ka bo, á for, tong bo dv Jisos, fere yak-e ka re bo song kum-e go ekros.
40027027	Owo nsoja nyi ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm rodo Jisos, tahm a ne go nlaaga ntubesi noo, kehm song lung ellong nsoja nehko re bo ba.
40027028	Bo kehm-e yehke nsol go ngubjing, fere kak-e mbilibili ekpawobo ana ji atul kpo kono elkake.
40027029	Bo kehm tahnge ekpasi akpiri, ba konng-e go esi, fere ka-e ebti, á fili go ege eboblum, kehm jo gbo, jamm-e alahng go ege alata, fere jo nyok-e re, “E kp-a kake nnyo, ntul no Jus.”
40027030	Bo kehm jo so atel wohng-e, fere taare ebti bi á fili go ebo, jo rum-e go esi.
40027031	Eji bo m-e nyok ano kpee, owo bo kehm-e yehke ekpawobo jio, feere a nsol enye kak-e, ko-e tahm a ne re bo song kum-e go ekros.
40027032	Eji bo ma lohng fi, bo kehm song nyehn nne no bo jo lung-e re Saimon ji jolo nne a Sirin. Bo kehm-e bobo re á sol ekros ji Jisos.
40027033	Eji bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re Golgota ji lohngo re “edi nkpakesi”,
40027034	owo bo kehm-e kake amahm ma bo semme alullul anyane. Eji Jisos wuungu no, á kpeem wo.
40027035	Bo kum-e kan a lake go ekros, bo kehm soro kehme elfaange tub, eji bo l'mal baange nsol ebjing enye.
40027036	Eji bo ma baange nsol nyio, bo kehm jehke o, jo baab-e.
40027037	Bo kehm lake ekpakenwer go ero kohlo go ege esi, ji bo nyono ebi ji bo ka-e re, “A WO LI JISOS, NTUL NO JUS.”
40027038	Owo bo kehm tob kum awajv abal lake go akros, noko go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
40027039	Ane ba jo sehng go mbang kehm kehme aromo tuubu, fere jo su-e re,
40027040	“Wo sang jo bung re, a bahke wake etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si go nfung eraa? Tahre elna anv me! L'jol re, wo Mmon no Esowo wo, badde go ekros me!”
40027041	Atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm, go anebkul nfam tob jo nyok-e ano fvfo re,
40027042	“Á kpo tahre ane bako, yefono nehm ma tahre elne! L'jol re ye ntul no Israel wo, nong, á tohko badde go ekros ba, wahr kehm taame tv-e.
40027043	Á kpo bum Esowo go etingitingi, nong, Esowo tahr-e me, á l'kor-e. Tibre á kpo bung re, ye Mmon Esowo wo.”
40027044	Awajv nya bo tob kumu bo ana ye, jo tob su-e ano.
40027045	Eji efin ma yiimi, ejannge kehm gboko go ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete biingi awa ara.
40027046	Eji ma rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung, Jisos kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” ji lohngo re, “Nsoo, Nsoo, jen ji wahng ka a ma-m yake ana?”
40027047	Ane bandiki ba yiimi o wuk, kehm bungu re, “Á kpi Elaija lung.”
40027048	Owo nne awohng kehm soro be eje, song rod nd'dahng, suku go evinegar, tung go esi ebti, rod ton-e re á yab.
40027049	Egom ane bako kehm bungu re, “Tohken nong, wahr nyehnen, joare Elaija bahke bake, ba tahr-e.”
40027050	Jisos kehm kpe rabe wahre wahre wahre, kehm yake etohko eje ka go.
40027051	Owo ekpiki ji bo tohko go etahk Esowo kehm soro yang ejang ebbal, bomo go ero tete ba jahm ndi. Ndi kehm gbehke. Akpartal bahnge.
40027052	Alahm kehm lennge. Aneb Esowo gbalee ba kpo no, kehm nyahme.
40027053	Ngare nyi Jisos nyahme go elkv, bo kehm lohngo go alahm, tahm song rehng go Jerusalem. Owo ane gbalee nyehne bo.
40027054	Eji ntubesi a nsoja, a nsoja nyehko nyi jo tob baabe Jisos a ne nyehne ana ndi ma gbehke, fere nyehn nsol nyehko nyi kpe lim budu, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere kehme elbungu re, “Etingitingi, nne noa lohko jol Mmon no Esowo!”
40027055	Anebkal gbalee ba lohngo go Galili, ba jo toono Jisos, fere jo kak-e ebo, yiimi ebo go fee, jo nyehn.
40027056	Meri ji lohng go Magdala woomo go bo ellong, a Meri nnyehn Jems a Josef, go nnyehn abon Sibidi.
40027057	Eji elgung ma ba, efange nne ajehng ji bo jo lung-e re Josef, ji lohng go Arimatia kehm bake. Ye fvfo tob jolo nt'toono no Jisos.
40027058	Á kehm tahme song kpiri Pailet, fere gboong-e re á yake ekv ji Jisos ka-e. Pailet kehm tongo re, bo yake ekv eje ka-e.
40027059	Josef kehm rodo ekv ji Jisos, kpennge abarebare abomo nya nfenfe,
40027060	fere rod, song kak go ege elahm bi bo kp'na rahme go ekpartal. Á kehm bannge egburu eltal, bulu go nnyo elahm, kehm tahme eje.
40027061	Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Meri jehko, bo kehm song ji, wane elahm bio.
40027062	Etoono efung behko, eji efung ebjing atoobo ma sehng, atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm song kono asi go etahk Pailet,
40027063	kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, wahr ebbuumu ana nnehm a nne noo bungu ngare nyi á kpeke li go elkpin re, ‘Nfung era m bahke nyahme go elkv.’
40027064	Tum ane, bo song baabe elahm bio tete nfung era nyio biingi, eji abat'toono ebe l'k'song v ekv eje, fere jo bung tong ane re, ‘Yebnyahme go elkv’. Tohko jol ano, es'kohro enehm bia bahke sabe sehnge bi ngbokambang.”
40027065	Owo Pailet kehm bungu re, “Koon ab'baabe, wahn song baabe elahm ana ń kahne no.”
40027066	Bo kehm tahme, song bum ab'baabe o re bo baabe elahm, fere rod elak lake, kak elliingi, (eji bo l'kahn, nne l'yel go elahm).
40028001	Eji Esabat ma sehng, ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu behre behre Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Meri jehko, bo kehm tahme re, bo song nyehn elahm.
40028002	Owo ndi kehm soro kehme elgbehke tete, tibre enjel nyi Ntul Esowo lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba, ba bannge eltal nio bum go nkpe, fere ji.
40028003	Á jolo are emangedu ji. Nsol nyi á kake go ngubjing jo bare kparaang.
40028004	Ab'baabe bao fahl-e sehng, fere jo k'kahm, bo fere jolo are akvne nya.
40028005	Enjel nyio kehm tongo anebkal bao re, “Kana kpe fahl! Tibre n kp'kahne re, n kpi Jisos seb, ji bo kum-e go ekros.
40028006	Ana á limm, yebnyahme fi, ana á bungu no. Baan, wahn ba nyehn edi ji á noongo no.
40028007	Songen anv elwaare, wahn song tong abat'toono ebe re, yebnyahme go elkv. Á bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili. Go wo ḿ bahk-e nyehne. Buumen ji m ma-n tong a!”
40028008	Owo bo kehm lohngo go elahm elwaare, elfahle elfahle, a egburu eyebatahng, be re bo song tong abat'toono ebe.
40028009	Eji bo fi no re bo song tong abat'toono ebe, owo Jisos kehm ba wane bo, kehm bungu re, “N kp-n kake nnyo.” Bo kehm jeere kohl-e, jamm-e alahng, jabb-e akpade, fere kak-e.
40028010	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Songen, wahn song tong abonanee re, bo song go Galili. Go wo bo bahk-m nyehne.”
40028011	Eji anebkal bao ma tahm fi, ab'baabe elahm bandiki kehm tahme, song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tooro ejum ajehng ajehng ji ma lim, tong atubesi abalimajom.
40028012	Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm song kono edi ajehng, kehm toobo, ka ab'baabe elahm bao akpohko gbalee,
40028013	kehm bungu re, “Ana wo ḿ bahke jo bung re, ‘Abat'toono ebe ba atv, ba v nkvne, tahm a ne ngare nyi e jo lal.’
40028014	Ntubesi ejahbe l'wuk, e bahke song bung a ne, wahn, kana tiiri!”
40028015	Ab'baabe elahm bao kehm rodo akpohko nyao, song lim ana bo tongo bo. Eka jia, Jus kpi ntubu ntubu, tong atem tete sik anv.
40028016	Abat'toono Jisos, ewubu a nne awohng, bo kehm tahme go ewong ajehng ji li go Galili, edi ji Jisos tongo bo re bo je.
40028017	Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm gboko, jamm-e alahng, fere kak-e. Egom jindiki jo f'faabe.
40028018	Jisos kehm jeere kohlo bo, kehm tongo bo re, “Bo ma-m ka nsahm kpee nyi m bahke jo fili ejahbetul Esowo, fere jo fili njini.
40028019	Songen fvfo go njini kpee, wahn song lim ane, bo jol abat'toono ebame go ejahbe ajehng ajehng. Wohngen bo alahb go mbing nyi Nsoo, a Mmon, a Etingi Etohko,
40028020	wahn fere tib bo, bo jo bum ejum ajehng ajehng ji m ma-n tong. Buumen re, m bahke jolo a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng tete eying jia mal.”
41001001	Mbomannahb a nnoobo etib bi Jisos Kraist Mmon Esowo bi a.
41001002	Mahne mahne nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono go ege a nwer ana Esowo tongo Mmon ewe re, “M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame tv re á gbo-a mbang, ba lennge mbang ka-a.”
41001003	“Nne noa, kp'rabe go elka emahng re, ‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bahke sehnge, wahn lim t'tor.’ ”
41001004	Ane noo bo jo lung-e re Jon, á je go elka emahng, song kehme ane tiingi re, “Gboon ndon go egahne abiafem, wahn bel ewohngalahb, eji Esowo l'tahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
41001005	Ane kpee ba lene o nfam nyio nyi Judea, a ane kpee ba lene go Jerusalem jo lohngo je goji Jon, song fvvrv abiafem ebo, fere bel ewohngalahb go Jodan.
41001006	Jon jo kake nsol nyi bo limi go anyar nnyam nyi bo kpo lung re ekamel, fere jo gbaange egbaange ngunyam go ebun. Á jo li agohrobi, fere jo yab akehng ekon.
41001007	Á kehm kehme ane tiingi re, “Nne no kp'bake go, á li nj'joka nne sehnge me. Jol me, n tohkem f'fuumu re, me n kehme go ndi fannge alehke akpaketa enye.
41001008	Eltum ename li re, me n jo wohng-n alahb maka maka. Ye ji kp'bake, bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko.”
41001009	Ngare nyio Jisos lohngo go Nasaret ji Galili, ba go Jodan. Jon kehm-e wohngo alahb.
41001010	Jisos lohngo kan go alahb me, á kehm nyehne ejahbetul Esowo kp'lennge. Etohko ji Esowo kehm lohngo go elfoongo ni ebbehl, badde ba jol a ne.
41001011	Á kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “Wo wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m s'sehng.”
41001012	Tvtv ona etohko ji Esowo kehm soro rod-e tahm a ne go elka emahng.
41001013	Á kange elka emahng nio nfung atahl abal. Owo nnehm gar-e no, re á yel go abiafem. Enyam bi kpo jol emahng jolo ona fvfo. Owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kak-e ebo.
41001014	Ngare nyio, Jon, bo m-e kak go ngbekobo. Jisos kehm tahme song rehng go Galili, song tiingi nnoobo etib bi Esowo.
41001015	Á jo bungu re, “Etingitingi, ngare ebrehng. Etul bi Esowo ebkabbe. Gboon ndon go egahne abiafem, wahn taame tv nnoobo etib bi Esowo!”
41001016	Eji Jisos jo jen egbuk eto ji Galili, á nyehne abasahre nsahre, ane na abal, Saimon, a Andru ji mmonannyehn Saimon, bo jo kake erim go eto.
41001017	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen toon-m wahn! M bahk-n limi, ń nehm kpe bim nsahre, ḿ bahke fere jo bim ane.”
41001018	Bo kehm soro yake arim ebo, tahm toono Jisos.
41001019	Á kehm jene mmokidi, song kpiri Jems, a Jon ba jolo abon Sibidi. Bo woomo egbang, jo baade arim ebo.
41001020	Jisos kehm mahke bo. Bo kehm soro tahm nde ebo, a alokeltum ebe sa go egbang, tahm toono Jisos.
41001021	Bo kehm song rehng go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Kapenium. Efung Esabat Jisos kehm ba yel ekp'kpa ero kehm kehme eltibi.
41001022	Ane ba wuk-e no, kpo bo esi sehng tib go mbang nyi á jo tib. Á jolem ana at'tibi baka gana ba atahm. Á jo tibi area, ana nne no kpi nsahm.
41001023	Nne no bele ebi etohko go ege atahng kehm soro lohng, ba yel ekp'kpa ero jio.
41001024	Á kehm rabe tong Jisos re, “Jisos ji Nasaret, a ba jen ko go egahre? A ba re wo ba ranng-ra? N kp'kahne elkohn nne no a li no. A li mbarebara nne no Esowo. Ebi ajehng ajehng wa wobem go ega eltim. A lohng goji Esowo ba.”
41001025	Jisos kehm rabe tong ebi etohko jio re, “Rahke ewok, wo lohng nne noa!”
41001026	Ebi etohko jio limi nne noo, á soro gbo ngbabohngo, fere rabe tiim, kehm soro lohng nne noo.
41001027	Ane kpee ba jolo o, kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Jen ji jo jol ana? Nkpokosi anyi a? A eltibi ni nfenfe ni! Nne noa kpi nsahm nyi abi atohko kpo wuk-e, á l'bung a bo.”
41001028	Elgahm ni Jisos kehm yeere na yeere go nfam nyio nyi Galili kpee.
41001029	Jisos, Jems, a Jon, bo kehm lohngo go ekp'kpa ero jio asongo go etahk ji Pita a Andru lene no.
41001030	Saimon, nnyehn nkal ewe noongo edilnong, jo yam arumbum. Jisos rehnge kan a me, bo kehm-e tongo bada nnenkal noo.
41001031	Á kehm jeere kohl-e, song jabb-e go ebo, tab-e yiimi. Á soro nob arumbum nyao. Nnenkal noo kehm tahme fvfo, kehme bo loko.
41001032	Elgung ba kan a me, ngare nyi njul ma lahm, ane kehm koko aneb ayam kpee, a aneb abi atohko ba goji Jisos.
41001033	Ane kpee ba jolo ejahbe jio kehm ba nyo na nyo go mbutahk.
41001034	Jisos limi aneb ayam gbalee, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng, fere kam ane gbalee abi atohko. Á taamem re, abi atohko nyao bung ejumjum. Tibre bo jo k'kahn nne no Jisos li no.
41001035	Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm fungu atv atv tahm song rehng go edi ji li soom, song kak ero.
41001036	Saimon, a atem bako go kehm tahme, kehm-e elsebe.
41001037	Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, ane kpee kp-a sebe.”
41001038	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahr tahmen go abon ajahbe bako. M bahke tob bung alum Esowo tong bo. Tibre nya nya wahng ka m ba no.”
41001039	Á kehm mehle, kehme elyannge go Galili, jo bung alum Esowo go ntahk ero, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke go bo a ntim.
41001040	Efung abehng nne abili kehm bake goji Jisos, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm-e gboongo re, “L'fere kor-a, lim-m, me n nob.”
41001041	Jisos, ndon kehm-e fili. Á kehm tanne ebo, koor-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Kor-m kor, wobnob.”
41001042	Tvtv o nnenlum noo kehm soro nob abili nyao.
41001043	Jisos kehm-e rehke t'tahne, fere tong-e re á song.
41001044	Á kehm-e tongo re, “Wuungu atung, n kp-a tongo re, wo k'tiki tong nne awohng awohng jia ana! Song goji nlimajom, á feed-a, wo song lim njom nyi Moses tibi no, eji ane l'kahn re wobnob.”
41001045	Nne noo kehm tahme, kehm kehme eltiingi nkpokosi nyi m-e lim, tong ane edi ajehng ajehng. Á tooro area, kehn jol Jisos k'kpe ma lohng go nfam gbul gbul gbuul. Á jo fere jen eje adi nya li soom. Ane jo kpe lohng edi ajehng ajehng, song kpir-e.
41002001	Kange kan abon afung ntiil, Jisos kehm feere ba ga Kapenium. Eka kehm yeere na yeere re, Jisos noa etahk.
41002002	Ane kehm bake ba nyo, jol eyake ajehng ajehng kpeem jol go mbutahk ji nne bahke sehnge yel ekp'kpa. Jisos kehm kehme bo nnoobo etib bio tiingi.
41002003	Ellong ane bako kehm kpe ba. Ane ani woomo go bo ellong o, ba solo mbanne, jo ba a ne goji Jisos.
41002004	Bo kahnem mbang nyi bo bahke sehnge a ne rehng goji Jisos, tibre ane ruru sehng. Bo kehm lahme elbultahk, kanne alehke go edilnong, kehm kehme eltahre, tete nne eyam noo song rehng edi ji Jisos jehk no.
41002005	Eji Jisos nyehne ana bo taame no tv-e, á kehm bungu tong mbanne nyio re, “Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”
41002006	At'tibi ba atahm bandiki ba ji o, kehm kehme eltiri go bo a ntim re,
41002007	“Jen ji wahnge á ma daange Esowo, fere bung elkohn ellum ana nia? Nne awo bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem? Esowo ntahngtahng bi bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.”
41002008	Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro kahn ntir atahng abo, kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń tiri ntir ana nyia?
41002009	Jen ji ga riidi, n l'tong mbanne nyio re, ‘Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n l'tong-e re, ‘Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, tahm jen?’
41002010	M bahke lennge fvfo tib-n re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia, nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.”
41002011	Owo wahnge Jisos kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
41002012	Bo kehm kehme elseenge. Nne eyam noo soro mehl tvtv, rod edilnong eje tahm. Kehm kpoko bo esi, bo ane kpee. Bo kehme Esowo tehk re, “Elkohn ana nia, e ka nyehn a nyehn!”
41002013	Jisos kehm kpe lohng tahm go eto ji Galili. Ane kpee kehm bake go ege. Á kehm kehme bo tib.
41002014	Eji á kp'sehnge egbuk eto jio, á kehm nyehne Livai, mmon no Alfeus, jehk go ege edi eltum, kpi akpohko etak ko. Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Tahm toon-m me!” Livai kehm mehle fvfo toon-e.
41002015	Eji Jisos, a abat'toono ebe jo li nsol go etahk Livai, abakokatak, a aneb abiafem gbalee tob jolo o fvfo, jo li nsol. Tibre ane gbalee ba jo toon-e.
41002016	Eji ellong at'tibi ba atahm, ba bo jo lung bo re Farisis nyehne Jisos kp'lehke nsol a abakokatak, a aneb abiafem, bo kehm bahbe abat'toono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge á kpo li nsol a abakokatak, a aneb abiafem?”
41002017	Jisos wuku kan bo, á kehm faange re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem bao ba kp'yame ba kpo seb nlimakahm. M baam re me m ba lung anobonobo ane, m ba re me m ba lung aneb abiafem.”
41002018	Efung abehng abat'toono Jon, a ba Farisi jo bade elbo njal. Bo kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge abat'toono Jon, a abat'toono Farisis kpo bade elbo njal, abat'toono eba kil jo tob bade elbo ano?”
41002019	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “N'nob re ane ba bo ma tiingi bo elkak elbal, bo ji njala? Eji nfono elkak kpeke li na, bo nehm ma bade elbo njal.
41002020	Ngare kp'bake nyi bo bahke koko nfono elkak tahm a ne. Ngare nyio l'rehng, owo bo bahke kehme elbo njal bade.
41002021	“Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe song baade nk'kula mbomo. Á l'lim ano, mmojang mbomo no nfenfe nehm yiimi. Nk'kula mbomo mio bahke kpe kv na edi jio budu sehnge ana wuku wuku.
41002022	Nnene limm, no bahke yaange amahm ma kp'fahle, kak go nk'kohko eyahbe. Á l'lim ano, eyahbe jio bahke bahnge na, amahm sale. Nobo re nne ko amahm ma kp'fahle, yaange kak go eyahbe nfenfe.”
41002023	Efung Esabat Jisos jo jene go emahng ji bo ma bahm nkohl. Eji abat'toono ebe jo toon-e, bo kehm kehme amohk nkohl monngo tv go arahn.
41002024	Bab Farisi kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abat'toono eba kp'limi ejum ji ki fuumu re nne lim efung Esabat?”
41002025	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Wahn ka tiki lung bade ana Devid limi noa, eji nfem gbo tub-ea, á song seb nsol alehke lia, ye, a ane ebea?
41002026	Á yele ekp'kpa Esowo, song li abred nya bo limi bum go esamahr Esowo. Jia ana limi ngare nyi Abiatar jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Ntahm enyahre li re, abalimajom ba ba fuumu re bo jo li abred nyao. Devid li abred nyao, fere faake erik ka ane ebe, bo tob li.”
41002027	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Esowo limi efung Esabat ka nne. Á limem nne ka efung Esabat.
41002028	Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
41003001	Jisos kehm kpe feere go etahk ero. Nne jolo o, no ebo ebe lohngo no.
41003002	Ane ba jolo o jo kpuru Jisos, joare á bahke limi nne noo, á nob efung Esabat. Tibre bo jo sebe ejum ji bo bahke kake Jisos ebi.
41003003	Jisos kehm bungu tong nne no ebo ebe ma lohng re, “Mehl, wo jeere ba!”
41003004	Jisos kehm bahbe ane bako re, “Ejum aji atahm enyahre bungu re nne jo lim efung Esabat? Á jo kak nne eboa, afi á jo rannge na? Á tahre elkpin nnea, afi á rannge elkpin nne?” Jol ejumjum bo we faangem.
41003005	Jisos, atahng kehm-e rake, eji á mehle no jang. Ndon kehm-e fere fili bada bo. Tibre bo bele etahnsi. Á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!” Á kehm tanne ebo ebe, lohko nob tvtv.
41003006	Bab Farisi kehm lohngo ekp'kpa ero jio o, kehm song kpiri alokeltum ntul a Herod. Bo kehm toobo ana bo bahke limi, kehm wulu Jisos.
41003007	Jisos kehm tahme eje, a abat'toono ebe go eto ji Galili. Ellong ane tvv t'toono bo.
41003008	Ane bao lohngo go Galili, Judea, Jerusalem, a Idume, go egbuk jehko ji Jodan, fere lohng go abon ajahbe ba li sennge Taya abola Saidon kak. Ellong ane gbalee ba goji Jisos, tibre bobwuk ana á kp'limi.
41003009	Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re bo toobo egbang bum-e, eji ane l'ki-e fahd kak.
41003010	Tibre á limi ane gbalee, bo nob ayam ebo. Owo wahnge aneb ayam bao kpee jo temme atemtem re bo song koor-e ebo.
41003011	Abi atohko l'nyehn Jisos, bo jo gb'gbo jamm-e alahng, fere jo rabe tiim re, “Wo wo li Mmon no Esowo!”
41003012	Jisos kehm rehke abi atohko nyao t'tahne re, bo k'tooro tong ane elkohn nne no ye li no.
41003013	Jisos kehm tahme go ewong ajehng, song lung ane bao ba á kp'sebe. Bo kehm bake.
41003014	Á kehm yehke ewubu ane abal, fere tong bo re, “M ma-n yehke re wahn jol a name. M bahk-n tumu re wahn song bung alum Esowo.
41003015	Fvfo ḿ bahke bele nsahm nyi ḿ bahke jo kam abi atohko.”
41003016	A wo li ewubu ane abal ba á yehke no, Saimon ji Jisos ka-e mbing nyehko re Pita,
41003017	Jems, a Jon, bo jolo abon ba Sibidi. Jisos ka bo abing nyako re Boanerges ji lohngo re, “abon ba li ana ndan”,
41003018	Andru, Filip, Batolomi, Matiu, Tomos, Jems ji mmon no Alfeus, Tadeus, Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom,
41003019	go Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.
41003020	Jisos, a abat'toono ebe, bo kehm feere kehnge go etahk. Ellong ane kehm kame na kam song rur. Jisos, a abat'toono ebe belem eyake ji bo bahke lehke nsol.
41003021	Ane ebe wuku kan a me, bo kehm bake re bo ba ko-e tahm a ne. Tibre bo jo bungu re, “Yebgbo esahl!”
41003022	At'tibi ba atahm bandiki ba lohngo go Jerusalem ba, kehm bungu re, “Á kpi etohko ji nnehm go ege eltim. Ntul a nnehm wo ka-e nsahm nyio re á jo kam ane abi atohko yehke.”
41003023	Jisos kehm lungu ane bao tv elne, kehm tuubu ngaane tong bo re, “Nnehm bahke ma kam elne renan?
41003024	Ejahbe l'yab, jol ebo ebo, ejahbe jio bahke tane.
41003025	Nnahb l'yab, jol ebo ebo, nnahb nyio bahke tane.
41003026	Eblehm l'kehme elnoko atemtem, ejahbe ebo l'yab, bahke tane.
41003027	Nnene limm, no bahke ma wa mbutahk yel go etahk etahntahn nne, song kpu nsol enye kpee, sehngem re no, á tohko gbo mbang gba etahntahn nne noo alehke, kehm ma yel ege ekp'kpa, song seb ajehng ajehng ji kor-e no rod.
41003028	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bahke ma bel eltahmeka kpee go bo abiafem, a elsuku ni bo kpo su Esowo,
41003029	wo, nne awohng awohng no l'fere lim abiafem, su Etingi Etohko, á nehm tiki bel eltahmeka go njinanjini. Abiafem nyao we nehm tiki laade go njinanjini.”
41003030	Jisos bungu jia, tibre ane tvv jo tongo re, “Á kpi ebi etohko.”
41003031	Nnyehn Jisos, a abonanyehn Jisos kehm bake. Bo yiimi go elatahk, tum re bo lung-e.
41003032	Ellong ane tvv ji sennge Jisos kak. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nyehnee, nne, a abonane ebba yiimi go elatahk kp-a sebe.”
41003033	Jisos kehm faange re, “Nne awo li li nnee? Ane aba li li abonanee?”
41003034	Á kehm tabe esamahr wahre, jang ane kpee ba ji senng-e kak, kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, a wo li babnnee, a abonanee.
41003035	Nne awohng awohng no l'lim ji Esowo kp'sebe re á lim, ye wo li mmonannee, a nnee.”
41004001	Jisos kehm kpe tahm go eto ji Galili song tib ane. Ellong ane ni ba yiimi senng-e kak, gbale sehng. Owo á kehm song yel go egbang bi woomo go alahb, ellong ane jol ga nkpe egbuk.
41004002	Á jo ko ngaane, tib bo nsol tvv. A wo li eltibi ene ni á tibi bo re,
41004003	“Wuungen atung! Nne jolo gona, no tahme re á song wohngo amohk nti enye.
41004004	Eji á tahme no re á song wohngo amohk nti go ege egbe, nyandiki gbo noongo go mbang. Nruk ba suudu kpee mele.
41004005	“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Abon ndi jolo ntiil. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge. Tibre edi jio, ndi gbalem.
41004006	Njul nyaare kan a me, akohdo nti nyao wuudu, fere kpo. Tibre alohk jolem.
41004007	“Nyandiki gbo kuumu elkob akpiri. Akpiri nyao gbale na, bulu akohdo nti nyao, kabem.
41004008	“Amohk nti nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kehm mahnge, fere gbal arahn, kab. Atasok nyandiki jo jolo eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl ara ara, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl alon alon.”
41004009	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong á wuk!”
41004010	Eji Jisos jolo ntahngtahng, egom jindiki, a abat'toono ebe kehm song ji senng-e kak, kehm-e bahbe bada ngaane enye.
41004011	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn, boblennge nsol nyi li bade etul bi Esowo ka-n, nyi Esowo behre no. Ngare anyehng anyehng egom jehko jo wuku ngaane nyi nyi.
41004012	“ ‘Re bo seenge na seenge seenge, jol bo nehm tiki nyehn. Re bo wuk na wuk wuk kak atung, jol bo nehm tiki kahn, eji bo l'k'gbo ndon, feere goji Esowo, fere bel eltahmeka.’ ”
41004013	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Elgan nia wahn lenngema? Bahke limi renan, ń kehm kahne ngaane nyehko nyi m bahke kpe tuubu?
41004014	“Mbahmgbe noo tahme song wohngo alum Esowo.
41004015	“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang. Bo l'wuk alum Esowo, nnehm soro ba tvtv, ba yehke etib bio go bo a ntim.
41004016	“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Bo l'wuk alum Esowo, bo ko tvtv a eyebatahng.
41004017	Nehm yel rahbe go bo a ntim, lim alohk. Jol nehm tohko k'kang, erem l'ba, a ntong go alum Esowo nya bo wuku no, bo soro gbo tvtv.
41004018	“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya fooro gbo go elkob akpiri. Bao ba li ane ba kpo wuk etib bio o.
41004019	Gana, nsol nyi njini nyia kpi bo gbiingi go bo a ntim. Ekor akpohko kp'nehme bo. Bo fere jo nok, eji bo l'bel ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ki kpi. Nsol nyia kpee bahke rake yel go bo a ntim, bulu alum Esowo tv. Akab nehm kab.
41004020	“Ane bako li ana amohk nti nya bo wohngo go nnooba ndi. Bo l'wuk alum Esowo ko, bo fere kab akab, egom jindiki eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu, egom jindiki nkab atahl ara ara, egom jindiki nkab atahl alon alon.”
41004021	Jisos kehm kpe soro asi re, “Nne ebk'ko et'rekahng ba a jia, ba nyaala, fere rod ejeere konnga, afi á bum go nla ekp'kuru? Á kpo rod kunu go edi ji li gbuul.
41004022	Ajehng ajehng ji bo behre no, bo bahke koko ba edi ji li gbuul. Ajehng ajehng ji bo bulu no, bo bahke tiki lennge.
41004023	Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
41004024	Fvfo, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Kunen ekpu go ajehng ajehng ji ń kpo wuk. Mbang ny'nehm nyi ń kpo lam ane bako, ny'nehm nyi Esowo bahke tob lam-n. Elam ji Esowo bahke gbale sehng, fere s'sab.
41004025	Nne no kpi no, Esowo bahk-e kpe budu na. Nne no kpi ntiil, Esowo bahk-e gohro taare na, no á kpi no.”
41004026	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana nne no song wohngo amohk nti go ege egbe.
41004027	Á jo kono elnoongo lal ngare atv, fere nyahme efungfu. Amohk nti nyao mahng, fere gbal. Á kahnem ana limi lim.
41004028	Ndi nyi kpo lim antahng re nsol mahng, fere gbal, kab akab.
41004029	Ngare nyi nti nyio ma kab, nne noo bahke koko ebgbagodo, song bong. Tibre ngare elbongo ebrehng.”
41004030	Jisos kehm bahbe re, “E bahke bungu renan bade ana etul bi Esowo li no? Elgan ani e bahke koko lennge?
41004031	Li ana mmohk asia nyi sahb s'se go njini nyia sehnge mmohk eti anyehng anyehng.
41004032	Nne kehm rodo bahm go ndi. Kange kan a me, kehm gbale sehnge elrahnti anehng anehng, jamme agburu ab'bo, nruk ba si ntahk.”
41004033	Jisos jo bungu alum enye gbalee go ngaane ana elgan nia. Á jo bungu, eji bo l'mal elwuku.
41004034	Á jo tiki bung a bo go ngaane. Á l'jol ntahngtahng, a abat'toono ebe, á jo lennge ajehng ajehng tong bo.
41004035	Efung b'nehm ona, ngare elgung, Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Wahr siiren eto jia, rehng go egbuk jehko.”
41004036	Bo kehm yake ellong ane bao. Abat'toono ebe kehm tahme yel egbang. Ngare nyio Jisos ebyel. Agbang nyako tob jolo o fvfo.
41004037	Nfeb nyi kp'tahne kehm bake. Ebuku kehm kehme ellimi. Alahb kehm jo kim, yel egbang, ba elruru.
41004038	Jisos noongo go nnahb egbang jo lal. Á kunu esi go etisi. Abat'toono ebe kehm-e nyahme re, “Nt'tibi, wa nehme luba, wahr ga yahke tano?!”
41004039	Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu t'tahne, tong nfeb re, “Rahke!” Á kehm fere tong ebuku re, “Goomo!” Nfeb nyio kehm rahke. Edi kehm naange soom.
41004040	Jisos kehm fere bung tong abat'toono ebe re, “Jen ji ń kp'fahle ana? Jen ji wahng ka ń kil-m elbumu go etingitingi?”
41004041	Tibre bo fahle sehng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elkohn nne awo anae, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, wuk-e?”
41005001	Bo kehm rehnge go egbuk eto jehko go ejang bi Gerasa.
41005002	Jisos lohngo kan go egbuk, á kehm soro wane nne no lohng go edi ji alam akvne jolo no. Nne noo ona bele ebi etohko go ege atahng.
41005003	Á lene go alahm akvne. Nnene we kpeem ma kak agbekobo.
41005004	Nkpel tvv bo jo kak-e agbekobo. Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi bo gba-e no, á tohng nya abo kiimi, fere ruumu nya akpade kiimi. Nne ne jolem, no jo mal gon-e.
41005005	Atv a njul á jo yannge go alahm akvne, a awong, jo rabe tiim, fere jo rod atal, jo kadde elne, yehke alok.
41005006	Á jolo fee, eji á nyehne Jisos. Á kehm beke ba gbo jamme Jisos alahng,
41005007	kehm rabe tiim re, “Jisos ji Mmon no Esowo bi li go ero, a ba jen go egame? Tib go esi ji Esowo m ma-a gboongo re, wo ki-m kak erem!”
41005008	Á bungu jia, tib eji Jisos m-e tohko tong re, “Ebi etohko lohng-e!”
41005009	Jisos kehm bahbe ebi etohko jio re, “Mbing enya mee?” Á kehm faange re, “Mbing enyame li re ‘Egomegom’. Tibre e li go egom.”
41005010	Á kehm soro gboongo Jisos re, á k'kam bo yehke go ejahbe jio.
41005011	Ellong akuk jolo o kpidi kpidi, jo li nsol go ewong.
41005012	Abi atohko nyao kehm kehme Jisos gboongo re, á lub tum bo, bo song yel akuk nyao go atahng.
