41005013	Jisos kehm taame. Abi atohko nyao kehm soro yake nne noo abo, tahm song yel akuk nyao go atahng. Bo kehm beke song fooro agbunggbung gbo yel go alahb tan. Kpee ellong akuk nio o jolo akuk atahltahl nkpel elon (2,000).
41005014	Ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao, be ebo tahm, song tiingi go etahk, a abon ajahbe bako fvfo. Ane bao kehm lohngo re bo song nyehn ji ma lim.
41005015	Bo kehm bake goji Jisos, ba nyehn nne no bele ellong abi atohko go ege atahng. Á jehk eje sange sange, fere kak nsol go ngubjing. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
41005016	Ane ba nyehne no, kehm song tong ane bako ji ma lim nne no bele abi atohko, a ji ma lim akuk.
41005017	Bo kehm tongo Jisos re, á tahm ejahbe jio.
41005018	Eji Jisos yele egbang, nne no bele abi atohko kehm jo gboong-e re, “Nong, me n toon-a, wahr tahm!”
41005019	Jisos taamem, á tong-e re, “Feere song goji ane eba, wo song tong bo ana ji Ntul ma lim ka-a, ana a ma fili Esowo ndon.”
41005020	Nne noo kehm tahme jo yannge go ejahbe na ebwubu bi bo jo lung re Dekapolis, jo tooro ji Jisos ma lim ka-e. Ane bao kpee ba wuku no, kpo bo esi area.
41005021	Jisos kehm yele egbang, feere egbuk eto jehko. Owo ane kame no ba rur senng-e kak. Á jolo kpidi kpidi go nkpe eto.
41005022	Ntubesi awohng go ellong atubesi ba etahk ero, no bo jo lung-e re Jairus kehm bake. Á nyehne kan Jisos, á kehm gboko jamm-e alahng go alata,
41005023	kehm-e gboongo gbalee re, “Mmon ewame yahke kpo, titi, ba wo ba kun-e ebo go esi, eji á l'nob, fere bel elkpin.”
41005024	Jisos kehm soro tahm toono Jairus. Ellong ane tvv jo tob toono bo go njahm. Bo jo gbulu na gbul atemtem mbang mbang.
41005025	Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no alung sa-e nnahb ewubu a nnya ebal.
41005026	Á jo nyehne erem sehng, eji abalimakahm tvv jo lim-e akahm. Á rannge akpohko enye kpee re á nob eyam bio, eyam jo kpe-e nyede na.
41005027	Á wuku bada Jisos. Owo á kehm jene a ellong ane ba jo toono Jisos go njahm, ba kooro nsubu enye.
41005028	Tibre nnenkal noo bungu go ege eltim re, “N l'lub koor-e na kooro go ege a nsubu, m bahke nobo.”
41005029	Á kehm soro kooro nsubu enye. Alung eme soro mal. Á kehm soro kahn tvtv re, yeblohko nob eyam ebe.
41005030	Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro kahn re, nsahm m-e tele lohng. Á kehm keebe seenge ellong ane bao, kehm bahbe re, “Nne awo ma-m kooro go egama nsubu?”
41005031	Abat'toono ebe kehm faange re, “A kp'nyehne re, ane ebrur sehng, gana a kp'bahbe re, nne awo ma-m kooro!”
41005032	Tvtv o Jisos kpi njange njange re á nyehn nne no koor-e no.
41005033	Nnenkal noo kehm soro kahn ji ma lim go ege a ngubjing, kehm bake goji Jisos a elfahle, a ekahme akahb, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm-e soro tong etingitingi kpee.
41005034	Jisos kehm tongo re, “Nnenkal, eltaame ena ebwahng ka wobnob. Song go eyebatahng! Woblohko nob eyam eba.”
41005035	Eji Jisos jo bung jia, ane bandiki kehm soro lohng go etahk ntubesi etahk ero noo, kehm ba tong-e re, “Mmon ewa ebkpo. Jen ji wahng ka a kp'kpeke gbiingi nsoo?”
41005036	Jisos wuungem atung a jio ji bo bungu no. Á kehm tongo ntubesi no re, “Ka fahl, taame na taame!”
41005037	Jisos taamem re, nnene toon-e, sehngem Pita, Jems a Jon ji mmonannyehn Jems, bo ba, á taame re bo toon-e.
41005038	Bo kehm soro rehng etahk ntubesi noo. Jisos kehm nyehne egom jehko ji kp'lingi, fere nyehn bako ba kp'kake agohrobi, fere jo jokko na jokko edi.
41005039	Á kehm maade yel go ekp'kpa, song tong bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'limi ana? Jen ji wahnge ń kp'l'ling? Mmon noa ka kpo. Á kp'lale na.”
41005040	Bo kehm-e kehme elwolo. Á kehm nyame bo re, bo lohng elatahk. Owo á kehm lungu nde mmon, fere lung nnyehn mmon, a abat'toono ebe, ane ara ba toon-e no. Bo kehm yele ekp'kpa jio ji mmon noo noongo no.
41005041	Jisos song jabbe mmon noo go ebo, kehm bungu tong-e re, “Talita kumi,” ji lohngo re, “Mmon ewame, n tong-a re, wo mehl yiimi.”
41005042	Á kehm soro mehl tvtv, soro kehme eljene yannge. Ngare nyi nkpokosi nyio limi no, yebkang ewubu a nnya ebal. Kpo bo esi area.
41005043	Jisos kehm bungu t'tahne re, bo k'tong nnene. Á kehm soro bung re, “Kaan ye nsol alehke, á li!”
41006001	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ege ejahbe, a abat'toono ebe.
41006002	Efung Esabat á kehm song tib go ekp'kpa ero. Ane gbalee jolo o. Eji bo wuk-e no, kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Gan wo á bele nyaa? Á limi renan, kehm bele elkahne ana nia? Á kpo lim renan, kehm limi akpokosi nyaa!
41006003	Ye sang li ekapentaa, ji li mmon a Meria? Ye sang li mmonannyehn a Jems, Joses, Jud a Saimona? Abonanyehn ba nkal sang lene aa?” Ano wo wahnge bo kehm-e tene.
41006004	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nnyehnamahr Esowo, bo kpo kak-e edi ajehng ajehng, sehngem re nnahb enye, ejahbe eje, a etahk eje ji kil jo kak-e.”
41006005	Á maam lim nkpokosi anyehng anyehng o, sehngem re abon amohk ane ntiil ba jo yam ba á kunu bo ebo, bo nob.
41006006	Jisos, kpo-e esi area, eji ejahbe eje ki taame. Á kehm kehme elyannge go abon ajahbe ba jolo sennge ona, kehme bo tib.
41006007	Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv edi ajehng, kehm tumu bo ane abal abal. Á ka bo nsahm re bo kam ane abi atohko yehke.
41006008	Á bungu tong bo re, “Kana fili ejum ajehng ajehng, sehngem ntifilibo nyi nyi ḿ bahke fili. Kana fili nsol alehke! Kana fili abam! Kana kak akpohko go egahne abam!
41006009	Kaken akpaketa! Kana fili mbomo ebal ebal!”
41006010	Á kpe tong bo re, “Ń l'je, jolen a ane bao ba tong-n no re wahn kang go bo a ntahk. Kana yaange etahk jimongo tete ń tahm ejahbe jio.
41006011	Ń l'fere je ejahbe ji ane l'ki-n vvrv, k'fere wuung-n atung, lohngen ejahbe jio o, wahn kum akpade. Jia bahke jolo ana elliingi ka bo.”
41006012	Bo kehm lohngo song bung alum Esowo re, ane gbo ndon go bo abiafem.
41006013	Bo kame ane abi atohko yehke gbalee, fere jo taame aneb ayam akehng, bo jo nob.
41006014	Ntul a Herod kehm wuku bada nsol nyia kpee. Tibre elgahm ni Jisos ebyeere gbalee. Ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb ebnyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin. Owo wahng ka nne noo kpi elkohn nsahm ana nyio, fere kp'limi akpokosi.”
41006015	Ane bandiki jo fere bung re, “Elaija wo a.” Ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Nnyehnamahr wo, ana aj'jok anyehnamahr Esowo ba jolo go nk'kula ngare.”
41006016	Herod wuku kan a me, á kehm bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo, ye ji n kim-e esi. Yebkpe fere nyahme.”
41006017	Tibre nyanjehle Herod t'tum re bo bob Jon ba a ne, ba gba-e kak go ngbekobo. Herod limi jia tib go esi ji Herodias ji á taare Filip mmonannyehn.
41006018	Jon ji nwohngalahb jo tongo Herod re, “Nobem re wo baange nkal a mmonanne.”
41006019	Herodias kehm kehme elmarre a Jon. Á bele erakatahng re á bahk-e wulu. Á malem.
41006020	Tibre Herod jo fahle Jon, tib eji á jo kahn re, Jon jolo etingitingi nne Esowo. Herod jo sebe re á tahre elkpin ene. Jo kor-e re á jo wuungu atung go alum nya Jon, jol eji alum nyao jo gbiing-e gbiingi, fere ka-e at'tiiri go eltim.
41006021	Efung elbuumu bi bo jele Herod, Herodias kehm bele eyake. Tibre Herod tiingi atul elkak, fere tiingi atubesi nsoja, a anebkul nfam ba Galili.
41006022	Mmon a Herodias no nkal kehm lohngo ba yel, kehm kehme ese bahn. Kehm yebe ntul a Herod atahng, a ane ebe. Á kehm bahbe mmonse noo re, “Jen ji a kp'sebe re me n ka-a! M bahk-a kake ajehng ajehng ji a sebe no.”
41006023	Herod kehm nyame, fere t'tir re, “Ajehng ajehng ji a l'bahb-m, m bahk-a kake, jol afi ejang afang ejame ji, m bahk-a kak.”
41006024	Mmon noo kehm soro lohng tahm, song bahb nnyehn re, “Jen ji m bahk-e bahbe?” Nnyehn kehm faange re, “Esi ji Jon ji nwohngalahb.”
41006025	Mmon noo kehm feere elwaare elwaare, ba goji ntul, ba tong-e re, “N kp'sebe re, wo ka-m esi ji Jon go ekpingi.”
41006026	Jia limi ntul, á kehme elguunu. Á kpeem ma ten, tib eji á ma tohko nyam ano, fere tir go esamahr ane kpee.
41006027	Á kehm soro tum nlokeltum ewe na awohng re á song kim Jon esi ba a ji.
41006028	Nlokeltum noo kehm soro tahm, song rehng go ekp'kpa ngbekobo, song kim Jon esi, kak go ekpingi, ba ka mmon noo. Mmon noo kehm soro rod fvfo, song ka nnyehn.
41006029	Abat'toono Jon wuku kan a me, bo kehm song rod ekv eje, song kpa kak go ndi.
41006030	Abatiingetib Jisos kehm feere ba kpir-e, ba kehm-e nsol tong nyi bo ma lim kpee, fere t'tib.
41006031	Etahk ji Jisos jolo no, ane bako jo yele na, egom jehko jo lohng. Jisos, a abat'toono ebe belem ngare nyi nsol alehke. Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahr tahmen go edi ji li soom. Go wo ḿ bahke ma re ekv.”
41006032	Bo kehm yele go egbang tahm go edi ji li soom.
41006033	Ane gbalee nyehne bo eji bo tahme no, fere liingi bo. Owo ane kehm lohngo ajahbe nyao kpee, jo jen egbuk egbuk, gbo mbang song rehng edi jio, Bab Jisos kehm rehnge.
41006034	Jisos lohngo kan egbang, á kehm nyehne ellong ane gbalee. Ndon kehm-e fili. Tibre bo jolo ana ejoro bi ki kpi mb'baabe. Á kehm kehme bo nsol tib gbalee.
41006035	Eji atv yahke behde, abat'toono ebe kehm bake, ba bung tong-e re, “Tahm edi jia ana rehng go ajahbe, ekidi kp'labe, gana, atv yahke behde.
41006036	Tum bo, bo song go abon ajahbe ba li a kpidi kpidi, song gunu nsol alehke.”
41006037	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li!” Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “A kp'sebe re, wahr song gunu nsol go mpon atahl alon, ba le boa?”
41006038	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ebred ebbik ń kpi no? Song kpuren!” Eji bo ma song kpur, bo kehm bake, ba tong-e re, “Ebred eblon, kunu abon nsahre abal.”
41006039	Jisos kehm tongo ane bao re, bo ji ag'gabe ag'gabe go ajele nya kp'na kohdo.
41006040	Bo kehm jehke. Nlong nyindiki jo jolo ane atahl alon alon. Nlong nyindiki jo jolo ane atahl abal ane awubu, ane atahl abal ane awubu.
41006041	Jisos kehm rodo ebred eblon bio, a abon nsahre abal, seenge go elbung, kak Esowo saam, kehm bakke abred nyao, ka abat'toono ebe re bo ko song bak bo. Fvfo, á kehm kpe bakke abon nsahre bao na abal, bo tob song bak bo kpee.
41006042	Bo kpee li wohngo.
41006043	Abat'toono ebe kehm taare erik abred nyao, a nsahre, kak ajeere, ruru ewubu ejeere ebbal.
41006044	Aneblum ba li abred nyao jolo ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000). Anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem bo.
41006045	Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro tong abat'toono ebe re, bo yel egbang, gbo-e mbang, song egbuk jehko ji Betsaida, yefono ji, jo yaame ane.
41006046	Eji á ma tong ellong ane bao re bo song kehnge, á kehm tahme go ewong re á song kak ero.
41006047	Eji elgung ma ba, egbang bio jolo go nlum alahb. Jisos sa ntahngtahng go ewong.
41006048	Jisos kehm nyehne re, abat'toono ebe ebbel nfem go egbang, nyi jo lim bo re, bo k'ma kpe fing egbang. Tibre nfeb jo gbulu bo, feere njahm njahm. Eji ma rehng ejum nkaranka eni nyi efungfu, Jisos kehm kehme eljene go ero alahb asongo goji bo. Á jo jene, are á yahke sehng bo.
41006049	Bo kehm-e nyehne, á kp'jene go ero alahb. Bo tiri re, etohko ji. Bo kehm kehme elrabe.
41006050	Eji bo kpee nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elfahle. Jisos kehm soro tong bo re, “Me wo, kana kpe fahl! Boben eltim!”
41006051	Á kehm ba yel egbang. Nfeb kehm soro rahke. Abat'toono ebe kpo bo esi sehng.
41006052	Bo kahnem ana abred nyao lohngo no. Tibre jolo bo ekpehlekpehle.
41006053	Bo rehnge kan egbuk eto jehko, edi ndi ji bo jo lung re Genesaret, song kahn egbang ebo.
41006054	Bo lohngo kan a egbang me, ane kehm soro liingi Jisos.
41006055	Bo kehm tahme, yel nkpohko ejahbe anyehng anyehng, jo sol aneb ayam go ebkpa, ba edi ajehng ajehng ji bo l'wuk re Jisos ebrehng o.
41006056	Ajahbe nya nnen, a ajahbe nyi ki ga gbal, a abon ajahbe ba nse, ane gbalee jo ko aneb ayam ebo, je go are, fere gboongo Jisos re á lub taame, bo koor-e go ege as'sili nsubu. Ane kpee ba jo koor-e, jo l'lohko nob.
41007001	Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm bandiki kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba goji Jisos.
41007002	Bo nyehne re, abat'toono Jisos bandiki joom kpe ru abo go mbang nyi at'tibi ba atahm jo kono eltibi, kehm lehke nsol.
41007003	Farisis, a Jus kpee joom tiki li na li nsol, k'ru abo. Tibre bo jo toono eljini ni babnde ebo jo tib bo.
41007004	Bo l'je are feere, bo nehm tiki li nsol, bo tohko tiki bum elbo saang. Bo jo toono eljini nehko go fvfo, nio ni babnde jo tib bo, ana eljini ntuku aruku, a ni atu aruku, a ni nkpingi aruku.
41007005	Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm bao kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abat'toono eba kil jo toono eljini ni babnso ejahre tib-r no? Bo kpehme ru abo kehm lehke nsol!”
41007006	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Aisaya lohko nyehn amahr bada nahne! Lohko li ana á nyono no re, “ ‘Esowo re, Ane ebame kp-m kake go nnyo a nnyo, ntim ebo n wobem.
41007007	Bo kp-m kake mbol mbol, eji bo kp'tibi atahm nya ane baka baka jehke no, nya ki li nya Esowo.’ ”
41007008	“Wahn ebyake atahm nya Esowo, fere kp'toono eljini ni ane baka baka tibi no.”
41007009	Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Ebnob ka wahn, eji ḿ ma ten atahm nya Esowo, fere kp'limi eljini ni babnso ejahne.
41007010	Moses bungu re, ‘Kak nso, a nne! Nne awohng awohng no l'fere su nde, a nnyehn, bo bahk-e wulu.’
41007011	“Ń kpo tib re, ‘Nne l'bel ejum ji kehn á jol kake nde ebo, a nnyehn, á l'fere bung re, Ejum jia li re Korban (ji lohngo re, li ka Esowo),
41007012	á nehm kpe kak nde ebo, a nnyehn.’
41007013	Jia lohngo re, wahn ebten ellum ni Esowo, fere kp'tibi atahm nya babnso ejahne. Elkohn nsol ana nyia li gbalee, nyi ń kpo tob lim fvfo.”
41007014	Jisos kehm kpe lung ellong ane, kehm tongo bo re, “Wuungen atung, wahn ane kpee, wahn kahn!
41007015	Ejumjum limm, ji kpo yel nne go nnyo, kehm limi eltim ene sab. Ji kpo lohng nne go eltim, ji ji kpo lim eltim nne sab.
41007016	Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
41007017	Jisos lohngo kan go ellong ane bao o rehng go etahk, abat'toono ebe kehm-e bahbe bade elgan nio ni á tubu no.
41007018	Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn ebgboolo ana ane bako goa? Wahn lenngema? Ji kpo yel nne go nnyo sang kpo lim nne sab.
41007019	Tibre kpehme yel go ege eltim. Kpo yel go ala, fere lohng go ngubjing.” Jisos bungu jia re, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng nyi ane kpo li, n'nob re wahr li.
41007020	Á kehm kpe soro asi elbungu re, “Ji kpo lohng nne go ege atahng, ji ji kpo wahng ka nne k'jol saang.
41007021	Tibre go atahng ma nne, a eltim ene, owo ab'bi kpo lohng, ana ebi ntir atahng, as'sa, ejv avohko, ewulane, anebkal akono,
41007022	etong alahme, nkahng abare, ab'bi, enehm, atahm agboko, amahr abaare ejum nne, afahnge akiimi lake ane, elgeere, a elgboolo.
41007023	Ab'bi nyaa kpo lohng eltim nne. Nya nya kpo lim eltim nne sab.”
41007024	Jisos kehm tahme go ejahbe ajehng ji li kohlo Taya, song yel ekp'kpa ajehng. Tibre á joom seb re, nne awohng awohng kahn re, á li o. Á maam tiki biiri.
41007025	Nnenkal awohng no mmon ewe no nkal bele ebi etohko go ege atahng kehm wuku bada Jisos. Á kehm ba kpir-e, soro gbo tvtv, jamm-e alahng.
41007026	Mmonankal noo jolo nfono ejahbe no jo bung Grik. Á kehm gboongo Jisos re, á lub kam ebi etohko jio, yehke mmon ewe go eltim.
41007027	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nong, me n tohko gbo mbang le abon. Nobem re me n rod nsol alehke nyi abon, ka ebv.”
41007028	Nnenkal noo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo, fvfo, n kp'kahne re, akahb elang nya abon l'fooro gbo ndi, ebv bi kpo fohko li.”
41007029	Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Tib go ellum ni a faange no, a li ma song kehnge, tibre mmon ewa, ebi etohko m-e lohng go ege eltim.”
41007030	Nnyehn kehm feere je, lohko song nyehn mmon ewe nong go edilnong sange sange. Ebi etohko jio m-e lohko lohng.
41007031	Jisos kehm sehnge go Taya asongo, song rehng go Saidon, fere song rehng go Dekapolis, tete song rehng go eto ji Galili.
41007032	Ane kehm koko nlakatung nyi ki jo ma bung nob nob, ba a ne goji Jisos, fere gboongo Jisos re, á lub kun-e ebo.
41007033	Jisos kehm-e koko, lohng a ne go ellong ane bao, kehm-e lohko anyohkebo go atung, fere so atel wohngo go ebnyohkobo abehng, ko song behd-e go ebliki.
41007034	Jisos kehm kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, tub eromo, kehm bungu tong nne noo re, “Efata,” ji lohngo re, “Lennge!”
41007035	Tvtv o atung nne noo soro lennge, ebliki soro tahm. Á kehme elbungu nob nob.
41007036	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, bo k'tooro tong ane. Jol eji á rehke rehke bo o, ano wo fvfo bo tob tooro kpee.
41007037	Nne awohng awohng no wuku no, jo kpo-e esi area. Bo re, “Yeblim ejum ajehng ajehng ebnob go nseenga nseenge, ye jio ji kpo lim alakatung, bo wuk, fere lim akamme, bo bung.”
41008001	Gaam kang fvfo, ellong ane bako kehm kpe ba. Eji bo ki kpe bel ejum ellehke ajehng ajehng, Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe tv elne, kehm bungu tong bo re,
41008002	“Ndon ma-m fili sehng. Tibre ane baa ebkang nfung era a name. Ejumjum bo kpeem kpi ji ellehke.
41008003	Re me n tum bo ana, bo song kehnge, egom jindiki bahke kehme awo gbo mbang mbang, tib ane bandiki lohng nlaabambang ba.”
41008004	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e faange re, “Elka emahng nia, gan wo nne bahke tingi nsol alehke, kehm leke elkohn ane ana baa kpee?”
41008005	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ebred ebbik ń kpi no?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E kpi ebred ebsehma.”
41008006	Á kehm tongo ellong ane bao re, bo ji ndi. Á kehm rodo ebred ebsehma bio, kehm kake Esowo saam, kehm bakke ka abat'toono ebe re bo song bak. Abat'toono ebe lohko lim ano.
41008007	Bo bele abon nsahre abik abik o fvfo. Jisos kehm kake Esowo saam go nsol nyia, fere tong abat'toono ebe re bo tob song bak.
41008008	Nne awohng awohng l'li wohngo. Owo abat'toono ebe kehm taare erik ji sa no, ruru ejeere na ebsehma.
41008009	Bo jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000). Jisos kehm tongo ane bao re bo song kehnge.
41008010	Á kehm yele go egbang, a abat'toono ebe. Bo kehm tahme go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Dalmanuta.
41008011	Bab Farisi kehm ba kehme Jisos abahbe bahb go nfaabe re, bo nyehn nkpokosi nyi ejahbetul Esowo, eji bo l'gar-e.
41008012	Jisos kehm tubu eromo, kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahng ka ane ba li anv kp'sebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi? Ellingi anehng anehng nehm jol ka ane bao.”
41008013	Á kehm tahme bo sa, song yel go egbang, tahm egbuk eto jehko.
41008014	Abat'toono ebe y'yini abred go elkoko ba a nya. Sa mmobred awohng wo wo go egbang.
41008015	Jisos kehm kake bo erehke re, “Gberen elnahne go ayist nyao nya Farisis, a nya Herod.”
41008016	Abat'toono ebe kehm kehme elbungu atemtem. Bo bumu re, Jisos bungu alum nyaa, tib eji bo ki bel abred.
41008017	Jisos k'kahn re, lenngem bo re á bungu bade eltibi ni ane bao. Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kp'bungu bade abred nya ń ki kpi? Ń nehme nyehna? Ń nehme wuka? Anv, li-n ekpehlekpehla?
41008018	Ń kpi amahr, ń nehme nyehna? Ń kpi atung, ń nehme wuka? Ń nehme kpe buuma,
41008019	ana m bakke ebred eblon, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awuba (5,000)? Ejeere ebbik ń ko ar'rohko kak tahm a nya?” Bo kehm faange re, “Ewubu ejeere ebbal.”
41008020	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Nyanjehle, eji m bakke ebred na ebsehma, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000), ejeere ebbik ń ko ar'rohko kak tahm a nya?” Bo faange re, “Ejeere ebsehma.”
41008021	Jisos kehm kpe bahb bo re, “Wahn ka tiki lennga?”
41008022	Jisos, a abat'toono ebe je go Betsaida. Ane bako kehm koko nwakamahr je goji Jisos, song gboong-e re, á lub koor-e.
41008023	Jisos kehm jabbe nwakamahr nyio go ebo, lohng a ne tahm go esi mbang. Á so atel, kak nne noo go amahr, kehm-e kooro abo go amahr, kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a bahke ma nyehn ejuma?”
41008024	Nne noo kehm lennge amahr enye, kehm bungu re, “N kp'nyehne ane. Bo li na li, are nti nyi kp'jene yannge.”
41008025	Jisos kehm-e kpe kooro abo go amahr. Ngare nyio nne noo kehm gohro lennge amahr enye, amahr enye kehm feere ana wuku wuku. Á kehm nyehne ejum ajehng ajehng saang.
41008026	Jisos kehm-e tumu re, á song kehnge, fere tong-e re, á k'sehng mbang ejahbe jio ji bo kp'na lohngo abake.
41008027	Jisos kehm tahme, a abat'toono ebe song rehng go abon ajahbe ba bo jo lung re Sisaria Filipi. Eji bo kp'jene go mbang, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Tong-m wahn, ane kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
41008028	Bo kehm faange re, “Egom jindiki kpo bung re, Wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Egom jindiki re, Wo Elaija wo. Egom jindiki re, Wo nnyehnamahr Esowo wo.”
41008029	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Wahn fvfo mee? Wahn kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?” Pita kehm-e faange re, “Wo Kraist wo!”
41008030	Jisos kehm rehke bo re, bo k'tong nnene ejum ajehng ajehng bada ne.
41008031	Jisos kehm kehme abat'toono ebe tib re, “Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem gbalee. Anebkul nfam, a atubesi abalimajom, go at'tibi ba atahm bahk-e tene, fere wul-e. L'kang nfung era á nyahme, fere jol go elkpin.”
41008032	Jisos jo bungu alum nyao gbul gbul gbuul. Pita kehm-e koko, tahm a ne go nkpohko, kehm-e kehme elrehke.
41008033	Jisos kehm keebe, seenge abat'toono ebe, kehm nyame Pita re, “Nnehm, fak-m go esamahr! Ntir enya nyi nne nyi, nyi Esowo sang.”
41008034	Jisos kehm lungu ellong ane tv elne, fere tob lung abat'toono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'tong re, á kp-m toono, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje, tahm toon-m.
41008035	Nne no l'tong re, á bahke tahre elkpin ene go njini nyia, á bahke fere tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no l'fere tane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, a esi ji alum Esowo, á bahke bele na etingitingi elkpin.
41008036	“Li re nne bahke bele afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane etohko eje, nsehng anyi á bahke lehke?
41008037	Ejumjum limm, ji nne bahke kake, kehm fake etohko eje.
41008038	Nne no l'daang-m tib go egame alum go eb'bi njini nyia nyi ma ten Esowo, Mmon no nne bahke tob daang-e, á l'ba go ellub ni nde, a abarebare enjel.”
41009001	Jisos kehm soro asi elbungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom jindiki ji yim a, nehm tiki kpo, tete bo nyehn etul bi Esowo ma badde ba go njini nyia a nsahm a nsahm.”
41009002	Kange kan nfung erakera, Jisos kehm yehke Pita, Jems, a Jon tahm a bo go ewong ji wahre wahre. Jisos kehm yaange ngubjing enye o.
41009003	Nsol nyi á kake no kehm bare kparaang, fere jo y'ya. Nnene limm go njini nyia, no bahke ma baare elkohn ana nio.
41009004	Elaija abola Moses kehm lohngo ba bung a Jisos.
41009005	Pita kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Nsoo, n'nob re wahr jol a. E bahke sehke nkpatahk na era, ebkpatahk behko b'ba, behko bi Elaija, behko bi Moses.”
41009006	Pita kahnem ana ji á bahke bungu, tibre bo jo f'fahl.
41009007	Ekparesemsem kehm soro tahl ba bulu bo. Bo kehm wuku ellum go ekparesemsem re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m s'sehng. Wuken ye!”
41009008	Abat'toono ebe kehm soro kehme eljange. Bo kpeem nyehn nnene, sehngem Jisos ntahngtahng wo bo nyehn-e no.
41009009	Eji bo jo badde abake go nnahb ewong, Jisos kehm rehke bo re, “Kana tiki tong nnene ji ń nyehne no, tete Mmon no nne nyahme go elkv.”
41009010	Bo lohko bum erehke jio ji á kake bo. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Elnyahme ngubjing go elkv nia lohngo renan?”
41009011	Bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahng ka at'tibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba?”
41009012	Á kehm faange bo re, “Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba, ba tuungu nsol kpee bum. Nwer Esowo bungu renan bada Mmon no nne? Bungu re, Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem, bo bahk-e tene.
41009013	N kp-n tongo re, Elaija eblohko ba. Bo lim-e ana ji koro bo, jang jang ana nwer Esowo bungu no.”
41009014	Bo feere kan ana, bo kehm ba kpiri abat'toono baka gana, fere nyehn ellong ane tvv ma sennge bo kak. At'tibi ba atahm bandiki jo limi nfaabe a abat'toono Jisos.
41009015	Ane bao nyehne kan Jisos ana, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm soro be tvtv song wan-e, kak-e nnyo.
41009016	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'l'lim nfaabe?”
41009017	Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm faange re, “Nsoo, n ko mmon ewame ba a ne. Tibre á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng. Á nehme ma bung.
41009018	Edi ajehng ajehng ji ebi etohko jio l'si mehl-e mehl, kpo rod-e tub ndi, nfahl jo tub-e na tub go nnyo. Á kpo kono amahn go esi, fere tahne na tahne. Me n gboongo abat'toono eba re, bo kam-e ebi etohko jio jehke. Bo maam lim.”
41009019	Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpi ek'taame go egahna ntim? M bahke kange renan a nahne? Ko mmon noo, ba a ne!”
41009020	Bo ko-e kan a, ba a ne, ebi etohko jio nyehne kan Jisos a, á kehm limi mmon noo, á gbo ngboko, fere gbo ndi, kehm kehme elgbehde. Nfahl jo tub-e go nnyo.
41009021	Jisos kehm bahbe nde re, “Ebkang renan eji eyam bia bom-e no?” Á kehm-e faange re, “Bomo ngare nyi á jolo mmonse ntiil, tete rehng anv.
41009022	Nkpel tvv ebi etohko jio kpo gare re á wul-e. Nkpel nyindiki tub-e kak agun. Nkpel nyindiki tub-e kak alahb. Nong, wahr fil-a ndon, wo kak-r ebo, tohk-a jahk!”
41009023	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wobbung re, ‘Tohk-m jahk.’ Nne no l'taame, ejumjum limm, ji bahk-e riidi.”
41009024	Nde kehm soro rabe tvtv re, “Me n taame, kak-m ebo go egame ek'taame.”
41009025	Eji Jisos nyehne re, ellong ane bao kp'kame ba rur, á kehm nyame ebi etohko jio, fere tong-e re, “Etohko ji kpo lim nne gbo ekamme, fere lak atung, ka kpe tiki yel mmon noa!”
41009026	Tvtv o ebi etohko jio kehm biingi tiim, kehm soro yehke mmon noo, á gbo ngboko ekidi l'lab. Ebi etohko jio kehm soro lohng-e. Mmon noo kehm sake noongo, are nkvne nyi. Owo ane bandiki kehm kehme elbungu re, “Yebkpo.”
41009027	Jisos kehm jabbe mmon noo go ebo, tab-e yiimi, mmon noo lohko yiimi.
41009028	Jisos yele kan ekp'kpa me, abat'toono ebe kehm bake, ba bahb-e eji bo jolo ebo ebo re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr ki ma kam mmon noo ebi etohko jio yehke?”
41009029	Jisos kehm faange re, “Elkohn etohko ana jio, ń nehm ma tiki kam yehke, tohko tiki jol re, ero akake bi.”
41009030	Bo kehm tahme ejahbe jio asongo go Galili. Jisos joom seb re nne awohng awohng kahn edi ji á li no.
41009031	Tibre á jo tibi abat'toono ebe re, “Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e rodo, kak abi ane go ebo, bo bahk-e wulu. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme, jol go elkpin.”
41009032	Bo kahnem ji á jo b'bung. Bo jo f'fahl a ye bahb.
41009033	Eji bo song rehng go Kapenium, bo kehm yele go ekp'kpa. Jisos kehm bahbe abat'toono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń jo lim nfaabe mbang mbang?”
41009034	Jol bo we faangem. Tibre bo jo limi nfaabe mbang mbang bada nne no li nj'joka nne go bo ellong.
41009035	Jisos kehm jehke, kehm lungu abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv elne, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nne no l'tong re, ye wo li ntubesi, á bahke fere jol nkahlanjahm, fere jol nlokeltum no bahke jo loko ane kpee.”
41009036	Á kehm koko mmonse ba yiimi go bo a mbuksong, kehm-e kpaake ebo, kehm bungu tong bo re,
41009037	“Nne no l'ko mmonse ana noa a go egama mbing, á ma-m tob ko. Nne no l'ko-m, á tob ko Nsoo no tum-m no.”
41009038	Jon kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Wahr ebnyehn nne no kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go ega a mbing. Go egahre ellong á wobem. E sahd-e sahde re á rahke, tibre á wobem go egahre ellong.”
41009039	Jisos kehm faange re, “Kana ye sahde re á rahke. Tibre nnene limm, no bahke limi nkpokosi go egama mbing, kehm fere jo bung ab'bi bada name.
41009040	Etingitingi, nne no tohk-r ko ekv, ye nne ewahre wo.
41009041	Nne no l'ka-n mmobtuku alahb tib eji ń li abat'toono ba Kraist, á bahke bele eltuuru go etingitingi.”
41009042	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ga nob re, bo kahn nne eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse no ma taame tv-m, á gbo yel abiafem.
41009043	“Ebo eba l'kehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, kim ebo bio tub go. Ga nob re wo bel ebo abehng, kpo, yel ejahbetul Esowo, sehnge re wo bel abo abal abal, kpo, je ellulagun ni l'k'tiki lahme go njinanjini.
41009044	Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane l'k'tiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
41009045	“Ekpade eja l'kehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, kim ekpade jio tub go. Ga nob re wo jen ekpade ajehng, kpo, yel ejahbetul Esowo, sehnge re wo jen akpade abal abal, kpo, je go ellulagun.
41009046	Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane l'k'tiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
41009047	“Elmahr ena l'kehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, luudu elmahr nio tub go. Ga nob re wo bel elmahr anehng, kpo, yel ejahbetul Esowo, sehnge re wo bel amahr abal abal, kpo, je go ellulagun.
41009048	Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane l'k'tiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
41009049	“Nne awohng awohng, Esowo bahk-e doobo go agun.
41009050	“Akang kp'nobo. Elyebe akang l'lohng, a bahke limi renan, kehm kpe yebe? Belen akang go egahne atahng. Jolen go elkoono atemtem!”
41010001	Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, siiri aya ma bo kpo lung re Jodan, rehng go egbuk jehko ji Judea. Fvfo, ellong ane kehm kpe ba rur. Á kehm kpe tib bo ana á kpo kono eltibi.
41010002	Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bake re bo ba gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-r, ntahm enyahre b'bung re, nne li ma ten nkal ewe no jehk-e go etahka?”
41010003	Jisos kehm faange a mbahbe re, “Atahm anya Moses tib-n no?”
41010004	Bo faange re, “Moses tib-r re, nne yeele nwer, ka nkal ewe, kehm-e yehke elbal.”
41010005	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Moses nyono nsol nyia tib go egahne etahnsi.
41010006	Go mbomannahb eji Esowo limi njini, ‘Á limi nnenlum, a nnenkal.
41010007	Jia ji bahke wahng ka nne bahke tahme nde, a nnyehn sa, bo song jol abola nkal ewe,
41010008	bo fere jol ana ngubjing anyehng.’ Bo nehm kpe jol ane abal. Bo bahke fere jol ana nne awohng.
41010009	Ji Esowo ma kono edi ajehng, nne k'yaame.”
41010010	Bo feere kan a song rehng go bo etahk, abat'toono ebe kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ellum ni a kp'na bungu lohngo renan?”
41010011	Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'ten nkal ewe, fere song baange nondiki, yeblim abiafem nyao nya erehbe go esamahr bi Esowo tob nkal no á gbo mbang baang-e.
41010012	Ano wo fvfo tob li ka nnenkal no l'be nlum ewe sa, fere song bal nlum nondiki. Yebtob lim abiafem nya erehbe go esamahr bi Esowo.”
41010013	Ane bako ko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kooro bo abo. Abat'toono ebe jo sebe re bo sahde ane bao.
41010014	Jisos wuku kan a me, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Yaken abons'sohko abonse ba ga egame! Kana kpe sahde bo! Tibre elkohn ane ana abonse baa, bo ba etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
41010015	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no tohko taame, woomo go elwo ni Esowo ana mmonse kpo woomo go elwo ni nde, etul bi Esowo á nehm li.”
41010016	Á kehm koko abonse bao, kpaake bo abo, kehm kunu bo abo, jo fuulu bo.
41010017	Eji Jisos ma tahm eljen ene, á kehm nyehne nne ma be, ba jamm-e alahng, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnooba nt'tibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
41010018	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahng ka, a kehm-m lungu re nnooba nt'tibi? Nnene limm, no li nnooba nne, sehngem Esowo ntahngtahng bi li nnooba nne.
41010019	A kp'kahne atahm nya bungu re, ‘Ka wul nne! Ka kak afem nya erehbe! Ka v ejv! Ka yiimi ntianse efahnge! Ka nehm nne! Kak nso, a nne!’ ”
41010020	Nne noo kehm bungu re, “Nt'tibi, jol bomo ngare nyi n jolo ntiil tete ba rehng anv, nyaa kpee n kpo b'bum.”
41010021	Go elkoro wo Jisos kpiidi amahr enye seeng-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Ejum ajehng ji ma-a sa. Song, wo song gungu nsol afang enya, ko ba ka akpak! Owo a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo ba, ba toon-m.”
41010022	Nne noa wuku kan ano, esamahr kehm-e gbodo. Á kehm soro tahm eje ndon ndon. Tibre á fange sehng.
41010023	Jisos kehm keebe, tong abat'toono ebe re, “Bahke riidi, afang ane kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo.”
41010024	Abat'toono ebe, alum nyao gbale bo go eltim sehng. Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Ate ebame, bahke riidi area, nne kehm yele ejahbetul Esowo.
41010025	Re efange nne kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
41010026	Kpo na kpo abat'toono ebe esi tete ga. Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo, nne awo bahke bele eltahre me l'lun?”
41010027	Jisos kehm keebe, seenge bo, kehm bungu re, “Ji nne l'k'ma lim, goji Esowo riidem. Ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo riidi Esowo.”
41010028	Pita kehm bungu re, “Wahr jia, eji e li a, wahr ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kpi wo toono.”
41010029	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no l'yake etahk eje, fere yake abonanyehn, nnyehn, nde, abon ebe, egbe eje, tib go egame esi, a esi ji alum Esowo,
41010030	á bahke bele na budu. Á bahke bele na ntahk budu nkpel atahl alon, bel abonanyehn, babnnyehn, abon, a ebgbe. Fvfo, ebnohko bia. Go ngare es'song, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
41010031	Ane gbalee ba li agbokombang bahke fere jol akahlenjahm. Fvfo, ane gbalee ba li akahlenjahm bahke fere jol agbokombang.”
41010032	Eji bo jo tahm go Jerusalem, Jisos gbo abat'toono ebe mbang. Ala jo teele bo sehng. Ane bako ba jo toono bo go njahm jo f'fahl. Jisos kehm kpe yehke abat'toono ebe, kehm kpe tong bo nsol nyi bahk-e limi.
41010033	Á bungu re, “Nyehnen, anv, e kp'tahme go Jerusalem. Owo Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e rodo, kak atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm go abo. Bo bahke kimi elam ji bo bahk-e wulu, fere rod-e, kak ane bako ba ki li Jus go abo.
41010034	Bo bahk-e nyoko, fere jo so atel wohng-e, dv-e tete bo wul-e. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin.”
41010035	Abon Sibidi, Jems abola Jon kehm bake goji Jisos, ba tong-e re, “Nt'tibi, ejum jia, ji e kp'sebe re, wo lim ka-r.”
41010036	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kp'sebe re me n lim ka-n?”
41010037	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ngare nyi a ma ji go ega eti etul, e kp'sebe re wahr tob ji a na o, noko go ega ejang eboblum, noko go ega ejang ebobkal.”
41010038	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń nehme kahn ji ń kp'b'bahb. Ḿ bahke ma nyehn erem bi me m bahke nyehna? Ḿ bahke ma bel ewohngalahb ji m bahke bela?”
41010039	Bo kehm faange re, “Ee, e bahke ma bel.” Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahke tob nyehn erem bi m bahke nyehne, fere bel ewohngalahb ji m bahke bele.
41010040	Nsahm me n kpimm, nyi m bahke yehke ane re, noko ji go egame ejang eboblum, noko ji egame ejang ebobkal. Esowo bi bi bahke kake ane bao adi nya á ma toobo re á ka bo.”
41010041	Erik abat'toono baka gana, ane awubu, wuku kan a bade Jems, a Jon, eltim kehm kehme bo rak tob bo.
41010042	Jisos kehm lungu bo kpee, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kp'kahne re, ane ba bo yehke bo re bo jol atul, bo kpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane ebo t'tahne. Aj'jok ane, bo ba kpo fili bo t'tahne.
41010043	Wahn, kana jo lim ano! Nne awohng awohng ewahne no l'seb re á jol nj'joka nne, á bahke fere jol nlokeltum ka wahn ane kpee.
41010044	Nne awohng awohng ewahne no l'fere seb re á jol ntubesi, á bahke fere jol nju ka wahn ane kpee.
41010045	Tibre Mmon no nne baam re bo jo lok-e, á ba re á ba loko na, fere ka elkpin ene, tahre ane gbalee yake.”
41010046	Bo kehm bake go Jeriko. Eji Jisos lohngo no, a abat'toono ebe, a ellong ane ba jo toon-e, nwakamahr a nne no bo jo lung-e re Batimos ji mmon a Timeus ji nkpe a mbang ona, jo gboongo ane nsol.
41010047	Á wuku kan a re Jisos ji Nasaret wo, á kehm kehme elrabe re, “Jisos ji mmon a Devid, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
41010048	Ane gbalee kehm-e kehme elnyame re, á rahke ewok. Jol á jo kpe rabe na wahre wahre re, “Mmon a Devid, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
41010049	Jisos kehm yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Lungen ye tv-m!” Bo kehm lungu nwakamahr nyio re á ba. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Bob eltim, wo tahm ba, á kp-a lungu.”
41010050	Á kehm tahnge mbomo eme tub, mehl karab yiimi, kehm jeke goji Jisos.
41010051	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “A kp'sebe re me n lim jen ka-a?” Nwakamahr nyio kehm bungu re, “Nt'tibi, n kp'sebe re me n lub nyehn!”
41010052	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, eltaame ena ni ma wahng ka, a ma nyehn.” Tvtv o á kehm soro nyehn, tahm toono Jisos mbang mbang asongo.
41011001	Eji bo ma jen kabbe go Jerusalem, a abon ajahbe ba li sennge o kak, ana Betfage abola Betani ba li kohlo ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, Jisos kehm yehke abat'toono ebe na abal, tum re bo song.
41011002	Á tongo bo re, “Songen ejahbe jio o ji li egahna mbuksong. Ń l'si r'rehng o, ḿ bahke nyehne mmombvankang no bo kal-e k'kuumu. Fanngen ye, wahn ko-e ba!
41011003	Nne awohng awohng l'fere bahb-n re, ‘Ń kpi jen lim a ne?’ tongen ye re, ‘Ntul wo kp-e sebe.’ Nfona mbvankang bahk-e yake elwaare ka-n.”
41011004	Bo kehm jeke, lohko song nyehn mmombvankang nonehm o, bo m-e kahn kohlo go mbutahk. Eji bo jo fannge,
41011005	ane ba yiimi o kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kp'limi o? Jen ji wahnge ń kp'fannge mmombvankang noo?”
41011006	Bo kehm faange bo ana Jisos tongo bo. Bo yake bo, bo tahm a ne.
41011007	Bo kehm koko mmombvankang noo ba a ne goji Jisos. Bo kehm rodo abomo ebo, yal mmombvankang noo go njahm. Jisos kehm kuumu.
41011008	Ane gbalee jo yale abomo ebo go mbang. Egom jindiki jo ja amang go emahng, jo ba yal go mbang.
41011009	Ane bandiki gbo-e mbang, bandiki kahle njahm. Bo kpee kehm kehme elrabe re, “Tehken Esowo!” “Elfuulu jol ka nne no ma ba go mbing nyi Ntul!”
41011010	“Elfuulu jol ka etul bi Devid nso ejahre bi kp'bake!” “Ellub jol ka Esowo bi li go ero!”
41011011	Jisos kehm rehnge go Jerusalem, sehng song yange go etahk Esowo, kehm kehme elkpuru ejum ajehng ajehng ji jolo go etahk Esowo jio. Eji atv yahke behde, Jisos kehm tahme asongo go Betani, a abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
41011012	Etoono efung behko eji bo tahme go Betani, jo jen asongo, Jisos, njal kehm-e yame.
41011013	Á kehm nyehne eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go fee ma tahb na tahb, jolo anyane anyane. Á kehm jeere, song rehng go nnahb re, fundiki á bahke tingi nkab anyehng. Eji á jeere no kohlo re á kpur me, jol kabem. Tibre ngare ka rehng nyi kpo kab.
41011014	Jisos kehm tongo eti jio re, “Nnene limm, no bahke kpe li nkab anyehng anyehng enya go etingitingi.” Abat'toono ebe t'tob wuk.
41011015	Eji bo rehnge go Jerusalem, Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, kehm song kam ane bao ba jo gungu, fere g'gunu. Á kehm gbulu akp'kuru nya ane ba jo yaange akpohko tub, fere gbul nti nyi ane ba jo gungu mbehl tub.
41011016	Á kpeem tiki taame re, nne awohng awohng jo sol ejum ajehng ajehng, sehng a ji etahk Esowo jio.
41011017	Á kehm tibi ane bao re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, Esowo re, ‘Etahk ejame, bo bahke jo lung re etahk ero akake ji li ka ane kpee.’ Wahn ebfere rod, bum ana ebehre awajv.”
41011018	Atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm wuku kan jia, bo kehm kehme mbang seb nyi bo bahke Jisos wul. Bo jo fahl-e fahl, tibre ellong ane bao kpo bo esi area tib go ege eltibi.
41011019	Elgung ba kan a, Jisos, a abat'toono ebe kehm tahme ejahbe jio asongo.
41011020	Etoono efung behko eji bo jo jen mbang mbang asongo, bo kehm nyehne eti jio ji ki kab akab ma kpo kpee tete rehng go alohk.
41011021	Pita kehm buumu ji ma lim, kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, nyehn! Eti ji nyaane a bungu no re bahke kpoko, eblohko kpo.”
41011022	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Taamen tv Esowo!
41011023	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne l'taame tv Esowo, á li ma tong re, ‘Ewong mehl, song yiimi go aya!’ Ewong jio lohko mehl. Á tohko bel nfaabe go ege eltim, á l'fere taame re, ji á bahbe no bahke lohko lim, ji ji Esowo bahke tiki lim ka-e.
41011024	Owo wahng ka n kp-n tongo re, Ń l'kak ero, bahb ejum ajehng ajehng, taamen re wahn eblohko bel, ji ji ḿ bahke bele.
41011025	“Ń l'kehme ero kak, jo tahmen ka ate ebahne go ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń kpi no bada bo, goji Nso ejahne no li go ero l'tob tahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.
41011026	Ń tohko jo tahm ka nne, Nso ejahne no li go ero nehm tob tahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
41011027	Bo kehm kpe feere go Jerusalem. Eji Jisos jolo go etahk Esowo, atubesi abalimajom, at'tibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kehm bake goji Jisos,
41011028	kehm ba bahb-e re, “Nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi a kpo lim elkohn nsol ana nyia?”
41011029	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me fvfo, m bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe anyehng. Ń l'faang-m, m bahk-n tongo nsahm ana nyi n kpi no, nyi n kpo lim nsol nyia.
41011030	Tong-m wahn, ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng goji Esowoa, afi lohng goji ane?”
41011031	Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim atemtem re, “E bahke bungu renan? E l'tong re ‘Ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng goji Esowo’, á bahk-r bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahng ka ń ki taame tv alum nya Jon?’
41011032	E l'fere bung re, ‘Lohng goji nne’, ma ane bahk-r limi ejum nji?” Bo jo fahle ane, tibre nne awohng awohng jo sahb k'kahn re, Jon jolo etingitingi nnyehnamahr Esowo.
41011033	Owo wahnge bo kehm faange Jisos re, “E nehme kahn.” Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “L'lun, wahn n nehm tob tong nsahm nyi wahng ka n kpo lim nsol nyia.”
41012001	Jisos kehm kehme elbungu a bo go ngaane re, “Nne jolo go, no bahme avain, fere kak ega sennge. Á kehm rahme elbing ni bo jo kak akab nti, fere jo kaame akab nti nyao tv elbing nio, alahb jo lohng. Á si enyong, kak ane ba jo baabe edi jio, kehm yaame abahmgbe edi jio, toono eje tahm ejahbe jehko ji li fee.
41012002	Ngare rehnge kan a, nyi bo kpo bong akab nti nyao. Nfono etahngga kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe awohng tv re á song ko akab nti enye goji ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje.
41012003	Bo kehm-e tubu ejahm, dv-e t'tahne, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
41012004	Á kehm kpe tum nlokeltum noko. Bo kehm-e kpe dv, bom-e elok go esi, fere son-e.
41012005	Á kehm kpe tum nne noko. Ye, bo wul-e na. Ano wo tob lim egom jindiki ji á kpe tum. Bandiki bo dv bo. Bandiki bo wul na.
41012006	“Awohng no gohr-e sa, ekorokoro mmon ewe wo. Es'kohro, á kehm-e gohro tum tv bo. Á tiri re, ‘Mmon ewame bahke lubu bo.’
41012007	“Abayaame etahngga bao kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, ‘A wo li nne no bahke lehke elkv ene. Baan, wahr wulen ye, eji etahngga jia l'fere jol j'jahre.’
41012008	Bo kehm-e jabbe, wul-e, fere rod-e tub go nkpe etahngga.
41012009	“Jen ji nfono etahngga noo bahke limi? Á bahke wulu abayaame etahngga bao, fere faake etahngga jio ka ane bandiki.
41012010	Wahn ka lung a lung edi nwer Esowo jiaa, ji bungu re, “ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no, ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahma?
41012011	Ntul Esowo limi jia ji li nkpokosi go egahra ntim.’ ”
41012012	Atubesi Jus kehm jo seb re bo bob Jisos. Bo jo kahne re, elgan nio á tubu bada bo. Bo jo f'fahl ellong ane ba jolo o. Bo kehm-e tahme sa, tahm ebo.
41012013	Bo kehm tumu egom Farisi jindiki, fere tob tum egom ane ba Herod tv Jisos re bo song bob-e go ege alum nnyo.
41012014	Eji bo je no, bo kehm bungu tong-e re, “Nt'tibi, e kp'kahne re, wo etingi nne ji. E kp'kahne re, wo kpehme rang ane. Nne awohng awohng li jang jang go ega esamahr. Á kpo lohko tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi. N'nob re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi nobem? Wahr jo tahba, afi wahr k'jo tahb?”
41012015	Jisos k'kahn awak ebo, kehm fere tong bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp-m gare? Ka-m wahn nsiring, me n tohko nyehn!”
41012016	Bo kehm koko nsiring ba ka-e. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?” Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Esi jia ji ntul ji. Mbing nyia nyi ntul nyi.”
41012017	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ka-n ntul ji li ka ntul, wahn ka Esowo ji li ka Esowo!” Jisos, kehm kpoko bo esi.
41012018	Egom Sadusi jindiki kehm bake goji Jisos. Bo jo kono eltibi re, “Elnyahme ngubjing go elkv limm.” Bo kehm bungu re,
41012019	“Nt'tibi, ntahm nyi Moses nyono ka-r li re, ‘Nne l'kpo, nkal ewe sa, eji á ki jel mmon awohng awohng, mmonannyehn nne no ma kpo wo bahke baange nnenkal noo, eji á l'jel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
41012020	Jolo abonanyehn nne na asehma. Ngbokambang baange nkal. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, kehm kpoko.
41012021	Etoono kpe baange nnenkal nonehm o. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á tob kpo. Ano wo tob jol a mmonannyehn noko no toon-e no.
41012022	Erik abonanyehn bako ba sa njahm tob baange nnenkal nonehm o. Mmon awohng awohng bo tikem jel. Bo kpo kpee. Es'kohro, nnenkal noo gohro kpo.
41012023	Go es'kohro efung, ane l'fere nyahme go elkv, nne awo bahke jolo nlum a nnenkal noo? Kpee abonanyehn bao na asehma ko nnenkal noo ana nkal abo.”
41012024	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn ebsoodo. Ń kp'kahne ji wahng kaa? Tibre ń nehme kahn nwer Esowo, ń nehme kahn nsahm nyi Esowo.
41012025	Go efung elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ane bahke fere jol ana babenjel go ejahbetul Esowo. Aneblum nehm kpe ko akal. Anebkal nehm kpe bal alum.
41012026	Bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ń ka lung a lung go nwer nyi Moses bade eti ji jo lula? Owo bo nyono re, ‘Esowo bungu tong Moses re, Me wo li Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’
41012027	Jia lohngo re, Ye wo li Esowo bi ane ba li go elkpin, bi akvne sang. Wahn ebsoodo tete.”
41012028	Nt'tibi no atahm awohng jolo o, no jo wuk ana bo jo bung. Á nyehne re, Jisos ebfaange Bab Sadusi nnooba nfaange. Á kehm lohngo ba, ba bahb Jisos re, “Ntahm anyi li li ngbokambang a ntahm nyi gbale sehnge atahm kpee?”
41012029	Jisos kehm faange re, “A wo li ngbokambang a ntahm, ‘Wuken abon Israel! Esowo Ntul ewahre, ye wo li Esowo ntahngtahng.
41012030	Nobo re Esowo Ntul ewa jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, a etohko etohko eja, a ntir ntir enya, a eko eko eja.’
41012031	Etoono ntahm nyehka li re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.’ Ntahm anyehng anyehng go kpeem li, nyi li etahntahn ntahm sehnge nyia na ebal.”
41012032	Nt'tibi no atahm noo kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, woblohko bung go etingitingi. Etingitingi, lohko li Esowo na abehng. Esowo abehng abehng kpeem li, sehngem ye ntahngtahng wo li no.
41012033	Ano wo nobo re Esowo jo kor nne eltim eltim ene, a ntir ntir enye, a eko eko eje. Nne ebjing ewe jo kor-e ana ebjing ebe. Elbumu ni nne bahke jo bum ntahm nyia na ebal, ni ni ga nob sehnge enyam kpee bi á kpo ko, jahm fi ka Esowo, a nsol nyehko nyi á kpo ko lim njom ka Esowo.”
41012034	Eji Jisos kahne re, yebfaange nnooba nfaange, á kehm-e tongo re, “Ebsa ntiil, a li etul bi Esowo.” Nnene kpeem sahb, bahb Jisos mbahbe anyehng anyehng.
41012035	Eji Jisos jo tib go etahk Esowo, á kehm bahbe mbahbe anyehng re, “Jen ji wahnge at'tibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Mesaya bahke lohngo go et'tohngo ji Devid?
41012036	Yefono Devid nyono ana Etingi Etohko tong-e no re, “ ‘Esowo bungu tong ntul ewame re, Ji go egame eboblum, tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
41012037	Yefono Devid jo lung-e re, ‘Ntul ewame’. Bahke jolo renan, ntul noo kehm fere jol mmon ewe?” Ellong ane bao wuku alum nyao go eyebatahng.
41012038	Jisos kehm kpe tib ane re, “Gberen at'tibi ba atahm! Kpo kor bo re bo jo kak akpawobo, jo yannge. Go are, bo kpo seb re, ane jo gong, kak bo nnyo.
41012039	Go ero, bo kpo ji go mbuksong. Go elkak, bo kpo ji adi nji nya fuumu re aj'jok ane ji.
41012040	Bo kpo nehm akalebun, taare ntahk ebo. Bo kpo kak alaabe aro go nnyo a nnyo, go ntim kpehme rehng. Elam ji bo bahke bibi sehng.”
41012041	Eji Jisos ji ona ekp'kpa Esowo kohlo edi ji bo kpo ka ayare, á jo nyehne ana bo kpi ayare ka. Afang ane tvv jo ba yaange na yaange akpohko ka.
41012042	Nkpak a nkalebun kehm bake, ba tub ederi ebbal kak, bi limi mpene anyehng.
41012043	Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nkalebun noa ana, ye wo ga ka sehnge ane bao kpee.
41012044	Egom jehko jo ka gbalee, jo sa bo gbalee go. Ye ji li nkpak, á ka kpee ji á bele no, ji kehn á jol ma ko, gunu nsol alehke.”
41013001	Jisos lohngo kan a ekp'kpa Esowo me, nt'toono ewe na awohng kehme tongo re, “Nt'tibi, nyehn elkohn anoobo ntahk nya li gae! Nyehn agburu atal nya bo ko sie!”
41013002	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wobnyehn aj'jok ntahk nyaa? Jol eltal anehng anehng limm, ni bahke kpe kuumu a ntem. Bo bahke wake kpee, wohng ndi.”
41013003	Eji Jisos ji go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, etahk Esowo jolo go ege a mbuksong kpidi kpidi, Pita, Jems, Jon, a Andru, bo jo jolo a ne o kehm-e bahbe re,
41013004	“Tong-r ngare nyi afemfem nyaa bahke limi. Tib-r elliingi ni bahke jolo, nsol nyio kpee kehm limi.”
41013005	Jisos kehm kehme eltibi bo re, “Kunen ekpu, eji nne awohng awohng l'ki-n nehm.
41013006	Ane tvv bahke bake go egama mbing re, bo ba li nt'tahre. Bo bahke nehme ane tvv.
41013007	“Ń l'wuk bade ebta bi li kpidi kpidi, fere wuk aka nta fee, kana jo fahl mbol mbol! Elkohn nsol nyia bahke tiki lim. Jol nyaa ana lohngem re, es'kohro efung bi ma rehng na.
41013008	Ajahbe nyandiki bahke jo nok atemtem. Ajahbe nyandiki bahke kehme elnoko a ajahbe nyako. Ndi bahke jo gb'gbehke adi nyandiki. Owo njal bahke bake. Nyaa a kpee nya li mbomannahb erem.
41013009	“Baaben elnahne! Ane bahk-n jo bob, kak esub. Bo bahke jo dv-n dv go ntahk ero. Ḿ bahke jo yiimi go esamahr atubesi, a esamahr atul tib go egame esi, eji ń l'jo yiimi ntianse nyi nnoobo etib tong bo.
41013010	“Alum enyame bahke tohko gbo mbang yeere rehng ejang njini abehng abehng.
41013011	Bo l'bob-n, kak go esub, kana jo tiiri nsol nyi ḿ bahke bungu. Ngare nyio ellum anehng anehng ni Esowo l'fere ka-n, bungen! Tibre alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, nyanyahne sang, bahke jo lohng goji Etingi Etohko.
41013012	“Ane bahke kehme abonanyehn jabbe ka re bo wul. Babnde nne bahke tob lim abon ebo ano. Abon bahke tob ten babnde ebo, fere jabbe bo ka re bo wul.
41013013	Nne awohng awohng bahke jo ko-n ekv tib go egama mbing. Nne awohng awohng no l'soro asi ano go mbang nyi Esowo tete rehng go es'kohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.”
41013014	“Ḿ bahke nyehne ‘ejum ji kp'sahb s'sab’, ji bahke rannge edi, yim no edi ji ki fuumu re yiimi. Wuungen atung, wahn kahn nob nob ana lohngo no. Ngare nyio ane ba li go Judea bahke beke, tahm go awong.
41013015	Nne no l'kuumu go ege ero etahk, jo re ekv, á l'badde, á k'tohko seb elyele go ekp'kpa song rod ejum fili.
41013016	Nne no l'jol go ege egbe, á k'kpe tohko be na tahm go etahk, song rod abomo enye.
41013017	Ngare nyio bahke sabe area ka anebkal ba li ela, a anebkal ba kpi abon go ebo.
41013018	“Kaken ero ka Esowo, eji nfem nyio l'k'lim ngara nnale.
41013019	Ngare nyio erem bahke gbale sehng, jol bi kala j'jol bomo eji Esowo limi njini tete rehng anv. Jol erem ana bio nehm kpe tiki jol ejolojolo.
41013020	“Tohko jol re Ntul Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe, nne awohng awohng nehm jol no bahke bele eltahre. Tib go esi ane ba Esowo ma yehke, ji ji bahke wahnge Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe.
41013021	“Ngare nyio nne l'tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist ga!’ afi á tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist go!’ kana taame tv-e!
41013022	Akimfahnge ane bahke lohngo ba, jo ba bung re, bo ba li Mesaya. Egom jindiki bahke jo bung re, bo ba li abanyehnamahr Esowo. Bo bahke kehme nliingi tib, fere jo lim akpokosi, eji limi limi kan, bo l'nehm aneb Esowo, ba Esowo ma jak.
41013023	Kunen ekpu, m ma-n tong jia ana ngare kehm rehnge.
41013024	“Ngare nyio, “ ‘Njul bahke dvvrv. Ebareka nehm kpe ya na eyakeyake.
41013025	Alonlo bahke kehm elfooro go elbung gbo. Atahm nya elbung bahke range.’
41013026	“Owo bo bahke nyehne Mmon no nne kp'bake go akparesemsem, a egburu nsahm enye, a ellub.
41013027	Owo á bahke tumu enjel enye re bo song ko ane ba Esowo ma jak bo go nkpohka njini anyehng anyehng ba a bo.
41013028	“Kpilen ejum go eti ji bo kpo lung re efig. Ngare nyi eti jio ma nyono, kak anyane, owo ḿ bahke kahne re, nnale ebba.
41013029	Tob li ka-n fvfo. Ń l'nyehn nsol nyio kp'limi, kahnen re, elbake ni Mmon no nne ebkabbe.
41013030	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bao ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio, bo nehm kpo tete nsol nyio lim kpee.
41013031	“Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.
41013032	“Efung bio, a ngare nyio, nnene nehme kahn, jol babenjel ba li go ejahbetul Esowo nehme kan, jol Mmon fvfo nehm tob kahn. Nsoo ntahngtahng wo kp'kahne.
41013033	“Jo kunen ekpu! Kana tiki lal! Tibre ń nehme kahn ngare nyi nsol nyio bahke limi.
41013034	“Bahke jolo ana nne kp'tahme edi. Re á tahm etahk eje sa, á bahke tohko rod alokeltum ebe bum o, eji nne awohng awohng l'jo lim eltum ene. Á bahke tongo mb'baabe re á jo baabe mbutahk.
41013035	Kunen ekpu, tibre ń nehme kahn ngare nyi nfontahk bahke kehnge. Á li ma ba elgung, á li ma ba nlum atv, á li ma ba ngare nyi ekok kp'kuku. Á li ma ba efungfu.
41013036	Kana jo lal, eji afi nfontahk gbede na ba, á l'ki-n ba kpiri, ń kp'lale.
41013037	Ji m bungu a, tong-n li ka wahn ane kpee re wahn jo baabe.”
41014001	Ngare nyio ebsa nfung ebal elkak Pasova kehm rehnge, nio ni abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist. Atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke bobo Jisos mbehr mbehr song wul.
41014002	Bo kehm bungu re, “E nehm lim ngare elkak, eji ntong l'k'gbo.”
41014003	Jisos kehm feere je go Betani go etahk Saimon ji jolo nne abili wuku wuku. Eji bo jo li nsol, nnenkal awohng kehm bake, ba yel ekp'kpa. Á fili elom akehng ji nno a nno, ji sahb k'kim ekun. Á kehm lennge elom akehng jio, yaange akehng kak Jisos go esi.
41014004	Ane bandiki ba jolo ona kehm kehme atahng rak, fere jo bung atemtem re, “Jen ji wahng ka á kp'fade akehng ana maa!
41014005	Kehn bo jol gungu, ko mpon atahl asehma, ko akpohko nyao, le akpak.” Eltim kehm rake bo tob nnenkal noo.
41014006	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Yaken ye! Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e gbiingi? Yeblim nnobonobo ejum ka-m.
41014007	Wahn, ngare anyehng anyehng akpak li a nahne. L'fere kor-n, ḿ bahke ma jo lim nnoobo ka bo. Me n nehm jol a nahne ngare kpe kpe.
41014008	Nnenkal noa eblim ji á male no. Á toobo ebjing ebame bum, bi m bahke kpoko.
41014009	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Edi ajehng ajehng go njini ji bo bahke tiingi nnoobo etib, bo bahke jo tob bung bade jia ji nnenkal noa ma lim, eji bo l'jo buum-e.”
41014010	Judas Iskariot ji woomo go ellong ewubu ane abal ba jo toono Jisos kehm tahme goji atubesi abalimajom re á song gungu Jisos.
41014011	Eltim yebe bo sehng, eji bo wuku ji Judas jo bung. Bo kehm taame re bo bahk-e kake akpohko. Á kehm kehme elsebe mbang nyi nno nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos kak bo go abo.
41014012	Ngbokambang efung elkak ni abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist, ni ni jolo efung bi bo wulu abon ejoro. Abat'toono Jisos kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Gan wo a kp'sebe re wahr song toobo nsol alehke elkak bum-a?”
41014013	Jisos kehm tumu ane abal, fere tong bo re, “Songen go nfam. Ḿ bahke wane nne no solo etulahb. Toonen ye,
41014014	wahn song go etahk ji á bahke yange. Tongen nfontahk noo re, ‘Nt'tibi ewahre re, Ekp'kpa jin ji á bahke jehke, a abat'toono ebe, li elkak nia?’
41014015	Á bahk-n tibi ekp'kpa ji li go ero enyong, ji bo ma jehke nsol kpee. Owo ḿ bahke toobo nsol nyio bum-r.”
41014016	Abat'toono ebe kehm tahme song rehng go nfam, lohko song nyehn nsol kpee, nyi Jisos tongo bo. Bo kehm toobo nsol elkak nyio bum.
41014017	Elgung ba kan a me, Jisos kehm tahme, a abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
41014018	Eji bo jehk go ekp'kuru kp'lehke nsol, Jisos kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng ewahne no kp'lehke nsol a name bahk-m jabbe, kak abi ane go ebo.”
41014019	Abat'toono ebe, ndon kehm kehme bo fili. No nne jo bahbe Jisos re, “Me woa, afi?”
41014020	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bahke jolo nne awohng go egahne ellong no kp'tohko ebred ekpingi ajehng a name.
41014021	Mmon no nne bahke kpoko ana nwer Esowo bungu no. Erem bahke gbale sehng ka nne no ma gungu Mmon no nne. Jol ga nob, li re, nne noo bo we jelem.”
41014022	Eji bo jo li nsol o, Jisos kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, kehm bakke ka abat'toono ebe, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn li! A wo li ngubjing enyame.”
41014023	Á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm kake bo. Bo kpee kehm woko ona.
41014024	Jisos kehm bungu re, “A wo li alung emame ma egbanngalung ji nfenfe, ma kp'fabe ka ane gbalee.
41014025	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe tiki wo alahb avain maa tete go efung bio bi m bahke kpe wo a nahne go ejahbetul Esowo.”
41014026	Owo bo kehm yimi ese ero, kehm soro tahm asongo go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
41014027	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn kpee bahke dulu atv maa tib esi ejame. Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re, “ ‘Esowo bahke wulu mbaabebul, ebul ebe yaame.’
41014028	Ngare nyi m ma nyahme go elkv, m bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili.”
41014029	Pita kehm faange re, “Me, wa n nehm tiki yake, jol afi egom jehka kpee yaam-a na sa.”
41014030	Jisos kehm bungu tong Pita re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Re nkok kehm kuku nkpel ebal, a bahke gbaame nkpel era atv maa re, me a nyimm.”
41014031	Pita kehm faange t'tahne re, “Me, wa n nehm tiki ten, jol afi elkv ni, m bahke tob kpo a na.” Abat'toono bako kehm tob bung ano fvfo.
41014032	Bo kehm song rehng go etahngga ji bo jo lung re Gesemani. Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Jiin a, me n tohko song kak ero.”
41014033	Á kehm rodo Pita, Jems, a Jon, bo tahm. Á kehm kehme elfahle, ala fere jo teel-e.
41014034	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eltim ename ebgbal ndon ndon sehng, jol tete rehng go elkv. Jiin ana, wahn jo baabe!”
41014035	Á kehm jeere, je es'song, song gbo noongo ndi. Á kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, nong, me n k'lub nyehn erem bia, eyake l'fere jol.
41014036	Nsoo, ejum ajehng ajehng riidem go ega. Fak-m erem bia! Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
41014037	Á kehm feere, ba kpiri abat'toono ebe, ane ara, á ba no, bo kp'lale. Á kehm bungu tong Pita re, “Saimon, a kp'lala? A nehm ma ji awa anyehng k'lala?”
41014038	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo baaben, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń l'k'yel go elgaare. Etohko, mbang nyi Esowo kp-e kor, wo ga, ngubjing kp'leenge.”
41014039	Á kehm kpe feere, kpe song kehme ero b'nehm kak ana wuku wuku,
41014040	kehm kpe feere ba goji abat'toono ebe, kpe ba nyehn bo, bo kp'lale. Tibre akpakamahr lubu bo ellu ellu. Bo joom kahn ji bo bahk-e t'tong.
41014041	Á kpe feere kan a me, á kehm ba tong bo re, “Ń kpi nlale nlala? Songen, wahn song re ekv! Ebgbal. Ngare nyi ma biingi a, nyi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne, kak abi ane go abo.
41014042	Mehlen, wahr tahmen! Nyehnen, nne no bahk-m jabbe, kak abi ane go abo yeb rehng a kpidi kpidi.”
41014043	Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, Judas ji woomo go ellong ewubu ane abal, ba jo toono Jisos, kehm lohngo ba, a ellong ane ba fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm. Atubesi abalimajom, at'tibi ba atahm, a atubesi nfam ba tumu bo.
41014044	Nne no gung-e gungu tongo ane bao re, “Nne no, n l'sod-e nnyo, ye wo ń kpe-e sebe. Boben ye, song a ne, wahn baab-e nob nob!”
41014045	Judas rehnge kan a me, á kehm jeere rehng goji Jisos, kehm-e lungu re, “Nt'tibi!” kehm soro sod-e nnyo.
41014046	Bo kehm tubu Jisos ejahm g'gingi.
41014047	Nne awohng no yiimi ona kehm wobo ekahngkahng go mbak, kpale nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom awohng etung.
41014048	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm re wahn ba bob-m ana nwulanea?
41014049	Efung abehng abehng n jo jolo a nahne, jo tib-n go etahk Esowo, me ḿ bobem. Tibre alum nya Esowo bungu no bahke tiki lim.”
41014050	Abat'toono ebe kpee kehm soro yaam-e sa, be ebo tahm.
41014051	Njangkun anyehng jolo ona, nyi bobo mbarebara mbomo mi mi. Á jo tob toono Jisos fvfo. Bo gare re bo bob-e.
41014052	Á kehm yake mbomo tv bo, kehm beke ngubjing nehme nehme tahm.
41014053	Bo kehm koko Jisos tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi abalimajom. Owo atubesi abalimajom kpee, a anebkul nfam, a at'tibi ba atahm kono nkon.
41014054	Jisos jo jene ekv. Pita jen ekv. Bo ba rehng go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom. Owo Pita ji no, a alokeltum nfontahk, jo wooro agun.
41014055	Atubesi abalimajom, a atul esub jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke Jisos ebi ka, toono o, bo wul-e. Bo tikem nyehn ebi ajehng ajehng ji Jisos limi no.
41014056	Atianse gbalee jo kiimi afahnge lake Jisos. Alum nya bo jo bung joom yel.
41014057	Ane bako kehm kpe mehl, kiimi afahnge lak-e re,
41014058	“E wuk-e ana á bungu re, á bahke wake etahk Esowo jio ji ane si no, fere tuungu si ji nfenfe o nfung era, ji bo kala s'si.”
41014059	Atianse nya bo jo yiimi, anyo joom yel jang jang.
41014060	Ntubesi abalimajom kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A nehme faanga? A nehme wuk ebi ji atianse nyaa kp-a kaka?”
41014061	Jisos belle na belle, jol á faangem ellum anehng anehng. Ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Wo wo li Mesaya, Mmon no Esowo bi gbale sehnga?”
41014062	Jisos kehm faange re, “Me wo. Ḿ bahke nyehne Mmon no nne jehk go eboblum Esowo bi kpi nsahm. Ḿ bahk-e nyehne ana á kp'bake go akparesemsem.”
41014063	Ntubesi abalimajom kehm yare ewobo eje, kehm bungu re, “E nehme kpe seb ntianse anyehng anyehng.
41014064	Wahn ebwuk abi alum enye, ana á ma su Esowo. Ń kp'tiri renan?” Bo kpee kehm bungu re, “Yebgbo ntahm. Nobo re bo wul-e.”
41014065	Egom jindiki kehme atel so wohngo Jisos. Bo gba-e mbomo go esamahr, kehm-e kehme eldohko. Bo kehm bungu re, “Nyehn-r amahr me!” Alokeltum bao soro kehm-e nkpal ruumu.
41014066	Ngare nyio Pita kpeke li go nlaaga nyio. Owo nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom no jolo nnenkal kehm bake.
41014067	Á nyehne kan Pita a me, eji á kpi agun wooro, á kehm-e seenge too, kehm-e tongo re, “Wo fvfo tob jolo a Jisos ji Nasaret.”
41014068	Á kehm gbaame re, “Me, we n nyimm. N nehme wuk ji a kp'bungu.” Á kehm lohngo, song yiimi go mbuga. Nkok kehm soro kuk.
41014069	Nlokeltum noo kehm-e kpe nyehn, kehm kpe bung tong ane ba yiimi o re, “Ye wob go bo ellong.”
41014070	Pita kehm kpe ten. Mmongare ntiil ane ba yiimi o kehm kpe bung tong Pita re, “Go etingitingi, wo wob go bo ellong. A lohng go Galili. Wahr ma-a liingi go ega alum.”
41014071	Pita kehm tiri re, “Esowo demm-m na demme. Nne no ń kp'bungu bada ne, me, we n nyimm.”
41014072	Nkok kehm soro kpe kuk. Owo Pita kehm soro buumu ellum ni Jisos bungu tong-e re, “Re nkok kehm kuku nkpel ebal, a bahk-m tene nkpel era.” Á kehm kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
41015001	Etoono efungfu behko atubesi abalimajom, at'tibi ba atahm, anebkul nfam, a atul bako ba esub kehm toobo ana bo bahke limi. Bo kehm kake Jisos agbekobo, kehm-e rodo, tahm a ne, song kak Pailet go ebo.
41015002	Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo wo li ntul no Jusa?” Jisos kehm taame re, “Ee, me wo.”
41015003	Atubesi abalimajom bao ona kehm kehme eltooro nsol gbalee, fere jo ka-e ebi.
41015004	Pailet kehm kpe bahb Jisos re, “A nehm faanga? A nehme wuk ebi ji bo kp-a kaka?”
41015005	Jisos kpeem faange ejumjum. Pailet kehm-e kpoko esi area.
41015006	Ngare elkak (Pasova) anyehng anyehng Pailet jo yehke nne a ngbekobo awohng yake, no bo l'seb.
41015007	Ngare nyio ona nne awohng woomo go ngbekobo, no bo jo lung-e re Barabas, budu ate ebe ba jo wul ane, eji bo jo jokko ejahbe.
41015008	Eji ellong ane kame no ba rur, bo kehm tongo Pailet re, á yehke nne awohng. Ano wo eljini ene jolo no, ni á jo kono ellimi.
41015009	Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kp'sebe re me n yehke ntul no Jus ka-na?”
41015010	Á jo kahne re, atubesi abalimajom ebyake Jisos ka-e, tib eji á jo teele bo ala.
41015011	Atubesi abalimajom kehm nyare ellong ane bao, eji bo l'gbiingi Pailet, á yehke Barabas yake, fere wul Jisos.
41015012	Pailet kehm kpe bung tong ellong ane bao re, “Jen ji ń kp'sebe re me n lim nne noa no ń kp-e lungu re ntul no Jus?”
41015013	Bo kehm rabe re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
41015014	Pailet kehm bahbe re, “Anv, jen ji á ma l'lim?” Bo kehm kpe rabe tiim re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
41015015	Pailet jo sebe re, ellong ane bao bel eyebatahng, owo á kehm yehke Barabas yake, yake Jisos ka, bo dv-e. Bo dv-e kan a me, Pailet rod-e, kak nsoja go abo re bo song kum-e go ekros.
41015016	Nsoja nyio kehm rodo Jisos, yange a ne go nlaaga ntubesi ejahbe. Bo kehm lungu ellong nsoja nehko re bo ba.
41015017	Bo kehm kake Jisos mbilibili ekpawobo ana ji atul jo kono elkake, kehm tahnge ekpasi akpiri, ba konng-e go esi.
41015018	Bo kehm-e kehme nnyo mia kak re, “Wo noaa, ntul ewahra?”
41015019	Bo kehm koko ebti, jo rum-e go esi, kehm kehme atel so wohng-e, jo gbo jamm-e alahng, are bo kp-e kake na.
41015020	Bo nohk-e kan a rahke, bo kehm-e yehke ekpawobo jio, kehm feere a nsol enye kak-e, tahm a ne re bo song kum-e go ekros.
41015021	Eji bo fi mbang mbang, bo kehm nyehne nne no bo jo lung-e re Saimon ji lohng mmojahbe noko kp'bake go Jerusalem. Bo kehm-e bobo re á sol ekros ji Jisos. Saimon jolo nne a Sirin, ye wo jele Aleksanda, a Rufus.
41015022	Bo kehm koko Jisos tahm a ne go edi ji bo jo lung re Golgota, ji lohngo re Edi Nkpakesi.
41015023	Owo bo gare re bo ka-e amahm semme anyane nya bo kpo lung re mmir. Jisos tikem wo.
41015024	Bo kehm-e kumu go ekros, rod abomo enye bum, fere tub elfaange re bo kahn ana nne awohng awohng bahke koko.
41015025	Jolo nkaranka esehmwubu nyi efungfu nyi bo kum-e go ekros.
41015026	Ejum ji wahng ka bo kum-e lake go ekros, ji ji bo nyono go ekros re, “A wo li ntul no Jus.”
41015027	Bo tob kumu awulane, ane abal lake ona, noko, bo kum-e go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
41015028	Ana wo li ellum ni nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no go nk'kula ngare re, “Bo bahk-e fange kak go ellong abi ane.” Ni ni a, ma lohko jol.
41015029	Ane ba jo sehng mbang jo tiib-e abo, fere jo su-e re, “A tongo re, a bahke wake etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si ji nfenfe go nfung era.
41015030	Tahre elna, wo badde go ekros me!”
41015031	Atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm jo t'tob nyok-e fvfo, fere jo bung atemtem re, “Á kpo tahre ane bako. Yefono nehm ma tahre elne.
41015032	Nong, wahr nyehn ana Kraist, ntul no Israel, bahke badde go ekros ba, eji e l'taame tv-e.” Ane ba, bo tob kum bo go akros fvfo jo t'tob su Jisos.
41015033	Eji efin ma yiimi, ejannge kehm gboko go ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete biingi awa na ara.
41015034	Nkaranka era nyi elgung Jisos kehm rabe w'wahre w'wahre re, “Eloi eloi lama sabaktani!” ji lohngo re, “Nsoo, nsoo, jen ji wahng ka a ma-m yake anae?”
41015035	Eji egom ane bandiki ba jolo ona wuku alum nya Jisos bungu no, bo kehm bungu re, “Wuken, á kpi Elaija lung.”
41015036	Nne awohng kehm beke song ko nd'dahng, suku go amahm, tung go esi ebti, kehm tabe ton Jisos go ege a nnyo re á yab. Á kehm bungu re, “Nong, wahr tohko ny'nyehn, joare Elaija bahke bake, ba fon-e go ekros.”
41015037	Jisos kehm soro rabe, soro kpo.
41015038	Ekpiki ji bo tohko go etahk Esowo kehm soro yang, bomo ero tete ba jahm ndi.
41015039	Eji ntubesi a nsoja no yiimi ona wane go ekros nyehne ana Jisos kpo no, á kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana lohko jol Mmon Esowo!”
41015040	Anebkal bako jolo ona, ba yiimi go fee, jo nyehn, Salome a Meri ji lohng go Magdala, go Meri nnyehn a Joses abola Jems, ji jolo mmonse. Bo tob woomo go ellong nio.
41015041	Bo jo toono Jisos ngare nyi á jolo go Galili, fere jo kak-e ebo. Ellong anebkal bako ba tob toono Jisos ba go Jerusalem fvfo, tob jolo o.
41015042	Efung bi bo kpo toobo ebjing bi elkak Pasova, bi sene efung Esabat,
41015043	owo Josef ji lohng go Arimatia kehm bake. Á jolo nlamalam no jo sahb l'lub ane. Á jo siki elbake nio ni etul bi Esowo. Josef jo sahb tahm song kpiri ntul a Pailet, kehm-e bahbe re á lub taame, á song fono ekv ji Jisos.
41015044	Pailet kehm-e sahb kp'kpo esi, eji á wuku re, Jisos ebtahr kp'kpo. Á kehm lungu ntubesi a nsoja, kehm-e bahbe, joare yebtahr kp'kpo.
41015045	Eji Pailet wuku goji ntubesi a nsoja noo re, yeblohko kpo, á kehm tongo Josef re, á song fono ekv ji Jisos, song a ji.
41015046	Josef kehm gunu mbarebara mbomo, kehm song fono ekv ji Jisos, fere kpennge mbomo mio, rod tahm a ji, song kak go elahm bi bo rahme go ekpartal. Á kehm bannge eltal, bulu go nnyo elahm.
41015047	Meri ji lohng go Magdala, abola Meri nnyehn Joses, bo jo kpuru re bo nyehn edi ji bo kake Jisos.
41016001	Eji efung Esabat ma sehng, Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Salome, go Meri nnyehn Jems, bo song gunu ajoobo akehng re bo song taame ekv ji Jisos.
41016002	Ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu atv atv, bo kehm tahme go elahm ngare nyi njul ma ta elbange.
41016003	Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, nne awo bahke bannge eltal nio go nnyo elahm ka-r me?”
41016004	Jolo egburu eltal ni nnen a nnen. Eji bo rehnge go elahm, bo kehm tabe asamahr ebo, soro nyehn eltal nio ma bannge, noongo go nkpe.
41016005	Bo kehm soro yel go elahm. Owo bo nyehne njangkun jehk go ejang eboblum, nyi kake mbarebare ekpawobo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
41016006	Njangkun nyio tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Ń kpi Jisos ji Nasaret seb, ye ji bo kum-e go ekros. Ana á limm. Yebnyahme fi. A wo bo bum-e no.
41016007	Songen anv, wahn song tong Pita, a abat'toono Jisos bako fvfo re, Jisos bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili. Go wo ḿ bahk-e nyehne, ana á tong-n no.”
41016008	Owo bo kehm soro lohng go elahm, be asongo. Tibre ala jo t'teele bo, akahb fere jo kahm bo. Bo tikem bung ejumjum, tong nne awohng awohng. Tibre bo jo f'fahl.
41016009	Eji Jisos nyahme go elkv, á nyahme ngbokambang efung go erahde nkpese efungfu. Á gbo mbang kpiri Meri ji lohng go Magdala, ye ji á kam-e abi atohko na asehma yehke.
41016010	Meri kehm tahme song tong ane bao ba jo toono Jisos, ba ji ndon ndon, fere jo ling.
41016011	Eji bo wuku re, Jisos noa go elkpin, Meri m-e nyehn, bo tikem taame tv-e.
41016012	Fvfo, Jisos kehm tob kpiri abat'toono ebe, ane abal, go elfoongo nne nondiki eji bo ma lohng go Jerusalem kp'tahme ejahbe jehko.
41016013	Bo kehm feere ba tong abat'toono baka, jol bo tikem taame tv bo.
41016014	Es'kohro, Jisos kehm ba kpiri abat'toono ebe, ewubu a nne awohng, eji bo kpi nsol li. Á kehm nyame bo tib go bo ek'taame, a etahnsi ebo. Tibre bo tikem taame tv ane bao ba nyehn-e no, fere ba tong bo re, yebnyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin.
41016015	Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Songen go njini kpee, wahn song bung alum Esowo tong nne awohng awohng.
41016016	Nne no l'taame, fere bel ewohngalahb, á bahke bele eltahre. Nne no tohko fere taame, á bahke lehke ebi.
41016017	Ane ba l'taame, bo bahke bele nsahm nyi bo bahke jo lim akpokosi. Bo bahke jo kam ane abi atohko yehke go egama mbing. Bo bahke jo bung go ajahbe nfenfe.
41016018	Bo l'rod enyo go abo, fere wo ebi ekahm, ejumjum nehm lim bo. Bo bahke jo kunu aneb ayam abo, bo nob.”
41016019	Eji Ntul a Jisos ma bung a bo mal, nsahm Esowo kehm-e soro rod, tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo. Jisos song ji go eboblum Esowo.
41016020	Abat'toono ebe kehm tahme, jo bung alum Esowo edi ajehng ajehng. Ntul Esowo jo kake bo ebo, fere jo yiimi ntianse ka alum enye nya bo jo bung, eji bo jo lim akpokosi nya á ka bo re bo lim.
42001001	Ane gbalee ebnyon nsol nyi ma lim go egahre ellong, nyi e kpo taame tv go etingitingi.
42001002	Bo nyono ana ane ba jolo go mbomannahb, ba nyehne nsol nyio go amahr tong-r, bo ji jolo alokeltum ba Alum Esowo.
42001003	Tib eji me n tob seb nsol nyio kpee kahn nob nob ana jolo go mbomannahb, owo wahng ka n tiri re, n'nob re, me n tob nyon nsol nyio go ntooranti ka-a,
42001004	eji a l'kahn re, nsol nyi bo tib-a no lohko li go etingitingi.
42001005	Ngare nyi Herod jolo ntul go Judea, nlimajom awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Sekaraya. Á woomo go ellong abalimajom ba Abija jolo ntubesi abo mahne mahne. Nkal ewe, bo jo lung-e re Elisabet ji lohngo go et'tohngo ji Eron.
42001006	Bo ane abal abal jolo atingitingi ane go esamahr Esowo, ba jo bum atahm nya Ntul Esowo kpee nseenga nseenge.
42001007	Bo jelem mmon awohng awohng. Tibre Elisabet jolo ngum a nnenkal. Ngare nyio bobkul ane abal abal.
42001008	Efung abehng Sekaraya jo limi eltum njom alimi go etahk Esowo, tib jolo esennge ji ellong n'ne.
42001009	Ana eljini ni abalimajom jolo no, owo bo kehm-e yehke re á kak agun go insens, jo teebe go ekp'kpa Esowo.
42001010	Ane baka kpee jolo ga elatahk, jo kak ero ngare nyi insens jo teebe.
42001011	Owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kpir-e. Enjel nyio yiimi go ejang eboblum bi edi njom jio ji insens jo teebe.
42001012	Eji Sekaraya nyehn-e no, ala kehm-e teele, á kehme elfahle.
42001013	Owo enjel nyio kehm-e tongo re, “Sekaraya, ka kpe fahl! Esowo ebwuk ero eba. Elisabet nkal ewa bahke jele mmon no nlum ka-a. A bahk-e gungu mbing re Jon.
42001014	A bahke bele eyebatahng, fere jo geere. Ane gbalee, eltim bahke yebe bo, ń l'jel-e.
42001015	Tibre á bahke jolo nj'joka nne go esamahr bi Esowo. Á nehm jo wo amahm, a nsol elwoko nyehko nyi kpo lim nne. Bomo ngare nyi á wob nnyehn go ala, Etingi Etohko bahk-e ruru go atahng.
42001016	Á bahke feere abon Israel gbalee ba ka Esowo, Ntul abo.
42001017	Á bahk-e gboko mbang a etohko ji Elaija, a nsahm a nsahm enye, eji á l'sennge babnde ntim, bo fere jol ana abonse, fere sennge akpuuru ane ntim, bo fere bel elkahne ni atingitingi ane, fere toobo ane bum Esowo.”
42001018	Owo Sekaraya kehm bahbe enjel nyio re, “M bahke limi renan, kehm kahne, joare lohko li go etingitingi? Tibre me n kul, nkal ewame fvfo ebtob kul.”
42001019	Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Me wo li Gebriel ji kpo yiimi go esamahr bi Esowo. Esowo bi tum-m no re me m ba bung a na, fere tiing-a nnoobo etib bia.
42001020	A bahke gboko ekamme. A nehm ma kpe bung tete rehng efung bi ejum jia bahke jolo, tib eji a ki taame tv alum enyame nya bahke jolo go etingitingi, ngare nyio l'biingi.”
42001021	Ane ba jo sik Sekaraya jo kpo bo esi sehng, eji á ma laange ano go ekp'kpa Esowo.
42001022	Eji á lohngo go elatahk, á kpeem jo ma bung a bo. Owo bo kehm soro kahn re, yebnyehn nkpokosi ejum go ekp'kpa Esowo. Eji á ki ma jo bung go nnyo, á fere jo bung a bo go abo abo.
42001023	Eji afung nya á jo lim eltum go etahk Esowo ma mal, á kehm tahme kehnge.
42001024	Eji ma jol ano, Elisabet nkal ewe kehm sake ela, sa woomo ekp'kpa tete nnyahng elon. Á jo bungu re,
42001025	“Anv, eji m ma fili Ntul Esowo ndon, owo á ma-m kak ebo mbang nyia, eji á l'lim-m, n jo lub ane.”
42001026	Eji ma kang nnyahng erakera mi Elisabet sa ela, owo Esowo kehm tumu enjel Gebriel tv go ejahbe ajehng ji jolo go Galili, ji bo kpo lung re Nasaret.
42001027	Á ko etib ba a bi re á ba tiingi ngbahme anyehng nyi bo jo lung-e re Meri ji bo kala n'noongo a ne. Nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Josef ji lohng go et'tohngo ji ntul a Devid wo lame elbal a ne.
42001028	Enjel nyio kehm ba kpiri Meri, kehm-e tongo re, “M ma-a kak nnyo, wo ji Esowo ma-a fuulu. Ntul Esowo li a na.”
42001029	Owo ala kehm sahb t'teele Meri, eji á wuku etib bi enjel nyio tiing-e no. Á kehm kehme eltiiri bade ana nnyo akake mio lohngo no.
42001030	Enjel nyio kehm-e tongo re, “Meri, ka kpe fahl! Esowo ma-a fuulu.
42001031	A bahke sake ela, jel nnenlum no a bahk-e gungu mbing re Jisos.
42001032	Á bahke jolo nj'joka nne. Bo bahke jo lung-e re Mmon no Esowo bi gbale sehng. Ntul Esowo bahk-e jehke go eti etul ji nde Devid.
42001033	Á bahke fili abon Jekob go njinanjini. Etul ebe, es'kohlo nehm bel.”
42001034	Owo Meri kehm bahbe enjel nyio re, “Jia kehm jolo renan, eji n ki kpi nlum!”
42001035	Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Etingi Etohko bahke jolo a na. Nsahm nyi Esowo bahk-a bulu. Owo bahke wahng ka mbarebara mmon no a bahke jele, bo bahke jo lung-e re Mmon no Esowo.
42001036	Nyehn Elisabet, nne a nnahb ewa, ji bo jo lung-e re ngum a nnenkal, yebsa ela bi á bahke jele nnenlum, nnyahng erakera mi a, jol eji á ma k'kul o.
42001037	Tibre Esowo, ejumjum limm, ji á kil jo ma lim.”
42001038	Owo Meri kehm bungu re, “Me n li nlokeltum no Esowo. Nong, jol ana a bungu no.” Enjel nyio kehm soro tahm.
42001039	Jol gaam kang, Meri kehm toobo ebjing, foomo tahm song rehng go ejahbe ajehng ji jolo go ejang awong nya Judea.
42001040	Owo á kehm song yange go etahk Sekaraya, kehm song kak Elisabet nnyo.
42001041	Eji Elisabet wuku nnyo mi Meri kak-e no, mmon no woomo Elisabet go ala kehm nvvdv. Etingi Etohko kehm ruru Elisabet go atahng,
42001042	owo á kehm soro kehme elbungu wahre wahre re, “Wo wo, Esowo ma-a fuulu go ellong anebkal. Elfuulu li ka mmon no a bahke jele.
42001043	Jen ji wahnge elkohn nkpokosi ejum ana nyia ma lim re nnyehn ntul ewame ba nyehn-m?
42001044	Tibre n wuku kan nnyo mi a kak-m no, mmon no wob-m ga ala soro yuudu go eyebatahng.
42001045	Eyebatahng li a na, eji a ma taame tv etib bi Ntul Esowo tiing-a no. Tibre bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
42001046	Owo Meri kehm bungu re, “Eltim ename kp'tehke Ntul Esowo.
42001047	Etohko ejame kp'geere kak Esowo, nt'tahre ewame,
42001048	eji á ma-m buumu, me ji li nlokeltum ewe no li reed. Bomo anv asongo ane kpee bahk-m jo lung re, nne no Esowo m-e fuulu.
42001049	Tibre Esowo bi gbale sehng ma-m rod, kp'limi agburu nsol. Mbing enye li saang.
42001050	Ndon enye li ka ane ba kp-e fahle, jol afi bo jini ngare anyi.
42001051	Á tanne ebo ebe, fere tib nsahm enye, kam aneb elgeere raade, a ntir a ntir ebo.
42001052	Á kpo radde aj'jok atul go bo a nti etul, fere mehl ane ba li rede rede wahre.
42001053	Ane ba njal ma yam bo, á kpo ka bo anoobo nsol, bo li wohngo, fere yake afang ane, bo song abo abo.
42001054	Esowo ebkak Israel, nlokeltum ewe, ebo, eji á ma buumu ndon enye,
42001055	nyi li go njinanjini ana á bungu tong babnso ejahre, fere tong Ebraham, a abon ebe.”
42001056	Meri kange ejum nnyahng era a Elisabet, kehm feere kehnge.
42001057	Ngare kehm rehnge nyi Elisabet yahke jel. Á kehm jele nnenlum.
42001058	Eji aneb nkontahk ebe, a ane ebe wuku ana Ntul Esowo m-e tib egburu ndon enye, bo kehm-e tobo elgeere.
42001059	Eji mmon ma kang nfung enehkeni, bo kehm tahme re bo song yehk-e nrur. Owo bo kehm-e gungu mbing nyi nde re Sekaraya.
42001060	Nnyehn kehm tene re, “E'ee, bo bahk-e jo lung re Jon.”
42001061	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Nne ewa awohng awohng limm, no kpi mbing nyio!”
42001062	Bo kehm bahbe nde go abo abo re, “Elkohn mbing anyi a bahke gungu mmon ewa?”
42001063	Sekaraya kehm bahbe re, bo ka-e nwer. Á kehm koko nyon re, “Mbing enye, bo bahke jo lung-e re Jon.” Ane kpee kehm kpoko bo esi.
42001064	Sekaraya kehm soro kpe kehme elbungu, fere jo tehk Esowo.
42001065	Kpee ane ba lene kohlo o kehm kehme elfahle. Eka jio kehm yeere go ejang bi ajahbe kpee nya jolo go awong nya Judea.
42001066	Ane kpee ba wuku no, kehm rodo kak go bo a ntim, fere jo bahb re, “Anv, mmon noa bahke jolo elkohn nne awo?” Tibre bo nyehne ana nsahm nyi Esowo jolo a ne.
42001067	Owo Etingi Etohko kehm ba rur Sekaraya, nde Jon, á kehme amahr nyehn re,
42001068	“Nong, wahr tehken Esowo bi Israel, bi li Ntul ewahre. Yebba re á ba kak ane ebe ebo, fere fak bo yake.
42001069	Á ma-r ka nt'tahre no kpi nsahm, no lohng go et'tohngo ji Devid, nlokeltum ewe.
42001070	Ano wo Esowo bungu sehng go nnyo mi abarabare anyehnamahr ba jolo mahne mahne.
42001071	Á tongo re, á bahk-r tahre yehke go abo nya anebekv ebahre, fere yehk-r go abo nya ane kpee ba ma-r ko ekv,
42001072	fere tib babnso ejahre ndon enye, tob buumu mbarebare enyam ebe bi á nyame no,
42001073	eji á tiri no, fere tong Ebraham, nso ejahre re,
42001074	-
42001075	á bahk-r yehke go abo nya anebekv ebahre, eji e l'jol ejahre ejahre ka ye ye, fere li eno go ege esamahr, jo lok-e, k'fahl afung kpee nya e li go elkpin.
42001076	Mmon ewame, bo bahk-a jo lung re, nnyehnamahr no Esowo bi gbale sehng. Tibre a bahke gboko Ntul mbang, song tuungu mbang enye bum-e,
42001077	fere tong ane ebe re bo bahke bele eltahre, tib eji Esowo bahke tahme ka bo go bo abiafem.
42001078	Tibre Esowo ebahre kpi egburu ndon nyi bahke lohngo go ero. Ellohngo ni bahke lohngo bahke jolo ana njul kp'yake tub-r,
42001079	eji l'ka ane ba jehk go ejannge ellennge, a ane ba nong go emel elkv, fere jo tib-r mbang nyi elkoono.”
42001080	Mmon noo kehm gbale, fere tahne go etohko. Á jolo go elka emahng tete efung bi á lohngo gbuul, Israel kehm-e nyehne.
42002001	Ngare nyio nyi ntul Agostos kehm jehke ntahm re, bo fange njini kpee, kak abing ebo go nwer.
42002002	Eji bo gbo mbang fange ane, Sirinus wo jolo ntubesi go Siria.
42002003	Nne awohng awohng kehm tahme go ege ejahbe re bo kak-e mbing go nwer.
42002004	Josef ji lene go Nasaret nyi Galili kehm tob tahm, song rehng go Betlehem ji Judea, ejahbe jio ji bo jele ntul a Devid. Tibre Josef lohng go et'tohngo ji Devid.
42002005	Á je ona re bo kak mbing enye go nwer, a Meri ji á tongo re á bahk-e koko, ye ji jolo ela.
42002006	Eji bo jolo o Betlehem, ngare kehm biingi nyi Meri yahke ba eljele.
42002007	Owo á kehm jele ngbokambang a mmon ewe no nlum, kpenng-e abomo, fere rod-e, bum go ejum ji bo jo kak efong nsol alehke. Tibre eyake jolem go ekp'kpa elkang ka bo.
42002008	Abaabebul jolo ejang ejahbe jio, ba jo kang go emahng, jo baabe ebul ebo atv.
42002009	Enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kpiri bo. Ellub ni Esowo kehm yake ana njul tub bo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle tete.
42002010	Owo enjel nyio kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Tibre n ko nnoobo etib ba a bi, bi kpi egburu eyebatahng ka ane kpee.
42002011	Tibre lela bobjel nt'tahre ka-n go ejahbe ji Devid, no li Kraist ji Ntul.
42002012	A wo li elliingi ka-n. Ḿ bahke nyehne mmon elbili no bo m-e kpennge abomo, á nong go ejum ji bo kpo kak efong nsol alehke.”
42002013	Ellong enjel nyi ejahbetul Esowo gbalee kehm soro lohng ba kpiri enjel nyio, jo tehk Esowo re,
42002014	“Ellub jol a Esowo go ero. Elkoono jol a ane go njini, ba Esowo li a bo yebe yebe.”
42002015	Eji babenjel ma feere ebo fi go ejahbetul Esowo, abaabebul kehm bungu atemtem re, “Nong, wahr tahmen go Betlehem, song nyehnen ejum ji ma jol, ji Ntul Esowo ma-r tong.”
42002016	Owo bo kehm soro tahm elwaare, song nyehn Meri, a Josef, fere nyehn mmon nong go ejum ji bo kpo kak efong nsol alehke.
42002017	Bo nyehne kan ano me, bo kehm tahme, jo yannge, jo tooro tong ane ana enjel tongo bo bada mmon noo.
42002018	Ane kpee ba wuku ana abaabebul tongo bo, kehm kpoko bo esi.
42002019	Meri kehm kuuru nsol nyio kpee go ege eltim, fere jo tir bade.
42002020	Abaabebul bao kehm feere, jo ka Esowo ellub, fere jo tehk-e mbang mbang go nsol kpee nyi bo ma nyehn, fere w'wuk. Jolo na jol jang jang ana enjel tongo bo.
42002021	Eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, nyi bo bahke mmon noo nrur yehke, owo bo kehm-e gungu mbing re Jisos, ny'nehm o nyi enjel tibi Meri, á kehm sake ela ebe.
