42002022	Eji ngare biingi no nyi Meri bahke limi kpee, eji á l'kpe jol saang ana ntahm nyi Moses bungu no, owo Josef abola Meri kehm rodo mmon noo, tahm a ne go Jerusalem re bo song rod-e kak Ntul Esowo go ebo.
42002023	Ana wo bo nyono go ntahm nyi Ntul Esowo re, “Ngbokambang a mmon no nlum awohng awohng no l'jini, á bahke jolo ka Ntul Esowo.”
42002024	Bo kehm limi njom ana ntahm Esowo bungu no re, “Ane bao bahke kake etomtom ebbal, tohko jol ano mbehl ebal.”
42002025	Nne jolo go Jerusalem, no bo jo lung-e re Simeon. Á jolo nnooba nne no jo fahl Esowo, fere jo sik nkakeltim no bahke ba kak Israel eltim. Etingi Etohko jolo a ne.
42002026	Tibre Etingi Etohko lennge tong-e re, á nehm tiki waka kpo tete á nyehn Mesaya nyi Ntul Esowo bahke tumu.
42002027	Etohko ji Esowo kehm-e yehke re á je go etahk Esowo. Eji Josef, a Meri, bo ko Jisos, mmon abo, song yange a ne go etahk Esowo re bo song lim-e ana ntahm bungu no,
42002028	owo Simeon kehm taare mmon, fili go ebo, fere jo tehk Esowo re,
42002029	“Ntul, woblim enyam eba, anv, nong, nlokeltum ewa kehm yake njini nyia abo, song go eyebatahng,
42002030	tibre amahr enyame ebnyehn eltahre ena,
42002031	ni a ma toobo bum go esamahr ane kpee.
42002032	Eltahre nia li ellennge ni bahke wahnge ane baka baka nyehn mbang enya, ni bahke jolo ellub ni Israel, ane eba.”
42002033	Eji nde, a nnyehn wuku ana Simeon bungu bada mmon noo, kehm kpoko bo esi.
42002034	Simeon kehm biri elfuulu ni Esowo tv bo, kehm tongo Meri nnyehn re, “Mmon noa, Esowo bi m-e yehke. Ye wo bahke limi ane gbalee go Israel gbo, fere lim ane gbalee mehl yiimi. Ye wo li elliingi ni Esowo ma tib, ni ane bahke jo bung ebi bade,
42002035	eji ntir atahng nyi ane gbalee l'jol gbuul. Wofono antahng eltim ena bahke jolo, are bo jahm-a ekahngkahng.”
42002036	Nnenkal awohng tob jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Ana. Á jolo nnyehnamahr. Nde, bo jo lung-e re Fanuel ji lohng go et'tohngo ji Aser. Ana sahb k'kul. Eji nlum ewe ko-e no, á ji elbal nnya esehma,
42002037	nlum ewe kehm-e kpoko sa, á fere jol nkalebun. Ngare nyia a, yebkang nnya atahl ani a nnya ani. Á joom tiki lohng go etahk Esowo, á jo kak Esowo, jo bade elne njal, fere jo kak ero atv a njul.
42002038	Á kehm soro ba ngare ny'nehm o, ba kehme Esowo tehk, fere jo bung tong ane bao bada mmon noo, bao ba ji, jo sik elforo ni Jerusalem bahke foro.
42002039	Eji bo ma lim ejum ajehng ajehng mal ana ntahm nyi Ntul Esowo bungu no, owo bo kehm feere kehnge go Nasaret, ejahbe ebo ji li go Galili.
42002040	Mmon noo kehm gbale, fere tahne. Á gbale go elkahne. Elfuulu ni Esowo jolo a ne.
42002041	Elya anehng anehng nde Jisos, a nnyehn jo je elkak Pasova go Jerusalem.
42002042	Eji Jisos ma kang ewubu a nnya ebal, bo kehm kpe je go Jerusalem ana bo jo kono eljeke elkak nio.
42002043	Eji afung elkak nio ma mal, owo bo kehm feere kehnge. Jisos sa go Jerusalem. Nde, a nnyehn kahnem.
42002044	Bo jo tiri re, Jisos wob go ellong ane ba kp'kehnge. Eji bo ma jen efung kohro kohro, owo bo kehm-e kehme elsebe go ellong abonanyehn ebo, a atem ebo.
42002045	Eji bo ki-e nyehn, bo kehm feere go Jerusalem, song seb-e gona.
42002046	Eji ma kang nfung era, owo bo kehm song nyehn-e go etahk Esowo, á jehk no a at'tibi kp'wuungu atung, fere jo bahb bo abahbe.
42002047	Ane kpee ba wuk-e no, kehm jo kpo bo esi tib go ege elkahne, a afaange nya á jo faange bo.
42002048	Nde, a nnyehn, kpo bo esi sehng, eji bo nyehn-e no. Owo nnyehn kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewame, jen ji wahnge a kehm limi ejum ana jia? Nso, a me, e ma-a seb na seb seb seb.”
42002049	Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń jo seb-m? Ń nehme kahn re, m bahke tiki lim eltum ni Nsooa?”
42002050	Bo kahnem es'si ejum ji á jo b'bung tong bo.
42002051	Owo Jisos kehm tahme toono bo, bo feere kehnge go Nasaret, á song woomo bo go elwo. Nnyehn kuuru nsol nyio kpee go ege eltim.
42002052	Jisos kehm gbale go elkahne, fere gbal agbal nya ngubjing. Elkoro ni á jo kor Esowo, fere jo kor ane jo kpe gbal na.
42003001	Eji ma kang nnya elku nyi Taibirius jolo ntul a Rom, ngare nyio nyi Pontus Pailet jolo ntubesi ejahbe go Judea, Herod jo fili Galili, Filip mmonannyehn jo fili Iturea, fere jo fili Trakonitis, Lisanias jo fili Abilene.
42003002	Annas abola Kayafas jolo atubesi abalimajom. Ngare nyio nyi ellum Esowo song kpiri Jon ji jolo mmon a Sekaraya go elka emahng.
42003003	Jon kehm tahme, jo yannge go ajahbe nya li kohlo Jodan, jo bung alum Esowo re, “Yaangen mbang enyahne, wahn bel ewohngalahb, Esowo bahke tahme ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
42003004	Ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono kak go nwer re, “Nne noa, kp'rabe go elka emahng re, ‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bum-e! Limen mbang t'tor nyi á bahke sehnge.
42003005	Bo bahke kake ndi go edamme ajehng ajehng, fere jol bale bale, fere rene ewong ajehng ajehng gooro, fere jol bale bale. Ejum ji l'galle, bo bahke limi, fere tor. Abang nya li akpuku akpuku, bo bahke fere gooro, jol gele gele.
42003006	Nne awohng awohng bahke nyehne eltahre ni Esowo.’ ”
42003007	Ellong ane gbalee jo l'lohng, je goji Jon re á wohngo bo alahb. Jon kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn enyo bia, nne awo tong-n re ḿ bahke foro go erakatahng ji Esowo ji kp'bake?
42003008	Jo limen eljini ni bahke jo tib re, wahn ebyaange mbang enyahne. Kana bom elbungu atemtem re, ‘Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.’ Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Esowo bahke ma ko atal nyaa, lim abon ka Ebraham.
42003009	“Bobtoobo elfuk bum, ni bo bahke kiimi alohk nti. Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab akab nya nno, bo bahke gbahke tub, rod kak agun.”
42003010	Owo ane bao kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, ejum aji e bahke limi me?”
42003011	Á kehm faange bo re, “Nne no l'bel nsubu ebal, nong, á yehke anyehng, ka nne no ki kpi. Nne no l'bel nsol alehke, nong, á tob lim ano.”
42003012	Abakokatak kehm tob ba re bo ba bel ewohngalahb. Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, ejum aji e bahke limi?”
42003013	Jon kehm faange bo re, “Kana kpe jo ko akpohko etahk sehnge ana bo tong-n re wahn jo ko.”
42003014	Egom nsoja nyindiki kehm-e tob bahb re, “Wahr bahke limi renan?” Á kehm faange bo re, “Kana jo lim nne awohng awohng ejum go eko! Kana jo ka nne ebi mbol mbol! Nong, ana bo kp-n kpiki jo gbal-n.”
42003015	Owo ane kehm kehme ekpu kunu, fere jo tir go bo a ntim bada Jon re, fundiki ye Mesaya wo.
42003016	Owo Jon kehm bungu tong bo ane kpee re, “N kp-n wohngo alahb maka maka. Nne no kp'bake gbale sehnge me. Jol me n tohkem f'fuumu re me n fannge alehke akpaketa enye. Ye wo bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko, a agun.
42003017	Á fili ed'da go ebo, kp'feebe arasi enye. Á bahke kpuku arasi enye, song kak go ege ekp'kpa, fere jahm awal go agun nya l'k'tiki lahme elahmelahme.”
42003018	Nsol nyehko kpe jol tvv, nyi Jon kpe jo rehke bo, eji á jo tiingi ane bao nnoobo etib.
42003019	Á tob ka ntul a Herod ebi, tib eji á taare Herodias, nkal a Filip mmonannyehn, kpe lim abi nsol nyako budu.
42003020	Herod kpe lim ebi jehko kpele, eji á bobo Jon kak ngbekobo.
42003021	Eji ane bao kpee ma bel ewohngalahb, Jisos kehm tob bel ewohngalahb. Eji á jo kak ero, ejahbetul kehm lennge.
42003022	Etingi Etohko kehm badde go elfoongo ni ebbehl, ba jol a ne. Bo kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo re, “Wo wo li akor-m mmon ewame, no kpo kor-m s'sehng.”
42003023	Ngare nyio Jisos ebkang ejum eltahl a nnya ewubu. Ane jo tiri re, á jolo mmon a Josef, ji jolo mmon a Heli.
42003024	Heli jolo mmon a Matat. Matat jol mmon a Livai. Livai jol mmon a Melki. Melki jol mmon a Jannai. Jannai jol mmon a Josef.
42003025	Josef jol mmon a Matatias. Matatias jol mmon Amos. Amos jol mmon a Nahum. Nahum jol mmon Esli. Esli jol mmon a Naggai.
42003026	Naggai jol mmon a Maat. Maat jol mmon a Matatias. Matatias jol mmon a Semein. Semein jol mmon a Josek. Josek jol mmon a Joda.
42003027	Joda jol mmon a Joanan. Joanan jol mmon a Resa. Resa jol mmon a Serubabel. Serubabel jol mmon a Sealtiel. Sealtiel jol mmon a Neri.
42003028	Neri jol mmon a Melki. Melki jol mmon Addi. Addi jol mmon a Kosam. Kosam jol mmon Elmadam. Elmadam jol mmon Er.
42003029	Er jol mmon a Josua. Josua jol mmon Eliesa. Eliesa jol mmon a Jorim. Jorim jol mmon a Matat. Matat jol mmon a Livai.
42003030	Livai jol mmon a Simeon. Simeon jol mmon a Juda. Juda jol mmon a Josef. Josef jol mmon a Jonam. Jonam jol mmon Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim jol mmon a Melea. Melea jol mmon a Menna. Menna jol mmon a Matata. Matata jol mmon a Natan. Natan jol mmon a Devid.
42003032	Devid jol mmon a Jesi. Jesi jol mmon Obed. Obed jol mmon a Boas. Boas jol mmon a Sela. Sela jol mmon a Nason.
42003033	Nason jol mmon Aminadab. Aminadab jol mmon Admin. Admin jol mmon Arni. Arni jol mmon a Hesron. Hesron jol mmon a Peres. Peres jol mmon a Juda.
42003034	Juda jol mmon a Jekob. Jekob jol mmon no Aisik. Aisik jol mmon no Ebraham. Ebraham jol mmon a Tera. Tera jol mmon a Nahor.
42003035	Nahor jol mmon a Serug. Serug jol mmon a Reu. Reu jol mmon a Peleg. Peleg jol mmon no Eber. Eber jol mmon a Sela.
42003036	Sela jol mmon a Kainan. Kainan jol mmon Arfasad. Arfasad jol mmon a Sem. Sem jol mmon a Noa. Noa jol mmon a Lamek.
42003037	Lamek jol mmon a Metusala. Metusala jol mmon no Enohk. Enohk jol mmon a Jared. Jared jol mmon no Mahalalel. Mahalalel jol mmon a Kainan.
42003038	Kainan jol mmon no Enos. Enos jol mmon a Set. Set jol mmon no Adam. Adam jol mmon Esowo.
42004001	Eji Jisos lohngo go Jodan, jo kehnge, Etingi Etohko rur-e go ege atahng. Etingi Etohko kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go elka emahng.
42004002	Owo nnehm gar-e no nfung atahl abal. Afung nyao kpee á tikem li ejumjum. Eji afung nyao ma biingi, njal kehm-e yame.
42004003	Owo nnehm kehm-e tongo re, “A l'jol Mmon Esowo, tong eltal nia siingi ebred.”
42004004	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Abred nya nya sang wahnge nne kpo kpin. Á kpo tob bel elkpin go ellum Esowo anehng anehng.’ ”
42004005	Nnehm kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go nwahrewahre ewong, ko mmongare ana no nne bahke jehbe akpakamahr, tib-e ajahbe nya li go njini kpee,
42004006	kehm-e tongo re, “M bahk-a kake nsahm kpee nyi a bahke jo fili ajahbe nyao, fere ka-a ellub ebo. Tibre bobyake kpee kak-m go ebo, m bahke fere faake ka nne no kor-m no.
42004007	A l'soro j'jamme alahng kak-m, nsol nyia kpee bahke fere jol ny'nya.”
42004008	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Kak Esowo Ntul ewa. Ye ntahngtahng wo a bahk-e loko.’ ”
42004009	Nnehm kehm-e koko tahm a ne go Jerusalem, song rod-e kunu go elkong etahk Esowo, kehm-e tongo re, “A l'fere jol Mmon Esowo, yehb gbo ndi.
42004010	Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Esowo bahke tongo enjel enye, bo baab-a.’
42004011	Edi nwer Esowo jehko kpe bung re, ‘Bo bahk-a gbiiri go bo abo, eji a l'k'ba jahre akpade go eltal.’ ”
42004012	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Ka gare Esowo Ntul ewa.’ ”
42004013	Eji nnehm m-e gare mal, á kehm-e tohko yake mmongare ntiil.
42004014	Jisos kehm feere a nsahm Etingi Etohko, ba rehng go Galili. Owo elgahm ene kehm yeere ejang ejahbe jio kpee.
42004015	Á jo tibi go bo a ntahk ero. Ane kpee jo tehk-e tehk.
42004016	Jisos kehm jeke go Nasaret, edi ji bo le-e no, á gbal. Efung Esabat á kehm jeke go etahk ero ana á jo kono ellimi. Á kehm mehle yiimi re á lung edi nwer Esowo.
42004017	Bo kehm-e kake nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya. Eji á ma lennge nwer nyio, á kehm song nyehn edi ji bo nyono re,
42004018	“Etohko ji Ntul Esowo jia, kun-m. Á ma-m tum re me n song tiingi etib bi bahke wahnge aneb agbekobo for, awakamahr nyehn. Á ma-m tum re me n song tahre ane ba kp'nyehne erem yehke bo go afemfem nya bo wob no,
42004019	fere tong ane re, Elya eyebatahng ni Ntul Esowo ebrehng.”
42004020	Eji á ma bulu nwer nyio, á kehm feere a nyi ka nlokeltum, kehm jehke. Ane kpee ba woomo go ekp'kpa ero jio jo seeng-e na seenge too.
42004021	Owo á kehm kehme elbungu a bo re, “Edi nwer Esowo jia ebjol go etingitingi lela, eji ḿ ma wuk.”
42004022	Owo ane kpee kehm-e kehme eltehke. Anoobo alum nya lohng-e go nnyo jo kpo bo esi sehng. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, mmon a Josef sang aa?”
42004023	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahk-m tubu elgan nia re, ‘Nlimakahm, lim elna, wo nob me!’ fere bung re, ‘Nsol nyi e ma wuk re, woblim go Kapenium, tob lim a fvfo go ega ejahbe!’ ”
42004024	Owo Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nnyehnamahr awohng awohng limm, no bo kpo ko-e go ege ejahbe.
42004025	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Akalebun jolo gbalee go Israel ngare nyi Elaija, eji elahb ki kpe na go nnya era kunu ejang, owo egburu njal kehm bake go ndi nyio kpee.
42004026	Jol Esowo tumem Elaija tv nkalebun awohng awohng gona, sehngem nkalebun awohng no jolo go Sarefat ji Saidon wo, Esowo tumu Elaija tv-e.
42004027	“Aneb abili gbalee ba jolo go Israel ngare nyi nnyehnamahr Elisa. Bo, nne awohng awohng nobem abili enye, sehngem Neman ji jolo nne a Siria wo wo nobo.”
42004028	Eji ane ba woomo ekp'kpa ero jio wuku ano, atahng kehm rake bo tete.
42004029	Bo kehm-e tohngo yehke go ejahbe jio, song rehng a ne go nkpe ewong nyi bo si ejahbe jio kunu re bo gbul-e, á fooro go egbunggbung ewong ba gbo.
42004030	Á fere jene na, ba sehng go elka ane tahm eje.
42004031	Owo Jisos kehm tahme, song rehng go Kapenium ji li go Galili, song kehme ane tib efung Esabat.
42004032	Jo kpo bo esi tib go ege eltibi ni á jo tib bo. Tibre alum nya á jo bung, á jo bungu ana nne no kpi nsahm.
42004033	Nne jolo o ekp'kpa ero jio, no bele esabsab etohko go ege atahng. Á kehm rabe tiim re,
42004034	“Yak-m! E li go nfem anyi awahr a na, Jisos ji Nasaret? A ba re wo ba ranng-ra? N kp'kahne nne no a li no. A li mbarebara nne Esowo!”
42004035	Owo Jisos kehm-e nyame re, “Behl ewok, wo lohng-e song!” Ebi etohko jio kehm yehke nne noo tub ndi go elka ane bao, soro lohng-e. Ejumjum we á limem.
42004036	Kehm kehme nne awohng awohng esi kpo, bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elkohn alum anya a, nya á kpo bung go nsahm, tong asabsab atohko, bo jo lohng?”
42004037	Owo elgahm ni Jisos kehm yeere, rehng ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji jolo ejang bio.
42004038	Jisos kehm lohngo ekp'kpa ero jio, song rehng go etahk Saimon. Nnyehn nkal a Saimon, arumbum nyed-e sehng. Bo kehm-e gboongo ka-e.
42004039	Á kehm tahme song yiimi go ege a nkpe edilnong, kehm nyame arumbum nyao, nnenkal noo soro nob, kehm mehle tvtv, soro kehme bo loko.
42004040	Eji njul yahke ba ellahme, ane kpee ba bele aneb ayam, ba jo yam ajoobo ayam tvv, kehm koko bo, ba goji Jisos. Á kehm kunu bo abo, go nne awohng awohng, bo nob ane kpee.
42004041	Abi atohko tob lohngo ane gbalee, jo biingi tiim, fere jo bung re, “Wo wo li Mmon no Esowo!” Jisos jo nyame bo. Á joom taame re bo bung. Tibre bo jo kahne kpee re á li Mesaya.
42004042	Efungfu behre behre Jisos kehm tahme ejahbe jio, song rehng go edi ji li soom. Ane kehm-e kehme elsebe. Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm jo nok mbang anyehng anyehng, eji á l'k'tahm bo sa.
42004043	Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “M bahke tob tiingi nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo tong ajahbe nyako fvfo. Tibre ana wo wahnge Esowo tum-m no.”
42004044	Owo á kehm tahme, jo song bung alum Esowo go ntahk ero nyi jolo go Judea.
42005001	Efung abehng eji Jisos yiimi go nkpe eto nyi Genesaret, ane kehm ba rur, jo fahd-e tv re bo wuk alum Esowo.
42005002	Owo á kehm nyehne agbang na abal go elga. Abasahre nsahre eblohng go agbang nyao, song kehme arim ebo faare.
42005003	Á kehm song yel egbang abehng bi jolo bi Saimon, kehm-e tongo re, á reenge egbang feere go elka alahb. Owo á kehm jehke go egbang, jo tib ane bao.
42005004	Eji á ma bung mal, owo á kehm tongo Saimon re, “Reenge egbang, song rehng edi ji kp'rahbe, wahn yake arim enyahne kak o, bob nsahre.”
42005005	Owo Saimon kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, wahr eblim eltum atv atv maa ana tete, jol ejumjum e tikem bob. Wo, eji a ma bung ano, m bahke yake erim ebame kak.”
42005006	Eji bo ma lim ano, bo kehm bobo nsahre gbalee, erim kehm kehme elyare.
42005007	Owo bo kehm soro kehme atem ba woomo go egbang behko mahk re bo ba tob bo. Bo kehm bake, ba yehke nsahre nyio, ruru agbang abal abal, fere jol are agbang yahke ter.
42005008	Eji Saimon Pita nyehne ano, á kehm gboko jamme Jisos alahng, kehm bungu re, “Ntul, jeere song, tibre me nne abiafem wo.”
42005009	Tibre nkpokosi nyio jo kpo-e esi sehng, a ane bako kpee ba tob jolo a ne o, tib go elkohn nsahre nyi bo bobo no.
42005010	Ano wo fvfo, Jems a Jon ba jolo abon Sibidi, bo ji jo lim eltum ano a Pita, jo tob kpo bo esi. Owo Jisos kehm tongo Saimon re, “Ka kpe fahl! Bomo anv asongo, a bahke fere jo bim ane.”
42005011	Eji bo ma tohng agbang ebo kunu egbuk, bo kehm tahme ejum ajehng ajehng sa, tahm toono Jisos.
42005012	Efung abehng eji Jisos jolo ejahbe ajehng, nne jolo ona, no abili saab-e na saabe go ngubjing. Á nyehne kan Jisos, á kehm gboko, kohk esamahr ebe go ndi, fere jo gboong-e re, “Ntul, l'fere kor-a, a li-m ma lim, n nob.”
42005013	Jisos kehm soro tanne ebo ebe, koor-e, kehm bungu re, “Kor-m kor. Wobnob!” Tvtv o á kehm soro nob abili nyao.
42005014	Owo Jisos kehm-e rehke re, á k'tong nne ne, fere tong-e re, “Song, wo song kpiri nlimajom, fere tib-e elna, fere lim njom ana Moses tongo no, tib eji a ma nob, eji l'jol ejum ntianse ka bo.”
42005015	Tvtv o elgahm ni Jisos kpe yeere na budu. Nlong ane gbalee kehm jo kam, jo ba re bo jo wuk-e, fere jo nob ayam ebo.
42005016	Jisos jo tahme, song rehng edi nya li soom, song kak ero.
42005017	Efung abehng eji Jisos jo tib, Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm tob ji ona, ba lohngo go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji li go Galili, a Judea, fere tob lohng go Jerusalem ba. Nsahm nyi Esowo jolo a Jisos ona re á ko lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
42005018	Ane kehm koko mbanne ba a ne, nyi bo sol-e go edilnong. Bo jo gare re bo yel a ne go ekp'kpa, song bum-e go alata Jisos.
42005019	Bo tingem mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke sehnge a ne tib ellong ane bao. Owo bo kehm wahre a ne go ero etahk, kehm song lahm elbulu, kehm tahre alehke nya bo kanne go edilnong jio tete ba rehng go elka ane bao, edi ji Jisos jolo no.
42005020	Eji Jisos nyehne ana bo ma taame tv-e, owo á kehm bungu re, “Mbi, abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”
42005021	At'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, ye elkohn nne awo, no kp'bungu ab'bi alum ana nyaa tob Esowo? Nne awo bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem? Esowo ntahngtahng bi bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem!”
42005022	Eji Jisos ma seb kahn ana bo jo tir, owo á kehm faange bo re, “Elkohn ntir anyi ń kp'tiri go egahna ntim?
42005023	Jen ji ga riidi, n l'tong nne noa re, ‘Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n l'tong-e re, ‘Mehl yiimi, wo jen?’
42005024	M bahk-n tibi re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia, nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.” Owo á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “N kp-a tongo re, wo tahm, rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
42005025	Tvtv o nne noo kehm soro mehl yiimi go esamahr ane bao, rod edilnong ji á noongo no, tahm eje kehnge, jo tehk Esowo asongo.
42005026	Ane bao kpee kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk afahlafahle, fere jo bung re, “Wahr ebnyehn akpokosi nsol lela.”
42005027	Eji ma jol ano, Jisos kehm tahme, song nyehn nkokatak no bo jo lung-e re Livai jehk go ekp'kpa etak. Á kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
42005028	Livai kehm tahme ejum ajehng ajehng sa, tahm toon-e.
42005029	Owo Livai kehm limi egburu elkak go ege etahk ka Jisos. Abakokatak gbalee tob jolo o, a ane bako fvfo, jo li nsol abo.
42005030	Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm ba woomo go ellong Farisis kehm kehme elmemme tob abat'toono Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpo li nsol alehke a abakokatak, go aneb ab'bi?”
42005031	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem ane ba kp'yame ba kp'sebe.
42005032	M baam re me m ba lung anoobo ane, bo gbo ndon. M ba re me m ba lung abi ane.”
42005033	Egom ane bandiki kehm ba bahb Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abat'toono Jon, a ba Farisis kpo bade elbo njal nkpel a nkpele, fere jo kak ero, abat'toono eba kpo li na nsol, fere jo w'wo?”
42005034	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ḿ bahke limi renan, kehm tongo ane ba bo ma tiingi bo elkak elbal re bo ji njal ngare nyi nlumanne kpeke li a bo?
42005035	Ngare kp'bake nyi bo bahke yehke nlumanne go bo ellong tahm a ne. Ngare nyio nyi bo bahke kehme elbo njal bade.”
42005036	Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan re, “Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe, song baade nk'kula mbomo. Á l'lim ano, edi ji bo ko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe baade, bahke kpe kv na budu. Ejang mbomo nfenfe nehm fuumu a nk'kula mbomo.
42005037	“Nnene limm fvfo, no bahke yaange amahm ma kp'fahle kak go nk'kohko eyahbe. Á l'lim ano, amahm mao ma kp'fahle bahke limi eyahbe jio bahnge, amahm sale, eyahbe rannge kpee.
42005038	Amahm ma kp'fahle, bo bahke jo kak go eyahbe nfenfe.
42005039	Nnene limm, no kpo wo ak'kulu amahm, amahm ma kp'fahle kehm-e kpe kor. Á bahke bungu re, ‘Ak'kulu amahm ma ga nob.’ ”
42006001	Efung Esabat abehng eji Jisos jo jen go emahng ji bo bahme nkohl, owo abat'toono ebe kehm jo laade nkohl, fere monngo amohk tv go arahn, jo li.
42006002	Owo egom Farisi jindiki kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'limi ejum ji ntahm enyahre sahde re, nne k'jo lim efung Esabat?”
42006003	Jisos kehm faange re, “Ń ka tiki lung bade ana Devid limi no ngare nyi njal yam-e no, a ane ebea?
42006004	Á yele ekp'kpa Esowo, song rod abred nya bo limi bum go esamahr Esowo li, fere tob ka ane ebe ba jolo a ne, bo li, nya ki fuumu re nne awohng awohng li, sehngem abalimajom ba ba jo li.”
42006005	Owo Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
42006006	Efung Esabat bi Jisos kpe je go etahk ero song tib, nne awohng jolo o, no eboblum ebe lohngo no.
42006007	At'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi, bo jo baab-e, joare á bahke limi nne awohng awohng, á nob efung Esabat.
42006008	Jisos k'kahn ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm tongo nne no ebo ebe lohngo no re, “Ba, wo ba yiimi ana!” Nne noo kehm mehle yiimi, jen song yiimi ona.
42006009	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “N kp-n bahbe re, Anv, ntahm enyahre bungu re wahr jo lim jen efung Esabat, wahr jo kak na nne ebo, afi wahr jo rannge na? Wahr jo tahre elkpin nne, afi wahr jo rannge elkpin nne?”
42006010	Eji á ma seenge bo, song jahm, owo á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!” Á kehm limi ano. Ebo ebe kehm feere jol ana behko jang jang.
42006011	Atahng kehm rake bo tete, bo kehm kehme eltoobo bo bo, ji bo bahke limi Jisos.
42006012	Ngare nyio Jisos kehm tahme go ewong re á song kak ero. Owo á kange no, jo kak ero ka Esowo.
42006013	Eji efungfu ma se, á kehm lungu abat'toono ebe tv elne, kehm jake ewubu ane abal, ba á jo lung bo re abatiingetib.
42006014	A wo li ewubu ane abal ba á yehke no. Saimon ji Jisos ka-e mbing nyehko re Pita, a Andru mmonannyehn Pita, go Jems, Jon, Filip, Batolomi,
42006015	Matiu, Tomos, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom,
42006016	go Judas ji mmon a Jems, a Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.
42006017	Eji Jisos jo badde a bo go ewong, á kehm ba yiimi edi ji li bale bale, a ellong abat'toono ebe gbalee, a ellong ane tvv, ba lohngo go Judea kpee, fere lohng go Jerusalem, a ba lohng go nkpe agburu aya, ejang bi Taya, a Saidon. Bo ba re bo ba wuk-e, fere nob ayam ebo.
42006018	Ane ba asabsab atohko jo gbiingi bo, bo nobo ane kpee.
42006019	Ellong ane bao kpee jo sebe re, bo koor-e, tibre nsahm jo lohng-e lohng. Á fere lim bo, bo nob ane kpee.
42006020	Owo Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe seenge abat'toono ebe, kehm bungu re, “Elfuulu li ka wahn akpak, tibre etul bi Esowo b'bahne bi.
42006021	“Elfuulu li ka wahn ji njal kp-n yame anv, tibre ḿ bahke wohngo. “Elfuulu li ka wahn ji kp'lingi anv, tibre ḿ bahke wolo asol.
42006022	“Elfuulu li ka wahn, ane l'ko-n ekv tib go esi ji Mmon no nne, fere yab a nahne, jo su-n, fere jo bung re, wahn abi ane ba.
42006023	“Jo belen eyebatahng, nsol ana nyio l'lim, wahn fere jo siiki. Tibre egburu eltuuru enahne nia, nong-n go ejahbetul Esowo. Tibre nsol ny'nehm ona nyi babnde ebo jo lim abanyehnamahr Esowo.
42006024	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn afang ane, tibre wahn ebbel ejum ekakeltim ejahne.
42006025	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn ji kp'wohngo anv, tibre ḿ bahke jene njal njal. “Eyuu a nahne, wahn ji kp'wolo anv, tibre ḿ bahke jehke ndon ndon, fere jo ling.
42006026	“Eyuu a nahne, ane kpee l'jo tehk-n. Tibre ano wo babnde ebo tob jo tehk akimfahnge abanyehnamahr.
42006027	“N kp-n tongo wahn ji kp'wuungu atung re, Anebekv ebahne jo kor-n. Jo limen nnoobo ka ane ba kpo ko-n ekv.
42006028	Jo biren nnoobo tv ane ba kpo su-n. Jo kaken ero ka ane ba kpo lim-n ebi.
42006029	Nne no l'rum-a elkpal, tob sennge ejang behko ka-e fvfo, á kpe-a rum. Nne no l'taare nsubu enya, á l'kpe ba ewobo eja taare, tob yake ka-e.
42006030	Jo ka nne awohng awohng ejum, no bahb-a no. Nne no l'taare ejum eja, k-e tong re á feere a ji.
42006031	“Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń kp'sebe re ane jo lim ka-n, wahn fvfo, tob jo limen ano ka bo.
42006032	Ane ba ń kpo kor bo, bo l'jo kor-n, eltuuru ani Esowo bahk-n tuuru? Tibre ane ba, aneb abiafem kpo kor bo, bo ba fvfo kpo tob kor aneb abiafem.
42006033	Ń l'jo lim nnoobo ka ane ba kpo lim nnoobo ka-n, eltuuru ani ḿ bahke bele? Tibre aneb abiafem kpo tob lim ano.
42006034	Ń l'jo bong ane akpohko, ba ń tiri re bo bahke tob bong-n, eltuuru ani ḿ bahke bele? Tibre aneb abiafem kpo bong aneb abiafem, eji bo l'tob lim jang jang ka bo.
42006035	“Nong, anebekv ebahne jo kor-n, wahn jo lim nnoobo. Jo bongen ane akpohko, wahn k'jo kunu ekpu re bo feere a nya ka-n. Ń l'lim ano, eltuuru enahne bahke gbale. Owo ḿ bahke kehm jolo abon ba Esowo bi gbale sehng. Tibre Esowo kpo lim nnoobo ka ane ba kil jo kak saam, fere tob lim nnoobo ka abi ane.
42006036	“Nong, ane jo fil-n ndon, ana Nso ejahne, ane kpo fil-e ndon.”
42006037	“Kana jo lam ane bako, Esowo wahn nehm tob lam. Kana jo tong ane re, bobli ebi, Esowo wahn nehm tob tong re, wahn ebli ebi. Jo tahmen ka ane, Esowo bahke tob tahm ka-n.
42006038	Jo kaan, Esowo bahk-n tob ka. Á bahke gare go ebam ji nno a nno, gbehke, fere so, kak, rur w'wohng, fere yaange kak egahne abam. Ana ń gare no ka, ano wo fvfo Esowo bahke tob gare ka-n.”
42006039	Jisos kehm tob tub bo elgan re, “Anv, nwakamahr a nne bahke ma tib nwakamahr nyehko mbanga? Bo ane abal abal nehm song gbo yel go elbinga?
42006040	“Nne no kp'kpili kpehme gbal sehnge nt'tibi ewe. Nne awohng awohng no l'kpili mal, á bahke jolo ana nt'tibi ewe.
42006041	“Jen ji wahnge a kp'seenge mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr, a kil eltiri bada nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr?
42006042	A bahke limi renan, kehm tongo mmonanne, re, ‘Nong, me n yehk-a mmolsahk no wob-a go elmahr,’ eji wofono antahng kil nyehne nkporti nyi wob-a go elmahr? Wobnob tane! Tohko gbo mbang yehke nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr, eji a l'mal nyehn, yehke mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr.
42006043	“Tibre eti ji nno ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo kab asabsab akab. Jol fvfo, esabsab eti ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo kab anoobo akab.
42006044	Tibre eti ajehng ajehng, bo kpo liing-e go ege akab. Nnene limm, no kpo bong akab efig go asokonso, fere bong akab avain go egab.
42006045	“Nsol afang nyi wob nnooba nne go ege eltim, nyi nyi á kpo yehke, lohng a nyi. Ab'bi nsol nya wob ebi nne go ege eltim, nya nya á kpo yehke, lohng a nya. Tibre ji ma rur nne go eltim, ji ji kpo lohng-e go nnyo.
42006046	“Jen ji wahnge ń kpo lung-m re, ‘Ntul, Ntul!’ ń kil jo lim nsol nyi n kpo tong-n re wahn lim?
42006047	“Nne awohng awohng no l'ba go egame, ba wuk alum enyame, fere jo lim, m bahk-n tibi elkohn nne no á li no.
42006048	Á li ana nne no si etahk. Á kpa r'rahbe tete rehng go ekpartal, kehm bumu nnahb ekahme enye o. Eji nnyel yele no, alahb jo gbul etahk jio, tikem ma gbehke egbehkegbehke, tibre nnahb ekahme nyio kuumu go ekpartal.
42006049	“Nne no l'wuk alum enyame, fere ten go ellimi, á li ana nne no si na si etahk eje kunu go ndi, k'bum nnahb ekahme. Eji alahb jo gbul etahk jio, kehm soro gbo kpee r'rere r'rere.”
42007001	Eji Jisos ma bung nsol nyia kpee mal, tong ane bao, á kehm tahme go Kapenium.
42007002	Ntubesi a nsoja awohng jolo o, no bele nlokeltum no jo sahb kor-e kor. Nlokeltum ewe noo jo yame, are á bahke kpoko.
42007003	Eji ntubesi a nsoja noo wuku bada Jisos, á kehm tumu anebkul Jus bandiki re bo song gboong-e, á ba lim nlokeltum ewe nob.
42007004	Eji bo ba rehng goji Jisos, bo kehm sahb gboong-e gboongo re, “Ntubesi noo, f'fuumu re wo kak-e ebo.
42007005	Tibre ejahbe ejahre kpo kor-e sehng. Yebsi etahk ero ka-r.”
42007006	Owo Jisos kehm tahme toono bo. Eji á ma kabbe etahk jio, ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm tumu ate ebe tv-e. Bo kehm-e song tong re, “Ntubesi re, wo k'kpe gbiingi elna mbol mbol, are ye fuumem re wo song yel ege ekp'kpa.
42007007	Jol á fuumem re á ba go ega. Are, wo lub bung ellum ellum, nlokeltum ewe bahke nobo.
42007008	Ntubesi re, á li nne no wob go elwo nne. Á tob kpi nsoja nyi tob wob-e go elwo. Á l'tong nne noko re, ‘Song!’ á tahm. Á l'tong nne noka re, ‘Ba!’ á ba. Á l'tong nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Lim ejum jia!’ á lim na lim.”
42007009	Jisos, esi kehm-e kpoko, eji á wuku ano. Á kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong ellong ane ba jo toon-e re, “N kp-n tongo re, Jol go Israel n ka tiki nyehn nne no kpi elkohn egburu eltaame ana nia.”
42007010	Eji ane ba ntubesi a nsoja noo tumu bo feere no, ba rehng ege etahk, bo ba nyehne nlokeltum noo ma lohko nob.
42007011	Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm tahme go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Nain. Abat'toono ebe gbalee, a ellong ane tvv ba toon-e no je.
42007012	Eji á ma kabbe eti mbu ji jolo ejahbe jio, ane ba solo nkvne kehm lohngo ejahbe jio abake. Nne no kpo no jolo mmon mmon awohng no nnenkal no jolo nkalebun. Ellong ane gbalee jolo a nnenkal noo o, ba lohngo ejahbe jio.
42007013	Eji Ntul a Jisos nyehn-e no, ndon kehm-e gbale go ege eltim tib nnenkal noo. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Ka kpe ling!”
42007014	Á kehm jeere, song kooro ekpa ji bo gbade nkvne. Aneblum ba sol-e no kehm yiimi. Jisos kehm bungu re, “Njangkun, n kp-a tongo re wo mehl!”
42007015	Nne no kpo no kehm soro mehl ji, kehm kehme elbungu. Jisos kehm-e jabbe, kak nnyehn go ebo.
42007016	Owo nne awohng awohng kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tehk Esowo re, “Egburu nnyehnamahr eblohng go egahre ellong.” Bo kpe bung re, “Esowo ebba re á ba tahre ane ebe.”
42007017	Eka jia bada Jisos kehm yeere go Judea kpee, a ajahbe nya jolo sennge Nain ka.
42007018	Abat'toono Jon kehm song tong-e nsol nyio kpee.
42007019	Jon kehm lungu abat'toono ebe na abal, tum bo tv Ntul a Jisos re bo song bahb-e re, “Wo wo li nne no kp'bake, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?”
42007020	Eji bo song kpiri Jisos, bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo ma-r tum tv-a re wahr ba bahb-a re, ‘Wo wo li nne no kp'bake, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?’ ”
42007021	Ngare nyio Jisos limi aneb ayam gbalee, bo nob go ajoobo ayam tvv, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke, tob lim awakamahr gbalee, bo nyehn.
42007022	Owo Jisos kehm faange ane ba Jon tumu no re, “Songen, wahn song tong Jon nsol nyi ḿ ma nyehn, fere w'wuk. Anv, awakamahr kp'nyehne, abanne ebtahm kp'jene, aneb abili kp'nobo, alakatung kp'wuku, akvne kp'nyahme go elkv. Akpak kp'wuku nnoobo etib.
42007023	“Elfuulu li ka nne no l'ki-m sel gbo.”
42007024	Eji ane ba Jon tumu bo ma feere fi, owo Jisos kehm bomo elbungu bada Jon, tong ellong ane bao re, “Ń jo lohngo je elka emahng re wahn song nyehn jen? Eljele ni nfeb kp'limi, kp'neenga?
42007025	Jen ji ń jo j'je re wahn song nyehn? Nne no liibi anoobo nsola? Etingitingi, elkohn ane ba kpo liibi ano, fere jo li ebno, bo kpo kono eljolo go ntahk atul.
42007026	Anv, ejum aji ń jo je re wahn song nyehn? Nnyehnamahra? “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, wahn ebnyehn nne no gbale sehnge nnyehnamahr.
42007027	Tibre Jon wo li nne no nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne re, “ ‘M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame re á gbo-a mbang, song tuungu mbang bum-a.’
42007028	“N kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng limm, no ma j'jol go njini nyia no gbale sehnge Jon. Wo, nne no sahb r'rede, no kun etul bi Esowo, á gbale sehnge ye.
42007029	“Ane kpee, a abakokatak ba wuk-e no, bo ba taame re, Esowo lohko li go etingitingi, tib eji bo ma bel ewohngalahb ji Jon.
42007030	“Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm t'ten ji Esowo toobo re á lim ka bo, eji ki kor bo re bo bel ewohngalahb jio ji Jon.
42007031	“Anv, m bahke koko ane ba li anv gara jen? Bo li renan?
42007032	Bo li ana abonse ba ma lohng song ji go elatahkgur kpi mbene lim. Egom jindiki tong egom jehko re, “ ‘Wahr ebwor afiri ka-n, ḿ bahnem. Wahr ebling aling, wahn tobem ling fvfo.’
42007033	Eji Jon ji nwohngalahb ba no, á joom li abred, fere jo wo amahm, ń jo tongo re, ‘Á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng.’
42007034	Wo anv, Mmon no nne ebba, kp'lehke, fere jo w'wo, ń fere jo bungu re, ‘Nyehnen nlehke ebno noa! Á li nwokamahm, a ntem no abakokatak, a ntem no aneb ab'bi.’
42007035	“Nne l'kpur nsol nyi aneb elkahne kpo lim, owo á bahke tob kahn ana elkahne li no.”
42007036	Nne a Farisi awohng kehm tiingi Jisos re á song li nsol a ne. Jisos kehm jeke go etahk nne a Farisi noo, song ji go ekp'kuru nsol alehke.
42007037	Nnenkal awohng jolo ejahbe jio, no jolo nne abiafem. Eji á sebe kahn re Jisos noa, kp'lehke nsol go etahk nne a Farisi noo, owo á kehm koko elom akehng tahm a ji,
42007038	song yiimi go njahm a Jisos, edi ji Jisos bumu akpade. Á jo l'ling, abonngo jo toongo wohngo Jisos go akpade. Owo á kehm koko alv esi enye dohk-e akpade, fere sod akpade enye, kehm yaange akehng mao, wohng-e go akpade.
42007039	Eji nne a Farisi no tiingi Jisos nyehne ano, á kehm bungu atahng atahng re, “Li re nne noa lohko li nnyehnamahr, kehn á jol kahne nne no nnenkal noo li no, no kp-e kooro abo, fere kahn elkohn elkpin ni á kpo lim, tibre á li nne abiafem.”
42007040	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Saimon, n kpi ejum ji n kp-a tongo.” Á kehm faange re, “Aa, nt'tibi, tong-m me!”
42007041	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ane abal jolo go, ba bele nne no kpo bong ane akpohko mbong. Nne noko bel-e mbong a mpon atahl awubu, noko bel-e mbong a mpon eltahl.
42007042	Eji bo ki bel ejumjum ji bo bahke koko gal mbong nyio, á kehm yake ka bo. Tong-m, go ellong ane abal baa, nne awo, nne noo bahk-e jo ga kor?”
42007043	Owo Saimon kehm faange re, “Me m bum re, nne no á ga yake ka-e wo.” Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Wobfaange go nseenge.”
42007044	Á kehm keebe seenge nnenkal noo, kehm bungu tong Saimon re, “Wobnyehn nnenkal noaa? Eji m ba yel go ega ekp'kpa, me a kaam alahb re men ru akpade. Wo, ye ma-m ru akpade go ege abonngo, fere ko alv enye dohk-m.
42007045	M-e a sodem nnyo. Jol ye ka tiki rahke akpade enyame go elsodo, eji n tiki yel a.
42007046	Akehng, m-e a kakem go esi, wo, ye ma-m wohngo akehng go akpade.
42007047	Owo wahnge n kp-a tongo re, Abiafem enye nya li gbalee, me n tahm ka-e, tibre á kpi egburu elkoro sehng.”
42007048	Á kehm tongo nnenkal noo re, “Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a.”
42007049	Ane bako ba tob ji ekp'kuru nsol alehke jio kehm kehme elbungu atahng atahng re, “Ebga! Anv, ye nne awo no kpo tahm ka nne go ege abiafem?”
42007050	Owo Jisos kehm tongo nnenkal noo re, “Song go eyebatahng! Eltaame ena ni ma-a tahre.”
42008001	Eji ma jol ano, Jisos kehm jo jen yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, jo bung alum Esowo, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo. Abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, jolo a ne o,
42008002	a anebkal bandiki ba á kame bo abi atohko yehke, fere lim bo nob ayam ebo. Meri ji bo jo lung-e re Meri ji lohng go Magdala tob woomo go ellong ane bao, ye ji á kam-e abi atohko na asehma yehke,
42008003	go Joanna nkal a Kusa, Kusa ji jolo ntubesi no alokeltum ba jolo go nlaaga Herod, go Susanna, a anebkal gbalee bako ba jo kak Jisos, a abat'toono ebe ebo go nsol nyi bo bele no.
42008004	Eji ellong ane gbalee kpi nlohngo nlohngo go ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, ba kono edi ajehng goji Jisos, owo á kehm tubu bo elgan nia re,
42008005	“Nne jolo go, no tahme re á song wohngo amohk nti enye go ege egbe. Eji á jo wohngo, nyandiki fooro gbo go mbang. Ane ba kadde sehng. Nruk ba suudu mele.
42008006	“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi jolo atal atal. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge, fere kpo, waange, tibre ndi waange sehng.
42008007	“Nyandiki gbo kuumu go elkob akpiri, mahng. Akpiri kehm gbale, bulu akohdo nti nyao.
42008008	“Nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kehm mahnge, gbal, kab akab, etasok ajehng ajehng nkab atahl alon alon.” Eji Jisos ma bung ano, á kehm rabe re, “Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
42008009	Abat'toono Jisos kehm-e bahbe ana elgan nia lohngo no.
42008010	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo ma-n ka elkahne nio ni nsol nyi li ka etul bi Esowo, nyi Esowo behre no. Egom ane bako kpo wuk ngaane ngaane, eji ‘bo l'seenge na seenge, k'nyehn, fere wuk na wuk, k'kahn ana lohngo no.’
42008011	“Ana wo elgan nia lohngo no. Amohk nti nyao, alum Esowo nya.
42008012	“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang lohngo ana ane ba kpo wuk alum Esowo. Nnehm ba yehke alum nyao go bo a ntim, eji bo l'k'taame, fere bel eltahre.
42008013	“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal lohngo ana ane ba l'wuk alum Esowo. Bo ko go eyebatahng. Alohk bo nehm bel. Bo kpo toono Esowo mmongare ntiil. Elgaare l'ba, bo yak-e.
42008014	“Amohk nti nya gbo kuumu elkob akpiri lohngo ana ane ba ma wuk alum Esowo. At'tiiri nya njini nyia, ekor afang, a ekor nsol nyi njini kpo lim, nsol nyi nyi kpo ra yel go bo a ntim, song bulu alum Esowo tv, akab nehm kul.
42008015	“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go nnooba ndi lohngo ana ane ba ma wuk alum Esowo, fere ko, kuuru go bo anoobo ntim nya enehm abehng abehng ki wob, soro asi, jo kab akab.
42008016	“Nnene limm, no ma ny'nyaale et'rekahng, rod ejeere konngo, jol rod, kak go nla ekp'kuru. Á bahke rodo na, kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu et'rekahng, eji ane ba kp'yele ekp'kpa l'jo nyehn ellennge nio.
42008017	Tibre ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo behre no, ji l'k'jol gbuul. Jol ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji li go mbiiri, ji l'k'lohng gbuul, ane fere kahn.
42008018	“Jo kunen ekpu ana ń kpo wuk nsol. Nne awohng awohng no kpi no, bo bahk-e kake na budu. Nne awohng awohng no ki kpi, jio ji á tiri no re á kp'kpi, bo bahk-e taare na.”
42008019	Nnyehn Jisos, a abonanyehn Jisos kehm bake. Bo tikem ma rehng goji Jisos tib ellong ane.
42008020	Owo ane bao kehm-e tongo re, “Nne, a abonane, bo baa, yim go elatahk kp'sebe re bo nyehn-a.”
42008021	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba l'wuk alum Esowo, fere jo lim, bo ba li babnnee, a abonanee.”
42008022	Efung abehng Jisos kehm yele go egbang, a abat'toono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Nong, wahr siiren rehng egbuk eto jehko.” Owo bo kehm soro tahm.
42008023	Eji bo jo fing asongo, Jisos kehm gboko ellu. Owo egburu nfeb kehm ba kehme ellimi go eto jio, alahb kehm kehme elkimi yel egbang, ba elruru. Bo jolo efin efin ngare nyio.
42008024	Owo abat'toono ebe kehm ba kpir-e, kehm-e nyahme re, “Nsoo, nsoo, e kp'tane na ao!” Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm nyame nfeb, a ebuku ji jo lim nsahm nsahm. Kehm rahke, edi naange soom.
42008025	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Anv, eltaame enahne n'na me?” Owo bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo kpo bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, ye elkohn nne awoe, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, wuk-e?”
42008026	Bo kehm song rehng go Gerasa ji jolo egbuk eto jehko. Galili egbuk jehka.
42008027	Eji Jisos wahre go egbuk, nne awohng lohngo go nla ejahbe, kehm ba wan-e. Nne noo bele abi atohko ekidi eblab. Á jo jene ebun ebun. Á joom kang etahk, á jo kange edi ji alahm akvne jolo no.
42008028	Á nyehne kan Jisos a, á kehm rabe, gbo-e go alata, fere jo bung wahre wahre re, “E li nfem anyi awahr a na, Jisos ji Mmon Esowo bi gbale sehng? N kp-a gboongo re, wo ki-m kak erem.”
42008029	Tibre Jisos tohko tong esabsab etohko jio re á lohng nne noo. Nkpel tvv etohko jio jo yehk-e. Jol eji ane jo kak-e kak agbekobo go abo, a akpade akpade, fere jo baab-e, á jo kiimi na agbekobo nyao, ebi etohko jio jo yehk-e kak go elka emahng.
42008030	Owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Mbing enya mee?” Á kehm faange re, “Egom.” Tibre abi atohko gbalee woom-e go atahng.
42008031	Abi atohko nyao kehm gboongo Jisos re, á k'tong bo, bo je song yel go nrabbe elbing.
42008032	Ngare nyio ellong akuk gbalee jo li nsol ona go nkpe ewong. Abi atohko nyao kehm gboongo Jisos re á lub yake bo, bo song yel akuk nyao go atahng. Jisos kehm yake bo.
42008033	Owo abi atohko nyao kehm lohngo nne noo, song yel akuk go atahng. Akuk nyao kpee kehm beke, song fooro egbunggbung aya, yel alahb tan.
42008034	Eji ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao nyehne ano, bo kehm beke, song tooro go etahk, a abon ajahbe ba jolo o.
42008035	Ane bao kehm lohngo ba re bo ba nyehn ejum ji ma lim. Eji bo ba kpiri Jisos, bo kehm tob ba nyehn nne no abi atohko lohng-e no, jehk go alata nya Jisos sange sange. Á ma kak nsol go ngubjing kpee. Owo bo kehm kehme elfahle.
42008036	Ane ba nyehne ana ngbokesahl nyio ma nob, bo kehm song tooro tong ane bako.
42008037	Ane kpee ba lene ejang bio bi Gerasa kehm gboongo Jisos re á tahm o song. Tibre bo jo fahle sehng. Owo Jisos kehm song yel egbang re á feere kehnge.
42008038	Nne no abi atohko lohng-e no kehm gboongo Jisos re, “Nong, me n jol a na!” Jisos kehm-e tongo re á song, fere bung re,
42008039	“Feere song kehnge, wo song tong ane ana ji Esowo ma lim ka-a.” Owo nne noo kehm tahme, song tooro tong ejahbe jio kpee bade egburu ejum ji Jisos ma lim ka-e.
42008040	Eji Jisos feere no, ba rehng egbuk eto jehka, ane kehm-e jo gbaame. Tibre bo ji, jo sik-e.
42008041	Owo nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, no bo jo lung-e re Jairus ji jolo ntubesi etahk ero, ba gbo jamme Jisos alahng, fere gboong-e re, á lub je go ege etahk.
42008042	Tibre á bele mmon mmon awohng no nkal, no ma kang ewubu a nnya ebal. Á noongo go emel elkv. Eji Jisos jo jen mbang mbang asongo, ellong ane jo fahd-e na fahd kak.
42008043	Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no alung jo lohng-e go nnahb go ewubu a nnya ebal. Á rannge akpohko nya á bele no kpee, ka abalimakahm. Jol nnene we tikem ma lim, á nob.
42008044	Owo á kehm jeere kohlo Jisos go njahm, fere koor-e go ege es'sili nsubu. Tvtv o, alung eme kehm soro kimi.
42008045	Jisos kehm bahbe re, “Nne awo ma-m kooro a?” Eji ane kpee ma ten, Pita kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, ellong ane ni kp'jene a na, ni ni kp-a sehme.”
42008046	Owo Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Nne ma-m kooro. Tibre me n kahn re, nsahm ma-m tele lohng.”
42008047	Eji nnenkal noo sebe kahn re, á nehm ma biiri, á kehm lohngo kp'kahme abake, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm tooro go esamahr ane kpee, ana ji wahnge á koor-e no, fere tong ana á soro nob ngare ny'nehm o.
42008048	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Mmon ewame, eltaame ena ni ma-a lim, a ma nob. Song go eyebatahng!”
42008049	Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, nne awohng kehm lohngo etahk ntubesi ero noo, ba tong-e re, “Mmon ewa ebkpo. Ka kpe gbiingi nt'tibi mbol mbol.”
42008050	Eji Jisos wuku ano, owo á kehm-e faange re, “Ka kpe fahl, taame na taame! Á bahke nobo.”
42008051	Eji á ba rehng etahk jio, á taamem re nnene kpe yel ekp'kpa, sehngem Pita, Jon, a Jems, go nde mmon, a nnyehn, bo ba, á taame no bo yel.
42008052	Nne awohng awohng jo ji ndon ndon, fere jo ling. Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Kana kpe ling, mmon noa ka kpo, á kp'lale na.”
42008053	Bo kehm-e elwolo, tibre bo jo kahne kpee re, mmon noo ebkpo.
42008054	Jisos kame kan ane bao yehke, á kehm jabbe mmon noo go ebo, kehm rabe re, “Mmon, mehl!”
42008055	Etohko mmon noo kehm soro feere ba yel-e, á soro mehl tvtv. Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, bo ka mmon noo nsol alehke, á li.
42008056	Nde, a nnyehn, kpo bo esi sehng. Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, bo k'tong nne awohng awohng ji ma lim.
42009001	Jisos kehm lungu abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tv edi ajehng, fere ka bo nsahm nyi bo bahke jo kam ane abi atohko kpee yehke, fere jo lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
42009002	Owo á kehm tumu bo re, bo song tiingi ane etib bi etul bi Esowo, fere lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
42009003	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eljen ni ḿ bahke tahme, kana rod ejum ajehng ajehng fili, ana ebti efilibo, a abam, a nsol alehke, a akpohko. Kana fili nsubu ebal ebal!
42009004	Etahk ajehng ajehng ji bo l'vvr-n, jolen o, tete wahn tahm ejahbe jio.
42009005	Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji tohk-n vvrv, tahmen ejahbe jio, wahn kum ebtohko go egahne akpade. Ebtohko bio bi bahke jolo ana ntianse nyi bahke jo bung tob bo.”
42009006	Abat'toono bao kehm tahme, jo yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, jo tiingi nnoobo etib, fere jo lim ane edi ajehng ajehng, bo nob ayam ebo.
42009007	Eji Herod ji jolo ntul no Galili wuku nsol kpee nyi jo lim, owo ala kehm jo teel-e, tibre ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb ebnyahme go elkv.”
42009008	Ane bandiki bungu re, “Elaija wo ma lohng ba.” Ane bandiki bungu re, “Nnyehnamahr awohng noko no jolo go nk'kula ngare wo ma feere ba jol go elkpin.”
42009009	Herod bungu re, “Jon, m m-e kim esi, wo anv, nne awo n kp'kpeke wuk elkohn nsol ana nyia bada ne?” Owo á kehm jo gare ana á bahke nyehne Jisos.
42009010	Eji abatiingetib ma feere, bo kehm ba tong Jisos ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ma lim. Á kehm koko bo bo, tahm a bo go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Betsaida.
42009011	Eji ane wuku ano, owo bo kehm-e toono. Á kehm gbaame bo, fere bung a bo bade etul bi Esowo. Ane ba jo yam, á lim bo, bo nob.
42009012	Ngare nyi njul yahke ba ellahme, owo abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal kehm bake ba tong-e re, “Tong ane baa, bo song go ajahbe nya li kpidi kpidi, a abon ajahbe bako, eji bo l'ting nsol alehke li, fere ting adi nyao bo bahke kange. Tibre tahm edi jia rehng go ajahbe ekidi kp'labe.”
42009013	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li.” Bo kehm faange re, “E kpi abon abred na alon, kunu abon nsahre na abal ba ba. Anv, a kp'sebe re wahr tahm song gunu nsol alehke, ba ka elkohn ellong ane ana niaa?”
42009014	Tibre aneblum ba jolo o, jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awubu (5,000). Owo Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Nong, ane baa ji ag'gabe ag'gabe, ellong anehng anehng jo jol ane atahl abal ane awubu.”
42009015	Abat'toono ebe kehm limi ano, ane bao kpee ji ndi.
42009016	Owo Jisos kehm rodo abon abred bao na alon, kunu abon nsahre abal, kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, kak Esowo saam, bakke, ka abat'toono ebe, eji bo l'song bak ellong ane bao. Bo kehm song bak bo.
42009017	Ane bao li kpee wohngo. Abat'toono ebe kehm taare erik ji ane bao li no sa, ruru ewubu ejeere ebbal.
42009018	Efung abehng bi Jisos jo kak ero antahng, abat'toono ebe kehm ba kpir-e. Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ane kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
42009019	Bo kehm faange re, “Ane bandiki kpo bung re, wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Ane bandiki re, wo Elaija wo. Ane bandiki re, nnyehnamahr awohng noko no jolo mahne mahne wo ma nyahme.”
42009020	Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?” Pita kehm faange re, “Wo li Mesaya nyi Esowo tum-a no.”
42009021	Jisos kehm rehke bo, fere bung a bo t'tahne re, bo k'tong nnene.
42009022	Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong abat'toono ebe re, “Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem gb'gbal. Anebkul nfam, atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm bahk-e tene, fere wul-e. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
42009023	Owo á kehm bungu tong ane kpee re, “Nne no l'seb re á toon-m, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje efung abehng abehng, jo toon-m.
42009024	Nne awohng awohng no kp'sebe re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no l'tane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
42009025	Nsehng anyi nne bahke lehke, jol afi á gbo afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane elkpin ene, afi á yake elne ka go?
42009026	Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'be ndon, ten-m, afi jolo alum enyame, fvfo, Mmon no nne bahke tob be-e ndon, á l'ba go ege ellub, a ellub ni Nde, a abarebare enjel.
42009027	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom jindiki ji yim a, nehm kpo, tete bo nyehn etul bi Esowo go amahr.”
42009028	Bomo ngare nyi Jisos bungu alum nyao, eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, owo á kehm rodo Pita, Jon, a Jems, wahr a bo go ewong re á song kak ero.
42009029	Eji á jo kak ero, esamahr ebe kehm yaange. Nsol nyi á kake no kehm bare, fere jo ny'nyahne.
42009030	Owo ane abal kehm soro lohng ba kehme elbungu a ne, noko jolo Moses, noko jol Elaija.
42009031	Bo ba go ellub ba bung a Jisos bade elkv ni á yahke ba elkpoko go Jerusalem, eji á l'gohro lim ji Esowo toobo no bum-e.
42009032	Wo gana, Bab Pita ebgbo ellu kp'lale. Eji bo ma nyahme, bo kehm nyehne Jisos a ellub ene, fere nyehn ane abal ba yiimi a ne ona.
42009033	Eji ane bao yahke tahm, owo Pita kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nsoo, n'nob re wahr jol a. Nong, wahr si nkpatahk era, behko b'ba, behko bi Moses, behko bi Elaija.” Jol á kahnem ji á jo b'bung.
42009034	Eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, ekparesemsem kehm tahle, ba bulu bo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle, eji bo woomo go ekparesemsem.
42009035	Bo kehm wuku ellum go atahng ekparesemsem re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame, jo wuken ye!”
42009036	Eji ellum nio ma mal, bo nyehne Jisos ntahngtahng. Bo belle na belle. Ngare nyio bo tikem tong nne awohng awohng ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo nyehne no.
42009037	Etoono efung behko eji bo ma badde go ewong, ellong ane tvv kehm ba kpiri Jisos.
42009038	Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm rabe re, “Nt'tibi, n kpa gboongo! Nyehn mmon ewame ana! Ye ntahngtahng wo n kpi-e no.
42009039	Ebi etohko kpo yehk-e. Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi á l'yehk-e, á soro biingi tvtv, fere sok-e, tete nfahl jo tub-e nnyo, fere jo jahr-e. Kpo riidi kehm-e yake abo.
42009040	Me n gboongo abat'toono eba re bo kam-e yehke. Bo maam lim.”
42009041	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Jen ji wahnge wahn ane ba li anv kil taame? Ń kpo fere soodo! Anv, m bahke kange renan a nahne, fere jo tib-n, ń kehm kahne? Ko mmon ewa ba a ne!”
42009042	Eji mmon noo jo jen abake, ebi etohko jio kehm-e soro yehke tub go ndi, á soro gbo ngboko. Owo Jisos kehm nyame esabsab etohko jio, fere lim mmon noo, á nob, fere yak-e ka nde.
42009043	Ane kpee kehm kpoko bo esi, eji bo nyehne egburu nsahm nyi Esowo. Eji kpi nkpoko nkpoko ane bao kpee esi bade ejum ajehng ajehng ji Jisos ma lim, owo á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re,
42009044	“Wuken alum nyaa, wahn kak go egahna ntim! Tibre Mmon no nne, bo yahk-e ba elyake kak ane go abo.”
42009045	Bo kahnem ana alum nyao lohngo no. Tibre á lenngem bo, eji bo l'k'kahn ana lohngo no. Bo jo f'fahl a ye bahb ana alum nyao lohngo no.
42009046	Abat'toono Jisos kehm kehme nfaabe lim bada nne no ga gbal go bo ellong.
42009047	Eji Jisos sebe kahn ji bo jo tir go bo a ntim, owo á kehm koko mmonse, á ba yiimi kohl-e,
42009048	kehm tongo bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'ko mmonse ana noa tib go egama mbing, á ko me. Nne no l'ko me, á ko nne no tum-m no. Tibre nne no l'ga rede go egahne ellong, ye wo li nj'joka nne.”
42009049	Jon kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, wahr ebnyehn nne no kp'kame ane abi atohko yehke go ega mbing. E m-e sahde, tibre wa á kpehme toono ana wahr.”
42009050	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Kana ye kpe sahde, tibre nne no tohk-n ko ekv, ye nne ewahne wo.”
42009051	Eji afung nya bo bahke rodo Jisos tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo ma kabbe, á kehm bobo eltim ene re á tahm go Jerusalem.
42009052	Á kehm tumu ane, bo gbo-e mbang, song rehng go ejahbe Samaria ajehng re bo song toobo nsol bum-e.
42009053	Ane ba jolo ona we koom, tibre bo kahne kpee re, á jo tahme go Jerusalem.
42009054	Eji abat'toono ebe Jems, a Jon nyehne ano, owo bo kehm bahbe re, “Ntul, anv, a kp'sebe re wahr biri agun lohng go ejahbetul Esowo tv boa, ana Elaija limi noa?”
42009055	Owo Jisos kehm keebe, kehm nyame bo re, “Anv, ń nehme kahn elkohn etohko ji ń kpi noa?”
42009056	“Tibre Mmon no nne baam re á ba rannge elkpin ane, á ba na re ane bel eltahre.” Owo bo kehm sehnge, song rehng ejahbe jehko.
42009057	Eji bo jo jen go mbang asongo, nne awohng kehm tongo Jisos re, “M bahk-a toono, je edi ajehng ajehng ji a fi no.”
42009058	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Akpangang kpi abing, nruk kpi ntahk. Wo, Mmon no nne, edi ellohko esi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.”
42009059	Owo Jisos kehm tongo nne noko re, “Tahm toon-m!” Á kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, nong me n tohko gbo mbang song kpa nsoo kak.”
42009060	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nong, akvne kpa akvne ebo kak. Wo, song, wo song tiingi etib bio bi etul bi Esowo.”
42009061	Owo nne noko kehm kpe bung re, “Ntul, m bahk-a toono. Nong, me n tohko gbo mbang song tong ane ebame re me n fio.”
42009062	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng no ma rod elu eje, bom egbe abahme, fere jo keebe go njahm, á kpeem fuumu re á kuumu etul bi Esowo.”
42010001	Eji ma jol ano, owo Jisos kehm yehke ane atahl ara ane awubu bako, tum bo ane abal abal re, bo gbo-e mbang song rehng ejahbe ajehng ajehng, a edi ajehng ajehng ji yefono antahng yahke ba eljeke.
42010002	Tib á tongo bo re, “Egbe ji elkpake jia gbalee. Abalimeltum li ntiil. Owo fvfo nobo re wahn gboongo nfono egbe, á tum abalimeltum tv go ege egbe, bo song kpa.
42010003	Songen, n kp-n tumu ana abon ejoro re wahn song go ellong agabe.
42010004	Kana fili akpohko, a abam! Kana kak akpaketa! Kana yange, kak nne awohng awohng nnyo go mbang!
42010005	“Etahk ajehng ajehng ji ń l'yange, jo kaken aneb etahk bao nnyo re, ‘Nong, elkoono jol etahk jia!’
42010006	Nne l'fere jol o, no kp'sebe elkoono, elkoono enahne bahke jolo a ne, tohko jol ano elkoono enahne bahke feere ba tob-n.
42010007	Jolen etahk j'nehm ona, wahn jo li, fere jo wo ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo l'ka-n. Tibre nlokeltum f'fuumu re á bel eltuuru ene. Kana jo yaange ntahk nyindiki jol!
42010008	“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń l'je, bo l'vvr-n, jo liin ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ka-n no.
42010009	Limen aneb ayam, bo nob ejahbe jio, wahn fere tong ane bao re, ‘Etul bi Esowo ma-n kabbe.’
42010010	“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń l'je, bo tohk-n vvrv, tahmen song go afak nya li ejahbe jio, wahn jo bung re,
42010011	‘Ebtohko bi ejahbe ejahne bi ma-r laake go egahre akpade, e kp'kumu tv-n. Ejum jia ji nobo re wahn kahn ji li re, Etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.’
42010012	“N kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a aneb Sodom ana bahke bibi a ejahbe jio.
42010013	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn aneb Korasin! Eyuu a nahne, wahn aneb Betsaida! Li re Taya abola Saidon nyehne akpokosi ana nya ḿ ma nyehn, kehn bobgbo ndon wuku wuku, kak agbajake nsol, fere ji go atong.
42010014	Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a aneb Taya, a Saidon ana bahke bibi a nahne!
42010015	“Wahn aneb Kapenium, bo ma-n mehl wahre rehng go ejahbetul Esowo. Bo bahke fere rod-n, ro kak go ellulagun.
42010016	“Nne no l'wuk-n, á wuku me. Nne no l'ten-n, á tene me. Nne no l'ten me, á tene nne no tum-m no.”
42010017	Ane atahl ara ane awubu bao feere kehnge go eyebatahng, fere jo bung re, “Ntul jol abi atohko wob-r na go elwo tib go ega mbing.”
42010018	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me n nyehn nnehm ma fooro go ejahbetul Esowo gbo ana emangedu.
42010019	M ma-n ka nsahm nyi ḿ bahke jo jade enyo, a enang go akpade, fere ka-n nsahm nyi gbale sehnge nsahm kpee nyi Nnekv kpi no. Ejumjum limm, ji bahk-n jo lim go mbang anyehng anyehng.
42010020	Kana jo geere tib abi atohko wob-n go elwo. Jo geeren, tibre abing enyahne, bobnyon go ejahbetul Esowo.”
42010021	Ngare nyio Jisos kehm bele eyebatahng go etohko, kehm bungu re, “N kp-a tehke Nsoo, wo ji li Ntul no ejahbetul Esowo, a ndi, tibre a behre nsol nyia re akahnkahn ane, a aneb ngbere k'nyehn, a ma fere lennge ka abonbili. O nsoo, ano wo kor-a no go ega eltim.
42010022	Nsoo ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kak-m go ebo. Nnene nehme kahn nne no Mmon li no, sehngem Nsoo ntahngtahng wo kp'kahne. Nnene nehme tob kahn nne no Nsoo li no, sehngem Mmon wo kp'kahne, a nne no Mmon bahke lennge Nsoo ka-e.”
42010023	Jisos kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong abat'toono ebe ngare nyi bo jolo bo bo re, “Elfuulu li ka ane ba kp'nyehne nsol nyi wahn kp'nyehne.
42010024	Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Abanyehnamahr gbalee, a atul jo sebe re bo nyehn ji ń kp'nyehne, jol bo nyehnem. Bo jo sebe re bo wuk ji ń kp'wuku, jol bo tikem wuk.”
42010025	Nt'tibi no atahm awohng kehm lohngo ba re á ba gare Jisos. Owo á kehm bungu re, “Nt'tibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
42010026	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, jen ji bo nyono go atahm? Jen ji a kpo l'lung?”
42010027	Owo á kehm faange re, “Esowo Ntul ewa bahke jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, etohko etohko eja, eko eko eja, a ntir a ntir enya. Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.”
42010028	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wobfaange go nseenge. Jo lim ano, a bahke bele elkpin.”
42010029	Nt'tibi noo sebe re á tib re, ye etingi nne ji. Owo á kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Nne awo li nne ebjing ewame?”
42010030	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne awohng lohngo go Jerusalem, jo tahm go Jeriko. Eji á jo tahm, á kehm song kpiri awajv. Bo kehm-e yehke nsol nyi á kake no, fere dv-e, tab-e tub, á sa noongo o ana nkvne.
42010031	“Wo ana, ejum jo jol, nlimajom awohng jo sehnge mbang nyio. Eji á ba nyehn nne noo nong no, á kehm gbake eje, sehng nkpe a mbang nyehko tahm.
42010032	“Ano wo fvfo nne no kpo lim eltum go etahk Esowo kehm tob ba rehng edi jio, ba nyehn nne noo, tob gbake eje, sehng nkpe a mbang nyehko tahm eje.
42010033	“Nne a Samaria awohng no jo tahm eljen, kehm tob ba rehng eji nne noo. Eji á nyehn-e no, ndon kehm-e gbale go eltim.
42010034	Á kehm jeere, song kpir-e, fere kak-e akehng go alok, a alahb avain, gba-e, kehm-e rodo kunu go ege a nnyam, tahm a ne, song rehng go etahk ajehng. Owo á bohng-e no.
42010035	Etoono efung behko, á kehm yehke nsiring ewubu, ka nfontahk noo, kehm bungu re, ‘Jo kpur-e. Akpohko anyehng anyehng nya a l'kpe rannge budu, n l'ba, m bahke feere a nya ka-a.’
42010036	“Anv, ane ara baa, nne awo a tiri re, á jolo nne ebjing a nne no awajv dv-e no?”
42010037	Owo nt'tibi no atahm noo kehm faange re, “Nne no á fil-e ndon wo.” Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo tob song lim ano!”
42010038	Eji Jisos, a abat'toono ebe jo jen go mbang asongo, á kehm song rehng ejahbe ajehng. Owo nnenkal awohng no bo jo lung-e re Mata kehm-e vvrv, kak go etahk.
42010039	Mata bele mmonannyehn no bo jo lung-e re Meri, ji jii kohlo Ntul a Jisos, jo wuungu atung go ege alum.
42010040	Mata jo dehke na dehke, eji á jo lam nsol ka bo, tib eltum gbale sehng. Owo á kehm bake, ba tong Jisos re, “Ntul, anv wa nehme lub, eji n kp'loko eltum nia antahng, Meri kil-m ebo kaka? Tong-e, á ba kak-m ebo!”
42010041	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mata, a kp'tiiri nsol gbalee nyi kp-a gbiingi go eltim.
42010042	Ejum ajehng ji li ji tahne tahne. Meri wo ma yehke ji ga nob, ji bo l'ki-e ma tiki taare.”
42011001	Efung abehng Jisos jolo edi ajehng, jo kak ero. Eji á ma kak mal, nt'toono ewe awohng kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, tib-r ana e bahke jo kak ero, ana Jon tibi abat'toono ebe.”
42011002	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń l'kehme ero kak, jo bungen re, “Nsoo, nong, mbing enya jol saang! Yake etul eba ba!
42011003	Jo ka-r nsol alehke nyi l'biingi a nahre go efung efung.
42011004	Jo tahm ka-r go egahre abiafem! Tibre wahrfono antahng kpo tob tahm ka nne awohng awohng no lim-r abiafem. Ka lim, e yel go elgaare!”
42011005	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Li re nne awohng ewahne bahke jeke, song kpiri nte ewe nlum atv, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Mbi, bong-m abon abred na ara,
42011006	tibre nte ewame awohng eblohng ba ejen go egame etahk. Ejum alehke ajehng ajehng n kpimm, ji m bahk-e kake.’
42011007	“Fono, nne no wob ekp'kpa bahke faange re, ‘Ka ma kpe gbiinga, mbutahk li ta taa, abon ebame nong a name ga edilnonga, n nehm ma mehl ba ka-aa?’
42011008	“N kp-n tongo re, Jol afi á tahmem ba ka-e tib eji á li nte ewe, á bahke tahme ba ka-e ana á kp'sebe tib go elgbiingi ni á kp-e gbiingi.
42011009	“Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, wahn bahb, ḿ bahke bele. Seben, ḿ bahke nyehne. Kahden, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-n.
42011010	Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'bahb, á bahke bele. Nne no l'seb, á bahke nyehne. Nne no l'kahd, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-e.
42011011	“Li re nne awohng ewahne li nde nne, mmon ewe l'bahb-e re á ka-e ebred, anv, á bahk-e kake eltala? Afi á l'bahb-e re á ka-e nsahre, á bahke bobo nnyo ka-e?
42011012	Afi á l'bahb-e re á ka-e ejenkok, á bahk-e kake nnang?
42011013	Anv, wahn ji li na abi ane, ń l'mal ka abon ebahne nsol nyi nno, l'lim renan Nsoo no li go ejahbetul l'k'ka ane ba bahb-e no Etingi Etohko?”
42011014	Jisos kehm kame nne no jolo nkamme ebi etohko yehke. Eji ebi etohko jio ma lohng nne noo, nne noo kehm kehme elbungu. Owo kehm kpoko ellong ane bao esi.
42011015	Egom jindiki kehm kehme elbungu re, “Á kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke tib go nsahm nyi Belsebul ntul a nnehm ka-e no.”
42011016	Egom jehko jo sebe re bo gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e tongo re á tib elliingi ni bahke lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo.
42011017	Jisos k'kahn ntir atahng abo, owo á kehm tongo bo re, “Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji l'yab, jol ebo ebo, bahke rannge na, afi fere jol nlaaga, nlaaga nyio bahke tane.
42011018	Anv, ejahbetul ji nnehm l'yab, ejahbetul eje bahke limi renan kehm yiimi? Tibre wahn kpo bung re, n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm.
42011019	L'jol re n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm, anv, nsahm anyi abon ebahne kpo ko, jo kam bo yehke? Owo wahnge bo bahke jolo ane ba bahk-n lame.
42011020	“Wo, l'fere jol re n kp'kame ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi Esowo, lohngo re etul bi Esowo bi ma badde ba tob-n.
42011021	Etahntahn nne l'fili ntahme go ebo, jo baabe etahk eje, ejum ajehng ajehng eje nehm ran esi.
42011022	Etahntahn nne ji tahne sehng-e l'ba, ba nok a ne, fere ga-e, á bahk-e taare ntahme enye nyi á kpo tir re, nyi nyi bahk-e kake ebo, fere kpu nsol enye tahm a nyi song bak.
42011023	“Nne no ki li ka me, ye nnekv ewame wo. Nne no tohk-m tob elkpuku bum edi ajehng, á kp'fare na faade.
42011024	“Eji esabsab etohko ma lohng nne, á kpo song yannge go adi nya kp'waange, jo seb edi ji á bahke reke ekv. Á tohko ting edi ajehng ajehng, á bahke bungu re, ‘M bahke feere go egame etahk ji n tahme sa.’
42011025	“Á l'feere ba, ba nyehn, etahk jio bo ma feenge, fere tuungu ejum ajehng ajehng bum go nseenge.
42011026	Owo á bahke feere song ko atohko nyako na asehma nya sabe sehnge yefono. Bo feere ba lene o. Nne no bahke kpe sab na sehng ana wuku wuku á jolo no.”
42011027	Eji Jisos ma bung ano, nnenkal awohng go ellong ane bao kehm bungu re, “Elfuulu li a nnenkal no jel-a no, fere yab-a.”
42011028	Jisos kehm faange re, “Elfuulu ga li ka ane ba wuku alum Esowo, fere jo lim.”
42011029	Eji ellong ane jo kpe ba budu, Jisos kehm kehme elbungu re, “Ane ba li anv, abi ane ba. Bo kp'sebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi. Nkpokosi anyehng anyehng limm, nyi bo bahke nyehne, sehngem nkpokosi ana nyi Jona nyi bo bahke nyehne.
42011030	Ana Jona jolo elliingi ka aneb Ninive, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke tob jol elliingi ka ane ba li anv.
42011031	“Go efung elam bio, ntul a nnenkal no Seba bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre á lohngo nlaabambang ejahbe, ba goji Solomon re á ba wuk elkahne ene. Wo anv, ejum jia, ji gbale sehnge Solomon.
42011032	“Go efung elam bio, aneb Ninive bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre bo gb'gbo ndon go bo abiafem, eji bo wuku alum Esowo nya Jona bungu no. Nyehnen, a wo li ejum ji gbale sehnge Jona.
42011033	“Nnene limm, no ma ny'nyaale et'rekahng, fere rod song behr, jol rod ejeere konngo. Á bahke rodo na, kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu et'rekahng, eji ane ba kp'yele ekp'kpa l'jo nyehn.
42011034	“Elmahr ena li ana et'rekahng ka ngubjing enya. Elmahr ena l'jol saang, ngubjing enya kpee bahke jolo ellennge. Elmahr ena l'fere jol ab'bi, ngubjing enya kpee bahke gboko ejannge.
42011035	“Jo kunu ekpu, eji ellennge ni wob-a go atahng l'k'fere gbo ejannge.
42011036	Ngubjing enya kpee l'jol ellennge, k'bel nkpohko anyehng anyehng nyi kpi ejannge, owo ngubjing enya bahke jolo ellennge ellennge kpee ana et'rekahng kp'yake tub-a.”
42011037	Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, nne a Farisi awohng kehm-e tongo re á song li nsol a ne. Owo á kehm yele ekp'kpa, song ji go ekp'kuru nsol alehke.
42011038	Nne a Farisi noo kehm-e kpoko esi, eji á nyehne re, Jisos ruum akidi, kehm kehme nsol li.
42011039	Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wahn Farisis, ń kpo ru njahm a nkob, a njahm ekpingi. Go atahng, ab'bi nya ma rur, a nsol ejv.
42011040	Wahn agboolo nya! Ye ji limi njahm elatahk sang tob lim atahnga?
42011041	Yaren akpak ka nsol nyi wob go egahne akob, a nkpingi, ejum ajehng ajehng ejahne bahke bare.
42011042	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn Farisis! Wahn kpo ka eltahme go asahkesahke nsol ana nkambe, a alamaje, a anyane nyako kpee, fere jo gbake elam, a elkoro ni Esowo bum go nkpe. Limen nsol ebal ebal! Kana gbake ejum ajehng, bum go nkpe!
42011043	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn Farisis! Go egahne ekp'kpa ero, kpo kor-n re wahn jo ji go mbuksong. Go are, kpo kor-n re ane jo gong na, kak-n nnyo.
42011044	“Eyuu a nahne! Ń li ana alahm nya bo kil nyehne, ane kp'kadde sehng, jol bo nehme kahn re, bobfere jol ane ba ki kpe li saang.”
42011045	Owo nt'tibi atahm na awohng kehm-e faange re, “Nt'tibi, alum nya a kp'bungu a, a kp-r suku nao!”
42011046	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm fvfo! Ń kpo si ane elsol ni nnen ni kpo riidi elsolo, jol wahnfono antahng, ń kpehme tohko g'gare elmehle.
42011047	“Eyuu a nahne! Wahn ba li ane ba kake alahm nya anyehnamahr Esowo go nsement, ba babnso ejahne wulu no.
42011048	Eji ḿ ma lim ano, ebtib re, wahn ebtaame tv ji babnso ejahne limi no. Tibre bo ba wulu bo. Wahn ma rod alahm ebo kp'kake nsement.
42011049	“Owo wahnge Elkahne ni Esowo bungu re, ‘M bahke tumu abanyehnamahr, fere tum abatiingetib tv bo. Bandiki, bo bahke wulu bo. Bandiki, bo bahke nohko bo,’
42011050	eji alung ma abanyehnamahr kpee ba bo wulu no, bomo ngare nyi njini bomo no l'tuunu ane ba li anv,
42011051	bomo goji Ebel tete ba rehng goji Sekaraya ji bo wul-e go elka elka ni edi njom alimi, a etahk Esowo. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba li anv, Esowo bahke bo bahb bada nsol nyia kpee.
42011052	“Eyuu a nahne, wahn at'tibi ba atahm? Wahn ba ma rod egbokoro jio ji etahk elkahne. Wahnfono yelem. Ń kpo kpan ane ba jol yele.”
42011053	Eji Jisos ma tahm edi jio, owo at'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi kehm-e kehme alum jamme, fere jo bahb-e abahbe gbalee bada nsol tvv,
42011054	fere jo baab-e go ege alum nnyo, eji bo l'bob-e.
42012001	Eji ellong ane gbalee ma ba rur edi ajehng, bo ruru sehng, fere jo kadde atem go akpade, owo Jisos kehm gboko mbang tong abat'toono ebe re, “Jo gberen ayist nyao nya Farisis, nya li alum abal abal.
42012002	Ejumjum limm, ji bo bulu no, ji bo l'k'lennge. Ejumjum limm, ji bo behre no, ji l'k'jol gbuul.
42012003	Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ḿ bungu go ejannge, bo bahke wuku ngara njul. Ji ḿ bungu aw'wa go nkimi, bo bahke kuumu go aro ntahk, tooro wahre wahre.
42012004	“Ate ebame wahn, n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo fahl ane ba kpo wul ngubjing, ba l'k'ma kpe lim ejumjum budu.
42012005	M bahk-n tibi nne no fuumu re wahn fahl-e. Jo fahlen ye jio ji kpi nsahm nyi á bahke ma ro nne kak ellulagun ngare nyi ngubjing ma kpo. N kp-n tongo re, ye wo nobo re wahn fahl-e.
42012006	“Nne li ma gunu nruk elon go are, ka mpene ebal. Jol tvtv ona, abehng abehng limm, bi Esowo m-e yini.
42012007	Alv enyahne nya li go egahne esi, Esowo ebfange kpee. Owo nobo re wahn k'jo fahl. Tibre wahn ba ga gbal sehnge nruk, jol afi bo ruru renan.
42012008	“N kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no l'yiim-m ntianse go esamahr ane, Mmon no nne bahk-e tob yiimi ntianse go esamahr enjel nyi Esowo.
42012009	Nne no l'ten-m go esamahr ane, Mmon no nne bahke tob ten-e fvfo go esamahr enjel nyi Esowo.
42012010	Nne awohng awohng no l'bung ellum tob Mmon no nne, á bahke ma bel eltahmeka. Nne no l'bung ebi tob Etingi Etohko, á nehm bel eltahmeka.
42012011	Bo l'ko-n, tahm a nahne go ntahk ero, afi jolo go esamahr atubesi, afi bo fere kak-n esub, kana jo tiiri bade ana ḿ bahke faange, jol kana jo tiiri ana ḿ bahke bungu.
42012012	Tibre Etingi Etohko bahk-n tibi ngare nyio ji ḿ bahke bungu.”
42012013	Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, ba tong mmonannee, wahr baange nsol nyi e li elkv me!”
42012014	Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mbi, nnene limm, no tong-m re me n jo lam alam, fere jo bak-n nsol nyi ḿ ma li elkv.”
42012015	Á kehm bungu tong bo ane kpee re, “Jo kunen ekpu, wahn jo gbere elnahne, eji ń l'k'jo baare amahr enyahne go nsol ane re wahn jo bel na bel bel bel budu. Tibre nsol gbalee nyi nne kpi no sang li elkpin ene.”
42012016	Owo á kehm tubu bo elgan re, “Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji egbe eje sahb l'lak.
42012017	Á kehm bahbe elne re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan? Ebuungu ejame gbalem, ji m bahke lake eblu ebame.’
42012018	Owo á kehm bungu re, ‘Ana wo m bahke limi. M bahke kpe nyange ebuungu ejame. Owo m bahke lake eblu ebame, a nsol nyehko gona kpee.
42012019	Owo m bahke kehm bungu tong elname re, Me n li efa sehng. M bahke jehke, re ekv, bel elkpin, jo li na li li li, fere jo wo, bel eyebatahng. Tibre me m bel nsol gbalee nyi bahk-m biingi go nnya tvv.’
42012020	“Esowo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo egboolo jia, lela atv bo bahke bake, ba ko elkpin ena. Nsol nyi a ma kuuru bum elna, nne nondiki wo bahke ba ting ko.’
42012021	“Ano wo tob li ka nne no l'kpu nsol afang luk elne, no ki gbo afang nya Esowo.”
42012022	Jisos kehm bungu tong abat'toono ebe re, “Ana wo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, wahn k'jo tiiri bada nsol alehke nyi ḿ bahke jo li, a nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo kak go egahna ngubjing.
42012023	Elkpin ni ga gbal sehnge nsol alehke. Ngubjing ga gbal sehnge abomo.
42012024	“Nyehnen nruk! Bo kpehme bahm. Bo kpehme kpa. Abuungu, bo kpimm, jol bo kpehme kak go ayake. Esowo bi kpo le bo. Anv, wahn sang ga gbal sehnge nruka?
42012025	Nne awo ewahne no bahke kpe ma budu abon nnya go ege elkpin, eji á kp'tiiri ana?
42012026	Eji ń l'k'ma lim mmons'sohko ejum ana noo, jen ji wahnge ń kp'tiiri bada nsol nyehko?
42012027	“Nyehnen ana at'tul nkpad kpo gbal go emahng! Bo kpehme nyennge, lim eltum. Bo kpehme jamme nsol, kak elbo. Wo, n kp-n tongo re, jol Solomon go ege ellub, á liibem ana et'tuul ajehng go ellong at'tul nyao.
42012028	Ana Esowo kpo liibi ajele nya li go emahng, nya kpo kpin lela lela, behna bo jahm fi, jen ji wahnge á l'ki-n tob liibi, wahn ji kp'kahn taame ntiil?
42012029	“Ano wo fvfo nobo re wahn k'jo sahb s'seb nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo li, fere jo wo. Kana jo tiiri!
42012030	Tibre ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo ba kpo lim ano. Nso ejahne kp'kahne re, ń kp'sebe nsol nyia.
42012031	Ga nob re wahn gbo mbang seb etul bi Esowo. Nsol nyehko kpee á bahk-n budu.
42012032	“Kana kpe fahl, wahn mmoblong ejoro! Tibre koro Nso ejahne re wahn tob ji go eti etul eje.
42012033	“Gungen nsol nyi ń kpi no, wahn rod akpohko ka akpak. Belen abon abam akpohko ba l'k'tiki kul, wahn fere gbo afang nya ejahbetul Esowo, nya l'ki-n mal go abo, nya li edi ji nwajv anyehng anyehng l'k'ma rehng, etan l'k'ma wo.
42012034	Tibre edi ji nsol afang enya li no, owo eltim ena bahke jolo.
42012035	“Tooben ebjing, wahn gbaange agbaange go egahne ebun! Taben av at'rekahng enyahne wahre!
42012036	Jolen ana ane ba kp'siki nde ebo re á kehnge elkak elbal ba, eji á l'feere ba kahd, bo l'lennge ka-e.
42012037	“Elfuulu li ka alokeltum ba l'k'lal ngare nyi nde ebo bahke bake. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, á bahke tongo bo re bo ji ekp'kuru nsol alehke. Á bahke gbaange egbaange eje, fere jo loko bo.
42012038	Á li ma ba nlum atv. Á li ma ba nkpese efungfu. “Elfuulu li ka alokeltum bao ba, á l'ba nyehn bo, bo ma toobo ebjing.
42012039	Jia ji nobo re wahn kahn. Tibre nfontahk kahne kahn ngare nyi nwajv kp'bake, kehn á jol baabe etahk eje, k'taame nwajv lahm etahk eje yel.
42012040	“Wahn fvfo, tooben ebjing, tibre Mmon no nne bahke bake ngare nyi ń kil tiri re á kp'bake.”
42012041	Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, elgan nia, a tubu tong wahra, afi nne awohng awohng?”
42012042	Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm faange re, “Li ka ekahnkahn nlokeltum no kpi ekakesehk, no nde bahke yake alokeltum bako, kak go ege ebo re á jo le bo ngare. Nne awo li elkohn nlokeltum ana noa?
42012043	Eyebatahng bahke jolo a nlokeltum noo, no nde l'ba, á bahke ba kpir-e, á kp'limi ano.
42012044	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, á bahke yake nsol enye kpee kak-e go ebo.
42012045	“Nlokeltum noo l'fere bung go ege eltim re, ‘Nsoo eblaange elbake,’ á l'bom alokeltum bako go eldohko, fere jo li, jo wo, fere jo buumu,
42012046	owo nde nlokeltum noo bahke bake efung bi á kil ekpu kunu re á bahke bake, ngare nyi á kil elkahne. Nde noo bahk-e boomo, kiimi akv akv akv, fere tuur-e eltuuru n'nehm ana ni á bahke tuuru ane ba ki taame tv-e.
42012047	“Nlokeltum no kahne ji nde sebe re á lim, k'toobo ebjing, fere lim, bo bahk-e sahb d'dv.
42012048	“Nlokeltum no ki kahn ji nde sebe re á lim, á l'fere lim nsol nyi fuumu re bo dv-e, ye, bo we nehm ga dv. “Nne awohng awohng no bo m-e ka nsol gbalee, bo bahke sebe nsol gbalee go ege abo. Nne no bo ma yake nsol gbalee kak-e go ebo, ye wo, bo bahke koko gbalee go ege.
42012049	“M ba re me m ba kono agun go njini. Kor-m kor re, kehn agun nyao bom ellulu.
42012050	Ewohngalahb jia, ji m bahke tohko bel, ji ji ma-m gba area. Bahke jolo anaana tete mal.
42012051	Anv, ń kp'tiri re, eji m ba njini nyia, n ko elkoono ba a nia? N kp-n tongo re, elkoono sang wahnge m ba no. M ba, eji ane l'yab.
42012052	Bomo anv asongo ane alon l'jol nlaaga anyehng, abal bahke yabe jol ebo ebo, ane ara bako jol ebo ebo.
42012053	Nde nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, mmon ewe woomo njahm nyehka. Nnyehn nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, mmon ewe woomo njahm nyehka. Nnyehn nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, nkal a mmon woomo njahm nyehka.”
42012054	Jisos kehm tob bung tong ellong ane bao re, “Ń l'nyehn ekparesemsem ma tahl go erede nfam kp'bake, ń kpo bung tvtv re, ‘Elahb yahke ba elnake.’ Lohko na fvfo.
42012055	Nfeb l'kehme ellimi nyi lohng go elka emahng, ń kpo bung re, ‘Ewannge yahke ba.’ Lohko ba fvfo.
42012056	“Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo mal seenge elbung abola ndi, fere kahn ana ji bahke jolo. Jen ji wahnge ń l'k'ma kahn ngare nyi li anv?
42012057	“Jen ji wahnge wahnfono antahng kil ebtiki kahn ji kp'nobo?
42012058	Nnekv ewa l'fere ko-a, tahm a na go esub, nok, eji a l'toobo a ne ngare nyi ń kpeke li go mbang, eji á l'ki-a tohng, tahm a na goji nlamalam, nlamalam faak-a, kak mbehresi go ebo, mbehresi ko-a song kak ngbekobo.
42012059	N kpa tongo re, a nehm tiki lohng ona, tete a gohro gal mbong enya kpee mal, jol ederi ajehng ajehng nehm sa.”
42013001	Ngare nyio ane jolo o, ba tongo Jisos bade ana Pailet wulu aneb Galili, eji bo jo lim njom ka Esowo.
42013002	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv, ń kp'tiri re, aneb Galili bao ba ga jol aneb abiafem sehnge aneb Galili bako kpeea, tib eji bo nyehne erem bioa?
42013003	E'ee! N kp-n tongo re, ń tohko yaange mbang enyahne, ḿ bahke tob kpo kpee ana ane bao.
42013004	“Anv, elku ane ara ba kpo go Siloam, eji enyong gbo bulu bo mee? Anv, ń kp'tiri re, bo ba ga jol abi ane sehnge ane bako kpee ba lene go Jerusalema?
42013005	E'ee! N kp-n tongo re, ń tohko yaange mbang enyahne, ḿ bahke tob kpo kpee ana ane bao.”
42013006	Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan nia re, “Nne awohng bele eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go ege etahngga. Á kehm bake ba seb akab. Á tingem nkab anyehng anyehng.
42013007	Owo á kehm tongo nne no jo lim eltum go etahngga jio re, ‘Nyehnee, nnya era nyia, nyi n kpo ba, ba kpur akab go eti jia, jol n ka tiki bel. Gbahk eti jia tub, tibre yim na yim a mbol mbol.’
42013008	“Owo á kehm-e faange re, ‘Nsoo, nong tohko kpe jol elya nia ni ni. M bahke kpake kpee sennge, fere kak akpake elu, a ajele.
42013009	Owo e bahke nyehne, joare bahke kabe akab. Tohko fere kab, wo kehm gbahke tub.’ ”
42013010	Efung Esabat abehng Jisos jo tibi go etahk ero ajehng.
42013011	Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no bele ebi etohko ji bum-e eyam, bi ma kang elku a nnya era. Nnenkal noo fehde na fehd, á joom kpe ma tanne etannetanne.
42013012	Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, á kehm-e lungu tv elne, kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, ngubjing enya ebfannge!”
42013013	Jisos kehm-e kunu abo, nnenkal noo soro tanne tvtv, fere jo tehk Esowo.
42013014	Ntubesi etahk ero noo, atahng kehm-e rake, tib eji Jisos ma lim nne, á ma nob efung Esabat. Á kehm kehme ane tong re, “Li nfung erakera nyi ane bahke jo lim eltum. Jo baan afung nyao, wahn jo ba nob ayam enyahne, go efung Esabat sang.”
42013015	Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Wahn ane kpee, wahn sang kpo fannge efong ebahne, a ebvankang ebahne go ntahk nyi bo kpo wooma, tahm a bo go alahb efung Esabata?
42013016	Nyehnen nnenkal noa no li mmon no Ebraham, no nnehm gba-e no go elku a nnya era. Nobem re á for go eyam bia efung Esabata?”
42013017	Alum nya Jisos faange no kehm riki anebekv ebe ndon, bo ane kpee. Wo, ellong ane bako kpee jo bele na eyebatahng tib go agburu nsol nyi á ma lim.
42013018	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv, etul bi Esowo li renan? M bahke koko gara jen?
42013019	Li ana mmohk asia nyi nne rodo, song bahm go ege etahngga. Kehm gbale egburu elrahn. Nruk kehm bake, ba si ntahk ebo ona.”
42013020	Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Anv, m bahke koko etul bi Esowo gara jen?
42013021	Li ana ayist, nya nnenkal ko song behr go ebam aflawa na ebra, tete semme kpee, fere tung.”
42013022	Eji Jisos jo tahm go Jerusalem, á jo sehnge go ajahbe ajahbe, fere jo tib ane.
42013023	Nne awohng kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, anv, abon amohk ane abik abik ba bahke bele eltahra?” Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re,
42013024	“Jo noken, eji ń l'sehng go nfiidifiida mbutahk. Tibre n kp-n tongo re, ane gbalee bahke gare re bo sehng yel, bo nehm ma sehng.
42013025	“Nfontahk l'si m'mehl, bam mbu, ḿ bahke yiimi go mbutahk, jo kahd, fere jo bung re, ‘Nsoo, lenng-r mbu!’ Owo á bahk-n kehm faange re, ‘N nehme kahn edi ji ń lohng no ba.’
42013026	“Owo ḿ bahke kehme elbungu re, ‘E jo li nsol a na, fere jo wo. A jo tibi go egahre ejahbe.’
42013027	“Á bahke bungu re, ‘N kp-n tongo re, N nehme kan edi ji ń lohng no ba. Wahn abi ane baa, tahm-m wahn go esamahr!’
42013028	“Go elatahk wo ḿ bahke jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi, ń l'nyehn Ebraham, Aisik, Jekob, a abanyehnamahr kpee go ejahbetul Esowo, wahnfono antahng fere sa elatahk.
42013029	Ane bahke lohngo go ejang njini abehng abehng ba ji, jo li nsol go ejahbetul Esowo.
42013030	“Egom jindiki ji kahle njahm bahke fere gbo mbang. Egom jindiki ji gbo mbang fere kahle njahm.”
42013031	Ngare ny'nehm ona aneb Farisi bandiki kehm ba kpiri Jisos, kehm-e tongo re, “Lohng a, song! Tibre Herod kp'sebe re á wul-a.”
42013032	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Songen, wahn song tong ekpangang jio re, ‘N kp'kame ane abi atohko yehke, fere lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo. N kp'limi lela, lim behna, l'biingi nfung era, n gohro lim mal.’
42013033	M bahke tahme eljen ename asongo lela tete rehng behna, a etoono efung behko. Tibre nnyehnamahr, bo bahk-e tiki wul go Jerusalem, edi jindiki sang.
42013034	“Wahn Jerusalem, ń kpo wul abanyehnamahr, fere tuubu ane ba Esowo tumu tv-n atal. Nkpel tvv n jo gare re me n lung-n tv elname ana nkok abon kpo lung abon ebe, fere walle bo. Wahn korem elbake!
42013035	“Anv, etahk ejahne bahke sake nehme nehme. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, me ń nehm kpe tiki nyehn tete ḿ bung re, ‘Elfuulu li a nne no kp'bake go mbing nyi Ntul.’ ”
42014001	Efung Esabat abehng Jisos kehm tahme song li nsol go etahk ntubesi a nne a Farisi awohng. Owo bo jo baab-e.
42014002	Nne awohng no gbo eyam ebyeenge kehm bake goji Jisos.
42014003	Owo Jisos kehm bahbe at'tibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi re, “Anv, ntahm enyahre t'taame re nne jo lim ane, bo nob efung Esabata, afi?”
42014004	Bo kehm belle. Owo Jisos kehm rodo nne eyam noo, lim-e, á nob, fere yak-e, á song.
42014005	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne awo ewahne no mmon ewe, afi nfong enye bahke gboko yel elbing alahb ni kp'rahbe, á k'song yehk-e efung Esabata?”
42014006	Jol bo we maam faange ejumjum.
42014007	Jisos nyehne kan ana ane ba bo tob tiingi bo elkak fvfo ma song yehke adi nji nya li wahre wahre, owo á kehm tubu bo elgan re,
42014008	“Nne l'tiing-a elkak elbal, ka song ji edi nji ji li wahre wahre. Fundiki nne no ga gbal sehnge wo, nfono elkak t'tob tiing-e fvfo.
42014009	L'jol ano, nne no tiingi wahn ane abal abal bahke bake, ba tong-a re, ‘Tahm ka nne noa, á ji!’ Ndon bahk-a kehme elfili re wo fere song ji go nredereda nji.
42014010	“Bo l'tiing-a elkak, song ji go nredereda nji, eji nfono elkak l'ba, á bahke ba tong-a re, ‘Mbi, mehl, wo ba ji ga nwahrewahra nji.’ Owo a bahke bele ellub go esamahr ane kpee ba jehk a na go ekp'kuru jio.
42014011	“Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'rod elne bum wahre wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne no l'rede elne, bo bahk-e rodo, bum wahre wahre.”
42014012	Owo Jisos kehm tob bung a nne no tiing-e no re, “A l'tiingi ane re bo ba li nsol, afi jolo elkak, ka jo tiingi ate eba, jol abonane, jol nnahb enya, a aneb nkontahk eba ba li afang ane. Tibre bo fvfo bo bahk-a tob tiingi. A l'lim ano, wobbel eltuuru ena tvtv go ejum ji a limi no.
42014013	Ga nob re a l'tiingi ane elkak, wo jo tiingi akpak, a abanne, a awakamahr.
