42014014	A bahke bele elfuulu, tibre bo nehm ma tob lim ka-a. Esowo bi bahke limi ka-a efung bio bi atingi ane bahke nyahme go elkv.”
42014015	Eji nne awohng no woomo go ellong ane ba tob ji ekp'kuru jio a Jisos wuku ano, owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Elfuulu li ka nne no bahke lehke nsol go ejahbetul Esowo.”
42014016	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne awohng jolo go, no limi egburu elkak, tiingi ane gbalee.
42014017	Eji afung elkak ma rehng, á kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe re á song tong ane ba á tiingi bo re bo ba. Tibre bobtoobo ejum ajehng ajehng bum.
42014018	“Bo ane kpee kehm kehme ellaange kunu go nsol. Ngbokambang a nne kehm tongo nlokeltum noo re, ‘N gunu nfong ewubu, n yahke tahm song wuungu bo. Lub wuk ana n kp-a gboongo titi.’
42014019	Owo nne noko kehm kpe bung re, ‘N gunu edi egbe. M bahke tahme song nyehn. Lub wuk ana n kp-a gboongo titi.’
42014020	Nne noko kehm tob kpe bung re, ‘Me n ko nkal, owo wahnge n l'k'ma ba.’
42014021	“Nlokeltum noo kehm feere song tong nde. “Nfono elkak noo, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tongo nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Foomo song go afak ejahbe, wo song ko akpak, fere ko abanne, a awakamahr ba a bo.’
42014022	“Eji nlokeltum noo je feere, á kehm ba tong nde re, ‘Nsoo, ana a bungu no, me n lim. Eyake jia, kpeke li, ji ane bahke kpe ji.’
42014023	“Nde kehm tongo nlokeltum noo re, ‘Song go abang ebud, a abang ekulugbe, wo jo fanne ane, eji bo l'ba, ba yel, ane l'rur go egame ekp'kpa.’
42014024	Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng go ellong ane ba bo tiingi bo nehm tiki li elkak ename.”
42014025	Ellong ane gbalee jo jene a Jisos. Owo á kehm keebe, kehm tongo bo re,
42014026	“Nne awohng awohng no l'ba go egame, á nehm ma jol nt'toono ewame, tohko jol re á ko nde ekv, a nnyehn, a nkal ewe, a abon ebe, a abonanyehn, a elkpin ene fvfo.
42014027	Nne no tohko sol ekros eje, tahm toon-m, á nehm ma jol nt'toono ewame.
42014028	Nne awohng ewahne l'seb re á si enyong, á bahke tohko gbo mbang ji, gabe ana bahk-e kimi ekun, joare akpohko enye bahk-e biingi, á si kpee mal.
42014029	Á tohko lim ano, fundiki á bahke bumu nnahb ekahme nyi nyi, á nehm kpe ma soro asi. Ane kpee ba l'nyehn, bo bahk-e kehme elnyoko re,
42014030	‘Nne noa ana bomo etahk go elsehke, á kpeem ma gohro si mal.’
42014031	“Ntul no kpi nsoja atahltahl nkpel eltahl, no yahke tahm re á song nok ebta a ntul noko no kp'bake re á ba nok a ne, no kpi nsoja atahltahl nkpel atahl abal, á bahke tohko gbo mbang ji kpee, toobo, joare á li ma yiimi, nok a ntul noko.
42014032	Joare á nehm ma yiimi a ne, á bahke tumu ane tv ntul noko, eji á kpeke li go fee re bo song bahb-e ji á bahk-e kake, bo kehm koono.
42014033	“Ano wo fvfo, nne awohng awohng ewahne no tohko yake ejum ajehng ajehng ji á kpi no, á l'k'ma jol nt'toono ewame.
42014034	“Akang kp'yebe. Elyebe akang l'lohng, a bahke limi renan, akang kehm kpe yebe?
42014035	Jol nehm nob ka ndi, jol nehm nob re nne ko kak go abangenahb nti. Ane kpo sale na elkohn akang nio wohng go. Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.”
42015001	Abakokatak, a aneb abiafem jo jeere kohlo Jisos, eji bo l'jo wuk-e.
42015002	Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm jo memme re, “Nne noa kpo ko aneb abiafem, fere jo li nsol a bo.”
42015003	Owo wahnge Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan re,
42015004	“Anv, nne ewahne awohng l'bel ejoro atahl alon, anyehng l'tan, á nehm tahm ejoro behko sa go elka emahng, song seb nyi tane no tete á nyehn-ea?
42015005	Á l'nyehn-e, á bahk-e rodo, kunu go ebahk, fere jo geere.
42015006	“Á l'ba rehng etahk, á bahke lungu ate ebe, a aneb nkontahk ebe, fere tong bo re, ‘Tob-m wahn elgeere, tibre me n nyehn njoro enyame nyi tane no.’
42015007	“N kp-n tongo re, Eyebatahng bahke ga gbal go ejahbetul Esowo, nne abiafem awohng l'gbo ndon, sehnge atingitingi ane gbalee ba kil sebe re bo gbo ndon.
42015008	“Li re nnenkal kpi nsiring ewubu, anyehng kehm ba tan-e, anv, á nehm nyaale et'rekahng, fere feenge ekp'kpa, jo seb bem bem bem tete á nyehna?
42015009	“Á l'nyehn, á bahke lungu ate ebe, a aneb nkontahk ebe, tong bo re, ‘Ba tob-m wahn elgeere, tibre me n fere nyehn nsiring nyi tan-m no.’
42015010	“N kp-n tongo re, Ano wo fvfo enjel nyi Esowo kpo bel eyebatahng, nne abiafem awohng l'gbo ndon.”
42015011	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nne awohng jolo go, no bele abon ba nlum na abal.
42015012	Nkalla kehm tongo nde re, ‘Nsoo, ka-m ejang nsol nyi bahke jolo ny'nyame.’ Owo nde noo kehm bake abon ebe na abal nsol enye.
42015013	“Gaam kang, mmonkalla noo kehm kpuku nsol kpee nyi á bele no, tahm go nlaabambang ejahbe. Owo á song li akpohko enye go mbang elwur kpee mal.
42015014	Eji á ma fad akpohko enye kpee mal, owo njal kehm bake go ejahbe jio, jol nyi nse sang. Á kehm sake abo abo.
42015015	“Á kehm tahme, song wu laake nfono ejahbe awohng. Á kehm-e tumu re á song, jo song baabe akuk.
42015016	Jol-e koro re, á jo li nsol nyi akuk kpo li. Jol nnene jolem no jo ka-e.
42015017	“Eji á ma fere gbo ntir, owo á kehm bungu re, ‘Ane kpee ba nsoo kpo lak bo eltum, bo kpi nsol alehke gbalee, jol sehnge ana nyi bo kp'sebe. Wo, me n jehk ana, kp'kpoko njal.
42015018	M bahke tahme, song kpiri nsoo, fere tong-e re, Nsoo, me n lim abiafem bade Esowo, fere tob lim bada na.
42015019	Me n kpeem fuumu re bo jo lung-m re mmon ewa. Tob lak-m, me n tob jol nlimeltum ewa.’
42015020	“Owo á kehm mehle, feere goji nde. Jol á gaam kabbe go etahk nde, nde kehm-e nyehne. Ndon kehm-e fili, á kehm beke, song bing-e, fere sod-e nnyo.
42015021	“Owo mmon noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nsoo, me n lim abiafem bade Esowo, fere lim bada na. N kpeem fuumu re bo jo lung-m re mmon ewa.’
42015022	“Nde kehm lungu alokeltum ebe, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Song koon ekpawobo ji nno a nno ba a ji, wahn ba kak-e. Tob kaken ye ebil go ebo, wahn fere kak-e akpaketa go akpade.
42015023	Song koon mmon a nfong no sahb j'jok, wahn ba wul, wahr limen elkak, fere bel eyebatahng.
42015024	Tibre mmon ewame noa kp'kpo, wo anv, yebfere jol go elkpin. Á t'tan. Anv a, m m-e nyehn.’ “Owo bo kehm soro bom elkak nio go ellimi.
42015025	“Ngbokambang a mmon jolo go egbe. Eji á jo kehnge abake, ba kabbe go nkpe etahk, á kehm wuku ase nya bo jo kub, fere jo bahn.
42015026	Á kehm lungu nlokeltum awohng, kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Ase nyao lohngo rejen?’
42015027	“Owo á kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmonanne wo ma feere kehnge. Nso ma wul mmon a nfong no joko jok. Tibre yebfere bel mmon ewe nob nob. Ejumjum we limem.’
42015028	“Eji á ma wuk ano, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tene elyele go ekp'kpa. “Owo nde kehm lohngo ba gboong-e.
42015029	“Á kehm faange nde re, ‘Nnya tvv nyi m ma-a loko. Ngare anyehng anyehng n kpo lim ajehng ajehng ji a tong-m no. Jol me, a ka k'ka mbul re me n ko lim elkak ka ate ebame.
42015030	Wo anv, eji mmon ewa noa ma ba, no ma rannge akpohko enya eji á jo noongo abajenas'sa, ye wo, a ma wul mmon a nfong no joko jok ka-e.’
42015031	“Owo nde kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmon ewame, wo li a name ngare anyehng anyehng. Nsol kpee nyi li ny'nyame, tob li ny'nya fvfo.
42015032	F'fuumu re wahr lim elkak, fere bel eyebatahng. Tibre mmonanne noa kp'kpo, anv, yebfere jol go elkpin. Á t'tan, anv a, m m-e nyehn.’ ”
42016001	Jisos kehm kpe bung tong abat'toono ebe re, “Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji bele nlokeltum. Ane kehm song tong-e re, nlokeltum noo kp'fade akpohko enye.
42016002	“Owo nde noo kehm-e lungu, kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahnge n kp'wuku nsol ana nyia bada na? Ko awer ba a nya, nya a kpo nyon nsol enyame nyi n yake kak-a go ebo. Tibre a nehm kpe tiki jol nlokeltum ewame.’
42016003	“Owo nlokeltum noo kehm bungu go ege eltim re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan, eji nsoo yahk-m yehke go egame eltum? Eko n gaam kpi, ji m bahke jo bahm egbe. Ndon kp-m fili re me n jo gboongo na nsol.
42016004	Anv, me n kahn ji m bahke limi, eji n l'bel ane ba bahk-m koko, n lene tob bo ngare nyi nsoo ma-m yehke go eltum.’
42016005	“Owo á kehm lungu ane kpee, ba bele nde abong, kehm tongo ngbokambang re, ‘A kpi nsoo mbong rejen?’
42016006	Á kehm faange re, ‘Nsang akehng atahl alon.’ Nlokeltum noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Rod nwer a mbong enya, wo ji elwaare, nyon nsang atahl abal a nsang ewubu.’
42016007	“Owo á kehm bahbe noko re, ‘Anv, wo, mbong enya li rejen?’ Á kehm-e faange re, ‘Ebam nkohl atahl alon.’ Nlokeltum noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Rod nwer a mbong enya, wo nyon ebam atahl ani.’
42016008	“Owo nde kehm tehke nkimfahnga nlokeltum ewe noo, tib go elwake ni á ma wake. Tibre abon ba njini nyia ba kp'gaka wake go bo a ntum sehnge abon ba ellennge.
42016009	“N kp-n tongo re, Roden afang nya ki li nyanyahne, wahn ko lim etem, eji afang l'mal, bo l'ko-n kak go ntahk nyi li go njinanjini.
42016010	Nne no l'bel ekakesehk go mmojum no nse, á tob kpi ekakesehk go egburu ejum. Nne no kil ma lim mmojum no nse go etingitingi, á kpehme ma tob lim egburu ejum go etingitingi.
42016011	“Eji ń ki ma lim nsol nyi njini nyia go ekakesehk, bahke limi renan, bo kehm yake atingitingi afang kak-n go egahne abo?
42016012	Eji ń ki bel ekakesehk go nsol nyi ki li ny'nyahne, nne awo me, no bahk-n kake ji bahke jolo j'jahne?
42016013	“Nlokeltum awohng awohng limm, no bahke ma loko nde na ebal. Noko, á bahk-e koko ekv, noko jo kor-e. Tohko jol ano á bahke lake nde noko, fere jo daange noko. Ń nehm ma loko Esowo, fere jo loko akpohko.”
42016014	Eji Bab Farisi wuku nsol nyio, bo kehm-e kehme elnyoko, tibre akpohko jo koro bo sehng.
42016015	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn li ane ba kpo tib elnahne go esamahr ane re, wahn li atingitingi ane. Wo, Esowo kp'kahne ntim enyahne. Tibre nsol nyi ane kpo tehk, nyi nyi li nsol eltehb go esamahr Esowo.
42016016	“Atahm nya Moses, a alum nya abanyehnamahr nyono no jolo ka ngare nyio nyi mahne mahne tete ba rehng ngare nyi Jon ji nwohngalahb. Bomo ngare nyio, owo bo kehme eltiingi nnoobo etib bi li bade etul bi Esowo. Nne awohng awohng no l'lim go nsahm, á bahke ma kuumu.
42016017	“Elbung abola ndi tohkem r'riidi re tan. Jol nr'rohka ntahm anyehng anyehng nehm tiki range.
42016018	“Nne awohng awohng no l'ten nkal ewe, fere ko noko, yeblim erehbe. Nne no l'baange nnenkal no nlum ewe m-e yehke elbal, eblim erehbe.”
42016019	“Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji jo liibi nsol nyi jo sahb k'kim ekun, fere jo lim egburu elkak efung abehng abehng.
42016020	“Nne awohng tob jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Lasaros, ji jolo nkpak. Ngubjing enye jolo alok alok. Á jo kono eljeke go mbutahk efange nne jio.
42016021	Á jo sebe re á jo kpiimi akahb elang li, nya jo fooro ekp'kuru efange nne jio gbo, eji á l'wohngo. Ebv jo lohngo ba lahb-e alok.
42016022	Toono o nkpak nyio ba kpo. Babenjel kehm ba sol-e, song bum-e, á ji kohlo Ebraham. “Efange nne jio kehm tob kpo. Bo kpa-e kak.
42016023	Eji á woomo go ellulagun, jo nyehn erem, á kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm nyehne Ebraham go fee, fere nyehn Lasaros jehk kohl-e.
42016024	Owo á kehm rabe re, ‘Nso Ebraham, nong, me n fil-a ndon! Lub tum Lasaros, á song behde ebnyohkobo ebe go alahb, ba behd-m go ebliki, eji ebliki ebame l'lub naang-m. Tibre n kp'nyehne erem sehng go agun nyaa.’
42016025	“Owo Ebraham kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmon ewame, buumu re, ngare nyi a jolo go elkpin, a bele anoobo nsol, Lasaros bele asabsab nsol. Wo anv, bo m-e kak eltim, wo noa, kpi erem nyehn.
42016026	Wo gana, elka elka ni wahr a nahne, egburu edamme jia, ji nnene l'k'ma sehng ga egahre, ba rehng go egahne, fvfo ji nnene l'k'tob ma sehng go egahne, ba rehng ga egahre.’
42016027	“Owo efange nne jio kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, n kp-a gboongo re, wo lub tum Lasaros tv go etahk nsoo,
42016028	eji á l'song rehke abonanee. Tibre n kpi abonanyehn na alon, tohko jol ano, bo bahke tob ba, ba nyehn erem ebnohko edi jia.’
42016029	“Owo Ebraham kehm faange re, ‘Bo kpi awer nya Moses, a nya abanyehnamahr, nong, bo jo wuk.’
42016030	“Efange nne jio kehm tene re, ‘E'ee nso Ebraham, nne l'lohng akvne, fere song kpiri bo, bo bahke gboko ndon.’
42016031	“Ebraham kehm-e tongo re, ‘Bo tohko fere wuk alum nya Moses, a nya anyehnamahr, afi nne nyahme na go elkv, bo nehm taame.’ ”
42017001	Jisos kehm bungu tong abat'toono ebe re, “Nsol nyi kpo lim nne gbo yel abiafem bahke tiki ba. Eyuu a nne no bahke wahnge re ba!
42017002	Ga nob re bo kahn-e eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse awohng go ellong abonse baa, á gbo yel abiafem.
42017003	“Jo gberen elnahne! “Mmonanne l'lim abiafem, jo rehk-e. Á l'gbo ndon, tahm ka-e.
42017004	Á l'sood-a nkpel esehma efung abehng, fere ba gboong-a nkpel esehma re, ‘Ndon ma-m fili!’ tahm ka-e.”
42017005	Owo abatiingetib kehm tongo Ntul a Jisos re, “Lim eltaame enahre gbal!”
42017006	Ntul a Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li re ń kpi eltaame ni se ana mmohk asia, kehn ń li ma bung tong etaamenti bia re, ‘Mehl, wo song yiimi go aya!’ kehn bahk-n wuku.
42017007	“Li re nne awohng ewahne kpi nlokeltum no kpo bahm egbe, tohko jol ano á kpo baabe ebul. Á l'kehnge egbe ba, nde kpo tong-e tong rea, ‘Ba elwaare, wo ba ji ekp'kuru li nsola?’
42017008	“E'ee! Á bahk-e tongo na re, ‘Song lam nsol ka-m, wo fere toobo ebjing bi a bahk-m loko ngare nyi n kpi nsol li. N l'li mal, wo kehm tob li.’
42017009	“Anv, á bahke kake nlokeltum ewe nnyo go nsol nyi á tong-e re á lima?
42017010	“Wahn fvfo, ń l'lim nsol kpee nyi bo tong-n re wahn lim, jo bungen re, ‘Wahr alokeltum baka baka ba. Wahr eblim ji li ka-r re wahr lim.’ ”
42017011	Eji Jisos je go Jerusalem, á sehnge go Samaria, a Galili.
42017012	Eji á rehnge go ejahbe ajehng, aneb abili na awubu kehm ba wan-e. Bo yiimi go fee,
42017013	kehm rabe re, “Jisos nso ejahre, nong, wahr fil-a ndon!”
42017014	Eji Jisos nyehne bo, á kehm tongo bo re, “Songen, wahn song kpiri abalimajom, fere tib bo elnahne.” Eji bo jo jen asongo, bo kehme elnobo.
42017015	Nne awohng go bo ellong, eji á nyehne re yeblohko nob, á kehm feere abake, jo tehk Esowo wahre wahre,
42017016	kehm ba gbo go alata nya Jisos, kehm-e kake saam. Nne noo jolo nne a Samaria.
42017017	Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv, ane awubu sang nobo noa? Ane asehmwubu bako bana?
42017018	Nnene feerem ba re á ba tehk Esowoa, sehngem njenne nyia nyi nyi feere noa?”
42017019	Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Mehl, wo song, eltaame ena eblim, wobnob.”
42017020	Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ngare anyi etul bi Esowo bahke bake!” Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etul bi Esowo nehm ba go mbang nyi ane bahke nyehne.
42017021	Nne awohng awohng limm, no bahke bungu re, ‘Nyehn, bi gana!’ jol, ‘Nyehn, bi gona!’ Tibre etul bi Esowo bia, wob-n go atahng.”
42017022	Owo á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Ngare kp'bake nyi ḿ bahke sebe re efung abehng bi Mmon no nne kpir-n, jol wahn nehm kpiri.
42017023	Bo bahk-n jo tong re, ‘Nyehnen gona!’ Ane bako bahk-n jo tong re, ‘Nyehnen ga!’ Kana lohng je ona! Jol kana toono bo!
42017024	Ana emangedu kpo lim, lennge go elbung, rehng ejang abehng abehng, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke jolo go ege efung.
42017025	Á bahke gboko mbang nyehn erem gbalee. Ane ba li anv bahk-e tene.
42017026	“Ana jolo ngare nyio nyi Noa, ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol afung nyao nya Mmon no nne.
42017027	Ngare nyio ane jo li, fere jo w'wo. Aneblum jo ko akal, anebkal jo bal alum, tete rehng efung bio bi Noa yele go egbang. Owo nnyel kehm yele, ba wul bo kpee.
42017028	“Bahke jolo ana jolo ngare nyio nyi Lot. Bo jo li, fere jo w'wo, jo gunu, fere jo g'gungu, jo bahm ebgbe, fere jo si ntahk.
42017029	Efung bi Lot lohngo go Sodom, agun, a asalfa kehm kehme elnake go ejahbetul Esowo, ba wul bo kpee.
42017030	“Ano wo bahke tob jol fvfo efung bi bo bahke lennge Mmon no nne tib.
42017031	Efung bio, nne no l'kuumu go ege ero etahk, á l'badde, á k'tohko kpe ji, yel go ege ekp'kpa, song rod nsol enye. Ano wo fvfo tob li ka nne no li go ege egbe, á nehm tohko kpe feere go ege etahk.
42017032	“Buumen nkal a Lot!
42017033	Nne awohng awohng no l'gare re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne no l'tane elkpin ene, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
42017034	“N kp-n tongo re, atv mao ane abal bahke noongo go edilnong ajehng, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.
42017035	Anebkal abal bahke jo gok nsol, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.
42017036	Aneblum abal bahke jolo go egbe, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.”
42017037	Owo abat'toono ebe kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, gan wo?” Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Edi ji ekpakv ejum li no, owo ntere kpo song rur.”
42018001	Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan, eji á l'tib bo ana bo bahke jo kak ero ngare anyehng anyehng, k'jo yini ekpu.
42018002	Á bungu re, “Nlamalam awohng jolo go ejahbe ajehng, no ki jo fahl Esowo. Ane we joom lub.
42018003	“Nkalebun awohng tob jolo ejahbe jio, no gbake jo je go ege, jo song tong-e re, ‘Lam elam ejame nob nob, ji n kpi a nnekv ewame.’
42018004	“Á kehm tene. Kpe kang kan a, á kehm fere bung go ege eltim re, ‘Jol eji n kil jo f'fahl Esowo, ane kil jo lub-m,
42018005	tib eji nkalebun noa kp-m gbiingi s'sehng, m bahke lame elam eje nob nob, tohko jol ano á bahk-m gboro tib go elbake ni á kpo ba ngare anyehng anyehng.’ ”
42018006	Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wuken ana ebi nlamalam noo bungu no.
42018007	Anv, Esowo nehm tob lam elam ji nno ka ane ba á yehke no, ba kpo gboong-e atv a njula? Anv, á bahke tohko laange, kehm kake bo eboa?
42018008	N kp-n tongo re, á bahke lame elam ji nno elwaare ka bo. Anv, Mmon no nne l'ba, á bahke nyehne ane ba kp'taame go njini nyiaa?”
42018009	Jisos tob tubu elgan nia, tong ane ba jo bum elbo re, bo ba li go etingitingi, fere jo daange ane bako.
42018010	Á bungu re, “Ane abal je go etahk Esowo re bo song kak ero. Noko jolo nne a Farisi, noko jol nkokatak.
42018011	“Nne a Farisi kehm yiimi eje eje, jo kak ero re, ‘O Esowo, m ma-a kak saam, tibre n limm ana ane ba kpo v ejv, ba kil jo lim nsol go etingitingi. N limm ana ane ba kpo lim erehbe. M ma-a kak saam, tibre n limm ana nkokatak noo ona.
42018012	N kpo bade elname njal nkpel ebal go erahde. N kpo ka eltahme go ejum ajehng ajehng ji n l'bel.’
42018013	“Nkokatak yiimi eje go fee. Jol á tabem esamahr ebe, seenge go elbung. Á kohko na esi eje go ndi, kehm bungu re, ‘Esowo, nong, me n fil-a ndon, me nne abiafem wo.’
42018014	“N kp-n tongo re, Nkokatak noa wo li eno go esamahr Esowo, kehm kehnge go etahk, nne a Farisi sang. Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'mehl elne wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne no l'rede elne, bo bahk-e mehle na wahre.”
42018015	Ane bandiki kehm koko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kooro bo abo. Eji abat'toono Jisos nyehne ano, bo kehm nyame bo.
42018016	Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo tv elne, kehm bungu re, “Nongen, abon ba nse jo ba ga egame. Kana jo sahde bo! Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka nkohn nyia.
42018017	“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, nne awohng awohng no tohko ko etul bi Esowo ana mmon no nse, á nehm tiki li.”
42018018	Ntubesi awohng kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Nnooba nt'tibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
42018019	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm-m l'lung re nnooba nne fono? Nnene limm, no li nnooba nne, sehngem Esowo ntahngtahng bi li nnooba nne.
42018020	A kp'kahne atahm nya bungu re, ‘Ka jo lim erehbe! Ka jo wul nne! Ka jo v ejv! Ka jo yiimi ntianse efahnge! Jo kak nso, a nne!’ ”
42018021	Owo nne noo kehm faange re, “Atahm nyaa kpee m bomo elbumu ngare nyi n kpeke li ntiil.”
42018022	Eji Jisos wuku ano, á kehm bungu re, “Ebsa ejum ajehng ji a bahke gohro lim. Song gungu nsol kpee nyi a kpi no, wo ko akpohko nyao song ka akpak, owo a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo fere tahm toon-m.”
42018023	Eji á wuku ano, á kehm kehme elguunu, tibre á fange sehng.
42018024	Jisos nyehne kan re á kp'guunu, á kehm bungu re, “Bahke riidi sehng re afang ane kehm lehke etul bi Esowo.
42018025	Re efange nne kehm yele ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
42018026	Ane ba wuku no kehm bahbe re, “Anv, nne awo me, no bahke kehm bele eltahre?”
42018027	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Ji nne kil ma lim, goji Esowo riidem.”
42018028	Pita kehm bungu re, “Nyehn, ana e ma tahm ntahk enyahre sa, kp-a toono.”
42018029	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nnene limm, no ma tahm etahk eje sa, jol nkal ewe, jol abonanyehn, jol babnde, a abon ebe tib go esi ji etul bi Esowo,
42018030	no l'k'bel na gbalee budu eying jia ji anv, fere bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini eying ji kp'bake.”
42018031	Owo Jisos kehm rodo abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tahm a bo go nkpohko, kehm song tong bo re, “Anv, e yahke tahm go Jerusalem. Go wo ejum ajehng ajehng ji abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no bada Mmon no nne, bahke lohko lim ano go etingitingi.
42018032	Tibre bo bahk-e yake, kak ane ba ki li Jus go ebo. Bo bahk-e nyoko, fere son-e, fere so atel wohng-e.
42018033	Bo bahk-e dohko, fere wul-e. L'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
42018034	Abat'toono ebe wukem ejum ajehng ajehng ji á bungu no. Lenngem bo, tibre bo b'behr bo alum nyao.
42018035	Jisos kehm jene song kabbe go Jeriko. Nwakamahr anyehng ji o nkpe a mbang, jo gboongo nsol.
42018036	Eji á wuku ellong ane kp'sehnge, á kehm bahbe re, “Nenan ana?”
42018037	Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo kp'sehnge.”
42018038	Owo á kehm soro rabe re, “Jisos mmon no Devid, nong, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
42018039	Ane ba jolo es'song kehm-e nyame re á rahke ewok. Á kehm kpe tuungu na, rabe wahre wahre re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, me n fil-a ndon!”
42018040	Jisos kehm yiimi, kehm tongo bo re, bo ko-e ba. Eji á ba rehng kabbe Jisos, owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re,
42018041	“Anv, a kp'sebe re me n lim jen ka-a?” Á kehm faange re, “Nsoo, n kp'sebe re me n lub nyehn.”
42018042	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Fere jo nyehn anv! Eltaame ena ebwahng, wobnob.”
42018043	Tvtv ona á kehm soro nyehn, fere tahm toon-e, jo ka Esowo ellub. Eji ane bako kpee nyehne ano, bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk.
42019001	Jisos kehm rehnge go Jeriko, sehng asongo.
42019002	Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Sakeus. Á jolo ntubesi abakokatak, fere f'fang.
42019003	Á jo sebe re á nyehn ana Jisos li no. We á joom nyehn, tib ellong ane gbale o sehng, ga fvfo á jolo nkpehrekahba nne.
42019004	Owo á kehm beke, gbo bo mbang, song wahr ekuntaake, eji á l'nyehn-e. Tibre Jisos jo ba elsehnge go mbang nyio.
42019005	Eji Jisos ba rehng edi jio, á kehm kpuru ero, kehm-e tongo re, “Sakeus, badde elwaare, tibre lela m bahke kange go ega etahk.”
42019006	Owo á kehm badde elwaare, ba vvr-e go eyebatahng.
42019007	Bo nyehne kan ano, bo kehm kehme elmemme ane kpee re, “Nne noa ebtahm re á song kang a nne no li na nne abiafem.”
42019008	Sakeus kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu tong Ntul a Jisos re, “Nsoo, m bahke yange nsol enyame, yehke ejang ka akpak. Nne awohng awohng no n nehm-e go ejum ajehng ajehng, m bahk-e gale nkpel eni budu.”
42019009	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Lela eltahre ebba go etahk jia, tib eji á tob li mmon no Ebraham.
42019010	Tibre Mmon no nne ba re á ba seb, fere tahre jio ji ma tan.”
42019011	Eji ane bao wuku nsol nyio, Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan. Tibre ngare nyio yebkabbe go Jerusalem, ane bao jo fere tir re, etul bi Esowo bahke soro ba tvtv.
42019012	Owo wahng ka á kehm bungu re, “Mmon a ntul awohng jolo go, no tahme nlaabambang ejahbe re á song li etul feere.
42019013	Re á kehm tahme, á lungu alokeltum ebe, ane awubu, ka bo mpon ewubu ewubu, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Roden akpohko nyaa, wahn jen are tete me n feere ba.’
42019014	“Ejahbe eje ko-e ekv, owo bo kehm tiingi etib tv-e re, bo nehme seb re á ba jol ntul abo.
42019015	“Eji á ma song li etul feere, á kehm ba lung alokeltum ebe, ba á ka bo akpohko re bo ba, eji á l'kahn ana bo ma li nsehng go are ma bo ma jen.
42019016	“Ngbokambang a nlokeltum kehm bake, ba yiimi go ege esamahr, kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, mpon ewubu enya nyi a ka-m no eblim mpon atahl alon.’
42019017	“Owo á kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nnooba nlokeltum. Tib eji a ma bel ekakesehk go mmons'sohka mmojum, a bahke jo fili ejahbe na ebwubu.’
42019018	“Etoono nlokeltum noko kehm kpe lohng ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, mpon ewubu enya nyi a ka-m no eblim mpon atahl abal a mpon ewubu.’
42019019	“Owo á kehm-e tongo re, ‘A bahke jo fili ejahbe na eblon.’
42019020	“Noko kehm kpe lohng ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, nyehn mpon ewubu enya ga! N kake go egame afiafong, song bum go.
42019021	N jo fahl-a fahl. Tibre a li ebibbib nne sehng. A kpo rod nsol nyi ki li wo bumu no. A kpo kpa nsol nyi a ki bahm.’
42019022	“Á kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo eb'bi nlokeltum noa, m bahke koko alum nnyo enya lam-a. A k'kahn re, me ebibbib nne ji. N kpo rod nsol nyi n ki bum, fere kpa nsol nyi n ki bahm.
42019023	Jen ji wahnge a ki ka njenare akpohko enyame, kehn eji m ma feere ba, n jol ba ko, fere ko nsehng budu?’
42019024	“Owo á kehm bungu tong ane ba yiimi ona re, ‘Taaren ye mpon ewubu nyio, wahn faake a nyi ka nne no kpi mpon atahl alon.’
42019025	“Bo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nsoo, á kpi mpon atahl alono!’
42019026	Á kehm faange re, ‘N kp-n tongo re, nne awohng awohng no l'bel, bo bahk-e kake na budu. Nne no ki kpi, jol ji á kpi no, bo bahk-e taare.
42019027	“ ‘Anebekv ebame bao ba kil sebe re me m ba jol ntul abo, song koon bo ba, wahn ba wul bo go egame esamahr.’ ”
42019028	Eji Jisos ma bung ano, á kehm soro asi asongo go Jerusalem.
42019029	Eji á ba rehng kohlo go Betfage, a Betani, ajahbe nya li go nnahb ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, á kehm yehke abat'toono ebe na abal tum.
42019030	Re á kehm tumu bo, á tongo bo re, “Songen go ejahbe ji li go egahna mbuksong. Ń l'song rehng ejahbe jio, eji ń fi no, ḿ bahke nyehne mmon a mbvankang no bo kal-e k'kuumu, no bo tohk-e go eti. Fanngen ye, wahn ko-e ba a ne!
42019031	Nne awohng awohng no l'bahb-n re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e fannge?’ faangen ye re, ‘Ntul wo kp-e sebe.’ ”
42019032	Ane ba Jisos tumu bo kehm lohko je, lohko song nyehn ana Jisos tongo bo.
42019033	Eji bo jo fannge mmon a mbvankang noo, owo afono mbvankang nyio kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'fannge mbvankang nyio?”
42019034	Owo bo kehm faange re, “Ntul wo kp-e sebe.”
42019035	Bo kehm koko mbvankang nyio tahm a nyi goji Jisos, fere yehke nsol nyi bo kake no, yal mbvankang nyio go njahm, fere mehl Jisos jehke.
42019036	Eji mbvankang jo jen a ne asongo, bo kehme abomo ebo yal go mbang.
42019037	Eji á jo badde go ewong jio asongo, ngare nyi á ma kabbe go Jerusalem, ellong abat'toono ebe gbalee kehm kehme elgeere, fere jo tehk Esowo wahre wahre tib go agburu akpokosi nya bo ma nyehn.
42019038	Bo jo bungu re, “Elfuulu li a ntul no kp'bake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo. Elkoono jol go ejahbetul Esowo, ellub jol go ero!”
42019039	Egom Farisi jindiki ji woomo go ellong ane bao kehm-e tongo re, “Nt'tibi, nyam abat'toono eba!”
42019040	Jisos kehm faange re, “N kp-n tongo re, Ane baa l'belle, atal bahke kehme elrabe.”
42019041	Eji bo ba rehng kohlo go Jerusalem, eji á ma nyehn yefono ejahbe, á kehm kehme ellingi re,
42019042	“N kp'sebe re wahn lub kahn lela ejum ji bahke koko elkoono ba a ni, wo anv, ń nehme ma nyehn.
42019043	Tibre afung nyao bahk-n kpiri, nya anebekv ebahne bahke bake, ba senng-n kak, fere kohk-n tv.
42019044	Bo bahke rannge ejahbe ejahne kpee, a ane kpee ba lene o. Jol eltal anehng anehng nehm kpe jol ni bahke sake kuumu a ntem egahne ejahbe. Tibre ń kahnem ngare nyi Esowo ba re á ba tahr-n.”
42019045	Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, song kehme ane bao kam, ba ji o, jo gungu nsol,
42019046	fere tong bo re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, Esowo bungu re, ‘Etahk ejame bahke jolo etahk ero akake.’ Wahn ebfere rod bum ana ebehre awajv.”
42019047	Jisos jo tibi efung abehng abehng go etahk Esowo. Atubesi abalimajom, at'tibi ba atahm, a atubesi ane jo sebe re bo wul-e.
42019048	Jol bo tikem kahn mbang ana nyi bo bahke limi. Tibre ane kpee jo wuung-e atung sehng, eji ellum ene anehng anehng l'k'gbo ndi.
42020001	Efung abehng eji Jisos jo tib ane go etahk Esowo, fere jo tiingi bo nnoobo etib, owo atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kehm lohngo ba,
42020002	ba bahb-e re, “Tong-r, nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi wahnge a kpo lim nsol ana nyia? Nne awo ka-a ka nsahm ny'nehm a?”
42020003	Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Me fvfo, m bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe. Tong-m wahn,
42020004	anv, ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng go ejahbetul Esowoa, afi lohng goji ane?”
42020005	Bo kehm kehme eltoobo atemtem re, “E l'tong re, ‘Lohng go ejahbetul Esowo,’ á bahke bungu re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń ki taame tv Jon?’
42020006	E l'fere tong re, ‘Lohng goji ane,’ ane kpee bahk-r atal tuubu.” Tibre bo jo sahb k'kahn re, Jon jolo nnyehnamahr Esowo.
42020007	Owo wahnge bo kehm faange re, bo nehme kahn edi ji lohng no ba.
42020008	Jisos kehm tob tong bo re, “Ano wo fvfo n l'ki-n tob tong nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi wahnge n kpo lim nsol nyia.”
42020009	Jisos kehm tubu elgan nia tong ane re, “Nne awohng jolo go, no bahme avain go ege etahngga, fere rod yaame ane, kehm tahme eje song rehng go ejahbe jehko, kang go ekidi l'lab.
42020010	Ngare biingi kan a me, á kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe tv ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje re bo song bong akab nti nyandiki go etahngga ba ka-e. Abayaame etahngga bao fere dv-e na, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
42020011	“Owo á kehm kpe tum nlokeltum noko. Ye fvfo, bo tob dv-e ano, fere son-e, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
42020012	Á kehm kpe bulu, kpe tum noko. Noa ana, bo bom-e elok, fere kam-e yake go.
42020013	“Owo nfono etahngga noo kehm bungu re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan abee? M bahke gohro tum akor-m mmon ewame. Fundiki á bahke bo lub.’
42020014	“Eji abayaame etahngga bao nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, ‘Ye wo li nlehkelkv, nong, wahr wulen ye, eji etahngga jia l'fere jol j'jahre.’
42020015	Owo bo kehm-e yehke go etahngga jio, song wul-e. “Anv, jen ji nfono etahngga noo bahke bo lim?
42020016	Á bahke bake ba wul abayaame etahngga bao, fere faake etahngga jio ka ane bandiki.” Eji ane bao wuku ano, bo kehm bungu re, “Esowo k'taame!”
42020017	Owo Jisos kehm seenge bo too, kehm bungu re, “Anv, edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo renan, ji bungu re, “ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no, ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahme?’
42020018	Nne awohng awohng no l'gbo go eltal nio, á bahke banne. Eltal nio l'fere gbo na, nyede nne, bahk-e wade na wade.”
42020019	At'tibi ba atahm, a atubesi abalimajom gare re bo bob Jisos ngare ny'nehm ona. Tibre bo jo kahne re, á tubu elgan nio bada bo. Fvfo, bo jo f'fahl ane.
42020020	Owo bo kehm-e kehme elbaabe, fere tum ane ba bo ka bo ngu, bo song kehme awak lim, are bo atingitingi ane ba, eji bo l'bob-e go ege alum nnyo, fere yak-e kak ntubesi ejahbe go ebo, eji á l'lam-e.
42020021	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, e kp'kahne re, wo kpo bung, fere tib go nseenga nseenge. Wo kpehme rang nnene. A kpo lohko tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi.
42020022	Anv, atahm enyahre t'taame ka-r re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi taamem?”
42020023	Jisos k'kahn awak ebo. Owo á kehm tongo bo re,
42020024	bo tib-e nsiring, kehm fere bahb bo re, “Anv, esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Nyi ntul a Rom nyi.”
42020025	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Kaan ntul a Rom ji li ka-e, wahn ka Esowo ji li ka Esowo.”
42020026	Bo we maam tiki bob go ellum anehng anehng go esamahr ane. Owo bo kehm belle, tib eji nfaange enye jo kpo bo esi.
42020027	Egom Sadusi jindiki kehm lohngo ba goji Jisos. Bo ba li ane ba kpo bung re, “Elnyahme go elkv limm.”
42020028	Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nt'tibi, Moses nyono ntahm ka-r re, ‘Nne l'kpo, nkal ewe sa, eji á ki jel mmon awohng awohng, mmonannyehn nkvne bahke koko nnenkal noo, jel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
42020029	“Jolo abonanyehn na asehma. Ngbokambang kehm koko nkal. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á kpo.
42020030	Etoono kehm tob ko nnenkal nonehm o, kehm kpoko.
42020031	Noko gona kehm kpe ko nnenkal nonehm o. Ano wo jolo a ane asehma bao kpee. Mmon awohng awohng bo jelem, kehm kpoko.
42020032	Es'kohro, nnenkal noo gohro kpo.
42020033	Go efung bi ane l'nyahme go elkv, á bahke jolo nkal a nyehne? Tibre bo ane asehma kpee ko-e ana nkal abo.”
42020034	Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba li eying jia ji anv kpo ko akal, anebkal bal alum.
42020035	Ane ba fuumu re bo nyahme go elkv, fere jol go eying ji kp'bake nehm kpe jo ko akal, anebkal nehm kpe jo bal alum.
42020036	Bo nehm kpe jo kpo, tibre bobjol ana babenjel. Eji bo ma nyahme go elkv, bobfere jol abon ba Esowo.
42020037	Elnyahme go elkv nia. Jol Moses tib-r tib, eji á nyono bade eti jio ji jo lul. Owo á lungu Ntul Esowo re, ‘Esowo bio bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’
42020038	Á limm Esowo bi akvne, á li Esowo bi ane ba li go elkpin. Tibre bo kp'kpini ka ye.”
42020039	At'tibi ba atahm bandiki kehm faange re, “Nt'tibi, a bungu go nseenge.”
42020040	Bo kpeem sahb bahb Jisos mbahbe anyehng anyehng.
42020041	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, jen ji wahnge bo kpo bung re, Mesaya mmon a Devid wo?
42020042	Tibre yefono Devid bungu go nwer a Saams re, “ ‘Ntul Esowo tongo ntul ewame re, Ji go egame ejang eboblum,
42020043	tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
42020044	Eji Devid lung-e re, ‘Ntul ewame’, anv, á kehm jolo mmon ewe renan?”
42020045	Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe go esamahr ane kpee re,
42020046	“Jo gberen at'tibi ba atahm, ba kpo kor bo re bo jo kak akpawobo yannge. Kpo kor bo re, ane jo gong, kak bo nnyo go are. Go ekp'kpa ero, afi jolo go nkak, kpo kor bo re bo jo ji adi nji nya aj'jok ane kpo ji.
42020047	Bo kpo taare akalebun ntahk ebo, fere jo kak alaabe aro go nnyo a nnyo. Elam ji bo bahke gbale sehng.”
42021001	Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm nyehne afang ane kp'kake akpohko ayare ebo go elkohl akpohko ni jolo go etahk Esowo.
42021002	Á kehm tob nyehn nkpak a nkalebun kp'kake ederi ebbal.
42021003	Owo á kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nkpak a nkalebun noa wo ga ka sehnge bo ane kpee.
42021004	Egom jehko jo ka gbalee, jo sa bo gbalee go. Ye ji li nkpak ka kpee ji á bele no, ji kehn á jol ma ko, gunu nsol alehke.”
42021005	Egom ebo jindiki jo bungu bade etahk Esowo, ana bo liibi no go anoobo atal, a nsol nyi bo ko akpohko ayare gunu. Owo Jisos kehm bungu re,
42021006	“Bada nsol nyi ń kp'nyehne a, ngare kp'bake nyi eltal anehng anehng l'k'kpe sa kuumu a ntem. Bo bahke wake kpee wohng ndi.”
42021007	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, anv, jia bahke limi ngare anyi? Ellingi ani bahke tibi re, yahke ba ellimi?”
42021008	Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Jo kunen ekpu, eji bo l'ki-n nehm. Tibre ane gbalee bahke bake go egama mbing, fere jo bung re, ‘Me wo a!’ fere bung re, ‘Ngare ebkabbe!’ Kana jo toono bo!
42021009	Ń l'wuk bada nta, fere wuk bade ana ane bahke kehme asi tab, fere jo ten atubesi ebo, kana jo fahl! Nsol nyio bahke tohko gbo mbang lim. Fvfo, lohngem re, es'kohro ji ma kabbe o.”
42021010	Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Ejahbe ajehng ajehng bahke noko a njahm ejahbe nyehko. Ajahbe bahke jo nok atemtem.
42021011	Adi nyandiki, ndi bahke jo gbehke sehng. Njal bahke jolo, a ayam nya bahke jo sehnge ane. Amenngemennge nsol, a agburu nliingi bahke jo tib go elbung.
42021012	“Re nsol nyia kpee kehm limi, bo bahke jo bob-n, fere jo nohk-n, jo ko-n tahm a nahne go ntahk ero, fere jo kak-n go ngbekobo. Bo bahk-n jo ko tahm a nahne, song yiimi go esamahr atul, a atubesi tib go egama mbing.
42021013	Jia ji bahk-n limi, eji ń l'yiimi ntianse ka-m.
42021014	“Nong, ntim enyahne jo tahn-n, eji ń l'k'jo tiiri ana ḿ bahke faange, ngare kehm rehnge.
42021015	Tibre m bahk-n kake alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, fere ka-n elkahne, eji anebekv ebahne l'k'ma faange, fere jo ten.
42021016	Jol babnso ejahne, a abonane ejahne, a nnahb enyahne, a ate ebahne bahk-n jabbe ka. Egom ejahne jindiki, bo bahke wulu na bo.
42021017	Ane kpee bahk-n koko ekv tib go egama mbing.
42021018	Jol ellv esi enahne anehng anehng limm, ni bahke tane.
42021019	Ń l'jo kpuumu, ḿ bahke tahre atohko enyahne.”
42021020	Ń l'nyehn nlong nsoja ma ba sennge Jerusalem kak, owo ḿ bahke kahne re, bahke gulu elrannge.
42021021	Nong, ane ba li go Judea be song go awong ngare nyio, ane ba li go Jerusalem tahm ejahbe jio song. Ane ba li go bo ebgbe, nong, bo k'kpe feere ba go Jerusalem.
42021022	Tibre afung nyao nya li afung elbongo, eji nsol kpee nyi bo nyono go nwer Esowo l'lohko jol go etingitingi.
42021023	Eyuu a anebkal ba bahke jolo ela, a ane ba bahke jo yab abon ngare nyio. Ndon bahke gbale sehng ejahbe jio. Erakatahng ji Esowo bahke gboko kuumu ane bao.
42021024	Bo bahke wulu bo go ekahngkahng. Egom jehko, bo bahke bobo bo, tahm abo, bo song jol aneb agbekobo go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji li go njini. Ane baka baka bahke jo kadde Jerusalem go akpade akpade tete ngare abo biingi.
42021025	“Nliingi bahke jo tib go njul, fere jo tib go ebareka, a alonlo. Ane ba li go njini, ala bahke jo teele bo, eko fere jo tan bo. Bo nehm jo kahn ji bo bahke limi tib go ewahl ji agburu aya, a ebuku bahke jo wahl.
42021026	Ane bahke jo gbo elkv tib elfahle, eji bo kp'siki nsol nyi kp'bake go njini kpee. Tibre atahm nya kpi elbung bahke range.
42021027	Owo bo bahke nyehne Mmon no nne kp'bake go ekparesemsem, a nsahm, a egburu ellub.
42021028	“Nsol nyio l'kehme ellimi, kpiiden asamahr enyahne go ero, wahn tab asi enyahne wahre, tibre eltahre enahne kp'kabbe abake.”
42021029	Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan re, “Kpuren eti ji bo kpo lung re efig, a nti nyehko kpee.
42021030	Ń l'soro ny'nyehn eji ma kehme elnyono, ḿ bahke kahne re, nnale yahke ba.
42021031	Mbang ny'nehm nyi, ń l'tob nyehn nsol nyio kpee kp'limi, ḿ bahke kahne fvfo re, etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.
42021032	Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio nehm kpo tete nsol nyio kpee lim.
42021033	Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.
42021034	“Jo baaben elnahne, goji nkak alimi, a amahm awoko a at'tiiri nya elkpin nia l'ki-n gbal go egahna ntim, eji efung bio l'ki-n gbede na.
42021035	Tibre efung bio bahke gbede ane kpee ba li go njini, ana ntahmfuk nyi bo kpo saade konngo nsahre.
42021036	Jo baaben ngare kpe kpe, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń l'bel eko ji ḿ bahke foro go nsol nyio kpee nyi bahke limi, wahn fere yiimi go esamahr bi Mmon no nne.”
42021037	Efung abehng abehng Jisos jo tibi go etahk Esowo. Atv l'behde, á jo kono eljeke song kang go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
42021038	Efungfu atv atv ane kpee jo lohngo ba go etahk Esowo re bo ba wuk-e.
42022001	Eji elkak ni bo jo li abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist ma kabbe, ni bo kpo lung re Pasova,
42022002	owo atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm jo seb mbang ana nyi bo bahke wulu Jisos. Fvfo, bo jo f'fahl ane.
42022003	Ngare nyio nnehm kehm yele Judas ji bo jo lung-e re Iskariot, ji woomo go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ewubu ane abal.
42022004	Owo Judas kehm tahme song kpiri atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo, fere toobo a bo ana á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo.
42022005	Atahng yebe bo sehng, owo bo kehm taame re, bo bahk-e kake akpohko.
42022006	Judas kehm taame, kehm kehme mbang seb nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo, eji ane bako ki li.
42022007	Owo efung kehm ba rehng bi elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist, bi bo jo wul abon ejoro ba Pasova.
42022008	Jisos kehm tongo Pita abola Jon re bo song toobo edi bum bo, ji bo bahke lehke elkak Pasova. Owo á kehm tumu bo tv.
42022009	Re bo kehm tahme, bo tohk-e bahb re, “Gan wo a kp'sebe re wahr song toobo bum?”
42022010	Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Wuungen atung! Ń l'yel go nla ejahbe, ḿ bahke wane nne no solo etulahb. Toonen ye, song go etahk ji á bahke yange,
42022011	wahn tong nfontahk re, ‘Nt'tibi kp-a bahbe re, Gan wo ekp'kpa li no, ji m bahke jehke, li elkak Pasova, a abat'toono ebame?’
42022012	Á bahk-n tibi egburu ekp'kpa ajehng ji li go ero enyong ji bo ma jehke nti. Owo ḿ bahke toobo nsol kpee bum.”
42022013	Bo kehm lohko tahm, lohko song nyehn ejum ajehng ajehng ana Jisos tongo bo, kehm toobo nsol elkak Pasova bum.
42022014	Eji ngare biingi no, á kehm song ji go ekp'kuru, a abatiingetib ebe.
42022015	Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo kor-m sehng re me n li elkak Pasova nia a nahne, kehm nyehne erem.
42022016	Tibre n kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe tiki li elkak nia, tete n li etingitingi elkak a nahne go ejahbetul Esowo.”
42022017	Owo á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn wo, wahn ane kpee.
42022018	Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Bomo anv asongo n nehm kpe tiki wo alahb avain tete etul bi Esowo ba.”
42022019	Owo á kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke, ka bo, kehm bungu re, “A wo li ngubjing enyame, nyi bo kp-n kake. Jo limen ana, eji ń l'jo buum-m.”
42022020	Eji bo ma li nsol mal, go mbang ny'nehm nyi á tob ka bo nkob, fere bung re, “Nkob nyia nyi li egbanngalung ji nfenfe tib go alung emame ma kp'fabe ka-n.
42022021	“Nyehnen, nne no kp-m gungu, á jehk a name ana go ekp'kuru.
42022022	Tibre Mmon no nne bahke kpoko ana Esowo toobo no. Eyuu a nne no kp-e gungu.”
42022023	Owo bo kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Nne awo go egahre ellong no bahke limi elkohn ejum ana jia?”
42022024	Owo nfaabe kehm gboko abat'toono Jisos bada nne no bo bahk-e bumu ana nne no ga gbal go bo ellong.
42022025	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Atul ba njini nyia kp'kpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane ebo. Atubesi ane, bo kpo lung bo re, ‘Akubi!’
42022026	Ano sang bahke jolo go egahne. Ga nob re nne no ga gbal go egahne ellong jol ana mmonse. Ntubesi bahke jolo ana nlokeltum.
42022027	Anv, nne awo ga gbal, nne no jehk go ekp'kuru, afi nne no kp-e loko wo? No jehk go ekp'kuru sang ga gbal? Eji n li a nahne, n li ana nl'loko.
42022028	“Wahn ba li ane ba ma jol a name kpee go egame elgaare.
42022029	Ana nsoo ma-m ka ejahbe re me n fili, ano wo fvfo m ma-n tob ka,
42022030	eji ń l'jo li nsol ekp'kuru ajehng a name go egame ejahbetul, fere ji go nti etul, jo lam ewubu et'tohngo ebbal bi Israel.”
42022031	Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu re, “Saimon, nnehm sebe re á ko nsahm nyi á bahk-n febe ana bo kpo febe arasi.
42022032	Me n kak ero ka-a, eji a l'k'gbo go egama mbang. Ngare nyi a ma fere gbo ndon, jo kak abonane eko!”
42022033	Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, me n toobo ebjing re me n je ngbekobo a na, jol afi elkv ni, m bahke kpoko a na.”
42022034	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Pita, n kp-a tongo re, Lela a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me a nehme kahn, nkok kehm kuku.”
42022035	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ngare nyi n tum-n no, eji ń ki fili abon abam akpohko, fere fili abam efilibo, a akpaketa, ejum jia ji rin-n noa?” Bo kehm faange re, “Ejumjum wahr rinem.”
42022036	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne no l'bel mmombam akpohko, afi á bele ebam efilibo, nong, á fili. Nong, nne no ki kpi ekahngkahng gungu mbomo eme, song gunu.
42022037	Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re, ‘Bo m-e fange kak go ellong abi ane’, bahke lohko jol go etingitingi. Tibre ji bo nyono bada name bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
42022038	Owo abat'toono ebe kehm bungu re, “Ntul, nyehn akahngkahng na abal a!” Á kehm faange bo re, “Ebgbal.”
42022039	Jisos kehm lohngo tahm go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, ana á jo kono ellimi. Abat'toono ebe tahm toon-e.
42022040	Eji á song rehng edi jio, á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo kaken ero, eji ń l'k'yel go elgaare.”
42022041	Á kehm jeere song rehng go es'song ekidi labe ana nne bahke roko eltal song rehng. Owo á kehm jamme alahng, kehm kehme ero kak re,
42022042	“Nsoo, l'kor-a, fak-m nkob erem nyia! Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
42022043	Owo enjel kehm soro lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba kak-e eko.
42022044	Eji ala jo sahb teel-e teele, á kehm nyennge, jo kak ero. Nwuuru nyi á wuuru no, nyi jo toongo wohngo ndi jolo ana agburu atoongo alung.
42022045	Eji á mehle go edi ji á jo kak ero, á kehm feere goji abat'toono ebe, song kpiri bo, bo kp'lale, tib ndon nyi jo fili bo.
42022046	Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'lale? Tahmen, wahn kak ero, eji ń l'k'yel go elgaare.”
42022047	Eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, ellong ane kehm soro lohng abake. Nne no bo jo lung-e re Judas ji woomo go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, ye wo jo tib bo mbang. Eji bo ma rehng goji Jisos, Judas kehm jeere kohlo Jisos re á sod-e nnyo.
42022048	Owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Judas, anv, a bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka go nnyo asoda?”
42022049	Eji abat'toono Jisos nyehne ji yahke lim, owo bo kehm bahbe re, “Ntul, wahr ko akahngkahng enyahre, song nok a boa?”
42022050	Nne awohng go bo ellong kehm fohko ekahngkahng ebe, kpale nju nyi ntubesi abalimajom etung eboblum.
42022051	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka kpe lim ano!” Á kehm rodo etung nne noo, feere a bi lak-e, á nob.
42022052	Jisos kehm bahbe atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo, a anebkul nfam ba ba re bo ba bob-e re, “Ń lohngo a akahngkahng, a atahmtahm atahmtahm ana ń kp'bake a nwajv boba?
42022053	N jo jolo a nahne go etahk Esowo efung abehng abehng, me ń lakem abo. A wo li ngare enyahne, a nyi atubesi ba ejannge.”
42022054	Owo bo kehm bobo Jisos tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi abalimajom. Jisos jo jene ekv, Pita jen ekv.
42022055	Bo kono agun go nlaaga nyio, ji sennge kak. Pita kehm tob song ji o a bo.
42022056	Eji nlokeltum no jolo nnenkal nyehne Pita jehk go agun, owo á kehm-e seenge too, kehm bungu re, “Nne noa fvfo tob jolo a ne!”
42022057	Owo Pita kehm gbaame re, “Nnenkal, me we n nehme kahn.”
42022058	Eji ma kpe ji mmongare ntiil, nne noko kehm-e tob nyehn, kehm bungu re, “A tob wob go bo ellong.” Owo Pita kehm tene re, “E'ee mbi, me sang.”
42022059	Eji ma kpe ji ejum awa anyehng, nne noko kehm kpe bung t'tahne re, “Etingitingi, nne noa tob jolo a ne fvfo, tibre ye nne a Galili wo.”
42022060	Owo Pita kehm faange re, “Mbi, n nehme kahn ji a kp'b'bung.” Tvtv ona eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, nkok kehm soro kuk.
42022061	Ntul a Jisos kehm soro keebe, seenge Pita. Owo Pita kehm buumu ellum ni Ntul a Jisos bungu no tong-e re, “Re nkok kehm kuku lela, a bahk-m tene nkpel era.”
42022062	Pita kehm soro lohng ona, song kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
42022063	Ane ba jabbe Jisos kehm-e kehme elnyoko, fere jo dv-e.
42022064	Bo tob gba-e mbomo go esamahr, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nyehn amahr me! Anv, nne awo ma-a rum?”
42022065	Bo kpe bung alum nyako gbalee, nya bo jo su-e.
42022066	Eji efungfu ma se, anebkul Jus, atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm kehm ba kono edi ajehng, kehm koko Jisos ba a ne go bo elam, kehm-e tongo re,
42022067	“Tong-r, joare wo wo li Mesaya!” Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “N l'tong-n anv, ń nehm taame.
42022068	N l'fere bahb-n na, ń nehm faange.
42022069	Bomo anv asongo, Mmon no nne bahke jehke go eboblum Esowo bi gbale sehng.”
42022070	Bo ane kpee kehm bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li Mmon no Esowoa?” Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me wo, ḿ bungu nseenge.”
42022071	Owo bo kehm bungu re, “Anv, e bahke kpe seb ntiansea? Wahrfono antahng ebwuk go ege a nnyo.”
42023001	Ellong ane bao kpee kehm tahme, ko Jisos song rehng a ne goji Pailet.
42023002	Owo bo kehm-e kehme ebi ka re, “E sebe kahn re, nne noa kpi ane ebahre rannge, fere jo sahd-r re wahr k'kpe tahb etak ka Ntul a Rom, fere jo bung re, ye wo li Kraist ji li ntul.”
42023003	Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li ntul no Jusa?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo, a bungu nseenge.”
42023004	Pailet kehm tongo atubesi abalimajom, a ellong ane bao re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng n nyehnem ji nne noa ma lim.”
42023005	Bo kehm kpe nyennge na, jo bung re, “Á kpo lim ntim ane jo jokko go ege eltibi. Á bomo go Galili, á ma yannge go Judea kpee, anv, á ma ba a.”
42023006	Eji Pailet wuku ano, á kehm bahbe, joare Jisos nne a Galili wo.
42023007	Á kahne kan a re á lohng go ejahbe ji ntul a Herod kp'fili, á kehm-e tumu tv Herod ji jolo go Jerusalem ngare nyio.
42023008	Eji Herod nyehne Jisos, atahng yeb-e sehng. Tibre á bomo elsebe wuku wuku re á nyehn-e, tib eji á wuku bada ne. Á jo tob sebe re á nyehn nkpokosi nyindiki nyi á bahke limi.
42023009	Owo Herod kehm bahbe Jisos abahbe tvv, jol Jisos we tikem faange.
42023010	Atubesi abalimajom, a at'tibi ba atahm tob jolo ona fvfo. Owo bo jo ka-e ebi gbalee.
42023011	Herod, a nsoja enye bum Jisos daange daange daange, fere jo nyok-e, kehm-e kake ekpawobo ji nno a nno, ji jo nyane go amahr, kehm-e tumu tv Pailet.
42023012	Efung bio bi, Herod abola Pailet, bo fere jol go etem, tibre wuku wuku bo jolo go ekv.
42023013	Pailet kehm lungu atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane, a ane bako,
42023014	kehm tongo bo re, “Ń ko nne noa ba kak-m go ebo, no ḿ bungu re á kpi ane rannge. Eji m bahb-e abahbe go egahne esamahr, n nyehnem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ji wahnge ń kp-e kake ebi.
42023015	Ano wo fvfo tob jol goji Herod, tib eji á feere a ne ba ka-m. Nne noa limem ejumjum ji fuumu re bo wul-e.
42023016	Owo wahnge m bahke tongo, bo dv-e, n fere yak-e, á song.”
42023017	Elkak Pasova anehng anehng Pailet jo yehke nne a ngbekobo awohng ka bo.
42023018	Ellong ane bao kpee kehm rabe nnyo nnyo amehng re, “Song a nne noo, wo song wul-e, wo yake Barabas ka-r.”
42023019	Barabas, bo kak-e ngbekobo tib eji á jo jokko ejahbe, fere wul nne.
42023020	Pailet jo sebe re á yehke Jisos yake, owo á kehm kpe bung a bo.
42023021	Bo kpe rabe na re, “Kum-e go ekros! Kum-e go ekros!”
42023022	Owo Pailet kehm kpe bahb bo go nkpel era re, “Anv, jen ji wahnge? Ebi aji á limi no? N nyehnem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ji fuumu re bo wul-e. M bahke tongo bo dv-e, n fere yehk-e yake.”
42023023	Bo kehm kpe ny'nyennge na, jo rabe wahre wahre wahre re bo kum-e go ekros. Es'kohro elrabe ni bo jo gohro rabe kehm gake Pailet.
42023024	Owo á kehm kimi elam ana bo jo seb,
42023025	fere yehke nne no bo sebe no yake, no bo kak-e ngbekobo tib eji á jo jokko ejahbe, fere wul nne, kehm fere yehke Jisos ka, bo lim-e ana koro bo.
42023026	Eji bo ko Jisos, jo tahm a ne, bo kehm song wane nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Saimon, ji jolo nne a Sirin. Á lohngo go mmojahbe noko kp'tahme go Jerusalem. Bo kehm-e bobo, kun-e ekros re á sol, jo toono Jisos go njahm.
42023027	Ellong ane gbalee ba jo toono Jisos, a anebkal ba jo ling-e ndon ndon.
42023028	Owo Jisos kehm keebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Anebkal ba Jerusalem, ka ma wahn kpe ling! Lingen elnahne, wahn ling abon ebahne!
42023029	Tibre ngare kp'bake nyi bo bahke bungu re, ‘Elfuulu li ka agum anebkal, ba kala j'jel, bo ji kala y'yabe abon.’
42023030	Owo bo bahke kehme elbungu tong awong re, ‘Gboon bul-r!’
42023031	Esowo l'lim eti mbir mbir ano, l'lim renan, á l'k'tob lim ekpakv eti ano?”
42023032	Ane abal bako ba jolo abi ane, bo tob ko bo tahm a bo re bo tob song wul bo a Jisos.
42023033	Eji bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re edi nkpakesi, owo bo kehm kumu Jisos go ekros, a abi ane bao fvfo, noko go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
42023034	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, tahm ka bo, tibre bo nehme kahn ji bo kp'limi.” Bo kehm tubu elfaange, eji bo l'kahn ana bo bahke baange nsol ebjing enye.
42023035	Ane yiimi ona, jo nyehn, eji atubesi Jus jo nyok-e re, “Á kpo tahre ane bako, nong, á tob tahre elne, joare ye wo li Kraist ji Esowo ma yehke.”
42023036	Nsoja t'tob nyok-e fvfo, owo bo kehm bake re bo ba ka-e amahm,
42023037	fere bung re, “L'jol re wo wo li ntul no Jus, tahre elna!”
42023038	Bo tob nyono nwer lake kohlo go ege esi. Nwer nyio bo nyono go Grik, Latin, a Hibru re, “A WO LI NTUL NO JUS.”
42023039	Ebi nne ajehng ji tob kpaake go ekros kohlo Jisos, kehm-e suku re, “Wo sang li Mesayaa? Tahre elna, wo tob tahr-r me!”
42023040	Noko kehm-e nyame re, “Anv, a nehme fahl Esowoa, eji bo ma tob kimi elam re bo wul-aa?
42023041	Wahr kp'nyehne erem bia go nseenge. Tibre e kp'bele eltuuru enahre ni fuumu re wahr bel go nsol nyi e limi no. Wo, nne noa, jol ebi ajehng ajehng á limem.”
42023042	Owo á kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Buum-m, a l'ba ji go ega eti etul.”
42023043	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Lela a bahke jolo a name go ejahbetul Esowo.”
42023044	Jolo ejum nkaranka ewubbal nyi efin, nyi ejannge gbo no ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung.
42023045	Njul kpeem ya. Ekpiki ji tokko go etahk Esowo kehm yange ejang ebbal.
42023046	Owo Jisos kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Nsoo, me n yake etohko ejame kak go ega ebo.” Eji á ma bung ano mal, á soro kpo.
42023047	Ntubesi a nsoja nyehne kan ji ma lim, á kehm kehme Esowo tehk, fere bung re, “Etingitingi, nne noa lohko jol etingi nne.”
42023048	Ellong ane ba kame ba rur re bo ba nyehn ana bo bahke wulu Jisos, eji bo nyehne ji ma lim, bo kehm feere ebo kehnge ndon ndon.
42023049	Ane kpee ba kahne Jisos, a anebkal ba lohngo go Galili toon-e ba rehng o, bo yiimi ebo fee, jo nyehn nsol nyia.
42023050	Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Josef ji lohng go ejahbe Jus ji bo jo lung re Arimatia. Á jolo nnooba nne, no jolo go etingitingi, fere jol ntul esub.
42023051	Á jo siki etul bi Esowo bi kp'bake. Owo wahnge á ki taame tv ntoobo ebo nyi bo toobo no, fere lim.
42023052	Á kehm tahme song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame, á song fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji.
42023053	Owo á kehm song fono ekv ji Jisos, fere kpennge ekpowo, rod song kak go elahm bi á rahme go ekpartal, bi bo kala k'kak nne awohng awohng.
42023054	Jolo efung bi bo jo toobo ebjing bi Esabat yahke rehng.
42023055	Anebkal ba lohngo go Galili jo toono Jisos kehm tob ba nyehn elahm, fere nyehn ana bo kak-e no.
42023056	Owo bo kehm feere, ba toobo anyane, fere toobo akehng bum. Efung Esabat bo kehm jehke, re ekv, ana ntahm bungu no.
42024001	Ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu atv atv, bo kehm rodo anyane nya bo toobo no, tahm a nya go elahm.
42024002	Eji bo rehnge go, bo kehm song nyehn eltal nio ma bannge go nnyo elahm, noongo go nkpe.
42024003	Owo bo kehm maade yel, jol ekv ji Ntul a Jisos bo nyehnem.
42024004	Eji bo yim o, ma bil bo amahr, bo kehm soro nyehn ane abal yim kohlo bo, ba kake nsol nyi jo nyane.
42024005	Eji anebkal bao jo fahl, fere kohk asamahr go ndi, ane bao na abal kehm soro kehme elbungu a bo re, “Jen ji wahng ń kp'sebe nne a mbir mbir go ellong akvne?
42024006	Ana á limm. Yebnyahme. Buumen ana á tong-n no ngare nyi á kpeke li go Galili re,
42024007	‘Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e yake, kak abi ane go ebo, bo kum-e go ekros, l'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.’ ”
42024008	Owo anebkal bao kehm soro buumu alum enye,
42024009	kehm lohngo go elahm feere, song tooro nsol nyio tong abat'toono ebe, ewubu a nne awohng, fere tob tong erik ane bako fvfo.
42024010	Anebkal ba tongo abatiingetib nsol nyia jolo Meri ji lohng go Magdala, Joanna, Meri nnyehn Jems, a anebkal bako ba tob jol a bo fvfo.
42024011	Abatiingetib, alum nya anebkal bao tongo bo jolo bo ana emongo. Bo taamem tv bo.
42024012	Pita kehm tahme, be song rehng go elahm, kehm song reme fahng, nyehn akpowo nya nya nong no. Owo á kehm feere kehnge, fere jo tir bade ji ma lim.
42024013	Efung b'nehm ona ane abal ba woomo go bo ellong lohngo jo tahm go ejahbe ji bo kpo lung re Emmaus ji jolo ejum mmal esehma, a l'tahm go Jerusalem.
42024014	Bo jo tubu eka atemtem bada nsol nyia kpee nyi ma lim.
42024015	Eji bo kpi mbungu mbungu atemtem, fere jo tiiri, yefono Jisos kehm lohngo ba kpiri bo, jo jen a bo.
42024016	Ngare nyio amahr ebo ka lennge, owo bo ki-e liingi.
42024017	Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kp'bungu tong atemtem, eji ń kp'jene asongo ndon ndon?”
42024018	Owo nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Kleopas kehm-e faange re, “Anv, wo ntahngtahng wo ga li njenne nyi li go Jerusalema, nyi kil kahne nsol nyi ma lim a afung nyaa?”
42024019	Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Nsol anyi?” Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsol nyi ma lim Jisos ji Nasaret, ji jolo nnyehnamahr no jo bung alum nya kpi nsahm, fere jo lim agburu akpokosi go esamahr Esowo, a esamahr bi ane kpee.
42024020	Atubesi abalimajom ebahre, a atubesi ebahre ba yak-e no ka re bo kimi elam ji bo bahk-e wulu. Owo bo kehm-e kumu go ekros.
42024021	Wahr jo kunu ekpu re, ye wo bahke fake Israel yake. Gana yebkpo! Lela nfung era nyi a, nyi nsol nyia limi no.
42024022	“Fvfo, ji ma-r kpe kp'kpo esi, anebkal bandiki ba wob go egahre ellong fungu efungfu atv atv, je go elahm,
42024023	ekv eje bo nyehnem. Bo kehm feere ba, ba bung re, bobnyehn nkpokosi ejum, eji bo nyehne enjel nyi tongo bo re, á noa go elkpin.
42024024	Egom jindiki ji woomo go egahre ellong kehm jeke go elahm, lohko song nyehn jang jang ana anebkal bao bungu no, sehngem yefono wo bo ki-e nyehn.”
42024025	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn agboolo ane baa, jen ji wahnge kpo riid-n go eltaame ejum ajehng ajehng ji anyehnamahr nyono no?
42024026	Tiki li re, Mesaya gbo mbang nyehn erem bia kpee, kehm yele go ege ellub.”
42024027	Owo Jisos kehm lennge adi nwer Esowo kpee nya bungu bada ne tong bo, bomo go awer nya Moses, a awer nya anyehnamahr kpee.
42024028	Bo kehm kabbe ejahbe ji bo fi no. Jo jolo are Jisos yahke sehng asongo.
42024029	Bo kehm-e gboongo re, “Ba kang a nahre, tibre elgung ebba, gana ejannge ebkehme elgboko.” Owo á kehm song yel ekp'kpa re á song kang goji bo.
42024030	Eji á ji ekp'kuru, jo li nsol a bo, owo á kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, bakke, ka bo.
42024031	Owo amahr ebo kehm soro lennge, bo kehm-e soro liingi. Á kehm soro lamme.
42024032	Owo bo kehm kehme elbungu, jo tong atemtem re, “Ano wo wahnge alum enye jo yall-r, eji á jo bung a nahre go mbang, fere jo lennge nwer Esowo tong-r.”
42024033	Owo bo kehm soro mehl tvtv, feere go Jerusalem, ba nyehn abat'toono Jisos, ewubu a nne awohng ma ba kono edi ajehng, a ane ba tob jol a bo o fvfo,
42024034	ba jo bung re, “Ntul a Jisos eblohko nyahme go etingitingi. Saimon m-e nyehn.”
42024035	Owo ane abal bao kehm tob tooro ana ji limi go mbang tong bo, ana bo liing-e no ngare nyi á bakke ebred.
42024036	Eji bo kpi mbungu mbungu, yefono Jisos kehm soro ba lohng go bo elka, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Elkoono jol a nahne!”
42024037	Kehm mennge bo, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tir re, etohko ji bo kp'nyehne a.
42024038	Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge eko ma-n tan ana? Jen ji wahnge ń kp'faabe go egahna ntim?
42024039	Nyehnen abo enyame, wahn nyehn akpade enyame fvfo, eji ń l'kahn re mefono antahng wo. Dam-m wahn, wahn nyehn. Tibre etohko, ngubjing kpimm, ana ḿ ma-m nyehn, n kpi no.”
42024040	Á bungu kan ano mal, á kehm tibi bo abo enye, a akpade akpade.
42024041	Eji bo kala tiki taame tib go eyebatahng ji bo bele no, a esi ji jo kpo bo, owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kp'kpi ejum ajehng ajehng a, ji ellehka?”
42024042	Bo kehm-e kake ekv nsahre ji bo ma lam.
42024043	Owo á kehm taare li go bo esamahr.
42024044	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Alum enyame nya ana, nya n jo bung a nahne ngare nyi n kpeke li a nahne re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo nyono bada name go atahm nya Moses, fere nyon go awer nya abanyehnamahr, a nwer a Saams bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
42024045	Owo á kehm lennge ntim ebo, eji bo l'kahn nwer Esowo,
42024046	fere tong bo re, “Ana wo bo nyono re, Mesaya bahke nyehne erem, l'kang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv,
42024047	bo fere tiingi ane kpee ba li go njini etib bi egbokondon, a bi eltahmeka go abiafem. Go Jerusalem wo, bo bahke bomo etib bio go eltiingi go ege a mbing.
42024048	Wahn ba li atianse go nsol nyia.
42024049	M bahke tumu ji nsoo nyame no tv-n. Jolen ejahbe jia a, tete nsahm nyi bahke lohngo go ero, lohng ba tob-n.”
42024050	Owo á kehm rodo bo, tahm abo song rehng go Betani. Owo á kehm tabe abo enye wahre, fuulu bo.
42024051	Eji á jo fuulu bo, á kehm soro tahm bo sa. Nsahm nyi Esowo rod-e tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo.
42024052	Bo kehm feere go Jerusalem, a egburu eyebatahng.
42024053	Bo jo jolo go etahk Esowo ngare anyehng anyehng, jo tehk Esowo, fere jo kak-e saam.
43001001	Go mbomannahb Ellum ni jolo. Ellum nio ni jolo a Esowo. Ellum nio ni jolo Esowo.
43001002	Ellum nio ni jolo a Esowo go mbomannahb.
43001003	Ni ni Esowo ko, lim nsol kpee. Ki li ye, kehn ejumjum jolem jolo ji ma jol.
43001004	Ege wo elkpin jolo no. Elkpin nia ni jolo ellennge ka ane.
43001005	Ellennge nio li ana agun nya kp'yake go ejannge. Ejannge jio ka tiki lahme agun nyao.
43001006	Nne awohng jolo go, no Esowo tum-e no, no bo jo lung-e re Jon.
43001007	Á ba re á ba yiimi ntianse bade ellennge nio, eji ane kpee l'taame tib go alum nya á bungu no.
43001008	Ye sang jolo ellennge nio. Á ba re á ba yiimi ntianse ka ellennge nio.
43001009	Etingitingi ellennge ni kpo ka nne awohng awohng ellennge, ni ni ma ba go njini.
43001010	Á jolo go njini. Ye wo Esowo ko-e, lim njini nyia. Jol njini nyia, we tikem liingi.
43001011	Á ba go ege ejahbe, ane ebe we koom.
43001012	Ane bao ba ko-e no, fere taame tv mbing enye, bo ba li ane ba á ka bo nsahm re bo jol abon Esowo.
43001013	Bo jelem bo ana ane baka baka, jol go elkoro ni anebkal sang, jol bo jelem bo tib ana nne tiri no. Esowo bi jele bo.
43001014	Ellum nio ni ba siingi nne, fere lene tob-r. Wahr ebnyehn ellub ene, ellub nio ni Nde ka Mmon mmon awohng ewe, no ma gbal go nnoobo, a etingitingi.
43001015	Jon ji nwohngalahb jo yiimi ntianse ka-e, fere jo rabe re, “Ye wo a, ji n jo bung bada ne re, ‘Nne no kp'bake toon-m go njahm gbale sehnge me. Tibre á tohko jol, me n kehm jini.’ ”
43001016	Go ege agbal wo, á jo yehke nnoobo, jo ka wahr ane kpee.
43001017	Moses wo ka atahm. Nnoobo, a etingitingi, Jisos Kraist wo ko ba ka.
43001018	Nnene limm, no ma ny'nyehn Esowo, sehngem Mmon mmon awohng no li a Esowo bad bad, ye wo ma lim re wahr kahn Esowo.
43001019	Alum nya ana, nya Jon bungu no. Eji Jus ji jolo go Jerusalem tumu abalimajom, a abon Livai tv-e, bo song bahb-e re, “Ekahmekahme kpee, wo nne awo?”
43001020	Á kehm lennge ka bo, á gbaamem. Á lennge ka bo re, “Me Kraist sang.”
43001021	Bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Ekahmekahme kpee, wo nne awo fono? Anv, wo Elaija woa?” Á kehm faange re, “E'ee, me Elaija sang.” Bo kpe-e bahb re, “Anv, wo nnyehnamahr no e kp-e siki woa?” Á kpe faange re, “E'ee, me nnyehnamahr noo sang.”
43001022	Bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Anv, wo nne awo? Tong-r, eji e l'song tong ane ba tum-r no. Anv, a kpo bung renan bade elna?”
43001023	Jon kehm faange re, “Me wo li ‘nne no kp'rabe go elka emahng re, Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bahke sehnge, wahn lim t'tor’ ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no.”
43001024	Ane ba tumu bo, Bab Farisi ba.
43001025	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Eji a tong-r re, wo Kraist sang, wo Elaija sang, wo nnyehnamahr noo sang, anv, jen ji wahnge a kp'wohngo ane alahb?”
43001026	Jon kehm faange bo re, “N kpo wohngo ane alahb maka maka. Go egahne ellong nne awohng noa yim, no ń kil-e elkahne.
43001027	Jol eji á kp'b'ba toon-m go njahm, me n fuumem re me n kehme, fannge alehke akpaketa enye.”
43001028	Nsol nyia kpee limi go Betani, go egbuk Jodan jehko, edi jio ji Jon jo wohngo ane alahb.
43001029	Etoono efung behko Jon kehm nyehne Jisos kp'bake go ege. Á kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, Mmon a Njoro no Esowo, no bahke ba rod abiafem nya njini.
43001030	Nne noa wo, n jo bung bada ne re, Nne no kp'bake toon-m go njahm gbale sehnge me, tibre á tohko jol, me n kehm jini.
43001031	Mefono antahng, we n tohkem kahn wuku wuku. Ji wahnge m ba no, fere kpi ane alahb wohngo, li, eji abon Israel l'kahn-e.”
43001032	Jon jo yiimi ntianse re, “N nyehne Etingi Etohko go elfoongo ebbehl ma lohng go ejahbetul Esowo badde ba kuum-e.
43001033	Mefono antahng, we n tohkem kahn wuku wuku. Esowo bio bi tum-m no re me m ba wohngo ane alahb, ye wo tong-m re, ‘Nne no, a l'nyehn Etingi Etohko ma badde ba kuum-e, ye wo li nne no kpo wohngo ane alahb go Etingi Etohko.’
43001034	Me n lohko nyehn, fere yiimi ntianse re, ye wo lohko li Mmon no Esowo.”
43001035	Etoono efung behko Jon kpe jol ona, a abat'toono ebe, ane abal.
43001036	Á kehm nyehne Jisos, eji á jo jen abake, kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, Mmon a Njoro no Esowo!”
43001037	Eji abat'toono bao na abal wuku ano, bo kehm tahme toono Jisos.
43001038	Jisos kehm keebe, nyehn bo, eji bo kp-e toono, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kpi jen seb?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Rabbi (ji lohngo re nt'tibi), gan wo a kpo kang?”
43001039	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Baan, wahn ba nyehn!” Bo kehm jeke, song nyehn edi ji á jo kang, kehm tob kang o efung bio. Tibre ngare nyio jolo ejum nkaranka eni nyi elgung.
43001040	Nne awohng go ellong ane abal bao, no tob wuk ana Jon jo bung, kehm tahme toono Jisos. Bo jo lung-e re Andru ji jolo mmonannyehn a Saimon Pita.
43001041	Á gbo mbang song nyehn Saimon mmonannyehn, kehm-e tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn Mesaya,” (ji lohngo re Kraist).
43001042	Á kehm koko Saimon ba a ne goji Jisos. Jisos kehm-e seenge too, kehm bungu re, “Wo Saimon wo, ji mmon a Jon. Bo bahke fere jo lung-a re Kefas ji lohngo re Pita.”
43001043	Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm toobo re á bahke tahme go Galili. Owo á nyehne Filip, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
43001044	Filip lohng go Betsaida, ejahbe ji Andru abola Pita lene no.
43001045	Filip kehm song nyehn Natanael, kehme tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn nne no Moses nyono bada ne go nwer atahm, no abanyehnamahr Esowo tob nyon fvfo bada ne, Jisos ji Nasaret, ji mmon a Josef.”
43001046	Natanael kehm faange re, “Anv, ejum ajehng ajehng ji nno jia, ji bahke tiki lohng go Nasareta?” Filip kehm-e faange re, “Ba wahr tahm, wo ba nyehn!”
43001047	Eji Jisos nyehne Natanael kp'bake go ege, á kehm bungu bada ne re, “Nyehnen, a wo li etingitingi nne Israel, no enehm abehng abehng ki-e wob go atahng.”
43001048	Natanael kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A limi renan, kehm-m kahne?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Re Filip kehm-a lungu, n nyehn-a, a jehk no go nnahb eti ji bo kpo lung re efig.”
43001049	Natanael kehm bungu re, “Rabbi, a lohko li Mmon no Esowo. Wo wo li Ntul no Israel!”
43001050	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, wobtaama, tib eji m ma-a tong re, N nyehn-a go nnahb efiga? A bahke nyehne akpokosi sehnge ana nyi a ma nyehn a.”
43001051	Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, ḿ bahke nyehne ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge, fere nyehn babenjel kp'tahme go ero, fere jo badde ba goji Mmon no nne.”
43002001	Eji ma kang nfung ebal, elkak elbal jolo go Kena ji Galili. Nnyehn Jisos jolo ona.
43002002	Jisos, bo t'tob tiing-e elkak elbal nio, a abat'toono ebe.
43002003	Eji amahm male no, owo nnyehn Jisos kehm bake ba tong-e re, “Amahm ebmal.”
43002004	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nnenkal, n'nan a kp-m tohngo anv kak go ntong nyia? Ngare ny'nyame ka rehng.”
43002005	Owo nnyehn Jisos kehm tongo alokeltum ba jolo o re, “Limen ajehng ajehng ji á bahk-n tongo!”
43002006	Etu ebrakebra jolo ona, nya bo bumu re bo jo ba ru elbo ana atahm ebo bungu no. Jolo agburu atulahb nya nnen a nnen, nya etu ajehng ajehng jo yele rehng egalon eltahl, tohko jol ano eltahl egalon ewubu.
43002007	Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Song tuken alahb, wahn ba ruru go atulahb nyao!” Bo kehm tuku alahb, ba ruru atulahb nyao kpee.
43002008	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Limen alahb maa, wahn song ka nfakamahm!” Bo kehm limi, tahm a ma.
43002009	Nfakamahm no elkak nio kehm wuungu alahb mao ma ma siingi amahm. Á kahnem edi ji lohngo lohng ba. Alokeltum bao ba limi lim alahb mao, bo jo k'kahn. Owo á kehm lungu nlumanne,
43002010	kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng kpo tohko ka amahm ma nno. Eji bo ma wo kp'buumu, á kehm gohro ka bo ma ki ga nob. Wobrod amahm ma nno bum gona tete sik anv!”
43002011	Ngbokambang a nkpokosi nyi Jisos limi no nyi a, á limi go Kana ji Galili. Owo á tibi ellub ene. Abat'toono ebe kehm taame tv-e.
43002012	Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Kapenium, a nnyehn, a abonanyehn, a abat'toono ebe. Owo bo kange abon afung ntiil.
43002013	Ngare nyio elkak ni aneb Jus ni bo kpo lung re Pasova ebkabbe. Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Jerusalem.
43002014	Etahk Esowo ona wo, á nyehne ane ba jo gungu efong, a ejoro, go mbehl, fere nyehn ane ba jo yaange akpohko jehk no, kp'yaange akpohko go akp'kuru ebo.
43002015	Jisos kehm soro ko ebr'rare, kam ane kpee yehke go etahk Esowo jio, a efong efong fvfo. Á sale akpohko nya abayaangakpohko, fere gbul akp'kuru ebo tuubu go.
43002016	Á kehm tongo ane bao ba jo gungu mbehl re, “Roden nsol nyia, wahn song a nyi! Kana rod etahk Nsoo, bum ana edi are!”
43002017	Abat'toono ebe kehm soro buumu ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, “Ntir nyi n yehke kak, eji n tuungu etahk Esowo, nyi nyi bahke fere wul-m.”
43002018	Jus kehm-e bahbe re, “Elliingi ani a bahk-r tibi, eji e l'kahn re, a kpi nsahm nyi a kpo lim nsol nyia?”
43002019	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Waan etahk Esowo jia, m bahke tuungu si ji nfenfe go nfung era.”
43002020	Jus kehm bungu re, “Bo ko nnya atahl abal a nnya erakera, si etahk Esowo jia, ji ji a ma fere tong re, a bahke tuungu si go nfung eraa?”
43002021	Etahk Esowo ji Jisos jo bung bade, ngubjing enye nyi.
43002022	Ngare nyi á nyahme go elkv, abat'toono ebe b'buumu alum nyao nya á bungu no. Owo bo kehm taame tv nwer Esowo, fere taame tv alum nya Jisos bungu no.
43002023	Eji Jisos jolo go Jerusalem ngare nyio nyi elkak Pasova, ane gbalee ba taame no tv mbing enye, eji bo nyehne akpokosi nya á jo lim.
43002024	Á joom bum bo go etingitingi, tibre á jo kahne bo kpee, ana bo li no.
43002025	Kpeem fuumu re nne awohng awohng tong-e bade ana ane li no, tibre yefono antahng k'kahn ana ntim ane li no.
43003001	Nne a Farisi awohng jolo gona, no bo jo lung-e re Nekodimos. Á jolo nne no woomo go ellong atubesi Jus.
43003002	Atv amehng á kehm bake goji Jisos, ba tong-e re, “Rabbi, wahr kp'kahne re, wo li nt'tibi no Esowo tumu no. Tibre nnene limm, no bahke ma lim akpokosi ana nyaa nya a kp'limi, sehngem re no, Esowo bi jol a ne.”
43003003	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-a re, Tohko tiki jol re, nne kpe tuungu jini, á nehm tiki nyehn etul bi Esowo.”
43003004	Nekodimos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, nne bahke kpe tuungu jini renan, eji á ma kul? Á bahke kpe feere na song yel nnyehn go ala, á kpe-e jela?”
43003005	Jisos kehm faange re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-a re, Tohko tiki jol re, nne kpe tuungu jini go alahb, a Etingi Etohko, á nehm nyehn etul bi Esowo.
43003006	Nne kpo jel nne. Etohko kpo jel etohko.
43003007	Ki-a kpe kpo esi mbol mbol, tib eji n tong-a re, Tiki li re wahn kpe tuungu jini.
43003008	Nfeb kpo lim edi ajehng ajehng ji kor-e no. A kpo wuk ewahl ewahl. A kpehme kahn edi ji kp'lohngo abake, a edi ji fi no. Ano wo tob li jang jang a nne no Etingi Etohko jel-e no.”
43003009	Nekodimos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, jia kehm jolo renan ana?”
43003010	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wo ji li na nt'tibi Israel, nsol nyia a nehme kahna?
43003011	Etingitingi n kp'bungu tong-a re, Wahr kpo bung bada nsol nyi e kp'kahne, fere jo yiimi ntianse go nsol nyi e ma nyehn. Jol ń nehme tiki taame tv etib ebahre.
43003012	Eji m ma-n tong nsol nyi njini nyia, ń kil eltaame, l'lim renan, ń kehm taame, n l'tong-n nsol nyi ejahbetul Esowo?
43003013	Nnene limm, no ma j'je go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem Mmon no nne wo wo ma lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba.”
43003014	Ana Moses rodo nnyo kum go ejangnti, rod jahm ngare nyi bo jolo go elka emahng, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob rod Mmon no nne, kum go ejangnti, rod jahm,
43003015	eji nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-e, á l'bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
43003016	Esowo njini kor-e na, wo, á rodo Mmon mmon awohng ewe ka re, nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-e, á nehm tiki kpo tan, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
43003017	Tibre Esowo tumem Mmon ewe tv go njini nyia re á ba ka njini ebi. Á tum-e re á ba tahre njini nyia.
43003018	Nne no l'taame tv-e, á nehm li ebi. Nne no tohko taame, yebsi l'li ebi. Tibre á taamem tv mbing nyi Mmon mmon awohng no Esowo.
43003019	Ana wo li elam, eji ellennge ma ba go njini. Ane, ejannge ji kpi bo kor sehnge ellennge. Tibre nsol nyi bo kp'limi, li ab'bi ab'bi.
43003020	Tibre nne awohng awohng no kpo lim ab'bi, ellennge kpo sab-e sab. Á kpehme seb re á jen go edi ji ellennge li no, eji bo l'k'nyehn ab'bi enye.
43003021	Nne no kpo lim jio ji li go etingitingi, ye wo li nne no kp'jene go edi ji ellennge li no, eji nne awohng awohng l'nyehn nnoobo eltum ni á limi no go elfahle ni Esowo.
43003022	Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Judea, a abat'toono ebe. Ona wo bo kange no, jo wohngo ane alahb.
43003023	Jon fvfo jo tob wohngo ane alahb go Enon ji li kohlo Salim. Tibre alahb jolo o gbalee. Ane jo je o, song bel ewohngalahb.
43003024	Ngare nyio, Jon, bo we ka bob kak ngbekobo.
43003025	Abat'toono Jon, a nne a Jus awohng, bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim bade eljini ni nne bahke jo bum elne saang.
43003026	Owo bo kehm bake goji Jon, kehm ba tong-e re, “Nt'tibi, nne noo no jolo a na go egbuk Jodan jehko, no a jo yiimi ntianse ka-e, á noa ona, kpi ane alahb wohngo, nne awohng awohng kp'jeke go ege.”
43003027	Owo Jon kehm faange re, “Nnene limm, no bahke ma bel ejum ajehng ajehng, sehngem re no Esowo bi ka-e.
43003028	Wahnfono antahng ebwuk ana n tong-n no re, Me sang li Kraist. Bo tum-m na re me n gbo-e mbang.
43003029	“Nne no kpi nkal, ye wo li nlumanne. Eji ntem no nlumanne yim ona, kp'wuku alum nya á kp'bungu, eltim bahk-e jo yebe sehng. Anv, eyebatahng ejame jia ebgbal.
43003030	Ye bahke gbale na, me m bahke fere jol reed.”
43003031	“Ye jio ji lohng go ero ba, á gbale sehnge ane kpee. Nne no lohng go njini, á li ka njini. Á kpo bung nyi njini. Nne no lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba, á gbale sehnge ane kpee.
43003032	Á kpo yiimi ntianse go nsol nyi á ma nyehn, fere w'wuk. Nnene limm, no kp'taame tv etib ebe.
43003033	Nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv etib ebe, bahke lohko tib re, Esowo li go etingitingi.
43003034	Nne no Esowo m-e tum, á kpo bung alum nya Esowo. Tibre Esowo kpehme gare na etohko eje ka ane.
43003035	Esowo, Mmon ewe kor-e sehng, owo wahnge á ma yake nsol enye kpee, kak-e go ebo.
43003036	Nne no l'taame tv Mmon Esowo, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Nne no tohko wuk Mmon Esowo, elkpin á nehm bel. Erakatahng ji Esowo ji li a ne.”
43004001	Bab Farisi kehm wuku re, Jisos kpo wohngo ane alahb sehnge Jon, ane bao fere jo toon-e.
43004002	Jol Jisos wohngem nne awohng awohng alahb, sehngem abat'toono ebe ba ba jo lim ano.
43004003	Ntul a Jisos sebe kan kahn ano me, á kehm tahme o Judea asongo go Galili.
43004004	Tiki jol re, á sehng go Samaria.
43004005	Á kehm song rehng go ejahbe Samaria ajehng, ji bo jo lung re Sikar, ji jolo kohlo edi ndi ji Jekob ka mmon ewe Josef.
43004006	Elbing alahb ni Jekob jolo ona. Eji Jisos ma lahng eljen, á kehm ba ji o elbing alahb nio. Ngare nyio jolo ngare efin.
43004007	Owo nnenkal a Samaria kehm bake re á ba tuk alahb. Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka-m alahb, me n wo!”
43004008	Ngare nyio abat'toono Jisos ebtahm go nla ejahbe re bo song gunu nsol alehke.
43004009	Nnenkal a Samaria noo kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kp-m bahbe re, me n ka-a alahb, wo ji li na nne a Jus, gana me nne a Samaria?” Tibre Jus, a Samaria, bo kpehme kod abo.
43004010	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Li re a kp'kahne ayare nya Esowo kpo ka, fere kahn nne no kp-a bahbe re, wo ka-e alahb, á wo, kehn a m-e gboongo na, á ka-a alahb mao ma elkpin.”
43004011	Mmonankal noo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, ejum limm, ji a bahke koko tuk alahb, gana elbing alahb nia kp'rahbe. Gan wo a bahke bele alahb mao ma elkpin?
43004012	Anv, wo ga gbal sehnge Jekob, nso ejahre, no ka-r elbing alahb nia? Á jo wo alahb ana, a abon abon ebe, a atohkondi enye kpee.”
43004013	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'wo alahb maa, bahk-e kpe kor.
43004014	Nne awohng awohng no l'wo alahb mao ma m bahk-e kake, ekor bahk-e tane. Alahb mao ma m bahk-e kake, bahke jo tub mb'behl go ege atahng, fere gbo ebgba bi bahke jo fab, rehng go elkpin ni li go njinanjini.”
43004015	Mmonankal noo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, ka-m alahb mao ma ekor bahk-m tane, eji n l'k'kpe ba a, ba tuk alahb elbing nia.”
43004016	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo song lung nlum ewa, wahn ba!”
43004017	Mmonankal noo kehm-e faange re, “Nlum awohng awohng n kpimm.” Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wobbung etingitingi, eji a tongo re, nlum a kpimm.
43004018	Wobbel alum na alon. Noo no a jehk-e etahk, etingitingi nlum ewa sang. A lohk-m tong etingitingi.”
43004019	Mmonankal noo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, me n lohko kahn re, wo nnyehnamahr wo.
43004020	Babnso ejahre jo kake Esowo go ewong jia. Wahn Jus, ń kpo bung re, Go Jerusalem wo li edi ji fuumu re, ane jo ba, ba kak Esowo.”
43004021	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, taame tv alum enyame nya n kp'bungu tong-a re, Ngare kp'bake nyi ń l'k'kpe kak Esowo Nsoo go ewong jia, jol go Jerusalem fvfo.
43004022	Wahn aneb Samaria, ń kpo kak ejum ji ń kil elkahne. Wahr Jus, e kpo kak ji e kp'kahne. Tibre eltahre kpo lohng goji Jus.
43004023	Ngare kp'bake nyi atingitingi abakake Esowo bahke jo kak Esowo Nsoo go etohko, a etingitingi. Tibre elkohn ane ana bao ba, Esowo Nsoo kp'sebe re bo kak-e. Ngare ny'nehm nyi ma rehng a.
43004024	Esowo, etohko ji. Bao ba kp-e kake, bahke jo kak-e go etohko, a etingitingi.”
43004025	Mmonankal noo kehm-e tongo re, “N kp'kahne re, Mesaya kp'bake. Mesaya ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist l'ba, á bahk-r tibi nsol kpee.”
43004026	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me jia ji kp'bungu a na, me wo li Mesaya.”
43004027	Tvtv ona abat'toono Jisos kehm soro ba. Kpo bo esi area, eji bo nyehne re, á kp'bungu a nnenkal. Nnene jolem go bo ellong no bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji a kp'sebe?” Jol bo we bahbem re, “Jen ji wahnge a kp'bungu a ne?”
43004028	Nnenkal noo kehm soro tahm etulahb eje sa, tahm song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tong ane re,
43004029	“Baan, wahn ba nyehn nne no ma-m tong nsol kpee, nyi n kpo lim. Ma ye wo li Mesaya nji!”
43004030	Ane bao kehm soro lohng ejahbe jio, tahm song kpiri Jisos.
43004031	Ngare ny'nehm nyi abat'toono Jisos jo gboongo Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, ko nsol alehke, wo li me!”
43004032	Á kehm tongo bo re, “N kpi nsol alehke nyi m bahke lehke, nyi ń kil elkahne.”
43004033	Abat'toono ebe kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Anv, nne ebko nsol alehke ba ka-ea?”
43004034	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nsol alehke enyame li re, me n lim mbang nyi nne no tum-m no, fere gohro mal eltum ene.
43004035	Wahn sang kpo kono elbungu re, ‘Ebsa nnyahng eni, ngare elkpake rehnga?’ N kp-n tongo re, wahn tab asamahr enyahne wahre, nyehn ana ebgbe ma kum, ngare ebrehng kpee, nyi elkpake.
43004036	Nne no l'kpa, á kpo bel eltuuru. Á kpo kpu nsol nyio bum, jol go elkpin ni li go njinanjini, eji mb'bahme, a nkp'kpake, bo l'bel eyebatahng egom egom.
43004037	Tibre jia ji bo kpo kono elbungu, lohko li go etingitingi re, ‘Nne noko bahm, noko kpa.’
43004038	M ma-n tum re, wahn song kpa egbe jio ji ń ki lim eltum anehng anehng. Ane bako ba ma lim eltum o, wahn ebba yel eltum nio, soro asi kp'limi asongo.”
43004039	Aneb Samaria gbalee ba lene ejahbe jio, kehm taame tv Jisos, tibre mmonankal noo bungu re, “Á tong-m nsol kpee nyi m ma l'lim.”
43004040	Eji aneb Samaria bao ba goji Jisos, bo gboong-e re, á lub song kang a bo. Owo Jisos kehm song kang a bo nfung ebal.
43004041	Ane gbalee kpe taame budu, tib go ege alum nya á bungu no.
43004042	Bo kehm tongo mmonankal noo re, “Wahr ebtaame anv. Lohngem re, wahr ebtaame tib eji a tong-r no. Wahr ebtaame, tibre wahrfono antahng ebwuk. Wahr eblohko kahn go etingitingi re, ye wo li nt'tahre no njini.”
43004043	Jisos kange kan nfung ebal o me, á kehm tahme go Galili.
43004044	Tibre Jisos jo yiimi ntianse antahng antahng re, “Nnyehnamahr Esowo kpehme lub go ege ejahbe.”
43004045	Eji Jisos ba no, ba rehng go Galili, aneb Galili jo vvr-e sehng, tib eji bo nyehne akpokosi nya á limi no go Jerusalem ngare elkak. Tibre bofono t'tob je elkak nio.
43004046	Á kehm feere tahm go Kena ji Galili, ejahbe jio ji á ko alahb lim, siingi amahm. Ntubesi ejahbe awohng jolo go Kapenium, no mmon ewe jo yam.
43004047	Á wuku kan re, Jisos eblohng go Judea ba go Galili, á kehm bake goji Jisos, ba gboong-e re, á je go Kapenium, song lim mmon ewe, á nob. Tibre mmon ewe nong go emel elkv.
43004048	Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tohko tiki jol re, ń nyehne akpokosi, ń kpehme tiki taame.”
43004049	Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, ba wahr tahm, mmon ewame yahke kpo.”
43004050	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Song, mmon ewa bahke kpini!” Nne noo kehm soro taame tv alum nya Jisos bungu no tong-e, kehm soro tahm eje.
43004051	Eji á jo kehnge, alokeltum ebe kehm ba wan-e go mbang, kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewa kpeke li go elkpin.”
43004052	Á kehm bahbe bo ngare nyi mmon ewe kehme elnobo. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nyaane ngare efin nkaranka anyehng, owo á nobo arumbum nyao.”
43004053	Nde mmon kehm soro buumu tvtv re, ngare nyio nyi Jisos tong-e re, “Mmon ewa bahke kpini.” Yefono antahng kehm taame tv-e, a ane ba lene go ege a nlaaga kpee.
43004054	Etoono nkpokosi nyi a, nyi Jisos kpe lim ngare nyio nyi á longo go Judea, feere go Galili.
43005001	Eji nsol nyio ma sehng kpee, owo Jisos kehm tahme go Jerusalem. Tibre ngare nyio jolo ngare elkak ni Jus.
43005002	Go Jerusalem, go eti mbu jio ji bo jo lung re, Eti Mbu Ejoro, owo eto jolo no, ji bo si nkpatahk elon sennge kak. Eto jio bo jo lungu go alum Hibru re Betsata.
43005003	Ona wo ellong ane gbalee noongo no, jo yam, awakamahr, abanne, a aneb ayam bandiki. (Bo jo baabe re alahb gbehke.
43005004	Tibre ngare nyimongo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo jo ba yel alahb mao, jo gbehke alahb. Nne eyam awohng awohng no l'fere gbo mbang song yel go alahb, eji kp'gbehke, ye wo bahke nobo eyam ebe, afi á bele elkohn eyam abehng abehng.)
43005005	Nne awohng jolo noa, no eyam ebe ma kang eltahl a nnya elku a nnya era.
43005006	Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, fere kahn re, yebnoongo ona edi jio ekidi eblab, á kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a kp'sebe re wo noba?”
