43005007	Nne eyam noo kehm-e faange re, “Ee nsoo, wo, nnene n kpimm, no bahk-m rodo kak go eto jia, eji alahb ma kehme elgbehke. N l'tahm re me n song yel, nne noko go tohko gbo mbang ka-m.”
43005008	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo rod ekpa eja, jen song!”
43005009	Tvtv ona nne noa kehm soro nob eyam ebe, kehm rodo ekpa eje, kehme eljene. Efung bio jolo efung Esabat.
43005010	Aneb Jus kehm tongo nne noo no ma nob eyam ebe re, “Lela efung Esabat bi. Nobem re wo sol ekpa eja.”
43005011	Nne noo kehm faange bo re, “Nne no lim-m no, n nob, ye wo tong-m re, ‘Rod ekpa eja, wo jen song!’ ”
43005012	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nne awo tong-a tong re, wo rod ekpa eja, jen song?”
43005013	Nne noo no nobo eyam ebe kahnem nne no lim-e lim, á nob. Tibre Jisos t'tahm, eji ellong ane kame no ba rur o.
43005014	Eji ma ji ntiil, Jisos kehm song nyehn-e go etahk Esowo, kehm-e tongo re, “Nyehnee, anv wobnob. Ka kpe lim abiafem, eji ejum ji sabe sehnge jia l'ki-a kpe lim.”
43005015	Nne noo kehm tahme song tong Jus re, Jisos wo lim-e no, á nob.
43005016	Owo wahng ka Jus kehm kehme Jisos gbak, tib eji á limi nne nob efung Esabat.
43005017	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nsoo kpi nlimi nlimi eltum. Me fvfo, n kp'tob lim eltum.”
43005018	Jia ji wahnge aneb Jus kpe bel erakatahng gbalee tob-e, fere jo seb mbang ana nyi bo bahk-e wulu. Tibre bo jo bungu re, Jisos, ntahm Esabat nyi nyi sang á soodo no, á kpe bung re, Esowo, Nde no we wo, ji lohngo re, á kp'rodo elne bum jang jang a Esowo.
43005019	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Mmon nehm ma lim ejumjum go ege a ngang antahng, sehngem ji á l'nyehn Nde kp'limi, ji ji á kpo tob lim. Ajehng ajehng ji Nde l'lim, j'nehm ji Mmon kpo tob lim.
43005020	Tibre Nde, Mmon ewe kp-e koro sehng, owo wahnge á kp-e tibi nsol kpee nyi yefono antahng kp'limi. Á bahk-e tibi nsol nyi gbale sehnge nyia a, eji l'jo kpo-n esi.
43005021	Ana Nde kpo nyahme ane go elkv, bo fere bel elkpin, ano wo fvfo Mmon bahke tob ka nne awohng awohng elkpin, no kor-e no.
43005022	Nsoo kpehme lam nne awohng awohng. Yebfaake elam eje kpee ka Mmon ewe re
43005023	eji nne awohng awohng l'kak Mmon ewe, jang jang ana bo kpo kak Nde. Nne no tohko kak Mmon ewe, lohngo re, á nehme kak Nde no tum-e no.
43005024	“Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no l'wuk alum enyame, fere taame tv nne no tum-m no, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Bo we nehm kpe lam. Yebsehng elkv sa rehng go elkpin.
43005025	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Ngare kp'bake, ngare ny'nehm nyi ma rehng a, nyi akvne bahke wuku alum nya Mmon Esowo. Bao ba l'wuk, bo bahke jolo go elkpin.
43005026	“Ana Nsoo kpi nsahm antahng nyi á kpo ko, ka elkpin, ano wo fvfo á ma tob lim Mmon ewe re, á tob bel nsahm nyi á bahke tob jo ka elkpin.
43005027	Á m-e ka nsahm nyi á bahke jo lam alam. Tibre ye wo li Mmon no nne.
43005028	Nong, ki-n kpe kpo esi mbol mbol. Tibre ngare bahke bake nyi akvne kpee nya wob go alahm bahke wuku alum enye.
43005029	Bo bahke nyahme lohng go alahm. Bao ba limi nob nob bahke nyahme, jol go elkpin. Bao ba limi ab'bi bahke nyahme, ba yiimi go eti elam.
43005030	“N nehm ma lim ejumjum go egame eko. Ana n kpo wuk goji Esowo, ano wo n kpo lam. Elam ejame li go etingitingi. Tibre n nehme lim mbang ny'nyame. N kp'limi mbang nyi nne no tum-m no.
43005031	N l'yiimi ntianse ka elname antahng, ntianse enyame nehm lub.
43005032	Nne noko noa, no kp'yiimi ntianse ka-m. N kp'kahne re, ntianse nyi á kp'yiimi ka-m, lohko li go etingitingi.
43005033	Ń tumu ane tv Jon ji jo yiimi ntianse ka etingitingi jia.
43005034	Jol nnene n sebem re á yiimi ntianse ka-m. M bungu jia, eji wahn l'bel eltahre.
43005035	Jon jolo ana et'rekahng ji jo lul, fere jo y'ya. Jo kor-n re wahn jo bel eyebatahng mmongare ntiil tib go ege ellennge.
43005036	“Ntianse nyi me n kpi no, gbale sehnge nyi Jon. Tibre akpokosi nyao nya Nsoo ma-m ka re me n lim, eltum n'nehm ni n kp'limi a, ni ni kp'yiimi ntianse ka-m re, Nsoo wo tum-m no.
43005037	Nsoo no tum-m no wo yiimi ntianse antahng antahng ka-m. Ellum ene wahn ka wuk a wuk, jol esamahr ebe ń ka nyehn a nyehn.
43005038	Ellum ene go egahne atahng wobem. Tibre ń nehme taame tv nne no á tum-e no.
43005039	Ń kpo kpili nwer Esowo, tibre ń kpo tir re, ona wo ḿ bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Nwer Esowo nyio nyi kp'yiimi ntianse ka me.
43005040	“Wahn nehme kor elbake go egame, eji ń l'bel elkpin.
43005041	“N kpehme ko ellub goji ane.
43005042	Tibre n kp'sahb k'kahn re, ekor ji Esowo wobem go egahne atahng.
43005043	M ba go mbing nyi Nsoo. Me ń nehme ko. Nne nondiki l'fere ba go ege a mbing, ye wo ḿ bahk-e koko.
43005044	Bahke limi renan, ń kehm taame tv Esowo, eji ń kpo ko ellub goji ane? Esowo bi li na abehng, ellub ene ń kpehme seb.
43005045	“Kana tir re, m bahk-n kake ebi go esamahr Nsoo. Moses wo bahk-n kake ebi, ye jio ji ń kp'kunu ekpu go ege.
43005046	“Li re ń kp'taame tv Moses, kehn ń kp'tob taame tv-m. Tibre Moses ny'nyon bada name.
43005047	Eji ń kil eltaame tv alum enye nya á nyono no, bahke limi renan, ń kehm taame tv alum enyame?”
43006001	Owo Jisos kehm tahme go egbuk eto jehko ji Galili, ji bo jo tob lung re eto ji Taibirias.
43006002	Ellong ane gbalee kehm-e toono, tibre bo jo nyehne akpokosi nya á jo lim aneb ayam, bo nob.
43006003	Jisos kehm wahre go ewong, song ji a abat'toono ebe.
43006004	Ngare nyio elkak Pasova ni Jus ebkabbe.
43006005	Eji Jisos tabe esamahr ebe wahre, nyehn ellong ane bao kp'bake, á kehm bahbe Filip re, “E bahke limi renan, kehm gunu abred nya ane bao kpee bahke lehke?”
43006006	Á bungu ellum nia re á wuung-e. Tibre yefono antahng jo k'kahn kpee ji á bahke limi.
43006007	Filip kehm-e faange re, “Mpon eltahl, e l'ko gunu abred, jol nehm tohko b'biingi bo, afi nne awohng awong jo li ntiil.”
43006008	Nt'toono ewe awohng no bo jo lung-e re Andru ji mmonannyehn a Saimon Pita, kehm-e tongo re,
43006009	“Mmonse awohng li ana, no kpi ebred na eblon, a abon nsahre na abal. Anv, nyaa a, tohko l'li jen, ka ellong ane ana nia?”
43006010	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tongen ane bao, bo ji ndi.” Tibre ajele jolo gbalee edi jio. Owo ane bao kehm jehke ndi. Bo jolo ejum aneblum atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awubu (5,000).
43006011	Jisos kehm rodo abred nyao, kak Esowo saam, kehm bake ane bao ba ji go ndi. Ano wo fvfo á tob lim go abon nsahre bao. Nne awohng awohng li ana kor-e no.
43006012	Eji bo ma wohngo ane kpee, Jisos kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Taaren bo erik ji ma sa, eji ejum ajehng ajehng l'k'rannge mbol mbol.”
43006013	Ebred eblon bi ane bao li no, bo kehm song taare erik ji sa no, ruru ewubu ejeere na ebbal.
43006014	Ane bao nyehne kan nkpokosi nyi Jisos ma lim, bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “A wo lohko li nnyehnamahr Esowo no e jo wuk re, á bahke bake go njini.”
43006015	Eji Jisos sebe kahn re, bo yahke ba, ba bob-e etul go nsahm, á kehm tahme bo sa, tahm go ewong ntahngtahng.
43006016	Eji elgung ba no, abat'toono ebe kehm tahme go nkpe eto,
43006017	kehm song yel go egbang, kehm kehme elfingi re bo siiri eto jio rehng go Kapenium go egbuk jehko. Ngare nyio ejannge ebgbo. Jisos ka tiki ba, ba kpiri bo.
43006018	Alahb kehm kehme ebuku lim, tibre nfeb jo limi sehng.
43006019	Bo fingi kan ejum mmal era, fundiki mmal eni, bo kehm soro nyehn Jisos kp'jene go ero alahb, jo kabbe go bo egbang. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
43006020	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl, me wo!”
43006021	Eltim yebe bo sehng. Bo kehm-e solo go egbang. Tvtv ona egbang kehm soro rehng egbuk eto jehko ji bo jo j'je.
43006022	Etoono efung behko, ellong ane ba sa go egbuk eto jehko kehm sebe kahn re, egbang abehng bi bi jolo o. Egbang bio, Jisos yelem. Abat'toono ebe ba, ba yel egbang bio tahm asongo bo bo.
43006023	Owo agbang nyandiki kehm lohngo go Taibirias ba edi ji bo li abred nyao ngare nyi Ntul a Jisos ma kak Esowo saam.
43006024	Eji ane bao sebe no kahn re, Jisos, a abat'toono ebe, ona bo limm, bo kehm kpe yel agbang tahm go Kapenium, song seb Jisos.
43006025	Eji bo nyehn-e no go egbuk eto jehko, bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, ngare anyi a rehnge a?”
43006026	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Elsebe ni ń kp-m sebe, me ń nehme seb tib eji ń nyehne akpokosi. Abred nya ń li wohngo, nya nya wahnge ń kp-m sebe.
43006027	Kana kpe nyennge, jo lim eltum ni ḿ bahke bele nsol alehke nyi bahke tane na. Jo noken mbang nyi ḿ bahke bele nsol alehke nyi bahke jolo go njinanjini, nyi Mmon no nne bahk-n kake. Tibre ye wo, Esowo Nsoo m-e kak elliingi nio ni nsahm enye.”
43006028	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji e bahke l'lim, kehm jo lim eltum ni Esowo?”
43006029	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Eltum ni Esowo kp'sebe re wahn lim, li re, wahn taame tv nne no á tum-e no.”
43006030	Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Elliingi ani a bahke tibi, ni e bahke nyehne, kehm taame tv-a? Nkpokosi anyi a bahke limi?
43006031	Babnso ejahre jo li nsol nyi bo kpo lung re mmanna go elka emahng, jang jang ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Á ka bo abred nya lohng go ejahbetul Esowo re bo li.’ ”
43006032	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Moses sang ka-n abred nya lohng go ejahbetul Esowo. Nsoo wo kp-n kake etingitingi ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo.
43006033	Tibre ebred ji Esowo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo, ba ka njini elkpin.”
43006034	Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, jo ka-r ebred jio ngare anyehng anyehng!”
43006035	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Me wo li ebred ji elkpin. Nne no l'ba go egame, njal we nehm kpe yam. Nne no l'taame tv-m, ekor alahb bahk-e tane.
43006036	M ma-n tong re, ḿ ma-m nyehn, jol ń nehme tiki taame.
43006037	Nne awohng awohng no Nsoo ka-m ye, ye wo bahke bake go egame. Nne no l'ba go egame, we n nehm kam yake go.
43006038	Tibre n lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba re me m ba lim mbang nyi Nsoo no tum-m no. Mbang ny'nyame sang m ba ellimi.
43006039	Ejum ji ana, ji Nsoo no tum-m no tong-m re me n lim. Á tong-m re, me n k'wahng nne awohng awohng tan, no á ma-m ka. M bahke nyahme bo go elkv es'kohro efung.
43006040	A wo tob li ejum ji Nsoo kp'sebe re, nne awohng awohng no l'nyehn Mmon ewe fere taame, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. M bahk-e nyahme go es'kohro efung.”
43006041	Jus kehm kehme elmemme atemtem tob-e, tib eji á bungu re, “Me wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba.”
43006042	Bo kehm bungu re, “Jisos sang aa, ji li mmon a Josef, ji e kp'kahne nde, a nnyehna? Jen ji wahnge á bahke kehm bungu re, á lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba?”
43006043	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Kana kpe memme atemtem!
43006044	Nnene limm, no bahke ma ba go egame, tohko jol re Nsoo no tum-m no wo leeb-e. M bahk-e nyahme go elkv es'kohro efung.
43006045	Tibre abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono re, ‘Esowo bahke bo tib, bo ane kpee.’ Nne awohng awohng no ma wuk, fere kpili goji Nsoo, á bahke bake go egame.
43006046	“Jia lohngem re, nne awohng awohng ebnyehn Nsoo, sehngem nne no lohng goji Esowo Nsoo ba, ye wo ma nyehn Nsoo.
43006047	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne no l'taame, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
43006048	Me wo li ebred ji elkpin.
43006049	Babnso ejahne jo li mmanna go elka emahng. Bobkpo kpee.
43006050	“A wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba, ji nne l'li, á l'k'kpo.
43006051	Me wo li ebred ji elkpin, ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba. Nne awohng awohng no l'li ebred jia, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Ebred ji m bahke kake njini re bo bel elkpin, ngubjing enyame nyi.”
43006052	Jus kehm kehme nfaabe lim atemtem re, “Bahke limi renan, nne noa kehm-r kake ngubjing enye, wahr li?”
43006053	Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Tohko tiki jol re, ń li ngubjing nyi Mmon no nne, fere wo alung eme, ń nehm tiki bel elkpin go egahne atahng.
43006054	Nne no kpo li ngubjing enyame, fere jo wo alung emame, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. M bahk-e nyahme go elkv es'kohro efung.
43006055	Tibre ngubjing enyame lohko li etingitingi ejum alehke. Alung emame tob li etingitingi ejum elwoko.
43006056	Nne no l'li ngubjing enyame, fere jo wo alung emame, á wob-m go eltim, me n tob wob-e go eltim.
43006057	Nsoo no li go elkpin wo tum-m. Esi eje ji wahnge n tob li go elkpin. Nne no l'li ngubjing enyame, á bahke tob jol go elkpin tib go egame esi.
43006058	A wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba. Limm ana elkohn ni babnso ejahne li no, fere kpo. Nne no l'li ebred jia, á bahke jolo go njinanjini.”
43006059	Jisos jo bungu alum nyaa, eji á jo tib go etahk ero ji jolo go Kapenium.
43006060	Egom abat'toono Jisos gbalee, eji bo wuku alum nyao, bo kehm bungu re, “Alum nyao kp'riidi sehng. Nne awo bahke ma wuungu atung go nsol nyio?”
43006061	Eji Jisos sebe kahn re, abat'toono ebe kp'memme bade alum nyao, owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, alum nya m bungu a, ma-n saba?
43006062	Ḿ bahke bungu renan, ń l'nyehn Mmon no nne kp'feere go ero edi ji á tohko jol?
43006063	Etohko ji kpo ka elkpin, ngubjing o mbol mbol wo. Alum nya m ma bung tong-n li etohko etohko, a elkpin.
43006064	Egom ejahne jindiki jia, ji kil eltaame.” Jisos bungu ellum nia a, tibre á jo kahne kpee mboma mbomo. Á jo kahne egom ji l'k'taame, fere kahn nne no bahk-e gungu.
43006065	Á kehm bungu re, “Owo wahnge n tong-n no re, Nnene limm, no bahke ma ba go egame, sehngem re no, Nsoo wo limi mbang ka-e.”
43006066	Tib go alum nyao, egom abat'toono ebe gbalee kehm soro yaam-e sa, tahm ebo. Bo we kpeem jo tiki toono.
43006067	Jisos kehm bahbe abat'toono ebe, ewubu ane abal re, “Wahn fvfo, ḿ bahke tob yaam-m saa?”
43006068	Saimon Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, eji nyehne wo, e bahke jeke? Wo wo kpi alum nyao nya elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
43006069	Wahr ebtaame, fere kahn re, wo wo li Mbarebara nne no Esowo.”
43006070	Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn sang n jak-n no yehka, wahn ewubu ane abala? Nne awohng go egahne ellong, nnehm nyi.”
43006071	Á bungu bade Judas ji mmon a Saimon Iskariot, ji woomo go ellong ane ebe, ewubu ane abal. Tibre ye wo jolo nne no bahk-e gungu.
43007001	Eji nyao kpee ma mal, Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge go Galili. Á joom yannge go Judea, tibre Jus jo sebe re bo wul-e.
43007002	Ngare nyio ona elkak ni Jus jo si nkpatahk jo woomo, ebkabbe.
43007003	Owo abonanyehn Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo song go Judea, eji abat'toono eba l'nyehn akpokosi nya a kp'limi me!
43007004	Nnene limm, no kpo behr nsol nyi á kp'limi, eji á kp'sebe re nne awohng awohng kahn-e. A l'kehme nsol enya lim, jo tib elna go njini.”
43007005	Jol abonanyehn fvfo joom taame tv-e.
43007006	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ngare enyame ka biingi. Ngare ny'nyahne li ngare anyehng anyehng.
43007007	Njini nyia, ekv bo wahn nehme ko, me wo, bo kp-m koko ekv, tibre n kpo tong bo re, mbang nyi bo kp'toono nobem.
43007008	Songen go elkak nio wahn wahn. Me n nehme tahm elkak anv, tibre ngare enyame ka biingi.”
43007009	Á bungu kan ano me, á kehm sake eje go Galili.
43007010	Ngare nyi abonanyehn ma tahm go elkak, á kehm tob tahm fvfo. Á joom jen gbul gbul gbuul, á jo jene mbehr mbehr.
43007011	Jus jo seb-e go elkak nio, fere jo bahb re, “Ye nona?”
43007012	Ellong ane bao jo bungu aw'wa bada ne. Bandiki jo bungu re, “Á li nnooba nne.” Bandiki re, “E'ee, á kp'nehme na ane.”
43007013	Tib eji bo jo fahl Jus, nnene jolem, no jo bung gbul gbul gbuul bada ne.
43007014	Elkak nio kpo kang nfung enehkeni. Elka elka ene wo, Jisos tahme go etahk Esowo, song kehme eltibi.
43007015	Kehm kpoko Jus esi, bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Jen ji wahnge nne noa kp'kahne elkahne ana nia, jol eji á ki j'je nwer?”
43007016	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Eltibi ename ni n kp'tibi a, n'name sang, ni Esowo bi tum-m no ni.
43007017	Nne awohng awohng no kp'sebe re, á lim mbang nyi Esowo, á bahke kahne, joare eltibi ename ni n kp'tibi lohko lohng goji Esowo, afi n kpo bung go egama nsahm.
43007018	Nne no kpo bung go ege a nsahm, á kpo seb ellub n'ne. Nne no kp'sebe ellub ni nne no tum-e no, á lohko li go etingitingi, eb'bi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.
43007019	Moses sang ka-n atahma? Nne ewahne awohng awohng limm, no kp'bumu atahm nyao. Jen ji wahnge ń kp'sebe re wahn wul-m?”
43007020	Ane bao kehm faange re, “A kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng. Nne awo kp's'seb re á wul-a?”
43007021	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “N limi nkpokosi anyehng ana ny'nyehng, jo kpo-n esi, wahn ane kpee.
43007022	Moses tong-n re, wahn jo yehke abon ebahne nrur. (Lohngem re, Moses wo ko nrur ayehke ba a nyi, lohng goji babnso ejahre.) Wahn kpo yehke mmon nrur efung Esabat.
43007023	Bo l'yehke mmon nrur efung Esabat, eji atahm nya Moses l'k'range, jen ji wahnge l'lun ntim enyahne kp-n rake tob-m, tib eji n limi nne eyam nob kpee go ege a ngubjing efung Esabat?
43007024	Kana jo lam alam ane ana ń kp'nyehne esamahr ebo. Jo lamen elam ji nno!”
43007025	Aneb Jerusalem bandiki kehm bungu re, “Nne noa sang bo kp'sebe re bo wul-ea?
43007026	Ye sang ana, kp'bungu gbul gbul gbuula? Jol nnene nehme bung ejumjum tob-e. Ma atubesi ebahre eblohko kahn re, ye Mesaya wo nji.
43007027	Wahr kp'kahne edi ji nne noa lohng no. Mesaya l'ba, nnene limm, no bahke kahne edi ji á bahke lohngo ba.”
43007028	Eji Jisos jo tib go etahk Esowo, á kehm jo bung wahre wahre re, “Ń kp-m kahne, ń kp'tob kahn edi ji n lohng no ba. M baam antahng a. Nne no tum-m no li go etingitingi. Wahn, we ń nehme kahn.
43007029	N kp-e kahne, tibre n lohng go ege ba. Ye wo tum-m no.”
43007030	Owo bo kehm gare re bo bob Jisos, jol nnene jolem, no lak-e abo. Tibre ngare enye ka biingi.
43007031	Ane gbalee jolo go ellong nio ba taame tv Jisos. Bo jo bungu re, “Anv, Mesaya l'ba, á bahke limi akpokosi sehnge ana nya nne noa ma lima?”
43007032	Bab Farisi kehm wuku ana ellong ane bao jo bung aw'wa bada Jisos. Owo atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm tumu alokeltum ebo re bo song bob Jisos.
43007033	Jisos kehm bungu re, “M bahke kpe jol a nahne ana mmongare ntiil, kehm tahme goji nne no tum-m no.
43007034	Ḿ bahk-m sebe, me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Edi ji m bahke jeke, ń nehm ma ba.”
43007035	Jus kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Gan wo nne noa kp'bungu re, á yahke tahm, eji e l'ki-e kpe nyehn? Anv, á yahke tahm goji Jus ji lene go ajahbe Grika, fere song tib aneb Grika?
43007036	Anv, jio ona lohngo renan, ji á kp'bungu re, ‘Ḿ bahk-m sebe, me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Edi ji m bahke jolo, ń nehm ma ba?’ ”
43007037	Es'kohro efung bi elkak nio, bi bi jolo egburu efung. Owo Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu wahre wahre re, “Nne awohng awohng no alahb l'kor-e, nong á ba ga egame, ba wo!
43007038	Ana wo nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-m, aya ma elkpin bahke kehme elfabe go ege eltim lohng.’ ”
43007039	Jisos bungu ellum nia bade etohko ji ane ba l'taame tv-e bahke bele. Tibre ngare nyio etohko ji Esowo ka ba, eji Jisos kala nyahme go elkv song ji go ege ellub.
43007040	Eji ane bao wuku alum nyao, egom jindiki kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana lohko li nnyehnamahr Esowo noo.”
43007041	Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Nne noa ana, Kraist wo.” Egom jindiki jo bahbe re, “Anv, Kraist bahke lohngo go Galilia?
43007042	Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Kraist bahke lohngo go et'tohngo ji Devid. Bo bahk-e jele go Betlehem, ejahbe ji Devid.’ ”
43007043	Owo ane bao kehm kehme elyabe tib go ege esi.
43007044	Egom jindiki jo sebe re bo bob-e, jol nnene jolem, no lak-e abo.
43007045	Alokeltum bao kehm feere ebo, tahm goji Bab Farisi, a atubesi abalimajom. Bo kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń ki-e bob, ba a ne?”
43007046	Alokeltum bao kehm faange re, “Nnene limm, no kpo bung ana nne noo.”
43007047	Bab Farisi kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn fvfo, á kp-n tob nehma?
43007048	Wahn ebtiki nyehn ntubesi awohng awohng, a nne a Farisi no ma tiki taame tv-ea?
43007049	Ellong ane bao nehme kahn atahm nya Moses. Owo wahng ka erakatahng ji Esowo li a bo.”
43007050	Nekodimos ji ma tohko je goji Jisos, ji woomo go ellong Farisis kehm bungu re,
43007051	“Atahm enyahre bungu re, wahr k'jo lam na lam nne, eji e kala wuk, fere seb kahn ji á limi no.”
43007052	Bo kehm faange re, “Anv, wo tob lohng go Galili fvfoa? Lung nwer Esowo, a bahke kahne re, nnyehnamahr awohng awohng limm, no bahke lohngo go Galili.”
43007053	Ane kpee kehm yaame kehnge.
43008001	Jisos kehm tahme go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
43008002	Efungfu atv atv á kehm kpe feere ba go etahk Esowo. Ane kpee kehm kame ba rur senng-e kak. Á kehm jehke, jo tib bo.
43008003	Bab Farisi, a at'tibi ba atahm kehm koko mmonankal awohng ba a ne, no bo bob-e no, eji á jo lim erehbe, ko-e song yiimi go esamahr ane kpee.
43008004	Bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nt'tibi, mmonankal noa, e m-e bob, eji á jo lim erehbe.
43008005	Go egahre atahm, Moses tong-r re, elkohn nnenkal noo, wahr jo wul-e na go atal atal. Anv, a bahke bungu renan bada ne?”
43008006	Alum nyao, bo bungu, eji bo l'gar-e. Bo jo sebe re, bo bel ejum ji bo bahk-e ebi ka. Jisos kehm soro kabe, jo tennge ebnyohkobo go ndi.
43008007	Eji bo soro asi, jo bahb-e abahbe, Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm tongo bo re, “Nong, nne awohng awohng go egahne ellong no kala l'lim ab'bi, gbo mbang rod eltal tub-e.”
43008008	Jisos kehm kpe kabe, kpe kehme ebnyohkobo tennge go ndi.
43008009	Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm kehme elyaame, go nne awohng awohng, nnenkul abo wo gbo mbang. Jisos sa ntahngtahng, a nnenkal noo no yiimi o.
43008010	Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, ane bako bana? Nnene limm, no kp-a kpeke ka ebia?”
43008011	Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, nnene me kpeem ka ebi.” Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Jol me, wa n nehm tob ka ebi. Song, ka kpe lim ab'bi.”
43008012	Jisos kehm kpe kehme elbungu a bo re, “Me wo li ellennge ni njini. Nne awohng awohng no l'toon-m, á nehm kpe jen go ejannge, á bahke bele ellennge ni elkpin.”
43008013	Bab Farisi kehm-e tongo re, “Eji a kp'yiimi ntianse ka elna antahng, ntianse enya limm go etingitingi.”
43008014	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Jol afi n kp'yiimi ntianse ka elname antahng, ntianse enyame lohko li go etingitingi. Tibre n kp'kahne edi ji n lohng no ba, fere kahn edi ji n fi no. Wahn nehme kahn edi ji n lohng no ba, jol ń nehme tob kahn edi ji n fi no.
43008015	Ń kpo lam alam ana ane kpo lam, wo, me n kpehme lam nnene.
43008016	Li re n kp'lame ane, kehn elam ejame li go etingitingi. Tibre me ntahngtahng sang kpo lam. E kpo lam awahr a Nsoo no tum-m no.
43008017	Bo ny'nyon go egahne atahm re, ane abal l'yiimi ntianse, bung nnyo amehng, lohngo re, alum nya bo bungu no lohko li etingitingi.
43008018	N kpo yiimi ntianse ka elname antahng. Nsoo no tum-m no kpo tob yiimi ntianse ka-m fvfo.”
43008019	Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo li gan?” Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M-e ń nehme kahnem. Nsoo, w-e ń nehme tob kahn. Li re ń kp-m kahne, kehn wahn ebtob kahn Nsoo fvfo.”
43008020	Jisos jo bungu alum nyaa, eji á jo tib go etahk Esowo, edi ji bo kpo kuuru akpohko. Nnene jolem, no bob-e no, tibre ngare enye ka rehng.
43008021	Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “M bahke tahme, ḿ bahk-m sebe. Ngare nyio wo ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem. Edi ji n fi no, ń nehm ma ba.”
43008022	Jus kehm bahbe re, “Anv, á bahke wulu na elnea, tib eji á kp'bungu re, edi ji á fi no, wahr nehm ma jea?”
43008023	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn lohng go njini nyia. Me n lohng go ero ba. Wahn li ka njini nyia. Me n limm ka njini nyia.
43008024	M ma-n tong re, ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem. Tohko tiki jol re, ń taame na tv re, me nne noo wo, ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem.”
43008025	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo nne awo?” Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li ana m ma-n tohko tong mboma mbomo.
43008026	N kpi nsol gbalee nyi m bahke bungu bada nahne, fere lam-n. Nne no tum-m no li go etingitingi. Ajehng ajehng ji n wuku go ege, ji ji n kp'lennge ka njini nyia.”
43008027	Tikem lennge bo re, Jisos jo bungu bada Nde.
43008028	Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Ngare nyi ḿ ma rod Mmon no nne, kum go ejangnti, rod jahm, owo ḿ bahke kahne re, me nne noo wo, fere kahn re ejumjum limm, ji n kpo lim go egame eko. N kpo bung ana Nsoo tong-m no.
43008029	Nsoo no tum-m no li a name. Me á ka tahm sa. Tibre n kpo lim ji kpo kor-e ngare anyehng anyehng.”
43008030	Eji Jisos bungu alum nyaa, ane gbalee t'taame tv-e.
43008031	Jisos kehm bungu tong aneb Jus ba ma taame tv-e re, “Ń l'soro asi ana, jo toono alum enyame, ḿ bahke lohko jol atingitingi abat'toono ebame.
43008032	Ḿ bahke kahne etingitingi. Etingitingi bahk-n limi, ń for.”
43008033	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Wahr lohng go et'tohngo ji Ebraham. E ka jol a jol aju ka nne awohng awohng. Jen ji wahnge a kehm bungu re, bo bahk-r limi, e for?”
43008034	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no l'lim abiafem, á li nju ka abiafem.
43008035	Nju kpehme jol etahk nde ngare kpe kpe. Mmon a nde nne wo kpo jol etahk nde ngare kpe kpe.
43008036	Mmon no Esowo l'lim-n re wahn for, wahn eblohko for go etingitingi.
43008037	N kp'kahne re, wahn lohng go et'tohngo ji Ebraham, gana ń kp'sebe re wahn wul-m. Tibre ń nehme ko alum enyame nya n kp-n tibi, kak go egahna ntim.
43008038	N kpo bung jio ji n nyehne goji Nsoo. Wahn kpo lim ji ń wuku goji nso ejahne.”
43008039	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.” Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Li re ń li abon ba Ebraham, kehn ń kp'limi ji Ebraham limi no.
43008040	Anv a, ń kp'sebe re wahn wul-m, me ji li nne no kp-n tongo etingitingi ji n wuku goji Esowo. Nsol ana nyia Ebraham joom lim.
43008041	Ń kpo lim nsol nyi nso ejahne limi no.” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Wahr limm abon ba ki nyi babnde. Wahr kpi nde na awohng no li Esowo.”
43008042	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Li re Esowo nso ejahne wo, kehn n kp-n koro. Tibre n lohngo goji Esowo ba. Ye wo tum-m no. M baam go egama ngang antahng.
43008043	Jen ji wahnge alum nya n kp'bungu kil-n ellennge? Tibre wahn nehme kor re, wahn wuungu atung go egame alum.
43008044	Wahn li abon ba nnehm nyi nso ejahne. Ń kp'sebe re wahn toono mbang nyi nso ejahne. Á jolo nwulane go mboma mbomo. Ye, a etingitingi, bo kpehme koono. Etingitingi ajehng ajehng á kpimm. Á l'kim efahnge, á kp'limi ana eljini ene li no. Tibre ye nkimfahnge nyi. Afahnge kpee lohng go ege.
43008045	“N kpo tong-n etingitingi, owo wahng ka ń kil taame tv-m.
43008046	Nne awo go egahne ellong bahk-m tibi eb'bi ajehng ajehng ji m ma lim? N l'tong-n etingitingi, jen ji wahng ka ń kil taame tv-m?
43008047	Nne no lohng goji Esowo, ye wo kpo wuk alum nya Esowo. Ejum ji wahnge ń kil wuku alum Esowo, li re, ń limm ka Esowo.”
43008048	Jus kehm faange Jisos re, “Anv, e l'tong-a re, wo nne a Samaria wo, a kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng, etingitingi sang e kp'bunga?”
43008049	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me, ebi etohko ajehng ajehng n kpimm go egame atahng. Esowo bi li Nsoo. Ye wo n kpo kak-e. Wahn, m-e nehme kak.
43008050	N nehme seb ellub n'name antahng. Nne noa go, no kp-m ellub ka. Ye wo li nl'lame.
43008051	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no l'bum alum enyame, á nehm kpe tiki kpo.”
43008052	Jus kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, wahr eblohko kahn re, a kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng. Tibre Ebraham kp'kpo, ano wo fvfo abanyehnamahr Esowo tob kpo, gana a kp-r fere tong re, nne no l'bum alum enya, á nehm kpe tiki kpo.
43008053	Anv, wo wo ga gbal sehnge Ebraham, nso ejahre no ma kpoa? Abanyehnamahr Esowo fvfo t'tob kpo. Anv, a kp'tiri re, wo elkohn nne awo?”
43008054	Jisos kehm faange re, “N l'ka elname ellub antahng, ellub ename li mbol mbol. Nsoo wo kpo ka-m ellub, ye ji ń kp'tongo re, Esowo ebahne bi.
43008055	We ń ka tiki kahn. Me n kp-e kahne. N l'tong re, me, we n nehme kahn, n li nkimfahnga nne ana wahn. N kp-e kahne kpee, fere jo bum alum enye.
43008056	Ebraham, nso ejahne, eltim jo yeb-e sehng re, afung enyame kpir-e. Á ny'nyehn, fere bel eyebatahng.”
43008057	Jus kehm-e tongo re, “Jol nnya atahl abal a nnya ewubu a ka kang, gana a kp'bungu re, wobnyehn Ebraham!”
43008058	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Re Ebraham kehm jini, me n noa.”
43008059	Owo bo kehm fohko atal re bo tuub-e. Jisos kehm beke, biiri eje etahk Esowo o, fere lohng eje tahm.
43009001	Eji Jisos jo sehng go mbang, á kehm nyehne nne no bo jel-e nwakamahr.
43009002	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e bahbe re, “Nt'tibi, ye wo limi abiafema, afi nde abola nnyehn ba limi abiafem, ji wahng ka bo kehm-e jele ano?”
43009003	Jisos kehm faange bo re “Lohngem re abiafem nya nne noa nya, jol nya nde, a nnyehn sang. Jia li, eji ane l'nyehn nkpokosi nyi Esowo bahke limi go ege elkpin.
43009004	E bahke tiki jo lim eltum ni nne no tum-m no, eji njul kpeke li. Tibre atv bahke behde, ma nnene l'k'kpe ma lim eltum.
43009005	Me wo li ellennge ni njini, eji n kpeke li go njini.”
43009006	Á bungu kan ano me, á kehm soro so atel wohngo ndi, nyob ndi, roongo nne noo go amahr,
43009007	kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo song ru esamahr eba go eto ji Siloam!” (ji lohngo re “eltumu”). Nwakamahr nyio kehm soro tahm, song ru esamahr ebe, soro nyehn, kehm feere ba.
43009008	Aneb ebjing ebe, a ane ba jo nyehn-e, eji á jo ji, jo gboongo nsol, kehm kehme elbungu re, “Nne noa sang ana, no kpo kono eljehke, jo gboongo nsola?”
43009009	Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Ye wo ana.” Egom jindiki re, “Ye sang, á kp-e foongo na.” Yefono antahng kehm kehme elbungu re, “Me wo ana.”
43009010	Bo kehme bahbe re, “Anv, á limi renan, amahr enya kehm lennge?”
43009011	Á kehm faange re, “Nne no bo kpo lung-e re Jisos, ye wo nyobo ndi, roong-m go amahr, kehm-m tongo re, ‘Song go eto ji Siloam, wo song ru esamahr!’ Owo n kehm lohko tahm, song ru esamahr, lohko nyehn.”
43009012	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, nne noo li gan?” Á kehm faange re, “Me n nehme kahno!”
43009013	Bo kehm soro ko nne noo no tohko wa amahr, tahm a ne goji Bab Farisi.
43009014	Efung bi Jisos nyobo edob, fere lim nne noo amahr enye lennge, jolo efung Esabat.
43009015	Bab Farisi kehm-e kpe bahb ana limi lim, á kehm nyehne. Á kehm tongo bo re, “Á roong-m edob go amahr, n kehm song ru esamahr, soro nyehn.”
43009016	Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bungu re, “Nne no limi ejum jia, á lohngem goji Esowo, tibre á nehme bum ntahm nyi Esabat.” Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Bahke jolo renan re, nne no li nne abiafem, kehm ma lim akpokosi ana nyaa?” Ane bao kehm kehme elyabe.
43009017	Owo bo kehm kpe bahb nwakamahr a nne noo no ma nyehn re, “Anv, a kpo bung renan bada ne, eji á ma-a lim amahr enya ma lennge, a ma nyehn?” Nne noo kehm faange re, “Nnyehnamahr wo.”
43009018	Jus tikem taame re, nne noo l'lohko wa amahr, á ma fere nyehn, tete bo lung nde, a nnyehn nne no ma nyehn, bo ba.
43009019	Bo kehm bahbe bo re, “Mmon ewahne wo aa, no ń kpo bung re, ń jel-e nwakamahra? Á limi renan, kehm nyehne?”
43009020	Nde, a nnyehn kehm faange re, “E kp'kahne re, mmon ewahre wo a, no e jel-e nwakamahr.
43009021	Ana á ma fere nyehn anv, e nehme kahn ana limi lim, á kehm nyehne. E nehme kahn nne no lenng-e amahr. Bahben ye, yebgbal, á bahke ma faange antahng.”
43009022	Nde, a nnyehn bungu alum nyaa, tibre bo jo fahle Jus. Tib Jus bungu bum nnyo amehng re, nne awohng awohng no l'si b'bung re, Jisos, Mesaya wo, bo bahk-e kame yehke go ero.
43009023	Esi jio ji wahng ka nde, a nnyehn tongo re, “Yebgbal, bahben ye!”
43009024	Bab Farisi kehm kpe lung nne noo no bo jel-e nwakamahr, kehm-e tongo re, “Ka Esowo ellub! E kp'kahne re, nne noo, nne abiafem wo.”
43009025	Á kehm faange re, “Ma nne noo nne abiafem wo nji. Me n nehme kahn. Ejum ajehng ji n kp'kahne, li re, n jolo nwakamahr, anv, me n nyehn.”
43009026	Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, á lim-a renan? Á limi renan, kehm lennge amahr enya?”
43009027	Á kehm faange bo re, “M ma-n tohko tong wuku wuku, ń wuungem atung. Jen ji wahnge ń kp'sebe re, me n kpe-n tong, wahn kpe wuk? Anv, ń kp'sebe re wahn tob jol abat'toono ebea?”
43009028	Bo kehm-e suku re, “Wo wo li nt'toono ewe, go, wahr abat'toono ba Moses ba.
43009029	E kp'kahne re, Esowo jo bungu a Moses. Nne noo, wahr nehme kahn edi ji á lohng no ba.”
43009030	Á kehm kpe faange re, “Anv, ejum jia nkpokosi sanga? Ń nehme kahn edi ji á lohng no, gana yeblennge amahr enyame.
43009031	E kp'kahne re, Esowo kpehme wuungu aneb abiafem atung. Nne awohng awohng no l'kak-e, fere lim mbang enye, ye wo Esowo kpo wuung-e atung.
43009032	Bomo go mbomannahb nyi njini bomo no tete rehng anv, nnene limm, no ma w'wuk re, nne noa, no ma l'lennge amahr nne no bo jel-e nwakamahr.
43009033	Li re nne noo lohngem goji Esowo, kehn á jolem ma lim ejumjum.”
43009034	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Bo jel-a go abiafem, a ejannge, anv, a kp'sebe re wo tib-ra?” Bo kehm soro kam-e yehke go ero bio.
43009035	Jisos kehm wuku re, bo m-e kam yehke go ero. Eji á song nyehn-e, á kehme bahbe re, “Wobtaame tv Mmon no nnea?”
43009036	Á kehm faange re, “Nsoo, nne awo m bahke taame tv-e?”
43009037	Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “A m-e nyehn. Ye wo ana, kp'bungu a na.”
43009038	Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, me n taame,” fere gbo jamm-e alahng.
43009039	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Esi elam jio ji wahnge m ba go njini nyia, eji ane ba kil elnyehne l'nyehn, eji ane bao ba kp'nyehne l'fere wa amahr.”
43009040	Egom Farisi jindiki ji jolo kohl-e, kehm wuku, bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wahr tob li awakamahra?”
43009041	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li re wahn ebwa amahr, kehn eb'bi ajehng ajehng a nahne limm. Anv, eji ń kp'tongo re, ‘E kp'nyehne,’ ebi jia, a nahne.”
43010001	Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no tohko yel go mbutahk mi etahk ejoro, á l'fere wahr edi jindiki yel, nne noo ona nwajv nyi.
43010002	Nne no l'yel go mbutahk, ye wo li mbaabebul.
43010003	Ye wo, nne no kpo baabe mbu bahke lennge ka-e, á yel. Ejoro ebe kpo wuk ellum ene. Á kpo lung ejoro ebe go bo abing, fere lohng a bo.
43010004	Á l'yehke bo kpee, á kpo fere gbo bo mbang, ejoro jo toon-e go njahm. Tibre bo kp'liingi ellum ene.
43010005	Njenne, bo we nehm toono. Bo bahk-e beke na, yaam-e sa. Tibre alum ajenne, bo nehme liingi.”
43010006	Eji Jisos tubu bo elgan nia, bo kahnem ejum ji á jo t'tong bo.
43010007	Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, “Me wo li mbutahk mi ejoro.
43010008	Egom jehko kpee ji gbo mbang ba ka me, awajv nya. Ejoro joom wuungu bo atung.
43010009	Me wo li mbutahk. Nne awohng awohng no l'yel go mbutahk mio, á bahke bele eltahre. Á bahke yele, fere lohng, song li efa.
43010010	Nwajv kpo ba re á ba v, fere wul, fere r'rannge. Me m ba re me m ba ka bo elkpin budu sahb gb'gbal.
43010011	“Me wo li nnooba mbaabebul, nnooba mbaabebul no bahke kake elkpin ene go esi ejoro ebe.
43010012	Nne no bo lak-e na, no ki li nfono ejoro, á l'nyehn ebi nnyam kp'bake, á bahke beke, ejoro bio sa. Ebi nnyam nyio bahke bake, ba bob ejoro bindiki, behko yaame ebo kpee.
43010013	Nne noo bahke beke, tibre bo lak-e na, á nehme tiiri ejoro bio.
43010014	“Me wo li nnooba mbaabebul. N kp'kahne ejoro b'bame, ejoro ebame kp-m tob kahn.
43010015	Ana Nsoo kp-m kahne, ano wo fvfo n kp'tob kahn Nsoo. Me n yake elkpin ename ka go esi ejoro ebame.
43010016	N kpi ejoro bindiki, bi ki wob go ellong nia. Bo fvfo, m bahke tob ko bo ba. Bo bahke wuku alum enyame, fere jol ellong anehng, a mbaabebul awohng.
43010017	Ana wo wahnge n kp'koro Nsoo, tibre me n yake elkpin ename ka, goji n l'fere kpe ko elkpin ename.
43010018	“Nnene limm, no bahke ma taare elkpin ename, sehngem re no, n ka na antahng. N kpi nsahm nyi m bahke yake elkpin ename ka, fere bel nsahm nyi m bahke fere ko elkpin ename. Tibre ano wo Nsoo tong-m re me n lim.”
43010019	Jus kehm kpe kehme elyabe, tib go alum nyao nya Jisos bungu no.
43010020	Egom Jus gbalee jo bungu re, “Á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng. Yebgbo esahl. Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e wuungu atung?”
43010021	Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “A alum nya nne no kpi ebi etohko sang. Anv, ebi etohko bahke ma lennge nwakamahr amahra?”
43010022	Elkak nio ni elbuumu ni bo kpe lennge etahk Esowo jolo go Jerusalem.
43010023	Ngare nyio jolo ngare elkoko. Jisos jo yannge go nlaaga nyi etahk Esowo, edi ji bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.
43010024	Jus kehm kame ba rur senng-e kak, kehm-e bahbe re, “Bahke kpe kang renan, a kehm-r tongo? Wahr ga li-r ekpehlekpehle. Joare wo Mesaya wo, lennge tong-r.”
43010025	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M ma-n tohko tong, ń nehme taame. Ntum nyi n kp'limi go mbing nyi Nsoo, nyi nyi kp'yiimi ntianse ka-m.
43010026	Wahn nehme taame, tibre ń wobem go ellong ejoro ebame.
43010027	“Ejoro ebame kpo wuk alum enyame. N kp'kahne bo, bo kp-m toono.
43010028	N kpo ka bo elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Bo nehm tiki kpo tan. Nnene limm, no bahke ma fooro bo go egame abo, tahm a bo.
43010029	Nsoo no ka-m bo, gbale sehnge nne awohng awohng. Nnene limm, no bahke ma fooro bo go ebo bi Nsoo.
43010030	Wahr awahr a Nsoo, e li ajehng.”
43010031	Owo Jus kehm kpe fohko atal re bo tuub-e.
43010032	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me n lim nnoobo gbalee ka-n, nnoobo nyi Nsoo ka-m no re me n lim. Go nsol nyia kpee, ekahmekahme ejum aji wahnge ń kp'sebe re, wahn tuub-m atal?”
43010033	Jus kehm-e faange re, “E nehme seb re, wahr tuub-a atal tib go nnoobo nyi a kp'limi. E kp'sebe re, wahr tuub-a atal tib eji a kp'suku Esowo, eji a kp'rodo elna, jo bum ana Esowo, wo ji li na nne.”
43010034	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo nyono go egahne atahm re, ‘Esowo re, wahn li are Esowo bi.’
43010035	“E kp'kahne re, ji nwer Esowo bungu no, nnene limm, no bahke ma range alum nya Esowo. Esowo kpo lung ane bao ba á ka bo alum enye re, ‘Esowo’,
43010036	jen ji wahnge ń kp-m tongo re, n kp'suku Esowo, tib eji n tong-n re, me Mmon Esowo wo, me ji Esowo Nsoo yehke no, fere tum tv go njini nyia?
43010037	N tohko lim eltum ni Nsoo, kana taame tv-m!
43010038	N l'fere lim eltum ni Nsoo, ń tohko taame tv-m, lub taamen tv eltum ni n kp'limi, eji ń l'kahn, fere taame re, Nsoo noa, wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob Nsoo go atahng.”
43010039	Bo kehm kpe gare re bo bob-e, Jisos kehm weele eje be.
43010040	Á kehm feere song siiri Jodan, song kang eje go egbuk jehko, edi jio ji Jon gbo mbang jo wohngo ane alahb.
43010041	Ellong ane gbalee kehm bake go ege, kehm ba bung re, “Jol eji Jon ki l'lim nkpokosi anyehng anyehng, ejum ajehng ajehng ji á bungu no bada nne noa eblohko jol go etingitingi.”
43010042	Ane tvv t'taame tv-e edi jio o.
43011001	Nne awohng jolo gona, no bo jo lung-e re Lasaros ji jo yam. Á lene go Betani, ejahbe ji Meri lene no, a Mata mmonannyehn.
43011002	Meri jio wo yaange akehng ma nno a nno wohngo Ntul a Jisos, fere ko alv esi enye dohk-e akpade. Ye wo, Lasaros mmonannyehn jo yam.
43011003	Abonanyehn Lasaros bao kehm tiingi etib tv Jisos re, “Ntul, ekpondahme eja ji kpo kor-a s'sehng kp'yame.”
43011004	Eji Jisos wuku no, á kehm bungu re, “Eyam bio, eyam elkv sang, li re Esowo tib ellub ene, eji Mmon Esowo l'bel ellub.”
43011005	Jisos, Mata jo kor-e sehng, a Meri mmonannyehn, go Lasaros.
43011006	Jisos wuku kan re, Lasaros kp'yame, á kpe kang nfung ebal edi jio ji á jolo no.
43011007	Owo á kehm tongo abat'toono ebe re, “Ba, wahr feeren go Judea!”
43011008	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Nt'tibi, nyanjehle Jus jo sebe re bo tuub-a atal, anv ana, a kp'kpeke seb re wo kpe feere goa?”
43011009	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ewubu awa na abal sang li go efung kohro kohra? Nne awohng awohng no l'jen ngara njul, á kpehme seele. Tibre á kp'nyehne ellennge ni njini nyia.
43011010	Nne awohng awohng no l'jen go ejannge, á kpo s'seele. Tibre ellennge go ege atahng limm.”
43011011	Ana wo Jisos bungu no, kehm kpe soro asi bung tong bo re, “Lasaros, nte ewahre kp'lale. N kp'tahme song nyahm-e.”
43011012	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, l'jol re Lasaros kp'lale na, eyam ebe bahk-e tele.”
43011013	Jisos bungu bade elkv ni Lasaros. Bo jo tiri re, Jisos bungu bade ellu nehka nehka ni nne kpo lal.
43011014	Owo Jisos kehm lennge tong bo re, “Lasaros ebkpo.
43011015	Esi ejahne ji wahnge eltim kp-m yebe, eji n ki jol ona, eji ń l'taame. Nong, wahr tahmen go!”
43011016	Tomos ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, kehm tongo abat'toono Jisos bako re, “Nong, wahr tob tahmen toon-e, eji afi jolo elkv, e l'tob kpo a ne a ne.”
43011017	Eji Jisos ba no, á sebe kahn re, Lasaros, bo m-e kak elahm, ebkang nfung eni.
43011018	Tahm go Betani rehng go Jerusalem labem, jolo mmal na ebal.
43011019	Jus gbalee ji ba no re bo ba ji, jo kak Mata, a Meri eltim, tib go elkv ni mmonannyehn ebo ma kpo.
43011020	Eji Mata wuku re, Jisos kp'bake, á kehm tahme song wan-e. Meri ji eje ga etahk.
43011021	Mata kehm tongo Jisos re, “Ntul, li re, a jolo jol ana, kehn mmonannee jolem kpoko.
43011022	Jol anv, n kp'kahne re, ejum ajehng ajehng ji a l'bahb Esowo, á bahk-a kake.”
43011023	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mmonanne bahke nyahme go elkv.”
43011024	Mata kehm-e tongo re, “N kp'kahne re, á bahke nyahme go elkv go es'kohro efung bi ane kpee bahke nyahme.”
43011025	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Me wo li enyahme ngubjing go elkv. Me wo li elkpin. Nne no l'taame tv-m, afi á kpo na, á bahke fere jol go elkpin.
43011026	Nne no l'jol go elkpin, fere taame tv-m, á nehm kpe tiki kpo ekpokokpoko. Wobtaame ana n tong-a noa?”
43011027	Á kehm-e faange re, “Ee Ntul, me n taame re, wo wo li Kraist ji Mmon no Esowo no bo tong-r re, á kp'bake go njini.”
43011028	Eji Mata bungu ano mal, á kehm tahme song lung Meri mmonannyehn, kehm-e tongo go aw'wa re, “Nt'tibi ebba, á kp-a lungu.”
43011029	Meri wuku kan ano me, á kehm mehle tahm re, á song kpir-e.
43011030	Ngare nyio o Jisos ka rehng go ejahbe jio, á kpeke yim go edi ji Mata kpir-e no.
43011031	Eji aneb Jus ba ji a Meri go ege etahk, jo kak-e eltim, nyehne re, yebmehl fi, bo kehm tob tahm toon-e. Tibre bo jo tiri re, Meri fi song ling go elahm.
43011032	Meri ba kan a, ba rehng edi ji Jisos jolo no, á kehm soro nyehn-e, soro gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, li re, a jolo jol ana, kehn mmonannee jolem kpoko.”
43011033	Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, á kp'lingi, fere nyehn Jus ji toon-e no ba, kp'tob ling, owo ndon kehm-e fili go eltim, fere moong-e go atahng.
43011034	Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Gan wo ń kak-e no?” Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, ba wahr tahm, wo ba nyehn!”
43011035	Jisos kehm lingi.
43011036	Owo Jus kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen ana á kp-e korae!”
43011037	Egom ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Ye sang lennge nwakamahr amahra? Anv, á jolem ma lim nne noa, á k'kpoa?”
43011038	Jisos, ndon kehme kpe gbal go eltim. Á kehm bake go elahm. Elahm bio o, bo rahme go ekpartal, fere bannge eltal bulu go nnyo elahm.
43011039	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Banngen eltal nio, wahn bum go nkpe!” Mata ji mmonannyehn nkvne kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, á bahke vohko t'tokko sehng, tibre ebkang nfung eni nyi á kpo no.”
43011040	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wa n tongem re, a l'taame, a bahke nyehne ellub ni Esowoa?”
43011041	Owo bo kehm bannge eltal nio bum go nkpe. Jisos kehm kpiidi amahr go ero, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, m ma-a kak saam, tibre a ma-m wuk.
43011042	N kp'kahne re, a kpo wuk-m ngare anyehng anyehng. M bungu jia tib go esi ji ane baa ba yim a, eji bo l'taame re, wo wo lohk-m tum.”
43011043	Jisos bungu kan ano me, á kehm rabe wahre wahre re, “Lasaros, lohng me!”
43011044	Nne no kpo no, kehm soro lohng go elahm, a abomo nya bo kpenng-e no go abo, a akpade akpade. Esamahr ebe, bo tob kpenng-e mbomo. Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Fanngen ye, wahn yak-e, á song!”
43011045	Jus gbalee ji ba no, ba ji a Meri, fere nyehn ji Jisos limi no, bo soro taame tv-e.
43011046	Egom jindiki kehm tahme goji Bab Farisi, song tooro tong bo ana ji Jisos ma lim.
43011047	Owo atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm lungu atubesi nfam, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, e bahke limi renan, tib eji nne noa kp'limi akpokosi gbalee?
43011048	E l'yak-e, á l'soro asi ana, nne awohng awohng bahke taame tv-e. Aneb Rom bahke bake, ba rannge ejahbe ejahre, fere rannge mbarebare etahk Esowo jia.”
43011049	Nne awohng no tob woomo go ellong ane bao, no bo jo lung-e re Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom go elya nio, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Ń nehme tohko k'kahn ejumjum.
43011050	Ń nehme kahn re, nobo re, nne awohng kpo, tib go esi ane kpee, sehnge re ejahbe kohro kohro rannga?”
43011051	Alum nya á bungu no, á bungem go ege a ntir. Tib eji á jolo ntubesi abalimajom, owo wahnge á nyehne amahr nya Esowo re, nobo re Jisos kpo go esi ejahbe kohro kohro.
43011052	Lohngem re ejahbe Jus ji ji, fvfo tob li ka abon Esowo ba ma yaame rur go njini, eji bo l'fere jol ajehng.
43011053	Bomo efung bio asongo, owo bo toobo no ana bo bahk-e wulu.
43011054	Owo wahnge Jisos ki kpe jo jen gbul gbul gbuul, jo yannge go Judea. Á jo tahme ona, song rehng go ejahbe ji li kohlo elka emahng, ji bo jo lung re Efraim. Owo á jolo no eje, a abat'toono ebe.
43011055	Ngare nyio elkak ni Jus ni Pasova ebkabbe. Ane gbalee jo tahme ajahbe nyako, jo je go Jerusalem, eji bo l'song bum elbo saang, elkak nio kehm rehnge.
43011056	Bo jo sebe Jisos. Eji bo song kono asi go etahk Esowo, bo kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Anv, ń kp'tiri renan? Á nehm ba go elkak niaa?”
43011057	Ngare nyio nyi atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm tongo re, nne awohng awohng no l'kahn edi ji Jisos li no, á ba tong bo, eji bo l'je, song bob-e.
43012001	Eji ma sa nfung erakera, Pasova rehng, Jisos kehm tahme go Betani, edi ji Lasaros lene no, ji á nyahme go elkv.
43012002	Owo bo kehm lame nsol ka-e. Mata wo jo loko bo. Lasaros t'tob woomo go ellong ane ba ji ekp'kuru nsol alehke a Jisos.
43012003	Meri kehm koko egburu elom akehng ji sahb k'kim ekun, ba a ji, ba yaange wohngo Jisos go akpade, kehm fere ko alv esi enye, jo dohk-e akpade. Es'svv akehng mao kehm yeele na yeele ekp'kpa jio.
43012004	Judas Iskariot ji woomo go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ye jio ji bahk-e gungu, kehm bungu re,
43012005	“Jen ji wahnge bo ki gungu akehng maa, ko eltahl a mpon ewubu ka akpak?”
43012006	Alum nyaa nya á bungu no, lohngem re á tiiri akpak, lohngo re á tiiri elne. Tibre ye jolo nwajv. Á jolo nne no jo kuuru akpohko, fere jo yehke o, jo kak elne ebo.
43012007	Jisos kehm bungu re, “Yaken nnenkal noo! Á kuuru akehng maa sik elkv ename.
43012008	Akpak li a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng, wo, me n limm a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng.”
43012009	Eji ellong Jus tvv wuku no re, Jisos li o, bo kehm jeke. Bo jeem tib Jisos wo wo. Bo je re, bo tob song nyehn Lasaros ji Jisos nyahm-e go elkv.
43012010	Atubesi abalimajom kehm toobo re, bo tob wul Lasaros fvfo.
43012011	Tib go ege esi wo wahnge egom Jus gbalee jo yake bo, fere jo taame tv Jisos.
43012012	Etoono efung behko ellong ane gbalee ba, ba go elkak kehm wuku re, Jisos kp'bake go Jerusalem.
43012013	Owo bo kehm jake amang mbohng, tahm a nya re bo song wan-e. Bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Tehken Esowo! Elfuulu li a nne no kp'bake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo. Elfuulu li a ntul no Israel!”
43012014	Jisos nyehne mmombvankang no nse, kehm kuumu, ana bo nyono go nwer Esowo re,
43012015	“Ka kpe fahl Jerusalem, mmon a Sayon. Nyehn, ntul ewa kp'bake, á kun go mmombvankang no nse.”
43012016	Abat'toono ebe wakem lennge bo ngare nyio. Eji Jisos ma bel ellub ene, owo bo kehm buumu re, edi nwer Esowo jio ji bo nyono bada Jisos. Eblohko jol ano ka-e.
43012017	Ellong ane ba jolo o ngare nyi á lungu Lasaros go elahm, fere nyahm-e go elkv, bo ba yiimi Jisos ntianse.
43012018	Owo wahnge ellong ane kame no re bo ba kpiri Jisos, tibre bo wuku re, ye wo ma lim nkpokosi nyio.
43012019	Bab Farisi kehm bungu atemtem re, “Ń kp'nyehne re, ń nehm ma lim ejumjum. Nyehnen ana njini kpee ma tahm kp-e toono.”
43012020	Aneb Grik bandiki woomo go ellong ni ane ba je elkak go Jerusalem re bo song kak Esowo.
43012021	Aneb Grik bao kehm bake goji Filip ji lohng go Betsaida ji Galili, kehm ba tong-e re, “Nsoo, e kp'sebe re wahr nyehn Jisos.”
43012022	Filip kehm tahme song tong Andru. Andru abola Filip, bo kehm tahme ano, song tong Jisos.
43012023	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ngare ebrehng nyi Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e egburu ellub ka.
43012024	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Tohko tiki jol re mmohk eti fooro na gbo go ndi kpo, bahke sake ano ano. L'kpo, bahke kabe akab gbalee.
43012025	Nne no elkpin ene l'kor-e, á kp'tane na elkpin ene. Nne no elkpin ene l'sab-e go njini nyia, á kp'kuuru na elkpin ene bum go njinanjini.
43012026	Nne awohng awohng no l'tong re á kp-m loko, á bahk-m tiki toono. Edi ji n li no, owo nlokeltum ewame bahke tob jol. Nne awohng awohng no l'lok-m, á bahke jo lub Nsoo.
43012027	“Anv, eltim ename kp-m gbiingi. M bahke bungu renan a? L'li re me m bung re, ‘Nsoo, tahr-m go ngare nyiaa?’ E'ee, j'nehm ana ji wahnge m ba no re me m ba nyehn erem ngare nyia.
43012028	Nsoo, lim, goji mbing enya l'bel ellub!” Bo kehm soro wuk ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “Me n lim re, mbing enyame bel ellub, m bahke kpe lim, kpe bel ellub.”
43012029	Ellong ane ba yiimi kohlo o w'wuk ellum nio. Egom jindiki kehm bungu re, ndan ebta. Egom jindiki bungu re, enjel nyi ma bung a ne.
43012030	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ellum nia a, ba tib go egahne esi, go egame esi sang wahnge.
43012031	Anv wo li ngare nyi njini nyia yim go eti elam. Ngare nyia nyi ntubesi no njini nyia, bo bahk-e kame yake go.
43012032	Ngare nyi bo ma-m kum go ejangnti, rod jahm, owo m bahke leebe ane kpee tv elname.”
43012033	Jisos bungu ellum nia, goji á l'tib ane elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko.
43012034	Ellong ane bao kehm-e faange re, “Wahr ebwuk go atahm nya Esowo re, Mesaya bahke jolo go njinanjini. Jen ji wahnge a kehm bungu re, Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e kumu go ejangnti, rod jahm? Nne awo li Mmon no nne?”
43012035	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ellennge nia, li a nahne mmongare ntiil. Jo jenen, eji ellennge kpeke li, goji ejannge l'ki-n kpiri. Nne no kp'jene go ejannge, á kpehme kahn edi ji á fi fi.
43012036	Eji ellennge nia, kpeke li a nahne, taamen tv ellennge nia, eji ń l'jol abon ba ellennge.” Jisos bungu kan a mal, á kehm tahme song seb edi biiri, eji bo l'ki-e nyehn.
43012037	Jus tikem taame tv Jisos, jol eji á jo l'lim akpokosi gbalee, tib bo.
43012038	Jia jolo, tib goji ellum ni nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no l'lohko jol go etingitingi, ni á bungu re, “Ntul, nne awo ma taame tv etib ebahre? Nne awo no Ntul Esowo m-e tib nsahm enye?”
43012039	Tib go esi alum nyao, bo tikem ma taame. Tibre Aisaya kpe bung re,
43012040	“Esowo ebwa bo amahr, fere lim asi ebo tahne. Ki li ano, kehn bo kp'nyehne go bo amahr, fere kahn go bo a ntim, fere sennge, feere go egame, eji n l'lim bo, bo nob.”
43012041	Aisaya bungu alum nyaa, tibre á nyehne ellub ni Mesaya, fere bung bada ne.
43012042	Tvtv o, atubesi Jus gbalee t'taame tv Jisos. Tib eji bo jo fahl Bab Farisi, bo joom bung gbul gbul gbuul, eji bo l'k'kam bo yehke go ero.
43012043	Tibre ellub ni bo kpo ko goji atem, ni ni jo ga kor bo, sehnge ellub ni Esowo.
43012044	Jisos kehm kehme elbungu wahre wahre re, “Nne no l'taame tv-m, á taamem tv me me, á tob taame tv nne no tum-m no.
43012045	Nne no l'nyehn-m, yebnyehn nne no tum-m no.
43012046	M ba go njini nyia ba jol ellennge, eji nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-m, á l'k'kpe sa go ejannge.
43012047	Nne awohng awohng no l'wuk alum enyame, k'fere bum alum nyao, we n nehm lam. Tibre m baam re me m ba lam njini nyia. M ba na re me m ba tahre njini nyia.
43012048	“Nne no l'ten-m, k'ko alum enyame, ye wo elam nong kp-e siki. Alum nya m ma bung a, nyanehm nya bahk-e lame go es'kohro efung.
43012049	Tibre alum nya m bungu no, nyanyame sang. Nsoo no tum-m no, ye wo tong-m ji m bahke bungu, fere tib.
43012050	N kp'kahne re, alum enye kpo ka elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Owo wahng ka n kpo bung ana Nsoo tong-m no re me m bung.”
43013001	Ngare nyio ebsa efung abehng elkak Pasova rehng. Jisos k'kahn re, ngare ebbiingi nyi á bahke tahme njini nyia song rehng goji Nde. Ane ba jolo ane ebe go njini nyia, jo kor-e s'sehng. Bo jo kor-e tete rehng go es'kohro.
43013002	Eji Jisos, a abat'toono ebe jo li nsol, ngare nyio nnehm ebkak Judas Iskariot ji mmon a Saimon ntir go ege eltim re á gungu Jisos.
43013003	Jisos k'kahn re, Nde m-e kak nsol kpee go ebo. Á jo tob kahne re, á lohng goji Esowo ba, á bahke kpe feere goji Esowo.
43013004	Jisos kehm mehle go ekp'kuru nsol alehke yiimi, kehm soro fannge mbomo eme, fere rod ntawehre bobo.
43013005	Á kehm yaange alahb kak ngbanggbang, jo ru abat'toono ebe akpade, fere jo dohk bo go ntawehre nyi á bobo go ebun.
43013006	Á kehm bake goji Saimon Pita. Saimon Pita kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, anv, a yahk-m ru akpada?”
43013007	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ji n kp'limi a, a nehme kahn anv, behnjehle go wo bahk-a lennge.”
43013008	Pita kehm-e tongo re, “A nehm tiki ru akpade enyame!” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N tohk-a ru, lohngo re, wo nne ewame sang.”
43013009	Saimon Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, akpade enyame nya nya sang, a bahk-m ruku. Fvfo, a bahk-m tob ru abo enyame, a esi.”
43013010	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne no ma wuumu alahb, kpeem li re á kpe ru akidi, tibre yebbar kpee, sehngem re akpade enye nya ano á bahke kpe ru. Wahn ebbar kpee, fvfo, wahn ane kpee sang.”
43013011	Tibre Jisos jo k'kahn nne no bahk-e gungu. Owo wahnge á bungu no re, “Wahn ane kpee sang ma bar.”
43013012	Á ru kan bo akpade mal, á kehm rodo mbomo eme bobo, feere song ji go ege a nji, kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kp'kahne ji n lim-n aa?
43013013	Ń kpo lung-m re nt'tibi, fere lung-m re Ntul. Kp'nobo, eji ń kpo lung-m ano. Tibre ano wo n lohko li.
43013014	Me wo li ntul ewahne, a nt'tibi ewahne. M ma-n ru akpade enyahne. Nobo re wahn fvfo, wahn tob jo ru atemtem akpade.
43013015	M ma-n tib ntugare, eji wahn fvfo ń l'tob lim ana m ma lim ka-n.
43013016	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde no á kp-e loko. Ntiingetib awohng awohng limm, no kpo gbal sehnge nde no tum-e no.
43013017	Eji ń kp'kahne nsol nyia, ń l'lim, elfuulu bahke jolo ka-n.
43013018	“N nehme bung bade wahn ane kpee. N kp'kahne bao ba m ma yehke. Bahke tiki jol go etingitingi ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Nne no jo li nsol alehke enyame, ye wo jolo nne no ma lam kak-m.’
43013019	N kp-n tongo anv ana re kehm limi, eji l'lim, ń l'taame re, me nne noo wo.
43013020	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no l'ko nne no n tum-e no, á ko me. Nne no l'ko-m, á tob ko nne no tum-m no.”
43013021	Jisos bungu kan ano mal, ndon kehm-e gbale go ege atahng. Á kehm kehme elbungu gbul gbul gbuul re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng go egahne ellong bahk-m gungu.”
43013022	Abat'toono ebe kehm kehme elkeebe, seenge atemtem. Bo joom kahn nne no á jo b'bung bada ne.
43013023	Nt'toono awohng no Jisos jo kor-e s'sehng ji kohlo Jisos.
43013024	Saimon Pita kehm-e faake ebo, kehm bungu re, “Tong-r nne no á kp'bung bada ne.”
43013025	Owo nt'toono noo kehm jeere kohlo Jisos, kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, nne awo me?”
43013026	Jisos kehm faange re, “Ye ji m bahk-e kake ejum alehke jia ji m bahke tohko go abehne wo.” Jisos kehm rodo ejum alehke jio, tv abehne, kehm faake ka Judas ji mmon a Saimon Iskariot.
43013027	Eji Jisos ma lim ano, nnehm kehm soro yel Judas. Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ejum ji a fi ellimi, song lim elwaare.”
43013028	Nnene jolem no ji ekp'kuru jio, no kahne ji wahnge Jisos bung ano.
43013029	Egom jindiki jo tiri re, eji Judas jo kuuru akpohko, owo wahnge Jisos tong-e no re, á song gunu nsol nyi bo bahke lehke go elkak nio. Egom jindiki tiri re, “Fundiki Jisos tong-e re, á yehke apene song ka akpak.”
43013030	Eji Judas ma taare ejum alehke jio, á kehm soro lohng tvtv tahm. Ngare nyio atv ebbehde.
43013031	Eji Judas ma lohng fi, Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv wo, Mmon no nne ma bel ellub ene. Eji á ma bel ellub, owo Esowo ma tob bel ellub.
43013032	Esowo l'bel ellub ni Mmon ewe, á bahke kpe feere a ni, ka Mmon ewe. Á bahke limi ano elwaare.
43013033	Abon ebame wahn, m bahke gohro jol a nahne mmongare ntiil. Ḿ bahk-m sebe. Ana m bungu tong Jus, ano wo n kp-n tob tong re, Edi ji n fi no, ń nehm ma ba.
43013034	N kp'jehke ntahm nyi nfenfe ka-n anv re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem. Ana ń kp-m koro, nobo re wahn tob bel elkoro atemtem.
43013035	Ń l'bel elkoro atemtem, owo ane kpee bahke kahne re, wahn lohko li abat'toono ebame.”
43013036	Saimon Pita kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, gan wo a kp'tahme?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Edi ji n fi no, me a nehm ma toono anv. Ngare es'song wo, a bahk-m toono rehng edi jio.”
43013037	Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, jen ji wahnge n l'ki-a ma toono anv? Me n taame re, m bahke kake elkpin ename, kpo go ega esi.”
43013038	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, a bahke taame, yake elkpin ena ka go egame esia? Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-a re, a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me, m-e a nehme kahn, nkok kehm kuku.
43014001	“Kana jo taame re, ntim enyahne jo gbiing-n! Taamen tv Esowo, wahn tob taame tv me!
43014002	Go etahk Nsoo akimi nyaa tvv. Tibre n fi song toobo edi bum-n. Ki li ano, kehn wahn n jolem tongo.
43014003	N l'je song toobo edi jio bum-n, wo m bahke kpe feere ba, ba ko-n tahm a nahne go edi ji n li no, eji ń l'tob jol go edi jio ji n li no.
43014004	Anv, wahn ebkahn mbang nyi ḿ bahke sehnge rehng go edi ji n fi no.”
43014005	Tomos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, e nehme kahn edi ji a fi no. E bahke limi renan, kehm kahne mbang?”
43014006	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo li mbang, me wo li etingitingi, me wo li elkpin. Nnene limm, no bahke sehnge rehng goji Nsoo, tohko tiki jol re á sehnge go egame.
43014007	Li re ń kp-m kahne, kehn ń kp'tob kahn Nsoo. Bomo anv asongo ń kp-e kahne, tibre ḿ m-e nyehn.”
43014008	Filip kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Ntul, tib-r Esowo Nsoo. Ejum jia ji e kp'sebe.”
43014009	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Filip, me n jol a nahne afung tvv. Me a nehme tiki kahna? Nne no l'nyehn-m, yebnyehn Esowo Nsoo. Jen ji wahnge a bahke kpe bung re, ‘Tib-r Esowo Nsoo?’
43014010	A nehme taame re, me n wob Nsoo go atahng, Nsoo tob wob-m go atahnga? Alum nya n kp'bungu tong-n, nyanyame sang. Nsoo no wob-m go atahng, ye wo n kpi eltum ene lim.
43014011	Taamen tv-m re me n wob Nsoo go atahng, Nsoo tob wob-m go atahng. Tohko jol ano, lub taamen tib go eltum ename ni n kp'limi.
43014012	“Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Nne no l'taame tv-m, á bahke tob lim eltum ni n kp'limi. Jol á bahke limi na eltum ni gbale gbal sehng eltum ni n kp'limi. Tibre n kp'tahme goji Nsoo.
43014013	Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń l'bahb go egama mbing, m bahke limi ka-n, eji Mmon l'tib ellub ni Nde.
43014014	Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń l'bahb go egama mbing, m bahke limi ka-n.
43014015	“N l'kor-n, ḿ bahke bumu atahm enyame.
43014016	M bahke gboongo Nsoo, á fere tum nkakebo noko tv-n, eji á l'ba jol a nahne go njinanjini.
43014017	Nne noo, Etingi Etohko ji, ji njini l'k'ma bel. Tibre njini we nehme nyehn, jol bo we nehme kahn. Wahn ba kp-e kahne. Tibre á bahke jolo a nahne, fere woom-n go egahne atahng.
43014018	“Wahn n nehm yake abo, ń jol ana abon akubin. M bahke kpe feere ba go egahne.
43014019	Mmongare ntiil, njini nyia me nehm kpe nyehn. Wahn bahk-m jo ny'nyehn. Tib eji me n li go elkpin, owo wahnge ḿ bahke tob jol go elkpin.
43014020	Efung bio bi ḿ bahke kahne re, me n wob Nsoo go atahng, wahn wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob-n go atahng.
43014021	“Nne no l'wuk atahm enyame, fere bum, ye wo li nne no n kp-e koro. Nne no, me n l'kor-e, á bahke tob kor Nsoo. Me fvfo, á bahk-m tob kor, n fere lennge elname ka-e.”
43014022	Judas jehko ji mmon a Jems kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, bahke jolo renan re wo lennge elna ka-r, k'tob lennge elna ka njini?”
43014023	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne no, me n l'kor-e, á bahke bumu alum enyame. Á bahke koro Nsoo. Me, a Nsoo, e bahke bake, ba lene tob-e go ege atahng.
43014024	Nne no, me n tohk-e kor, á nehm jo bum alum enyame. Alum nya ḿ ma wuk, alum nyanyame sang, nya Nsoo no tum-m no nya.
43014025	“Nsol nyia a, n kp'bungu a nahne, eji n kpeke li a nahne.
43014026	Nkakebo no Nsoo bahke tumu go egama mbing, no li Etingi Etohko, á bahk-n tibi nsol kpee, fere buum-n nsol kpee nyi m ma-n tohko tong.
43014027	N kp'tahme elkoono sa-n. Elkoono n'name ni m bahk-n kake. Wahn n nehme ka ana njini nyia kpo ka. Kana ga jo tiiri, fere jo fahl mbol mbol!
43014028	“Ń w'wuk, eji n tong-n no re, ‘M bahke tahme, kehm kpe feere ba go egahne.’ Li re n kp-n koro, kehn ń jol bele eyebatahng. Tibre n kp'tahme goji Nsoo. Nsoo wo ga gbal sehnge me.
43014029	Anv, m ma-n tohko tong, ngare nyio kehm rehnge, eji l'kehme ellimi, ń l'taame.
43014030	N nehm kpe ga bung a nahne gbalee. Tibre ntubesi no njini nyia kp'bake. Jol we n wobem go elwo.
43014031	N kpo lim ana Nsoo tong-m no, eji njini nyia l'kahn re, Nsoo kpo kor-m sehng. Tahmen, wahr tahm edi jia!
43015001	“Me wo li etingitingi evain. Nsoo wo li nne no kpo lim eltum go etahngga, jo kuuru nti enye.
43015002	Mb'bo eti anyehng anyehng nyi tohko kab akab, á gbahk tub go. Mb'bo eti anyehng anyehng nyi l'kab akab, á kpo tele na sere, eji l'kpe kab akab gbalee budu.
43015003	Wahn ebsi b'bar tib go alum nya m ma bung tong-n.
43015004	Jolen a name, m bahke tob jol a nahne. Ana mbo eti l'k'ma kab akab antahng, tohko tiki jol re á laake go ek'kv eti, ano wo tob li ka-n fvfo re, ń nehm ma kab akab, tohko tiki jol re ń laake me.
43015005	“Me wo li ek'kv eti, wahn ba li ab'bo eti. Nne no l'ya laak-m, ye wo m bahke tob laak-e, á bahke kabe akab gbalee. Tib tohko tiki jol re, ń ya laake me, ń nehm ma lim ejumjum.
43015006	Nne no tohko ya laake me, bo bahk-e kimi tub go ana mb'bo eti. Á bahke wuudu sa o kpo. Ab'bo nyao, bo bahke kpuku na luk edi ajehng, jahm agun.
43015007	Ń l'ya laak-m, alum enyame tob jol a nahne, bahben ajehng ajehng ji ń kp'sebe, ḿ bahke bele.
43015008	Ana wo Nsoo bahke jo bel ellub, ń l'jo kab akab. Tibre nyao nya bahke tibi re, wahn abat'toono ebame ba.
43015009	Ana n kp'koro Nsoo, ano wo wahn kp-m tob kor. Jolen go egame elkoro!
43015010	Ń l'bum atahm enyame, ḿ bahke jolo go egame elkoro, jang jang ana m ma bum atahm nya Nsoo, fere jol go ege elkoro.
43015011	M ma-n tong nsol nyia ana, goji eyebatahng ejame l'jol a nahne, fere rur go egahna ntim.
43015012	“A wo li ntahm enyame, nyi li re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem, ana ń kp-m koro.
43015013	Elkoro anehng anehng limm, ni nne bahke ma bel, ni biingi a nia ni li re, nne yake elkpin ene ka go esi atem.
43015014	Wahn ate ebame ba, ń l'lim ji n tong-n no.
43015015	“Wahn n nehme kpe lung re alokeltum nkpel anyehng anyehng. Tibre nlokeltum kpehme kahn ji nde kp'limi. M ma-n lung re ate ebame. Tibre nsol kpee nyi n wuku goji Nsoo, me n lennge kpee ka-n.
43015016	Wahn sang yehke me, me wo yehk-n na re wahn song kab akab, akab enyahne jol k'bol. Owo bahke wahnge ajehng ajehng ji ń l'bahb Nsoo go egama mbing, á bahk-n kake.
43015017	Ji n kp-n tongo li re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem.
43015018	“Njini nyia l'ko-n ekv, nobo re wahn kahn re, bo gbo mbang ko me ekv, kehm tob ko-n ekv.
43015019	Li re ń wob go njini nyia, kehn ḿ bahke jo kor njini nyia, are wahn ane ebe ba. Eji ń ki wob go njini nyia, m ma-n jak yehke go njini nyia a, owo wahnge njini nyia kp-n koko ekv.
43015020	“Jo buumen ellum ni m bungu tong-n re, ‘Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde.’ Ana bo jo gbak-m, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob jo gbak-n. Ana bo jo bum alum enyame, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob jo bum alum enyahne.
43015021	Bo bahk-n limi nsol nyia kpee tib go egame esi. Tibre bo nehme kahn nne no tum-m no.
43015022	“Ki li re m ba, ba bung a bo, kehn bo jolem lehke ebi go bo abiafem. Wo anv, aneb abiafem bao, ejum ellaange kunu ajehng ajehng bo kpeem kpi.
43015023	Nne no l'ko-m ekv, á tob ko Nsoo ekv.
43015024	“Li re n limem akpokosi nyao go bo ellong, nya nne awohng awohng kala l'lim, kehn bo jolem lehke ebi go bo abiafem. Anv, bobnyehn nsol kpee nyi n limi no, jol bo kp-m koko ekv tv o, fere tob ko Nsoo ekv.
43015025	Jia li, eji ellum ni bo nyono go bo atahm l'lohko jol go etingitingi, ni li re, ‘Bo ko-m ekv, eji n ki lim ejumjum.’
43015026	“Nkakebo no li a Nsoo l'ba, no m bahk-e tumu tv-n, ye ji li Etingi Etohko ji lohng goji Nsoo, á bahke jo yiimi ntianse ka-m.
43015027	Wahn fvfo, wahn tob li atianse enyame, tibre ń jolo a name, go mbomannahb.
43016001	N tong-n alum nyaa, eji ń l'k'gbo.
43016002	Tibre bo bahke jo kam-n yehke go ero. Etingitingi, ngare kp'bake nyi nne awohng awohng no l'wul-n, á bahke tiri re, á kpi Esowo loko.
43016003	Bo bahke jo lim ana, tibre bo me nehme kahn, jol Nsoo bo we nehme kahn.
43016004	M ma-n tong nsol nyia re, eji ngare nyio l'biingi nyi bo bahke limi ano, ń l'buumu nsol nyi n tong-n no bada bo. Wahn n tongem nsol nyia go mbomannahb, tibre n jolo a nahne.
43016005	“Anv, n kp'tahme goji nne no tum-m no. Nne ewahne awohng awohng limm, no kp-m bahbe re, ‘Gan wo a kp'tahme?’
43016006	Alum nya m ma-n tong nya wahnge ndon ma-n jol go atahng gbalee.
43016007	N kp-n tongo etingitingi re, bahke nobo a nahne sehng, n l'tahm. N tohko tahm, Nkakebo nehm ba. N l'tahm, m bahk-e tumu tv-n.
43016008	“Á l'ba, á bahke ba lennge ane ba li njini nyia bade ana abiafem li no, fere lennge bo bade ana eno alehke li no, go elam ji Esowo ji kp'bake.
43016009	Abiafem nyao nya li nya bo kil taame tv-m.
43016010	Eno alehke jio, j'jame ji. Tibre n kp'tahme goji Nsoo, bo me nehm kpe tiki nyehn.
43016011	Elam jio ji li elam ji bo ma lam ntubesi no njini nyia.
43016012	“N kpe kpi nsol tvv nyi n jol kpe bung a nahne. Anv, ngare nyia, kp'riidi re wahn kehm kahne.
43016013	“Etingi Etohko jio l'ba, á bahke jo tib-n mbang anyehng anyehng nyi etingitingi. Tibre á nehm jo bung alum nyanye go ege a nsahm. Ajehng ajehng ji á wuku no, j'nehm ji á bahke bungu. Á bahk-n lennge nsol nyi kp'bake go es'song.
43016014	Á bahke me ellub ka. Á bahke koko nsol ny'nyame, ba lennge ka-n.
43016015	“Ejum ajehng ajehng ji Nsoo kpi no, tob li j'jame. Ana wo wahnge n tong-n re, á bahke koko j'jame, ba lennge ka-n.
43016016	“Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn. L'kpe kang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn.”
43016017	Abat'toono ebe bandiki kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, alum nyaa lohngo renan, nya á kp-r tongo a re, ‘Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn, l'kpe kang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn,’ a ellum nehko ni kpe li re, ‘Tibre n kp'tahme goji Nsoo?’ ”
43016018	Bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ‘mmongare ntiil’ lohngo renan? E nehme kahn ji á kp'sebe re á bung tong-r.”
43016019	Jisos k'kahn re, bo kp'sebe re bo bahb-e. Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “M bungu re, ‘Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn. L'kang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn.’ Ellum nia ni, ń kp'bahbe atemtem ana lohngo noa?
43016020	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Ḿ bahke lingi, fere jo ka agohrobi, gana njini bahke jo bel na eyebatahng. Ḿ bahke jo ji ndon ndon, ndon enyahne bahke fere siingi eyebatahng ka-n.
43016021	Eji nnenkal yahke jel, á kpo nyehn erem, tibre ngare erem enye ebrehng, ngare nyi á ma jel mmon, á nehm kpe tiki buumu erem bi á nyehne no, tib go eyebatahng ji á ma jel mmon kak go njini nyia.
43016022	Mbang ny'nehm nyi, ń li go ndon anv, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn. Ngare nyio ntim enyahne bahke gbale go eyebatahng.
43016023	Efung bio me ń nehm kpe jo bahb ejumjum. Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-n re, Ajehng ajehng ji ń l'bahb Nsoo, á bahk-n kake tib go egama mbing.
43016024	Jol tete sik anv, ń ka tiki bahb ejumjum go egama mbing. Bahben, ḿ bahke bele, goji eyebatahng ejahne l'kpe gbal go egahne atahng.
43016025	“Alum nya m bungu tong-n, m bungu go ngaane. Ngare kp'bake nyi n l'k'kpe bung a nahne go ngaane. M bahke jo bung gbuul tong-n bada Nsoo.
43016026	Afung nyao l'biingi, ḿ bahke jo bahb Nsoo go egama mbing. Wahn n nehme tong re, m bahke jo bahb Nsoo ka-n.
43016027	Tibre yefono Nsoo, wahn kp-e koro, tib eji me n kp-n koro, ḿ ma fere taame re, n lohng goji Nsoo ba.
43016028	N lohng goji Nsoo ba go njini nyia. Anv, n kp'tahme njini nyia, feere goji Nsoo.”
43016029	Abat'toono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, a kp'bungu gbuul tong-r, go ngaane sang.
43016030	Anv, wahr ebkahn re, a kp'kahne ejum ajehng ajehng. Kpeem fuumu re, nne awohng awohng bahb-a mbahbe. Owo wahng ka e ma taame re, a lohko lohng goji Esowo ba.”
43016031	Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv wo, ḿ ma kehm rahng taama?
43016032	Ngare kp'bake nyi nne awohng awohng ewahne bahk-m yaame sa, tahm go ege ejahbe. Ngare ny'nehm nyi a. Jol fvfo, n nehm tiki jol antahng. Nsoo noa a name.
43016033	M bungu alum nyaa tong-n, eji ń l'bel elkoono tib go egame esi. Go njini nyia ḿ bahke jo bel afemfem. Kana jo tiiri, me n ga njini nyia.”
43017001	Eji Jisos ma bung alum nyao kpee mal, á kehm kpiidi amahr enye go ero, kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, ngare ebbiingi. Ka mmon ewa ellub, eji mmon ewa l'tob ka-a ellub.
43017002	Tibre wobyake ane kpee kak go ege elwo, eji á l'ka ane ba a yehke no ka-e elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
43017003	“Elkpin ni li go njinanjini ni li elkahne ni ane ma-a kahn, fere kahn re, wo ntahngtahng wo li etingitingi Esowo, tob kahn Jisos Kraist ji a tum-e no.
43017004	Eji n jolo go njini, n jo ka-a ellub. Me n lim eltum ni a ka-m no mal.
43017005	Nsoo, ka-m ellub anv go ega esamahr, ellub ni m bele go ega ngare nyi njini kala jol.
43017006	“Me n lennge mbing enya tong ane ba a yehke no go njini nyia ka-m. Bo jolo ane eba, ba a yehke no ka-m. Boblohko bum alum enya.
43017007	Anv, bo kp'kahne re, ajehng ajehng ji a ka-m no lohng go ega.
43017008	Tibre me m bung alum enya tong bo, nya a tong-m no. Bobtaame tv alum nyao, fere kahn go etingitingi re, me n lohng go ega ba. Boblohko taame re, wo wo tum-m no.
43017009	N kp'kake ero ka bo. N nehme kak ero ka njini nyia a. N kp'kake ero ka bao ba a ka-m no. Tibre bo ane eba ba.
43017010	Ejum ajehng ajehng ji n kpi no, j'ja ji. Ajehng ajehng ji a kpi no, j'jame ji. Bo ba kp'tibi ellub ename.
43017011	Anv, n kpeem li go njini, bo ba kpeke li go njini. N kp'bake go ega. Mbarebara Nsoo, jo fili bao ba a ka-m no go nsahm nyi li go ega mbing, eji bo l'jol ajehng ana wahr li ajehng.
43017012	Eji n jolo a bao ba a ka-m no, n jo fili bo go ega mbing, fere jo baabe bo. Nne awohng awohng limm, no ma tan, sehngem nne no tiki jol re á tan, ye wo ma tan, eji nwer Esowo l'lohko jol go etingitingi.
43017013	“Anv, n kp'bake go ega. Alum nya n kp'bungu ga njini nyia li, eji eyebatahng ejame l'gbal go bo atahng.
43017014	Me m bung alum enya tong bo. Njini ebko bo ekv, tibre bo wobem go njini nyia, jang jang ana me n ki tob wob go njini nyia.
43017015	N nehme kak ero re, wo yehke bo go njini nyia. N kp'kake ero re, wo baabe bo nob nob, eji ab'bi l'k'yel go bo atahng.
43017016	Bo wobem go njini, ana mefono antahng ki tob wob go njini.
43017017	“Ko etingitingi, wo yehke bo, bo jol ebo ebo. Alum enya, etingitingi ji.
43017018	Ana a tum-m no tv go njini nyia, ano wo fvfo m ma tob tum bo tv go njini.
43017019	Tib go bo esi wo wahnge, n kp'rodo elname ka, eji bofono antahng l'jol ebo ebo, fere sa go etingitingi.
43017020	“N kp'kake ero ka bo, fere tob kak ero ka ane bako fvfo, bao ba bahke tob taame tv-m tib go bo alum.
43017021	Nsoo, n kp'kake ero re bo jol ajehng, bo ane kpee, ana a wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob-a go atahng, eji bo kpe l'tob woom-r go atahng, eji l'toono o, njini nyia tob taame re, wo wo tum-m no.
43017022	Ellub ni a ma-m ka, me n faake a ni ka bo, eji bo l'jol ajehng ana wahr li ajehng,
43017023	m bahke woomo go bo atahng ana wo wob-m go atahng, eji bo l'lohko jol na ajehng ana j'jehng. Ano wo bahke wahnge njini kahn re, wo li nne no tum-m no, fere kahn re, bo kp-a koro ana n kp-a koro.
43017024	“Nsoo, n kp'sebe re, ane ba a ka-m no jol a name edi ji n li no, eji bo l'nyehn ellub ni a ma-m ka, tib go ega elkoro ni n kor-a no ngare nyi njini kala jol.
43017025	Nnobonoba nsoo, njini nyia ana wa ka kahn. Wo, me n kp-a kahne. Ane baa ana kp'kahne re, wo wo tum-m no.
43017026	Me n lennge mbing enya ka bo. M bahke soro asi, jo lim ano ano, eji elkoro ni n kp-a koro l'woomo go bo atahng, me n fere tob woomo go bo atahng.”
43018001	Eji Jisos ma kak ero mal, á kehm tahme, a abat'toono ebe, song siiri ebgba bi bo jo lung re Kidron. Etahngga jolo ona edi jio. Jisos kehm yele ona, a abat'toono ebe.
43018002	Judas ji gungu Jisos jo tob kahn edi jio. Tibre Jisos, bo jo kono eljeke ona song kono, a abat'toono ebe.
43018003	Judas kehm song kpiri atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi. Bo kehm-e kake nsoja, a egom ane bandiki ba kpo baabe etahk Esowo. Bo fili at'rekahng, fili nr'rare nyi bo bunu no, jo ko nyaale agun, fere fili nsol ebta, tahm a nyi edi jio o.
43018004	Jisos k'kahn nsol kpee nyi bahk-e limi. Á kehm jeere song kpiri bo, kehm bahbe bo re, “Nne awo ń kp-e sebe?”
43018005	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo.” Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Me wo a.” Judas ji gung-e no, tob yiimi o go bo ellong.
43018006	Eji Jisos tongo bo re, “Me wo a,” bo kehm feere njahm njahm, song gbo go ndi.
43018007	Á kehm kpe bahb bo re, “Nne awo ń kp-e sebe?” Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo.”
43018008	Jisos kehm kpe faange bo re, “N tong-n re, ‘Me wo ana.’ Joare me wo ń kp-m sebe, yaken ane baa, bo song.”
43018009	Á bungu ellum nia, eji l'lohko jol go etingitingi, ana á tohko bung re, “Ane ba a ka-m no, nne awohng awohng limm, no ma tan.”
43018010	Saimon Pita bele ekahngkahng ona, á kehm wobo go mbak, kpale nju nyi ntubesi abalimajom etung eboblum. Nju nyio, bo jo lung-e re Malkus.
43018011	Jisos kehm tongo Pita re, “Feere ekahngkahng eba, wo kak go mbak. Anv, me n k'wo go nkob erem nyi Nsoo ka-m noa?”
43018012	Ntubesi a nsoja, a nsoja enye nyio, a egom ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo kehm ba bob Jisos, fere gba-e alehke.
43018013	Bo tohko gbo mbang ko-e tahm a ne goji Annas ji jolo nde nkal a Kayafas, Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom go elya nio.
43018014	Kayafas wo jolo nne no tubu Jus elle re, “Nobo re nne awohng kpo go esi ane kpee.”
43018015	Saimon Pita, a nt'toono Jisos noko, bo kehm kehme Jisos toono. Nt'toono Jisos noko kehm song yange go nlaaga nyi ntubesi abalimajom, tibre ntubesi abalimajom noo jo kahn-e kpee.
43018016	Pita ji gana kohlo mbuga. Nt'toono Jisos noko no ntubesi abalimajom jo kahn-e, kehm lohngo song tong nnenkal no jo baabe mbuga re á nongo Pita yange.
43018017	Nnenkal noo no jo baabe mbuga kehm bahbe Pita re, “Anv, wo nt'toono a nne noo sanga?” Pita kehm faange re, “Ee, me nt'toono ewe sang.”
43018018	Ngare nyio ona alohk jo f'fili. Owo alokeltum bao, a ab'baabe edi kehm kono agun go akal nsehng. Bo kehm yiimi sennge agun nyao kak, jo wooro. Pita yiimi go bo ellong o, tob jo wooro.
43018019	Ntubesi abalimajom jo bahbe Jisos bade abat'toono ebe, fere bahb-e bade eltibi ene.
43018020	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N jo bungu gbul gbul gbuul tong nne awohng awohng. Ngare anyehng anyehng n jo tibi eltibi ename go ntahk ero, fere jo tib go etahk Esowo, edi ji Jus kpee jo ba kono. Ejumjum limm, ji n jo bung mbehr mbehr.
43018021	Jen ji wahnge a kp-m abahbe bahb? Bahb ane ba wuku nsol nyi m bungu no. Bo kp'kahne nsol nyi m bungu no.”
43018022	Eji Jisos bung ano, owo mb'baabe awohng no yiimi kohl-e kehm-e rumu elkpal, kehm-e tongo re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm faange ntubesi abalimajom elkohn nfaange ana nyia?”
43018023	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Joare me n soodo, eji m bungu a, lennge tong nne awohng awohng ji n soodo no. Joare ellum ni m bungu no, m bungu go etingitingi, jen ji wahnge a kehm-m rumu elkpal?”
43018024	Owo Annas kehm tumu Jisos, a alehke alehke nya bo gba-e no tv goji Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom.
43018025	Eji Saimon Pita kpeke yim, kpi agun wooro, bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Wo nt'toono a nne noo sanga?” Pita kehm kpe gbaame re, “Ee, me nt'toono ewe sang.”
43018026	Nlokeltum a Ntubesi abalimajom awohng no jolo mmonannyehn nne no Pita kpal-e etung, kehm bahbe Pita re, “Wo sang n nyehn-a no go etahngga, a nne nooa?”
43018027	Pita kehm kpe gbaame. Nkok kehm soro kuk tvtv.
43018028	Efungfu atv atv bo kehm koko Jisos go etahk Kayafas, tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi ejahbe. Jus joom yel go ekp'kpa ntubesi, tibre bofono antahng jo sebe re bo bum elbo saang, eji bo l'mal li elkak Pasova.
43018029	Owo Pailet kehm lohngo go elatahk, ba kpiri bo, kehm ba bahb bo re, “Ejum aji wahnge wahng ń kpi nne noa ebi ka?”
43018030	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Li re nne noa ebi nne sang, kehn we e jolem koko ba a ne.”
43018031	Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Koon ye, wahn lam-e ana atahm enyahne bungu no.” Jus kehm-e faange re, “Bo nehm taame re, wahr wul nne.”
43018032	Jia limi, eji ebung ji Jisos bungu no l'lohko jol go etingitingi, ana á bungu no bade elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko.
43018033	Pailet kehm feere song yel go ege ekp'kpa, kehm lungu Jisos, kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li ntul no Jusa?”
43018034	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, mbahbe nyia a tiri antahnga, afi ane bandiki ba tong-a bada name?”
43018035	Pailet kehm bungu re, “Anv, me nne a Jus woa? Ane eba, a atubesi abalimajom, bo ba yak-a no ka-m. Anv, a limi jen?”
43018036	Jisos kehm faange re, “Me ntul sang go njini nyia. Li re n li ntul go njini nyia, kehn alokeltum ebame jol noko ka-m, eji bo l'ki-m yake kak Jus go ebo. Tibre me ntul sang go njini nyia.”
43018037	Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, lohngo re wo ntul woa?” Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, wobbung etingitingi re, me ntul wo. M ba go njini nyia re, me m ba bung bade etingitingi. Tibre esi jia ji wahnge bo jel-m no. Nne awohng awohng no l'jol ka etingitingi jio, á kpo wuk alum enyame.”
43018038	Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Ejum aji li re etingitingi?” Eji Pailet ma bung ano mal, á kehm kpe lohng go elatahk, ba kpiri Jus, kehm ba tong bo re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng n nyehnem ji nne noo ma lim.
43018039	Ń kpi eljini ni n kpo kono nne a ngbekobo ewahne awohng yehke yake ngare elkak Pasova. Ń kp'sebe re me n yehke ntul ewahne noo yaka?”
43018040	Bo kehm-e faange wahre wahre wahre re, “Barabas wo e kp'sebe re wo yehk-e yake. Nne noo sang!” Barabas jolo nne no jo jen, jo taare ane nsol go nsahm.
43019001	Pailet kehm kake nsahm re, bo ko Jisos song dv-e.
43019002	Nsoja nyio kehm koko akpiri, tahng ekpasi, konng-e go esi. Bo kehm rodo ekpawobo kak-e, mbilibili ekpawobo ji atul kpo kono elkake.
43019003	Bo kehm jo ba lim ayok re, “E ma-a kak nnyo, ntul no Jus,” fere jo ruum-e nkpal.
43019004	Pailet kehm kpe lohng go elatahk, kpe song tong Jus re, “M bahke kpe lohng a ne ba, eji ń l'kahn re, ejumjum n nyehnem ji á limi no.”
43019005	Owo Jisos kehm lohngo ba go elatahk, a ekpasi akpiri jio go esi, a mbilibili ekpawobo ji bo kak-e no. Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Nyehnen nne noa ga.”
43019006	Eji atubesi abalimajom, a ab'baabe nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Kum-e lake go ekros! Kum-e lake go ekros!” Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Koon ye antahng, wahn song kum-e, tibre ejumjum n nyehnem ji á limi no.”
43019007	Jus kehm-e faange re, “E kpi ntahm, tib go ntahm nyio ona fuumu re á kpo. Tibre yebrod elne bum re, ye Mmon Esowo wo.”
43019008	Eji Pailet wuku alum nya bo bungu no, á kpe f'fahl na budu.
43019009	Á kehm kpe maade yel go ege ekp'kpa, song bahb Jisos re, “Anv, a lohng gan?” Jisos we faangem efaangefaange.
43019010	Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “A nehm bung a nama? Anv, a nehme kahn re, n kpi nsahm nyi m bahk-a ma yake, a fora, fere bel nsahm nyi m bahk-a ma kum go ekrosa?”
43019011	Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ki li re Esowo bi ka-a nsahm, kehn a jolem ma bel nsahm nyi a bahk-m wulu. Nne no ko-m no, ba kak-a go abo, ye wo ma ga lim abiafem.”
43019012	Pailet wuku kan alum nyao o, á kehm kehme elsebe mbang ana nyi á bahk-e yehke yake. Jus kehm kpe kehme elrabe re, “A l'yehke nne noo yake, a nehm kpe jol ntem a ntul no Rom. Tibre nne awohng awohng no l'tong re, ye ntul wo, á li nnekv no ntul a Rom.”
43019013	Pailet wuku kan alum nyaa a me, á kehm soro yehke Jisos lohng a ne go elatahk, kehm fere song ji go ege eti elam, edi ji bo jo lung re Pevment ji bo jo lung go alum Hibru re Gabata.
43019014	Efung bio jolo efung bi bo jo toobo ebjing bi Pasova. Ngare efin Pailet kehm tongo Jus re, “Nyehnen, ntul ewahne gana!”
43019015	Bo kehm rabe re, “Tahmen a ne! Tahmen a ne! Song kumen ye go ekros!” Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kp'sebe re me n kum ntul ewahne go ekrosa?” Atubesi abalimajom kehm faange re, “Ntul awohng awohng e kpimm, sehngem ntul a Rom wo wo e kpi no.”
43019016	Pailet kehm yake Jisos ka bo re bo song kum-e go ekros. Bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne.
43019017	Jisos kehm solo ekros eje, song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re edi nkpakesi, ji bo jo lung go alum Hibru re Golgota.
43019018	Owo bo kum-e lake go ekros. Ane abal ba bo tob kum bo o, nne noko go ejang eboblum, noko go ejang ebobkal, Jisos woomo go elka elka.
43019019	Pailet nyono mmonwer lake go ekros, no bungu re, “Jisos ji Nasaret, ntul no Jus wo ana.”
43019020	Aneb Jus gbalee ba jo lung mmonwer noo. Tibre edi ji bo kumu Jisos jolo kohlo go nla ejahbe. Mmonwer noo bo nyono go Hibru, fere nyon go Latin, fere nyon go Grik.
43019021	Atubesi abalimajom kehm tongo Pailet re, “A jolem nyono re Ntul no Jus, a jol nyono re, Nne noa bungu re, ye ntul no Jus wo.”
43019022	Pailet kehm faange re, “Ji m ma nyon, tiki li ana n nyono no.”
43019023	Ngare nyi nsoja nyio ma kum Jisos go ekros, bo kehm rodo nsol ebjing enye baange, bo ane ani. Bo t'tob rodo nsubu enye nyi bo tubu no, nyi ki bel nkon anyehng anyehng.
