43019024	Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Nong, wahr k'kiimi nsubu nyia baange, wahr tub na elfaange, nyehn nne no bahke bele.” Jia limi, eji nwer Esowo l'lohko jol go etingitingi ana bungu no re, “Bobbaange nsol ebjing enyame, fere tub elfaange, gohro ko nsubu enyame.”
43019025	Owo nsoja nyio kehm limi ano. Nnyehn Jisos yiimi ona kohlo go ekros, a mmonannyehn, a Meri nkal a Klopas, go Meri ji lohng go Magdala.
43019026	Eji Jisos nyehne nnyehn, a nt'toono ewe no jo sahb kor-e kor yim kohlo o, á kehm tongo nnyehn re, “Nnenkal, nyehn mmon ewa o!”
43019027	Á kehm tongo nt'toono ewe noo re, “Nne no wa wo a.” Bomo ngare nyio asongo nt'toono noo kehm-e koko tahm a ne go ege etahk, á song lene tob-e.
43019028	Eji ma jol ano, Jisos k'kahn re, nsol kpee ebmal. Owo á kehm bungu re, “Alahb ma-m kor,” goji alum Esowo l'lohko jol go etingitingi.
43019029	Etu jekke ona, ji bo kake alahb ma bo kpo lung re evinegar. Bo kehm soro tub nd'dahng kak go alahb mao, tung go ebti, song koor-e go nnyo.
43019030	Jisos wo kan alahb mao, á kehm bungu re, “Ebmal,” kehm soro yake elkpin ene ka go, bahk emel kpo.
43019031	Efung bio jolo efung ebjing atoobo bi Esabat. Jus kehm song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame re, bo song banne ane ba kpaake go akros akpade, fere fono bo. Bo joom seb re, akv ebo kpe kpaake go akros egburu efung Esabat bi jolo etoono efung behko.
43019032	Nsoja kehm bake, ba banne nne noko no bo kum-e kohlo Jisos akpade, fere kpe banne nne noko akpade fvfo.
43019033	Eji bo ba rehng goji Jisos, bo sebe kahn re, yeblohko kpo. Bo we bannem akpade.
43019034	Nne a nsoja awohng kehm-e jahme elkong go ngbaange. Owo alung kehm lohngo, semme alahb.
43019035	Nne noo no nyehne ji ma lim o, ye wo yiimi ntianse, goji wahn fvfo l'tob taame. Ntianse enye lohko li go etingitingi. Á kp'kahne re, alum enye lohko li go etingitingi.
43019036	Nsol nyia kpee limi, goji nwer Esowo l'lohko jol go etingitingi, nyi bungu re, “Ekahb eje ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo bahke bahne.”
43019037	Edi nwer Esowo jehko kpe bung re, “Ane bahke seenge nne noo no bo jahm-e elkong.”
43019038	Josef ji lohng go Arimatia kehm song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame, á fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji. Josef jo toono Jisos mbehr mbehr, tib á jo fahle Jus. Pailet kehm taame, owo Josef kehm bake, ba fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji.
43019039	Nekodimos ji tohko je goji Jisos atv amehng kehm koko nsol nyi kpo v es'svv ji nno a nno, ba a nyi, nyi jo lub ana ekpa akang ji nnen. Nsol nyio bo ko anyane nya bo kpo lung re mmir, a aloe semme, kehm limi.
43019040	Bo ane abal abal kehm rodo ekv ji Jisos ba a ji, ba wohngo nsol nyio, kpennge abarebare abomo, ana eljini elkv alimi ni Jus jolo no.
43019041	Etahngga jolo edi ji bo kumu Jisos go ekros. Elahm jolo go etahngga jio, bi bo kala k'kak nnene.
43019042	Eji jolo efung bi bahke sene efung Esabat, tibre elahm bio jolo kpidi kpidi, owo bo kehm koko ekv ji Jisos song kak elahm bio.
43020001	Ngbokambang efung go erahde, Meri ji lohng go Magdala kehm fungu go elahm efungfu atv atv, kehm song nyehn eltal ni bo bannge bulu go nnyo elahm ma bannge noongo go nkpe.
43020002	Á kehm beke tahm goji Saimon Pita, a nt'toono Jisos noko go fvfo, no jo sahb k'kor Jisos, kehm song tong bo re, “Bobyehke Ntul ewahre go elahm fi a ne. E nehme kahn edi ji bo m-e song bum.”
43020003	Pita, a nt'toono noko, bo kehm mehle tahm gona elahm.
43020004	Bo ane abal abal jo be abahl. Nt'toono noko be sehnge Pita, gbo mbang song rehng go elahm.
43020005	Á kehm song kehme, jo fahng go elahm, kehm nyehne abarebare abomo nyao nong no go atahng. Á yelem go atahng.
43020006	Saimon Pita ji jo tob toon-e, kehm bake, ba sehng na sehng, yel go elahm, kehm nyehne abarebare abomo nyao nong no,
43020007	fere nyehn mbomo mi bo kpennge Jisos go esi. Noongem edi ajehng a abarebare abomo nyako. Mbomo mio mi bo kpennge Jisos go esi noongo elfehd.
43020008	Owo nt'toono noko no gbo mbang rehng go elahm, kehm tob yel song nyehn, fere taame.
43020009	Tibre wuku wuku bo tikem kahn edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re, á bahke nyahme go elkv.
43020010	Abat'toono Jisos bao kehm feere kehnge.
43020011	Meri yiimi eje kohlo elahm, jo ling. Eji á jo ling, á kehm kehme, jo fahng go elahm.
43020012	Á kehm nyehne enjel na ebal nyi kake abarebare nsol jehk no go edi jio ji bo kake ekv ji Jisos, noko ji edi ji esi Jisos noongo no, noko ji edi ji akpade nya Jisos noongo no.
43020013	Enjel nyio kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnenkal, jen ji wahnge a kp'lingi?” Á kehm faange bo re, “Tibre bobyehke Ntul ewame fi a ne. N nehme kahn edi ji bo bum-e no.”
43020014	Á bungu kan ana mal, á kehm soro keebe, nyehn Jisos yim no. Á kahnem re, Jisos wo.
43020015	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnenkal, jen ji wahnge a kp'lingi? Nne awo a kp-e sebe?” Meri jo tiri re, nne no kpo lim eltum etahngga jio wo. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, joare wo wo rod-e, tib-m edi ji a bum-e no, eji n l'song rod-e tahm a ne.”
43020016	Jisos kehm-e lungu re, “Meri!” Meri kehm keebe, kehm bungu go ellum Hibru re, “Rabbuni,” ji lohngo re nt'tibi.
43020017	Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka ma lak abo, eji n kala tahm go ero goji Nsoo. Song goji abonanee, wo song tong bo re, n kp'tahme go ero goji Nsoo, no tob li Nso ejahne. N fi goji Esowo ebame, bi tob li Esowo ebahne.”
43020018	Meri ji lohng go Magdala kehm tahme song kpiri abat'toono Jisos, kehm tongo bo re, “Me n nyehn Ntul,” fere tong bo ana Jisos bungu no tong-e.
43020019	Efung b'nehm ona bi jolo ngbokambang efung go erahde, elgung nio ona, abat'toono Jisos woomo ekp'kpa ajehng, gbaange abutahk kpee tv elbo, tibre bo jo fahle Jus. Jisos kehm bake, ba yiimi go bo ellong, kehm kake bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono!”
43020020	Á bungu kan ano mal me, á kehm tibi bo abo enye, a ngbaange. Abat'toono ebe bele eyebatahng sehng, eji bo nyehne Ntul abo.
43020021	Jisos kehm kpe kak bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono! Ana Nsoo tum-m no, ano wo fvfo n kp-n tob tum.”
43020022	Á bungu kan ano mal me, á kehm soro fahle elfeb wohngo bo, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Taaren Etingi Etohko!
43020023	Ń l'tahm ka nne go ege abiafem, yeblohko bel eltahmeka. Ń tohko tahm ka nne go ege abiafem, á bahke sake ano go ege abiafem.”
43020024	Tomos ji woomo go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, á jolem a bo ona ngare nyi Jisos ba no.
43020025	Owo abat'toono Jisos bako kehm-e tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn Ntul.” Á kehm faange bo re, “Tohko tiki jol re, n nyehne anv nya abang aba go ege abo, nya bo kum-e no, fere kooro ebnyohkobo go anv nyao, fere lak ebo ebame go ege a ngbaange, n nehm tiki taame.”
43020026	Eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, abat'toono Jisos kpe je edi jio. Tomos jolo a bo o fvfo. Bo ta abutahk kpee. Jisos kehm kpe ba lohng go bo ellong, kpe kak bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono!”
43020027	Á kehm tongo Tomos re, “Koor-m ebnyohkobo a, wo fere nyehn abo enyame. Tanne ebo eba, wo lak-m go ngbaange. Ka kpe faabe, taame na taame!”
43020028	Tomos kehm-e faange re, “Wo wo li Ntul ewame, a Esowo ebame!”
43020029	Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Wobtaame tib eji a ma-m nyehna? Elfuulu li ka ane ba ki nyehn go amahr, bo taame na taame.”
43020030	Jisos limi akpokosi gbalee go esamahr abat'toono ebe, nya ki wob nwer nyia.
43020031	Nyaa bo nyono, goji ń l'taame re, Jisos wo li Kraist ji Mmon no Esowo. Ń l'taame, ḿ bahke bele elkpin go ege a mbing.
43021001	Owo Jisos kehm kpe song tib elne go ellong abat'toono ebe go eto ji Taibirias. Ana wo á tibi elne.
43021002	Saimon Pita, a Tomos ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, go Natanael ji lohng go Kena ji Galili, a abon ba Sibidi, go abat'toono ebe bako na abal, bo ane kpee jolo o edi ajehng.
43021003	Saimon Pita kehm tongo bo re, “N kp'tahme nsahre.” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E bahke tob tahm toon-a.” Bo kehm soro tahm, song yel go egbang. Jol ejumjum bo bobem atv mao ona.
43021004	Eji efungfu yahke se, Jisos kehm bake ba yiimi go nkpe eto. Abat'toono ebe we liingem re, Jisos wo.
43021005	Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Abon ebame, ḿ b'bob nsahra?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E'ee, ejumjum e bobem.”
43021006	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Yaken erim ebahne kak alahb go ejang eboblum bi egbang, ḿ bahke bobo nsahre.” Owo bo kehm limi ano. Bo kpeem ma tohng erim bio, tibre nsahre ruru go erim sehng.
43021007	Nt'toono no jo kor Jisos s'sehng, kehm tongo Pita re, “Ntul ewahre wo o!” Saimon Pita wuku kan a re, Ntul wo, á kehm soro kak nsol enye go ege a ngubjing, nyi á yehke no lim eltum, kehm soro yehb yel go alahb.
43021008	Abat'toono Jisos bako fingi egbang, ba rehng go nkpe egbuk. Bo jo tohngo erim bi nsahre ma gbo gbalee, tibre nkpe egbuk gaam jol fee, jolo ejum eyake ego ewaya ajehng.
43021009	Eji bo rehnge go egbuk, bo kehm nyehne agun nya bo fohko go akal nsehng, fere nyehn nsahre kun go akal ngun, a ebred.
43021010	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Koono nsahre nyindiki ba a nyi, nyi ń kp'na bobo.”
43021011	Owo Saimon Pita kehm tahme song tohng erim bio ona, lohng a bi go egbuk. Erim bio nsahre ruru sehng. Nfange enyamalahb bio jolo nnyamalahb atahl asehma kunu ewubu a nnyamalahb era. Jol eji nsahre ruru rur ano, erim yarem.
43021012	Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Baan, wahn ba bob ala go elehke ejum jia.” Jol nt'toono ewe awohng awohng jolem, no sahbe no bahb-e re, “Wo nne awo?” Tibre bo jo k'kahn re, Ntul a Jisos wo.
43021013	Jisos kehm bake ba rod ebred jio ka bo, tob rod nsahre nyio ka bo.
43021014	Nkpel nyia nyi biingi nkpel era nyi Jisos tibi abat'toono ebe elne, bomo eji á nyahme go elkv.
43021015	Eji bo ma li nsol alehke mal, Jisos kehm bungu tong Saimon Pita re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a koro sehnge ane bakoa?” Pita kehm faange re, “Ee Ntul, a kp'kahne re, a kpo kor-m sehng.” Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Le abon ejoro ebame!”
43021016	Jisos kehm-e kpe bahb go nkpel ebal re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a kora?” Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ee Ntul, a kp'kahne re, a kp-m koro.” Jisos kehme tongo re, “Baabe ejoro ebame!”
43021017	Jisos kehm-e kpe bahb go nkpel era re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a kora?” Pita atahng kehm-e moongo, tib eji Jisos bahb-e nkpel era re, “N kp-a kora?” Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, a kp'kahne ejum ajehng ajehng. A kp'kahne re, a kp-m koro.” Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Le ejoro ebame!
43021018	Etingitingi, n kp'bungu tong-a re, Ngare nyi a jolo njangkun, a jo gbaange egbaange eja go ebun, jo je edi ajehng ajehng ji kor-a no. Eji a ma kul, a bahke tanne abo enya. Nne nondiki bahk-a gbaange egbaange eja go ebun, ko-a tahm a na go edi ji ki-a kor re wo je.”
43021019	Jisos bungu alum nyaa re, á tib Pita elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko, ka Esowo ellub. Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
43021020	Pita kehm keebe, nyehn nt'toona Jisos noko, kpi bo toono, no jo kor Jisos s'sehng, no ji kohlo Jisos, eji bo jo li nsol alehke elgung, fere bahb-e re, “Ntul, nne awo li nne no bahk-a gungu?”
43021021	Eji Pita nyehn-e no, á kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, nne noa mee?”
43021022	Jisos kehm faange Pita re, “L'kor-m re á jol a, tete me n feere ba, elam eja sang, wo toon-m na toono!”
43021023	Eka jia kehm yeere na yeere go ellong aneb Esowo re, nt'toono a Jisos noo nehm kpo, jol eji Jisos ki-e t'tong ejumjum re, á nehm kpo. Alum nya Jisos bungu no li re, “L'kor-m re á jol a, tete me n feere ba, elam eja sang.”
43021024	Nt'toona Jisos noo wo kp'yiimi ntianse go nsol nyia a. Ye wo fere nyon nwer nyia. E kp'kahne re, alum enye nya á yiimi ntianse lohko li go etingitingi.
43021025	Nsol nyehko nyia gbalee, nyi Jisos limi no. Li re bo nyono nsol kpee kak go awer, me m bum re, njini ebse sehng re awer nyaa kpee jol.
44001001	Teofailus, Ngbokambang a nwer enyame nyi n nyono no, n nyono bada nsol nyi Jisos limi no, fere t'tib, bomo ngare nyi á bomo eltum ene,
44001002	tete bo rod-e tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo. Re bo kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo, á jo tibi abat'toono ebe ba á yehke no go nsahm Etingi Etohko.
44001003	Bomo goji Jisos kpo no, nfung atahl abal nyi á ko no, tib abat'toono ebe elne, fere jo kpiri bo nkpel a nkpele, fere jo bung bade etul bi Esowo. Ano wo á tibi no re, á lohko li go elkpin, jol nfaabe limm.
44001004	Eji á jolo a bo, á jo tongo bo re, bo song jol go Jerusalem, bo k'kpe yaame je edi ajehng ajehng, bo ji sik nnoobo nyi Esowo Nsoo nyame re á bahke bo ka, nyio nyi á bungu no tong bo re,
44001005	“Jon jo wohngo ane alahb maka maka. Re kang abon afung ntiil, ḿ bahke bele ewohngalahb ji Etingi Etohko.”
44001006	Eji bo ma fadde edi ajehng, bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, ngare nyio nyi a bahke feere etul ka Israela?”
44001007	Á kehm faange bo re, “Jio li ka Nsoo, tibre ye wo kunu afung. Limm re wahn kahn.
44001008	Wahn bahke bele nsahm ngare nyi Etingi Etohko l'ba a nahne. Ḿ bahke jo yiimi atianse ka-m bomo go Jerusalem, rehng go Judea, fere rehng go Samaria, tete rehng ejang njini abehng abehng.”
44001009	Á bungu kan a mal, bo kehm-e soro mehl tahm a ne, eji abat'toono ebe jo seeng-e. Ekparesemsem kehm soro bul-e, á lahm.
44001010	Eji bo jo seenge go elbung too, eji á ma tahm, bo kehm soro nyehn ane abal ma lohng ba yiimi kohlo bo, ba kake abarebare akpawobo.
44001011	Bo kehm bungu re, “Aneb Galili, jen ji wahnge ḿ ma sa kp'seenge elbung too? Jisos j'nehm a, ji bo m-e rod go egahne ellong tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo, á bahke feere ba, ana ń nyehn-e no á kp'tahme go ejahbetul Esowo.”
44001012	Abat'toono Jisos kehm kehme elbadde go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv asongo go Jerusalem. Bomo go ewong jio rehng go Jerusalem rehngem mmal anyehng nob nob.
44001013	Eji bo rehnge go Jerusalem, bo kehm song yel ekp'kpa ajehng ji jolo go ero enyong, ji bo jo kono eljolo. Bo jolo Pita, Jon, Jems, Andru, Filip, Tomos, Batolomi, Matiu, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Saimon ji woomo go ellong ane ba bo jo lung bo re Silot (bo ji jo nok re ejahbe ebo for go abo nya anebe Rom), go Judas ji mmon a Jems.
44001014	Bo kpee jolo go nnyo nnyo amehng, jo kak ero bi ekakesehk, go anebkal fvfo, a Meri nnyehn Jisos, go abonanyehn Jisos.
44001015	Ane ba jolo o kpee jolo ane atahl arakera. Ngare nyio nyi Pita kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re,
44001016	“Abonanee, nwer Esowo eblohko jol go etingitingi ana Etingi Etohko bungu no tong Devid bada Judas ji ko ane song tib Jisos, bo bob-e.
44001017	Á jolo nne no woomo go egahre ellong, fere jo lim eltum ni wahr jo lim.
44001018	Á ko akpohko nyao nya á limi ebi, song gunu edi egbe. Owo á gbo no sahb l'lohko, ngubjing joodo, akpidla bohngo.
44001019	Ane kpee ba lene go Jerusalem w'wuk. Owo wahnge bo kpo lung edi egbe jio go bo ejahbe re Akeldama, ji lohngo re egbe alung.
44001020	“Tibre bo nyono go nwer a Saams re, “ ‘Nong, etahk eje jol na jol, nnene k'woomo.’ Bo kpe nyon re, “ ‘Eltum ene, nne nondiki wo bahke fere ko.’
44001021	“Nne noo bahke jolo nne no woomo egahre ellong ngare kpe kpe nyi Jisos jolo a nahre,
44001022	bomo ngare nyi Jon jo wohngo ane alahb tete rehng efung bi Jisos, bo rod-e tahm a ne go ero. Nne ana noo wo bahke yele ellong enahre, fere jo yiimi ntianse bade elnyahme ni Jisos.”
44001023	Owo bo kehm yehke ane abal, nne noko Josef ji bo jo lung-e re Barsabas, mbing enye nyehko, bo jo kpe-e lung re Justus. Nne noko, bo jo lung-e re Matayas.
44001024	Bo kehm kehme ero kak re, “Ntul Esowo no kp'kahne ntim nyi ane kpee, tib-r nne no a ma yehke, ane abal baa,
44001025	re á ko eltum nio ni ntiingetib, ni Judas yake no bum, tahm go ege edi.”
44001026	Bo kehm tubu elfaange, eji bo l'mal yehke nne awohng. Elfaange nio gbo tub Matayas. Bo kehm-e koko, budu go ellong abatiingetib, ewubu a nne awohng.
44002001	Eji efung bio bi Pintikost rehnge no, bo kpee jolo edi edi ajehng.
44002002	Tvtv ona egburu ewahl ji nnen a nnen ji lohng go elbung kehm kehme elwahle ana nfeb nyi nnen a nnen, kehm ba rur go ekp'kpa jio ji bo ji no.
44002003	Bo kehm nyehne nsol ana nlikagun ma yaame na yaame, kuumu nne awohng awohng.
44002004	Etingi Etohko kehm ruru bo kpee go atahng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu alum ajahbe nyandiki, ana Etingi Etohko jo lim bo re bo bung.
44002005	Jus jindiki ji lene go Jerusalem, ji lohngo go ejang njini abehng abehng ba, bo jolo anoobo ane ba Esowo jo kor bo.
44002006	Eji ellong ane wuku ewahl jio, bo kehm kame song rur, kehm kehme bo esi kpo. Tibre nne awohng awohng jo wuku abat'toono Jisos kp'bungu go ege ejahbe.
44002007	Eji bo ma nyehn nkpokosi nyio, bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ane ba kp'bungu a, aneb Galili sanga?
44002008	Jen ji wahng ka nne awohng awohng ewahre kp'wuku alum nyao go ege ejahbe?
44002009	Wahr lohng go Partia, ane bandiki lohng go Midis, ane bandiki lohng go Elam, ane bandiki lohng go Mesopotemia, ane bandiki lohng go Judea, ane bandiki lohng go Kapadosa, ane bandiki lohng go Pontus, ane bandiki lohng go Esia,
44002010	ane bandiki lohng go Frigia, ane bandiki lohng go Pamfilia, ane bandiki lohng go Ijipt, ane bandiki lohng go ejang Libia ji li kohlo Sirin. Ajenne nyandiki lohng go Rom, ane bandiki Jus ji, ane bandiki ane baka baka ba, ba kp'limi eljini ni Jus.
44002011	Egom ejahre jindiki lohng go Gris, ane bandiki lohng go Arebia. E kp'wuku bo kp'bungu ajahbe enyahre bade aj'joko nsol nya Esowo ma lim.”
44002012	Esi kehm kpoko bo ane kpee, amahr fere jo bil bo. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elgan nsol nyia lohngo renan?”
44002013	Ane bandiki kehm kehme bo nyok re, “Amahm ma bo ma wo kp'buumu.”
44002014	Pita kehm mehle yiimi, a abatiingetib bako, ewubu a nne awohng, kehm bungu wahre wahre tong ellong ane bao re, “Juda, ejahbe ejame, a wahn ji lene go Jerusalem kpee, wuungen atung, wahn wuk ji n yahke bung.
44002015	Ane baa ana, amahm sang bo kp'buumu, ana ń kp'tiri. Tibre anv ebrehng nkaranka esehmwubu nyi nyi, nyi efungfu.
44002016	“Ji ma lim a, ji ji nnyehnamahr a Joel bungu no re,
44002017	‘Esowo re, “ ‘Go ngare es'kohro afung m bahke yaange etohko ejame wohngo nne awohng awohng. Abon ebahne bahke kehme amahr nya Esowo nyehn. Ajangkun enyahne bahke tob jol abanyehnamahr fvfo. Anebkul ebahne bahke jo leeme alem.
44002018	Alokeltum ebame, aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, bo fvfo m bahke tob yaange etohko ejame wohngo bo ngare nyio. Bo bahke jo nyehn enyehnamahr ji Esowo.
44002019	M bahke jo lim akpokosi go elbung, a ndi. Bahke jolo go alung, go agun, a at'tohk nya ma sahb t'tehm.
44002020	Njul bahke fere gbo ejannge, ebareka bahke fere siingi alung, efung bi Ntul Esowo bahke bake. Bahke jolo egburu efung bi Esowo bahke tibi nsahm enye.
44002021	Owo nne awohng awohng no l'gboongo Ntul Esowo go ege a mbing, á bahke bele eltahre.’ ” (Ana wo Joel bungu fel.)
44002022	Pita kehm kpe bung re, “Israel, ejahbe ejame, wuungen atung go alum nya n kp'bungu. Jisos ji Nasaret wo, Esowo ka-e nsahm re á jo lim akpokosi, fere jo tib nliingi go egahne ajahbe, eji ń l'kahn re Esowo bi tum-e no.
44002023	Esowo go ege elkahne wo, á toobo no re á yake Jisos ka. Wahn ba jabb-e kak abi ane go ebo. Bo kum-e lake go ekros, á kpo.
44002024	Esowo bi nyahm-e go elkv. Á yehk-e go erem bi elkv. Tibre elkv we maam kpan.
44002025	“Tibre Devid b'bung bada ne re, “ ‘Ngare anyehng anyehng n jo nyehne Ntul Esowo bad bad a name. Á li go egame eboblum, eji nnene l'ki-m ma nyeenge.
44002026	Owo wahng ka eltim jo yeb-m, n kehme ase yim. Afi n kpo na, ekunukpu ejame li re, Esowo bahke tiki lim ka-m.
44002027	Tibre a nehm yake etohko ejame sa go ndi, go ellong akvne. A nehm taame re mbarebara Mmon ewa bol.
44002028	A ma-m tib mbang nyi li rehng go elkpin. Eji a bahke jolo a name, a bahke jo ka-m eyebatahng.’ (Ana wo Devid bungu fel.)”
44002029	Pita kehm kpe bung re, “Abonanee, n kp'bungu gbul gbul gbuul re, Devid nso ejahre kp'kpo mahne mahne, bo kpa-e kak. Elahm ebe bia, kpeke li tete sik anv.
44002030	Tib eji á jolo nnyehnamahr Esowo, á jo k'kahn ji Esowo nyame tong-e re, ‘Mmon ewa wo bahke jehke go ega eti etul.’
44002031	Á nyehne amahr bade elnyahme ni Mesaya re, ‘Esowo we yakem, á sa woomo go ellong akvne, ekv eje bol.’
44002032	“Jisos j'nehm o wo, Esowo lohk-e nyahme go elkv. Wahr kpee ba li atianse enye, tibre wahr ny'nyehn nsol nyio kpee.
44002033	Bo mehl-e, song jehke go eboblum Esowo bi ka-e Etingi Etohko ana á nyame no tong-e, ji ji á ma yaange wohng-r, j'nehm ji ń kp'nyehne a, fere jo wuk.
44002034	“Jol yefono Devid tohkem je na go ejahbetul Esowo. Á bungu na bung re, “ ‘Ntul Esowo bungu tong ntul ewame re, Ji a, egame ejang eboblum,
44002035	tete n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
44002036	“N kp'sebe re wahn anebe Israel kpee, wahn sahb k'kahn re, Jisos j'nehm ji ń kum-e go ekros, Esowo m-e rod lim ntul, fere rod-e lim Kraist.”
44002037	Eji bo wuku ana, ala kehm teele bo. Bo kehm bahbe Pita, a abatiingetib bako re, “Abonanee, anv, e bahke limi renan?”
44002038	Pita kehm tongo bo re, “Gboon ndon go egahne abiafem, wahn ane kpee, wahn fere bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist, eji ń l'bel eltahmeka go egahne abiafem, Esowo fere yar-n ka Etingi Etohko.
44002039	Enyam bia li ka wahn, a abon ebahne, a ajahbe nya li fee, a nne awohng awohng no Ntul Esowo bahk-e lungu tv elne.”
44002040	Pita bungu na bung bung bung, jo tong bo, fere jo kak bo erehke re, “Nobo re wahn for go erem bi bahke gboko tub abi ane baa ba li anv.”
44002041	Ane bao ba wuku alum enye fere taame, bo ba bele ewohngalahb. Bo jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel esehma ane atahl awubu (3,000), ba Esowo budu no efung bio.
44002042	Bo jo kake esi re bo kahn eltibi ni abatiingetib Jisos jo tib bo, fere jo kono edi ajehng, jo bakke ebred, fere jo kak ero.
44002043	Abatiingetib Jisos jo limi akpokosi gbalee, fere jo tib nliingi. Owo wahnge nne awohng awohng jo fahl.
44002044	Ane ba taame no soro asi, jo kono edi ajehng. Nne awohng l'bel ejum, fere jo jol ka bo ane kpee.
44002045	Bo jo gungu nsol ebo, fere jo baange akpohko, jo ka nne awohng awohng ana nsol m-e lehng.
44002046	Efung abehng abehng bo jo song wane go etahk Esowo, fere jo bakke ebred go bo a ntahk, jo li nsol ebo go eyebatahng,
44002047	fere jo tehk Esowo. Bo jo koro nne awohng awohng. Esowo jo kpe kpele na ane efung abehng abehng go ellong abat'toono Jisos, ba jo bel eltahre.
44003001	Eji ma rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung, ngare nyi bo jo kono ero kak, Pita abola Jon kehm tahme go etahk Esowo.
44003002	Eji bo ma rehng go eti mbu ji bo jo lung re eti mbu ji nno, bo kehm nyehne mbanne nyi kala j'jen bomo eji bo jel-e no. Efung abehng abehng bo jo sol-e ba bum eti mbu jio re á jo gboongo apene goji ane bao ba jo sehng yange go etahk Esowo.
44003003	Eji á nyehne Pita a Jon, bo yahke yange go etahk Esowo, á kehm soro gboongo bo re bo ka-e akpohko.
44003004	Bo kehm-e seenge too, Pita kehm bungu re, “Seeng-r gae!”
44003005	Mbanne nyio kehm kehme amahr baare re, anv, bo bahk-e kake ejum.
44003006	Pita kehm bungu re, “Asilva, a agul n kpimm. Ji n kpi no, ji ji m bahk-a kake. N kp-a tongo go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist ji Nasaret re, Mehl, wo jen!”
44003007	Á kehm-e jabbe go eboblum, tab-e yiimi. Akpade enye kehm soro tahne.
44003008	Á kehm soro mehl karab yiimi, kehme eljene yannge, soro toono Pita abola Jon, yange etahk Esowo, kehme eljene yannge, fere jo feebe, jo tehk Esowo.
44003009	Ane kpee ba nyehn-e no, eji á kp'jene, jo tehk Esowo,
44003010	bo kehm soro liing-e tvtv re, ye wo jolo ngb'gboongo nyi jo ji eti mbu ji li go etahk Esowo, jio ji bo jo lung re eti mbu ji nno. Kpo bo esi area, eji bo ma nyehn ji ma jol ka-e.
44003011	Eji nne noo jo jen bad bad a Pita, go Jon, ane kpee kehm jo kpo bo esi. Bo kehm kame, song kpiri bo go edi ji bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.
44003012	Pita nyehne kan ane bao ana, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Israel wahn, jen ji wahng ka esi kp-n kpoko ana, ḿ ma sa anyo kaa kp'seenge? Anv, ń kp'tiri re, go egahra nsahm wo, e ma lim nne noa á ma noba, afi go egahre elkake ni e kp'kake Esowo, ni e m-e lim á kp'jene?
44003013	Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob, Esowo bio bi babnso ejahre, ye wo ma ka nlokeltum ewe Jisos ellub ene. Jisos j'nehm ji ń senng-e njahm, fere ten-e go esamahr Pailet, eji á tiri re á yehke Jisos yake.
44003014	Ń tene Jisos ji li Nnooba Nne no Esowo, no li go etingitingi, fere taame re bo yehke nwulane ka-n.
44003015	Ń wulu nfono elkpin. Esowo fere nyahm-e go elkv. Nsol nyio nyi wahnge wahr kp'yiimi ntianse.
44003016	“Nsahm nyi li go mbing nyi Jisos nyi wahng ka, nne noa ma nob, ye ji ń kp-e kahne, fere kp-e nyehne. Eltaame ni á ma taame tv Jisos, ni ni ma wahng á ma nob, anv, á yim a go egahne esamahr.
44003017	“Abonanee, n kp'kahne re, ji ń limi no, a atubesi ebahne, ń limi ekpehlekpehle.
44003018	Mahne mahne Esowo tongo abanyehnamahr ebe re, bo song bung re, ‘Tiki li re, Kraist bahke tiki nyehn erem.’ Ana wo Esowo lohko lim enyam ebe re lohko jol go etingitingi.
44003019	Ano wo fvfo nobo re, wahn gbo ndon, fere sennge njahm go egahne abiafem, eji Ntul Esowo l'fvvdv abiafem enyahne, ngare nyio nyi eyebatahng nfenfe ji lohng goji Esowo bahk-n kpiri.
44003020	Á bahke tob tum Jisos Kraist ji á yehke no ka-n.
44003021	“Jisos bahke tohko jol go ejahbetul Esowo tete ngare rehng nyi nsol kpee bahke yaange, jol nfenfe, ana Esowo bungu no tong abanyehnamahr ebe, bomo mahne mahne tete sik anv.
44003022	“Moses bungu re, ‘Ntul Esowo bahke tumu nnyehnamahr no bahke lohngo go egahne ellong, ana á tob yehk-m tum. Jo wuungen ye atung go ellum anehng anehng ni á l'tong-n.
44003023	Nne awohng awohng no tohko wuungu nnyehnamahr noo atung, Esowo bahk-e yabe go ellong ane ebe, fere ranng-e.’
44003024	“Abanyehnamahr bao kpee, ba ba no, bomo go ngare nyio nyi Samuel tete sik anv, bo kpee jo bungu bada ngare ny'nehm ana.
44003025	“Wahn ba li abon ba abanyehnamahr bao, a ba babnso ejahre, ba Esowo limi egbanngalung a bo, ana á bungu tong Ebraham re, ‘Nne no bahke lohngo go ega et'tohngo, ye wo bahke wahng ka nnahb anyehng anyehng go njini bel elfuulu.’
44003026	Wahn ba li agbokombang ane ba Esowo yehke nlokeltum ewe tum tv-n re á ba fuul-n, fere lim-n wahn ane kpee, ń sennge njahm go egahne ab'bi.”
44004001	Ngare nyi Pita abola Jon kpi mbungu mbungu a ellong ane bao, owo abalimajom, a ntubesi ane ba kpo baabe etahk Esowo, go aneb Sadusi fvfo kehm tob ba kpiri bo.
44004002	Eltim jo rake bo, tibre Pita abola Jon jo tibi ane re, Jisos ebnyahme go elkv, ji ma lohng re, akvne bahke fere nyahme, bel elkpin.
44004003	Bo kehm soro bob bo, kak bo go ngbekobo tete etoono efungfu behko. Tibre elgung b'ba ngare nyio.
44004004	Ane gbalee ba wuku alum Esowo nyao t'taame. Nfange aneblum jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000).
44004005	Etoono efungfu behko atubesi, a anebkul nfam, go at'tibi ba atahm, bo kehm ba kono edi ajehng go Jerusalem.
44004006	Nkon nyio nyi bo song kono a Annas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom, go Kayafas, Jon Aleksanda, a ane bako ba tob woomo go nnahb nyi ntubesi abalimajom.
44004007	Bo kehm koko Pita, a Jon song yiimi go bo esamahr, kehm kehme bo bahb re, “Ń limi renan ejum j'nehm? Nsahm anyi ń ko no? Mbing nyi nyehne nyi ń ko no?”
44004008	Pita ji ruru go etohko ji Esowo kehm faange bo re, “Atubesi, a anebkul wahn,
44004009	lela bo kp-r abahbe bahb bada nnoobo nyi e ma lim, eji e limi mbanne nyio á nob.
44004010	Nobo re wahn kahn, a anebe Israel kpee re, nne no yim go egahne ellong a, yebnob kpee go nsahm nyi li go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist ji Nasaret ji ń kum-e go ekros, Esowo fere nyahm-e go elkv.
44004011	“Jisos j'nehm ji nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne re, Ye wo li ‘eltal ni wahn asehketahk tene no, ye wo ma fere jol etingitingi eltal ni nnahb ekahme.’
44004012	Eltahre li go ege wo wo. Mbing anyehng anyehng limm go njini nyia, nyi Esowo ma ka ane, nyi e bahke koko bel eltahre.”
44004013	Eji bo nyehna no re, Pita abola Jon, bo bele esahb, kehm kpoko bo esi, tibre Bab Pita jolo ane baka baka ba ki kahn nwer. Bo kehm soro seb kahn re, bo jolo a Jisos.
44004014	Eji bo nyehne mbanne nyio nyi ma nob, yim kohlo Pita abola Jon, mbang anyehng anyehng kpeem jol nyi bo bahke kpe ma faabe.
44004015	Bo kehm tongo bo re, bo lohng go ekp'kpa elam song elatahk. Bo kehm kehme eltoobo re,
44004016	“Anv, e bahke limi ane bao renan? Nne awohng awohng no lene go Jerusalem ebkahn re, bo ba li ane ba limi egburu nkpokosi nyia. Anv, e nehm kpe ma gbaame.
44004017	Nong, wahr rehke bo, bo k'kpe bung tong ane go mbing nyi Jisos, eji eka jia l'k'kpe yeere nkpel anyehng anyehng.”
44004018	Bo kehm lungu Pita, a Jon, bo feere ba yel ekp'kpa. Bo kehm rehke bo re, bo k'kpe bung go mbing nyi Jisos nkpel anyehng anyehng, fere jo tib.
44004019	Pita abola Jon kehm faange re, “Wahnfono antahng bahke toobo kahn, joare n'nob go ejang bi Esowo re nne wuk wahn, afi á wuk Esowo.
44004020	Wahr nehm tiki rahke elbungu bada nsol nyi e ma nyehn, fere wuk.”
44004021	Bo kehm kpe rehke bo t'tahne, kehm yake bo, bo song. Bo nyehnem mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke kake bo erem tib ane ba jolo o. Tibre nne awohng awohng jo tehke Esowo tib go nkpokosi nyi ma lim.
44004022	Nne no bo lim-e no, á nob, ngare nyio yebkang sehnge nnya atahl abal.
44004023	Tvtv ona eji bo yehke Pita abola Jon yake, bo kehm soro tahm goji atem ebo, kehm song tooro tong bo ana atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam bungu no.
44004024	Eji bo wuku no, bo ane kpee kehm kehme ero kak ka Esowo re, “Egburu Esowo bi limi elbung, a ndi, a alahb, a nsol kpee nyi li no,
44004025	go nsahm Etingi Etohko wo, nso ejahre Devid nlokeltum ewa jo bung re, “ ‘Jen ji wahnge ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo, ntim kpi bo maange ana? Jen ji wahnge ane bao kp'toobo mbol mbol?
44004026	Atul ba njini jo toobo ebjing ebo, atubesi song ji edi ajehng, jo toobo nfem bada Ntul Esowo, a Mesaya enye.’
44004027	“Tibre etingitingi, Herod abola Pailet, a ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo, a anebe Israel, bo kono edi ajehng go ejahbe jia, jo lam kak Jisos, mbarebara nlokeltum ewa, no a ko-e lim Mesaya.
44004028	Bo kono edi ajehng re bo lim ejum ajehng ajehng ana ji a toobo wuku wuku bum.
44004029	Ntul Esowo, nyehn esabsab enyam bi bo ma nyam! Ka abon eba nsahm, eji bo l'jo sahb tiingi etib eba,
44004030	wo fere tanne ebo eba, goji ane l'nob ayam ebo, wo fere lim akpokosi go mbing nyi mbarebara nlokeltum ewa Jisos.”
44004031	Eji bo ma kak ero mal, edi jio ji bo ji no, jo lim nkon, kehm gbehke. Etingi Etohko kehm ruru bo kpee go bo atahng, bo kehm kehme etib bi Esowo tiingi a esahb esahb.
44004032	Ellong ane ba taame tv Esowo jolo ntir ntir anyehng. Nnene jolem, no jo bung re, nsol ny'nye li ka ye ntahngtahng. Bo jo baange na ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo bele no egom egom.
44004033	Abatiingetib Jisos jo yiimi ntianse bade elnyahme ni Jisos a nsahm a nsahm. Esowo kehm fuulu bo egburu elfuulu bo ane kpee.
44004034	Nnene jolem go bo ellong, no ejum jo lehng-e. Tibre ane bao ba bele ebgbe, a ntahk, bo jo gungu, ko akpohko ba a nya,
44004035	ba faake a nya, kak abatiingetib Jisos go ebo. Akpohko nyao bo jo ka nne awohng awohng ana nsol m-e lehng.
44004036	Joses ji lohng go et'tohngo ji Livai, ji bo jel-e go Saiprus, ye ji abatiingetib Jisos ka-e mbing re Barnabas, ji lohngo re nkakeltim a mmon,
44004037	ye wo gungu egbe eje, ko akpohko nyao ba ka abatiingetib Jisos.
44005001	Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas. Nkal ewe bo jo lung-e re Safira. Bo gungu ejang nsol ebo.
44005002	Ananayas yange ejang akpohko bum elne go, ejang jehko á ko ba ka abatiingetib Jisos. Nkal ewe k'kahn kpee.
44005003	Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ananayas, jen ji wahnge nnehm ma ko nji go ega eltim kp-a fili, a ma bum akpohko nyako go, ba yiimi go esamahr Etingi Etohko kpi afahnge kiimi?
44005004	Re wo kehm gungu nsol enya nyio, jolo ny'nya. Eji a ma gungu nsol nyio, akpohko jolo nyanya. Jen ji wahnge a kehm tiri ano go ega eltim, lim elkohn ejum ana jia? A kimem efahnge soodo ane, a kimi efahnge soodo Esowo.”
44005005	Ananayas wuku kan ano me, á kehm soro tuulu gbo kpo. Ane ba wuku no kpee, kehm kehme elfahle tete.
44005006	Ajangkun kehm soro lohng ba, ba gbad-e, rod-e tahm a ne song kpa kak.
44005007	Ji kan ekidi rehng awa ara, nkal ewe kehm tob ba. Á wukem ji ma lim.
44005008	Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-m, akpohko nya a kpee, nya ń gungu edi egbe ejahna?” Á kehm faange re, “Ee, nya nya a kpee.”
44005009	Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń lame no re, wahn ba gare etohko ji Ntul Esowo? Ane ba rodo nlum ewa song kpa kak, bo baa, yim mbutahk o. Bo bahk-a tob rod lohng a na.”
44005010	Tvtv ona á kehm soro gbo ndi go ege alata kpo. Eji ajangkun nyao yele ekp'kpa, bo lohko nyehn re, yeblohko kpo. Bo kehm-e soro rod, lohng a ne, song kpa kak kohlo nlum ewe.
44005011	Aneb ero bao kpee, a egom jindiki ji wuku no, bo kehm kehme elfahle tete.
44005012	Abatiingetib Jisos jo limi akpokosi gbalee go esamahr ane. Aneb Esowo jo jolo edi ajehng go etahk Esowo, ejang bio bi bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.
44005013	Ane bako joom sahb yel ellong ebo, tvtv ona bo jo kake bo sehng.
44005014	Esowo jo kpe budu na budu budu ane ba jo taame go bo ellong, anebkal, a aneblum aneblum.
44005015	Ane jo solo aneb ayam ba a bo, ba bum bo go elatahk, egom jindiki noongo go adilnong, egom jindiki noongo go ebkpa, eji afi Pita sehnge na, etohko eje l'jo kooro bandiki.
44005016	Ellong ane gbalee kehm lohngo ba, ni lohngo go ajahbe nya li sennge Jerusalem kak. Bo ko aneb ayam, fere ko ane ba bele abi atohko, ba a bo, bo nob ane kpee.
44005017	Ntubesi abalimajom, a ane ebe kpee ba tob woomo go ellong nio ni aneb Sadusi, abatiingetib Jisos jo teele bo ala sehng.
44005018	Owo wahnge bo kehm bobo abatiingetib Jisos kak ngbekobo.
44005019	Ngare atv enjel nyi Esowo kehm bake, ba lennge abutahk agbekobo nyao, yehke abatiingetib Jisos bao, kehm bungu tong bo re,
44005020	“Songen go etahk Esowo, wahn song tong ane alum kpee nya li bade elkpin nia ni nfenfe.”
44005021	Eji bo wuku ana, bo kehm tahme go etahk Esowo ngare nyi efungfu ma se, song kehme eltibi. Ntubesi abalimajom, a ane ebe kehm tiingi tv anebkul nfam, a atul esub re bo ba kono edi ajehng. Bo kehm tumu alokeltum ebo tv go ekp'kpa ngbekobo re bo song ko abatiingetib Jisos ba a bo.
44005022	Eji bo ba no, bo nyehnem Bab Pita go ngbekobo. Bo kehm feere song tooro tong bo re,
44005023	“E nyehne abutahk ngbekobo ta ta, fere nyehn ab'baabe yim no go abutahk kp'baabe. Eji e lennge abu, nnene atahng e nyehnem.”
44005024	Eji ntubesi ab'baabe etahk Esowo, a atubesi abalimajom wuk ano, kehm fohko bo nkv, fere kpo bo esi ana ji bahke jolo.
44005025	Nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba tong bo re, “Ane ba ń kake bo ngbekobo, bo yim na go etahk Esowo kpi ane tib.”
44005026	Ntubesi ab'baabe etahk Esowo kehm tahme, a ane ebe song ko bo, ba a bo. Bo joom lim go nsahm, tibre bo jo fahle re, ane bako bahke bo atal tuubu.
44005027	Bo kehm koko abatiingetib Jisos bao, ba a bo, bo ba yiimi go esub. Ntubesi abalimajom kehm kehme bo abahbe bahb, fere tong bo re,
44005028	“E rehk-n re, wahn k'kpe tib go mbing a nne noo. Wahn ba ma wahng ka etib bia ma yeere go Jerusalem kpee. Wahn ba kp-r ebi ka tib go elkv ni nne noo.”
44005029	Pita, a abatiingetib Jisos bako kehm faange re, “E bahke tiki jo wuk Esowo, nne sang e bahk-e wuku.
44005030	Esowo bi babnso ejahre bi nyahme Jisos go elkv, ji ń wul-e no, eji ń kum-e go ekros,
44005031	Esowo m-e lim nj'jok a nne, fere rod-e jehke go ege eboblum ana ntubesi, a nt'tahre, eji Israel l'bel egbokondon, fere bel eltahmeka go bo abiafem.
44005032	Wahr ba li atianse nsol nyia kpee, wahr, a Etingi Etohko fvfo ji Esowo kpo ka ane ba kp-e wuku.”
44005033	Eji bo wuku ano, eltim kehm kehme bo rak. Bo kehme elsebe ana bo bahke wulu bo.
44005034	Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Gamaliel. Á jolo nne a Farisi, fere jol ntul esub, fere jol nt'tibi no atahm. Á jolo nne no ane kpee jo kak-e. Á kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu tong bo re, bo yehke abatiingetib Jisos, song a bo go elatahk, tohko ji mmongare ntiil.
44005035	Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Abonanee wahn Israel, kunen ekpu go ejum ji ń kp'tiri re wahn lim ane baa.
44005036	Mahne go, nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Tudas, á tabe esi, fere rod elne bum w'wahre re, ye wo li nj'joka nne. Ejum ane atahltahl ba tahme no toon-e. Bo wul-e wul, abat'toono ebe kpee yaame ebo tahm. Etul ebe gbo.
44005037	“Kange kan a, Judas ji lohng go Galili kehm kpe ba, ngare nyi bo jo fange ane. Ye fvfo tob bele ellong ane ba jo toon-e. Á tob kpo tan. Abat'toono ebe kpee yaame ebo tahm.
44005038	“Elam jia ji anv, n kp-n tongo re, wahn yake ane baa ana, bo song. Eltum nio ni bo kp'sebe re bo lim l'fere jol ni nne, bahke tane na.
44005039	L'fere lohng goji Esowo, wahn, nnene limm, no bahke ma sahde bo. Fundiki bahke jolo ana ń kp'noko a Esowo.”
44005040	Bo kehm koko elle ni Gamaliel, fere lung abatiingetib Jisos bao re bo feere ba. Bo kehm dohko bo, kehm rehke bo re, bo k'kpe tiki bung go mbing nyi Jisos, kehm yake bo, bo song.
44005041	Abatiingetib Jisos kehm lohngo, ane bao sa ekp'kpa esub o, tahm ebo. Bo bele eyebatahng tib eji Esowo kpunu bo, bo nyehn erem bio bi esono tib go esi ji Jisos.
44005042	Efung abehng abehng bo tikem rahke eltibi go etahk Esowo, fere jo tib go ntahk ane, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib re Jisos wo li Kraist.
44006001	Ngare nyio o eji nfange ane nyi abat'toono Jisos jo kpe rur na budu, nfem kehm gboko anebe Jus ba lohng go Gris, a anebe Jus baka ga ba li etahk. Anebe Jus ba lohng go Gris jo bungu re, efung abehng abehng bo l'kehme nsol bak, akalebun ebo kpehme bel jang jang ana ane bako.
44006002	Abatiingetib Jisos, ewubu ane abal kehm lungu abat'toono Jisos bako, bo ba kono edi ajehng, kehm bungu re, “Fuumem re wahr yake alum Esowo abungu, fere jo ba bak nsol alehke.
44006003	Abonanee, yehken ane asehma go egahne ellong, ba kp'yiimi ntianse nyi nno, ba etohko ji Esowo, a elkahne ma rur go bo atahng, wahr ka bo eltum nio.
44006004	Wahr bahke rodo ngare enyahre kak go ero akake, fere jo bung alum Esowo.”
44006005	Alum nya bo bungu no, yebe ellong ane bao atahng sehng. Owo bo kehm yehke Stiven ji etohko ji Esowo ruru go ege atahng, á fere gbal go ekakesehk, a Filip, go Prokoros, Nikanor, Taimon, Parmenas, a Nikolas ji ki jol nne a Jus, ye ji lohng go Antiok.
44006006	Bo kehm koko bo, ba goji abatiingetib Jisos. Bo kehm kake ero fere kunu bo abo.
44006007	Alum Esowo kehm yeere na yeere. Abat'toono Jisos kpe rur na go Jerusalem gbalee. Abalimajom gbalee ba tob taame, jo toono eltibi ni Jisos.
44006008	Stiven jolo nne no Esowo fuul-e no, fere ka-e nsahm gbalee. Á jo limi akpokosi go esamahr ane.
44006009	Ane bandiki joom taame tv-e. Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim a Stiven. Bandiki lohng go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Silisia, bandiki lohng go Esia, bandiki jo kono elkono go etahk ero ji ane bao ba bo jo lung bo re aforfor ane.
44006010	Etohko ji Esowo ka Stiven elkahne gbalee. Eji á jo bung, á jo ga bo. Bo kpeem jo kahn ana bo bahk-e jo faange.
44006011	Owo bo kehm nyare ane kak re bo song bung re, “E jo wuku ana á jo su Moses abola Esowo.”
44006012	Bo kehm tob nyare ane bako, fere nyare anebkul nfam, a at'tibi ba atahm. Bo kehm ba bob-e, ko-e tahm a ne go esub.
44006013	Bo kehm koko akimfahnge atianse ba a bo. Atianse nyao ba bungu re, “Nne noa kpo kono ebi bung bada mbarebare etahk Esowo jia, a atahm nya Moses.
44006014	E m-e wuk, eji á jo bung re, Jisos ji Nasaret bahke wake etahk Esowo jia, fere yaange atahm nya Moses ko no ba ka-r.”
44006015	Kpee ane ba ji ekp'kpa elam jio kehm kehme Stiven seenge too. Bo jo nyehne esamahr ebe, jolo are bi enjel bi.
44007001	Ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm bahbe Stiven re, “Anv, lohko li anoa?”
44007002	Stiven kehm faange re, “Babnso wahn, a abonanee, wuungen atung! Esowo bi kpi ellub kpiri nso ejahre Ebraham eji á lene go Mesopotemia. Ebraham kehm song jol go Haran.
44007003	Esowo bungu tong-e re, ‘Tahm nnahb enya sa, wo tahm ejahbe eja sa, song go edi ndi ji m bahk-a tibi.’
44007004	Á kehm tahme o ejahbe jio ji bo kpo lung re Kaldea, song lene go Haran. Eji nde kpo no, Esowo kehm yehke Ebraham ejahbe jio, tum-e tv ejahbe jia ji ń lene a anv.
44007005	Esowo we kaam edi ndi jio re jol j'je. Jol mmokpuku ndi awohng awohng á belem. Esowo nyame tong-e re, á bahk-e kake, jol j'je, a ji abon ebe. Jol ngare nyio Ebraham, mmon awohng awohng á ka jel.
44007006	“Ana wo Esowo bungu no tong-e re, ‘Abon eba bahke lene go ejahbe jindiki ana ajahmjahm. Bo bahke jolo aju. Ane bao bahke fere jo nohk bo go nnya atahltahl.’
44007007	Esowo kehm kpe bung re, ‘M bahke lame ejahbe jio ji bo bahke jo loko bo. Abon eba bahke tahme ejahbe jio o, fere ba lok-m edi jia a.’
44007008	“Esowo kehm limi etem a Ebraham, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wahn kpee bahke jolo ane ba bahke jo yehke nrur. A wo li elliingi ni etem bia.’ Ebraham kehm jele Aisik, kehm-e tob yehke nrur, eji Aisik ma kang nfung enehkeni. Aisik kehm tahme jel Jekob, kehm-e tob yehke nrur. Jekob kehm yehke abon ebe, ewubu ane abal nrur. Ewubu ane abal bao ba jolo babnso ejahre.
44007009	“Babnso ejahre bao ba, Josef teele bo ala, bo kehm-e gungu, á jol nju, bo tahm a ne go Ijipt. Esowo jolo a ne sehng.
44007010	Á jo tahr-e yehke go erem abehng abehng. Eji Josef ba yiimi go esamahr Fero, Esowo ka-e elkahne. Á fere jo kor Fero, Fero rod-e lim ntul re á jo fili Ijipt, fere fili etahk ntul.
44007011	Njal kehm bake go Ijipt, a Kenan. Erem gbale sehng ngare nyio. Babnso ejahre, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng bo kpeem bel.
44007012	“Eji Jekob wuku re, nkohl nyia go Ijipt, á kehm tumu babnso ejahre tv go ngbokambang a nkpele.
44007013	Nkpel nyehko nyi bo kpe je, Josef kehm lennge elne ka abonanyehn. Ngare nyio nyi Fero kehm kahne ana nnahb a Josef li no.
44007014	Josef kehm tiingi etib tv nde re, á ba, a ane ebe kpee. Bo jolo ane atahl ara ane elku kpe kpe.
44007015	Owo Jekob kehm tahme go Ijipt. Owo á kpo no, babnso ejahre tob kpo.
44007016	Bo solo bo, feere a bo go Sikem, song kak go elahm bi Ebraham gunu goji abon Hemor, ka akpohko gbalee.
44007017	Eji ngare ma kabbe nyi Esowo nyame no tong Ebraham, owo ane ebahre kehm ruru go Ijipt.
44007018	Ntul no jo fili Ijipt ngare nyio kahnem Josef.
44007019	Á jo nehme ane ebahre, jol ndon we joom fili. Á kehm jehke ntahm re, babnso ejahre jo rod abonbili ebo, song bum go ekul, eji bo l'jo kpo.
44007020	“Ngare nyio nyi bo jele Moses. Á jolo nnobonoba mmon sehng. Á kange nnyahng era mi mi go etahk nde.
44007021	Eji bo rod-e no song kak go aya, mmon a Fero no nkal kehm-e song ting. Á kehm-e rodo, le-e ana mmon ewe.
44007022	Bo jo tib-e elkahne ni Ijipt kpee. Á kehm jolo nj'joka nne go alum abungu, a nsol alimi.
44007023	“Eji Moses ma kang nnya atahl abal, á kehm tiri go ege eltim re, á bahke tahme song nyehn abonanyehn Israel.
44007024	Eji á je no, á kehm song nyehn nne awohng no nne Ijipt kp-e nohko, kehm kake nne noo ebo, no nne Ijipt jo nohk-e, kehm bongo nne Ijipt noo go elwulu.
44007025	Á jo tiri re, ane ebe bahke kahne re, Esowo m-e yehke re, á tahre bo yake. Jol bo tikem kahn.
44007026	“Njahmfungfu á kehm kpe song kpiri anebe Israel na abal kp'noko abohng. Á jo gare re á lim, bo bel elkoono. Owo á kehm bungu tong bo re, ‘Wuungen atung, wahn abonanyehn ba. Jen ji wahng ka ń kp'noko atemtem?’
44007027	“Nne noko no bohko ntem abohng, kehm gbulu Moses tv go nkpe, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nne awo lim-a re wo jol ntubesi, fere jo lam alam enyahre?
44007028	A kp'sebe re wo wul-m ana a wulu nne Ijipt nyaana?’
44007029	“Eji Moses wuku ano, á kehm beke go Ijipt, fere song lene go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Midian. Owo á jele abon abal.
44007030	“Eji ma sehng nnya atahl abal, á kehm nyehne enjel nyi Esowo elka emahng go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Sainai. Enjel nyio woomo go agun nya jolo go eti ajehng ji jo lul.
44007031	Ejum ji Moses nyehne no, kpo-e esi sehng. Eji á jeere no je re á song nyehn, á kehm wuku ellum ni Ntul Esowo bungu no re,
44007032	‘Me wo li Esowo bi babnso ejahne, Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’ “Moses kehm kehme elkahme, jol á kpeem sahb seenge.
44007033	“Esowo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Yehke akpaketa enya, tibre edi ndi ji á yim ona li mbarebare edi.
44007034	Me n lohko nyehn erem bi ane ebame kp'nyehne go Ijipt. Me n wuk aromo nya bo kp'tuubu. Me m badde ba re me m ba tahre bo. Ba, m bahk-a tumu go Ijipt.’
44007035	“Moses ji bo ten-e no, fere bung re, ‘Nne awo lim-a re wo jol ntubesi, fere jo lam alam enyahre?’ ye wo Esowo tum-e no re, á song jol ntubesi, fere jol nt'tahre. Enjel nyio nyi á nyehne no go eti jio, ny'nehm nyi song tv-e go Ijipt.
44007036	Moses kehm yehke bo go Ijipt. Á jo limi akpokosi go Ijipt, a Abilaya fvfo, a elka emahng go nnya atahl abal.
44007037	“Moses j'nehm o wo bungu tong abone Israel re, ‘Esowo bahk-n tumu nnyehnamahr no bahke lohngo go egahne ellong, jang jang ana á tum-m no.’
44007038	“Moses wo jolo a abone Israel go elka emahng. Ye wo jolo a babnso ejahre, a enjel nyi Esowo nyi bungu a ne go ewong jio. Ye wo jolo nne no ko etib bi li go elkpin ba tiing-r. Etib bio lohng goji Esowo.
44007039	“Babnso ejahre t'ten. Bo taamem tv-e. Bo yab-e na tv go nkpe. Go bo a ntim bo jo tiri re, bo feere go Ijipt.
44007040	Owo bo kehm bungu tong Eron re, ‘Lim eblom ka-r, jo gbo-r mbang. E nehme kahn ji ma lim Moses ji yehk-r no go Ijipt.’
44007041	“Bo kehm limi elom jio go elfoongo ni mmon a nfong, jo jom, eltim jo yebe bo sehng go ejum ji bo limi go bo abo.
44007042	“Esowo kehm sennge bo njahm, kehm yake bo re bo jo kak nsol nyi li go elbung, ana ebareka, a njul, go alonlo. Ana bo nyono no go nwer nyi abanyehnamahr Esowo re, “ ‘Anebe Israel wahn, me sang wahng ka ń jo wul enyam, jo lim ajom go nnya atahl abal nyi ń jolo go elka emahng.
44007043	Wahn ebsol etahk ji Molohk, elom ejahne, a elom ji bo jo lung re Refan, ji jolo go elfoongo ni elonlo. Bio bi jolo eblom bi ń li no, fere jo jom. M bahk-n kame tv fee sehng Bebilon sa.’
44007044	“Babnso ejahre bele ebkpatahk go elka emahng bi Esowo jo ba kpiri bo, bi bo limi ana Esowo tongo Moses re á lim, jang jang ana á nyehne goji Esowo.
44007045	Eji Josua jolo ntubesi abo, owo babnso ejahre kehm kpudu ebkpatahk bio song yel a bi ejahbe jio ji ane ba Esowo kame no. Ebkpatahk bio jolo o tete rehng afung nya Devid.
44007046	“Esowo, Devid jo kor-e sehng. Devid kehm bahbe Esowo re, joare n'nob re á si etahk ka-e, ye ji li Esowo bi nsoo Jekob.
44007047	Solomon wo si etahk jio ka-e.
44007048	Esowo bi gbale sehng kpehme lene go ntahk nyi ane si go ebo, ana nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re,
44007049	“ ‘Elbung ni li eti etul ejame. Njini nyi li etikunakpade ejame. Elkohn etahk ani ḿ bahke sehke ka-m? Gan wo li edi erekekv ejame?
44007050	Mefono antahng sang limi nsol nyia kpeea?’
44007051	“Wahn ebtahne asi sehng. Ntim enyahne li ntim nyi ane ba ki li aneb Esowo. Atung enyahne eblak. Ngare anyehng anyehng ń kpo kono Etingi Etohko ten. Ana babnso ejahne jo lim, ano wo fvfo ń kp'tob lim.
44007052	Nnyehnamahr awo no babnso ejahne ki-e nohk? Bo wulu bao ba jo tiingi wuku wuku re, ‘Etingitingi nne kp'bake.’ Ye wo ń gung-e no, fere wul-e.
44007053	Wahn ba li ane ba ko atahm nya Esowo, nya enjel ko ba ka-n. Ḿ bumem atahm nyao!”
44007054	Eji atul esub wuku ana Stiven jo bung, ntim kehm maange bo s'sehng. Bo kehm kehme aromo tuubu.
44007055	Stiven ji Etingi Etohko ji Esowo rur-e go ege atahng, kehm kpiidi esamahr ebe seenge go elbung, kehm nyehne ellub ni Esowo, Jisos yim no go eboblum Esowo.
44007056	Á kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, me n nyehn ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge, fere nyehn Mmon no nne yim go ejang eboblum bi Esowo.”
44007057	Bo kehm rabe wahre wahre, lohko abo atung, kehm soro song buul-e,
44007058	kehm-e tohngo, lohng a ne go ejahbe jio, song rehng a ne go esi mbang. Owo bo song kehm-e atal tuubu re bo wul. Atianse nyao fannge abomo ebo, bum njangkun anyehng, nyi bo jo lung-e re Sol re á kpur.
44007059	Eji bo jo tuubu Stiven atal, á jo kake ero re, “Ntul a Jisos, ko-m etohko ejame!”
44007060	Á kehm jamme alahng, soro rabe tiim re, “Ntul, nong, abiafem nyaa k'kuumu bo go esi!” Eji á bunga no, á kehm soro kpo.
44008001	Sol t'taame tv elwulu ni bo wulu Stiven. Efung bio bo kehm kehme abon Esowo ba jolo go Jerusalem nohk tete. Bo kehm yaame ebo kpee tahm go Judea, a Samaria, sehngem abatiingetib Jisos ba ba sa no.
44008002	Ane bandiki ba jo fahl Esowo kehm rodo ekv ji Stiven, song kpa kak, fere jo ling tete.
44008003	Sol jo sebe re, ero tan. Á jo je etahk ajehng ajehng, jo bob abon Esowo, aneblum, a anebkal, fere jo kak bo go ngbekobo.
44008004	Abon Esowo ba yaame no, kehm kehme elyannge edi ajehng ajehng, jo bung alum Esowo.
44008005	Filip kehm tahme go Samaria, kehm song tong ane bada Mesaya.
44008006	Ane bao w'wuungu atung wuk ana ji Filip jo bung. Bo wuku alum nyao nya á jo bung, bo ane kpee, fere nyehn akpokosi nya á jo lim.
44008007	Abi atohko gbalee jo biingi tiim, fere jo lohng ane gbalee. Abanne tvv, a agboodo agboodo t'tob nob fvfo.
44008008	Eyebatahng gbale sehng go Samaria.
44008009	Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Saimon. Á jo limi ntaane, fere jo lim nsol nyi jo kpo aneb Samaria esi. Á jo lungu elne re nj'joka nne.
44008010	Nne awohng awohng go ejahbe jio jo wuk-e wuk, afi á jolo ntul, afi á jolo nja, bo fere jo bung re, “Ye wo kpi nsahm nyio nyi Esowo, nyi bo kpo lung re Egburu Nsahm.”
44008011	Bo jo wuk-e, tibre ebkang ji á bomo ntaane nyio go ellimi, jo kpo ane bao esi.
44008012	Eji bo taame tv Filip go alum nya á jo bung bade etul bi Esowo, fere jo bung bada mbing nyi Jisos, ji li Kraist owo bo kehm bele ewohngalahb, aneblum, a anebkal anebkal.
44008013	Saimon kehm tob taame fvfo. Eji á ma bel ewohngalahb, á jo jene a Filip. Kpo-e esi area, eji á nyehne agburu akpokosi nya Filip jo lim.
44008014	Eji abatiingetib Jisos ba jolo go Jerusalem wuku no re, Samaria ebtaame tv alum Esowo, bo kehm tumu Pita abola Jon tv bo.
44008015	Eji bo je no, bo kehm song kehme ero kak ka ane bao ba ma taame, eji bo l'bel Etingi Etohko.
44008016	Tibre nnene limm, no ma bel, sehngem re ewohngalahb ji ji bo bele no go mbing nyi Jisos.
44008017	Bo kehm kunu bo abo go esi, bo kehm soro bel Etingi Etohko.
44008018	Eji Saimon nyehne re, eji abatiingetib kunu bo abo, owo wahnge bo ma bel Etingi Etohko, owo á kehm taame akpohko ka Pita abola Jon,
44008019	kehm bungu re, “Tob ka-m wahn nsahm nyia, eji nne awohng awohng no n l'kun-e ebo, á l'tob bel Etingi Etohko.”
44008020	Pita kehm bungu tong-e re, “Wo, a akpohko akpohko enya ḿ bahke yele go ellulagun, eji a kp'tiri re a bahke gunu ayare nya Esowo go akpohko.
44008021	Egahre ellong a wobem. Tibre eltim ena limm saang go esamahr bi Esowo.
44008022	Gbo ndon go ab'bi nyaa, wo kak ero ka Ntul Esowo, eji fundiki á l'tahm ka-a go ebi ntir nyi a ma tir a.
44008023	N kp'nyehne re, ala kpo teel-a sehng, a wob ngbekobo nyio nyi abiafem.”
44008024	Saimon kehm faange Pita, a Jon re, “Kaken ero ka Ntul Esowo ka-m, goji ejum ajehng ajehng ji ḿ bungu no l'ki-m lim.”
44008025	Eji bo ma bung alum Esowo, fere yiimi ntianse ka Esowo, Pita abola Jon kehm feere go Jerusalem. Go mbang elkehnge ebo, bo jo bungu alum Esowo mbang mbang go abon ajahbe ba Samaria.
44008026	Enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm bungu tong Filip re, “Mehl, song go erede nfam, edi jio ji mbang li no, nyi bomo go Jerusalem tete rehng go Gasa, mbang nyio nyi li elka emahng.”
44008027	Á kehm mehle, soro tahm. Nne Itiopia awohng no bo fang-e no, kehm kehme elsehnge kehnge. Nne noo jolo nj'joka nne no jo kuuru nsol afang nya ntul a nnenkal no jo fili Itiopia, no bo jo lung-e re Kandes. Á je go Jerusalem song kak Esowo.
44008028	Eji á kp'kehnge, á ji go ege a ntrok, jo lung nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono no.
44008029	Etingi Etohko kehm bungu tong Filip re, “Song, wo jen kohlo ntrok nyio!”
44008030	Filip kehm soro be asongo, kehm wuku nne noo kp'lungu nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono no. Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a kp'kahne ji a kp'l'lunga?”
44008031	Nne noo kehm-e faange re, “Tohko tiki jol re, nne wo lennge ka-m, n nehm kahn.” Á kehm tongo Filip re á wahr, ji go ntrok nyio kohl-e.
44008032	Edi nwer Esowo ji á jo l'lung li re, “Á jolo ana njoro nyi bo ma rod, yahke wul. Á jolo ana mmon a njoro no kil biingi, eji bo kp-e kpudu anyar. Á belle na belle, jol ellum anehng anehng á bungem.
44008033	Bo kehm-e rede. Jol eji bo kahne no re, yebli eno, bo ten-e tv o. Nnene limm, no bahke ma bung bade et'tohngo eje. Tibre elkpin ene kpeem li go njini nyia.”
44008034	Nne noo o kehm bahbe Filip re, “Anv, nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu bada nyehne? Á bungu bade elnea, afi bada nne nondikandiki?”
44008035	Filip kehm bomo elbungu bade edi nwer Esowo ji á jo lung, fere tiing-e nnoobo etib bada Jisos.
44008036	Eji bo jo sehng asongo, bo kehm song rehng go ebgba abehng. Nne noo kehm soro bung re, “Nyehn ebgba ana! Jen ji bahke wahnge n k'bel ewohngalahb!”
44008037	(Filip kehm faange re, “A li ma bel ewohngalahb anv, a l'taame eltim eltim ena kpee.” Nne noo kehm faange re, “Me n taame re, Jisos Kraist wo li Mmon Esowo.” )
44008038	Á kehm limi re ntrok nyio yiimi. Filip, a nne noo, bo kehm badde yel go ebgba. Filip kehm-e wohngo alahb.
44008039	Eji bo lohngo alahb mao, etohko ji Ntul Esowo kehm soro rod Filip, tahm a ne. Nne noo we kpeem nyehn. Á kehm soro asi eljen asongo a eyebatahng.
44008040	Bo kehm nyehne Filip go Asdod. Á kehm soro asi asongo go Sisaria, jo bung alum Esowo mbang mbang go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji jolo go mbang.
44009001	Ngare nyio Sol kp'kpeke nyam abat'toono Ntul a Jisos re á bahke wulu bo. Á kehm tahme goji ntubesi abalimajom,
44009002	kehm song tong-e re á ka-e awer, á tahm a nya, song tib go ntahk ero nyi li go Damaskus, eji jol afi á nyehne ane bao ba kp'toono mbang nyio nyi nfenfe, á l'bob bo aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, feere a bo go Jerusalem.
44009003	Eji Sol ma kabbe go Damaskus, ellennge kehm lohngo go elbung ya tub-e.
44009004	Á kehm fooro gbo ndi, fere wuk nne no jo bung a ne re, “Sol, Sol, jen ji wahng ka a kp-m nohko anae?”
44009005	Sol kehm bahbe re, “Wo nne awo, Ntul?” Á kehm faange re, “Me Jisos wo, ji a kp'nohko.
44009006	Mehl, wo song ejahbe jio, owo bo bahk-a tibi ji a bahke limi.”
44009007	Ane bao ba jo jen a ne, wuku ellum ellum. Nnene bo nyehnem. Kehm kpoko bo esi, bo yiimi na yiimi anyo kaa.
44009008	Sol kehm mehle. Eji á lennge amahr enye, ejumjum á kpeem jo ma nyehn. Bo kehm-e jabbe ebo, tahm a ne go Damaskus.
44009009	Á kpeem jo nyehn tete nfung era, jol ejumjum á kpeem jo li, alahb á kpeem jo wo.
44009010	Nt'toono Jisos awohng jolo go Damaskus, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas. Á nyehne Ntul a Jisos kp-e lungu re, “Ananayas!” Á kehm faange re, “Me ga, Ntul.”
44009011	Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Mehl, wo song go etahk Judas ji li go efak ji bo kpo lung re Ntoorambang, wo song kpiri nne no lohng go Tarsus, no bo kpo lung-e re Sol. Á kpi ero kak.
44009012	Sol nyehne nne go nlem, no bo kpo lung-e re Ananayas kp'bake re á ba kun-e ebo, eji á l'kpe nyehn.”
44009013	Ananayas kehm faange re, “Ntul, ane gbalee ma-m tub eka bada nne noo, ana á ma sahb n'nohk ane eba go Jerusalem.
44009014	Anv ana, á ko nsahm goji atubesi abalimajom, eji á l'ba bob ane kpee ba kp'kake ero go ega mbing.”
44009015	Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Song na song! M m-e yehke re á lok-m, eji mbing enyame l'yeere goji ane ba ki nyi Esowo, a atul, go abone Israel.
44009016	M bahk-e tibi ajoobo arem nya á bahke nyehne tib go egame esi.”
44009017	Ananayas kehm soro tahm song rehng go etahk jio, sehng song yel ekp'kpa, kehm song kunu Sol ebo ebe, kehm bungu re, “Egban Sol, Ntul a Jisos ji a nyehn-e go mbang nyi a lohngo no jo ba, ye wo ma-m tum a, eji a l'kpe nyehn, Etingi Etohko fere rur go ega eltim.”
44009018	Amahr Sol kehm soro lennge, jolo ana ebl'lu bi laad-e no. Á kehm soro nyehn saang, kehm soro tahm, bel ewohngalahb.
44009019	Á kehm lehke nsol, fere kpe bel eko, fere kang abon afung ntiil a abat'toono Jisos go Damaskus.
44009020	Sol kehm soro tahm go ntahk ero, song kehme eltibi bada Jisos re, ye wo li Mmon no Esowo.
44009021	Ane kpee ba jo wuk-e, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Nne noa sang jo wul ane ba jo taame tv mbing nyia go Jerusalema? Ji wahnge á ba a, á ba re á ba bob bo, feere a bo song ka atubesi abalimajom.”
44009022	Sol kpe gbal na, bel eko go alum Esowo abungu. Jus ji jolo go Damaskus, jo fohko bo nkv, tib eji á jo tib re, Jisos wo li Kraist.
44009023	Eji ma kang afung tvv, Jus kehm toobo re bo wul-e.
44009024	Sol kehm sebe kahn ana bo toobo no. Tibre bo jo baab-e go ati mbu atv a njul re bo wul-e.
44009025	Atv, abat'toono ebe kehm-e kake go ejeere, siir-e ekahme ji jolo sennge Damaskus kak, bum njahm ekahme nyehko.
44009026	Eji Sol rehnge go Jerusalem, á jo sebe re, á yel go ellong abat'toono Jisos. Bo jo fahl-e fahl. Bo joom bum re, á tob li nt'toona Jisos.
44009027	Owo Barnabas kehm-e koko ba ane goji abatiingetib Jisos, fere tooro tong bo ana Sol nyehne Jisos go mbang, Jisos fere bung a ne. Á t'tob tong bo ana Sol jo bung alum Esowo go mbing nyi Jisos esahb esahb go Damaskus.
44009028	Sol jo jene a bo, fere jo bung alum Esowo go mbing nyi Jisos esahb esahb go Jerusalem.
44009029	Á kehm tob bung tong Jus ji jo bung Grik. Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim, fere jo gare ana bo bahk-e wulu.
44009030	Eji abat'toono Jisos bako sebe ano kahn, owo bo kehm koko Sol, tahm a ne go Sisaria, fere tum-e re á song go Tarsus.
44009031	Owo wahnge aneb ero bao ba jolo go Judea, a Galili, a Samaria bele eyebatahng ngare nyio, tibre nfem anyehng anyehng kpeem jol. Ero kpe gbal na go nrur, fere t'tahne. Bo jo jene go elfahle ni Esowo. Etingi Etohko jo kake bo eltim.
44009032	Pita jo yannge, je edi ajehng ajehng. Efung abehng á kehm jeke go Lida, song nyehn aneb Esowo ba jolo go.
44009033	Owo á nyehne nne no bo jo lung-e re Anias ji jolo mbanne. Nnya enehkeni nyi á ki kpe jo ma mehl go edilnong.
44009034	Pita kehm bungu tong-e re, “Anias, Jisos Kraist bahk-a limi, a nob. Mehl, wo tuungu edilnong eja ya!” Tvtv ona Anias kehm soro mehl.
44009035	Eji ane bao kpee ba jolo go Lida, a Seron nyehn-e no, bo kehm taame tv Esowo.
44009036	Nnenkal awohng jolo go Jobba, no bo jo lung-e re Tabita. Á tob jolo nt'toona Jisos. Mbing enye nyi Grik, bo jo lung-e re Dorkas ji lohngo re mbilekpa. Á jo limi nnoobo ngare anyehng anyehng, fere jo kak akpak ebo.
44009037	Ngare nyio á kehm gboko eyam, soro kpo. Eji bo wul-e alahb, bo kehm-e rodo song bum go nkimi nyi jolo go ero enyong.
44009038	Lida jolo kpidi kpidi kohlo Jobba. Eji bo wuku re, Pita li go Lida, bo kehm tumu ane abal tv re bo song tong Pita re, titi, á ba elwaare, á k'laange.
44009039	Owo Pita kehm soro toobo ebjing, tahm toono bo. Eji bo ba no, ba rehng go Lida, bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne go nkimi nyio nyi jolo go ero enyong. Akalebun kpee ba jolo o jo ling, kehm bake ba sennge Pita kak, kehm-e tibi akpawobo, a nsol elliibi nyindiki budu, nyi Dorkas limi no, eji á kpeke li go elkpin.
44009040	Pita kehm tongo bo re bo lohng go nkimi nyio. Á kehm jamme alahng, kehm kake ero, kehm keebe seenge nkvne nyio, kehm bungu re, “Tabita, mehl me!” Á kehm soro lennge amahr enye. Eji á nyehne Pita, á kehm mehle ji.
44009041	Pita kehm-e jabbe go ebo, mehl-e yiimi, kehm lungu aneb Esowo, a akalebun, kehm tibi bo Dorkas ana á ma lohko nyahme.
44009042	Eka jia kehm yeere go Jobba. Ane tvv kehm taame tv Ntul Esowo.
44009043	Pita kange o Jobba afung tvv go etahk Saimon ji jolo nne eltum agunyam.
44010001	Nne awohng jolo go Sisaria, no bo jo lung-e re Kornilius. Á jolo ntubesi a nsoja no jo lim eltum go ellong nsoja nyi bo jo lung re, “Ellong nsoja nyi lohng go Itali.”
44010002	Á jolo nne no Esowo jo kor-e. Á fere jo fahl Esowo, a ane kpee ba jolo go ege a nlaaga. Á jo wehre abo, jo ko akpohko enye, jo lim nnoobo ka ane, fere jo kak ero ka Esowo kpe kpe ngare.
44010003	Jolo ejum nkaranka era nyi elgung, nyi á nyehne enjel nyi Esowo kp'bake, kehm ba lung-e re, “Kornilius!”
44010004	Eji á jo seenge enjel too, anyar kehm-e lamme. Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji, nsoo?” Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Esowo ma-a buumu, eji á ma nyehn nnoobo enya, fere wuk ero eba.
44010005	Tum ane anv, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita.
44010006	Á kpo kang go etahk Saimon, nne eltum agunyam. Etahk eje li go nkpe agburu aya.”
44010007	Eji enjel nyio nyi jo bung a ne ma tahm, Kornilius kehm lungu alokeltum ebe na abal, a nne a nsoja awohng no jolo a ne bad bad, no Esowo jo tob kor-e,
44010008	kehm tongo bo kpee ji ma lim, kehm tumu bo tv go Jobba.
44010009	Etoono efung behko eji bo ma kabbe Jobba ngare efin, Pita kehm wahre go ero etahk re á song kak ero.
44010010	Owo njal kehm-e yame. Á kehm kehme elsebe ejum ji á bahke lehke. Ngare nyi bo jo lam nsol alehke re bo ka-e, Pita kehm nyehne nkpokosi ejum.
44010011	Á nyehne elbung ma lennge, fere nyehn ejum ji kp'badde abake, jolo ana nsubu nyi bo ma jabbe go es'sili emni emni kp'badde beem abake ba rehng go ndi.
44010012	Ajoobo enyam gbalee woomo ona atahng, enyam ana eguumu, a enyo, go ntere.
44010013	Pita kehm wuku nne no bungu a ne re, “Pita tahm, wo wul li!”
44010014	Pita kehm faange re, “E'ee Ntul, n ka li a li esabsab nnyam nyi ki li saang.”
44010015	Á kehm kpe wuk ellum nehko re, “Ji Esowo ma tong re, li saang, ka kpe bung re, li esabsab ejum.”
44010016	Limi ano nkpel na era, tete bo rod nsubu nyio tahm a nyi go elbung.
44010017	Eji Pita nyehne nkpokosi nyio, kehm-e fohko nkv. Ngare nyi á kpi ntiri ntiri bade ana nkpokosi nyio lohngo lohng, ane bao ba Kornilius tumu bo ebba yiimi go mbuga. Tibre bobtohko bahb edi ji etahk Saimon li no.
44010018	Bo kehm lungu ane ba jolo etahk Saimon, fere bahb bo re, joare Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita noa o.
44010019	Ngare nyio Pita kpi ntiri ntiri bade ejum ji á ma nyehn. Etohko ji Esowo kehm soro tong-e re, “Nyehnee, ane ara baa go, kp-a sebe.
44010020	Mehl, wo badde song! Ka fahl eltoono bo, tibre me wo ma tum bo.”
44010021	Pita kehm badde je goji ane bao, kehm song tong bo re, “Me wo a, ji ń kp-m sebe. Jen ji wahng ka ḿ ba no?”
44010022	Bo kehm faange re, “Kornilius ji li ntubesi a nsoja wo ma-r tum. Á li nnooba nne no kpo fahl Esowo, no Jus kpee kpo kak-e. Enjel nyi Esowo nyi tong-e no re, á tiingi tv-a, wo je go ege etahk, eji á l'wuk ji a bahk-e tongo.”
44010023	Pita kehm tongo ane bao re bo ba, ba kang o. Etoono efung behko Pita kehm tahme toono bo. Abon Esowo bandiki ba jolo go Jobba kehm-e tob toono.
44010024	Njahmfungfu nyehko bo kehm rehnge go Sisaria. Ngare nyio Kornilius ebtiingi ane ebe, a ate ebe re, bo ba ji, jo sik bo.
44010025	Eji Pita yahke yel ekp'kpa ji Kornilius, Kornilius kehm ba wan-e, gbo jamm-e alahng go ege alata, gong kak-e.
44010026	Pita kehm-e tabe yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Mehl yiimi, me nne wo, ana wo.”
44010027	Ngare nyi Pita yele go ekp'kpa, á kpi mbungu mbungu a Kornilius. Á kehm song kpiri ane gbalee ma ba ji edi ajehng.
44010028	Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kp'kahne re, wahr Jus, ntahm enyahre bungu re, wahr k'jo ji elbong goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus, fere jo kod abo a bo, jo lim ejum ajehng ajehng. Esowo ma-m tib re, me n k'jo lung nne awohng awohng re nne noka noka. Jol me n k'jo lung nne re, á limm saang.
44010029	Eji ń tumu ane tv-m, m ba na ba. N kp-n bahbe re, Jen ji wahnge ń tumu tum ane tv-m?”
44010030	Kornilius kehm faange re, “Lela nfung eni ngare ny'nehm ana n jo kak ero egame etahk nkaranka era nyi elgung ana n kpo kono ellimi. Nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba yiim-m go esamahr. Á kake abarebare nsol nya jo ya na ya.
44010031	Á kehm bungu re, ‘Kornilius, Esowo ma-a buumu, eji á ma nyehn nnoobo enya, fere wuk ero eba.
44010032	Tum ane, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita. Á kpo kang go etahk Saimon ji kpo lim eltum agunyam, ji lene go nkpe agburu aya.’
44010033	N kehm soro tum ane tvtv tv-a. Emnob sehng goji a ma taame ba. Owo wahng ka e jehk ana go esamahr bi Esowo kp'siki re wahr wuk ajehng ajehng ji Esowo ma-a tong re wo ba tong-r.”
44010034	Pita kehm kehme elbungu re, “Anv, me n seb kahn re, etingitingi, Esowo kpehme rang nne awohng awohng.
44010035	Nne awohng awohng no l'fahl-e, fere lim mbang nyi kp'nobo, á bahk-e koko.
44010036	Wahn kp'kahne etib bi á tiingi Israel, eji Jisos Kraist ko nnoobo etib bio bi elkoono ba a bi. Ye wo li Ntul no ane kpee.
44010037	Ngare nyi Jon ma tiingi etib bio bi ewohngalahb, bo kehm bomo elbungu alum nya Jisos go Galili. Alum nyao kehm yeere go Judea kpee.
44010038	Wahn kp'kahne ana Esowo yaange etohko eje wohngo Jisos ji Nasaret, fere ka-e nsahm. Jisos jo yannge, fere jo lim nnoobo, jo lim ane bao ba nnehm jo nohk bo, bo jo nob. Tibre Esowo jolo a ne.
44010039	“Wahr ba li atianse go nsol nyio nyi á limi no go Jerusalem kpee tete rehng go nkpohko ejahbe Jus anyehng anyehng. Bo kehm-e kumu lake go ekros, á kpo.
44010040	Esowo kehm-e nyahme go nfung era, fere tib-r ye.
44010041	Ane kpe kpe sang nyehn-e no, sehngem wahr ba nyehn-e no, wahr jia ji Esowo yehk-r no ana atianse enye, wahr jia ji jo li, fere jo wo a ne ngare nyi á ma nyahme go elkv.
44010042	Á tong-r re wahr jo bung alum Esowo tong ane, fere jo yiimi ntianse re, ye wo Esowo m-e yehke re á lam aneb mbir mbir, fere lam ane ba ma kpo.
44010043	Abanyehnamahr Esowo kpee jo bungu bada ne re, nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-e, á bahke bele eltahmeka go ege abiafem, tib go ege a mbing.”
44010044	Ngare nyio eji Pita kpi mbungu mbungu, Etingi Etohko kehm gboko, bulu ane bao ba wuku alum Esowo nyao.
44010045	Aneb Esowo ba jolo Jus, ba toono Pita je, kehm kpoko bo esi. Tibre Esowo ebtob ka ane baka baka ba ki li Jus Etingi Etohko.
44010046	Bo kehm wuku bo, bo kp'bungu ajahbe nyandikandiki, fere jo tehk Esowo. Pita kehm bungu re,
44010047	“Anv, l'li nyi nne bahke tene re, wahr k'wohngo ane baa alahba? Tibre bobbel Etingi Etohko ana wahr bele no fvfo.”
44010048	Á kehm tongo bo re, bo bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist. Bo kehm-e tongo re, á kang abon afung a bo.
44011001	Abatiingetib Jisos, a aneb Esowo ba lene go Judea, kehm wuku re, ane baka baka ebtob taame tv alum Esowo.
44011002	Eji Pita je no go Jerusalem, ane bao ba jo kor bo re ane baka baka yehke nrur, kehm kehme ntong lim a ne,
44011003	fere jo bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahng ka a kehm jeke goji ane ba kil yehke nrur, fere li nsol a bo?”
44011004	Pita kehm kehme ellennge ejum ajehng ajehng tong bo ana jolo no. Á bungu re,
44011005	“N jolo go Jobba, jo kak ero. N kehm nyehne nkpokosi ejum, nyi bo jabbe go es'sili emni, jo badde abake tete ba rehng egame.
44011006	Eji n seenge no nob nob, n kehm nyehne enyam, bindiki abibbib enyam, bindiki enyam ana eguumu, a enyo, go ntere.
44011007	Owo n kehm wuku ellum ni jo bung tong-m re, ‘Pita tahm, wo wul li!’
44011008	N kehm tene, nde, ‘E'ee Ntul, n ka li a li esabsab ejum ajehng ajehng ji ki li saang tete sik anv.’
44011009	N kehm kpe wuk ellum ni lohng go elbung, ni bungu re, ‘Ji Esowo ma tong re li saang, ka kpe lung re, li esabsab ejum!’
44011010	“Limi anaana nkpel na era, nsubu nyio kehm feere tahm go elbung.
44011011	“Ngare ny'nehm ona, ane ara kehm soro lohng a etahk ji e jolo no. Bo tumu bo go Sisaria tv me.
44011012	Etohko ji Esowo kehm soro tong-m re, me n toono bo, me n k'faabe. Abon Esowo, ane arakera baa t'tob tahm toon-m. E kehm song rehng etahk nne noo.
44011013	“Á tong-r ana á nyehne enjel yim no go ege etahk, nyi bungu re, ‘Tum ane, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita, á ba.
44011014	Ye wo bahk-a tiingi etib bi bahke wahnge ka a bel eltahre, a etahk etahk eja kpee.’
44011015	“Eji m bomo elbungu, Etingi Etohko kehm soro gbo, bulu bo, jang jang ana tob lim-r go mbomannahb.
44011016	N kehm soro buumu ellum ni Ntul a Jisos bungu re, ‘Jon jo wohngo ane alahb maka maka, wahn bahke bele ewohngalahb ji Etingi Etohko.’
44011017	“Esowo ka ane baka baka ayare nyao, ana á tob ka-r, eji e taame tv Ntul a Jisos Kraist. Anv, me n li renan ji m bahke kehm sahde Esowo?”
44011018	Eji bo wuku ano me, bo kehm belle na belle soom, kehm kehme Esowo tehk re, “Esowo ebtob ka ane baka baka eyake re bo gbo ndon, fere bel elkpin.”
44011019	Ngare nyi bo wulu Stiven, ebnohko gbale sehng, aneb Esowo y'yaame. Bandiki be rehng go Fenisa, bandiki be rehng go Saiprus, bandiki be rehng go Antiok. Bo jo bungu alum Esowo tong Jus ji ji.
44011020	Aneb Esowo bandiki ba lohngo go Saiprus, a Sirin kehm tahme go Antiok. Bo kehm song bung alum Esowo bade Jisos tong aneb Grik fvfo.
44011021	Nsahm nyi Ntul Esowo jolo a bo. Ellong ane gbalee ba taame no, feere goji Ntul Esowo.
44011022	Aneb ero ba jolo go Jerusalem kehm wuku ana ji ma lim go Antiok. Bo kehm tumu Barnabas tv go Antiok.
44011023	Eltim yeb-e sehng, eji á je no, song nyehn ana Esowo ma fuulu bo. Á kehm rehke bo ane kpee re, bo soro asi go eltoono Ntul a Jisos a ntim a ntim ebo.
44011024	Tibre Barnabas jolo nnooba nne no bele ekakesehk, etohko ji Esowo ruru go ege eltim. Ellong ane gbalee ba kpe jo taame tv Ntul a Jisos.
44011025	Barnabas kehm tahme go Tarsus re á song kpur Sol.
44011026	Eji á nyehn-e no, á kehm-e koko ba a ne go Antiok. Bo kehm jolo ona elya anehng, a aneb ero, jo tib ane gbalee. Go Antiok wo, bo gbo mbang lung abat'toono Jisos re ane ba Kraist.
44011027	Ngare nyio nyi abanyehnamahr Esowo kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba go Antiok.
44011028	Nne awohng go bo ellong, no bo jo lung-e re Agabus kehm mehle yiimi, kehm kehme elbungu go nsahm nyi Etingi Etohko bade es'song re, egburu njal bahke bake go njini kpee. Njal nyio lohko ba ngare nyi Klodius jolo ntul.
44011029	Abat'toono Jisos bao kehm toobo re bo bahke jo t'tum nsol alehke tv abon Esowo ba li go Judea, ana nne awohng awohng bele no.
44011030	Bo kehm limi ano, kehm kake Barnabas abola Sol nsol nyio go abo re bo ko song ka anebkul ero.
44012001	Ngare nyio nyi Herod kehme aneb ero bandiki nohk.
44012002	Á wulu Jems mmonannyehn Jon go ekahngkahng.
44012003	Á nyehne kan re, eji á limi ano, ebyebe Jus atahng, á kehm kpe bob Pita fvfo. Ejum jia limi ngare elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist.
44012004	Eji bo bob-e no, bo kehm-e song kak go ngbekobo. Bo rod-e kak nsoja na eni go ebo, re bo baab-e. Ni ellong bele nsoja ane ani. Herod tiri re, elkak nio ni Pasova l'mal, á kehm-e yehke ba ka Jus.
44012005	Ngare nyio eji Pita kpeke wob go ngbekobo, aneb ero jo kake ero t'tahne ka Esowo tib go esi ji Pita.
44012006	Atv mao ma Herod jo tiri re, á bahke yehke Pita ba ka ane, Pita woomo go elka elka ni nsoja na ebal, jo lal. Bo kak-e agbekobo na abal. Ab'baabe baka yiimi ga mbutahk ngbekobo, jo baabe.
44012007	Owo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm lohngo ba. Ellennge kehm yake go nkimi ngbekobo nyio. Enjel nyio kehm bunu Pita go ebahk, nyahm-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Mehl elwaare!” Agbekobo nyao kehm soro won-e abo gbo.
44012008	Enjel kehm-e tongo re, “Gbaange egbaange eja, wo kak akpaketa enya!” Pita kehm limi ano kpee. Enjel kehm-e kpe tong re, “Konngo nsubu enya, wo tahm toon-m!”
44012009	Pita kehm lohngo toon-e. Á kahnem re, ji enjel jo lim lohko li etingitingi. Pita jo tiri re, á kp'leeme na.
44012010	Eji bo ma sehng ngbokambang a mb'baabe sa, fere sehng etoono sa, bo kehm song rehng go eti mbu ji bo ko akuungu lim, ji nne bahke sehnge o rehng go nfam. Lennge ntahngtahng ka bo. Bo kehm lohngo, jo jen asongo alab mbang. Enjel kehm soro tahm, Pita sa.
44012011	Pita, amahr kehm-e bange, á kehm bungu re, “Anv, me n lohko kahn re, Ntul Esowo ebtum enjel enye, ba tahr-m go abo nya Herod. Á ma-m fere yehke go nfem nyi Jus tiri re bo lim-m.”
44012012	Á sebe kan kahn ana ma jol me, á kehm tahme go etahk Meri nnyehn Jon, Jon jio ji bo jo lung-e re Mak. Owo ane gbalee jolo no, jo kak ero.
44012013	Eji Pita jo kahd go mbutahk, nlokeltum no bo jo lung-e re Roda kehm bake.
44012014	Á liingi kan ellum ni Pita, á bele eyebatahng sehng, jol mbu á lenngem. Á be na be, yel ekp'kpa, kehm song tong ane bako re, “Pita noa, yim go mbutahk.”
44012015	Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, esahl bi kp-a lima?” Á kehm faange re, “Lohko li etingitingi.” Bo kehm bungu re, “Enjel enye nyi ona.”
44012016	Ngare nyio Pita kpi nkahde nkahde go mbutahk. Bo kehm song lennge mbu, kehm-e nyehne. Eji bo nyehn-e no, kpo bo esi sehng.
44012017	Pita kehm bunu bo ebo re bo rahke, bo k'kpe bung. Á kehm kehme eltooro ana Esowo m-e yehke go ngbekobo, kehm bungu re, “Tob tongen Jems, a abon Esowo bako fvfo.” Pita kehm soro tahm eje ejahbe jindiki.
44012018	Eji efungfu se no, ebud nsoja jokko na jokko. Bo kpeem kahn ji ma lim eyaame ji Pita.
44012019	Herod kehm tongo ane ebe re bo song seb Pita. Bo seb-e, bo we tikem nyehn. Á kehm kehme ab'baabe bao abahbe bahb, kehm tongo re bo wul bo. Herod kehm tahme go Judea, sehng song rehng go Sisaria, sa kang go.
44012020	Herod, eltim jo rak-e tob aneb Taya, a Saidon sehng. Bo kehm tahme egom re bo song nyehn Herod. Bo gbo mbang sennge Blastus eltim feere go bo ejang. Blastus jolo ntubesi alokeltum Herod. Bo kehm tahme goji Ntul a Herod, song gboong-e re, “Titi, e ma-a gbo.” Tibre ajahbe ebo belem edi jindiki ji bo jo je, song gunu nsol alehke, sehngem ejahbe ji Herod ji ji bo jo je.
44012021	Efung bio bi Herod kunu tv, á liibi nsol nyi atul kpo liibi, kehm ba ji go eti etul eje, kehm kehme elbungu a ane.
44012022	Ane bao kehm soro rabe re, “O alum nya nne sang, nya Esowo nya!”
44012023	Tvtv ona enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm soro gbul Herod tub ndi. Tibre á kaam Esowo ellub. Aroongo kehm-e lehke, á kpo.
44012024	Alum Esowo kehm kpe yeere, fere gb'gbal.
44012025	Barnabas, a Sol, eji bo ma mal eltum ebo go Jerusalem, bo kehm koko Jon Mak tahm a ne kehnge.
44013001	Abanyehnamahr Esowo jolo go ero bio bi Antiok, a at'tibi fvfo. Abing ebo, noko, bo jo lung-e re Barnabas, noko Simeon ji bo jo lung-e re Naija, noko Lusius ji jolo nne a Sirin, noko Manaen ji bo jolo nlaaga anyehng a ntul a Herod tete bo gbal, noko Sol.
44013002	Eji bo jo kak Esowo, fere jo bade elbo njal, Etingi Etohko kehm bungu tong bo re, “Yaken Barnabas, a Sol, bo jo lim eltum ni n yehke bo.”
44013003	Bo kehm bade elbo njal, fere kak ero, kunu bo abo, kehm tumu bo re bo song.
44013004	Ana etohko ji Esowo tumu bo, bo kehm tahme go Silusa. Ona wo bo yele go egbang, tahm go Saiprus.
44013005	Eji bo rehnge go Salamis, bo kehm kehme alum Esowo bung go ntahk ero nyi Jus. Jon Mak jolo a bo, jo kak bo ebo go eltum.
44013006	Eji bo jo yannge ejahbe jio ji li elka alahb, bo kehm song rehng go Pafos. Owo bo kpiri nne a ntaane awohng no bo jo lung-e re Barjisos. Á jolo nne a Jus no jolo nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr.
44013007	Á jolo a ntubesi ejahbe no bo jo lung-e re Serjes Polos ji jolo ekahnkahn nne. Ntubesi noo kehm lungu Barnabas, a Sol, tibre á jo sebe re á wuk alum Esowo.
44013008	Nne a ntaane noo no bo jo lung-e go alum Grik re Elimas joom taame tv Bab Sol. Á jo sebe re, á sennge ntubesi noo eltim, á k'taame.
44013009	Sol ji bo jo lung-e re Pol ji etohko ji Esowo rur-e go ege eltim, kehm seenge nne a ntaane noo too,
44013010	kehm bungu re, “Wo mmon a nnehm noa, wobgbal go enehm sehng, a ab'bi. A kpo ko etingitingi ekv. A kpo seb re, wo yaange etingitingi ji Esowo, fere kak efahnge.
44013011	Erakatahng ji Esowo bahke gboko tub-a anv, a bahke wake amahr. A nehm kpe waka nyehn njul nyia.” Tvtv ona ejannge kehm soro gbo-e, á kehm kehme ane seb, ba bahk-e jabbe go ebo, jo tib-e mbang.
44013012	Ntubesi noo kehm taame, eji á nyehne ejum ji ma lim. Tibre eltibi nio ni Esowo jo kpo-e esi sehng.
44013013	Pol, a ane ebe bako, bo kehm yele egbang go Pafos, song rehng go Perga ji Pamfilia. Jon Mak kehm beke bo sa, feere eje go Jerusalem.
44013014	Bo kehm tahme go Perga, sehng song rehng go Antiok ji Pisidia. Eji efung Esabat rehnge no, bo kehm tahme go etahk ero ji Jus, song ji.
44013015	Eji ane bao ma lung atahm nya Moses, fere lung alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no, atubesi etahk ero jio kehm lungu bo re, “Abonanee, joare ń kp'kpi elle anehng anehng ni ḿ bahke tubu ane, tuben bo!”
44013016	Pol kehm mehle yiimi, faake ebo, kehm bungu re, “Anebe Israel, a wahn jia ji kpi Esowo fahl, wuungen atung!
44013017	Esowo bio bi Israel, ye wo yehke babnso ejahre, fere lim bo, bo rur, eji bo jolo go Ijipt. Esowo kehm yehke bo go Ijipt ege a nsahm.
44013018	Á le bo go elka emahng ejum nnya atahl abal.
44013019	Esowo tane ejahbe na ebsehma go ndi nyi Kenan, faake a ndi nyio bak bo.
44013020	“Owo á kehm kake bo abalamalam ba jo lam alam ane bao go ejum nnya atahltahl atahl abal a nnya ewubu, tete kehm song rehng go ngare nyi nnyehnamahr Samuel.
44013021	Bo jo sebe re bo bel ntul. Esowo kehm kake bo ntul no bo jo lung-e re Sol mmon a Kis, no lohng go et'tohngo ji Benjamin. Á jolo ntul go nnya atahl abal.
44013022	“Eji Esowo ma fak Sol, á kehm fere lim Devid jol ntul abo. Alum nya Esowo bungu bade Devid li re, ‘Devid ji mmon a Jesi wo li elkohn nne no kor-m no, no bahke limi ajehng ajehng ji n l'tong-e re á lim.’
44013023	“Go et'tohngo ji Devid wo, Jisos lohng no. Esowo lim-e nt'tahre no Israel ana á nyame no.
44013024	Re Jisos kehm bake, Jon ebtohko tiingi etib bi ewohngalahb, tong anebe Israel kpee re bo gbo ndon go bo abiafem.
44013025	Eji eltum ni Jon yahke mal, á kehm bungu tong bo re, ‘Anv, n kp'tir re, me n li elkohn nne awo? Me sang li nne no ń kp-e siki, no kp'bake go, jol me n tohkem f'fuumu re, me n fannge alehke akpaketa enye.’
44013026	“Abonanee, abon Ebraham, a ane ba wob go egahne ellong, ba kp'fahle Esowo, wahr ba wahnge etib bia bi eltahre ma ba.
44013027	“Tibre ane ba jolo go Jerusalem, a atubesi ebo, tib esi ji bo ki-e liingi re ye nt'tahre wo, jol alum nya abanyehnamahr nya bo jo lung go efung Esabat abehng abehng bo kahnem, bo lohko lim ebung ji enyehnamahr jio jol go etingitingi ji bo kimi elam re bo wul-e.
44013028	Jol eb'bi ajehng ajehng bo nyehnem ji kehn fuumu re bo wul-e. Tvtv ona bo tongo Pailet re á yak-e ka nsoja, bo wul-e.
44013029	Eji bo ma lim kpee, ana nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne, bo kehm-e fono go ekros, song kak elahm.
44013030	Esowo nyahm-e go elkv.
44013031	Afung tvv nya á jo kpiri ane ba jo lohng go Galili, jo toon-e tahm go Jerusalem. Bao ba li atianse enye anv.
44013032	“Wahr ko nnoobo etib ba abi, bi Esowo nyame no tong babnso ejahre.
44013033	Ana Esowo nyame no tong bo, ano wo á ma lim ka wahr ji li abon ebo, eji á nyahme Jisos go elkv. Ano wo fvfo bo tob nyon go nwer ebal nyi Saams re, “ ‘Wo wo li mmon ewame, lela wo a ma jini.’
44013034	“Ano wo Esowo bungu no bade elnyahme ni Jisos go elkv, fere bung bade ana á l'k'bol go ndi re, ‘Elfuulu ni m bahk-e fuulu bahke jolo etingitingi elfuulu ni kp'bare saang, ni n nyame tong Devid.’
44013035	“Edi nwer a Saams jehko kpe bung re, ‘A nehm taame re nnooba nlokeltum ewa bol go ndi.’
44013036	“Tibre Devid go ege a ngare á loko Esowo, fere jo lim ejum ajehng ajehng ji Esowo sebe re á lim, tete á kpo. Bo kpa-e kak kohlo alahm nya babnsoo. Á b'bol go ndi.
44013037	Ye ji Esowo nyahm-e go elkv, á bolem go ndi.
44013038	“Owo nobo re wahn kahn abonanee re, nne noo wo wahng ka e kp-n tiingi etib bi eltahmeka go abiafem.
44013039	Nne awohng awohng no l'taame tv-e, á bahk-e limi, á for go ege abiafem kpee. Tibre atahm nya Moses nehm ma lim nne, á for go ege abiafem.
44013040	“Kunen ekpu, goji ejum ji abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no l'ki-n lim, ji bo bungu re,
44013041	“ ‘Wahn ane ba nsol kil jo lub-n, nyehne nkpokosi, wahn kpo, k'kahn. Tibre ejum ji m bahke limi go egahne ngare, ń nehm tiki taame, jol afi nne lennge na ka-n.’ ”
44013042	Eji Pol, a Barnabas jo lohng ekp'kpa ero jio, ane bao kehm gboongo bo re, bo kpe feere ba efung Esabat behko, kpe ba tib bo budu.
44013043	Eji ane ma lohng ekp'kpa ero, Jus gbalee, a ane baka baka ba jo kak Esowo ana Jus, bo kehm toono Pol, a Barnabas. Bab Pol kehm tibi bo, fere rehke bo re bo soro asi, yiimi ano go nnoobo nyi Esowo.
44013044	Etoono Esabat jehko, ka riki ejahbe jio kpee kame na kam ba rur, jo wuk alum Esowo.
44013045	Eji Jus nyehne ellong ane ana bao, ala kehm kehme bo teele. Alum nya Pol jo bung, jo sabe bo sehng, bo kehm-e jahre alum, fere jo su-e.
44013046	Pol, a Barnabas, bo jo kpe bung na esahb esahb re, “Fuumu re bo tohko bung alum Esowo tong-n. Eji ḿ ma ten, wahn eblam elnahne antahng re, kpeem fuumu re wahn bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
44013047	Tibre Ntul Esowo tong-r re, “ ‘M ma-n yehke re wahn jol ellennge ka ane ba ki nyi Esowo, goji eltahre l'rehng go ejang njini abehng abehng.’ ”
44013048	Eji ane baka baka wuku ano, eltim yebe bo sehng. Bo kehm kehme alum Esowo tehk. Ane bao ba Esowo ma yehke re bo bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini, bo t'taame.
44013049	Alum Ntul Esowo kehm yeere na yeere go ejahbe jio kpee.
44013050	Jus kehm kehme atubesi nfam nyare, fere nyare anebkal ba ki jol Jus, ba jo kak Esowo, ba jolo aj'jok ane. Bo kehm kehme Pol a Barnabas gbak, fere kam bo re bo tahm ejahbe jio song.
44013051	Bab Pol kehm kumu ebtohko go bo akpade tv bo, fere tahm go Ikonium.
44013052	Abat'toono Jisos ba jolo o, etohko ji Esowo ruru bo go bo a ntim, bo fere bel eyebatahng.
44014001	Eji bo rehnge go Ikonium, Pol, a Barnabas, bo song yel go ekp'kpa ero ji Jus. Bo bungu sehng, toono o, Jus gbalee taame, a ane baka baka gbalee fvfo.
44014002	Jus ji ki taame, kehm kehme ane baka baka nyare, fere sennge bo ntim tob aneb Esowo.
