44014003	Abatiingetib Jisos bao kange ona afung tvv. Bo jo bungu a esahb esahb bada Ntul Esowo no yiimi ntianse ka alum nyao nya nnoobo enye, eji á ka bo nsahm re bo jo lim akpokosi.
44014004	Ane ba jolo go ejahbe jio kehm yabe. Egom jindiki jolo ka Jus, egom jehko jolo ka abatiingetib Jisos.
44014005	Owo ane baka baka, a anebe Jus, go atubesi ebo kehm toobo re, bo nohk Pol, a Barnabas, fere tuubu bo atal.
44014006	Bab Pol wuku kan ano me, bo kehm soro be tahm go Listra, sehng o song rehng go Derbe, a abon ajahbe ba Likaonia ba tob jol o fvfo.
44014007	Owo bo bungu alum Esowo.
44014008	Nne jolo go Listra, no ki jo ma jen. Á jolo mbanne bomo ngare nyi bo jel-e na jel.
44014009	Á ji, jo wuungu atung go alum Esowo nya Pol jo bung. Pol k'kahn re, nne noo ebtaame elkohn eltaame ni á bahke nobo. Owo á kehm-e soro seenge too,
44014010	kehm bungu wahre wahre tong-e re, “Mehl yiimi?” Á kehm soro mehl, kehme eljene.
44014011	Eji ellong ane bao nyehne nkpokosi nyi Pol ma lim, bo kehm kehme elrabe go alum nya Likaonia re, “Esowo ebbadde ba go elfoongo ni nne!”
44014012	Bo lungu Barnabas re Sus, fere lung Pol re Hermes, tibre Pol wo jolo mb'bungu.
44014013	Nlimajom no elom ji bo jo lung re Sus kehm koko efong, a at'tul, tahm a nya go eti mbu, tibre bo si etahk elom jio go esi mbang. Owo bo je no re bo song lim njom ka abatiingetib Jisos bao.
44014014	Eji Pol, a Barnabas wuku ji bo yahke song lim, bo kehm yare awobo ebo, be song yel go ellong ane bao, kehm kehme elrabe re,
44014015	“Wahn jia, jen ji wahnge ń kp'limi ana? Wahr li ane ana wahn! E ko nnoobo etib ba a bi, eji ń l'sennge njahm go nsol nyi li mbol mbol, feere goji Esowo bi li go elkpin, bi limi elbung, a ndi, a aya, go nsol kpee nyi li no.
44014016	Mahne mahne Esowo yake ane kpee, bo jo jen go mbang nyi koro bo.
44014017	Tvtv o, á kpo lennge elne go anobonobo nsol nya á kpo lim, ana elahb ji kpo lohng go elbung, na ka-n, ana nsol enyahne nyi kpo lak go ngare. Á kpo ka-n nsol alehke, fere ka-n eyebatahng.”
44014018	Sa ntiil ane bao lim njom ka bo, jol eji bo jo b'bung alum nyao tong bo.
44014019	Jus jindiki lohngo go Antiok ji Pisidia, bandiki lohng go Ikonium, ba sennge ane bao ntim, feere goji bo. Bo tuubu Pol atal, tohng-e, lohng a ne go esi mbang. Tibre bo jo tiri re, yebkpo.
44014020	Eji abat'toono Jisos ba no, ba rur senng-e kak, Pol kehm soro mehl, tahm go nla ejahbe. Etoono efungfu behko Pol, a Barnabas kehm tahme asongo go Derbe.
44014021	Bo kehm bungu alum Esowo go Derbe. Ane gbalee ba taame no o. Bab Pol kehm feere go Listra, sehng song rehng go Ikonium, sehng o kehm song rehng Antiok ji Pisidia.
44014022	Bo jo kake abat'toono Jisos ba jolo o eltim, fere jo rehke bo re bo soro asi ano ano go mbang nyi Esowo. Bo jo tibi ane re, “E bahke tiki nyehn erem, kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo.”
44014023	Bo jo yehke anebkul ero go ero abehng abehng, fere rod bo kak Ntul Esowo bi bo ma taame tv-e go ebo, jo kak ero, fere jo bade elbo njal.
44014024	Bo kehm sehnge asongo go Pisidia, fere sehng o rehng go Pamfilia.
44014025	Eji bo ma bung alum Esowo go Perga, bo kehm tahme asongo go Atalia.
44014026	Owo bo yele go egbang asongo go Antiok, ejahbe jio ji bo rodo bo, kak Esowo go ebo, tib go eltum ni bo ma lim mal.
44014027	Eji Pol, a Barnabas ma ba rehng go Antiok, bo kehm lungu aneb ero kpee, ba kono edi ajehng, kehm tooro nsol nyi Esowo ma ko bo lim, tong bo ana Esowo ma lennge mbang ka ane baka baka re bo tob taame.
44014028	Bo kange afung tvv a abat'toono Jisos bao.
44015001	Ane bandiki lohngo go Judea ba go Antiok, ba kehme abon Esowo ba li o tib re, “Tohko tiki jol re, ń yehke nrur ana ntahm nyi Moses tibi no, ń nehm tiki bel eltahre.”
44015002	Pol, a Barnabas, bo jo limi nfaabe a bo bada nsol nyio, edi jooko na jooko. Ano wo wahnge bo toobo no re, Pol, a Barnabas, a aneb Esowo bandiki ba li go Antiok, bo song go Jerusalem, song kpiri abatiingetib, a anebkul ero, bo toobo nfem nyio.
44015003	Aneb ero kehm tumu bo, bo kehm tahme, song sehng go Fenisa, a Samaria. Edi ajehng ajehng bo jo tooro ana ane baka baka kp'gboko ndon go bo abiafem, feere goji Esowo. Eji abat'toono Jisos bao wuku ano, ntim yebe bo sehng.
44015004	Eji Bab Pol song rehng go Jerusalem, aneb Esowo, a abatiingetib a anebkul ero vvrv bo sehng. Bo kehm tooro nsol nyi Esowo ma ko bo lim, tong bo.
44015005	Aneb Esowo bandiki ba woomo go ellong Farisis kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Tiki li re, bo tiki yehke nrur, fere bum atahm nya Moses.”
44015006	Abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero kehm bake ba ji edi ajehng re bo toobo nfem nyia.
44015007	Eji bo ma bung tetete, Pita kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Abonanee, ń kp'kahne re, ebkang ji Esowo yehk-m no go egahne ellong re, go egama nnyo wo ane baka baka bahke wuku nnoobo etib, fere taame.
44015008	“Esowo bi kp'kahne ntim ane. Ye wo yiimi ane baka baka ntianse, eji á ka bo Etingi Etohko ana á tob ka-r.
44015009	Elyaange anehng anehng limm, wahr a bo. Yebtahm ka bo go bo abiafem, tib eji bo ma taame.
44015010	“Anv, jen ji wahnge ń kp'gare Esowo? Jia li ana e kp'rodo elsol ni nnen si ane baka baka, elsol ni jol babnso ejahre ki ma sol, awahr awahr fvfo.
44015011	Wahr kp'taame re, nnoobo nyi Ntul a Jisos nyi kpo wahng ka e bel eltahre, ano wo fvfo bo ma tob bel.”
44015012	Ellong ane bao kpee belle na belle, eji bo wuku Barnabas, a Pol kp'tooro bade akpokosi nya Esowo ka bo re bo lim go ellong ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.
44015013	Bo bungu kan a rahke, Jems kehm bungu re, “Abonanee, wuungen atung?
44015014	Saimon Pita kp'na bungu anv anv re, Esowo ebgbo mbang tib elkoro ene goji ane baka baka, tibre yebyehke ane go bo ellong re bo jol ane ebe.
44015015	Alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no ebwane a nya Pita, ana nwer Esowo bungu no re,
44015016	“ ‘Nyaa l'sehng, owo m bahke feere ba tuungu etahk ji Devid ji ma gbo, si. M bahke tuungu nkultahk nyio si,
44015017	goji egom ane bako l'seb Ntul Esowo, a ane baka baka kpee, ba li abehn nyanyame.
44015018	Ano wo Ntul Esowo bungu no, eji á lennge nsol nyia mahne mahne.’ ”
44015019	Owo Jems kehm kpe soro asi go elbungu re, “Egame, kor-m re wahr k'jo gbiingi ane baka baka ba kp'taame tv Esowo.
44015020	Ji li no li re, wahr nyon nwer tong bo re, bo k'jo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang, bo jo jahng as'sa, bo k'jo li nnyam nyi bo kahn-e ekehd, á kpo, bo k'jo li alung.
44015021	Tibre atahm nya Moses, bo bomo ellungu mahne mahne go ntahk ero enyahre efung Esabat abehng abehng. Alum nyao, ejahbe ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo kala bung.”
44015022	Abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero, a aneb ero kpee, bo toobo re bo yehke ane go bo ellong tum tv go Antiok. Bo yehke Judas ji bo jo lung-e re Barsabas, fere yehke Sailas, ane abal baa ba jo sahb l'lub aneb ero bao. Bo toono Pol, a Barnabas.
44015023	A wo li nwer nyi bo tumu no, nyi bo nyono re, “Wahr abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero, ba li abonanee ejahne, e ma-n kak nnyo, wahn abonanee ba ki li Jus, ba lene go Antiok, a Siria, go Silisia.
44015024	Wahr ebwuk re, ane ebahre bandiki ebba ba bung alum nya ma-n bil amahr, fere joob-n go egahna ntim. Elle anehng anehng e tubem bo re bo ba bung elkohn alum ana nyao.
44015025	Wahr ebkono edi ajehng, yehke ane re wahr tum bo tv-n. Bo bahke toono akpondahme enyahre Pol, a Barnabas,
44015026	bo ji ma taame elkv go esi ji Ntul a Jisos Kraist.
44015027	E yehke Judas, a Sailas re bo ba tong-n nsol ny'nehm go nnyo a nnyo ana e nyono no.
44015028	Etingi Etohko, a wahr ebtaame re, e nehm si-n elsol ni nnen, sehngem re akahmekahme nsol nyaa, nya nya fuumu re wahn k'jo lim.
44015029	Kana jo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang. Kana jo li alung. Kana jo li nnyam nyi bo kahn-e ekehd, á kpo. Jo jahngen as'sa. Ń tohko jo lim nsol nyia, ḿ bahke jolo nob nob. E ma-n kak nnyo.”
44015030	Bo kehm tumu ane ba bo yehke bo, bo song rehng go Antiok, kehm song lung aneb Esowo bao, ba kono edi ajehng, kehm kake bo nwer nyio.
44015031	Eji bo lungu no, eltim yebe bo sehng go erehke ji bo kake bo.
44015032	Judas, a Sailas, bo ji jolo abanyehnamahr Esowo kehm kehme bo rehke, fere jo kak bo eltim.
44015033	Eji bo ma kang abon afung o, ane bao kehm tongo bo re, bo feere song kehnge a eyebatahng goji ane ba tumu bo.
44015034	(Sailas kehm tiri re, ye bahke jolo o).
44015035	Pol, a Barnabas, bo sa ona Antiok, fere jo tib ane alum Esowo, fere jo bung alum Esowo tong ane. Ane gbalee bako jo t'tob bung fvfo.
44015036	Eji ma kang abon afung ntiil, Pol kehm tongo Barnabas re, “Ba wahr feere tahm goji aneb Esowo ba li go ajahbe nya e bungu alum Esowo, song nyehn ana bo li no.”
44015037	Barnabas jo sebe re, Jon Mak toono bo.
44015038	Pol kehm bungu re, “Nobem re wahr kpe-e ko, tibre á tahm-r sa go Pamfilia. Á jolem a nahre tete e lim eltum mal.”
44015039	Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim t'tahne bo bo, kehm yaame. Barnabas kehm koko Mak, bo yel egbang tahm go Saiprus.
44015040	Pol yehke Sailas. Aneb Esowo kehm jabbe bo kak Ntul Esowo go ebo, bo kehm soro tahm.
44015041	Pol je go Siria, fere sehng song rehng go Silisia, jo kak aneb ero eko.
44016001	Pol kehm soro asi rehng go Derbe, a Listra. Nt'toona Jisos awohng jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Timoti. Nnyehn jolo nne a Jus. Á tob jolo mmon Esowo. Nde jolo nne a Grik.
44016002	Abon Esowo ba jolo go Listra, a Ikonium jo tehke Timoti sehng.
44016003	Pol jo sebe re Timoti toon-e. Á kehme koko, song yehk-e nrur, tib go esi ji Jus ji jolo adi nyao. Tibre bo kpee jo kahne re, nde Timoti jolo nne a Grik.
44016004	Eji bo jo sehng ajahbe nyao o, bo jo tongo bo re bo jo bum alum nya abatiingetib Jisos toobo no go Jerusalem, a anebkul ero.
44016005	Aneb ero bao ona gbale na, fere yiimi t'tahne go mbang nyi Esowo. Ane jo kpe rur na efung abehng abehng, ba jo taame.
44016006	Bo jo yannge go Frigia, a Galesa. Etingi Etohko joom taame re bo bung alum Esowo go Esia.
44016007	Eji bo ma kabbe Misa, owo bo kehm gare re bo sehng go Bitinia. Etohko ji Jisos taamem.
44016008	Bo sehnge go nkpe ejahbe nyi Misa rehng go Troas.
44016009	Pol kehm nyehne nkpokosi anyehng atv. Á nyehne nne a Masedonia yim no, kp-e gboongo re, “Ba ga Masedonia, wo ba kak-r ebo!”
44016010	Pol nyehne kan nkpokosi nyio o, wahr ane kpee, e kehm soro toobo ebjing, tahm go Masedonia. Tibre wahr ebseb kahn re, Esowo bi ma-r lung re wahr song bung alum enye tong bo.
44016011	E yele egbang go Troas tete song rehng go Samotres. Etoono efung behko e rehng go Neapolis.
44016012	Owo e sehnge no song rehng go Filipai ji jolo ngbokambang ejahbe go Masedonia. Ejahbe jio woomo go elwo ni Rom. Owo e kange abon afung.
44016013	Efung Esabat e kehm lohngo ejahbe jio, tahm go nkpe aya. Tibre e tiri re, edi jio ji li edi ero akake. E kehm jehke, kehm kehme elbungu a anebkal bao ba ba no, ba kono edi ajehng.
44016014	Nnenkal awohng jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Lidia ji jolo nne a Tiatira. Á jo jene are abomo nya nno, fere jo kak Esowo. Á jo wuungu atung go alum nya Pol jo bung, tibre Esowo bi lennge eltim ene.
44016015	Owo Lidia, a aneb etahk ebe kehm bele ewohngalahb. Á kehm soro tong-r re, “Joare wahn ebbum re, me n lohko taame tv Esowo, baan, wahn ba jol go egame etahk.” Á kehm jo gbiing-r re wahr tiki je.
44016016	Efung abehng eji e jo tahm go edi ji bo kpo kak ero, e kehm nyehne mmonse no nkal no jolo nju. Á bele ebi etohko ji amahr anyehne. Á jo limi akpohko gbalee ka ane bao ba jo fil-e, eji á jo nyehn ane amahr.
44016017	Á jo toono Pol, a wahr, jo rabe tiim re, “Ane baa, alokeltum Esowo bi li go ero ba! Bo kpo tib-n mbang nyi ḿ bahke sehnge kehm bele eltahre!”
44016018	Alum nyaa á jo kono elbungu nkpel a nkpele. Pol, eltim kehm-e rake, á kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong ebi etohko jio re, “N kp-a tongo go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist re, wo lohng go ege a ngubjing!” Á kehm soro lohng ngare ny'nehm o.
44016019	Eji afono nju nyio sebe no kahn re, mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke kpe ting akpohko kpeem li, bo kehm soro bob Pol, a Sailas, tahm a bo go are, edi ji atubesi nfam jolo no.
44016020	Eji bo ma ko bo, je go esamahr atul esub, bo kehm bungu re, “Ane baa a, anebe Jus ba. Bo kp'sebe nfem go egahre ejahbe.
44016021	Bo kpi eljini tib, ni ki nob re wahr aneb Rom, wahr leeme, fere jo lim.”
44016022	Ane bako ba jolo o, kehm nake ba bulu bo. Abalamalam bao kehm tohngo bo awobo yare. Bo yehke bo awobo nyao, kehm soro ka ane bao nsahm re bo dv bo go nr'rare.
44016023	Eji bo ma dv bo gbalee, bo kehm kake bo go ngbekobo, tong mb'baabe agbekobo re á baabe bo n'nob.
44016024	Eji á wuku ano me, á kehm kake bo go nkimi nyi li atahng atahng, fere kak bo afung go akpade.
44016025	Nlum atv, Pol, a Sailas kehm kehme ero kak, fere jo yim ase, jo tehk Esowo. Aneb agbekobo bako jo wuungu atung, jo wuk.
44016026	Tvtv ona ndi kehm kehme elgbehke na gbehke. Nnahb ekahme nyio nyi ngbekobo jo gb'gbehke. Abutahk ngbekobo kpee kehm soro lennge. Agbekobo kehm soro won bo ane kpee gbo.
44016027	Mb'baabe agbekobo noo nyahme kan a me, á kehm ba nyehn abutahk ma lennge. Á kehm soro rod ntahme enye, yahke wul elne. Tibre á jo tiri re, anv, aneb agbekobo ebbe kpee fi.
44016028	Pol kehm soro bung wahre wahre re, “Ka bom elna! Wahr baa ane kpee.”
44016029	Mb'baabe agbekobo noo kehm lungu ane re, bo ko agun ba. Á kehm beke yel ekp'kpa ngbekobo jio, kehm kehme elfahle, jo k'kahm, gbo jamme Pol, a Sailas alahng go alata.
44016030	Á kehm lohngo a bo go elatahk, kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, jen ji m bahke limi, kehm bele eltahre?”
44016031	Bo kehm-e faange re, “Taame tv Ntul a Jisos, a bahke bele eltahre, a etahk etahk eja.”
44016032	Bo kehm bungu alum Esowo tong-e, a ane kpee ba jolo go ege etahk.
44016033	Mb'baabe noo kehm koko bo atv manehm o, tahm a bo, song ru bo alok nyao kpee, kehm soro bel ewohngalahb, a ane ebe kpee.
44016034	Á kehm koko bo tahm a bo go ege etahk, song ka bo nsol alehke. Á bele eyebatahng, a etahk etahk eje, tib eji á ma taame tv Esowo.
44016035	Etoono efungfu behko abalamalam kehm tumu mbehresi re bo ba yehke ane bao yake, bo song.
44016036	Mb'baabe agbekobo noo kehm tooro tong Pol re, “Abalamalam ebtiingi tv re wahn song. Lohngen anv, wahn song go eyebatahng.”
44016037	Pol kehm bungu tong mbehresi nyio re, “Bo dv-r go elkab ane. Elam jolem, jol ebi ajehng ajehng e liim. Bo kak-r go ngbekobo, wahr ji li na anebe Rom. Anv, bo kehm fere weele na, yehk-r mbehr mbehr re wahr song. E'ee, ano sang. Nong, bofono antahng ba, ba yehk-r.”
44016038	Mbehresi nyio kehm song tooro alum nyao tong abalamalam bao. Eji bo wuku re, bo anebe Rom ba, bo kehm kehme elfahle.
44016039	Bo kehm bake ba gboongo bo, kehm yehke bo yake re bo tahm ejahbe jio song.
44016040	Bab Pol kehm lohngo go ngbekobo tahm song nyehn Lidia, a aneb ero bako, kak bo eltim, kehm soro tahm.
44017001	Bo kehm tahme go Amfipolis, sehng song rehng go Apolonia, soro song rehng go Tesalonaika, edi ji etahk ero ji Jus jolo no.
44017002	Pol kehm song yel go ekp'kpa ero, ana á jo kono ellimi. Aneb Jus jo limi nfaabe a ne bada nwer Esowo tete biingi Esabat na ebra.
44017003	Á jo lennge bo, fere jo tib bo re, “Tiki jol re, Kraist nyehn erem, kpo, fere nyahme go elkv.” Á kehm kpe bung re, “Jisos jia ji n kp'bungu bada ne, Kraist wo.”
44017004	Egom jindiki l'lennge bo, bo taame, fere jo toono Pol, a Sailas. Ano wo fvfo ellong aneb Grik gbalee ba jo kak Esowo, a atubesi anebkal bandiki gbalee tob taame, jo toono bo.
44017005	Ala kehm kehme aneb Jus teele. Bo kehm lungu abi ane bandiki tum, bo song lung ane ba kono edi ajehng, kehm kehme edi sohko na sohko. Bo kehm song yel ekp'kpa Jeson, jo seb Bab Pol re, bo ko bo ba ka ane bao.
44017006	Eji bo ki nyehn bo, bo kehm tohngo Jeson, a abon Esowo bako gona, tahm a bo goji atubesi nfam, fere jo rabe re, “Ane bao ba ma rod njini nyia kpiidi akpade go ero, bobkpe ba a.
44017007	Jeson wo ma ko bo ba kak go ege etahk. Bo ba kpi atahm nya ntul a Rom range. Bo kpo bung re, Ntul noko noa, no li Jisos.”
44017008	Eji ellong ane bao, a atubesi nfam wuku ano, ntim kehm jokko na jokko bo.
44017009	Bo kehm tongo Jeson, a ane bako re bo ba ka akpohko nkpaneka. Eji bo ma ka akpohko nyao, bo kehm yake bo.
44017010	Eji atv behde no, aneb Esowo bao kehm tumu Pol, a Sailas tv go Berea. Eji bo rehnge o, bo kehm sehnge tahm go etahk ero ji Jus.
44017011	Aneb Jus bao ba ga nob sehnge ane bao ba jolo go Tesalonaika. Bo ko alum Esowo nyao kak go bo a ntim, fere jo kak ekpuku, jo feede go nwer Esowo efung abehng abehng, joare lohko li ano.
44017012	Owo wahnge ane gbalee go bo ellong taame no. Go bo ellong o, aj'jok anebkal Grik tob woomo o semme aneblum.
44017013	Eji Jus ji jolo go Tesalonaika wuku re, Pol ebtob bung alum Esowo go Berea, bo kehm tob je o fvfo, song kehme ane nyare. Nfam kehm kehme eljokko na jokko.
44017014	Abon Esowo bao kehm soro tong Pol re á song go mbang nyio nyi agburu aya li no. Sailas, a Timoti, bo sa ona Berea.
44017015	Ane bao ba jo tv Pol, ko-e tete song rehng a ne go Atens. Bo ko elle goji Pol, ni jolo re, Sailas, a Timoti gulu eljeke song kpir-e. Bo kehm feere kehnge go Berea.
44017016	Eji Pol ji go Atens, jo sik Sailas, a Timoti, eltim rak-e sehng, tibre ejahbe jio alokelom tv sehng.
44017017	Á jo bungu a anebe Jus go bo etahk ero, fere jo bung a ane baka baka ba ki jol Jus, ba jo kak Esowo. Efung abehng abehng á jo je go are, jo song bung tong ane ba jo ba si are.
44017018	At'tibi bandiki ba jo toono eltibi ni Epikur, a at'tibi bako ba bo jo lung bo re Stoik, kehm tob song kpiri Pol. Ane bandiki kehm bungu re, “Jen ji á kp'b'bung o? Akpaale abuuru nyaa lohngo renan?” Ane bandiki re, “Li are á kp'bungu bade ajen eblom bi ane bamongo.” Tibre Pol jo bungu bada Jisos, a elnyahme ngubjing go elkv.
44017019	Bo kehm koko Pol tahm ane go edi ji bo jo lung re Areopagus, kehm-e tongo re, “E kp'sebe re wahr kahn eltibi nia ni nfenfe, ni a kp'bungu bade.
44017020	Nsol enya nyi a kp'tibi, nyindiki li-r nfenfe go egahre atung. E kp'sebe re wahr kahn ana nsol nyio lohngo lohng.”
44017021	Ane kpee ba lene go Atens, a ajenne fvfo jo rannge ngare ebo re bo jo wuk aka nfenfe nya nya, fere jo tub.
44017022	Pol jo yiimi go elka ane bao ba jo kono nkon go Areopagus, jo bung re, “Aneb Atens wahn, me n nyehn re, ń li ane ba kp'gare area re wahn sehng go mbang nyi Esowo.
44017023	Eji n jo sehng abake, n nyehne eblom bi ń kp'kake. N tob nyehne edi njom alimi ji bo nyono re, ‘Jia li ka Esowo bi e kil-e elkahne.’ Esowo bio bi ń kpo kak-e, bi ń kil-e elkahne, bi bi n yahk-n tong bada ne anv.
44017024	“Esowo bi limi njini, a nsol kpee nyi li no. Ye wo li ntul no elbung abola ndi. Á kpehme lene go ntahk ero nyi ane si no.
44017025	Esowo, ejum ajehng ajehng we kpehme rin ji nne bahk-e kake, tibre ye wo kpo ka ane elkpin, go nsol alehke, a ejum ajehng ajehng.
44017026	Go et'tohngo nne awohng no á lim-e no, owo ane ba li njini nyia kpee lohng no. Á limi bo re bo jol go njini nyia kpee. Eji á limi bo, á ka bo ngare ana nyi bo bahke kpini, fere bak bo adi ndi nya bo bahke jo lene,
44017027	eji bo l'seb Esowo. Fundiki bo bahk-e nyehne, eji bo kp-e sebe nkamme nkamme. Jol fee á limm go egahre.
44017028	Tib go ege esi wo wahnge, e li go elkpin, fere kp'jene tete sik anv. Li ana akahnkahn ane ebahne bandiki bungu no re, ‘Wahr lohng go ege et'tohngo.’
44017029	Eji wahr lohng go et'tohngo ji Esowo, wahr k'jo tir re, Esowo li go elfoongo ni agul, a ni asilva, a ni atal, a ni nsol nyi ane kpo lim abo, nyi lohng go bo a ntir atahng.
44017030	“Ngare nyio nyi ane ki liingi Esowo, Ntul Esowo kpooro na. Anv, yebtong nne awohng awohng go edi ajehng ajehng re á gbo ndon go ege abiafem.
44017031	Tibre yebkunu afung nya á bahke njini nyia kpee lam nob nob go nnyo mi nne no á ma yehke. Esowo eblennge jia ka nne awohng awohng, eji á nyahme nne noo go elkv.”
44017032	Eji bo wuku bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, egom jindiki kehm-e elnyoko. Egom jindiki re, “E bahke kpe wuk ana a bahke kpe bung efung bindiki.”
44017033	Owo Pol kehm soro lohng ekp'kpa nkon jio.
44017034	Egom ane bandiki t'taame toon-e. Nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Dionisius ji woomo go ellong ane ba jo kono nkon go Areopagus tob woomo go ellong ane ba taame no, a nnenkal awohng no bo jo lung-e re Damaris, a egom ane bandiki fvfo.
44018001	Owo Pol kehm tahme Atens, song rehng go Korint.
44018002	Owo á song mahnge nne a Jus awohng no bo jo lung-e re Akwila ji bo jel-e go Pontus. Ngare nyio á kp'na lohngo na lohng go Itali, a nkal ewe Priskilla ba. Tibre ntul a Klodius kame anebe Jus re bo tahm go Rom song. Pol kehm tahme song nyehn bo.
44018003	Á song jolo a bo, bo jo limi eltum edi ajehng. Tibre elkohn eltum n'nehm ni bo jo lim. Eltum ni bo jo lim, bo jo ko atapul, jo jamme kpee, ko jo si ntahk.
44018004	Efung Esabat abehng abehng Pol jo je go etahk ero ji Jus, jo song bung a ane, fere jo sennge Jus ntim, a Grik fvfo.
44018005	Eji Sailas, a Timoti lohngo go Masedonia ba kpiri Pol go Korint, Pol rodo ngare enye kpee kak go alum Esowo abungu, fere jo yiimi ntianse tong Jus re, Jisos wo li Kraist.
44018006	Eji bo jo ten alum enye, fere jo su-e, á kehm kumu ebtohko go ege ewobo, kehm faange bo re, “Joare wahn ebten, ebi jio bahke kuumu wahn, me sang. Bomo anv asongo, me n fi goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.”
44018007	Á kehm tahme eje song rehng go etahk nne no bo jo lung-e re Taitus Justus ji jo kak Esowo. Etahk eje jolo kohlo etahk ero ji Jus.
44018008	Krispus ji jolo ntubesi etahk ero ji Jus t'taame tv Ntul Esowo, a etahk etahk eje kpee. Ane gbalee ba lene go Korint, eji bo wuku etib bi Pol, bo t'taame, fere bel ewohngalahb.
44018009	Atv amehng Ntul Esowo kehm bungu a Pol go nkpokosi a mbang re, “Ka fahl! Jo bung, ka belle!
44018010	Tibre n li a na. Nnene limm, no bahke sahbe, lak-a ebo, fere lim-a ejum. Tibre ane ebame baa gbalee go ejahbe jia.”
44018011	Pol kange ona elya kunu nnyahng erakera, jo tib bo alum Esowo.
44018012	Ngare nyi Gallio jolo ntubesi go Akaya, nyi nyi aneb Jus na, bulu Pol, bob-e tahm a ne go ekp'kpa esub.
44018013	Bo kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana kpo sennge ane ntim re bo kak Esowo go mbang nyi kpo range atahm enyahre.”
44018014	Eji Pol tahme re á bung, Gallio kehm tongo Jus re, “Li re yebseb nfem, fere lim ebi, kehn elgbiingi enahne ni ń kp-m gbiingi me jolem kpene.
44018015	Eji li nfem nyi alum abungu, a abing, go atahm enyahne, limen antahng. Me n nehme seb re, me n lam alam nyaa.”
44018016	Á kehm kame bo re bo lohng ekp'kpa esub song.
44018017	Jus kehm soro bob Sostenes ji jolo ntubesi go bo etahk ero, fere dv-e go esamahr Gallio. Jol Gallio we lubem.
44018018	Pol kpe kang afung gbalee a abon Esowo go Korint, kehm tahme bo sa. Go Kenkrea Pol kehm soro kpud esi o, tibre á nyame ejum tong Esowo. Pol, bo kehm yele egbang, ye a Akwila, a Priskilla, jo tahm go Siria.
44018019	Bo kehm sehnge song rehng go Efesus. Pol kehm tahme Akwila, a Priskilla sa o, kehm song yel go ekp'kpa ero ji Jus, jo bung a bo.
44018020	Eji bo jo tong-e re á kpe kang a bo afung tvv, á t'ten.
44018021	Eji á jo tahm bo sa, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Esowo l'taame, m bahke feere egahne a.” A kehm kpe yel egbang o Efesus asongo.
44018022	Eji á song rehng go Sisaria, á kehm sehnge song rehng go Jerusalem, song kak aneb ero nnyo, kehm soro tahm go Antiok.
44018023	Eji á ma kang abon afung o, á kehm tahme, jo yannge edi ajehng ajehng go Galesa, a Frigia, jo kak abat'toono Jisos eltim.
44018024	Nne a Jus awohng no bo jo lung-e re Apollos ji bo jel-e go Aleksandria kehm bake go Efesus. Á jolo nne no sahb k'kahn nwer Esowo, fere jo mal elbungu.
44018025	Bo tib-e mbang nyi Ntul Esowo nob nob. Á jo bungu nsol nyi li bade Esowo eltim eltim ene, fere jo tib jang jang ana lohko jol, tvtv o á kahne ewohngalahb ji Jon ji ji.
44018026	Á jo bungu esahb esahb go etahk ero ji Jus. Eji Akwila, a Priskilla, bo wuk-e no eji á jo bung, bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne, kpe song tib-e mbang nyi Esowo budu.
44018027	Eji á sebe re á yel egbang tahm go Akaya, abon Esowo bao t'taame re á song. Bo kehm fere nyon nwer tv abat'toono Jisos bako go re, á l'rehng go, bo ko-e. Eji Apollos rehnge go, á jo kake abon Esowo ebo area, ba ma taame tib go nnoobo nyi Esowo.
44018028	Á jo bungu area, fere jo ga anebe Jus go elkab ane, eji á jo lennge nwer Esowo ka bo re, Jisos wo li Kraist.
44019001	Eji Apollos jolo go Korint, Pol kehm sehnge go alab ejahbe nya Esia, kehm song rehng go Efesus. Owo á ba nyehn abat'toono Jisos bandiki.
44019002	Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Eji ń tiki taame tv Esowo, wahn ebtiki bel Etingi Etohka?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E'ee, jol e ka wuk a wuk na re Etingi Etohko jia.”
44019003	Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Elkohn ewohngalahb aji ḿ bele no?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ewohngalahb ji Jon ji.”
44019004	Pol kehm bungu re, “Jon jo wohngo ane alahb ma egbokondon, fere jo tong bo re bo taame tv nne no kp'bake toon-e, no li Jisos.”
44019005	Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm tuungu bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Ntul a Jisos.
44019006	Pol kunu kan bo ebo, bo kehm soro bel Etingi Etohko, jo bung go ajahbe nfenfe, fere jo nyehn amahr.
44019007	Bo kpee jolo ejum ewubu aneblum abal.
44019008	Pol jo je go etahk ero ji Jus, jo song bung alum Esowo tong ane esahb esahb go nnyahng era. Á jo bungu bade etul bi Esowo, fere jo gare ana á bahke sennge bo ntim.
44019009	Ane bandiki jolo atahnsi ane, bo joom taame. Bo jo su na mbang nyi Esowo go esamahr ane kpee. Owo Pol kehm koko abat'toono Jisos tahm a bo, tahm atahnsi ane bao sa, fere jo tib ane efung abehng abehng go ekp'kpa ji Tirannus.
44019010	Á limi anaana nnya ebal tete Jus, a Grik kpee ji lene go Esia wuk alum nya Ntul a Jisos.
44019011	Esowo jo ko Pol, jo lim ajoobo akpokosi gbalee, nya kala l'lim.
44019012	Ane jo ko afiafong nya Pol bele no, a abomo enye, jo tahm a nya goji aneb ayam, bo jo nob ayam ebo, abi atohko fere jo lohng bo.
44019013	Jus jindiki ji jo yannge, jo kam ane abi atohko yehke, bo jo gare re bo lim nsol nyio go mbing nyi Ntul a Jisos. Bo jo bungu tong abi atohko nyao re, “N kp-n tongo go mbing nyi Jisos re wahn lohng, Jisos jio ji Pol kpo bung bada ne.”
44019014	Nne awohng jolo go no bo jo lung-e re Skiva ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Á bele abon ba nlum na asehma, ba jo lim nsol nyio.
44019015	Ebi etohko jio kehm faange bo re. “Jisos, n kp-e kahne. Pol, n kp-e kahne. Anv, wahn ane aba?”
44019016	Nne no bele ebi etohko jio kehm kehme elyebbe, jo nyede bo tv ndi, fere dv bo. Bo kehm soro be etahk jio, tahm ebo ebun ebun, a alok alok.
44019017	Jus kpee ji jolo go Efesus, a Grik kpee wuku kan nsol nyio, bo kehm kehme elfahle, bo ane kpee, fere jo tehk mbing nyi Jisos.
44019018	Aneb Esowo gbalee ba ma taame, kehm bake ba kehme elfvvrv, jo tooro nsol nyi bo ma lim.
44019019	Egom ane bandiki gbalee ba jo lim ntaane, kehm rodo awer ebo kpee, ba luk edi ajehng, jamme fi go esamahr ane kpee. Bo kehm gabe ekun ana bi bo ka go awer nyao, jolo ekpa akpohko atahl awubu.
44019020	Owo alum Esowo kehm kpe gbal, fere ny'nyab, fere tahne.
44019021	Eji nsol nyio ma sehng kpee, Pol kehm tiri re, á bahke sehnge go Masedonia rehng go Akaya, sehng song rehng go Jerusalem. Á kehm bungu re, “N l'je o, m bahke tob rehng go Rom.”
44019022	Á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe na abal, Timoti abola Erastus tv go Masedonia, yefono sa, kang abon afung ntiil ga Esia.
44019023	Ngare nyio nyi egburu ntong nyi nnen a nnen gbo go Efesus tib mbang nyi Esowo.
44019024	Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Demetrius. Á jolo nne etahl no jo ko asilva, jo tahl abontahk elom ba Artemis, jo gungu. Alokeltum ebe ba jolo a ne, jo limi akpohko sehng.
44019025	Á kehm lungu bo kpee, fere lung ane bako ba eltum ebo tob jol ana ni bo, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kp'kahne re, eltum nia ni kpi-r afang ka.
44019026	Anv, nde, ń kp'nyehne, fere jo wuk ana ji Pol kp'limi. Á kpo bung re, alokelom nya ane kp'rahme, fuumem re nne kak. Jol go Efesus wo wo sang, á ma sennge ane gbalee ntim, ka riki Esia kpee ji á ma sennge bo ntim.
44019027	N kp'fahle re, eltum enahre nia bahke bele ebi mbing. Etahk elom ejahre ji Artemis bahke tob jol mbol mbol. Jol egburu mbing enye nehm kpe lohng, elom jia ji nne awohng awohng go Esia kpo jom, a njini kpee.”
44019028	Eji ellong ane bao wuku ano, eltim kehm rake bo s'sehng. Bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Elom ejahre, Artemis ji aneb Efesus, ji ji li nj'jok elom!”
44019029	Ejahbe jio kpee kehm kehme eljokko na jokko. Bo kehm bobo Gayus abola Aristarkus, bo ji lohng go Masedonia, jo jen a Pol, tahm a bo go ekolo. Ane kehm kame song rur.
44019030	Pol jo sebe re á woomo go ellong ane bao. Abat'toono Jisos taamem.
44019031	Ane bandiki ba jolo atubesi ejahbe, ba jolo atem Pol, kehm tiingi etib tv-e re á k'lohng je go ekolo.
44019032	Egom ane bandiki jo rabe eje eje, egom jehko jo rabe eje eje. Nkon nyio jolo jokko jokko jokko. Ane tvv joom kahn es'si ji wahnge wahng bo je no, song kono edi ajehng.
44019033	Eji egom ane bandiki ba woomo go ellong nio nyehne Jus kp'tehme Aleksanda re á lohng song bung ka bo, bo kehm-e tohngo yehke re á lohng. Aleksanda kehm faake ebo ebe, tibre á jo sebe re á bung a ane bao, tahre Pol yake.
44019034	Bo kahne kan a re á jolo nne a Jus, bo kpee kehme elrabe nnyo nnyo amehng re, “Elom ejahre Artemis ji aneb Efesus, ji ji li nj'jok elom!” Bo rabe ano ano rehng awa na abal.
44019035	Es'kohro, nne no kpo nyon nsol nfam kehm male sahde bo ewok, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Aneb Efesus wahn, nne awohng awohng kp'kahne re, Efesus ji li ejahbe ji kpo kuuru etahk elom jia ji nj'jok Artemis, a mbarebare eltal ni lohngo go elbung gbo.
44019036	Nnene limm, no bahke ma faabe nsol nyia a. Jolen soom, kana lim ejum ajehng ajehng sohk sohk.
44019037	Jol ane baa ka v elom ejahre. Jol elom ejahre, bo ka su a su. Wahn ebko na ko ane baa, ba a bo.
44019038	“Demetrius, a alokeltum ebe, joare nne ebsoodo bo, afung elam nyaa, nya bo kpo lam alam. Atubesi ane baa. Go esamahr elam wo, fuumu re bo bung nfem nyia.
44019039	Joare ejum jindiki ji ń kp'sebe na, bo bahke lame elam jio go nkon nyi nfam kpo kono ngare anyehng anyehng.
44019040	N kp'fahle re, bo bahk-r ebi ka go nfem nyi e ma lim lela. Ejumjum limm, ji e bahke ma laange kunu, tib go nfem nyi e ma lim a.”
44019041	Eji á bungu ano mal, á kehm yaame ane bao.
44020001	Eji nfem nyio o ma mal, Pol kehm lungu abon Esowo, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kake kan bo eltim mal, á kehm tahme bo sa, tahm go Masedonia.
44020002	Eji á jo yannge ajahbe nyao, jo kak aneb Esowo eltim, fere jo bung alum gbalee, á kehm tahme go Gris.
44020003	Owo á kange nnyahng era. Á jo toobo ebjing bi á bahke tahme go Siria. Eji á sebe no kahn re, Jus kp'lame kak-e, owo á kehm toobo re, elfeere, á bahke sehnge mbang a Masedonia.
44020004	Owo Sopater mmon a Pirus ji lohng go Berea kehm tahme toon-e, a Aristarkus, go Sekundus, bo ji lohng go Tesalonaika, a Gayus ji lohng go Derbe, go Timoti, a Tikikus, a Trofimus, bo ji lohng go Esia.
44020005	Ane bao kpee kehm gboko mbang song ji go Troas, jo sik-r.
44020006	E yele egbang go Filipai, eji elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist ma sehng. Kange nfung elon, e kehm song rehng go Troas, song kpiri bo. Owo e kange nfung esehma.
44020007	Ngbokambang efung go erahde e kehm song kono asi edi ajehng re wahr bakke ebred. Pol kehm kehme elbungu a ane bao. Á bungu na bung bung bung tete nlum atv kul, tibre njahmfungfu wo, á toobo re á bahke tahme.
44020008	Bo nyaale at'rekahng gbalee bum go ero enyong, edi ji e kono no.
44020009	Njangkun anyehng nyi bo jo lung-e re Yutikus ji go eyake ewindu. Eji Pol kpi mbungu mbungu, á kehm lale kp'kpoodo kp'kpoodo. Eji á ma sahb l'lal, á kehm fooro go ero enyong song gbo ndi. Bo song rod-e ekpakv.
44020010	Pol kehm soro badde go ero enyong, song rehng go ndi, kehm song gbo konng-e, fere wall-e, kehm bungu re, “Kana kpe fahl, á kpeke li go elkpin.”
44020011	Pol kehm kpe feere song wahr go ero enyong, kehm bakke ebred, bo li. Á bungu a bo tetete efungfu se, á kehm soro tahm eje.
44020012	Nkpokosi nyia nyi kake bo eltim, eji bo rodo njangkun nyio kehnge a ne, á kpeke li go elkpin.
44020013	E yele go egbang song rehng go Assos, tibre owo e sebe re wahr song kak Pol go egbang, tib eji á tong-r re wahr lim ano, ye kp'sehnge egbuk egbuk song rehng go.
44020014	Eji á kpir-r go Assos, e kehm-e kake go egbang, song rehng go Mitilin,
44020015	kehm soro asi asongo. Etoono efung behko e sehng kohlo Kayos. Njahmfungfu nyehko e kehm song rehng go Semos. Etoono efung behko e soro rehng go Miletus.
44020016	Pol tiri re á sehng Efesus sa, eji á l'k'kpe rannge ngare go Esia. Tibre á jo foomo re á gulu elrehnge go Jerusalem, á l'mal, efung Pintikost kehm rehnge.
44020017	Go Miletus wo, Pol tiingi etib tv anebkul ero go Efesus re bo ba kpir-e o.
44020018	Eji bo ba no, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kp'kahne elkpin ni n jo lim ngare anyehng anyehng eji n jolo a nahne bomo gona ngbokambang efung bi n gbo mbang rehng go Esia,
44020019	ana n jolo rede rede, jo loko Ntul Esowo a abonngo abonngo go amahr, fere jo bel elgaare go nsol nyi Jus jo lam kak-m.
44020020	Ń kp'kahne re, ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji m behre no, ji li ji nno ka-n, eji n jo tib-n elkab ane, fere jo tib-n etahk ajehng ajehng.
44020021	N jo lennge tong Jus, fere tong Grik re bo gbo ndon go bo abiafem, feere goji Esowo, fere jo taame tv Ntul a Jisos Kraist.
44020022	“Anv a, n kp'tahme go Jerusalem, tibre Etingi Etohko ji ma-m mehl. N nehme kahn ji bahk-m limi go Jerusalem.
44020023	Ajehng ji n kp'kahne li re, go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji n sehnge no Etingi Etohko ji jo tong-m re, ngbekobo nyia go es'song kp-m siki, a erem.
44020024	Elkpin ename, ejum elkoko sang, lohngem ejumjum ka-m. Ji li no li re, me n gohro lim eltum ni Ntul a Jisos ka-m no mal, gohro be abahl enyame, fere tong ane alum nya nnoobo nyi Esowo.
44020025	Wahn ane kpee, n jo yannge go nlaaga anyehng anyehng enyahne, jo bung alum Esowo tong-n bade etul bi Esowo. Anv a, n kp'kahne re, me ń nehm kpe nyehn enyehnenyehne.
44020026	N kp'bungu go esamahr Esowo lela re, Nne awohng awohng ewahne no l'tan tib go ege abiafem, ebi ejame sang.
44020027	Ellum Esowo anehng anehng limm, ni m behr-n no. M ma-n tong kpee.
44020028	Baaben elnahne, a ejoro bi Esowo kpee, bi Etingi Etohko ma-n ka re wahn baabe. Leen abon Esowo ba Jisos ma gunu bo, ka alung eme.
44020029	N kp'kahne re, ngare nyi m ma tahm, abibbib enyam ana agabe bahke ba yel egahne ellong. Njoro anyehng anyehng limm, nyi bo bahk-e sehnge sa, k'gare re bo wul-e.
44020030	Ane bandiki ba bahke lohngo go egahne ellong. Bo bahke jolo akimfahnge at'tibi, fere jo gare re bo sennge abon Esowo ntim, bo fere jo toono bo.
44020031	Jo kunen ekpu! Buumen ana n jolo a nahne nnya era, jo rehke nne awohng awohng ewahne a abonngo go amahr atv a njul.
44020032	“Anv, m ma-n rod, kak Esowo go ebo, a alum enye nya kpo tib nnoobo enye, nya bahk-n ma lim, ń gbal, fere ka-n elfuulu ni Esowo ma kuuru bum ane ebe ba á ma ru ntim ebo.
44020033	N ka baare nne awohng awohng amahr re á ka-m akpohko, jol á ka-m abomo.
44020034	Wahnfono antahng kp'kahne re, abo enyame nyaa nya n kpo ko, jo lim eltum, kehm jo ting nsol alehke li, a ane ebame.
44020035	Go nsol nyia kpee nyi n jo lim, m ma-n tib ana nne bahke jo bade, jo lim eltum, jo kak ane ba kil tahne ebo. Buumen alum nya Jisos bungu no re, ‘Elfuulu ga li ka nne no kp'kake, sehnge nne no kp'koko.’ ”
44020036	Eji Pol ma bung alum nyaa kpee mal, á kehm jamme alahng a bo, kehm kehme ero kak.
44020037	Bo kpee kehm kehme ellingi, eji bo bingi Pol.
44020038	Bo bele erakatahng sehng go ekahmekahme ellum nio ni á bungu re, bo we nehm kpe nyehn enyehnenyehne. Bo kehm song tv-e, á yel go egbang.
44021001	E kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn jol o,” egbang kehm soro wob a nahre o, tete song rehng go Kos. Etoono efung behko e rehnge go Rodes. E kehm kpe sehng o, song rehng go Patara.
44021002	Owo e nyehne egbang bi jo tahm go Fenisa. E kehm soro yel tahm.
44021003	Eji e nyehne Saiprus go ejang ebobkal, e kehm maake song rehng go Siria. Go Taya wo, e yiimi no, tibre owo bo raade nsol are go egbang.
44021004	E nyehne abat'toono Jisos ona, kehm kange a bo nfung esehma. Go nsahm nyi Etingi Etohko nyi bo tongo Pol re á k'je go Jerusalem.
44021005	Eji afung enyahre biingi no, e kehm soro tahm, soro asi go egahre eljen asongo. Bo kehm bake ba tv-r go esi mbang, a akal ebo, a abon abon ebo. Eji e rehnge go nkpe agburu aya, e kehm jamme alahng, kehme ero kak.
44021006	E kehm soro kak atemtem nnyo, kehm song yel egbang. Bo soro yaame ebo kehnge.
44021007	E kehm kpe soro asi go Taya asongo, kehm song rehng go Ptolemais. Owo e song kak aneb Esowo nnyo, jol a bo efung kohro kohro.
44021008	Njahmfungfu e kehm tahme song rehng go Sisaria. Owo e song rehng etahk Filip ji jolo mbungalum Esowo, kehm jolo a ne. Á jolo nne no woomo go ellong ane asehma ba bo yehke bo go Jerusalem.
44021009	Á bele abon ba nkal na ani, ba kala bal alum. Bo jo nyehne amahr nya Esowo.
44021010	Eji e ma kang abon afung ntiil ona, nnyehnamahr no bo jo lung-e re Agabus kehm lohngo go Judea ba.
44021011	Eji á ba no, ba rehng egahre, á kehm rodo egbaange ji Pol, gbade elne abo, a akpade, kehm bungu re, “Ejum ji ana, ji Etingi Etohko ma bung re, ‘Ana wo Jus ji li go Jerusalem bahke gbake nfono egbaange noa, rod-e kak ane baka baka go ebo.’ ”
44021012	Eji e wuku ano, wahr, a ane bako ba jolo o, kehm kehme Pol gboongo re á k'je go Jerusalem.
44021013	Pol kehm faange re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp'lingi ana, jo lim eltim jo maang-m! Me n toobo ebjing kpee, jol afi ngbekobo nyi, jol afi elkv ni m bahke kpoko go Jerusalem tib go esi ji Jisos.”
44021014	E kpe-e tahre re á k'je, á ten. Owo e kehm soro yak-e abo, kehm bungu re, “Nong, mbang Esowo lim, ana kor-e no.”
44021015	Owo e kehm toobo ebjing, tahm go Jerusalem.
44021016	Abat'toono Jisos bandiki ba jolo go Sisaria t'tahm toon-r, fere ko-r, song rehng go etahk Mneson ji jolo nne a Saiprus, ye ji bomo eltoono Jisos wuku wuku. Go ege wo, e song jol.
44021017	Eji e song rehng go Jerusalem, aneb Esowo bao gbaam-r sehng go eyebatahng.
44021018	Etoono efung behko Pol kehm tahme a nahre re wahr song nyehn Jems. Anebkul ero kpee jolo ona.
44021019	Pol kehm kake bo nnyo, kehm fere tooro ajehng ajehng ana ji Esowo ka-e re á lim ka ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.
44021020	Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk, kehm bungu tong Pol re, “Egban, a kp'nyehne re, anebe Jus atahl nku a nku ba ma taame. Bo kpeke li ane ba kp'sahb b'bum atahm.
44021021	Bobtooro gana re, a kp'tibi Jus kpee ji lene go ajahbe nyandiki re, bo yake atahm nya Moses, k'kpe yehke abon ebo nrur, k'kpe lim eljini ni Jus.
44021022	Jen ji e bahke limi anv a? Bo bahke tiki seb kahn re, wobrehng a.
44021023	“Anv, lim ana ji e bahk-a tongo. E kpi ane ani a, ba ma nyam enyam tong Esowo.
44021024	Song toono ane bao, wahn song bum elnahne saang, wo fere kpi akpohko go bo esi, eji bo l'mal kpud ebsi ebo. Owo nne awohng awohng bahke kehm kahne re, nyao kpee nya bo bungu bada na etingitingi sang, fere kahn re, a kp'lohko bum atahm nya Moses.
44021025	Bade ane baka baka ba ma taame tv Esowo, wahr ebtum nwer tv bo, ana e ma toobo re, bo k'jo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang, bo k'jo li alung, bo k'jo li nnyam nyi bo kahn-e ekehd, á kpo, bo jo jahng as'sa.”
44021026	Pol kehm soro ko ane bao. Etoono efung behko, bo kehm bumu elbo saang, kehm tahme go etahk Esowo, eji bo l'tong bo afung ana nya bahke kange, elbumu elbo saang nio kehm male. Ngare nyio wo, bo bahke limi njom tib esi ji Pol, a ji ane bako.
44021027	Eji nfung esehma nyio yahke biingi, anebe Jus bandiki ba lohng go Esia ba, kehm ba nyehn Pol go etahk Esowo. Bo kehm soro nyare ellong ane re, bo song bob Pol. Bo kehm-e soro bob.
44021028	Bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Israel wahn, kaken ebo! Á wo li nne no kp'yannge edi ajehng ajehng, jo tib nne awohng awohng, fere jo bung tob anebe Israel, a atahm nya Moses, a etahk Esowo jia. Yebgohro ko aneb Grik ba kak go etahk Esowo jia, fili edi jia kp'rannge.”
44021029	Tibre bo tohko nyehn Trofimus ji lohng go Efesus go nla ejahbe a Pol. Owo wahnge bo kehm tiri re, Pol m-e ko ba kak go etahk Esowo.
44021030	Edi kehm kehme eljokko na jokko, ane kehm fere kam song rur edi ajehng, kehm bobo Pol, tohng-e yehke go etahk Esowo. Tvtv ona bo kehm soro bam abutahk nya etahk Esowo.
44021031	Eji bo jo gare ana bo bahke wulu Pol, nne kehm tahme song tooro tong ntubesi a nsoja nyi Rom re, “Ga Jerusalem edi kp'jokko area.”
44021032	Ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm soro ko atubesi nsoja, a nsoja nyindiki gbalee, tahm a bo. Eji Jus nyehne ntubesi, a nsoja enye kp'foomo abake, bo kehm rahke Pol go eldohko.
44021033	Ntubesi a nsoja kehm bake, a nsoja enya, ba tong bo re, bo bob Pol, kak-e agbekobo abal. Á kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ye nne awoo! Jen ji á ma lim?”
44021034	Egom jindiki jo rabe eje eje, egom jehko jo rabe ebo ebo. Eji ntubesi noo ki kahn ejum ji ma gb'gbo tib go eljokko no bo jo jokko edi, á kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol song a ne go bo ebud.
44021035	Eji bo ba rehng mbuga, nsoja nyio kehm mehle Pol, sol, tibre ellong ane bao jo gbiingi bo sehng.
44021036	Bo jo jene a bo bad bad, jo rabe re, “Wulen na ye!”
44021037	Eji nsoja yahke rehng a Pol go bo ebud, Pol kehm tongo ntubesi noo re, “N kp'sebe re me m bung a na.” Ntubesi kehm bahbe re, “Anv, a kpo m'ma bung Grika?
44021038	Wo nne a Ijipt sanga, no bomo ebta anoko a nahre nyanjehla, no jake akpuuru ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu, ba fili nsol ebta, song biiri go elka emahnga?”
44021039	Pol kehm faange re, “Ee, me nne a Jus wo. N li nne a Tarsus ji li go Silisia. N li nfono ejahbe no lohng go egburu ejahbe, titi, nong me n tohko bung a ane bao.”
44021040	Ntubesi noo kehm taame. Pol kehm yiimi go mbuga, kehm faake ebo ebe. Bo kehm naange kp'tii, are alahb ma. Pol kehm bungu go alum Hibru re,
44022001	“Babnsoo, abonanee, ane ebame wahn, wuungen atung, eji n yahke lennge elname ka-n.”
44022002	Eji bo wuk-e no, á kp'bungu go alum Hibru, bo kehm sahb n'naange kp'tii. Pol kehm bungu re,
44022003	“Me nne a Jus wo. Bo jel-m go Tarsus ji Silisia. Bo ko-m ntiil ntiil, ba a name go Jerusalem. Gamaliel wo jolo nt'tibi ewame. Bo tib-m tib atahm nya babnso ejahre nseenga nseenga. N rod elname kpee nob nob ka Esowo jang jang ana wahn ji li a lela.
44022004	N jo nohko ane ba jo toono mbang nyi Jisos. N jo bobo aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, jo kak bo afarebok, tum bo ngbekobo, egom jindiki n jo wul na bo.
44022005	Ntubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam, bo kpee kp'kahne re, n kp'bungu etingitingi. Bo jo ka-m awer re me n song ka aneb Jus ebahre ba li go Damaskus. N kehm jeke re me n song bob ane ba Jisos ba jolo o, kak bo afarebok, feere a bo go Jerusalem, eji bo l'kak bo erem.
44022006	“Eji e ma tahm asongo, yahke ba elrehnge go Damaskus, ngare nyio jolo ngare efin, n kehm nyehne egburu ellennge ni lohngo go elbung, ya tub-m.
44022007	“N kehm fooro gbo ndi, kehm wuku ellum ni bungu re, ‘Sol, Sol, jen ji wahng ka a kp-m nohko anae?’
44022008	“N kehm faange re, ‘Wo nne awo, Ntul?’ “Á kehm bungu tong-m re, ‘Me Jisos ji Nasaret wo, ji a kp'nohko.’
44022009	“Ane ba jene a name nyehne ellennge ellennge. Bo wukem ellum ni nne noo jo bung a name.
44022010	N kehm-e soro bahb re, ‘Jen ji m bahke limi, Ntul?’ “Ntul a Jisos kehm-m tongo re, ‘Tahm, wo song go Damaskus. Owo bo bahk-a tongo ejum ajehng ajehng ji Esowo ma toobo bum-a re wo lim.’
44022011	“Eji amahr wa-m no tib go egburu ellennge ni n nyehne no, ane ba jene a name kehm-m jabbe go ebo, rehng a name go Damaskus.
44022012	“Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas. Á jo fahle Esowo, fere jo bum atahm enyahre. Jus kpee ji lene go Damaskus jo kak-e sehng.
44022013	Á kehm bake go egame, ba yiimi kohl-m, kehm bungu re, ‘Egban Sol, kpe nyehn!’ “Tvtv ona amahr enyame kehm soro lennge n kehm-e nyehne.
44022014	“Ananayas kehm bungu re, ‘Esowo bi babnso ejahre ma-a yehke re wo kahn mbang enye, fere nyehn Etingitingi Nne ewe, fere wuk alum enye go ege a nnyo antahng.
44022015	Tibre wo bahke jolo ntianse enye, fere tong nne awohng awohng nsol nyi a ma nyehn, fere w'wuk.
44022016	Anv, jen ji wahnge a kp'kpeke laange? Tahm, wo bel ewohngalahb, fere gboong-e go ege a mbing, eji á l'ru eltim abiafem ena.’
44022017	“Eji n feere go Jerusalem, n song kehme ero kak go etahk Esowo, n kehm nyehne nkpokosi.
44022018	Nkpokosi nyi n nyehne no, n nyehne Ntul a Jisos kp'bungu a name re, ‘Foomo elwaare, wo tahm a Jerusalem. Tibre ane ba li a, nehm taame tv ntianse ny'nya, nyi a bahke yiimi ka-m.’
44022019	“N kehm faange re, ‘Ntul, bofono antahng kp'kahne re, n jo je go etahk ero ajehng ajehng, jo song bob ane ba kp'taame tv-a, jo dv bo, fere kak bo ngbekobo.
44022020	Eji bo wulu Stiven, nne a ntianse ewa, mefono antahng tob jolo o. N t'taame, eji bo wul-e no, fere jo baabe abomo nya ane ba wul-e no.’
44022021	“Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-m re, ‘Song, m bahk-a tumu fee goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.’ ”
44022022	Bo wuung-e atung tete rehng alum nyao. Bo kehm kehme elrabe wahre wahre re, “Tahmen a ne, wahn song wul-e! Kpeem fuumu re, elkohn nne ana noa kpe jol go elkpin!”
44022023	Bo jo rabe wahre wahre wahre, jo fokko abomo, fere jo kpu at'to, jo saade tv go ero.
44022024	Ntubesi nsoja kehm tongo nsoja enye re bo ko Pol song a ne go ebud, song dv-e, eji bo l'seb kahn ji wahnge Jus kp'r'rabe ano tob-e.
44022025	Eji bo m-e gba alehke re bo dv-e, Pol kehm bungu tong mmontubesi a nsoja noko no yiimi kohl-e re, “Anv, f'fuumu re, wahn dv nne a Rom, eji bo kala kahn ejum ji á limi noa!”
44022026	Mmontubesi noo wuku kan ano me, á kehm tahme goji ntubesi no nnen, kehm song tong-e re, “Jen ji a yahke lim? Nne noa ana, nne a Rom wo.”
44022027	Ntubesi noo kehm bake goji Pol, kehm ba bahb-e re, “Tong-m anv, a lohko li nne a Roma?” Pol kehm taame.
44022028	Ntubesi noo kehm faange re, “Re me n kehm jolo nne a Rom, n ka akpohko gbalee.” Pol kehm bungu re, “Bo jel-m ana nne a Rom.”
44022029	Tvtv ona ane bao ba ba re bo ba bahb Pol abahbe, kehm soro jeere, fere njahm. Ntubesi noo kehm kehme elfahle, eji á sebe kahn re, Pol jolo nne a Rom, tibre á m-e gba alehke.
44022030	Ntubesi noo jo sebe re, á kahn etingitingi, ana ji wahnge Jus ka Pol ebi. Etoono efung behko á kehm tongo atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kpee re bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kehm yehke Pol agbekobo, ko-e ba yiimi go esamahr ane bao kpee.
44023001	Pol kehm seenge ellong ane bao too, fere kehme elbungu re, “Abonanee, atahng ala enyame kp'bare saang go esamahr Esowo, bomo wuku wuku tete sik anv.”
44023002	Ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas kehm tongo ane bao ba yiimi kohlo Pol re bo rum-e go nnyo.
44023003	Pol kehm bungu tong-e re, “Esowo bahke tob rum-a, wo jia ji li ana ekahme ji bo taame efem. A jehk ana re wo lam-m ana ntahm bungu no, wobfere gbo ntahm, eji a tongo re, bo rum-m.”
44023004	Ane ba yiimi kohlo Pol kehm bungu re, “A kp'suku ntubesi abalimajom no Esowo!”
44023005	Pol kehm faange re, “Abonanee, n kahnem re, ye wo li ntubesi abalimajom. Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re, nne k'jo bung ebi tob ntubesi ejahbe ewe.”
44023006	Eji Pol sebe no kahn re, egom jindiki jolo Sadusis, egom jehko Farisis, á kehm soro bung wahre wahre tong ane bao re, “Abonanee, me nne a Farisi wo, babnsoo, Farisis ba. N yim esamahr elam a, tib eji n kp'taame re, akvne bahke nyahme go elkv.”
44023007	Pol bungu kan ano mal, Farisis, a Sadusis kehm kehme eltaange, nkon kehm yabe, jol ejang ebbal.
44023008	Tibre Sadusis jo bungu re, “Elnyahme ngubjing go elkv limm, jol enjel limm, jol atohko limm.” Farisis jo t'taame tv nsol nyio kpee.
44023009	Edi kehm kehme elwahle. At'tibi ba atahm bandiki ba woomo ellong Farisi kehm mehle yiimi, kehm kehme eltaange a Sadusis re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng e ka nyehn ji nne noa ma lim. Ma etohko ji ma bung a ne nji, ma enjel nyi nji.”
44023010	Nfaabe kehm kpe gbal, are yahke gbo abohng. Owo ntubesi kehm kehme elfahle re, fundiki bo bahke tohngo Pol yare. Á kehm tongo nsoja enye re, “Badden song, wahn song yehke Pol go ellong ane bao, song a ne go ebud.”
44023011	Etoono atv mako, Ntul a Jisos kehm lohngo ba yiimi kohlo Pol, kehm bungu re, “Bob eltim! Wobyiimi ntianse ka-m go Jerusalem. A bahke tob kpe yiimi ntianse go Rom fvfo.”
44023012	Etoono efungfu behko Jus kehm song kono edi ajehng, jo lam kak Pol, fere nyam t'tahne re, bo tohko tiki wul Pol, bo nehm li nsol, jol alahb bo nehm wo.
44023013	Ane bao ba lame no, bo jolo ejum ane atahl abal k'kunu.
44023014	Bo kehm jeke goji atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam, kehm song tong bo re, “Wahr ebnyam t'tahne re, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng e nehm li, tete e wul Pol.
44023015	Anv, nobo re wahn, a abalamalam, wahn tiingi tv ntubesi a nsoja no nnen re á ko Pol ba a ne. Limen awak, wahn tong-e re, ń kp'sebe re, wahn kpe lennge elam eje. E bahk-e wulu go mbang. E nehm taame, á rehng ga.”
44023016	Mmon no mmonannyehn Pol no nkal wuku kan ana bo lame no, á kehm tahme song rehng go ebud, kehm song tong Pol.
44023017	Pol kehm lungu ntubesi a nsoja awohng, kehm-e tongo re, “Ko mmonse noa, song a ne goji ntubesi a nsoja no nnen, tibre á kpi ejum ji á bahk-e tongo.”
44023018	Owo á kehm-e koko tahm a ne goji ntubesi no nnen, kehm song tong-e re, “Pol nne a ngbekobo, ye wo lung-m no, fere tong-m re, me n ko mmonse noa ba a ne go ega, tibre á kpi ejum ji á bahk-a tongo.”
44023019	Ntubesi noo no nnen kehm jabbe mmonse noo go ebo, tahm a ne go nkpohko, edi ji nnene l'k'wuk. Owo á kehm-e bahbe re, “Ejum aji a yahk-m tong!”
44023020	Mmonse noo kehm bungu re, “Jus ebtoobo re, bo ba bahb-a re, wo ko Pol je a ne behna go elam. Bo kp'limi awak re bo kp'sebe re bo kpe lennge elam eje.
44023021	Ka taame tv bo! Tibre ane baa, ba ma biiri go ekane kpi Pol sik. Bo li ane atahl abal k'kunu. Bobnyam t'tahne re, bo tohko tiki wul Pol, ejumjum bo nehm tiki li, jol alahb bo nehm wo. Anv, bobtoobo ebjing kp'siki re wo lim ana bo bahk-a bahbe.”
44023022	Ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm bungu re, “Ka tong nne awohng awohng ji a ma-m tong a!” Á kehm-e tongo re á song.
44023023	Ntubesi noo no nnen kehm lungu atubesi bako ba nse, ane na abal, kehm tongo bo re, “Yehken nsoja atahl awubu, bo toobo ebjing tahm go Sisaria nkaranka esehmwubu nyi atv, wahn tob yehke ane atahl ara ane awubu ba bahke kuumu go any'nya, a ane atahl awubu ba bahke fili nkong.
44023024	Tooben any'nya nyandiki, wahn bum Pol kuumu, wahn ko-e song rehng a ne goji ntul a Feliks, ejumjum ki-e lim go mbang.”
44023025	Ntubesi a nsoja noo no nnen kehm nyono nwer nyi bungu re,
44023026	“Me Klodius Lisias, Feliks ntul ewame, m ma-a kak nnyo.
44023027	Jus bobo nne noa, bo jol-e wulu. N sebe kahn re, á jolo nne a Rom, n k'ko nsoja enyame song tahr-e.
44023028	Eji n sebe re me n kahn ji wahnge bo jo ka-e ebi, n kehm-e koko je a ne go bo elam.
44023029	N sebe kahn re, bo jo ka-e ebi tib go esi atahm ebo. Eb'bi ajehng ajehng á limem ji fuumu re bo wul-e, jol bo kak-e ngbekobo.
44023030	Eji bo lennge no ka-m re, Jus kp'lame kak-e, owo n kehm-e soro tum tv-a. N tongo ane ba jo ka-e ebi re, bo ba tooro tong-a ji wahnge bo kp-e kake ebi.”
44023031	Nsoja nyio kehm soro ko Pol, tahm a ne go Antipatris atv, ana ntubesi tongo bo.
44023032	Eji efungfu se no, nsoja nyehka kehm feere ga ebud. Nsoja nyi kuumu any'nya soro asi asongo a Pol.
44023033	Eji bo song rehng go Sisaria, bo kehm koko nwer nyio song ka ntul a Feliks, kehm-e soro tib Pol.
44023034	Eji ntul noo ma lung nwer nyio kpee, á kehm bahbe Pol ejahbe ji á lohng no. Á kahne kan a re, á lohng go Silisia,
44023035	á kehm bungu tong-e re, “M bahke wuku elam eja nob nob ngare nyi ane ba kp-a kake ebi ma ba.” Á kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol song kak-e go etahk ji ntul a Herod, fere jo baab-e.
44024001	Eji ma kang nfung elon, ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas kehm bake go Sisaria, a anebkul nfam bandiki, go nne no jo kahn atahm kpee, no bo jo lung-e re Tertullus. Bo kehm tahme song kpiri ntul a Feliks, kehm kehme Pol tooro tong ntul.
44024002	Eji bo ma lung Pol, á ma ba, owo Tertullus kehm kehme Pol ebi ka, kehm bungu re, “Nj'joka ntul ewahre Feliks, elkahne ena ni a kp-r male elfili ebko elkoono gbalee ba ka-r. Wo wo ma kehme ejahbe ejahre tuungu, owo wahnge ejahbe ejahre ma kehme elnobo.
44024003	Kpee nsol nyi a ma kehme ellimi go edi ajehng ajehng kp-r atahng yebe tob-a sehng, e kp-a kake saam.
44024004	Anv, me n nehme kpe seb re me n kpe rannge ngare enya. N kp-a gboongo re, lub kor-a, wo tohk-r wuungu atung ntiil.
44024005	“Wahr ebseb kahn re, nne noa nsebantong a nne wo. Á li nkakanyooda nne no kpo jen ejang njini abehng abehng bi Jus li no, jo seb afem. Ye wo li ntubesi go ellong ane ba bo kpo lung bo re Nasarin.
44024006	Á gare re á rannge etahk Esowo, k'kpe jol saang, e kehm soro bob-e. E jol-e lame ana ntahm enyahre bungu no.
44024007	Ntubesi a nsoja no bo kpo lung-e re Lisias, a ane ebe kehm bake ba taar-r ye go eko tahm a ne.
44024008	Lisias kehm tongo re, ane ba kp-e kake ebi, bo ba go ega. A l'bahb nne noo abahbe, owo a bahke kehm kahne ejum ajehng ajehng antahng ji wahnge e kp-e ebi ka.”
44024009	Jus kehm taame kpee re, “Ebi ji e kp-e kake a, lohko li ano.”
44024010	Ntul noo kehm soro mahk Pol re á bung. Pol kehm soro faange re, “N kp'kahne re, woblam ejahbe jia go nnya tvv. Eltim kp-m yebe sehng re me n lennge elname ka-a.
44024011	A li ma seb antahng kahn, tibre ka sehng ewubu a nfung ebal nyi n je go Jerusalem re me n song kak Esowo.
44024012	Jus me nyehnem ana n jo lim nfaabe a nne awohng awohng, fere jo tong ane re bo song seb nfem go etahk Esowo, jol go ntahk ero, jol go nfam.
44024013	Bo nehm ma tib ekahmekahme ejum ji wahnge bo kp-m kake ebi.
44024014	Ejum jia a, ji n kp-a tongo, n kp-a tongo gbul gbul gbuul re, n kp'kake Esowo bi babnso ejahre, eji n kp'toono mbang nyi ane bao ba bo kp'suku bo re, mmollong abvvrv ane. N kpo taame tv ejum ajehng ajehng ji atahm nya Moses bungu no, fere taame tv alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no.
44024015	Ekunukpu ji n kpi no, j'nehm ji bo tob kpi, ji li re, Esowo bahke nyahme ane kpee go elkv, anoobo ane, a abi ane.
44024016	N kpo nok mbang anyehng anyehng re, atahng ala enyame jol saang go esamahr bi Esowo, a bi ane.
44024017	“Eji m ma kang nnya tvv go adi nyandiki, n kehm feere go Jerusalem, ba ka ane ebame akpohko, fere lim njom ka Esowo.
44024018	Eji n jo lim ano, bo kehm ba kpir-m go etahk Esowo, eji m ma bum elname saang. Ellong ane jolem a name, nfem anyehng anyehng jolem.
44024019	Jus jindiki ji lohngo go Esia jolo o. Bo ba fuumu re bo ba go ega esamahr ba ka-m ebi, joare n li go nfem a bo.
44024020	Eji ane bao ki li, nong, ane baa tooro ebi ji bo nyehn-m, n limi no, eji n yiimi go bo esamahr elam,
44024021	sehngem ejum na ajehng jia ji m bungu no, eji n yiimi go bo esamahr. Tib go esi jio ji elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ji ji wahnge lela n wob esub a.”
44024022	Feliks ji kahne mbang nyi Jisos nob nob, kehm bulu elam jio, kehm bungu re, “Lisias ntubesi a nsoja l'ba, owo m bahke elam ejahne lam, fere kimi.”
44024023	Á kehm tongo ntubesi a nsoja noko re á baabe Pol. Á jo ka Pol eyake, jo taame ate ebe jo ba nyehn-e, fere ka-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji l'rin-e.
44024024	Eji ma kang abon afung ntiil, Feliks kehm koko nkal ewe ba a ne, no jolo nne a Jus. Mbing enye, bo jo lung-e re Drusilla. Feliks kehm tumu tv Pol re á ba, ba tong-e bada mbang nyi Jisos Kraist.
44024025	Eji Pol kehme elbungu bade ana nne bahke lehke eno go esamahr Esowo, fere bung bade ana nne bahke jo bob elne, a elam ji kp'bake go es'song, Feliks, ala kehm-e teele. Á kehm faange re, “A li ma song anv. N l'bel eyake, m bahk-a kpe lung.”
44024026	Á jo tiri re, Pol bahk-e kake ngu. Esi jio ji wahnge á jo lung-e ngare anyehng anyehng, bo jo tub aka.
44024027	Eji ma kang nnya ebal, Porsius Festus kehm koko nji etul nyi Feliks. Feliks jo sebe re á lim nnoobo ka Jus, owo eji á tahme no, á tahme Pol sa go ngbekobo.
44025001	Eji Festus ma ba go ejahbe ji á bahke fili, eji ma kang nfung era, á kehm tahme go Sisaria, sehng song rehng go Jerusalem.
44025002	Atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi Jus kehm tooro Pol tong-e, fere gboong-e re,
44025003	á lim bo nnoobo, ko Pol ba a ne go Jerusalem. Tibre bobtohko lam wuku wuku re bo biiri go mbang wul-e.
44025004	Festus kehm faange re, “Pol noa, kpeke wob ngbekobo go Sisaria. N kp'sebe re me n gulu eljeke ona.
44025005	Nong, atubesi ejahbe ejahne toon-m song rehng go Sisaria, song ka-e ebi, joare yeblim ebi ajehng ajehng.”
44025006	Festus kehm kange a bo ejum nfung enehkeni, fundiki nfung ewubu, kehm soro tahm song rehng go Sisaria. Etoono efung behko á kehm jehke go ege a nji elam, kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol ba a ne.
44025007	Eji Pol ba no, Jus ji lohng go Jerusalem ba, kehm ba yiimi sennge Pol kak, jo kpu agburu afem tvv kun-e. Bo tikem ma tib ekahmekahme ejum.
44025008	Pol kehm kehme eltooro re á yehke elne. Á bungu re, “Atahm nya Jus n gboom. Etahk Esowo n soodem, jol ntul a Rom we n soodem.”
44025009	Festus jo sebe re á lim nnoobo ka Jus. Owo wahnge á kehm bahbe Pol re, “Anv, a kp'sebe re, wo je go Jerusalem, bo kpe lam elam eja go egame esamahra?”
44025010	Pol kehm faange re, “Anv, n yim go esamahr eti elam ji ntul a Rom. A wo nobo re bo lam-m. Wofono antahng kp'kahne re, ebi ajehng ajehng limm, ji n limi Jus.
44025011	Joare me n gbo ntahm, fere lim eb'bi ajehng ajehng ji fuumu re bo wul-m, n nehme seb re me n for go elkv nio. L'fere jol re bo kp-m ebi ka mbol mbol, eji n ki lim ejumjum, nnene limm, no bahk-m ma rod kak bo go abo. N kp'sebe re me n lennge elam ejame tv goji ntul a Rom.”
44025012	Festus kehm toobo a abalamalam ebe, kehm faange re, “Woblennge elam eja tv go Rom. Go wo a bahke jeke goji ntul a Rom.”
44025013	Kange kan abon afung ntiil, ntul Agrippa, a Bernis kehm bake go Sisaria re bo ba kak ntul a Festus nnyo.
44025014	Eji bo ma kang abon afung ntiil o, Festus kehm jo lennge elam ji Pol ka bo re, “Nne awohng li ana, no Feliks tahm-e no sa go ngbekobo.
44025015	Eji n jolo go Jerusalem atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul Jus jo tong-m bada ne, fere tong-m re me n kimi ebi ka-e.
44025016	N kehm faange bo re, ‘Eljini enahre, wahr anebe Rom, e kpehme ka na ka nne ebi, sehngem re nne noo tohko kpiri ane bao ba ko nfem kun-e, fere bel eyake ji á bungu, yehke elne.’
44025017	Eji bo ba no, n laangem nkpel anyehng anyehng. Etoono efung behko n kehm soro ji go eti elam, kehm tongo re bo ko Pol ba a ne.
44025018	“Eji ane ba jo ka-e ebi mehle no yiimi, jo tooro, n wukem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ana n tiri no.
44025019	Jolo na jol nfaabe alimi nyi nyi bada mbang nyi bo kp'kake Esowo, a elkohn nne awohng no kpo no, no bo jo lung-e re Jisos, ji Pol jo bung re á kpeke li go elkpin.
44025020	N joom kahn ana m bahke l'lim, kehm kahne nsol nyio o. Owo n kehm bahbe Pol re, joare á bahke jeke go Jerusalem, kpe song lennge elam eje go.
44025021	Pol jo sebe re á lennge elam eje tv goji ntul a Rom. Á fere tong re, bo nong-e, á sa woomo go ngbekobo. Owo n kehm tongo re, bo jo baab-e tete me n tum-e tv goji ntul a Rom.”
44025022	Ntul Agrippa kehm bungu tong Festus re, “Kor-m kor re, me n tob wuk-e go ege a nnyo antahng.” Festus kehm faange re, “Behna wo, a bahk-e wuku.”
44025023	Etoono efung behko Agrippa abola Bernis kehm bake a egburu ellub, sehng song yel go ekp'kpa esub, go atubesi nsoja, a atubesi nfam. Festus kehm tumu ane re bo song ko Pol ba a ne.
44025024	Festus kehm bungu re, “Ntul Agrippa, a ane bako wahn, nyehnen nne no Jus kpee ji li a, a ji li go Jerusalem jo gbiing-m, fere jo rabe re, á kpeem fuumu re á jol go elkpin.
44025025	Ji n sebe no kahn li re, ejumjum á limem ji fuumu re bo wul-e. Ana yefono tongo re, á bahke lennge elam eje tv go Rom, n kehm taame re, m bahk-e tumu tv goji ntul a Rom.
44025026	N nehme kahn akahmekahme alum nya m bahke ny'nyon go nwer tum tv ntul a Rom. Owo wahng ka m m-e ko ba a ne go egahne esamahr, asehngesehnge wo ntul Agrippa. Ngare nyi e l'bahb-e abahbe kpee, owo fundiki m bahke bele ejum ji m bahke nyono.
44025027	Egame, n kp'tiri re, nobem re nne tum nne a ngbekobo tv, eji á ki lennge ebi ji bo m-e ka.”
44026001	Ntul Agrippa kehm bungu tong Pol re, “Anv, a li ma bung yehke elna.” Pol kehm soro tanne ebo ebe, kehm kehme elbungu re á yehke elne. Á bungu re,
44026002	“Ntul Agrippa, n kp'tiri re esi ma-m nob lela, eji m ma bel eyake ji m bahke bungu yehke elname go ega esamahr bada nsol nyi Jus kp-m kake ebi.
44026003	Tibre a kp'kahne eljini ni Jus, a afemfem ebo kpee. Owo wahng ka n kp-a gboongo re wo lub wuung-m atung.
44026004	“Jus kpee kp'kahne eljini ename, bomo ngare nyi n jolo ntiil. Tibre n jo kono eljolo a ane ebame go Jerusalem.
44026005	Bo kp'kahne go wuku wuku re, n jo limi eljini ni Farisis ji jo sahb b'bum atahm enyahre, joare bo kp'sebe re bo yiimi ntianse go nsol nyio.
44026006	“Anv, n yim eti elam jia, tibre n kp'kunu ekpu go nsol nyi Esowo nyame no tong babnso ejahre,
44026007	nsol nyio nyi ane ebahre, ewubu et'tohngo ebbal, jo kunu ekpu re bo bahke bele, eji bo kp'kake Esowo atv a njul, a ntim a ntim ebo. Ntul Agrippa, ekunukpu jio ji wahng ka, Jus kp-m kake ebi.
44026008	Jen ji wahnge, wahn Jus, kp-n riidi ana re wahn taame re, Esowo kpo nyahme akvne?
44026009	“Me fvfo, n jo tob tiri re, m bahke tiki lim mbang anyehng anyehng, eji mbing nyi Jisos ji Nasaret l'tan.
44026010	N jo limi ano go Jerusalem. N jo ko nsahm goji atubesi abalimajom, fere jo song bob aneb Esowo gbalee kak bo ngbekobo. Eji bo jo gohro lam elam, fere kimi re bo bahke wulu bo, n jo t'tob taame.
44026011	Nkpel tvv n jo song kake bo erem go ntahk ero nyi Jus. N jo gare re me n sennge bo ntim, bo su Kraist. Eltim jo rak-m tob bo sehng, owo wahnge n jo tob je ajahbe nyandiki, song nohk bo fvfo.
44026012	“Esi jio ji wahng ka, n kehm jeke song ko nsahm goji atubesi abalimajom, kehm tahme go Damaskus.
44026013	Ntul, ano wo jolo no. Eji e jo jen asongo ngare efin, n kehm nyehne ellennge ni lohngo go elbung, ni jo sahb y'ya sehnge njul, kehm yake tub-m, a ane ba jo jen a name.
44026014	Wahr ane kpee kehm gboko go ndi. N kehm wuku nne no bungu a name go alum Hibru re, ‘Sol, Sol, jen ji wahng ka a kp-m nohko anae? Bahke wofono antahng yam ana nfong nyi kpo sahn ekpade tv nfono, eji bo m-e kahn nlehke go ekpade.’
44026015	“N kehm bahbe re, ‘Wo nne awo, Ntul?’ “Ntul a Jisos kehm soro bung re, ‘Me Jisos wo, ji a kp'nohko.
44026016	Mehl yiimi! M ma-a kpiri lela, fere yehk-a re, wo jol nlokeltum ewame, fere jo yiimi ntianse enyame go nsol kpee nyi a ma nyehn lela, a nsol nya m bahk-a kpe tib go es'song.
44026017	M bahk-a tahre yehke go abo nya aneb Israel, fere yehk-a go abo nya ane baka baka ba m bahk-a tumu tv bo.
44026018	A bahke bo amahr lennge, eji bo l'fere lohng go ejannge, feere ga ellennge, eji bo l'fere lohng go elwo ni nnehm, feere goji Esowo. Bo l'fere taame tv-m, bo bahke bele eltahmeka go bo abiafem, fere bel eyake go ellong ane ba Esowo ma yehke.’
44026019	“Ntul Agrippa, ano wo wahnge n ki faabe alum nya n wuku no, nya lohngo go elbung.
44026020	M bomo alum Esowo abungu go Damaskus, sehng song rehng go Jerusalem sehng asongo tete rehng go ajahbe nya li go Judea, fere tob bung tong ane baka baka ba ki li Jus re, nne awohng awohng gbo ndon go ege abiafem, feere goji Esowo, fere jo lim eljini ni bahke jo tib re, yeblohko gbo ndon.
44026021	Esi jia ji wahnge Jus bob-m no go etahk Esowo, jo gare ana bo bahk-m wulu.
44026022	“Tete sik anv Esowo kp-m nkake nkake ebo. Owo wahng ka n yim ana go egahne esamahr, kpi ntianse yiimi, fere tong nne awohng awohng, afi jolo mmonse, afi jolo nnenkul. Ejumjum limm, ji n kp'bungu, sehngem nyao nya Moses, a anyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re bahke limi, nya nya n kp'tob bung,
44026023	nya li re, Kraist bahke nyehne erem kpo, fere jol ngbokambang a nne no bahke nyahme go elkv, eji á l'tiingi Jus etib bio bi bahke kake bo ellennge, a ane baka baka ba ki li Jus fvfo.”
44026024	Pol gohro bung kan ano me, Festus kehm rabe re, “Pol, wobgbo esahl! Egburu elkahne ena ni kp-a bumu esahl!”
44026025	Pol kehm faange re, “Egburu ntul a Festus, esahl n ka gbo. Alum enyame nya n kp'bungu, n kp'bungu nseenga nseenge, li go etingitingi.
44026026	Tibre ntul Agrippa kp'kahne nsol nyia, owo wahng ka n kp'bungu a ne gbul gbul gbuul. N kp'sahb k'kahn re, ejumjum limm, ji á ki jo wuk, fere kahn. Tibre nsol nyio limem go nkpohko.
44026027	Ntul Agrippa, anv, a kp'taame tv abanyehnamahr Esowoa? N kp'kahne re, a kp'taame.”
44026028	Agrippa kehm faange Pol re, “Mmongare ana noa, a kp'tiri re, a bahk-m ma sennge eltim n jol nne a Kraista?”
44026029	Pol kehm faange re, “Afi mmongare ntiil wo, afi fere labe na ekidi, n kp'kake ero ka Esowo, jol wo ntahngtahng sang, wahn ane kpee ba wuk-m no lela re wahn jol ana me n li no, sehngem agbekobo nyaa nya ń l'k'woomo.”
44026030	Ntul Agrippa, ntul a Festus, a Bernis, bo kehm mehle yiimi, a egom ane bako fvfo,
44026031	kehm lohngo ekp'kpa jio, fere jo bung atemtem re, “Ejumjum limm, ji nne noa limi no, ji fuumu re á woomo go ngbekobo, jol ji fuumu re bo wul-e.”
44026032	Agrippa kehm bungu tong Festus re, “Li re nne noa ka lennge elam eje tv goji ntul a Rom, kehn e jol-e ma yehke yake.”
44027001	Eji bo toobo no re, wahr yel go egbang tahm go Itali, bo kehm koko Pol, a aneb agbekobo bako, kak ntubesi a nsoja awohng go ebo, no bo jo lung-e re Julius ji woomo go ellong nsoja nyi bo jo lung re, ellong nsoja nyi ntul Agostos.
44027002	E kehm yele egbang bi lohngo go Adramitium ba, bi yahke tahm go ajahbe nyao nya li go Esia, nya li nkpe alahb, adi nyao nya agbang kpo kono eltehme. E kehm tahme asongo. Aristarkus ji lohng go Tesalonaika ji Masedonia t'tob toon-r fvfo.
44027003	Etoono efung behko e kehm song rehng go Saidon. Julius jo bumu Pol ndok ndok, fere jo yak-e re á song nyehn ate ebe, eji bo l'ka-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji m-e rin.
44027004	E kehm tahme o asongo, song sehng Saiprus sa go ebobkal. Tibre nfeb jo gbiing-r sehng.
44027005	E kehm siiri aya ma li kohlo Silisia, a Pamfilia, fere sehng o song rehng go Mira nyi li go Lisa.
44027006	Owo ntubesi a nsoja nyehne egbang bi lohngo go Aleksandria kp'tahme go Itali. Á kehm-r kake go egbang bio, e tahm.
44027007	Ngare nyio jolo ejahkjahk ngare area. Egbang bio jo jene beem. Eji ma kang afung tvv, e kehm song rehng kohlo Knidus. Nfeb nongem re, wahr sehng asongo. E kehm fere tannge, feere go Salmone, sehng Krit sa go eboblum.
44027008	Eji e jo sehng nkpe egbuk nkpe egbuk nyi Krit, ngare nyio kpe jol ejahkjahk ngare area, tete e kehm song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re, Edi ji nobo eljolo, ji agbang kpo tehme, ji li kohlo Lasea.
44027009	E kange afung tvv ona. Ngare nyio efin gbale go aya sehng. Tibre efung bi Jus jo bade njal ebsehng. Owo Pol kehm tubu bo elle re,
44027010	“Babnsoo wahn, n kp'kahne re, eljen enahre ni e fi a, bahke gbale efin sehng, a erem. Fundiki egbang bahke wake, nsol tan, fundiki ane bake tane elkpin ebo.”
44027011	Alum nya nfono egbang, a nya ntubesi egbang, nya nya ntubesi a nsoja jo ga wuungu atung sehnge nya Pol.
44027012	Edi jio ji egbang bio jolo no gaam nob re agbang jol o ngare elkoko. Ane gbalee ba tubu bo elle re bo wob tahm, eji fundiki bo l'nok ano ano rehng Feniks, song jol o tete elkoko nio mal. Feniks tob li ejahbe Krit. Edi jio li edi ji nfeb kil jo lohng ba.
44027013	Eji mmonfeb no nse bomo ellimi go ejang aya bio, ane bao kehm tiri re, bo li ma lim ana bo toobo no. Owo bo kehm wobo akuungu nya jolo ana nlo, nya bo tubu kak alahb re egbang yiimi, jo fing nkpe egbuk nkpe egbuk nyi Krit.
44027014	Tvtv ona nfeb nyi nnen a nnen nyi bo jo lung re nfeb egbuk kehm soro lohng egbuk ba, kehm kehme ellimi.
44027015	Nfeb jo yehke na yehke egbang asongo. Bo joom kpe ma soongo esi egbang. E kehm fere yake elsoongo, tibre nfeb jo yehke na yehke egbang tv edi ajehng ajehng.
44027016	Eji e song rehng go mmojahbe no li go elka alahb, no bo kpo lung re Kloda, e kehm fere jo sehng nkpe egbuk nkpe egbuk. Owo nfeb kehm tele ntiil. Bo kehm noko, tahre egbang bi nse bi laake nkpe,
44027017	rod kak atahng egbang bi nnen. Bo kehm sebe alehke, te egbang bi nnen t'tahne t'tahne. Tibre bo jo f'fahl re egbang li ma bahm go erikehndi ji li go nkpe egbuk nyi Libia. Owo bo kehm soro fannge afara go egbang, yake egbang jo fab asongo.
44027018	Eji nfeb tahne sehng, egbang kehm kehme elgbiingi na gbiingi go alahb. Owo etoono efung behko bo kehm kehme nsol are nyi bo kake go egbang raade, tuubu kak go alahb.
44027019	Etoono efung behko bo kehm kehme nsol egbang raade, tuubu kak alahb fvfo.
44027020	Afung tvv e kpeem jo nyehn njul, a alonlo. Nfeb jo limi na lim lim lim, tikem rahke. E joom kpe kunu ekpu re e bahke kpe kpin.
44027021	Eji ane bao ma ji njal ekidi ma lab. Pol kehm song bung tong bo re, “Ate ebame wahn, ń jol-m wuku, eji n tong-n no re, wahn k'tahm go Krit, kehn nsol ana nyia jolem tane, jol kehn erem ana bia e jolem nyehne.
44027022	N kp-n tongo re, wahn bob eltim. Nnene limm, no bahke tane elkpin ene, sehngem re egbang bi bahke tane.
44027023	Nyaane atv, enjel nyi Esowo bi n tohk-e no, fere kp-e kake yiimi kohl-m,
44027024	kehm bungu re, ‘Pol, ka kpe fahl! A bahke tiki yiimi go esamahr ntul a Rom. Esowo ma-a ka elkpin ane baa kpee, ba wob a na go egbang, tib go ege a nnoobo.’
44027025	Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, wahn bob eltim, ate ebame wahn. N kp'taame tv Esowo re, bahke lohko lim jang jang ana n wuku no.
44027026	Nfeb bahke yehke egbang song rehng a nahre go ejahbe ji li go elka alahb.”
44027027	Eji ma kang ewuba nfung eni, ngare nyio egbang kpi nfabe nfabe asongo go aya ma bo kpo lung re Adria, nlum atv, abafingegbang kehm kehme eltiri re, bo yahke ba elrehnge go egbuk.
44027028	Owo bo kehm gare, kahn ana alahb rahbe no. Jolo efut atahl arakera. Eji bo kpe fab ntiil rehng es'song, bo kehm yake nlehke, kpe kak, kehm sebe kahn re, jolo efut atahl ani a ngbahk ewubu.
44027029	Bo kehm kehme elfahle re, egbang ebahre bahke fabe, song kahd kak atal. Owo bo kehm fannge ekuungu emni bi jolo ana nlo, kak alahb, kehm kake ero re, edi lub lennge.
44027030	Abafingegbang kehm kehme elgare re bo weele ebo be. Ngare nyio nyi bo kehme mmogbang noo fannge re bo kak alahb, fere lim awak re bo fi song fannge akuungu nyao nya li ana nlo go esi egbang, kak alahb.
44027031	Pol kehm bungu tong ntubesi a nsoja, a nsoja enye re, “Tohko tiki jol re abafingegbang baa, woomo go egbang bi nnen, ń nehm ma tahre elkpin enahne.”
44027032	Nsoja nyio kehm soro kiimi alehke nya bo gbade egbang bi nse, egbang bi nse fooro yel alahb, fab tahm.
44027033	Ngare nyio edi yahke lennge. Pol kehm tongo bo kpee re, bo li nsol alehke. Á kehm bungu re, “Lela ewubu a nfung eni nyi a, nyi ḿ ma ji njal, ń kala kpe li ejumjum.
44027034	Anv, n kp-n gboongo re, wahn li nsol. Bahk-n eko ka. Jol ellv esi enahne anehng anehng nehm tan.”
44027035	Á bungu kan ano mal me, á kehm soro rod ebred, kak Esowo saam go esamahr ane kpee, kehm kehme elbakke li.
44027036	Bo ane kpee kehm bobo eltim, tob li nsol.
44027037	E jolo ane atahl awubu atahl ara ane elku a nne awohng ba woomo go egbang bio.
44027038	Ngare nyio eji nne awohng awohng ma li nsol wohngo, bo kehm yehke nkohl nyi bo kake egbang, saade kak go alahb, eji l'lim egbang yaare, k'ga kpe lub.
44027039	Eji efungfu se no, bo tikem liingi edi ji bo yahke rehng. Ji bo nyehne no, bo nyehne edi ana nkpohko aya, a elga ona ni jolo erikehndi erikehndi. Owo bo kehm tiri re, bo l'fere mal, bo bahke fingi egbang song rehng go egbuk.
44027040	Bo kehm soro kiimi alehke akuungu nyao nya jolo ana nlo, nya bo kake go alahb, fere song fannge alehke nya bo gbade ejum ji bo kpo ko soongo egbang, fere song tab afara nya jolo go esi egbang wahre, fere nyange, eji nfeb l'gbul egbang tahm a bi go elga.
44027041	Esi egbang kehm soro song bahm go erikehndi, joom kpe ma yuudu. Nnahb egbang kehm wake, tib go nsahm ebuku.
44027042	Nsoja nyio kehm toobo re bo wul aneb agbekobo bao, eji nne awohng awohng l'k'be ngare nyi bo l'kehme alahb nyok.
44027043	Ntubesi a nsoja noo jo sebe re á tahre Pol. Owo á kehm soro sahde bo re, bo k'lim ano. Á kehm tongo ane ba jo mal alahb anyoko re, bo gbo mbang nyok song rehng go egbuk,
44027044	fere tong egom jehka re, bo jabbe ajang nti, a ajang egbang toono bo. Ano wo jolo no, e kehm tahre elkpin enahre, rehng go egbuk.
44028001	Eji wahr ane kpee, e ma nyok lohng, owo e kehm kahne re, ejahbe jio bo kpo lung re Malta.
44028002	Afono ejahbe bao ona jo gbaam-r sehng. Bo kehm kono agun ka-r. Tibre ngare nyio elahb ebbom elnake, alohk jo f'fili.
44028003	Eji Pol song rak nkun ba a nyi re á ba kak agun, nnyo kehm soro lohng nkun nyio, kpenng-e go ebo. Tibre agun nyao jo fubu sehng.
44028004	Eji afono ejahbe nyehne nnyo nyio m-e kpennge go ebo, bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Nne noo lohko li nwulane, nfaabe anyehng anyehng limm. Jol eji á ma f'for aya, Esowo m-e demme na o.”
44028005	Pol kehm soro mahd nnyo nyio kak agun, jol ejumjum we limem.
44028006	Ane bao jo siki re bo nyehn, joare Pol bahke tungu, fundiki á bahke tuulu gbo kpo. Eji bo ma seenge, ekidi ma lab, eji ejumjum kil-e eltiki lim, bo kehm fere yaange nnyo, fere jo bung re, “Ye Esowo bi.”
44028007	Ebgbe jolo o kpidi kpidi, bi ntubesi ejahbe no bo jo lung-e re Publius bahme no. Á kehm-r gbaame, ko-r tahm a nahre go ege etahk. E kange nfung era a ne.
44028008	Ngare nyio nyi nde a Publius noongo go edilnong jo yam arumbum, fere jo yam ala alung. Pol kehm jeke song nyehn-e, fere kak ero, kun-e ebo, á nob eyam ebe.
44028009	Eji nkpokosi nyia limi no, aneb ayam bako kpee ba jolo ejahbe jio kehm bake, bo nobo ane kpee.
44028010	Bo kehm-r yare ka nsol gbalee. Re wahr kehm yele egbang tahm, bo kak-r nsol gbalee go egbang, nyi rin-r no.
44028011	Eji ma kang nnyahng era, e kehm yele go egbang bi jolo o ngare elkoko, bi lohngo go Aleksandria ba. Egbang bio o bele elokelom ji bo jo lung re Ayafele.
44028012	Eji e rehnge go Sirakus, e kehm kange o nfung era,
44028013	kehm wobo tahm song rehng go Regium. Etoono efung behko nfeb kehm kehme ellimi, nyi jo lohng go ejang Malta. Owo eji ma kang nfung ebal e kehm rehnge go Puteoli.
44028014	E nyehne abon Esowo o, bo kehm-r tongo re, wahr kang a bo nfung esehma. Owo e kehm soro sehng, song rehng go Rom.
44028015	Abon Esowo ba jolo go Rom, eji bo wuku re, wahr ebba, bo kehm bake ba wan-r go are ma Appius. Bandiki wan-r go Tres Taberna. Eji Pol nyehne bo, á kehm kake Esowo saam, fere bob eltim.
44028016	Eji e song rehng go Rom, bo kehm yake Pol re á jol edi j'je eje eje, a nne a nsoja awohng no jo baab-e.
44028017	Eji ma kang nfung era, Pol kehm lungu atubesi Jus ba jolo go Rom. Bo ba kono kan edi ajehng, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Abonanee, jol eji n ki l'lim ane ebahre ejumjum, jol atahm nya babnso ejahre n soodem, bo bohk na bohk bob-m kak go ngbekobo go Jerusalem, fere faak-m kak anebe Rom go ebo.
44028018	Eji bo ma lam elam ejame, bo kehm tahme re bo yehk-m yake, tibre bo sebe kahn re, ejumjum limm, ji bahke wahnge bo wul-m.
44028019	Eji anebe Jus tene re bo ki-m yehke yake, jol eji ki-m k'kor re me n lennge elam ejame tv goji ntul a Rom, n lennge na lennge, jol ejumjum m belem ji m bake bungu tob ane ebame.
44028020	Owo wahng ka, n sebe re me n nyehn-n fere bung a nahne. Tibre nne noo no Israel kp-e kunu ekpu, ye wo wahnge bo ma-m kak agbekobo nyaa.”
44028021	Bo kehm-e faange re, “E ka tiki bel nwer anyehng anyehng nyi lohng go Judea, nyi bungu bada na. Jol nne ejahbe ewahre awohng awohng limm, no ma lohng go ba ana ba bung eb'bi ajehng ajehng bada na.
44028022	E kp'sebe re wahr kahn ntir atahng enya. Tibre wahr kp'kahne re, edi ajehng ajehng ane kp'bungu tob mmollong ane bao ba a wob no.”
44028023	Bo kehm kunu afung, ellong ane gbalee kehm bake go etahk Pol. Á kehm kehme eltooro, bomo efungfu tete elgung ba, fere lennge atahm nya Moses, a awer nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no, tong bo bade etul bi Esowo, eji á l'sennge bo ntim, bo feere goji Jisos.
44028024	Egom jindiki t'taame tv alum nya á jo bung. Egom jehko taamem.
44028025	Jus kehm kehme nfaabe lim atemtem, eji Pol ma gohro bung alum nyaa re, “Etingi Etohko lohko bung etingitingi, eji á bungu sehng go nnyo mi nnyehnamahr Aisaya tong babnso ejahre re,
44028026	“ ‘Song goji ane bao, wo song tong bo re, Etingitingi, ḿ bahke jo wuk na wuk, ń nehm kahn ana lohngo no. Ḿ bahke jo seenge na seenge, ń nehm nyehn.
44028027	Tibre asi ane bao ebfere tahne. Bobsahde atung ebo. Bobbulu amahr ebo. Ki li ano, kehn bo kp'nyehne, fere jo wuk, kahn, fere sennge, feere go egame, eji n l'lim bo, bo nob.’ ”
44028028	Pol kehm kpe bung re, “Nobo re wahn kahn re, etib bia bi eltahre ni Esowo, bobtiingi ane baka baka ba ki li Jus. Bo bahke wuungu atung.”
44028029	Pol bungu kan ano mal me, Jus kehm tahme a nfaaba nfaabe asongo.
44028030	Pol kange nnya ebal go etahk ji á yaame no. Á jo gbaame ane kpee ba jo ba, ba nyehn-e.
44028031	Á jo bungu alum Esowo bade etul bi Esowo, fere jo tib ane bada Ntul a Jisos Kraist gbul gbul gbuul. Nnene jolem no jo sahd-e.
45001001	Me Pol, me wo kp'nyono nwer nyia, me ji li nlokeltum no Jisos Kraist, ji Esowo lung-m no re me n jol ntiingetib, fere yehk-m re me n tiingi nnoobo etib bi Esowo,
45001002	bi Esowo nyame no mahne mahne sehng go anyo nya abanyehnamahr ba nyono no kak go mbarebara nwer Esowo.
45001003	Nnoobo etib bio li bada Mmon ewe. Ana nne, bo jel-e kak go et'tohngo ji Devid.
45001004	Go eyaame ji Etingi Etohko ji li eje eje, á jolo Mmon no Esowo, Jisos Kraist Ntul ewahre. Esowo tibi jia go ege egburu nsahm, eji á nyahm-e go elkv,
45001005	ye ji ma wahnge Esowo ma-r ka nnoobo, fere ka-r eltum ni nnoobo etib atiingi, eji e l'wahnge egom ane bandiki go nnahb anyehng anyehng nyi li go njini taame, fere jo wuk Esowo tib esi mbing nyi Jisos.
45001006	Wahn tob wob go ellong nio, wahn ji Jisos Kraist ma-n lung.
45001007	N kp'nyono tv wahn ane kpee, ba kpo kor Esowo, wahn ji li go Rom. Á ma-n lung re wahn jol ane babe. Nong, Esowo Nso ejahre, a Ntul a Jisos Kraist ka-n nnoobo, a elkoono.
45001008	N kp'gboko mbang kak Esowo ebame saam sehng goji Jisos Kraist tib wahn ane kpee. Tibre njini kpee ebwuk bade ana ḿ ma taame tv Esowo.
45001009	Esowo bi n kpo lok-e a eltim eltim ename kpee, eji n kp'tiingi nnoobo etib bi Mmon ewe, ye wo kp-m yiimi ntianse re n kpo gahm-n gahm go egame ero ngare anyehng anyehng.
45001010	Ero ebame bi n kpo kak, n kpo gboongo Esowo ngare anyehng anyehng re, l'fere kor-e, á lim mbang anv, me m ba nyehn-n.
45001011	Tibre kp-m sahb k'kor re me n nyehn-n, eji n l'kak-n ebo bio bi etohko, ń fere tahne.
45001012	Jia lohngo re, e bahke jo kak atemtem eltim. Ekakesehk ejahne bahk-m eltim kak, ekakesehk ejame tob kak-n eltim.
45001013	Abonanee, n kp'sebe re wahn kahn re, nkpel tvv n jo toobo re me m ba go egahne, eji n l'ba, ba bong akab nti nyamongo go egahne, jang jang ana m bongo goji ane bako ba tob li ane baka baka. Ejum ji kpan-m re me n k'ba go egahne tete sik anv.
45001014	Tibre n kpi aneb Grik mbong, a aneb ekulugbe, a akahnkahn ane, a ane ba kil kahne ejumjum.
45001015	Owo wahnge n kp'noko re me n tob ba go Rom, ba tiing-n nnoobo etib fvfo.
45001016	N nehme be ndon go eltiingi nnoobo etib bi Kraist. Tibre kpi nsahm nyi Esowo nyi kpo tahre nne awohng awohng no l'taame, gbo mbang tahre Jus, kehm tob tahre Grik.
45001017	Tibre nnoobo etib bi kpo lennge ana nne bahke ma li eno go esamahr bi Esowo. Li ka nne no kp'taame, fere soro asi ano. Ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, “Etingi nne bahke bele elkpin tib go ege eltaame.”
45001018	Tibre Esowo eblennge ana erakatahng eje bahke lohngo go ege ejahbetul ba gbo tub abi ane, fere gbo tub ane kpee ba kil-e elkake. Go bo ab'bi wo, bo kpo kpan etingitingi jia.
45001019	Ji ane bahke ma kahn bade Esowo eblennge bo, tibre Esowo bi ma tib bo.
45001020	Bomo wuku wuku eji Esowo limi njini, ane ebnyehn nsahm enye nyi li go njinanjini, fere nyehn sange sange ana á lohko li Esowo go nsol nyi á limi no, jol eji nne l'k'ma nyehn Esowo. Owo wahnge bo l'k'ma laange kunu ejum ajehng ajehng.
45001021	Tibre bo k'kahn Esowo, jol bo we kaam ekpunu ji kehn bo jol-e kake. Jol saam bo we kakem. Ntir nyi bo kp'tiri anv, bo kp'fere tir mbol mbol. Ntim ebo li ekpakekpake, ebfere gbo ejannge.
45001022	Eji bo kp'rodo elbo bum ana akahnkahn, bobfere jol agboolo.
45001023	Bobfere yaange ellub ni Esowo bi l'k'tiki kpo, fere ko alokelom nya li go elfoongo nne no bahke kpoko, a ni nruk, a ni enyam, a ni enyo, fere kp'kake.
45001024	Owo Esowo ma yake bo re bo jo lim nsol nyi ki li saang, nyi kpo kor bo go ellimi, fere jo ko agubjing ebo, jo lim nsol ndon atemtem.
45001025	Tibre bobyaange etingitingi ji Esowo, fere ko efahnge, kp'kake nsol nyi Esowo limi no, fere jo loko nsol nyio, kehn nyi bo jol kake Esowo bi limi lim nsol nyio, bi fuumu re ane jo tehk-e go njinanjini. Emen.
45001026	Esi jio ji wahnge Esowo ma yake bo re bo jo lim nsol ndon nyi kpo kor bo go ellimi. Anebkal ebyaange eljini ni bo, fere kp'noongo atemtem.
