66001017	Eji n nyehn-e no, n kehm gboko go ege alata ana nne no ma kpo. Á kehm-m kunu eboblum ebe, kehm bungu re, “Ka fahl, me wo li ngbokambang, me wo li nkahlanjahm.
66001018	Me wo li nne no li go elkpin. N kp'kpo, anv, me n noa go elkpin. M bahke jolo ano ano go njinanjini. Me wo, elkv wob go egame ebo. Me wo kpi ejahbe akvne.
66001019	Jo nyon nsol nyi a ma nyehn, nsol nyi li anv, a nsol nyi bahke limi.
66001020	Ana wo nkpokosi nyi a nyehne no lohngo no, eji a nyehne elonlo ebsehma go egame eboblum, fere nyehn et'rekahng ebsehma. Elonlo ebsehma bio lohngo enjel nya aro nyao na asehma. Et'rekahng ebsehma bio lohngo aro asehma nyao.”
66002001	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Efesus re, Alum nya ana, nya nne no fili elonlo na ebsehma go eboblum yahke bung, ye ji kp'jene go elka elka ni et'rekahng na ebsehma bi bo limi go agul.
66002002	“N kp'kahne eltum ni a kp'limi, ana a kp'bade, jo lim eltum, fere kp'kpuumu. N kp'kahne re, a nehm jo taame re, abi ane woomo go egahne ellong. Wobwuungu ane bao ba kpo lung elbo re abatiingetib Jisos, na ga, ano sang bo li no. Wobseb kahn re, bo akimfahnge nya.
66002003	Wobnyehn erem go egame esi, fere kpuumu. Eltum wa tikem kpen.
66002004	“Ejum ji ana, ji n kpi bada na. Tibre, wa n nehme kpe kor ana wuku wuku n jo kor-a.
66002005	Gbo ntir, wo nyehn nsol nyi a ma yake bum. Yake mbang nyio, wo fere jo lim mbang nyi wuku wuku a gbo mbang jo lim. A tohko yake mbang nyio, m bahke ba radde et'rekahng eja edi ji kun no.
66002006	Ejum ji ana, ji m bahk-a tehke. Nsol nyi abat'toono ba Nikola kpo lim, kpo sab-a jang jang ana kpo tob sab-m.
66002007	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero. Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, m bahk-e kake eti jio ji elkpin, á li, ji li go etahngga ji Esowo.
66002008	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Smirna re, Alum nya ana, nya nne no li ngbokambang, a nkahlanjahm yahke bung, ye ji kpo no, á ma fere jol go elkpin.
66002009	“N kp'kahne erem eba bi a kp'nyehne. N kp'kahne ana a ma gbo ekpak, jol eji a li li efange nne. N kp'kahne abi nsol nya ane ba kpo lung elbo re, ‘Jus’ kpo bung tob-a, na nyehne, Jus sang, bo li ka nnehm.
66002010	Ka fahl erem bi a bahke nyehne! Nnehm yahke rod egom ejahne jindiki kak ngbekobo, eji á l'gar-a. Nfung na ewubu nyi a bahke nyehne erem bi ebnohko. Afi jolo go elkv, bel ekakesehk. Owo m bahk-a konngo ekpasi ji elkpin.
66002011	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero. Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, etoono elkv we nehm kpe lim ejumjum.
66002012	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Pergamum re, “Alum nya ana, nya nne no kpi ekahngkahng bi kpo kong njahm ebal ebal yahke bung.
66002013	“N kp'kahne edi ji a lene no. A lene edi ji eti etul ji nnehm li no. Wobyiimi t'tahne go egama mbing. A tikem ten mbang enyame, jol ngare nyio nyi bo wulu Antipas ji woomo go egahne ellong, ye ji jolo nkakesehk a ntianse enyame go edi ji nnehm lene no.
66002014	“N kpi abon nsol bada na. Egom ejahne jindiki jia ona, ji kp'toono eltibi ni Belam, ji tubu Balahk elle re, á jo lim, eji aneb Israel l'jo gbo yel abiafem, fere jo li nsol alehke nyi bo ko jom eblom, fere jo noongo a ane.
66002015	Egom ejahne jindiki jia, ji kp'toono eltibi ni abat'toono ba Nikola.
66002016	Yake mbang nyio! Tohko jol ano, m bahke gulu elbake go ega, ba nok ebta a bo go ekahngkahng bi kpo lohng go egama nnyo.
66002017	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero. “Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, m bahk-e kake mmanna nyi li go mbiiri, á li. M bahk-e tob ka mbarebare eltal ni bo nyono mbing a nfenfe, nyi nne awohng awohng kil elkahne, sehngem nne no bahke koko eltal nio, ye wo bahke kahne.
66002018	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Tiatira re, “Alum nya ana, nya Mmon no Esowo no kpi amahr ana eblikagun yahke bung, ye ji akpade enye li ana ekuungu ji li gele gele.
66002019	“N kp'kahne eltum ena ni a kp'limi, a eltaame ena, a elkoro ena, fere kahn ana a kp-m loko. N kp'kahne elkpuumu ena ni a kpo kpuumu. N kp'kahne re, anv, a kp'limi sehnge ana wuku wuku a jo lim.
66002020	“Ejum ji ana, ji n kpi no bada na. A kpo bulu amahr enya, eji a kp'nyehne Jesebel, nnenkal no kpo lung elne re, ‘Nnyehnamahr Esowo’. Á kpo tib, fere jo nehm alokeltum ebame, eji bo l'jo noongo a ane, fere jo li nsol alehke nyi bo ko jom eblom.
66002021	N ka-e ngare re á yake mbang nyio. Á t'ten re, á nehm sennge njahm go ege enoongo a ane.
66002022	Owo wahnge m bahk-e rodo tub edilnong, a ane ba kpo noongo a ne. Owo bo bahke nyehne erem bi ga ga, tohko jol re bo gbo ndon go elkohn nsol nyi á kp'limi.
66002023	M bahke wulu abon ebe. Ano wo bahke wahnge aneb ero kpee kahn re, me wo li nne no kpo rab atahng ma nne. M bahk-n tuuru go nne awohng awohng jang jang ana ń limi no.
66002024	“Wahn erik ane ji li go Tiatira, ji kala toono eltibi nio, wahn ji kala kpili nsol nyi ane bandiki kpo lung re, ‘Nsol nyi nnehm nyi li go mbiiri’, n kp-n tongo re, wahn n nehm kpe si elsol nehko.
66002025	Yiimen t'tahne go mbang nyi ń kp'toono, tete me n feere ba.
66002026	“Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, fere jo lim eltum ename tete rehng go es'kohro, ye wo m bahk-e kake nsahm nyi á bahke fili ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo.
66002027	Á bahke jo ko ebti bi bo limi go ekuungu, jo fili bo, fere jo ruumu bo ana nne ruumu atu wa. Tibre m bahk-e kake nsahm ny'nehm nyi m bele goji Nsoo.
66002028	M bahk-e kake elonlo ji efungfu.
66002029	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero.
66003001	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Sardis re, “Alum nya ana, nya nne no kpi etohko na ebsehma bi Esowo, a elonlo na ebsehma yahke bung. “N kp'kahne eltum ena ni a kp'limi. N kp'kahne ana bo kpo gahm-a re, wo noa go elkpin, na nyehne ga, wobkpo.
66003002	Nyahme, wo kak ane bako ebo, ba ma sa, bo ji yahke kpo. Tibre eltum ni a ma lim, me n nyehn re, gaam nob go ejang bi Esowo ebame.
66003003	Buumu alum nya bo tib-a no, wo fere buumu nya a wuku no. Jo bum alum nyao, wo yake mbang enya nyi a kp'toono. A tohko nyahme, m bahke bake go ega ana nwajv. A nehm kahn ngare nyi m bahke bake.
66003004	Egom ejahne jindiki ji li o Sardis, bo ka nyake awobo ebo. Bo bahke tiki jo jen a name ano a abarebare nsol, tibre f'fuumu re bo lim ano.
66003005	“Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, bo bahk-e liibi abarebare nsol. N nehm fvvdv mbing enye go nwer nyio nyi elkpin. M bahke yiimi ntianse ka-e go esamahr bi Nsoo, a bi enjel enye re, á li ka me.
66003006	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero.
66003007	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Filadelfia re, “Alum nya ana, nya Mbarebara Nne Esowo no li Etingitingi Nne yahke bung, ye ji kpi egbokoro ji Devid. Á l'lennge, nnene limm, no bahke ma bam. Á l'bam, nnene limm, no bahke ma lennge.
66003008	“N kp'kahne eltum ena ni a kp'limi. Me n lennge mbutahk bum-a, mi nne awohng awohng l'k'ma bam. N kp'kahne re, a kpi mmonsahm ntiil. Wobbum alum enyame. A tikem gbaame re, mbing enyame, a nyimm.
66003009	Wuungu atung! Ana ellong ane ba li ka nnehm, ba kpo lung elbo re, ‘Jus’, na nyehne, bo akimfahnge nya. M bahke limi bo, bo jo ba, ba gong kak-a, eji bo l'kahn re, a kp-m lohko kor.
66003010	Tibre wobbum alum enyame nya n tong-a re, wo jo kpuumu. Owo fvfo m bahk-a tob tahre yehke go egburu elgaare ni bahke bake go njini nyia kpee, ni nne awohng awohng no li go njini nyia bahke yele.
66003011	M bahke gulu elbake. Yiimi t'tahne go mbang nyi a kp'toono, eji nne awohng awohng l'k'taare ekpasi eltuuru eja.
66003012	“Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, m bahk-e limi, á jol ana ego go etahk Esowo ebame. Á nehm tiki tahm etahk jio sa. M bahke nyono mbing nyi Esowo ebame go ege a ngubjing, fere nyon-e mbing ejahbe ji Esowo ebame, Jerusalem ji nfenfe, jio ji bahke lohngo go ejahbetul ji Esowo ebame ba. M bahk-e tob nyon mbing enyame nyi nfenfe fvfo.
66003013	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero.
66003014	“Nyon tv enjel nyi ero bi Laodisea re, “Alum nya ana, nya nne no bo kpo lung-e re, ‘Emen’ yahke bung, ye ji li etingitingi ntianse nyi kpi ekakesehk. Ye wo li mbomannahb go nsol nyi Esowo limi no kpee.
66003015	“N kp'kahne eltum ena ni a kp'limi. A li ana alahb ma kil fubu, jol elnaange nehme naange. Kor-m re wo fub, tohko jol ano, wo naange na.
66003016	“Eji a li ana alahb ma ma rongo na rongo, ma kil fubu, jol elnaange nehme naange, m bahk-a fahme na wohng go.
66003017	Tibre a kp'bungu re, ‘Me n fang, anv, me n jol nj'joka nne. Ejumjum limm, ji n kp'kpeke seb.’ Na nyehne ga, a nehme kahn re, a li erem erem, fere kp'fili ane ndon. Wobgbo ekpak, fere wa amahr, fere kp'jene ebun ebun.
66003018	Owo wahnge n kp-a tubu elle re, wo ba ga egame, ba gunu agul nya nno a nno, nya bo ma tuungu tahl go agun, eji a l'fang, wo fere tob gunu abarebare nsol nya a bahke jo liibi, eji a l'k'kpe jen ebun ebun, fere jo riki elna ndon, wo fere tob gunu ekahm amahr, jo to go amahr, eji a l'nyehn.
66003019	N kpo nyam ane ba kp-m koro, fere jo kak bo erem. Niiri l'lun, wo yake mbang enya nyio.
66003020	Anv, me n noa, yim go mbutahk kp'kahde. Nne awohng awohng no l'wuk ellum ename, fere lennge mbu, m bahke yele go ege ekp'kpa, ba li nsol a ne, ye tob li nsol a name.
66003021	“Nne no l'ga anebekv ebe, m bahk-e kake nsahm nyi á bahke jehke a name go egame eti etul jang jang ana m ma ga anebekv ebame, fere song ji a Nsoo go ege eti etul.
66003022	“Nne no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk ji Etingi Etohko kp'bungu tong aneb ero.”
66004001	Owo n kehm kpe tab esamahr, soro nyehn mbutahk mi ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge. Nne no n wuk-e no, no gbo mbang bung a name, ellum ene jolo ana ntang, á bungu re, “Wahr, wo ba ga ero! M bahk-a tibi nsol nyi bahke limi toono nyia.”
66004002	Etingi Etohko kehm soro rod-m tvtv, n kehm soro nyehn eti etul go ejahbetul Esowo, fere nyehn nne jehk no.
66004003	Nne no ji eti etul jio, á jolo go elfoongo ni atal nya nno a nno, eltal nehko bo kpo lung re ejaspa, nehko bo kpo lung re ekarnilian. Ebangenjok jolo o sennge eti etul jio kak, jolo are eltal ni nno a nno ni, ni bo kpo lung re emerald.
66004004	Eltahl a nji etul eni jolo sennge eti etul jio kak. Eltahl anebkul ani ba ji o, ba kake abarebare nsol, fere konngo akpasi agul.
66004005	Amangedu, alum, a aran, kpee nsol nyia jo lohngo go eti etul jio. Enyaale na ebsehma bi bo nyaale no bum, jo lul go mbuksong eti etul jio, bio bi li etohko na ebsehma bi Esowo.
66004006	Ejum jolo ona, ji jolo ana eto ji jo foongo enyehn, fere sahb w'wili, are eltal ni nno a nno ni, ni bo kpo lung re ekristel. Enyam eni noongo sennge eti etul jio kak. Anyehng anyehng jo noongo go ege ejang. Bo bele amahr gbalee go ala, a njahm.
66004007	Nnyam nyehko jolo ana egabe, nyehko jolo ana nfong, nyehko bele esamahr ana bi nne, nyehko jolo ana ebtere bi kp'fonngo.
66004008	Enyam bio na eni bele akpungkpung arakera arakera. Amahr saabe na saabe bo kpee ejang ngubjing ajehng ajehng, a atahng atahng. Atv a njul, bo joom tiki rahke ase ayimi re, “Ntul Esowo no gbale sehng, ye wo li mbarebare, ye wo li mbarebare, ye ji jolo go mbomannahb, á noa anv, á bahke kpe feere ba.”
66004009	Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi enyam bio na eni l'kehme ase yim, jo tehk Esowo bi jehk go eti etul jio, ye ji li go njinanjini, fere jo ka-e ellub, jo kak-e saam,
66004010	eltahl anebkul ani bao kpo kono elgboko go alata nne no jehk go eti etul jio, jo kak-e, ye ji li go njinanjini, fere jo lennge akpasi eltuuru ebo, ro tv go mbuksong eti etul jio, fere jo bung re,
66004011	“Esowo Ntul ewahre, f'fuumu re, wo bel ellub, fere bel ekpunu, a nsahm. Tibre wo li nne no limi nsol kpee. Ana kor-a no wo, a limi no re jol, fere kpin.”
66005001	Owo n kehm nyehne nwer go eboblum bi nne no jehk go eti etul jio, nyi bo nyono njahm ebal ebal, fehd, fere lake elak edi na ebsehma, bi lohngo re bobbulu nwer.
66005002	N nyehne nj'joka enjel nyi bungu wahre wahre re, “Nne awo fuumu re á laade alak nyaa, fere lennge nwer nyia?”
66005003	Nnene jolem go ejahbetul Esowo, jol go njini nyia, jol go atahng ndi, no male lennge nwer nyio, fere nyehn atahng.
66005004	N lingi sehng, eji nnene ki jol, no fuumu re á lennge nwer nyio, fere nyehn atahng.
66005005	Nnenkul awohng kehm-m tongo re, “Ka kpe ling, nyehnee, egabe ji lohng go et'tohngo ji Juda, ye ji li nlohk nyi Devid, ebnok ebta ga anebekv ebe, á bahke ma laade alak nyao na asehma, fere lennge nwer nyio.”
66005006	Owo n kehm nyehne mmon a njoro yim go elka ni eti etul jio. Enyam bio na eni jolo o sennge kak, a anebkul bao fvfo. Mmon a njoro noo jolo are bo m-e wul na. Á bele ntang na esehma, fere bel amahr na asehma nya li etohko na ebsehma bi Esowo tumu no tv go njini kpee.
66005007	Mmon a njoro noo kehm tahme song taare nne no ji go eti etul jio nwer nyi á fili go eboblum.
66005008	Eji á ma taare nwer nyio, enyam bio na eni kehm gboko go ndi go alata nya mmon a njoro noo. Eltahl anebkul ani bao tob limi ano fvfo. Nne awohng awohng fili ebuk, fere fili ekpingi ji bo limi go agul, ji bo kake alakenti nya bo kake agun, jo teebe, jo v es'svv eleenge, nya li ero bi aneb Esowo kpo kak.
66005009	Bo jo yimi ese nfenfe re, “A f'fuumu re, wo ko nwer nyio, laade alak lennge, tibre bo ma-a wul, wobyake alung ema ka, gunu ane ka Esowo go nnahb anyehng anyehng, a ane ba kpo bung ajahbe nya bo ebo ebo go ejang njini abehng abehng, a ejahbe ajehng ajehng.
66005010	Wobbob bo etul, fere lim bo jol abalimajom, eji bo l'jo loko Esowo. Bo ba bahke jo fili njini.”
66005011	N kehm seenge, soro wuk babenjel. Bo jolo mbud a nkunu sennge eti etul jio kak, go enyam bio na eni, a anebkul bao fvfo.
66005012	Bo kehm kehme elbungu wahre wahre re, “Mmon a njoro no bo m-e wul, fuumu re á bel nsahm, fere gbo afang, bel elkahne, fere bel eko, bel ekpunu, fere bel ellub, a elfuulu.”
66005013	N kehm kpe wuk ejum ajehng ajehng ji Esowo limi no go elbung abola ndi, a atahng ndi, go alahb, a nsol kpee, jo bungu re, “Nong, elfuulu, ekpunu, ellub, a nsahm jol ka nne no jehk go eti etul jio, a mmon a njoro go njinanjini.”
66005014	Enyam bio na eni kehm bungu re, “Emen.” Anebkul bao kehm soro gbo go ndi, kak Esowo.
66006001	Owo n kehm nyehne ana mmon a njoro noo kp'laade ngbokambang elak go alak nyao na asehma. N kehm wuku ellum ni nnyam anyehng nyi woomo go ellong enyam eni bio, nyi bungu ana ndan re, “Ba!”
66006002	Owo n kehm nyehne mbarebare eny'nya. Nne no kuum-e go njahm, á fili elban. Bo konng-e ekpasi ntul. Á kehm lohngo tahm song nok ebta, fere ga anebekv ebe. Tibre ano wo wahnge á je no.
66006003	Eji mmon a njoro noo kpe laade etoono elak behko bi biingi alak abal, n kehm wuku etoono nnyam nyehko nyi kpe bung re, “Ba!”
66006004	Eny'nya jehko kehm kpe lohng ba, ji jolo mbilibili. Nne no kuum-e go njahm, bo ka-e nsahm re, á ko ebta ba a bi go njini, eji ane l'jo wul atemtem. Bo ka-e ekahngkahng bi nnen a nnen.
66006005	Eji mmon a njoro noo kpe laade etoono elak behko bi biingi alak abal, n kehm wuku etoono nnyam nyehko nyi kpe bung re, “Ba!” N kehm kpe nyehn nnyakenyake eny'nya. Nne no kuum-e go njahm fili ejum nsol agare go ege ebo.
66006006	N wuku ejum ana ellum ni lohngo go ellong enyam bio na eni, ni bungu re, “Nkob a nkohl, bo bahke jo gungu go nsiring era, ngbugu atehke go nsiring era. Ka rannge akehng, a alahb avain!”
66006007	Eji mmon a njoro noo kpe laade elak behko bi biingi alak ara, n kehm kpe wuk etoono nnyam nyehko nyi kpe bung re, “Ba!”
66006008	N kehm soro nyehn mbammebamme eny'nya. Nne no kuum-e go njahm, mbing enye, bo jo lung-e re Elkv. Ejahbe akvne jo toon-e njahm. Bo ka bo nsahm re bo ko ekahngkahng, njal, ayam, a abibbib enyam ba wul ejang ane ba li go njini. Go ejang emni bi ane ba li go njini, ejang ajehng bahke kpoko.
66006009	Eji mmon a njoro noo kpe laade elak behko bi biingi alak alon, n kehm nyehne edi njom alimi. Nla edi njom o, n nyehne atohko ane ba jo bung alum Esowo, ba bo wulu no tib go bo a ntianse nyi bo jo yiimi.
66006010	Bo kehm rabe wahre wahre re, “Mbarebare Esowo bi gbale sehng, bi li go etingitingi, bahke kange renan, a kehm lame ane ba li go njini, fere bongo bo tib go elwulu ni bo wul-r no?”
66006011	Owo bo kehm kake nne awohng awohng mbarebare ekpawobo, fere tong bo re, bo ji, re ekv mmongare ntiil, tete nfange nyi alokeltum bako ba li abonanyehn biingi, ba bo bahke tob wul bo jang jang ana bo wulu bo.
66006012	Eji mmon a njoro noo kpe laade elak behko bi biingi alak arakera, n kehm nyehne ana ndi kp'sahb gb'gbehke. Njul kehm soro gbo ejannge, fere jol ana nnyakenyaka mbomo. Ebareka fere jol, are alung ma.
66006013	Alonlo nya li go elbung jo fooro gbo go ndi ana akab arokpa kpo fooro gbo, eji nfeb nyi nnen kp'limi.
66006014	Elbung kehm daade ana nwer nyi bo ma fehd. Ewong ajehng ajehng kpeem jol edi ji jolo no. Ajahbe nya jolo go elka alahb kpeem jol adi nya jolo no. Bo rodo kpee yaange adi bum.
66006015	Atul ba njini, a aj'jok ane, a atubesi nsoja, a afang ane, a agburu ane, a ane kpee, afi jolo aju, afi jolo ane baka baka, bo be, jo biiri go akpartal, fere jo biiri go afukatal nya li go awong,
66006016	fere jo gboongo awong, a akpartal re, “Mehlen, bul-r, wahn behr-r, eji nne no jehk go eti etul l'ki-r nyehn, eji erakatahng ji mmon a njoro l'k'gbo tub-r.
66006017	Tibre egburu efung bi erakatahng ebo ebrehng. Nne awo bahke sahbe yiimi go nfem ana nyio?”
66007001	Owo n kehm nyehne enjel na eni yim no go nkpohka njini nyio na eni. Bo ma jabbe nfeb nyio na eni nyi li go njini, eji nfeb anyehng anyehng l'k'kpe lim go ndi, fere lim go agburu aya, fere lim eti ajehng ajehng.
66007002	N kehm kpe nyehn enjel nyehko kp'lohngo go ero nfam abake. Á fili ejum ji Esowo bi li go elkpin kpo ko, kak elliingi ene. Enjel nyio kehm rabe wahre wahre lung enjel nyehko na eni nyi bo ka bo nsahm nyi bo bahke kake ndi erem, a agburu aya.
66007003	Á kehm tongo bo re, “Kana waka kak ndi erem, a aya, a nti, tete wahr kak alokeltum ba Esowo ebahre elliingi go bo a mbuk.”
66007004	N wuku nfange ane nyi bo kake bo elliingi. Nfange ane nyio jolo ane atahltahl nkpel atahlku, a nkpelatahl ara (144,000), nyi lohngo go et'tohngo ajehng ajehng ji Israel.
66007005	Ane ba lohngo go et'tohngo ji Juda, ba bo kake bo elliingi, bo jolo ane atahltahl nkpel eltahl ewubu (12,000), et'tohngo ji Ruben, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Gad, ane tob jolo ano,
66007006	et'tohngo ji Aser, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Naftali, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Manase, ane tob jolo ano,
66007007	et'tohngo ji Simeon, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Livai, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Isasa, ane tob jolo ano,
66007008	et'tohngo ji Sebulon, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Josef, ane tob jolo ano, et'tohngo ji Benjamin, ane tob jolo ano fvfo.
66007009	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn ellong ane tvv, ni nne awohng awohng l'k'ma fange. Bo lohngo go ejahbe ajehng ajehng, go nnahb anyehng anyehng, go ejang njini abehng abehng, a ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji kpo bung eje eje. Bo yiimi go mbuksong eti etul jio, go esamahr bi mmon a njoro. Bo liibi abarebare akpawobo, fere fili amang go bo abo.
66007010	Bo jo rabe wahre wahre re, “Eltahre enahre lohng goji Esowo ebahre bi jehk go eti etul, a mmon a njoro.”
66007011	Eti etul jio, a anebkul bao, a enyam bio na eni, babenjel yiimi sennge bo kpee kak. Bo kehm gboko kohk asamahr ebo go ndi go mbuksong eti etul jio, kak Esowo,
66007012	fere jo bung re, “Emen. Elfuulu, ellub, elkahne, ekpunu, nsahm, a eko jol ka Esowo ebahre bi e kp-e kake saam go njinanjini. Emen.”
66007013	Nnenkul awohng kehm-m bahbe re, “Ane aba ana, ba ma liibi abarebare akpawobo? Gan wo bo lohng no ba?”
66007014	N kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, a kp'kahne.” Á kehm-m tongo re, “Ane baa ana eblohng go egburu erem bi ebnohko. Bobru akpawobo ebo go alung ma mmon a njoro ebbar.
66007015	Ano wo wahnge bo yim go mbuksong eti etul ji Esowo, fere kp-e kake atv a njul go ege etahk, ye jio ji jehk go eti etul jio, á li a bo o, kpi bo konngo ana elbultahk.
66007016	“Njal anyehng anyehng nehm kpe jo yam bo, jol alahb nehm kpe jo kor bo. Njul nehm kpe jo fub bo. Ewannge nehm kpe jo lim bo.
66007017	Tibre mmon a njoro no jehk go elka eti etul bahke jolo mb'baabe abo. Á bahke tahme a bo, song tib bo alahb ma elkpin, ma kp'tubu mb'behl. Esowo bahke fulu bo abonngo kpee go amahr.”
66008001	Eji mmon a njoro noo laade elak behko bi biingi alak asehma, ejahbetul Esowo naange na naange kp'tii go ejang awa.
66008002	Owo n kehm nyehne enjel na esehma nyi yiimi go esamahr bi Esowo. Bo ka bo ntang na esehma.
66008003	Enjel nyehko kehm lohngo ba yiimi go edi njom alimi ji bo limi go agul, ji jolo go mbuksong eti etul ji Esowo. Á fili ekpingi agul, ji bo kpo kak alakenti nya bo jo nyaale. Bo ka-e alakenti gbalee re á kunu go edi njom alimi jio semme ero bi aneb Esowo kpee kpo kak.
66008004	At'tohk jo longo go alakenti nyao nya enjel nyio fili go ebo, fere jo tahm go ero, song rehng esamahr bi Esowo, semme aro nya aneb Esowo.
66008005	Owo enjel nyio kehm koko ekpingi ji alakenti kpo woomo, kehm song kpar agun go edi njom alimi kak, rur go ekpingi jio, kehm sale wohng go njini. Owo aran kehm kehme eltake, edi jo wahl, amangedu jo lim, ndi jo gbehke.
66008006	Owo enjel nyio na esehma nyi bele ntang na esehma kehm toobo ebjing bi bo bahke woro atang nyao.
66008007	Ngbokambang enjel kehm woro ntang enye. Elahb atal ji jolo semme alung, a agun kehm kehm elnake. Ejang njini ajehng ji fi no, sa ejang ebbal. Go ejang ebra bi nti nyi li go njini, ejang ajehng ji fi. Ajele nya mbir mbir fi kpee.
66008008	Etoono enjel kehm tob wor ntang enye. Bo kehm rodo ejum ji jolo go elfoongo ni egburu ewong ji jo lul, tub kak go agburu aya.
66008009	Go ejang ebra bi aya kpee ma li go njini, ejang ajehng ji siingi alung. Go ejang ebra bi enyam alahb kpee bi li go njini, ejang ajehng ji kpo. Go ejang ebra bi agbang kpee nya li go njini, ejang ajehng ji rannge.
66008010	Etoono enjel nyi biingi enjel era kehm woro ntang enye. Egburu elonlo ji jo lul ana enyaale kehm fooro go elbung, ba gbo yel go ngba, a aya aya, a adi nya alahb kpo lohng.
66008011	Mbing elonlo nyio, bo kpo lung-e re Mbumti. Go ejang ebra bi alahb kpee ma li go njini, ejang ajehng ji jo lul suud. Ane gbalee ba kpo no tib alahb mao, tib eji jo lul suud.
66008012	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel eni kehm woro ntang enye. Bo kehm rumu njul, fere tob rum ebareka, a alonlo. Bo tele ejang ajehng gbo ejannge. Go ejang ebra bi elyake kpee ni njul, ebareka, a alonlo jo ya, ejang ajehng ji gbo ejannge. Go ejang ebra bi limi efung kohro kohro, ejang ajehng ji gbo ejannge. Go ejang ebra bi limi efung kohro kohro, ejang ajehng ji gbo ejannge. Go ejang ebra bi limi atv, ejang ajehng ji gbo ejannge.
66008013	N kehm seenge, soro wuk ebtere kp'fonngo go atahng ejahbetul Esowo, fere jo bung wahre wahre re, “Eyuu, eyuu, eyuu! Erem bi nnen yahke gbo tub ane ba lene go njini tib go atang nya enjel nyehko na era yahke wor.”
66009001	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel elon kehm woro ntang enye. N kehm nyehne elonlo ma lohng go elbung ba gbo ndi. Ye wo, bo ka-e egbokoro ji nrabbe elbing nio.
66009002	Á kehm lennge nrabbe elbing nio o, at'tohk kehm lohngo, fere jo t'tehm ana at'tohk nya egburu erehm agun. Njul fere nyak na nyak, a elbung fvfo tib go at'tohk nya jo lohng go nrabbe elbing nio.
66009003	Agohrobi kehm lohngo go at'tohk nyao, ba go njini. Bo ka bo nsahm ana nyio nyi enang.
66009004	Bo tongo bo re, bo k'rannge ajele, k'rannge elrahnti anehng anehng, k'rannge eti ajehng ajehng, sehngem ane ba ki kpi elliingi ni Esowo go bo a mbuk ba ba, bo bahke rannge bo.
66009005	Bo taamem re agohrobi nyao wul ane, sehngem ebnohko bi bi bo jo nohk bo go nnyahng elon. Ebnohko bi agohrobi nyao jo nohk ane, jolo ana nnang kpo ta nne.
66009006	Ngare nyio o ane bahke jo seb mbang ana nyi bo bahke gulu elkpoko, jol na. Bo bahke jo seb re bo kpo. Elkv bahke tene bo.
66009007	Agohrobi nyao jolo go elfoongo ni any'nya nya bo ma toobo bo bum re bo ko bo tahm ebta. Nsol nyi bo konngo no jolo ana akpasi atul nya bo limi go agul. Asamahr ebo jolo ana asamahr ane.
66009008	Alv esi ebo jolo ana alv esi anebkal. Amahn ebo jolo ana amahn agabe.
66009009	Nsol nyi jolo go bo a ngang jolo ana agbanggbang nya bo limi go akuungu. Ewahl ji akpungkpung ebo jo wahl, jolo ana ewahl at'rok gbalee nya any'nya kp'tohng tahm ebta.
66009010	Bo kpi asil ana nya enang, fere bel atakelehk. Go bo asil wo, nsahm wob no, nyi bo kpo ta ane, sum bo, tete rehng nnyahng elon.
66009011	Bo kpi ntul no kpo fili bo, ye ji li enjel nyi nrabbe elbing nio. Mbing enye go alum Hibru, bo kpo lung-e re Abadon. Go alum Grik, bo kpo lung-e re Apollion (ji lohngo re Nr'rannge).
66009012	Ngbokambang erem ebsehng. Ebsa na ebal nya bahke kpe ba.
66009013	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel erakera kehm woro ntang enye. N kehm wuku nne no bungu go ngoongo nyio na eni nyi edi njom alimi ji bo limi go agul, ji jolo go mbuksong Esowo.
66009014	Á bungu tong enjel nyio nyi biingi enjel erakera nyi fili ntang re, “Fannge enjel nyio na eni nyi bo gba bo alehke bum go nkpe aya ma bo kpo lung re Yufrat, ma li aya ma nnen.”
66009015	Owo á kehm fannge enjel nyio na eni alehke yake, ba bo toobo bo bum re bo wul ejang ane ba li go njini, elya nio l'rehng, nnyahng mio l'rehng, efung bio l'rehng, awa nyao l'rehng. Go ejang ebra bi ane ba li go njini, bo bahke wulu ejang ajehng.
66009016	N wuku nfanga nsoja nyi kuumu go any'nya. Jolo ane atahl nku a nku. (200,000,000)
66009017	Go egame enyehnamahr, n nyehne any'nya nyao. Ane ba kuumu go any'nya nyao, bo lake agbanggbang nya bo limi go akuungu go bo a ngang. Agbanggbang nyao jolo ana agun fere jol ana elbung ni li saang, fere jol ana elgok. Asi any'nya nyao jolo, are asi agabe nya. Agun, at'tohk, a asalfa jo lohngo go bo anyo.
66009018	Go ejang ebra bi ane ba li go njini, ejang ajehng ji kpo no go arem nyao na ara. Arem nyao jolo agun, at'tohk, a asalfa nya jo lohng go bo anyo.
66009019	Tibre nsahm nyi any'nya nyao wob go bo anyo, a nsil ebo. Nsil ebo li ana asi enyo nya bo kpo ko tokko ane.
66009020	Erik ane bako ba ki kpo go arem nyao, bo tikem sennge njahm go nsol nyi bo limi go bo abo. Bo tikem yake abi atohko akake, a eblom bi bo limi go agul, a asilva, a akuungu, a atal, go nti, bi kil ma nyehn, bi kil ma wuk, bi kil ma jen,
66009021	jol bo tikem rahke ane awulu, a ntaane alimi, a ejv avohko, go enoongo a ane.
66010001	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn enjel nyehko nyi nnen kp'badde go ejahbetul Esowo abake. Á liibi ekparesemsem. Ebangenjok kuumu go ege esi. Esamahr ebe jolo ana njul. Akpade enye jolo ana akehrenkv nti nya jo lul.
66010002	Á fili mmonwer go ebo, no bo ma lennge. Á rodo ekpade eboblum eje kunu go agburu aya, ekpade ebobkal, á bum go egbuk.
66010003	Á kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre, are egabe ji. Á rabe kan ano me, aran na asehma kehm take.
66010004	Eji aran nyao na asehma ma ta, n tahme re me n nyon. N kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul ni bungu re, “Nsol nyi aran nyao na asehma bungu no, yab bum go, ka nyon!”
66010005	Enjel nyio nyi n nyehn-e no, nyi kunu ekpade jehko go alahb, fere bum ekpade jehko go egbuk, kehm tabe eboblum ebe ton go elbung,
66010006	fere nyam enyam go mbing nyi Esowo bi li go njinanjini, ye ji limi elbung, a nsol kpee nyi li go elbung, fere lim njini, a nsol kpee nyi li go njini, fere lim alahb, a nsol kpee nyi wob go alahb. Enjel nyio bungu re, “Esowo nehm kpe laange nkpel anyehng anyehng.
66010007	Ngare nyio nyi enjel nyi biingi enjel na esehma yahke wor ntang enye, owo ntoobo nyi Esowo toobo no go ege eltim, tong alokeltum ebe ba li abanyehnamahr bahke kehm limi mal.”
66010008	Ellum ni n wuku go ejahbetul Esowo ni jo bung a name, kehm kpe bung a name re, “Song, wo song ko nwer nyio nyi ma lennge, nyi enjel fili go ebo, ye ji yim, kunu ekpade jehko go alahb, fere bum ekpade jehko go egbuk.”
66010009	N kehm jeke goji enjel nyio, song tong-e re, á ka-m mmonwer noo. Á kehm-m tongo re, “Ko, wo li! Bahk-a jo liiki go nnyo ana akehng ekon, fere jo gell-a ala.”
66010010	N kehm taare enjel nyio mmonwer noo no á fili go ebo li. Jo liik-m go egama nnyo, are akehng ekon ma. Eji m ma li mal, kehm-m kehme ala gelle.
66010011	Bo kehm-m tongo re, “A bahke kpe nyehn amahr nya Esowo bade ane gbalee, a ajahbe tvv, a ane ba kpo bung ajahbe ebo nya li nkohn a nkohn, a atul gbalee.”
66011001	Owo bo kehm-m kake ejum ana ejiingi ji bo kpo ko gare nsol, fere tong-m re, “Song, wo song gare etahk Esowo, wo tob gare edi njom alimi, a ane ba kpo kak Esowo o.
66011002	Ka gare nlaaga etahk Esowo! Yake na yake! Tibre bobyake ka ane baka baka ba ki li Jus. Bo bahke jo jade mbarebare ejahbe jio go bo akpade go nnyahng atahl abal a nnyahng ebal.
66011003	M bahke kake atianse enyame na abal nya bahke jo kak agbajake nsol nsahm nyi bo bahke jo nyehn amahr tete nfung atahltahl nkpel era a nfung atahl ara nyio mal (1,260).”
66011004	Atianse nyao na abal nya li nti ebal nyio nyi bo kpo lung re oliv, nyi yim go esamahr bi Ntul Esowo bi li Ntul a njini. Bo j'nehm o ba li et'rekahng ebbal bi jehk go esamahr Esowo.
66011005	Nnekv awohng awohng no l'gare re á lim bo ejum, agun bahke lohngo go bo anyo fi-e. Ano wo fvfo, nne awohng awohng no l'gare re á lim bo ejum, bo bahk-e wulu.
66011006	Bo bahke bele nsahm nyi bo bahke ma sahde elahb go elnake ngare nyi bo kp'nyehne amahr nya Esowo, fere bel nsahm nyi bo bahke ma lim alahb siingi alung, fere kak njini erem abehng abehng ngare anyehng anyehng nyi koro bo.
66011007	Ngare nyi bo ma yiimi ntianse nyi Esowo mal, owo ebibbib nnyam nyi bahke lohngo go nrabbe elbing nio bahke noko ebta a bo, ga bo, fere wul bo.
66011008	Akv ebo bahke noongo go elatahkgur egburu ejahbe ji bo kumu Ntul abo go ekros. Esowo ebfaake mbing nyi Sodom, go Ijipt gungu ejahbe jio.
66011009	Nfung era kunu esi nyi ane bahke jo nyehn akv nyao. Bo bahke lohngo go ajoobo ajahbe tvv ba, a adi nkohn a nkohn, a ajang njini gbalee fvfo. Bo bahke jo bung ajahbe ebo, nya li nkohn a nkohn. Bo nehm taame re, bo kpa bo kak.
66011010	Ane ba li go njini, eltim bahke bo yebe sehng tib go elkv ni ane abal bao ma kpo. Bo bahke limi elkak, fere jo yare atem, tibre abanyehnamahr bao na abal ko erem gbalee ba kak ane ba li go njini.
66011011	Eji ma kang nfung nyio na era kunu esi, owo etohko ji kpo ka elkpin kehm lohngo goji Esowo, ba yel bo. Bo kehm soro tahm yiimi. Ane kpee ba jo nyehn bo, kehm kehme elfahle tete.
66011012	Owo bo kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu wahre wahre re, “Wahren, ba ga ero!” Eji anebekv ebo kpi bo seenge, ekparesemsem kehm rodo bo tahm a bo go ejahbetul Esowo.
66011013	Ngare ny'nehm ona ndi kehm kehme elgbehke tete. Go ejang ebwubu bi ejahbe jio, ejang ajehng ji wa no. Ane jolo atahltahl nkpel atahl anehkeni a nkpel elku (7,000) ba kpo no tib go ndi agbehke nyio. Erik ane bako ba sa no, anyar lamme bo sehng. Bo kehm kehme Esowo bi li go ero ellub ka.
66011014	Etoono erem bi biingi arem abal ebmal. Etoono erem behko bi yahke kpe ba.
66011015	Etoono enjel nyi biingi enjel esehma kehm woro ntang enye. Owo ane ba li go ejahbetul Esowo kehm bungu wahre wahre re, “Esowo bi li Ntul ewahre, a Mesaya enye, bobfere ko etul bi njini nyia. Esowo bahke fili njini ano ano go njinanjini.”
66011016	Eltahl anebkul ani ba ji go nti etul ebo go esamahr Esowo, kehm gboko kohk asamahr ndi, kak Esowo,
66011017	fere bung re, “E ma-a kak saam Ntul Esowo no gbal sehng, wo ji li anv, wo ji jolo mahne mahne, tibre wobko egburu nsahm enya, fere kehme njini fili.
66011018	Aneb njini, atahng jo rake bo tete. Tibre ngare erakatahng enya ebbiingi, nyi a bahke lame akvne. Ngare nyio nyi a bahke tuuru alokeltum eba, fere tuuru abanyehnamahr eba, a abarebare ane eba, a nne awohng awohng no kpo fahl mbing enya, afi á jolo ntul, afi á jolo nja. Ngare ebbingi nyi a bahke rannge ane ba rannge njini nyia.”
66011019	Owo bo kehm lennge mbutahk mi etahk Esowo ji li go ejahbetul eje. Bo kehm nyehne elkohl ni egbanngalung ji Esowo limi a ane ebe, jehk go etahk Esowo. Amangedu jo limi ona, a ewahl ane. Aran kehm kehme eltake na ta, ndi fere jo gbehke, elahb atal kehm kehme elnake.
66012001	Egburu elliingi kehm tibi go ejahbetul Esowo. Jolo nnenkal no ma liibi njul go ngubjing, fere kunu akpade go ebareka. Á konngo ekpasi ntul ji bele ewubu elonlo na ebbal.
66012002	Ngare nyio á jolo ela. Á kehm rabe eling tib go elyame ni jo yam-e, eji á yahke jel mmon.
66012003	Elliingi nehko kehm kpe tib go ejahbetul Esowo. Jolo egburu ed'ragon ji bili bil, ji bele esi na ebsehma, a ntang na ewubu. Á konngo ekpasi ntul go esi ajehng ajehng.
66012004	Go ejang ebra bi alonlo kpee nya li go elbung, ed'ragon jio kehm feenge ejang ajehng go ege elsil wohng go njini. Á kehm yiimi nnenkal no yahke jel go esamahr, eji á l'mele mmon noo, á l'si jel-e jel.
66012005	Nnenkal noo kehm jele nnenlum, no bahke njini kpee fili go ebti bi bo limi go ekuungu. Bo kehm soro ba gbiiri mmon noo, tahm a ne goji Esowo, a eti etul eje.
66012006	Nnenkal noo kehm soro be tahm go elka emahng, edi jio ji Esowo toobo bum-e, eji á l'le-e nfung atahltahl nkpel era a nfung atahl ara nyio (1,260).
66012007	Ebta kehm gboko go ejahbetul Esowo. Maikel, a enjel enye, bo kehm kehme elnoko a ed'ragon jio. Ed'ragon, a enjel enye kehm tob kehme elnoko a bo fvfo.
66012008	Maikel, a enjel enye kehm noko, fere ga bo. Ed'ragon, a enjel enye, edi ajehng ajehng kpeem jol go ejahbetul Esowo ka bo.
66012009	Bo kehm kame egburu ed'ragon jio yake go, ye ji li nk'kula nnyo nyi bo kpo lung-e re nnehm, fere jo lung-e re Nnekv, ye ji ma nehm njini nyia kpee. Ye wo, bo rod-e no tub go ndi, a enjel enye.
66012010	N kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni jo bung wahre wahre re, “Anv, eltahre ebba. Esowo ebahre ebtib nsahm enye. Etul ebe ebba. Anv, Mesaya enye nyi ma kehme edi fili. Tibre nne no jo bung ebi bade abonane ejahre, bo m-e rod tub go njini, ye jio ji jo ka bo ebi go esamahr Esowo ebahre atv a njul.
66012011	Bo m-e ga go ebta tib go alung ma mmon a njoro, a atianse ebo nya bo jo yiimi. Tibre elkpin ebo joom kor bo, owo wahnge bo jo taame elkv.
66012012	Siiken, wahn aneb ejahbetul, wahn kpee ji lene o. Eyuu a nahne, ndi abola agburu aya. Tibre yebbadde ba go egahne, a egburu erakatahng. Á kp'kahne re, afung enye ebsa kahbe kahbe.”
66012013	Eji ed'ragon jio sebe no kahn re, bo m-e rod tub go ndi, á kehm kehme nnenkal no jele mmon no nlum kam.
66012014	Nnenkal noo, bo ka-e akpungkpung na abal nya egburu ebtere, eji á l'be nnyo nyio, fonngo song rehng go elka emahng, edi jio ji bo bum-e no, jo le-e go nnya era kunu esi.
66012015	Nnyo nyio kehm kehme alahb yaange go ege a nnyo. Alahb mao kehm jo fab ana aya, jo toono nnenkal noo, eji l'kpu-e, tahm a ne.
66012016	Ndi kehm kake nnenkal noo ebo, lennge nnyo eme, fere wo alahb mao ma yaange go nnyo ed'ragon jio kpee.
66012017	Owo ed'ragon, atahng kehm-e rake tob nnenkal noo gbalee. Á kehm tahme re á song nok ebta a erik abon ebe bako kpee, bo ji kpo bum atahm nya Esowo, fere jo yiimi ntianse ka Jisos.
66012018	Ed'ragon jio yiimi go erikehndi ji li go egbuk agburu aya.
66013001	N kehm nyehne ebibbib nnyam kp'lohngo go agburu aya. Á bele esi na ebsehma, fere bel ntang ewubu. Á konngo ekpasi ntul go ntang anyehng anyehng. Esi ajehng ajehng eje bo nyon-e mbing a nkuk.
66013002	Nnyam nyi n nyehne no jolo ana ngbe. Akpade enye jolo ana nya ebea. Nnyo eme jolo ana mi egabe. Ed'ragon jio kehm-e kake eko eje, fere ka-e eti etul eje, fere ka-e nsahm enye.
66013003	Esi ajehng ji nnyam nyio jolo are bo bom-e elok elkv. Elok jio ona kehm kpoko. Njini kpee kpo bo esi area, bo kehm kehme eltoono ebi nnyam nyio.
66013004	Ane kpee fere jo kak ed'ragon jio, tibre ye wo ka nnyam nyio nsahm enye. Bo jo kake nnyam nyio, fere jo bung re, “Nne awo li ana nnyam nyia? Nne awo bahke ma nok ebta a ne?”
66013005	Nnyam nyio, bo ka-e nnyo mi á jo bung abi alum bade Esowo, fere jo bung nnyo. Bo ka-e nsahm re á fili edi go nnyahng atahl abal a nnyahng ebal.
66013006	Á kehm kehme Esowo su, fere jo su mbing enye, a etahk eje. Á jo t'tob su ane ba lene go ejahbetul Esowo.
66013007	Bo t'taame re á nok ebta a aneb Esowo, fere ga bo. Bo ka-e nsahm re á fili nnahb anyehng anyehng, a nne awohng awohng, a ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji kpo bung eje eje.
66013008	Nne awohng awohng no li go njini nyia bahk-e kake, no bo ki nyon mbing enye go nwer nyi elkpin, njini nyia kehm jolo. Nwer nyio li ka mmon a njoro no bo wul-e no.
66013009	Nne awohng awohng no l'bel atung, nong, á wuk.
66013010	Nne awohng awohng no l'wahng re ntem je ngbekobo, á bahke tob je ngbekobo fvfo. Nne awohng awohng no l'wul nne go ntahme, go ntahme wo fvfo, bo bahke tob wul-e. Ana wo li erehke ji Esowo rehke ane ebe re bo jo kpuumu, fere jo bel ekakesehk.
66013011	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn ebibbib nnyam nyehko kp'lohngo go ndi. Á bele ntang ebal ana nyi mmon a njoro. Á jo bungu, are ed'ragon ji.
66013012	Á jo fili edi go esamahr ngbokambang a nnyam nyi ka-e nsahm. Owo wahnge á jo lim re, nne awohng awohng no li go njini jo kak ngbokambang a nnyam nyi bele egburu elok ji jolo elok elkv, ma fere kpo.
66013013	Etoono nnyam nyio limi agburu akpokosi, á jo limi agun lohng go elbung ba gbo go ndi go esamahr ane.
66013014	Akpokosi nya bo ka-e no re á jo lim go esamahr ngbokambang a nnyam, nya nya wahnge á jo nehm ane kpee ba li go njini, fere tong bo re bo lim elokelom go elfoongo ni ngbokambang a nnyam nyi bo bom-e elok elkv, á kpeke li go elkpin.
66013015	Etoono nnyam nyio bele nsahm nyi á bahke ma ka elokelom jio elkpin, jio ji jolo go elfoongo ni ngbokambang a nnyam, eji elokelom jio l'jo bung, fere jo wul ane ba kil-e elkake.
66013016	Etoono nnyam nyio nyi limi re nne awohng awohng bel elliingi go ege eboblum, tohko jol ano go ege a mbuk, afi nne noo jolo ntul, afi á jolo nja, afi á jolo efange nne, afi á jolo nkpak, afi á jolo nju, afi nju á jolem.
66013017	Nne awohng awohng joom ma gunu, fere g'gungu, sehngem re no, á bele elliingi nio ni li mbing nyi nnyam nyio, tohko jol ano, nfange nyi yim go mbing nyio.
66013018	Nsol nyia nyi Esowo kp-r rehke re, wahr bel elkahne. Ye ji kpi elkahne, nong, á gabe ana nfange a nnyam nyio lohngo no. Tibre nfange nyio, nyi nne nyi, li atahltahl atahl awubu atahl ara kunu nsol erakera (666).
66014001	Owo n kehm seenge, soro nyehn mmon a njoro yim no go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Sayon. Ane ba jolo a ne o, ba bo nyono mbing a mmon a njoro, a mbing a Nde go bo a mbuk. Bo jolo ane atahltahl nkpel atahlku, a nkpel atahl ara (144,000).
66014002	N kehm wuku ewahl ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo, ji jolo ana elahb ji nnen a nnen, fere wuk ana aran kp'take. Ewahl ji n wuku no jolo ana ewahl ane ba kp'kubu abuk.
66014003	Bo yiimi go esamahr eti etul jio, a esamahr enyam bio na eni, a esamahr anebkul bao, jo yim ese ji nfenfe ji nne awohng awohng l'k'ma kpili, sehngem ellong ane ba jolo ane atahltahl nkpel atahlku, a nkpel atahl ara (144,000), ba bo ma fak bo go njini nyia yake, bo ba bahke ma kpili.
66014004	Ane bao ba li ane ba ki noongo a anebkal, tib eji bo li agol. Bo kpo toono mmon a njoro edi ajehng ajehng ji á l'je. Bo ba li agbokombang ane ba bo ma fak bo yake go ellong ane kpee ba li njini, ka Esowo, a mmon a njoro.
66014005	Nnene tikem wuk efahnge ajehng ajehng go bo anyo. Tibre eb'bi ajehng ajehng go bo atahng wobem.
66014006	N kehm nyehne enjel nyehko kp'fonngo go elka ejahbetul Esowo. Á bele nnoobo etib bi li go njinanjini, bi á bahke tiingi ane ba li go njini, go ejahbe ajehng ajehng, a nnahb anyehng anyehng, a nne awohng awohng, go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji kpo bung eje eje.
66014007	Owo á kehm bungu wahre wahre re, “Jo fahlen Esowo, wahn jo ka-e ellub. Tibre ngare ebrehng nyi á bahke lame njini. Jo kaken ye ji limi elbung, a ndi, fere lim agburu aya, a adi nya alahb kpo lohng.”
66014008	Etoono enjel nyehko nyi lohngo toono ngbokambang, kehm bungu re, “Bebilon ebgbo! Nj'joka Bebilon ebgbo, ye ji ka ane kpee ba ki nyi Esowo amahm eme ma as'sa re bo wo.”
66014009	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel era kehm kpe lohng toono enjel nyehko, kehm bungu wahre wahre re, “Nne awohng awohng no l'kak nnyam nyio, a elokelom jio, fere bel elliingi ene go ege a mbuk, afi jolo go ege ebo,
66014010	á bahke tob wo amahm mao ma erakatahng ji Esowo, ma á ma yaange kak go nkob nyi erakatahng eje, ma bo ki semme ejum ajehng ajehng. Bo bahk-e nohko go agun, a asalfa go esamahr bi abarebare enjel, a bi mmon a njoro.
66014011	At'tohk agun nya bahke jo kak bo erem, bahke jo lohng go njinanjini. Ane ba jo kak nnyam nyio, fere jo kak elokelom jio nehm bel erekekv ajehng ajehng atv a njul, a nne awohng awohng no bele elliingi ni mbing enye.”
66014012	Erehke jia li ka aneb Esowo re bo bel elkpuumu, bo jio ji kpo bum atahm nya Esowo, fere taame tv Jisos.
66014013	N kehm wuku ellum ni bungu go ejahbetul Esowo re, “Nyon nsol nyia re, Bomo anv asongo, elfuulu li ka ane ba bahke kpoko eji bo kp'toono Ntul Esowo.” Etingi Etohko kehm taame re, “Ano wo. Bo bahke reke ekv go bo a ntum, fere bel eltuuru ebo.”
66014014	N kehm tabe esamahr, soro nyehn mbarebare ekparesemsem. Nne no ji go ekparesemsem jio, á jolo go elfoongo ni Mmon no nne. Á konngo ekpasi ntul ji bo limi go agul, fere fili ekongkong ntahme go ebo.
66014015	Enjel nyehko kehm lohngo go etahk Esowo ba, kehm ba rabe tong nne no ji go ekparesemsem re, “Ko ntahme enya, wo ja nkohl, fere jo banne. Tibre ngare ebbiingi nyi nkohl abanne, eji nkohl nyi njini nyi ma bil.”
66014016	Owo nne no ji go ekparesemsem kehm fohko ntahme enye tv go njini, ja nkohl kpee nyi li go njini, fere banne.
66014017	Enjel nyehko kehm kpe lohng go etahk Esowo ji li go ejahbetul Esowo, ye fvfo tob fili ekongkong ntahme.
66014018	Enjel nyehko kehm kpe lohng go edi njom alimi ji Esowo ba. Ye wo li nne no agun wob-e go ebo. Á kehm rabe wahre wahre tong nne no fili ekongkong ntahme re, “Ko ntahme enya, wo kiimi atasok avain nya li go njini kpee, tibre akab enye ebbil.”
66014019	Enjel nyio kehm fohko ntahme enye tv go njini, kiimi atasok avain nyao kpee, soro kpu, song tuubu kak go elbing ni Esowo kpo kaame akab nti go ege erakatahng.
66014020	Elbing ni bo kpo kaame akab nti jolo go esi mbang. Alung ma jo lohng go elbing nio ni bo kpo kaame akab nti kehm yele, are nnyel nyi. Nnyel alung nyio yele rehng mmal atahl awubu. Elrahbe ni rahbe no, eny'nya l'yel, bahk-e rehnge go nnyo.
66015001	N kehm kpe nyehn egburu elliingi go ejahbetul Esowo ni kpo-m esi s'sehng. Jolo enjel na esehma nyi ko arem na asehma ba a nya, nya li es'kohro erem. Tibre nyao kpee l'lim, erakatahng ji Esowo bahke male.
66015002	N nyehne ejum ji jo foongo eto ji li anyehn anyehn, ji bo semme agun, fere nyehn ane bao ba ma ga ebi nnyam nyio, fere ga elokelom eje, fere tob ga nfange nyi mbing enye. Bo ba yiimi go nkpe eto nyio. Bo fili abuk go abo, nya Esowo ka bo.
66015003	Bo yimi ese ji Moses ji nlokeltum Esowo, fere yim ese ji mmon a njoro re, “Ntul Esowo no gbale sehng, nsol nyi a ma lim ebgbal, fere kp'kpo esi. Ntul no njini kpee, mbang nyi a kpo lim nsol enya kp'nobo, li go etingitingi.
66015004	Ntul, nne awo l'ki-a fahl? Nne awo l'k'ka mbing enya ellub? Tibre wo ntahngtahng wo li mbarebara nne. Njini kpee bahke ba kak wo. Tibre atingitingi alam nya a lame no, ane kpee ebnyehn.”
66015005	Owo n kehm kpe seenge, kehm soro nyehn edi ji sahb b'bar go ebkpatahk bi Esowo jo song kpiri ane ebe ma lennge.
66015006	Enjel nyio na esehma nyi ko arem nyao na asehma ba a nya, bo lohngo o edi jio ji sahb b'bar. Bo kake abarebare akpawobo nya jo bar kparaang, fere gbaange agbaange nya bo limi go agul go bo ak'kv.
66015007	Nnyam anyehng nyi woomo go ellong enyam bio na eni kehm kake enjel nyio na esehma nkpingi na esehma bi bo limi go agul. Erakatahng ji Esowo bi li go njinanjini ruru go nkpingi nyio.
66015008	Edi jio ji sahb b'bar kehm jolo at'tohk at'tohk nya lohngo goji ellub ni Esowo, a nsahm enye. Nnene kpeem jol, no kpe ma yel ekp'kpa jio tete arem asehma nya enjel nyio na esehma ko no ba mal.
66016001	Owo n kehm wuku ellum ni jo bung wahre wahre go etahk Esowo tong enjel nyio na esehma re, “Songen, wahn song rod nkpingi esehma bi erakatahng ji Esowo wob no, song sale wohngo go njini.”
66016002	Owo ngbokambang enjel kehm tahme, song rod ekpingi eje ji erakatahng ji Esowo woomo no, sale wohngo go njini. Ane ba bele elliingi ni nnyam nyio, fere jo kak elokelom eje, kehm gboko alok nya jo sahb s'sab, fere jo y'yam.
66016003	Etoono enjel nyehko kehm rodo ekpingi eje, sale erakatahng ji Esowo kak go agburu aya. Alahb mao fere jol are alung akvne ma. Nnyam anehng anyehng nyi woomo go agburu aya kpo.
66016004	Etoono enjel nyi biingi enjel era kehm tob yaange erakatahng ji Esowo ji woomo go ege ekpingi kak go aya, fere kak go ngba alahb, a edi ajehng ajehng ji alahb kpo lohng. Alahb mao kehm siingi alung.
66016005	N kehm wuku enjel nyi alahb wob-e go ebo kp'bungu re, “Mbarebare Esowo, wo ji kpeke li anv, wo ji jolo wuku wuku, a kpo lam elam eja nob nob.
66016006	Alung aneb Esowo ba bo wulu no, a ma abanyehnamahr Esowo fvfo ebkuumu bo. Owo wahnge a ma ka bo alung re bo wo, ana eltuuru ebo.”
66016007	N kehm kpe wuk ellum ni bungu go edi njom alimi re, “Ntul Esowo no gbale sehng, elam eja ji a kpo lam, lohko li nob nob go etingitingi.”
66016008	Etoono enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel eni kehm yaange erakatahng ji Esowo ji woomo go ege ekpingi wohngo go njul. Bo ka-e nsahm nyi á bahke jo fi ane go agun.
66016009	Elfubu ni jo fub ane, jo sabe sehng. Ane kehm kehme mbing Esowo su, Esowo bi erem bio woom-e go ebo. Bo tikem gbo ndon go bo abiafem, fere jo ka-e ellub.
66016010	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel elon kehm yaange erakatahng ji Esowo ji woomo go ege ekpingi wohngo go eti etul ji nnyam nyio. Ejahbe eje ji á jo fili kehm gboko ejannge. Ane jo tokko nliki ebo tib go erem bi bo jo nyehn.
66016011	Bo jo su Esowo bi li go ejahbetul tib go erem bi bo jo nyehn, a alok nya jo yam bo. Bo tikem yake ab'bi abang ebo.
66016012	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel erakera kehm yaange erakatahng ji Esowo ji woomo go ege ekpingi kak go aya ma nnen ma bo kpo lung re Yufrat. Alahb mao ka kpee, eji l'lim mbang ka atul ba li go ero nfam.
66016013	N kehm nyehne esabsab etohko na ebra bi jolo go elfoongo ni akpajahme, jehko lohngo go nnyo mi ed'ragon, jehko lohngo go nnyo mi nnyam nyio, jehko lohngo go nnyo mi nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr.
66016014	Bo jolo atohko nya eblehm nya kpo lim akpokosi. Bo kehm song kpiri atul ba li go njini kpee re, bo ko bo ba kono edi ajehng, eji bo l'ba nok ebta go egburu efung bi Esowo bi gbale sehng.
66016015	“Kunen ekpu! N kp'bake ana nwajv. Elfuulu bahke jolo ka nne no kil eblale, ye ji kp'kuuru abomo enye, eji á l'k'jen ebun ebun, ane jo rik-e ndon.”
66016016	Atohko nyao ko atul bao ba a bo. Atul bao ba kono asi go edi ji bo jo lung go alum Hibru re Armagedon.
66016017	Enjel nyehko nyi biingi enjel esehma kehm gohro yaange erakatahng ji Esowo ji woomo go ege ekpingi wohngo go ewuungu. N kehm soro wuk ellum ni bungu wahre wahre go eti etul ji jolo go etahk Esowo jio re, “Emmal!”
66016018	Amangedu kehm kehme ellimi, a ewahl ane, aran jo ta, ndi jo gb'gbehke. Elkohn nio ka gbehka gbehke eji ane tiki li go njini. Jol njini ka gbehka gbehke ano.
66016019	Egburu ejahbe kehm bahnge ejang ebra. Ajahbe kpee nya li go njini rannge kpee. Esowo kehm buumu Bebilon ji nnen a nnen, fere lim-e re, á wo go nkob amahm nyi egburu erakatahng eje.
66016020	Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji jolo go elka alahb daade kpee. Ewong ajehng ajehng kpeem jol, ji bo jo kpe nyehn.
66016021	Agburu abahk elahb atal nya ebahk ajehng jo lub ana ekpa akang ji nnen jo fooro ero, jo tuubu ane. Ane kehm kehme Esowo su tib go erem bio bi elahb atal, tibre jolo egburu erem area.
66017001	Enjel anyehng go ellong enjel nyio na esehma nyi fili nkpingi na esehma kehm bake, ba tong-m re, “Ba! M bahk-a tibi erem bi bo bahke kak njenas'sa no ga ga, ye ji jehk go ero alahb ma gbale gbal.
66017002	Atul ba njini nyia noongo a njenas'sa noo. Ane ba li njini jo buumu amahm as'sa ma á ka bo, bo wo.”
66017003	Enjel nyio kehm soro rod-m go etohko, tahm a name go elka emahng. Owo n kehm nyehne nnenkal jehk go mbilibila nnyam nyi abing akuk saab-e na saabe go ngubjing. Nnyam nyio bele esi na ebsehma, fere bel ntang ewubu.
66017004	Nnenkal noo liibi abilibili nsol nya atul kpo kono elkake. Á liibi akpakamahr akpakamahr, eji á kake nsol nyi bo limi go agul, fere kak nsol nyi bo limi go atal nya nno a nno, fere kak amohkesol nya kpo sahb k'kim ekun. Á fili ekpingi agul go ebo ji nsol eltehb ma rur, a asabsab nsol nya as'sa enye.
66017005	Go ege a mbuk, bo nyon-e nkpokosi a mbing re, “Bebilon ji gbale gbal, ye wo li ntul as'sa, a nfono eltehb go njini kpee.”
66017006	N nyehne nnenkal noo kp'buumu, tibre á jo wo alung ma aneb Esowo, fere jo wo alung ma ane ba bo wulu bo go esi ji Jisos. Eji n nyehn-e no, kpo-m esi sehng.
66017007	Enjel nyio kehm-m bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge kp-a kpoko esi? Nong, me n lennge nkpokosi nyi nnenkal noo tong-a, tob lennge bada nnyam nyio nyi solo nnenkal noo, nyi bele esi na ebsehma, a ntang ewubu.
66017008	Nnyam nyio nyi a nyehne no, nyi jolo go elkpin ngare nyehko go, nyi ki kpe li go elkpin anv, á yahke ba ellohngo go nrabbe elbing nio ba. Á bahke feere song yel go ebi edi. Ane bao ba li go njini, ba bo ki nyon abing ebo go nwer nyi elkpin, njini kehm jolo, bahke kpoko bo esi sehng, bo l'nyehn nnyam nyio. Tibre á tohko jol go elkpin, anv, á kpeem li, á bahke kpe feere ba.
66017009	“A wo li ntir elkahne. Asi nnyam nyio na asehma lohngo ewong na ebsehma bi nnenkal noo jehk no.
66017010	Tob lohngo atul na asehma. Atul na alon kpeem li. Ntul awohng noa anv. Noko bahke kpe ba. Á l'ba, á bahke jolo mmongare ntiil.
66017011	Nnyam nyio nyi tohko jol go elkpin, anv, á ki kpe li, ye wo li ntul no bahke toono atul bao na asehma. Á tob wob go ellong atul bao na asehma. Á bahke yele go ebi edi.
66017012	“Atang nyao na awubu nya a nyehne no, longo atul na awubu ba kala kehme adi fili. Bo bahke bele nsahm nyi bo bahke tobo nnyam nyio adi afili ana atul go awa anyehng.
66017013	Bo li eltimtim anehng. Bo bahke faake a nsahm ebo, ka nnyam nyio, fere woom-e go elwo.
66017014	Bo bahke noko ebta a mmon a njoro. Mmon a njoro, a ane ebe ba á lungu bo, fere jak bo, bo ji kpi ekakesehk kp-e toono, bahke gake bo. Tibre ye wo li ntul no sehnge atem atul bako kpee.”
66017015	Enjel nyio kehm-m tongo re, “Alahb mao ma a nyehne no, ma nnenkal as'sa noo jehk go ero, lohngo ane, ellong ane gbalee, ajoobo ajahbe gbalee nya kpo bung alum ebo ebo.
66017016	Ntang ewubu nyi a nyehne no, a nnyam nyio, bo bahke koko njenas'sa noo ekv, fere taar-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji á kpi no, yak-e ebun ebun. Bo bahke lehke ngubjing enye, fere fi-e agun.
66017017	Tibre Esowo ebkak bo ntir nyio go bo a ntim re bo lim ji kp-e koro, fere jol eltimtim anehng, fere faake a etul ebo ka nnyam nyio tete alum nya Esowo bungu no lohko jol go etingitingi.
66017018	“Nnenkal no a nyehn-e no, ye wo li egburu ejahbe ji atul ba li go njini wob-e go elwo.”
66018001	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn enjel nyehko kp'badde go ejahbetul Esowo. Á jolo nj'jok, fere bel nsahm. Ellub ene jo ka ellennge go njini.
66018002	Á kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Bebilon ji gbale gbal ebgbo! Bebilon ebgbo! Ebfere jol edi ellene ji eblehm. Esabsab etohko ajehng ajehng, a esabsab ebruk abehng abehng bi li ebruk eltehb lene elbad nio.
66018003	Tibre ane baka baka kpee ebwo amahm eme mao ma as'sa. Atul ba li go njini ebnoongo a ne. Ajenare ba njini nyia ebgbo afang tib go elfo ni á jo li.”
66018004	Owo n kehm kpe wuk ellum nehko ni bungu go ejahbetul Esowo re, “Lohngen ane ebame, lohngen o, eji ń l'k'yel go ege abiafem nya á kp'limi, fere tob nyehn erem bi á bahke nyehne.
66018005	Abiafem enye ebtub nsun, fere wahre elkul tete rehng go elbung. Esowo ebbuumu ab'bi enye.
66018006	Tob limen ye ana á lim-n no. Bongen ye sehnge ana á limi no. Ganen ye amahm sehnge ana ma á ka-n no.
66018007	Ana á ka elne ellub, fere jo li elfo, ano wo fvfo ḿ bahke tob kak-e erem, fere lim-e, á jol ndon ndon.
66018008	Owo bahke wahnge erem bi á bahke nyehne bahke bake gburub efung abehng, erem behko bahke jolo elkv, behko ndon, behko njal. Bo bahk-e fehke go agun. Tibre Ntul Esowo bi kp-e lame, kp'tahne.”
66018009	Atul ba njini nyia ba noongo a ne, fere jo li elfo a ne, bo bahke jo ling, fere jo wa-e eyuu, eji bo bahke nyehne at'tohk nya ejahbe jio kp'lulu.
66018010	Bo bahke jo yiimi dake dake, tibre bo kp'fahle erem bi á kp'nyehne. Bo bahke jo bung re, “Eyuu a egburu ejahbe jio, Bebilon ji gbale gbal. Re kehm biingi awa anyehng, erem eba ebba.”
66018011	Abajenare ba li go njini nyia bahke jo ling. Eko bahke bo tan, tibre nnene limm, no kp'kpeke gunu nsol are ebo,
66018012	agul, asilva, atal nya nno a nno, amohkesol nya kpo sahb k'kim ekun, anoobo abarebare abomo, abomo nya atul kpo kak a akal akal ebo, a afang ane, elkohn nti gbalee nyi kpo v eleenge, nsol nyi bo kpo ko amahn njok lim, nsol nyi bo kpo ko nti nyi kpo sahb k'kim ekun lim, abilikpi, akuungu, abarebare atal,
66018013	nsol ana nyi bo kpo lung re esinamon, nyi bo kpo ko kak go nsol alehke yebe, alaknti ana nya bo kpo lung re mmir abola efrankinsens, nya bo kpo kak agun, jo teebe, jo v es'svv eleenge, amahm, akehng, nkohl nyi bo kpo gok, lim abred, nsol atohkondi, ejoro, any'nya, at'rok, aju, a atohko ane.
66018014	Abajenare bao kehm-e tongo re, “Anoobo nsol nya a jo kunu ekpu re a bahke bele, ebdaade. Nsol afang enya kpee, a awiliwili nsol enya ebmal kpee, a nehm kpe ma bel.”
66018015	Abajenare bo jo gungu nsol nyio, fere fang tib ye, bahke jo yiimi dake dake, tib bo bahke jo fahl erem bi á bahke jo nyehn. Bo bahke jo ling, fere jo wa-e eyuu wahre wahre re,
66018016	“Eyuu, eyuu, eyuu a egburu ejahbe jia ji jo kono elliibi abarebare abomo, fere jo liibi abilibili nsol nya atul kpo kono elkake, fere jo kak nsol nyi bo limi go agul, fere tob jo kak nsol nyi bo limi go atal nya nno a nno, a amohkesol nya kpo sahb k'kim ekun.
66018017	Re kehm biingi awa anyehng, nsol afang enye ebrannge kpee mal.” Atubesi asohkkahng, go ane ba kpo lim eltum go asohkkahng, a ane bako kpee ba jo lim eltum go aya, bo jo yiimi dake dake,
66018018	fere jo ling, eji bo nyehne at'tohk nya á jo lul. Bo kehm bungu re, “Ejahbe aji ji bik a egburu ejahbe jio?”
66018019	Bo jo kpu ndi, jo kunu go bo asi, eji bo jo ling, fere jo wa eyuu re, “Eyuu a egburu ejahbe jio! Tib nsol afang nya ejahbe jio nya wahnge afono asohkkahng kpee gbo afang. Re kehm biingi awa anyehng, yebtane ejum ajehng ajehng kpee.”
66018020	Aneb ejahbetul Esowo wahn, belen eyebatahng tib go ege elrannge. Belen eyebatahng, wahn aneb Esowo, a abatiingetib Jisos, go abanyehnamahr Esowo fvfo, tibre Esowo m-e lam, wahn fere li eno.
66018021	Owo enjel nyi gbale gbal kehm mehle eltal ni jolo ana egburu eltal ngoko, tub kak agburu aya, kehm bungu re, “Ana wo bo bahke rodo egburu ejahbe ji bo kpo lung re Bebilon tub fvfo. Bo nehm kpe tiki nyehn enyehnenyehne.
66018022	“Nnene limm, no bahke kpe wuk ase nya bo kpo kub go abuk ona, fere wuk afiri, a atang, fere wuk ase nya aneb ase kp'kubu. Nlimeltum awohng awohng ana ntahlagun, ana njammansol, ana nkonajangnti nehm kpe jol o ejolojolo. Nnene limm, no bahke kpe wuk nne awohng awohng kp'goko nsol ona.
66018023	Nnene limm, no bahke kpe nyehn et'rekahng ajehng ajehng kp'yake ona. Nnene limm, no bahke kpe je elkak elbal ona. Tibre abajenare eba ba jolo aj'jok ane kpee go njini. Go ega ntaane wo, a jo nehm ane kpee ba li go njini.”
66018024	Alung aneb Esowo, a alung abanyehnamahr Esowo, a ma ane kpee ba bo wulu bo go njini, bo nyehne go ega ejahbe.
66019001	Owo n kehm wuku ewahl ana alum ane gbalee go ejahbetul Esowo, ba jo bung wahre wahre re, “Tehken Esowo! Eltahre, ellub, a nsahm li ka Esowo ebahre,
66019002	tibre elam eje ji á kpo lam, li go etingitingi, á kpo lam nob nob. Yeblam egburu njenas'sa noo no rannge njini nyia kpee go ege as'sa. Esowo m-e bongo tib goji á wulu alokeltum ebe.”
66019003	Bo kehm kpe rabe nkpel nyehko re, “Tehken Esowo! Tibre at'tohk nya kp'lohngo go ejahbe jio bahke jo je go ero go njinanjini.”
66019004	Anebkul bao, eltahl ane ani, a enyam bio na eni, kehm gboko go ndi, kak Esowo bi jehk go eti etul jio re, “Emen, tehken Esowo!”
66019005	N kehm wuku ellum ni bungu go eti etul jio re, “Tehken Esowo ebahre, wahn alokeltum ebe kpee, ba kpo fahl-e, afi ń jolo anebkul, afi ń jolo abonse.”
66019006	Owo n kehm kpe wuk ewahl ji jolo ana ewahl ji ane gbalee, fere jolo ana elahb ji kp'sahb w'wahl. Ewahl jio jolo ana aran nya kp'sahb t'ta, nya bungu wahre wahre re, “Tehken Esowo! Tibre Esowo Ntul ewahre no gbale sehng wo kp'fili edi.
66019007	Nong, wahr belen eyebatahng, fere jo geere. Nong, wahr ka-e ellub. Tibre ngare elbal nyi mmon a njoro bahke koko elbal ebbiingi. Nkal ewe ebtoobo ebjing.
66019008	Bo t'taame re, á liibi abarebare nsol nya kp'sahb b'bar kparaang.” Tibre abarebare nsol nyao lohngo atingitingi nsol nya aneb Esowo limi no.
66019009	Enjel nyio kehm bungu a name re, “Nyon nsol nyia re, Elfuulu bahke jolo ka ane ba bo ma tiingi bo elkak elbal nio ni mmon a njoro.” Enjel nyio kehm kpe bung a name re, “Atingitingi alum nya ana nya Esowo.”
66019010	N kehm soro gbo go ege alata kak-e. Á kehm-m tongo re, “Ka kpe lim ano! Me n li nlokeltum ana wo, a abonane bako, ba kpo bung etingitingi ji Jisos lennge no ka bo. Jo kak Esowo!” Tibre, etingitingi ji Jisos lennge no ka, ji ji jolo abanyehnamahr Esowo go bo a ntim, bo jo bung.
66019011	Owo n kehm nyehne mbu mi ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge. N kehm kpe nyehn mbarebare eny'nya. Nne no kuum-e go njahm, bo kpo lung-e re Nkakesehk a nne no li go etingitingi. Á kpo lam elam ji nno, fere jo nok ebta bi nno.
66019012	Amahr enye li ana eblikagun. Á konngo akpasi atul gbalee. Á kpi mbing nyi bo nyon-e no, nyi nnene kil elkahne, sehngem ye ntahngtahng wo kp'kahne.
66019013	Á kake ekpawobo ji bo nyobo go alung. Mbing enye, bo kpo lung-e re Alum Esowo.
66019014	Nsoja nyi li go ejahbetul Esowo kehm tahme toon-e. Bo kake abarebare nsol nya sahb b'bar kparaang, fere kuumu go abarebare any'nya.
66019015	Ekongkong ekahngkahng kpo lohng-e go nnyo, bi á bahke koko, boomo ane ba li go njini. Á bahke jo fili bo go ebti bi bo limi go ekuungu. Á bahke kaame akab avain go elbing avain akaame ni egburu erakatahng ji Esowo bi gbale sehng.
66019016	Bo nyono mbing go ege ekpawobo, fere nyon go ege eyo re, “Ntul no gbale sehnge atem atul bako.”
66019017	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn enjel nyehko yim go atahng njul. Á kehm rabe lung nruk kpee nyi jo fonngo go elka ejahbetul Esowo re, “Baan, wahn ba kono edi ajehng go egburu elkak ni Esowo,
66019018	fere li akv atul, a akv nya atubesi nsoja, a nya aj'jok ane, fere tob li akpakv any'nya, a akv nya ane ba jo kuumu bo go njahm, a nya ane kpee, afi bo jolo aju, afi aju bo jolem, afi bo jolo atul, afi bo jolo aja.”
66019019	N nyehne nnyam nyio, a atul ba njini nyia, a nsoja ebo kpee. Bo kono edi ajehng re bo nok ebta a nne no kun go eny'nya, a nsoja enye.
66019020	Bo kehm bobo nnyam nyio, a nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr no jo lim akpokosi go esamahr nnyam nyio. Tib go akpokosi nyao wo, á jo nehm ane ba bele elliingi ni nnyam nyio, fere jo nehm ane ba jo kak elokelom eje. Nnyam nyio, a nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr noo, bo ba, bo rodo bo mbir mbir, tub kak go eto agun ji asalfa kpo lul.
66019021	Nsoja ebo kpee, nne no kuumu go eny'nya wulu bo kpee go ekahngkahng bi lohngo go ege a nnyo. Nruk nyio kpee kehm ba li akv ebo wohngo.
66020001	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn enjel nyehko ma lohng go ejahbetul Esowo kp'badde abake. Á fili egbokoro ji nrabbe elbing nio, fere fili ngbekobo nyi nnen a nnen go ebo.
66020002	Á kehm bobo ed'ragon jio ji li nk'kula nnyo, ye ji bo kpo lung-e re nnehm, fere jo lung-e re Nnekv, gbaang-e ngbekobo nyio re á jol ano go nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu.
66020003	Owo á kehm-e rodo, tub kak nrabbe elbing nio, bulu, fere gbaange, eji á l'k'kpe nehm ane ba li go njini, tete biingi nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu. L'biingi ano, bo kehm-e yehke mmongare ntiil.
66020004	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn nti etul, fere nyehn ane ba bo ka bo nsahm re bo jo lam alam jehk no go nti etul nyio. N kpe tob nyehn atohko nya ane ba bo kiimi bo asi tib go ntianse nyi bo jo yiimi ka Jisos, a alum Esowo. Bo tikem kak nnyam nyio, a elokelom eje. Bo tikem bel elliingi ene go bo a mbuk, jol go bo abo bo belem. Bo bele elkpin, fere jo fili edi a Kraist go nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu.
66020005	Akvne nyako kpeem nyahme, bel elkpin, tete nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu nyio biingi. A wo li ngbokambang elnyahme go elkv
66020006	Ane ba bahke gboko mbang nyahme go elkv, bo ba li aneb Esowo, ba elfuulu ni Esowo li ka bo. Elkohn ane bao, etoono elkv, nsahm anyehng anyehng kpeem kpi nyi bahke kpe fili bo. Bo bahke jolo abalimajom ba Esowo, fere jol abalimajom ba Kraist. Bo bahke fili edi a ne go nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu.
66020007	Eji ma biingi nnya atahltahl nkpel ebal atahl awubu, owo bo bahke yehke nnehm go ngbekobo nyi á woomo no yake.
66020008	Á bahke lohngo ba nehm ane ba li go ejang njini abehng abehng. Bo ba li Gog abola Magog. Nnehm bahke lungu bo ba kono edi ajehng re bo nok ebta. Bo bahke ruru, are asahknti nya.
66020009	Bo kehm yele, jo jen alab ejahbe tete ba sennge ebud aneb Esowo kak, a ejahbe ji kpo kor Esowo. Agun kehm lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba fi bo kpee.
66020010	Nnehm nyi nehme bo, bo rod-e ro kak eto agun ji asalfa kpo lul, edi jio ji nnyam nyio, a nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr noo wob no. Owo bo bahke woomo, jo nyehn erem bi ebnohko atv a njul tete go njinanjini.
66020011	N kehm kpe nyehn egburu mbarebare eti etul, fere nyehn nne jehk no. Elbung abola ndi kehm beke go ege esamahr tahm. Edi ajehng ajehng kpeem jol ka bo, ji bo bahke jolo.
66020012	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn akvne, egom jindiki jolo abonse, egom jehko anebkul, bo yim go mbuksong eti etul jio. Esowo kehm lennge awer, kehm kpe lennge nwer nyehko nyi jolo nwer nyi elkpin. Akvne nyao, bo lame bo ana bo nyono go awer nyao, jang jang ana bo limi no.
66020013	Agburu aya yake akvne nya woomo atahng ka. Elkv abola ejahbe akvne tob yake akvne nya bo fili no ka. Bo lame bo jang jang ana bo limi no.
66020014	Elkv abola ejahbe akvne, bo rodo bo, ro kak go eto agun. Eto agun jio ji li etoono elkv nehko.
66020015	Nne awohng awohng no bo ki nyon mbing enye go nwer nyio nyi elkpin, bo rod-e na, ro kak go eto agun.
66021001	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn elbung ni nfenfe, fere nyehn ndi nyi nfenfe. Tibre ngbokambang elbung, a ngbokambang a ndi ebtan. Agburu aya kpeem li elikiliki.
66021002	Owo n kehm kpe nyehn mbarebare ejahbe, Jerusalem ji nfenfe kp'badde go ejahbetul Esowo abake. Á toobo ebjing, fere liibi ana nkalanne liibi re, á song kpiri nlumanne.
66021003	N wuku ellum ni bungu wahre wahre go eti etul jio re, “Anv, Esowo bahke kake elsi ene goji ane. Á bahke lene tob bo. Bo bahke jolo ane ebe. Yefono antahng bahke jolo a bo, fere jol Esowo ebo.
66021004	Á bahke fulu bo abonngo kpee go bo amahr. Elkv nehm kpe jol ejolojolo. Ndon anyehng anyehng nehm kpe jol. Aling nehm kpe jol. Ayam nehm kpe jol. Tibre nsol nyi tohko jol ebtan.”
66021005	Nne no jehk go eti etul jio kehm bungu re, “Anv, n kp'limi nsol kpee, fere jol nyi nfenfe.” Á kpe bung re, “Nyon alum nyaa, tibre alum nyaa, alum etingitingi nya, li alum nya nne bahke bumu go etingitingi.”
66021006	Á kehm-m tongo re, “Ebmal. Me wo li Alfa, me j'nehm wo li Omega. Me wo li mbomannahb, me j'nehm wo li es'kohlo. Nne no alahb l'kor-e, m bahk-e kake alahb mbol mbol, ma lohng go elbing alahb nio ni alahb ma elkpin.
66021007	“Nne awohng awohng no l'ga anebekv ebe, á bahke lehke elkv nia. M bahke jolo Esowo ebe, ye bahke jolo mmon ewame.
66021008	Agubgub ane, ane ba kil jo taame, ane ba ma rannge, awulane, ane ba kpo noongo a ane, aneb ntaane, abajomeblom, akimfahnge ane kpee, nsehng ebo nyi bo bahke lehke, bo bahke woomo go eto ji asalfa kpo lul. Owo li etoono elkv nehko.”
66021009	Enjel anyehng nyi woomo go ellong enjel na esehma nyi fili nkpingi na esehma bi es'kohro arem na asehma ruru no, kehm bake go egame, ba tong-m re, “Ba, me n song tib-a nkal a mmon a njoro.”
66021010	Á kehm-m rodo go etohko, tahm a name go ewong ji sahb w'wahre, fere tib-m Jerusalem, mbarebare ejahbe kp'badde go ejahbetul Esowo abake.
66021011	Bele ellub ni Esowo, fere jo ya ana eltal ni nno a nno ni ga ga, ni li ana eltal ni bo kpo lung re ejaspa, fere wili ana eltal ni bo kpo lung re ekristel.
66021012	Bele egburu ekahme sennge kak, ji wahre wahre. Ekahme jio bele ewubu a mbutahk ebal. Ewubu enjel ebal jolo go abutahk nyao. Go abutahk nyao, bo nyono ewubu a mbing ebal nyi at'tohngo nya li go Israel kpee.
66021013	Ekahme jio bele ngoongo eni, ejang ajehng ajehng jo bele mbutahk era, ejang ero nfam bele mbutahk era, ejang erede nfam bele mbutahk era, ejang eboblum bele mbutahk era, ejang ebobkal bele mbutahk era.
66021014	Ekahme ji ejahbe jio bele ewubu atal abal nya bo ko bum nnahb ekahme. Atal nyao, bo nyono abing abatiingetib mmon a njoro, ewubu ane abal.
66021015	Nne no jo bung a name fili ejum ana ejiingi ji bo limi go agul re á ba gare ejahbe jio, fere gare abu, fere tob gare ekahme.
66021016	Ejahbe jio bele ngoongo eni. Alab, a akpang jolo jang jang. Enjel nyio jo gare ejahbe jio go ege ejiingi. Jolo astadio gbalee (12,000), nya li ejum mmal atahltahl nkpel era atahlku.
66021017	Á tob gare ekahme fvfo, wahre sehnge ana njan, jolo akubit atahl asehma a ekubit emni (144). (Ekubit ajehng li erula ajehng kunu esi). Enjel nyio gare ana nne kpo kono elgare.
66021018	Bo lange ekahme jio go atal nya nno a nno, nya bo kpo lung re ejaspa. Yefono ejahbe, bo limi go nnyam agul agul, jo wili ana enyehn.
66021019	Nnahb ekahme nyio, bo liibi go ajoobo atal nya nno a nno. Ngbokambang eltal jolo eltal ni bo kpo lung re ejaspa, nehko esafir, nehko agate, nehko emerald,
66021020	nehko oniks, nehko ekarnilian, nehko ekrisolit, nehko eberil, nehko etopas, nehko ekrisopras, nehko ejasin, nehko ametist.
66021021	Ewubu a mbutahk ebal mi jolo ewubu a mmohkesol ebal nya kpo sahb k'kim ekun. Mbu amehng amehng bo jo ko mmohkesol anyehng lim. Mbang nyi li go alab ejahbe jio jolo nnyam agul agul, jolo ana enyehn ji nne kp'nyehne wane go wane ga.
66021022	Etahk Esowo ajehng ajehng nyehnem ejahbe jio. Tibre Ntul Esowo antahng antahng no gbale sehng, a mmon a njoro, bo ba li etahk Esowo ji ejahbe jio.
66021023	Ejahbe jio ona kpehme seb njul, a ebareka re jo ya ona, tibre ellub ni Esowo ni kp'yake ejahbe jio, ni ni kpo ka ejahbe jio ellennge. Mmon a njoro wo li et'rekahng ji kp'yake ona.
66021024	Ellennge nio ni mmon a njoro ni bahke wahnge ane baka baka ba li go njini nyia jo nyehn, fere jo jen. Atul ba li go njini nyia bahke koko ellub ebo ba a ni go ejahbe jio.
66021025	Abu nya ejahbe jio, bo nehm jo tiki bam. Bahke jo jol foong efung kohro kohro. Atv nehm kpe jol o ejolojolo.
66021026	Ane baka baka kpee ba li go njini bahke jo ko ellub ebo ba a ni go ejahbe jio, a ekpunu ebo.
66021027	Ejumjum nehm yel ejahbe jio ji ki li saang. Nnene limm, no bahke yele ejahbe jio, no kpo lim nsol eltehb, afi á kpo kiimi afahnge, sehngem ane ba, bo nyono abing ebo go nwer nyi elkpin nyi mmon a njoro, bo ba bahke yele ejahbe jio.
66022001	Owo á kehm-m tibi aya ma alahb elkpin, ma jo wili ana eltal ni bo kpo lung re ekristel, bomo elfabe go eti etul ji Esowo, a ji mmon a njoro,
66022002	asongo go elka mbang ni ejahbe jio. Eti ji elkpin yiimi go egbuk aya ebbal ebbal. Jo kabe akab, ewubu a nkpel ebal go elya, nkpel anyehng go nnyahng. Anyane eti nyao nya li ekahm ji ane baka baka ba li go njini.
66022003	Ejum nkuk ajehng ajehng nehm jo jol go ejahbe jio. Eti etul ji Esowo, j'nehm ji li ji mmon a njoro bahke jolo o. Alokeltum ebe bahke jo kak-e.
66022004	Bo bahke jo nyehn esamahr ebe. Mbing enye bahke jolo go bo a mbuk.
66022005	Atv nehm kpe jol ejolojolo. Bo nehm kpe seb at'rekahng, jol njul bo nehm kpe seb. Tibre Ntul Esowo wo bahke jolo et'rekahng ebo ji bahke jo ka bo ellennge. Bo bahke jolo atul, jo fili adi go njinanjini.
66022006	Á kehm-m tongo re, “Alum nyaa, alum etingitingi nya, li alum nya nne bahke bumu go etingitingi. Ntul Esowo no kpo ka abanyehnamahr ebe etohko eje, ye wo ma tum enjel enye re á ba tib alokeltum ebe ejum ji bahke gulu ellimi.”
66022007	Jisos bungu re, “Wuungen atung! N kp'bake go elwaare! Elfuulu bahke jolo ka nne no jo bum alum enyehnamahr nya nwer nyia.”
66022008	Me Jon wo, ji wuku nsol nyia, fere ny'nyehn. N wuku kan nsol nyia, fere ny'nyehn, n kehm gboko jamme enjel nyi tib-m nsol nyia alahng re me n kak-e.
66022009	Enjel nyio kehm-m tongo re, “Nobem re wo lim ano. Jo kak Esowo. Me n tob li nlokeltum ana wo, a abonane ba li abanyehnamahr, a ane ba kpo bum alum nya nwer nyia.”
66022010	Á kehm-m kpe tong re, “Ka bulu nwer nyia nyi alum enyehnamahr Esowo wob no, tibre ngare ebkabbe.
66022011	Nong, aneb ab'bi jo lim ab'bi, aneb eltehb sa ano go bo eltehb. Nong, anobonobo ane jo lim nob nob. Nong, ane ba li saang sa ano saang.”
66022012	Jisos kpe bung re, “Kpuren, n kp'bake go elwaare. M bahke koko eltuuru ename ba a ni ba tuuru nne awohng awohng ana á limi no.
66022013	Me wo li Alfa, me j'nehm wo li Omega. Me wo li ngbokambang, me j'nehm wo li nkahlanjahm. Me wo li mbomannahb, me j'nehm wo li es'kohlo.
66022014	“Elfuulu bahke jolo ka ane bao ba kpo ru akpawobo ebo saang, eji bo l'bel nsahm nyi bo bahke ma li akab nyao nya eti ji elkpin, fere bel nsahm nyi bo bahke ma sehng go abutahk nyao yel ejahbe jio.
66022015	Ane ba l'k'jol ejahbe jio, bo ba li ebv, aneb ntaane, ane ba kpo noongo a ane, awulane, abajomeblom, akimfahnge ane, a nne awohng awohng no afahnge kpo kor-e.
66022016	“Me Jisos, me wo ma tum enjel enyame tv-n re á ba yiimi ntianse go nsol nyia tong wahn aneb ero. Me wo li nlohk nyi Devid. Me n tob li nne no lohng go ege et'tohngo. Me wo li elonlo ji efungfu ji kpo sahb y'ya.”
66022017	Etingi Etohko, a nkalanne, bo kpo bung re, “Ba!” Nong, nne awohng awohng no l'wuk ellum nia tob bung re, “Ba!” Nong, ye ji alahb m-e kor, á ba, ba ko alahb ma elkpin mbol mbol, nne awohng awohng no l'fere kor-e.
66022018	N kp'rehke nne awohng awohng no l'wuk alum enyehnamahr nya wob nwer nyia re, Nne awohng awohng no l'budu ejum ajehng ajehng go alum nyaa, Esowo bahk-e budu erem ana bi bo nyono go nwer nyia.
66022019	Nne awohng awohng no l'yehke ellum anehng anehng go alum enyehnamahr nya wob nwer nyia, Esowo bahk-e taare nsahm nyi kehn á jol lehke akab nti nyao nya li go eti ji elkpin, fere taar-e nsahm nyi kehn á jol bele re á lene go mbarebare ejahbe jio ji bo nyono go nwer nyia.
66022020	Ye ji kp'yiimi ntianse go nsol nyia kp'bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp'bake elwaare.” Emen. Ba, Ntul a Jisos!
66022021	Nong, nnoobo nyi Ntul a Jisos Kraist jol a aneb Esowo kpee. Emen.
